[ Exits: n e s w d ] An automatic teller machine has been installed in the wall here. A lady in a wheelchair sits here helping newbies get to college.

mud.name: Powermud
mud.desc: The unique world of PowerMud has been around since May of 1997. The world is over 7000 rooms and is full of exotic and unique settings, monsters, and items. There are no 'stock' areas on PowerMud, they are only found here and nowhere else. There are Twelve different races to choose from, as well as over Twenty Guilds that you character can join. The types of Guilds range from Thieves, Mages, Clerics, Fighters, to other 'non-stock' guilds such as Assassins, Monks, Merchants, Cultists, and Illusionists. Having multiple characters is allowed as well, so you can find a character that suits you best. PowerMud uses a customized Skill system, where experience is gained for a certain skill by actually performing that skill! For instance, if your character can 'hide' in the shadows, practicing doing so will raise your skill level. No more dividing up your experience points between non-related skills! As for the different skill types, there is a high number of them, ranging from the normal combat skills (slash, blunt, pierce) to specialized skills such as 'Advanced Melee', 'Sailing', 'Mercantile', 'Fishing', and 'Mental Attack' (Psionics, which any Player could potentially possess). Once your character gains some well-deserved experience, you can then choose from over Forty Professions. These Professions will augment your general Guild skills, or perhaps add new ones. You could choose the Bard Profession, and learn how to play songs that boost skills while also gaining some needed thieving skills. Or perhaps you would want to go to the 'builder' Professions, such as Chef, Blacksmith, Carpenter, Inditar (Scroll making), Alchemist, or Artificer. Maybe you want to supplement your fighting skills, so you could go with Archer, Bladesman, Sapper, Duelist, Horseman, Blind-Fighter, or many others. Since you can have more than one Profession, the unique combinations possible are only limited by your imagination. PowerMud has a non-PK killing zone called the Killing Fields, where Players can go to and battle each other without fear of losing a life. Every now and then Grand Melees are held, with the winners obtaining prizes consisting of free experience, money, and magical equipment. The Developers and Players on PowerMud are friendly and easy to get along with, and the Admins are almost always online to answer any questions that you may have. If you log in and experience the unique atmosphere that is PowerMud, you will surely enjoy it.

mud.name: Survivors
mud.codebase: [Custom] This is a WAP MUD, you can play it using your WAP enabled mobile phone
mud.desc: Survivors is the first WAP MUD. You can play this MUD when waiting for the bus, or the dentist... All you need is a WAP enabled mobile phone.
WEB URL: http://www.m-toyz.com WAP URL: http://www.m-toyz.com/index.wml

mud.name: Sanity's Edge
mud.desc: Sanity's Edge is a cyberpunk genre mud set in the decaying center of Edge City. Two sides of life are vividly depicted, the rich, opulent life of the corporations and the wretched squallor of the street. The year is 2032 and local politics have been effectively controlled by the corporations, led by the dominating Cybernetic Matrix Designs corporation. The glittering CMD building looms brightly at the center of downtown, but not far away the seedier aspects of life hide in run-down apartment buildings and shadowy alleyways.

Street gangs stake out territory, and are always looking for more cannon fodder like you to join their ranks. Just remember, it's a war out there, and you never know when you might get caught in the crossfire. Crime is on the rise, and netrunners are the wave of the future, becoming the backbone of the crime scene with their intimate knowledge of the Net.

Safety has become a thing of the past; you may find yourself assaulted by a street kid with a switchblade or an irate shopowner with a sawed-off shotgun. With a little luck and some smarts, you might fight your way to the top -- even into a corporate job. And then you'll only have one thing to worry about, your CredCard -- never leave home without it.

mud.name: Death From Above
mud.desc: This is a Stock dystopia GW based mud. We are going to be working on ALOT of things but in the mean time we are open and running if you want to step in and check it out come on in. We are currently hiring coders and a couple of select builders. Coders MUST have experiance and Ideas for improvement . Builders MUST be creative if both MUST LOG Often and WORK if you don't want to work DO NOT APPLY.

mud.name: Dragonball New Universe: Hopes Beginning
mud.desc: Dbnu:hb is a Dragonball z mud that undergoing changes daily as we break away from the Saga Clone-age and work towards being a more Unique Dragonball MUD.

We offer a newbie friendly environment. We encourage roleplaying, but do not enforce it. We have many unique systems that allow players to expand in may different directions. Whether it be Roleplaying, Player Killing, or just playing the game.

We offer a working clan system, a unique reincarnate system, A Race Rank system, Automatic questing, as well as a wide range of areas and races. The mud is always being worked on, by our friendly immortal staff.
Players are willing to help newbies along whenever asked. Immortals are very hands on when it comes to the players, because we believe that the mud is yours just as much as ours.
Currently hiring RP Immortals, and builders. Any one interested should apply on the forums and be ready for a test on your job abilities.

mud.name: Prophecy
mud.desc: Prophecy has been around since 1995 and is still growing. It is based on the Belgariad and Mallorean series by David and Leigh Eddings and runs with a heavily modified ROM 2.4 code with a lot of unique features such as our clan system and mob-run Quests.

We are constantly adding new areas based on the Belgariad with the help of our productive builder staff giving you the feeling that you are actually walking around in the world the Eddings' created. New areas are constantly being worked on and we are always hiring new and capable builders.

Prophecy offers a playerclan system which means that players are able to band with friends and create their own armies, guilds or whatever they can think of. The three main clans allow those who join to fight for the Western of Eastern armies for supremacy or for the infamous Bearcult to try and revive Aloria.

We also offer three different types of Quest systems. Autoquests, mob-run quests and immortal-run quests. They are quite different and provide the players with all sorts of entertainment. Ever fancied playing a game of soccer in the capital of Sendaria? Join us and you can!
Interested? Come join us as a foul and evil Murgo, or a sneaky Drasnian spy and explore the world of the Belgariad.

mud.name: Realm of Utopian Dreams
mud.desc: The mission of the Realm of Utopian Dreams (RUD, est. 1996) is to provide players an enjoyable and challenging mix of role-play, hack-and-slash, and talker features within a FREE mud setting. Some of RUD's design choices emphasize role-play configurations: titles, character descriptions, pk ability, and nobility. Other features respond to player needs for communication and interaction: channels, committees, the court system, and implementing player opinion and ideas--expressed in our Yahoo Group polls--in order to improve the game and to make the environment more exciting and friendly.

We offer 16 races, 16 classes, 12 remort-races, 16 remort- classes, and 18 alignment-based original classes, each with special skills and abilities. Try your hand, for example, at playing a Geomancer, Samurai, Psiblade, Merchant, Ghostwalker, Pyromancer, or Espion. We provide automated mapping, an automated quest system and noble-run quests, random mud-wide bonuses, random mud-wide remort and pk options, an on-line builder and one of the largest systems of on-line help files around.

Challenge yourself by becoming a Noble of the Realm, attempt 9 levels of Nobility, and earn special perks: build and add to your castle, extend your lands and influence, rent rooms to other players, tax citizens, jail criminals, run special quests, appoint deputies, serve as judges, host special role-play events, participate in individual and team pk when you wish, enjoy perks to your weapons, gain bonus quest points, and add to your Noble webpage.
EXPLORE THE MEDIEVAL FANTASY. Visit our Yahoo group at: groups.yahoo.com/group/rud_mud
--Aequitas, Hierarch (on behalf of the Immortal Staff)

mud.name: Avalon: The First Age
mud.desc: Avalon: The First Age is a return to a time when Avalon was savage and untamed and civilisation was just beginning to emerge from the depths of the dark ages. There are three major cityports - Mercinae: City of Justice and Honour and home to the Mage, Knights, Mystics, Bards and Alchemists guilds Thakria: The City of Miracles, home to the power-seekers and evil guild of Sorcerers, Seers, Loremasters and Thieves. Parrius: City of the Free, once a pirate stronghold, Parrius is now home to the Minstrels, Warriors, Enchanters and Artisans. Others guilds exist that are more independent; The Rangers of the Greenwood, the peace-loving Animists and the secretive Brigands. This land is a rich tapestry of adventure and role play with the ultimate aim of ordination for the select few who can stand the course. This is not a game for the faint of heart, but for those who would stand up and be counted as legends and leaders in their own lifetime. This is a land of unrestricted combat incorporating the now famous Avalon combat system in full; oft copied but never bettered.

mud.name: Deren Gard
mud.desc: Deren Gard is a land in the midst of war between mortals and dragons. Cities have been burned to the ground, thousands of armies have been utterly destroyed. With a eery calm in the war, empires rebuild, and new heroes arise. Mortals must unite to destroy a common foe.

This is a fantasy themed mud, roleplaying is definately encouraged but not neccesary. This is a fully playerkill mud, but there are protections and limits to allow a friendly environment. We are currently rebuilding alot of the stock areas, and looking for builders to help us. There aren't really any major theme plans right now, looking for players and immortals to help influence what it changes into.
We are open for players right now, although expect many changes to come in the next few weeks. These changes shouldn't affect your gameplay too much, except to enhance it.

mud.name: Orta Dunya
mud.desc: Orta DÃ¼nya Mud tÃ¼rkÃ§e ve ingilizce komut dillerini destekleyen TÃ¼rkÃ§e, Anatolia3.0 tabanlÄ± ancak Ã¼zerine bir Ã§ok eklemeler ve dÃ¼zenlemeler yapÄ±lmÄ±ÅŸ, 2004 yÄ±lÄ±ndan bu yana tÃ¼rkÃ§eleÅŸtirme Ã§alÄ±ÅŸmalarÄ± devam eden ve yaklaÅŸÄ±k 100 bÃ¶lgeden kabaca %80'i tamamen TÃ¼rkÃ§eleÅŸtirilmiÅŸ bir mud.

Orta DÃ¼nya Ã–lÃ¼msÃ¼zleri

mud.name: Arion: the Nightmare
mud.desc: Arion: the Nightmare is the second edition of original Arion which no longer exists. The first version of Arion came out in 2004. Since that much has changed in a good way of course. In Arion there are 5 sides: Blackies (Orc, Goblin, Demon, Troll), Whities (Elf, Dwarf, Human, Hobbit), Brownies (Nomad, Giant, Ssrathi, Formian), Misties (Ghost, Wight) and Fallens (Drow, Gollum, Fallen, Duergar). These sides can do pk with each other. The main goal of a player here is to advance in levels until he or she is great enough to slay enemy heroes. Then the real fun begins. Arion is an innovative player kill encouraged MUD. There are all capabilities for role play as it makes the environment more natural. We like realism, we hide no brutality. Arion's player kill highly supports one's mudding skill - there are a lot of different strategies how to bring your enemy down. Also, we like it if the game is convenient to play so that all the necessary programming is always done for the mudding here to be as easy as possible. You can play Arion in IRONMAN mode - You will gain 2x exp but if you happen to die it will be permanent. If an ironman character becomes a hero (level 51) and it dies then it will become a Ghost/a Wight which is the only way to play these hidden races. Finally, Arion will be an ultimate MUD where magic and realism work together mixed with humor and fun. We like it if the game allows the player to do things it can do in real life and it is our main condition in development. Secondly, we try to avoid making any rules and punishments because we believe that it is possible to make the system so good that the count of rules would be minimal.

mud.name: Purple Dragon
mud.desc: Purple Dragon is a fantasy mud, you will find no blasters or modern cities here. We are a friendly place to hack and slash your way to the top. We have three remort levels so it can take a while to become a dragon slayer, but it is worth the struggle.
We have tried our best to make this the kind of mud that encourages just hanging out and helping others. Newbies are very welcome. There is nothing better than turning on a newbie to mudding. (IMHO)
Check out our homepage to see what all you can do, what spells and skills you can gain, and if your interested you can even look to see who is playing right now and what levels they are.
Clans are in once again!
The Purple Dragon in its fullest potential is back and growing!

mud.name: RealityBytes
mud.desc: We have added several unique areas. We have also added color, sounds, a hospital for corpse retrieval, auto-quest, remort classes and races, bounty, banks, lockers, and much more. Our staff and players are friendly and willing to listen to new ideas and suggestions. We have Imm run quests on Sunday afternoons, and quest points may be traded for stats. There is also a mob who will change evil/good aligned flags on equipment! We have an Order (Order of Mapmakers) that is devoted to mapping out the entire Realm, and has quite a few maps available already!
So drop by and try us out. We think you'll be glad you did!

mud.name: Rage of Vengeance
mud.desc: The Sixth Cycle of Rage of Vengeance has started April 2009!

Rage of Vengeance is a playerkill mud, giving players the choice to either play good- or evil-aligned in the eternal struggle between good and evil. Good and evil each has its own homelands, located on opposite sides of the map. Players are encouraged to get some levels and go out to seek the enemy and try to kill them.

Some other features: - Barbarian, Thief, Assassin, Sorcerer, Battlemage, Druid, Vampire, Paladin, Astra, Dark Knight, Healer classes, - Very easy leveling for the first 35 levels, - Up to 90 mortal levels, - Quests, bounties and chores to be done when pk-action is low, - Smart 'robot'-players to kill for pleasure and PK-practice, - Hireable henchmen to help you out, - A 'location' command to show your surroundings and a 'travel' command to help you find your way, - Our own code base (Ragemud, 99 percent modified SMAUG; much resemblance with the Emlen code now), - 140+ spells and 50+ skills, - An Annual Playerwipe (Cycles) to give new(er) players a chance to start even with the rest and for experienced players to try something different, and - Alltime statistics of the cycles on the website to make it all worthwile.

mud.name: Dragonball Z Universe : Reloaded!
mud.desc: tba

mud.name: Bleached InuYasha Galaxy
mud.desc: Bleached InuYasha Galaxy (previously known as InuYasha Galaxy) is a hybrid MUD that mixes together the Bleach and InuYasha anime series into one unique intense adventure.
[We also have a pure PVP/PK port open on port 1804]

Our average player count ranges from 5-20 players online. One of our most unique features is our shard system, where shards (shikon shards) of a jewel (the Shikon no Tama) have been scattered across both eras, thus players can find these shards and use them to increase their own power by embedding them into body parts as well as attaching them to items. This plays a very important role in our intense PK system as well. There is virtually no limit for the strength of a player, and we have absolutely no stock areas, classes, or races. Since players have full control over the clan system, clan wars become extremely bloody (and even more so with shikon shards in play).

Here are just some of our features: -Embed shards of the Shikon no Tama in different body parts for various strengths, or attach shards to weapons and armor. -Combine enough shards and create the Shikon no Tama, which can grant your deepest desire! -Create your own customizable Youkai (demon) transformation. -Travel between two worlds; the Modern and Feudal era (time travel). -A unique class system, where you can multi-class into different classes such as Combatant or Slayer, and level up the class. -Set up your own shop and sell items with a merchant cart. -Create, customize, and control your own clans. -Plenty of skills right from both anime series, such as Sankon Tetsusou (Iron Reaver Soul Stealer), or Kidou (Demon Arts). -An elemental system (fire, wind, earth, etc), where players can choose an element on creation as well as elemental weapons. -Unique weapon attacks, where special weapons can fire powerful attacks. ...and so much more!
The current MUD version is alpha.

mud.name: No Reality
mud.desc: In the beginning, there was reality... Then we trashed that whole idea and went with chaos and lunacy instead. We felt it would be more fun that way.
On the first day, we created an account system to keep players more organized... And it was good.
On the second day, we created a new kind of auction system, never seen before in MUDs... And it was good.
On the third day, we created speedwalk and multi-commands... And it was good, but the players wanted more! So, on the fourth day, we created clans so that players could congregate.
On the fifth day, we did away with PK... And the morts stopped killing each other.
On the sixth day, we made the mobs come to life so the world was not so dreary and boring.
On the seventh day, we thought players should have a lot of fun with Quests, so we created ways to let Immortals run quests a lot easier... And that was definitely good.
On the eighth day, we gave the world a face-lift and it looked new.

And then, on the ninth day (yes, we have nine, you'll get used to it) we added a lot more... Then we slept for about 40 hours straight. And we spoke the words, and you came forth to multiply... And kill mobs.

mud.name: The Lion King
mud.desc: The Lion King--a movie which touched the hearts of millions and has continued to do so in the form of a game: The Lion King Muck. The Muck has returned to TLK's roots, and is about to begin the rule of Ahadi, father of Mufasa and Scar. If you are interested in being a part of the history that will shape the way we look at the Lion King, then join today! You can play any creature you like that is present on the African Contenent--a lioness, leopard, cheetah, hyena, elephant, zebra, civet, serval, antelope, eagle. The possibilities are endless! Come visit us and discover why we have been here for seven years and are still running strong.

mud.name: Enkidu
mud.desc: Enkidu is a fantasy setting MUD with classes and skills available. We are currently redoing our character creation to give preset 3-18 stats at creation and some additional creation options. The world contains newbie areas and is redeveloping existing advanced level areas. We have no actual level cap. Enkidu is under redevelopment and we are looking for players who are willing to post suggestions and comments and be part of rebuilding the game system and world. We encourage role playing in the general world and have non-role play areas for players to 'be themselves' in. We do not punish failure to role play but will be working on incentives for those who do. The early players who help in our development will have a jump on becoming creators as positions open up in the future.

mud.name: Time Portal
mud.desc: We are a very helpful mud for those people who have never palyed on a mud before it is mainly stock with lots of added areas so if you not so new to the game you will have a good feel for where areas are placed. We have just finished upgrading the server and lag should be non-exhistant. Feel free to stop by and check us out. We are also always looking for quality builders. Can't wait to see you.

mud.name: The Legends of Krynn
mud.desc: The Legends of Krynn has a lot to offer, with all original areas, and a very unique code system. The areas are built with extreme accuracy, as close to the books as possible. The Legends of Krynn offers a wide variety of races as well as classes, clans, skills, spells and various other options. Roleplay is encouraged and enforced. The date in which The Legends of Krynn takes place, is shortly after the War of the Lance (30 years after). Many unique systems not found anywhere else, such as our very unique Grouping system and our Clan system, reside here. Solamnic Knights govern the world as 'police', as they do in the books. There is NO Auto-Flagging for (Thief, Killer, Treason, Assault, Outlaw). Flagging of another player for a crime is controlled by members of the Solamnic Knights. Come check it out, but be warned, this MUD, while very newbie friendly, is still probably more for advanced MUDers, or people who have never played a MUD before and were never corrupted by all the Power MUDs out there. This is NOT a POWER MUD. No powerleveling here. Intelligence is requierd.

mud.name: Realm of Magic
mud.desc: Enter the Realm of Magic and discover the Magic and Mysteries that it holds for you.

Slay monsters, cast spells, mix alchemy potions or just rely on your wits and skills. Go on over 70 scripted quests, accept randomly generated assignments, take part in one of the many online quests directed by immortals and mortals alike or face the automated mayhem of vikings attacking a coastal town. Recover from your adventures in the harbour town of Moonglow, share your stories about mythical monsters, hidden cities and relate rumours about werewvolves and vampires. Socialise in the famous orders and take over responsbilities as a venerable judge, advisor or even lord. To encourage roleplay, people are allowed to customize their description in extra details or clothing and use an extended emote command.

Extra emphasis is put on easy use of the Realm. A java applet is installed on the homepage for playing the game and extensive in-game features support decent playing even with telnet e.g. multiple command aliases and speedwalk and many other things. Additionally, MXP extensions for clicking of actions have been added for player convenience.
Blind or visually impaired people using a talker program should connect to port 4002, which reduces the text sent to the client massively.
And yes, the Realm is running on a dedicated server with good connection to the internet.
Newest addition: Britannica

mud.name: The Retaliation
mud.desc: Here is the Retaliation, the mud that can never be considered dull. If you are tired of playing muds that never seem to change, or muds that promise change then never fulfill their promises, then come and join us! Here we are constantly changing for the better, new areas are being made regularly, classes get recoded, and the players are always encouraged to put forth ideas to help with the mud.
WELCOME
The Retaliation is based off the Godwars Mud, though heavily modified, and offers a wide variety of classes, there is sure to be one that will suit you best.
At present we have the following classes:

AMAZONS - Female warriors with major attitude. ANGELS - Warriors for all that is good. BASTETS - not your typical housecat. DEMONS - Warriors for all that is evil. DJINN - Mystical beings from the deepest desert. DRAGONS - Flying serpents of massive destructive power. HUNTERS - Slayers of the supernatural. MAGES - Beings who have mastery over the mystic world. MONKS - Male warriors with major attitude. MUMMYS - Bandage-wrapped beings of a undead nature. SIDHE - Graceful elven beings who control the natural world. VAMPIRES - The blood-sucking undead. WEREWOLVES - Not your typical guard dog. WRAITHS - Ghostly beings who can affect the mortal realm.
We also have hybrid classes!
Celestial Chorister - a hybrid class comprised of Mages and Angels. Damphyr - a hybrid class comprised of Vampires and Monks.
We just added:
Kaji - a hybrid class comprised of Demons and Mummys.
We are planning on adding several more selections of hybrid classes.
We do our best to balance the classes against each other, based on the skill of an average player. We welcome new players, old players and lurkers. We offer PK, both in and out of an arena.
Come and join us! We will be expecting you.

mud.name: BayMOO
mud.desc: There are two major themes that make BayMOO unique among the all-text virtual realities on the NET: 1) The Humanities of the San Francisco Bay Area and 2) The Meanings of Water.
These are available to all who want to explore their uses, and the janitors of BayMOO urge you to use them. But those who feel called to other frontiers are also welcome to help build BayMOO.

mud.name: Seeds of Hate: Chaotic Chronicle
mud.desc: Welcome to Seeds of hate: Chaotic Chronicle.
If you've ever played Seeds of Hate before, you probably loved it.
If you loved it, come back and give it a shot. If you've never played Seeds of Hate, it's basically what happens when you cross a Dystopia with a RPG.
Seeds of Hate features 16 completely original classes: Ghoul, Warlock, Thief, Demon, Skyblade, Mage, Druid, Swordsman, Warrior, Dark Knight, Drow, Wolfkin, Knight, Draconian, Vampire, and Cleric.
There is also a tier system, which allows for a much more open PvP experience.
Finally, Seeds of Hate features a pet system, where you can buy a pet from a shop and have it level with you.
Come on by, give us a shot, you won't be disappointed.
-Zig

mud.name: Metro II: Toronto by Night
mud.desc: Metro has undergone a change. At the end of 2005, the game was shut down and all old characters who had been created from 1998 when the original game opened up to that date were cleared from the database. Metro opened again using the name \"Metro II\" or \"M2\" enforcing all new characters, all new plots, and an extremely active staff and playerbase.

M2 is still set in Toronto and old players may note a comfortable feeling on the refurbished but familiar city-grid. Players may apply for one supernatural-based character and choose from any of eight different spheres to play in. Changeling: The Dreaming, Demon: The Fallen, Mage: The Ascension, Werewolf: The Apocalypse, Vampire: The Masquerade, and Wraith: The Oblivion are all supported as well as Mortal PCs and an Asian sphere that includes Hengyokai Shifters and Kuei-Jin vampires.
New players are encouraged to stop by and check the game out. Returning players are always welcome.

mud.name: Ansalon
mud.desc: Welcome to Ansalon,

Ansalon is a Dragonlance MUD (Multi User Dungeon, Text Based Game) where a player can become an imaginary character in the DragonLance world, and interact with other players who are also playing at the same time. Your character can be a Silvanesti Elf, a Neidar Dwarf, a Human, a Minotaur, a fun-loving Kender, or any of a multitude of races.

Ansalon has been up and running since 1996. It is a stable, well-developed world, with custom code and custom areas to explore. Even over a decade later, we're making upgrades and changes on a weekly basis!

Ansalon is always looking for new players with new stories to tell and new conflicts to insight. Speaking of stories, check out our stories page!! Thousands of stories from 1999 through now! Read them by author, updated as they post!

Newbies are encouraged and with them in mind, Ansalon offers detailed maps and lots of people willing to help out and give advice so that folks unused to Ansalon _don't_ have to struggle through the often painful process of learning a new MUD. There is a great 'USE' command for almost any object you find, give it a shot! Ask questions on the Newbie channel (or OOC), get all of the free maps from the school.. And READ that email we sent you, it does have some great information on how to get started!

We fully encourage clans and other organizations. Perhaps you'd like to join the Solamnic Knights? Or join the Conclave of Mages? Or maybe you want to take over the world in one of the wings of Takhisis' Dragonarmies? No matter what your character wants to do, there's a clan that should suit his/her taste.
This is the Ansalon people talk about, where we share our love of the DragonLance world without an iron fist... We welcome all of you home.

Recent additions: 5 coin system, full on insane fishing code!, drinking anywhere that makes sense, corks & labels for potions, fountains that gurgle and refill, nuances that make the game feel real, much much more! See our changes page on the web by year at: http://ansalon.wolfpaw.net/new/changes.php
Visit our website at: http://ansalon.wolfpaw.net

mud.name: 7 Degrees of Freedom
mud.desc: 7 Degrees of Freedom has now been in operation for over eight years, having just undergone a huge expansion involving 24 new quests and 4 new classes. Equipment storage has been added, and large expansions to several other zones have been implemented. Our quest and zone writers have added new material that gives the world a unique face and map.

The game dynamically resets objects and mobiles in a way invisible to players. Once you have reach the level of Wizard you can become mortal again, and run more quests to try and reach the level of MasterWizard. Our quest information system assigns a combat and puzzle rating to each quest, to help you gear your challenge to your ability.

As with most Abers, Roleplay is not encouraged and the main emphasis on the MUD is on everyone having a good time. The 7DOF ethos is that players should be permitted to enjoy their MUDing experience, hence we do not have niggling rules against quest recompletion, etc.
We are open to our players' ideas and suggestions, and enjoy receiving submissions for new quests and zones.
We also pride ourselves on not having tell-logging or snooping. Privacy is respected.

mud.name: DBZ: Land Of Psycho's
mud.desc: Dragon Ball Z: Land Of Psychos Is a new Dragon Ball Z Saga Mud Ran by the owner of the CraZee Records Server We Are Currently Hiring Builders and Coders Open to and Unlimited Amount of Builders and Coders And Are OPEN for players So come and play, and have fun. We will be adding changes to the mud as time goes by so w00t
I generaly have no rules Cept No Multiplayin and Racism!
--Server/Mud Owner -Jamie Madrox

mud.name: Realms of Despair
mud.desc: Realms of Despair remains one of the most stable, well established, popular muds for the past few years.

It is the development grounds for the SMAUG code, runs on a dedicated PII server with 256 Megs of RAM on multiple high speed (T3+) redundant Internet connections. It has over 20,000 active player files, and regularily peaks at well over 500 players.
We are newbie-friendly and have gone to great lengths to create a great community for our wonderful players.
Our extremely dedicated team of coders, builders and administrators have kept this mud alive and well through thick and thin -- Why? For the players. We are extremely player dedicated.
We have clans, guilds, orders, councils, well over a hundred non-stock areas, and all the 'stock' areas have been revamped and enhanced. -- Beware! This game is very addictive!

mud.name: AddictMUD
mud.desc: Partially based on the world of Drageara created by fantasy author Steven Brust, AddictMud features 65 mortal levels, 8 classes, 3 special remort classes, and an additional two remort only races with their own inherent skills and abilities.
You can also join guilds, which will open up new abilities and bonus' not available to any other class.

Players from all over the world regularly play for extended periods of time, which generally makes for an interesting and entertaining mudding experience, and usually guarantees company at all hours of the day.

Help is readily at hand either via the online help system, or from one of the experienced players online. Many players have been with Addict since the beginning, and we get new players 'addicted' almost daily!

* Newbie friendly!!! Zones and equipment exist to help ease a new player into playing, so they don't feel lost in the shuffle of a new mud * Limited multi-play allowed (two characters at a time) * 8 mortal and 3 remort classes, 65 levels * Constantly growing number of join-able guilds to further customize your character * 3 playable races, 2 via remort only with special race specific skills * Over 200 zones, with over 15,000+ rooms (more being developed constantly) * Quests frequently held for redeemable quest points and prizes * In game quests to find or assemble rare equipment * Helpful Immortal staff and newbie friendly mortal player base * Alias system with presets for newbies * Fully functional clan system with clan halls/areas and clan quests * PK during TCs (total carnage) held for fun and sport * Free rent! * Customized scripting and special properties to make mudding a very unique experience * Player owned personalized 'housing' which allows players to safely store excess equipment, and expand their own domicile * Five player hometowns spaced around the vast world

mud.name: WileyMUD III
mud.codebase: [Dikumud] lots of bits and pieces stuffed in here
mud.desc: Greetings!
What you have here is a classic. WileyMUD III is a cleaned up release of the mud that ran at WMU for several years back in 1992, and then again briefly in 1995.

You will find a pretty well balanced game, using traditional AD&D second edition rules. You'll find multi-classing. You'll find mobs that are somewhat more clever than usual. You'll also find an entire world, all original, and over 3000 rooms in size.

You won't find lots of flashy ANSI colours, nor will you find Ub3r-D3tH Swordz that do 9999 points of damage. You won't find a cuddly mud school to wipe the noses of players who are used to being immortal inside of a week.
I've had this game up and running for my own testing purposes for quite a while, and occasionally see someone drop by. So, I figured why not see if anyone out there wants to actually play the game?
You won't find any immortals on, but if people really do start playing, I might just see about getting a few to mind the store.
-Dread Quixadhal.

mud.name: Second Sun MUD
mud.desc: Second Sun MUD is set on a gigantic, city-sized space station far from Earth.

In orbit with a small planet circling the second star humanity has ever lived around, the station is an almost completely self-sufficient artificial ecosystem. It was built from the three immense star ships the ancestors of the present inhabitants used to travel from Earth's solar system. The ships were known as â€œgeneration shipsâ€ because they were designed to house many generations of people in order to facilitate a journey far longer than the human lifespan. There are more than a million people currently living aboard.

The station has been in complete isolation for the last three and a half centuries, not including the time it took for the ships to first arrive. For unknown reasons, 40 years into the voyage, transmissions from the home system stopped completely and abruptly. Though many of the ships' passengers wanted to turn back around to find out what was wrong, it was ultimately decided that too much had already been invested. The ships already had all the supplies and information they needed to complete the mission, and they could always await for word from the home world at their destination. Apart from the radio silence and four major, failed attempts at mutiny, the journey went as planned.

Conditions aboard the station are varied, as they can be in any metropolis, and range from the squalid and derelict to the pristine. The conjoined hulls of the three star ships form the core of the station, which today makes up only about 40% of its total mass. The rest has been built from materials mined from beneath the surface of the planet it is in orbit with.

The de jure government aboard the station takes the form of a representative democracy, and anyone over the age of 20 who is of organic origination and has not been convicted of a felony can vote. While the original government retains tight control over portions of the station, many areas have managed to slip into the hands of unrecognized splinter governments; some parts of the station, particularly the oldest, have degenerated into various states of anarchy.

mud.name: Isle of War
mud.desc: A nice combination of PK and RP with both enforced and encouraged. Classes are designed to encourage diversity in combat tactics, with both individual and group tactics considered no one-dimensional spam. The lands themselves are designed to make some unique races such as wolverines and treants, to go with the old staples like humans and orcs.

mud.name: Astral Plains
mud.desc: I am currently looking for coders so i can get my mud up and running. I am open to new ideas and will give almost anyone at least a try so if you're interested please e-mail me at treitz@stny.rr.com and I will get back to you.
Myrick

mud.name: Realms of the Dragon
mud.desc: Realms of the Dragon is a hugely successful LP mud that has run for over ten years and in that time, attracted a strong and loyal player-base. We are open 24 hours a day and are entirely free to play. With an enormous, completely original world of 20,000+ rooms, numerous guilds(classes) and races, and a variety of special interest organizations, the options are limitless in your quest for excitement.

With many quests available, and frequent immortal run online interactive games, from gladiator tournaments to trivia, to scavenger hunts and our own unique 'RoDopoly', there is plenty to test an adventurer’s mind and body. With customisable player housing, an advanced sailing and ocean system, and a detailed skill and training scheme, Realms of the Dragon is a rich tapestry of adventure.
Let your imagination roam free as you immerse yourself in Realms of the Dragon.

mud.name: Meadows MUCK
mud.desc: Meadows MUCK is a North American wildlife roleplaying haven set in a fictional area of the country during the early 1900s, featuring wolves, cougars, rabbits, cats, dogs, foxes, horses, and various other species that would inhabit the woodland areas featured here. While there is a small degree of human presence, the focus will be on the interactions between the animals. Originality and creativity are embraced.

mud.name: Insomniacs Asylum
mud.desc: We are currently running on a ROM Version 2.4 beta. Many modifications have been made and it is still a work in progress. We are currently looking for serious players to just play, test and/or advance to possibly becoming a builder. Also, we are looking for experienced builders who are willing to put time and effort in and also attempt to conform to a unique building style implemented currently. Please do not ask to become a builder if you do not have the time to put into it. Any slackers will be frowned upon and other nasty stuff that we will think of later. Roleplaying is Highly recommended mainly because it's fun. Be crazy, be silly, just be there.

mud.name: Ravenswood Academy
mud.desc: Ravenswood Academy is a teen superhero game, set in the Champions Universe, running on the Hero System. Our goal is to provide a fun, active game, especially for people who like the Ravenswood Academy is a teen superhero game, set in the Champions Universe, running on the Hero System. Our goal is to provide a fun, active game, especially for people who like the \"online tabletop\" style of play, and enjoy using dice, spending XP, and the like. We pattern ourselves after the topical materials of the genre, things like \"New Mutants\", \"Teen Titans\", \"Young Justice\" and the like. So, there's tons of games out there on the internet...why choose us? We like to believe that the key to success for a game like this is actually having staff who are proactive staffers. So we'll be actively running plots and stories. We help make your character with you, so you've got a hand right from the start. We're not afraid to say \"no\" when needed to keep the game at the right feel and theme, and we're also not afraid to say \"get out\" to elements that might be disruptive. We hold to the basic philosophy that we're all here to have fun and tell a good story together. We want: people who are willing to be active, to be part of a good story, and who are as willing to help their fellow players look awesome as they are to look awesome themselves. People who are willing to blend the fun and wonder and humor of teen superheroes with the more serious side of coming-of-age without falling into the twin perils of angst or special-snowflakism.

If this sounds like the kind of place you might be interested in, check us out! You can view our wiki (the first, best place for information) at http://ravenswoodacademy.org/db And if you want to connect up and check out the place, just connect to ravenswood.genesismuds.com 4227

mud.name: Splintered Realms
mud.desc: Splintered Realms is a new beginning for an older mud, Legend of Dracon II which was closed some years back. It is also the beginning of something new, taking the 40+ races, 11 classes (with 9 variations of mage plus a choice of wild magic or not and each deity's cleric is specialized) and going further.

The world is limited to one continent now, Matierra but it is no small place easilly over 10,000 rooms. Expansions will be ongoing, including another continent and other areas on at least one other world itself. There are currently 6 hometowns, each with its own design and some specialized for certain races.

Splintered Realms welcomes the casual player as well as the avid roleplayer, though it is expected that everyone will put some effort to their character, a description, filling out a profile which can be detailed or just a facts sheet.

Also, one of the nice features to this codebase is that the player first logs in with an email address. Once this is done they may make new characters under that email and need never remember more then their one account password. The command 'skinslip' allows a player to change between characters without logging off.
We hope others will give the mud a try and see how unique and entertaining it can be.

mud.name: Realmsmud
mud.desc: One of the oldest LPmuds, founded June 1991, Realmsmud is a large LP based MUD with 30+ players on at peak times. Well over 150 wizards have contributed to the more than sixty different areas that are open for exploration by players. There are several unique aspects of Realmsmud, including the multi- character system, a volunteer militia, an extensive player run nobles system where players may band together to create and defend their house against seiges from rival houses, and finally a trade skills system. Trades include Alchemy, Blacksmithing, Cartography, Fletching, Jewelcraft, Leathercraft, and Tailoring. Players have the option of creating their own fortress with rooms and monsters. So, feel free to drop in on us. New players will enter the game at Central Park (CP) after going through the brief character creation process. To help new players get acclimated to Realmsmud, they are given a chat line to ask questions on. Volunteer players above level 15, called newbie helpers, are online to answer any questions that a player might have about the mud.

mud.name: Redemption
mud.desc: Once, long ago, while I wandered between worlds, I heard whisper of an ancient conflict. Old hatreds between peoples; long ago enemies from across the sea. thirteen years ago, the first gossip came to me, that on this one world, a 'new' Continent was discovered. How they were gravely mistaken: instead of prosperous fields and lands to be conquered, the followers of Bosco rediscovered the people of Selina. For a time, they attempted to live in peace, however their differences were too great, and the rumbles of war could be heard once again.

As I continued to drift in the sea of dimensions, I was drawn to this world. I heard that one could be reborn as a new race there, or continue ones studies to new levels of specialization. There were four, then five, now four again factions to be found there, fighting amongst themselves for control. Did they not see the bigger picture? Perhaps, only from the outside, could I hear the winds of change. This land held much promise, and I had much to atone for. Perhaps here, I could finally be redeemed for my sins. As you read this, fellow traveller, I have departed for this world. I believe it to be the place of my salvation... and perhaps yours too. Will you join me and seek REDEMPTION?

Redemption has an extremely well developed pkill system. The great majority of Redemption's 14 year history has involved balancing and adding to our pkill system, while maintaining an enjoyable option for those who do not wish to pkill.

Redemption is constantly updating and improving, with 3.5 active coders. Most recently, a hardcore pkill system (full loot is back), a new class, metallic dragon colours, and player-controllable areas were added.

As Redemption has 10 races (many with racial-variations such as dragon colours or sliver types), each with 2 sub-races, and 13 classes, each with 2 sub-classes, you will spend countless hours trying new combinations. Redemption is well known for having a close relationship between the coders and the mortals, meaning all changes are carefully debated and vetted before implementation.
Come and check out the rich history, experienced playerbase, and loads of fun that Redemption has to offer!

mud.name: Rehobaom's Legacy
mud.desc: Rehobaom's Legacy is a ten year old mud, run by artist Gabrielle Taylor (yes, that Taylor), and physicist Tomohiko Tanabe. Russ Taylor (yes, that other Taylor) continues to loiter and hit on the girls. It may or may not be art. It is state-of-the-art Rom 4.1, aka Athen 1.2.
It has:

* a fire staff is * a light source * a staff of fireballs * AND a weapon, ALL IN ONE ITEM! * multi-location wear: * a suit covers your whole body * a cestus armors your hand and forearm, AND is a weapon * a cloak covers your shoulders and back * hit locations: being hit in the neck hurts! * mobs don't have unlimited mana - just like you * mobs heal and spell themselves up - just like you * the healer knows what's wrong with you, and casts what you need! * found your own guild, build your own house * death spells and vorpal swords * forge your own armor, sew your own clothes, concoct your own pills * illusory servants and undead creation spells * (hundreds of spells, really) * seven gods; each god has its own custom classes * easily find common areas by tracking landmarks * huge, original, detailed main city with over a hundred shops * don't want to PK? stay in the biggest dimension, Arethuse * want to PK? the dimension of Munesol allows unrestricted murder * rain leaves puddles; snow leaves snowdrifts

Rehobaom is beautifully written, with details and backstory that have evolved over the past decade. With the new, newbie friendly classes and landmarks, there's never been a better time to try us out.
Rom 4.1 is smart dumb fun.
hypercube.org 9000

mud.name: RetroMUD
mud.desc: RetroMUD consists of no less than six worlds, each with its own unique theme. Battle djinn in the air world of Raji, fight fishfolk in the water world of Wysoom, bag yourself a Tyrannosaurus in the steaming jungles of Sosel, wander the massive underground complex in the dead world of Crypt, go wild in the crazy and violent place known as Perdow...or just go dragon hunting in medieval fashion on Welstar. Our guilds are heavily researched and we use real life inspirations for their backgrounds. The Templar guild is really based on the Templars (from the titles, to the starting equipment). Psionicists are based on the actual principles of Chakras. Druids are true to their Celtic roots rather than a bunch of eco-terrorists! Not enough? We've got over 60 races, over 20 classes, hundreds of unique skills and spells, quests tailored to guilds, explosive events, castles -- you name it, we've got it. And if we don't have it, we're working on it. It's six MUDs in one. Come by and check us out. You'll be glad you did!

mud.name: Return of the Shadow
mud.codebase: [Circlemud] Circle (heavily modified) -- smooth transition into C++ original code is planned
mud.desc: When Frodo destroyed the One Ring, Shadow fell, Sauron and his darkness were no more, and all lived happily for about 200 years. Until....

The best war MUD, RETURN OF THE SHADOW, is a dedicated Tolkien game. Join either good or evil side battling for the supremacy of the world! The MUD features have many unique spells/skills, an original Tolkien world, many classes, including an option to make your own class, races you would expect to find on Arda, restricted player killing (race war), a more realistic fighting/spell/skill system. Roleplaying is highly encouraged. Happy mudding!

mud.name: Match Of The Millennium
mud.desc: Change is in the air at Match of the Millennium. Ancient evil stirs, masterful fighters struggle with one another in a power play that stretches generations. Come experience one of the deepest combat experiences available in a setting rich with kung fu lore, a chance to create new adventures with timeless characters. MotM draws its characters and theme inspiration from classic fighting series like King of Fighters, Street Fighter, and Fatal Fury. Players have an opportunity to step into the shoes of classic fighting game characters and expand their stories, or craft their own would-be fighting legends.

It's No Sin to Be Mighty: Match of the Millennium boasts the most balanced, nuanced, and diverse combat system of any game of its kind, and players are encouraged to master its intricacies. Some have said that we are two games in one -- being both cooperative role-playing endeavor and competitive turn-based battle of wits -- and indeed, the original vision for our combat system was one that, like a fighting game, could be pushed to its limits by canny players without ever allowing exploitation while balancing the system. We are very proud of the result: one that, like all great games, allows complex possibilities to arise from simple fundamentals. But crucial to the success of this approach is our culture, of which we are equally proud: one that firmly values role-playing over character power or player skill. Fundamentally, characters compete, but players cooperate -- to create a story that all can enjoy. Remember, it's no sin to be mighty at Match of the Millennium, but here, true victories are always shared.

New Challengers Welcome: Jump right in to the action with our new streamlined application process, or design your own character and freely choose the level of power and experience you wish your creation to begin at. Our new and innovative approach distinguishes between Supporting and Core Feature Characters, separating them not by power or popularity but by the amount of background knowledge required to adequately role-play them, thereby allowing new players unfamiliar with the theme to still start at whatever skill level they find most interesting and learn about the world as they go. Many fighting game characters can be sufficiently summarized with a paragraph and their unique look or style; precisely part of the appeal of a game like Match of the Millennium is fully realizing a living character from a cool or memorable template. It is our hope and ambition that all players do just that over the course of play -- but not our expectation that they have done so before they begin. At Match of the Millennium we offer several hundred of these characters already statted for play, many easy to make your own.

Read more at http://motm.kicks-ass.net or connect at telnet://motm.kicks-ass.net:2002 and expand the epic tale of your favorite character, or craft your own warrior on the path to enlightenment... or destruction.

mud.name: Being renamed
mud.desc: We are under construction so we are not open to the public for play right now, but if you want to stop by and apply for a position on the staff drop by. This mud is role play inforce due to the actions of the players effect what is going on in the ever evolving plot of the mud.There is clan halls and housing in place. Clans are set up and maintained through you the players. You only have so many pk deaths before you'r char is completly dead. There is a great mud for first timers. We are always adding new areas and code. We like to hear feed back from players. Idea will be concidered and if hey fit within the aspects of the story will be implamented. Clans get specal skills and weapons also. Drop by and have fun.

mud.name: Time of Troubles
mud.desc: Time of Troubles is a Rom/Sunder/Rot mud with many additions. Theme is basic medieval with an AD&D Forgotten Realms influence and feel. We strive for class diversity while retaining balance. Our immortal staff is extremely dedicated, and we boast a near completely original world which is still growing daily. The players on Time of Troubles are extremely helpful and full of ideas, which us implementor/coders take into full consideration and most often find a way of working into the code in a balanced manner. We boast three competent coders, two of which are owners of the mud. We never have problems with coders not doing things here, and will be expanding as rapidly as players permit. Time of Troubles is a pk optional mud, with many things for nonpk players, while maintaining an intense pk environment. Our roleplaying is ran by a team of professional staff members and encourages everyone to join in and help shape the world of Time of Troubles. A VERY brief overview of some of our features: (to see more, read \"help changes\" when you log onto the mud).

***34 selectable player races. ***9 selectable player classes: Warrior, Mage, Thief, Cleric, Ranger, Monk, Chaosmage, Elementalist, Archer. We also have 3 new classes currently in heavy development. ***An extremely user friendly built in map and configurable mini-move-map system for easy navigation. ***Over 500 new skills and spells added, along with all the classics being rebalanced and reworked for the class system. ***Numerous new functions and features too abundant to name. Encumberance, Chaotic spell effects, a D&D style feat system, player ran clans with wars, etc. We will never stop advancing.

Time of Troubles is a stable mud with a staff that logs on daily and makes changes, but most importantly listens to players. Time of Troubles will continue to grow and change based around the players while still retaining balance. Come join the Troubles. We hope to see you soon.

mud.name: Spindizzy
mud.desc: Imagine using a continually updated text-based system in which one, by typing out descriptions of oneself and one's activities, and in turn reading the descriptions of others and their activities, simulates the experience of being in strange an unearthly places doing all sorts of imaginative and even not physically possible activities.

Now consider Spindizzy, a product of modern design and the latest in scientific engineering. Our electronic brain, called a 'computer,' makes it possible for people from all over the world to participate without learning the tedious punch-card skills and assembler instructions that older, less sophisticated systems demand.

mud.name: Beutelland
mud.desc: Inventive Austrian MUD, created by informatics students at the Vienna University of Technology. The Beutelland is based upon an entirely new MUDLib called RoleMUD, which offers a wide range of features like weather, environmental stats, colourfulness, day/night change, extralogins, interactive plans a.m.m...

The Beutelland features fantasy themes of basically Tolkinian flavour, but doesn't take anything too seriously. Ardent fs/sf readers and/or computer game players will surely encounter many allusions to classic genre representatives.

The World (mythically created by the holy Beuteltier (zool. marsupial, opossum) contains differing climate/culture zones like plains, mountains, sea, viking island, jungle. Players can choose a hometown/region of their liking.
Eligible races up to now include Dwarfs, Humans, Hobbits and Elves, NPCs will show up in whatever form our coders imagination can spawn. (Items too).

Guilds and Trades are under construction, but we offer >20 Quests of mounting difficulty and lots of interesting details to research, treasures to find, monsters to kill and of course many interesting people to meet.
If you speak (any variant of) German and don't mind persisting Austriacisms, you will always be welcome in Beutelland. For further information, please have a look at our website.

mud.name: World of Naruto
mud.desc: World of Naruto is based on Naruto, written by Masashi Kishimoto.

In this MUD, you choose from one of 9 villages, one of 65 clans, a specialty out of Genjutsu, Ninjutsu, Taijutsu or Ninja Artist, a blood summon from Toad, Serpent, Slug or Hound, one of 11 guilds (or none at all).
You can do one of 2 types of auto missions (kage or reward), mob-run missions (get item, etc), imm-run missions, player-run missions (leaders only).
Players can become leader of their village (kage), their clan, or their guild.

Players begin life as an academy student, pass exams to become a Genin, go through the Forest of Death in their Chuunin exams, fight legendary ninja in their Tokubetsu Jounin exams, battle the 6 Paths of Pain in their Jounin exam, and finally defeat True Pain for their S-rank exam.
S-rank ninja gain the immortality jutsu and can choose a new body.
Whether you love Naruto, love MUDs or even if not, there is something in this MUD for everyone.
We offer all that you would expect to find in a World of Naruto, all mobs, skills and ideas from the series.

mud.name: CfMud - Mud de Ciencia Ficcion
mud.codebase: [SWR] Source heavily modified, completely original world
mud.desc: CfMud is the first Spanish science fiction mud. It's under active development and we are accepting players as testers and builders. Code base is Star Wars Reality, but it has been heavily modified and the world is completely original and not-based in star wars or any other existent science fiction world.

CfMud es el primer mud de ciencia ficciÃ³n en espaÃ±ol. EstÃ¡ siendo desarrollado activamente y aceptamos jugadores como testeadores y constructores. El cÃ³digo se basa en Star Wars Reality, pero ha sido ampliamente modificado y el mundo es completamente original y no estÃ¡ basado en star wars o ningÃºn otro mundo de ciencia ficciÃ³n existente.

Explora los confines de la Galaxia a bordo de tu nave estelar. Lucha contra los seres mÃ¡s insÃ³litos en los parajes mÃ¡s desolados. Comercia con mercaderes de mil especies alienÃ­genas. Toma el control de las empresas transplanetarias y de los gobiernos de todo el cosmos. Construye tus propios artilugios y naves espaciales. Descubre la cura para un nuevo virus que estÃ¡ asolando planetas enteros, o crea una enfermedad que sirva a tus oscuros designios. RelaciÃ³nate con otros jugadores en un entorno original y apasionante.
Entra en CfMud, el mud de ciencia ficciÃ³n.
Â¡Bienvenido al espacio!

mud.name: New Draconia Muck
mud.desc: What exactly is New Draconia Muck? It's the first triple-themed, fully anthropomorphic, all adult muck.
New Draconia Muck is a different concept that allows for a little something for everyone. Three Realms form the worlds of the Muck where adults can find just about any form of roleplay.
We do our best to keep our posted information up to date.

mud.name: Uzak Diyarlar
mud.desc: Uzak Diyarlar Mud TÃ¼rkÃ§eleÅŸtirilmiÅŸ Anatolia 3.0 Ã¼zerine inÅŸa edilmiÅŸtir. Uzak Diyarlar'da rol yapmak Ã¶nemlidir. Oyunun kimi Ã¶zellikleri aÅŸaÄŸÄ±dadÄ±r:
15 Ä±rk 13 sÄ±nÄ±f 8 kabal ( klan ) 6 din Binlerce oda YÃ¼zlerce yetenek ve bÃ¼yÃ¼
Mud'a yabancÄ± olanlar iÃ§in yardÄ±m dÃ¶kÃ¼manlarÄ± sitede bulunmaktadÄ±r. ---------------------------------------------------------
Uzak Diyarlar Mud is based on an Turkish Anatolia 3.0. In Uzak Diyarlar role playing is a must. Below some specs:
15 races 13 classes 8 cabals ( clans ) 6 religion Thousands of rooms Hundreds of skills and spells
We have newbie tutorials on web site.

mud.name: Everwar MUD
mud.desc: Everwar is up and running full tilt! Everwar is a full-featured, expansive player-vs-player MUD. The basic concept is a titanic struggle between good and evil - player killing is not only expected, but encouraged! Evolving out of and deriving ideas from the popular EmlenMUD Rites of Passage, Everwar has been open for close to 7 years in various states. It features a total of 23 races (11 balanced per side, as well as humans which are playable on either alignment) and more than 200 skills and spells.

Everwar allows for highly customized character design, using a 'remort' based system. This system will allow you to restart your level at 1, but with greatly enhanced abilities every time you choose to remort. Upon remort, you can choose to spend your accumulated 'remort points' in one of more than 25 different statistics, customizing your character to your specific playstyle. There is an extensive quest and crusade system, providing both exhaustive solo and challenging group combat. The quest/crusade system allows a player to explore the map, either individually or in crusade groups. Target mobiles (creatures, or 'mobs') are located in different far-flung areas, which encourages discovery and adventure. Through this system the player not only encounters the map and other players, but is also rewarded with quest points. These points can be spent in a variety of ways.

Another major feature Everwar offers over other MUD's is an integrated overhead mapping feature. With such an enormous map, this is a vital tool for players to utilize whether new or experienced. This feature also allows new players to quickly learn how to find their way around the world.

The most exhilarating feature of Everwar is the player vs. player combat. Set in a mythic game world, the armies of light and the forces of darkness are pitted against each other in eternal war. Good and evil players cannot communicate, which adds a significant amount of challenge to the field of battle a virtual 'fog of war'. Intelligence is gathered by scouting and reconnoitering the enemy, and when your foes are most vulnerable, the battle is joined! Fighting and chasing occurs over more than 23,000 in-game rooms.

With your enemies vanquished, the spoils of war are yours in the form of their equipment, as well as 'warpoints', which serve to increase your standing within your chosen profession. 13 professions are currently in-game. With choices ranging from the secretive assassin masters of poison and deceit, to the classic warrior, with their formidable armor and weapons, you choose how you want to fight!
Visit our website at http://www.everwar.net for more information.

mud.name: After Earth
mud.desc: Information Being Fixed to Fit!!!

mud.name: Between Shadows and Light
mud.desc: Between Shadows and Light is an unique combination of Rom 2.4 and originally coded Immortal Race skills. The concept is quite easy: 99 mortal levels to familiarize yourself with the game; choosing an Immortal Race from Vampire, Werewolf, Demon or Angel, and forming clans for player killing.
We offer quite a few features:

*Originally coded Immortal Race Skills* *Non-stock areas with unique quests* *Player organized and run Clans* *Randomized equipment drops for every level of game play* *Full ANSI colour* *MCCP for faster gameplay* *A dedicated server with little to no down time* *Mature Administrators with years of experience and no attitudes*
This has been an ongoing labour of love for the past 9 years. We are always open to player suggested improvements and changes. Please stop by and visit, we'd love to see you!

mud.name: Krynn's Peak
mud.desc: Video intro can be seen here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5urK3BLju60

In the doom and despair of post-Cataclysm Krynn, fear and destruction reign supreme. Plague and famine cloak the world in a shroud of death, disease and decay. The innocent have been judged as harshly as the wicked and in the so-called absence of the Gods, the Seekers look to further themselves by claiming theirs is the only way to true Faith.

The once protectors of the innocent the Knights of Solamnia, live in fear of persecution. The ignorant lay the blame of the Cataclysm upon the shoulders of those once mighty knights while unbeknownst to them, Takhisis is already preparing her forces.

Of late, however, Takhisis' gateway to this world has been rendered useless by a man named Berem. He dislodged a piece of the Foundation Stone, thus making it incomplete. Rumour has it, that the piece of the Foundation Stone he stole, has embedded itself in his chest. Should Takhisis find Berem, his life will be forfeit and the Gateway restored, giving the Dragon Queen full access to Krynn and an army to follow her.

It remains to be seen if the evil minions of Takhisis will overcome the world as it recovers from the Cataclysm. Will you become a hero who fights the darkness threatening to invade this world or will you attempt to snuff out the light for all times...

Krynn's Peak is back online. After some years of dormancy the coders decided to bring back up this old and joyful DragonLance mud. The mud is focused on roleplay and takes pride in being true to the DragonLance novels.
The code is based on Rom2.4 but has gone through so many changes that listing them all would be impossible. Some of the features include:

* Redone fight system. You now actually have to be active in the fights to come out successfully. * Greatly modified spell system. * New prayer system for clerics and paladins. * Overworld map identical to the world of Krynn. Consisting of over 16000 rooms. * New weather system. * Many new skills, races, abilities, classes. * All the guilds and clans featured in the novels. * New quest code. Quests are made by hand by the builders guaranteeing for interesting and challenging quests. * Much much more.

Be aware though that we are still making some major changes to the game mechanics, thus we haven't officially openend the mud for the public yet. The game is fully playable though and highly entertaining.
Come join us today. Krynn's Peak Address: portent.genesismuds.com Port: 9800

mud.name: Deathmatch
mud.desc: The only currently active MUD using the fabled and well-remembered Ground Zero / GroundZero2 codebase. Pure-PK at it's finest, Deathmatch is exactly that: a fast-paced, text-based team deathmatch using a cartesian grid.
Features incldue:
-Randomized map at every round reset on a 20 X 20 3-level grid -Guns with various multi-room ranges, reloading and clips -Grenades with settable detonation times -Mines -Airstrikes
All that's missing is you. Do you have what it takes?

mud.name: RoninMUD
mud.desc: Ronin is a heavily-modified DikuMUD that has been in existence for almost 15 years now. We have many beautifully crafted original areas with enough puzzles and intrigue to satisfy even the most seasoned of mudders. For those who enjoy change and get tired of a stagnant MUD, Ronin offers week to week change - we're in a state of flux, as any MUD that claims to be worth a player's time should be.

Features include: - 10 player classes, 50 mortal levels - 5 subclass levels, 2 different and distinct paths to choose for each class - Over 250 different skills & spells available - Multi-playing, up to 3 characters at once (hundreds of possible class combinations) - Meta system to trade experience points for stats/hp/mana with no upper limit on hp/mana - Autoquests to acquire points used to gain enhanced stats or faster subclasses - Immortal-run quests with chances to win one-of-a-kind quest prizes - Good balance between what's available to multi groups and what's available to solo players - Active, loyal player base - Vaults, lottery, auction hall, ranks, clans, deputy system, annual Chaos Night quest, and much more!
Come join us! We're a very newbie-friendly MUD, most of our players will be more than happy to help out if you've got any questions. Hope to see you there!

mud.name: Dragonball Ultimate Battle
mud.desc: Sorry folks, the game is down for a bit while I fix some things.

mud.name: NuclearWarUSA
mud.desc: We're a small mud looking to build a playerbase. We offer generous experience and lots of fun areas. You can use guns or dex weapons, and our gun system is pretty decent. There's a lovely tourguide system with real live tourguides to help you out in the beginning. Playerkilling is allowed with level restrictions of +/- 5 levels. There are 5 'clans' or gangs with specific themes, something to interest anyone, from computer hacking to japanese samurai. Come on in and check us out!

mud.name: CoffeeMud
mud.codebase: [CoffeeMud] Home of the CoffeeMud code base!
mud.desc: Adventure in over 170 familiar areas in a brand new way!

. Customize your character by training in numerous subclasses. . Learn common trade skills. . Join a clan, guild, or fellowship. . Make wars of conquest for gain or glory. Our codebase is entirely original. We are always on the cutting edge of the CoffeeMud system. Join us Right Now!

mud.name: Dadi del Destino
mud.desc: Dadi del Destino è il frutto di un lunghissimo lavoro. Allo stato attuale il mud è ancora in beta in quanto mancante di alcune parti, ma completo al 95%. Il gioco è aperto e disponibile da diversi mesi; per chiunque voglia provarlo raccomando di vedere bene il sito web in quanto molte meccaniche sono differenti da quelle usuali. I personaggi, durante il passaggio da beta a release, non saranno cancellati, quindi chiunque giochi al momento potrà conservare il proprio personaggio.

Caratteristiche principali: Sistema di skill innovativo in cui ogni classe ha accesso a tutte le skill, ma il potenziale di utilizzo di una skill varia a seconda della classe. Il personaggio può essere caratterizzato e particolare; si può scegliere se puntare molto su certe skill oppure fare un po’ di tutto ma poco bene. Due tipologie di magie, arcana e divina. Quattro vie che determinano l’impostazione base della classe del personaggio, via dell’ombra, via dello spirito, via della forza e via dell’arcano. Per ogni via sono disponibili alcune classi che determinano in modo più specifico le capacità del personaggio. Livelli virtualmente illimitati. Tre grandi tipologie di oggetti, enhanced, godforged e crafted. I primi creati tramite l’utilizzo della magia e sono gli oggetti che generalmente vengono utilizzati, i secondi creati dagli dei e gli utimi prodotti da fabbri, armaioli, sarti ecc... Tipi di materiali differenti che determinano la struttura e la resitenza dell’oggetto, speciali protezioni sulle armature e speciali attacchi sulle armi. Numerose quest fisse per ogni livello, in continuo aumento. Sistema di reward point con cui si premia chi impegna il tempo per far crescere il gioco, trovando bug o creado aree o semplicemente segnalando i typo. Tramite i punti reward è possibile comprare ed editare oggetti speciali superiori a quelli trovabili in gioco, questo per compensare l’impegno di tempo. Player killing e player steling non bloccato ma gestito tramite punti wanted, i punti wanted vengono presi quando si ruba un oggetto o si uccide un giocatore, questo viene esteso anche a certi npc come i negozianti, le guardie o alcuni speciali. Chi riceve la flag killer o thief può subire l’aggressione da parte degli altri pg liberamente. Inoltre ci sono speciali mob, i bounty hunter, che vanno a caccia dei pg con la flag. Possibilità di acquistare, costruire o affittare una casa, in cui mettere i propri possedimenti. Gestione avanzata delle armi con dimensioni differenti, tipo di impugnatura, parti di armatura che possono essere usati come armi con gli attacchi speciali, esempio l’elmo per una testata o i guanti per un pugno. Riduzione del danno per le armature e capacità di penetrazione per le armi. Molto altro ancora, già implementato o di prossima implemetazione che non sto qui ad elencare per questioni di spazio.

Vi aspetto, e soprattutto se avete aree già pronte o volete fare un area ma non sapete come fare, è disponibile un potente editor in grado di caricare aree scritte per circle (con alcune varianti), merc e smaug.
JJ

mud.name: ScalesMUCK
mud.desc: This is a muck that was made for those that love the scaly at heart. Furrys and others are encouraged to play and build a world for themselves. To get away from the furry only worlds. Build a home, come build a life
We would love to have you there to make new friends that love the same things you do.
The muck is currently available, and is now being mirrored nightly at a second location in case any future outages should occur.

mud.name: SchMOOze University
mud.desc: SchMOOze U. was established in 1994 as a place where people studying English as a second or foreign language could practice English while sharing experiences with other learners and practicers of English. Although schMOOze was founded with the ESL/EFL student in mind, it welcomes all people interested in cross-cultural communication.

mud.name: Astaria
mud.desc: I'm not sure what makes one person decide to try a mud over another. Instead of going into details I'll just say that Astaria has been around for more than 15 years and we have a very loyal player base. That in itself should make it worth a look.

mud.name: Dream Land
mud.desc: A world of heroes and dragons, where heroic deeds and horrible creatures are possible ...

A world of powerful magic and mighty weapons ... A world of steel and mithril, where you can go and slay powerful creatures or you can seek smart quests and receive great rewards, cool weapons, and destructive spells ...

mud.name: Shades
mud.desc: Shades is a traditional MUD along the lines of the original Essex MUD, and is now 12 years old. For a long time it was the most sucessfull commerical MUD ever, although it is now running for free. Its sucess was often credited to its easy to learn game-play and strong social atmosphere.

mud.name: Darbonne, the Floating City
mud.codebase: [Mordor] Hosted by Styx, an original and early DM
mud.desc: DARBONNE, THE FLOATING CITY

There was a time, long before the beginning of history, when there were both good and evil forces in the Land of Mordor. The battles between them raged constantly with first one side and then the other claiming victory. It was during the third age, at a time when the dragons and balrogs had joined forces against the elves, dwarves and humans in a grand assualt against them that a triad of powerful wizards and a white mage saved the city of Darbonne by casting a self-perpetuating spell on it. The spell lifted the city into the air, higher than any dragon could fly. Unfortunately, one of Darbonne's great libraries was torn asunder and parchments which were stored there, upon which were recorded offensive spells from the realms of Earth, Wind, Fire and Water, were lost from that library. Mighty adventurers still seek the fragments of those mystical parchments in many dangerous and mysterious places.
Would you like to join them? Styx, from the city of Oceancrest, will be your DM.

mud.name: Holomud 2000
mud.desc: Looking for a mud that is a challenge for advanced players yet friendly to even the worst of newbies? Well this is it, holomud is the result of time, being a very old mud with an old admin group, yet new and exciting to the new players. We feature a holodeck ran system that allows the player to run simulations. No food/drink/renting costs, and even the newest of players stands a chance in the game. Gold is no longer an issue, holomud runs on a credit system that acts like gold/exp combined, but credits can't be given away. It is much more interesting that even I can explain. Just give it a try.

mud.name: Dead Souls
mud.desc: WHAT DEAD SOULS MUD IS: ----------------------- The Dead Souls mud is a running demonstration of what the Dead Souls LP codebase can do. It is open for visitors to see for themselves what it's like to learn and build on the codebase without having to download and install first.
Once you log in as a creator on Dead Souls, you can:

* Use the online Quick Creation System: http://dead-souls.net/example.html * Use the offline web-based file editor: http://alcatraz.wolfpaw.net:8001/cgi/creweb.html * Get a feel for LPC with intuitive commands like ls, cd, more. * Wander around the sample areas to get a sense of the look-and-feel.

Of course, you can also get equipped and go monster hunting or questing, but as a Creator, that's a bit unsporting, as you can always just use commands like invis, heal, and zap to get around tough spots!
WHAT DEAD SOULS MUD IS NOT: --------------------------- The Dead Souls mud is not a

mud.name: Dragonfire II
mud.desc: Dragonfire is an ancient LPmud that has evolved for many years. Recently spun-off (hence the II), the mud is being worked on intensively, incorporating new features and updating the code. Dragonfire is a unique experience in the mud world, as it has not necessary followed the traditional paths of MUD evolution. Many of our loyal player base have been around for seven or eight YEARS, following the MUD through its trial and tribulations--new hosts, new admin, hacker attacks, and so forth. Dragonfire has a strong focus on player- killing, but PK is by each player's choice--the best of both worlds. The 'guilds' of Dragonfire are classes, skills, spells, and clans all wrapped into one in a style that makes Dragonfire unique. Come by and check us out!

mud.name: ShadowGate
mud.desc: ShadowGate is a huge MUD that sticks closely to the AD&D manuals. We strive to form a community of adventurers with all aspects of interactions, both positive and negative. Look forward to prejudice and tolerance, conflict and cooperation, hate and love.

Our systems of multi-classing, races, weapon and non-weapon proficiencies, languages, spells, deities, and required introductions all make you feel as if the world of ShadowGate is an evolving environment. Indeed characters can eventually gain influence and control over parts of the world as \"High Mortals\", continuing to shape and grow the game further.

We insist that you roleplay. Roleplaying is a process, not an end goal. Each individual thread of your character's experiences, misadventures, friends and enemies becomes the tapestry of his or her life, and the whole winds up becoming more than it's parts. We strictly enforce this as best as we are capable. We encourage RP through a system of Avatars, which are our DM's. They are not creators or builders. They are people who drive interactive quests through various abilities and interactively controlled NPCs. Avatars and creators are all selected from the players who have played and gained our trust, to ensure consistancy with the game's evolution forward.

The ultimate, and perhaps idealistic, goal is to make the ShadowGate world reflect not only the tabletop world of adventure and RP, but also those idle times of characters - the times in the city, spending your gold, reflecting on your adventures. We encourage any player who wishes to become part of the community to join us, enjoy what we have, and help us make it better and move toward our goal.
