mud.name: Insymnia MUD
mud.desc: The MUD is in its 2nd year of heavy code modifications and area creation. We have only 2 simple rules to follow, and a huge number of skills/spells, as the primary theme of the MUD is simple: Make the players as powerful as they can possibly be, while increasing the difficulty of the game to adapt to your increase in power, which quickly eliminates boredom.

The game, which is fantasy-based, is pure PK, and all of our players are always more than willing to help out new ones. This includes Immortals, who are prohibited from being lofty, invisible creatures whose sole purpose is to harass players and prevent them from having fun. Players can remort once into another class, with both classes consisting of 100 levels, and once into the powerful Hero class. You can watch players battle it out in an arena, as though you were walking along right beside them. Battles will be legendary in their magnitude, consisting of entire towns (and players if they wish to join) destroying each other, some for the pursuit of power and wealth, some just to watch the other side perish. Enter our world.

mud.name: Havok Mud
mud.desc: Havok is a medieval-fantasy based MUD. We offer 17 different races to select from right off, dozens more through reincarnation, and 13 classes with many options for multiclassing between them. Over 140 zones, and over 30,000 rooms to explore. Havok is a constantly changing world with new and exciting code added often. We have many of your favorite features found on other muds, as well as unique features that you are sure to love.
Havok is newbie-friendly, allowing newbies to easily get started, while still providing unlimited challenges for the overachievers.
If you have any problems getting started, drop us an email and we will respond as quickly as possible, usually the same day.

mud.name: Rebirth Mush
mud.desc: The year is 2043 AD on Earth and in the future things were seemingly bleak. Not to long ago in 2028 World War Three broke out and threw the governments of the world into chaos. After six long years the world united as one and what was once pain and suffering rapidly became entertainment. Without national barriers and even no language barriers entertainment became a large focus while other research went bankrupt due to lack of funding. Come the year 2040 Internet gaming was the top grossing form of entertainment and any company that hoped to earned money was in on the business. One research company known as Faust & Solomon Enterprises decided to corner the market with a new development. They created a new gaming system and game. They packaged it as one with one name Hirladan. That was the name of this believed virtual world, though in truth it was part of a research test. Using mental images and skills a person knew to create a sprite to exist in another world. While these sprites that uses amplified and modified skills such as a creative writer being a good spell caster, they also knew they could test resurrection and even duplication because ‘NPCs’ must be killed. A wizard to the north found these seemingly undying sprites, while struck down they rose again so to further his plots to take the struggling world he must stop the influx of immortals. A spell was developed and for two years people have been disappearing in the real world and hybrids of the character they were and who the look like have been showing up in game un able to log out as the spell merges body and mind into Hirladan.
It is possible for very unique creation as one can range from players to natives and even the trapped playes if one chosese to do so. So please stop in and give it a look see.

mud.name: Soucon MUSH
mud.desc: Soucon MUSH is a themed roleplaying MUSH based on the series of books the 'Dragonriders of Pern' by Anne McCaffrey, and runs with full permission from the author. We attempt to recreate, with as much authenticity as possible, the atmosphere and society described in the books. Set in the Southern Continent of Pern we are set in the 10th Pass, one pass after the events in Dragonflight, The White Dragon etc. We do not recognize the events outlined in 'All the Weyrs of Pern', and therefore Thread still falls, though technology remainsl very limited. SouCon MUSH is PernMUSH's sister game, and an ideal place to send a PC relative of a character you have here: we're running on the exact same timeline! Smaller than PernMUSH, SouCon offers a more intimate atmosphere for RP. Currently, we have 2 Weyrs (mountainous Honshu and jungle-covered Southern), 2 Holds, and many Crafts, offering characters many ways in which to get involved. We have 4 Hatchings a year, and Impress up to 10 players at each Hatching on average. We consider ourselves one of the friendliest MUSHes out there, and offer help to new players of all levels of experience. Please join us at: soucon.silvertree.org: 4201 (63.199.182.123: 4201), and feel free to contact any of the Wizards or Guides (+rwho wiz and +rwho gui) for help!

mud.name: Shattered Kingdoms
mud.desc: Shattered Kingdoms is a roleplay enforced mud which succesfully unites quality roleplay with the tactical considerations of challenging PK. Established in 1996, SK is considered one of the top muds out there today that are completely free - no pay to play, no pay for perks.

Shattered Kingdoms is known for its high quality building, its abundance of unique quests in all degrees of difficulty, as well as having stable and well-written code which is constantly being improved and expanded. It has a challenging combat system, frequent and original immortal run quests, as well as an active, vibrant community, a large playerbase and a dynamic game world.

The world of Pyrathia is huge, boasting of more than 160 areas and well over 30,000 uniquely described rooms. Exploration is a never- ending pleasure, always offering a new adventure around each corner. New areas are constantly being added by a hard-working staff, and old areas are updated, improved and adapted to new IC contexts.

The six kingdoms on Pyrathia have player-led factions which influence the political and economic conditions of each nation. A new economy system has recently been added, and an expanded trade system is currently being developed.

While PK is largely unrestricted (the only exception is a feature protecting genuine newbies from harrassment), it is possible to play a non-violent character as well, gaining experience through quests, roleplay rewards, experience rewarded for discovering new areas and casting spells.
Whether your pleasure is roleplay, exploration, combat or a combination of all of the above, Shattered Kingdoms has what you seek. Come try us out today, you won't be disappointed!

mud.name: Liosliath Mush
mud.desc: Liosliath Mush Overview A world where everyone's story matters, where everyone can contribute as hero or villain and where everyone can weave their stories into the fabric of Liosliath. The theme is crafted and presented so players can find inspiration and opportunities for meaningful character development. Our aim is to be flexible enough, within the bounds of theme, to allow adult players to find their own place in cooperative, mature role play. (Note this does NOT mean TS) Liosliath is a nation of clans ruled by a Thane. The country is just emerging from war and will need to rebuilt. The nobles need to find and put into position people they can trust. The various guilds and groups which were disbanded during the war to be revived. Characters will be part of a Clan and a profession. They will all be a part of Liosliath's rebuilding. What holds for the future? Politics, intrigue, mystery, conflict, and even the clever shopkeeper's wiles are all a part of this world. The printing press has yet to be invented and the majority of population is illiterate. Travel is by foot, horse and wagon. Weapons are early medieval: swords, daggers, hard leather armor, and chain mail. A modified feudal system of nobles and commoners organized into clans forms the basic political and social structure.

Liosliath Mush Features * A chargen to include FUDGE RPG System - FUDGE is a sheet / skills system that has been designed specifically to support RP. We have a number of skills to enable you to uniquely personalize your character. Liosliath Mush is foremost a Role Play Mush, the FUDGE system is here to enhance your Role Playing experiences as you wish to use it. * XP (Experience points) can be gained through RP (+vote), training , practice and even just by being part of Liosliath. These XP points are used to increase or add skills. * Interactive NPC's * Code-Lite - Code supporting Role Play while not limiting your storytelling creativity. * Players may select characters from +Roster, +Wanted or create their own.
How will YOUR character's story weave into the fabric of Liosliath's future ?
Sound interesting? Grab some friends and come check us out at: Liosliath.mushpark.com 3499

mud.name: Multi-User Dungeon (British Legends)
mud.desc: Multi-User Dungeon, or MUD for short, was the first ever game of this genre. For many years, MUD, or British Legends as it was known to players, existed on the CompuServe Information Service. In the fall of 1999, however, CIS decided to terminate British Legends as part of their Y2K cleanup efforts. Many players thought that this meant the end of their beloved game.

That is not so. The present incarnation is a high-fidelity port of the original MUD code base to a modern server platform. This accurate reimplementation faithfully reproduces almost all the original's features, even some of the bugs that have become part of the game's lore.

If you want to see what multiplayer gaming was like in the Land where it all began, and visit a game that still offers superior game play and balance, a visit to MUD at http://www.british-legends.com/ will be worth your time!

This version of MUD/BL was written with the permission of the original copyright holder by Viktor T. Toth (aka Viktor the arch-wizard, formerly MrSpock the wizard) in a 'mad programming binge' (as MUD's original author, Richard Bartle called it) in December 1999, and has been in limited operation on a test site since. It was opened to the public in May, 2000.

mud.name: Faction Earth V3
mud.desc: Faction Earth is a massively multi-player online role-playing game (MMORPG - MUD) set in the mega-cities of Earth in the year 2125. Faction Earth is an enhanced, browser-based MUD (multi-user dungeon), that uses interfaces and graphics to nring the Faction Earth world to life.

This world, behind the media-made corporate façade, is one of industrial espionage, super-hackers, mastery of newly discovered ancient Egyptian magic, battling factions and religious sects, and a constant struggle of humanity against its own genetic creations gone awry.

mud.name: Dragonball - Path of Legends
mud.desc: The mud is currently mostly stock but is very playable with minimal bugs and plenty of things to do. Staff will be working around the clock to get things edited and hopefully start getting new things put in.
We are looking for people to help us work on DPOT so if you can code or build please send the Owner an e-mail and we will get back to you or come on the game and talk to Slivo in the game.
Thanks, Slivo & The Management

mud.name: FinalMud
mud.desc: The most ancient of elves speak of a time long ago when there were no humans walking the lands we know of today. Nature and magic had reached a balance in this time of legend until the day the elves call 'Esz'tinia', or The Great Storm. During The Great Storm an elf mage called Alkyone found solace for many beneath the waves where an heretofore unknown deity took pity on them and gave them a new life in the deep sea. The Great Storm, which consisted not of rain and wind but fire and lightning raged over the world for many years. The mighty dwarves from the hills and mountains had taken safety along with their gnome brethren in the deepest of their mines.

When The Great Storm subsided those long years later and the races of the world crawled back onto the surface they found many changes. Men had begun to arrive, having fled lands now buried beneath unknown waters. What followed then were minor battles as man, elf, dwarf, and gnome redrew the boundaries of old.

Then came the dragons. Tiny pockets of hell cruising through the skies. Mostly humans roam the surface now, brought together into small pockets of life far from any dragon's lair. The men unite under one deity with warriors and templars serving as defenders of the people. Others seek to restore balance with the elements, others feed upon the chaos, and others create it as they wield magics never before seen upon the world.
Welcome to The Final Mud...

mud.name: Ages of Eternity
mud.desc: AOE is a mud thats been in the works for a number of years. We've just dusted it off - the intent is to create a mud with a player run economy, diverse skill/spell set with advancement based on detailed quests.

mud.name: Order of Chaos
mud.desc: --*ATTENTION*--

Order of Chaos has been in development since early 2005 with heavily modified code and additional new code. the mud is medieval based. areas are a main concern, therefore we are currently looking for builders and a coder with c++ experience. the story line has been written with a wide perspective of additional input. all stock areas have been removed. the mud is stable and with several months of ensuring it stays stable for years to come. the mud is dawn of time code based. any and all help would be appreciated. if you like to build areas Order of Chaos may just be the place for you. any other information can be found within the game itself. so please check it out at: orderofchaos.servegame.com:9500 and talk with Pax

mud.name: FlipSide Muck
mud.desc: FlipSide is a Multiple-World Environment, bringing together diverse and interesting cultures for a different roleplay experience. While inter-world travel is discouraged, central gathering points for all the characters to relax OOC make for an interesting and colorful mix. :)

Currently, FlipSide has six active worlds: El Dogrado - Set in an Aztec-themed environment, with dogs! Fur City - OOC world for settling back and relaxing Irken Invasion - New world based on Invader Zim Pridelands - World based on The Lion King Realms of Bastet - An anthropomorphic version of Ancient Egypt, complete with gods and goddesses Tir a' Turlach a Deigh - Tir is a fantastical world with a Robin Hood/Medieval flavor.

All worlds except Fur City are IC roleplay-based worlds with it's own unique culture, flavor and storyline. FlipSide is a PG-rated muck with emphasis on roleplay, not conflict. Check the web page for more information.

mud.name: Sleepless Nights
mud.desc: Welcome to the inflamed world of Sleepless Nights, an exciting world of swords and sorcery set in medieval times. Full of mystical dragons, knights, wizards and omnipotent gods, you use your brains and brawn to survive the mysteries of the land and become Immortal.

Sleepless Nights is a well established Aber5 mud based on blizzard.uni but with extensive source enhancements and significant universe growth to improve the game and make it more unique. Important features are:-

* Newbie friendly environment. * 7 guilds: Adventurer, Mage, Dark Priest, Nature Priest, Assassin, Warrior, Thieves + Vampire in development. * Points and puzzle-based progression through the game. * 18+ quests ranging in difficulty. * Player Killing and Stealing are allowed. * Offensive and defensive magic system. * Highlander system for no-risk pk bonus points. * Comprehensive web site containing game support.

mud.name: SlothMUD
mud.desc: We have recently decided to restart SlothMUD after a solid 13 year run(out of 17). This means you can compete for levels, from the beginning of the game, and not worry about a top heavy who list.

For 17 years, SlothMUD has been one of the most successful MUDs of its kind. Sloth is a heavily modified Diku which offers a unique world of more than 24,000 rooms, inhabited by 8,500 people and creatures. In SlothMUD , each player advances in all eight classes which are bard, cleric, druid, mage, monk, necromancer, thief, and warrior. In addition to the skills and spells of their classo, our multi-class system provides special powers to each \"prime\" class. As a result, the 1,680 possible class orderings have distinct play styles. Once a player reaches maximum level in all eight classes, a prestigious Avatar class opens up which gives him entirely new skills and powers. Sloth provides its immortals with a unique scripting language, allowing them to build areas that are interactive to an unprecedented degree. These areas include complex puzzles, hundreds of scripted quests, and monsters that behave in surprising and intelligent ways. Several areas provide more than simple hunt-and-kill; these include a PvP arena and a coliseum where the player can test his mettle against an ever-nastier series of monsters. For more information on this language, please visit http://www.outgribe.com/jason/mudl/index.html We have added MXP(Mud Extension Protocol), MCCP (Mud Client Compression Protocol), an astrological event system,tons of new spells and skills, and much, much more. We have a one of best coding staffs around who enjoy adding player suggestions, as well as implementing many of their own ideas while maintaining our 'Slothy' feel.

As well, one of our creators, William Lees, has been busy updating his MUD client Wintin.Net(an updated version of wintin95 which he also authored). It possesses many of the features we have added lately such as MXP, MCCP, etc. For more information on this great windows client,please refer to www.wintin.org

A new web page was revealed recently which we believe is one of the best on the internet combining stunning graphics with Sloth related information. A live information section contains everything from a dynamic world map(which allows our players to watch each other move around our five continents) to player stats, live who lists, etc.

SlothMUD also offers a very active immortal and administrative staff, constantly working to provide new and interesting experiences to challenge players. We are one of the most newbie-friendly MUDs around, with many experienced players willing to assist you in learning and enjoying our game. We look forward to seeing you soon!

mud.name: SMiLE
mud.desc: SMiLE is an abermud which supports player killing. The object of the game is to obtain 30+ quest points and get 200,000 points to make wizard. Points can be gained by solving puzzles and quests, killing mobiles and other players (if you have the killer flag) and dropping items of value in one of the two sacrificial pits.

The type of character you play is your choice. You may choose to run a killer, play nice and merely defend yourself when attacked, or something in between. Playing the mud as a player killing mud will increase the challenge you experience while running. Player killing also gives you the opportunity to try to outwit human players who are less predictable than computer generated mobiles. You also have the choice of playing the mud as a nonplayer killing mud. Which ever style you choose to play, the mobiles of SMiLE are more challenging than in some other muds. The game has a complete combat system with weapons, armor and spells. Weapons and armor are abundant and with a bit of exploration you can increase your magical knowledge.

mud.name: Victorian Reverie
mud.desc: The streets of London are a dark place, even when the sun is out. The smog of the factories creates a haze over the Thames, and the rain smells of sulfur and coal. When night falls, the air becomes choked with the flavor of burned gas from the few lanterns that light the way along the major routes through the city. In this setting, thieves and fops mix and mingle, and the knowing and unknowing agents of the Gentry run their machinations to trap the unwary.

The Winter King is dead. The Spring Queen is insane. The Summer Court is untested. The Autumn Lord schemes to take over the Seasonal Court, which has never been as disorganized as it is now. While some Changelings work to strengthen the Court, others go their own way, deserting the single cause that has kept them safe all of these years. Meanwhile, humanity grows; the prey for the Gentry gets more complacent and sedentary, making the city of London prime hunting grounds for the predators from beyond the Hedge.

Victorian Reverie is a new World of Darkness game set in the Victorian Era of London. Our inspiration comes from Victorian literature and fantasy movies based in the period, with a slightly darker twist to things. We have code support for changelings (as per Changeling: The Lost) and normal mortals. We, at current, have no plans to expand the scope of the game.
We are currently looking for all kinds of concepts, so come and visit us at: vrchangeling.isunlimited.net port 444

mud.name: Naruto: The Way Of The Ninja
mud.desc: Naruto: The Way Of The Ninja, is based off of the TV show Naruto, about a young boy, who seeks for his way of the ninja, but along the way makes a few friends, and learns a lot of things about his currently life situations. The mud offers a newbie friendly start, everyone should help everyone who needs it. Player killing is also accepted, and can be done at almost anytime, since yes, this is a ninjitsu based mud. The mud has ansi maps between areas. The mud is very self oriented, either you train, or you don't get strong, it's based off of your will to fight. You be the one to decide who will be the best ninja of all time.

mud.name: AnderLand
mud.desc: AnderLand is a native German LPmud. The players may become Seers (Seher, high level player) or Wizards (Magier) after fulfilling a number of quests. In addition there are lots of other adventures in our quickly growing world. AL features regions of different themes and size. Seers have the opportunity to have faster movement through magic gates. Interested persons also take advantage of our MudWWW frontend found on our web page, which allows to look around a few places without creating a character or to know any playing commands.
Have a look who currently plays AnderLand.

mud.name: The Realm Online
mud.desc: “The Realm Online” is an exciting, adventurous land of monsters, magic, and medieval society. Enter a world of companionship where thousands of players from around the globe are waiting to welcome you to a very special place.

With your subscription you can create up to four distinct characters, each a separate entity within the world of “The Realm”. Use your characters to choose your own style of gameplay. Transform yourself into a Giant Warrior, an Elf Wizard, a Human Adventurer, or any of the hundreds of totally customizable beings.

Immerse yourself in the fellowship of the storyline or compete with other players, become a heroic hunter doing battle alone or in groups, or a powerful wizard able to invoke the forces of 5 different circles of magic, or a stealthy thief preying upon unsuspecting travelers. The possibilities are limited only by your imagination.

Join guilds, establish relationships, and travel with friends to distant lands, dark dungeons, or villages large and small in journeys of magic, mystery, and exploration. Hunting monsters, building wealth, or enjoying relaxed conversation with friends and family, “The Realm Online” has something for everyone!

mud.name: End of the Line
mud.desc: Once in, avoid everything that moves. Only the swift thinking and swift moving survive. Don't touch anything without checking it out with a toss-away char first. Power is currently held by a group of petty, cruel people. They will do what they can to prevent you from suceeding in any way they can. Things change constantly and without much notification.

You will have your ego crushed, your time destroyed, and if you complain, there are many people whose sole job seems to be to ridicule you. This is their job, and they take pride in it. Welcome to Hell.
--Minister, 29 Nov 1995

mud.name: CrystalDreams
mud.desc: CrystalDreams MUSH offers RP and minigames in a science-fiction environment set in Anne McCaffrey's Crystal Singer universe, (c) 1975, by permission of the author.

CrystalDreams is set 150 years after the discovery of the 'symbiont' and the formation of the Heptite Guild to exploit the resources of Ballybran. The relatively young Guild has plenty of room for new hopefuls who wish to join the elite ranks of the Crystal Singers and help fill a long list of orders from around the galaxy.

mud.name: DreamScapes MMORPG
mud.desc: DreamScapes MMOFRPG A Massively MultiPlayer Online Fantasy RolePlaying Game that conjures up a spectacular gaming experience for all its players. Step into a wonder filled world and interact with people and monsters from all over the Realm! Battle mighty foes or seek to influence the political and religious balance ... choose your fate.

DreamScapes MMOFRPG is a text based adventure game that is free to play and is played by many people all at the same time. Within the game you develop a fantasy character that can interact with all the other players and many non-player characters, you can also explore the huge world that makes up DreamScapes. As you explore you will discover all sorts of cities, villages, quests, guilds, items, magic, and monsters! All these aspects of the game are beautifully crafted in colourful text with storybook like descriptions. The aim of the game is to increase in power and prestige within the realm, as such the ability to roleplay your chosen character is important because with good roleplaying you will soon become well renowned and respected.

When you join the game you will be asked to create a character. After that process has been completed you will enter the realm and your character will also be created on the games WebSite. Then you can log in to both the game and the site with the same name and password. Full access to the site proves useful as you can join the community to seek advice, learn more about the game, exchange ideas and participate in organised in-game events.

mud.name: SpheresMUX
mud.desc: Spheres is a role playing environment very loosely related to Jack L. Chalker's Well World series. Essentially the game world consists of an infinite plane of spheres, and within each sphere is a snapshot of a different realm.

For example, there is a sphere in which gryphons rule over their medieval jungles, and another in which centaurs are making the dangerous traversal from the nuclear age to the information age. Focus is made upon the interaction of travelers migrating across different, foreign spheres. Players are encouraged to develop their own tinyplots, or even conceive and design their own spheres to add on to the game. This is a solidly in character environment; if your looking for a place to hack and bash, or be all-powerful this isn't the game for you. There is no combat system, and no plans to ever develop one.

We consider ourselves very newbie friendly, and are willing to spend the time to help familiarize people with our theme. All that is necessary to play in the game is to have read the news files pertaining to our theme 'news theme' and the info files regarding your species. (Type 'info'.) If your interested in serious, exciting role play then come on out and welcome! Others should apply elsewhere. :>

mud.name: Godwars: Genesis
mud.desc: This is the old Godwars Genesis code, per say

mud.name: Bellum Nox 2064
mud.desc: Bellum Nox 2064 is a MUD based on the AwakeMUD codebase. It features a fully detailed Washington D.C. area and outlying areas. It features fully functional cyberware/bioware systems, magic, vehicle building and repair, and new features are always being worked on. AwakeMUD is a highly-evolved CircleMUD based codebase set in the world of Shadowrun from FASA (Now FanPro). It is based on the 3rd Edition Rules and follows the canon rules as much as is possible in a MUD environment.
Bellum Nox 2064 is based on a powerful server with a guaranteed uptime of 99.9% a month through the wonderful hosting services of rpg-works.net.
Contact Kru in game, or John at john.steensen@us.army.mil if you are interested in working with us.

mud.name: Star Wars Mud (SWmud)
mud.desc: SWMUD is set in the Star Wars universe. Though there is no set time-period for this mud, the areas roughly follow the timeline around the original trilogy +7-10 years in the expanded universe. SWMUD consists of around 40 large planets and space stations, including Kashyyyk, Korriban, Myrkr, and Ryloth, as well as more well-known planets like Endor, Hoth, Tatooine, Naboo, and the Death Star.

We have 10 guilds: assassin, bounty hunter, diplomat, jedi, mercenary, merchant, pilot, scientist, slicer, and smuggler. Each guild comes with an average of 30 unique skills. Player can choose three guilds for their character, with the option of taking a fourth guild at higher levels. Assassin and BH are forced-PK guilds, and Diplomats are forced non-PK. There are 22 player-races, among them Bothan, Clawdite, Falleen, Wookiee, and Zabrak. Each race comes with two unique race skills and bonuses. We have movable vehicles, ranged combat and an extensive space combat system. You can also build your own ship that is stored safely when you are not playing. The mud has newsgroups for the players to post ideas and discuss various things about the mud. Quests are not required for advancement, though a few will significantly help in advancement. Help files are very extensive and are all available on the website. A special newbie simulator exists with several areas to help new players get started. Players can apply to become a coder after reaching levels 15/10/10.
For more information, please visit our website at http://www.swmud.org

mud.name: RIFTs: Rise From Chaos
mud.desc: Although RIFTs is a highly combat and power oriented RPG, Rise From Chaos is about building relationships and telling entertaining stories, while exploring a fantasy life in a science fiction setting. Tolkeen is a frontier kingdom, a haven for those who would be persecuted elsewhere for their differences. The city-state is itself one link in a short chain of alliances, their goal - survival against the many enemies at the doorstep: the Coalition (a human supremacist, military organization); predatory dimensional beings (D-Bees); supernatural entities whose thoughts and purposes are too alien to comprehend; as well, humanity's own personal demons, living amongst and within - ignorance, power-lust, and vice.

The PCs of RfC live in a dangerous and mysterious world. Tolkeen's own secrets, of her origin and her survival, are yet to be discovered. Should you choose to take part, your impact upon this enduring quest will enrich the story today, and the story still untold.

The kingdom has been built to allow extensive travel outside the main city, offering many varied environments for storytelling. This MUSH is ideal for self-motivated writers with good attitudes and keen wits.

mud.name: Star Wars: Revenge of the Jedi
mud.desc: A very well-structured and in-depth game, Revenge of the Jedi is definitely a MUD everyone should try. Players of all levels of MUD experience play RotJ, as it is a game structured on player interaction. There are over 15,000 rooms and 10,000 NPC's. The MUD is geared to support a player base of about 200, with a self-healing economy, involved Immortals who are constantly improving gameplay, a guild system and faction system to make both friends and rivals. You have the ability to create a unique character by choosing from: 19 unique races, a primary-, secondary-, tertiary-, and specialized pilot-class to create your very own specialized experience.

You will bond with Mace Windu as he comes to your aid, and fear Boba Fett if you warrant him tracking you down in his sleek new Slave II in any of the well-beyond 100 zones that make up Revenge of the Jedi! Don't go to Dathomir alone, unless you're feeling lucky. You might lose more than just your hand. If you forget the hyperspace coordinates to Tatooine, I hope you remembered a comlink, or have a working nav-computer. I recommend this game for all Star Wars fans, for both new and experienced players of text-based games. So join us at rotjmud.com port 9400. Come see why our mud is as good as everyone says it is.
Adventure, excitement... a Jedi DOES crave these things! And the MUD that has it - Revenge of the Jedi.

mud.name: MatrixMUD
mud.desc: We're a new MUD and are currently looking for staff. And although things have been decided on; they are not set in stone. If you're into the matrix theme and want to be a part of creating an accurate matrix-themed MUD then please come along and help out! Also note that we are not yet ready for players, but soon hopefully that time will come. At such time I'll bother with a better description. :P
Thanks.

Due to a series of Unfortunate Events The Beta testing has been pushed back to November 12th we at Matrixmud are truly sorry for this happening. The War between The Machines And the Zion Humans. SHALL BEGIN ONCE MORE

mud.name: Dungeon Masters Live
mud.desc: This is a good generic fantasy MUD that will hopefuly bring us back to our roots. Anyone is welcome to play and have fun in their own ways.

mud.name: ShadowDale
mud.desc: ShadowDale is a heavily modified DikuMud system based strictly on the AD&D Forgotten Realms fantasy world. There remain only a handful of stock zones for, over the years, many builders, old and new, have helped bring the mud to its current state. The game is easy to learn, it has hundreds of zones with thousands of monsters and a huge selection of various equipment. Role-play is encouraged, as it enhances the game, but it is not mandatory. Newbies are treated with respect and there is always someone online willing to help them and, in many cases, the adept characters offer them help even if they do not ask for it. There are many puzzles, tricks and traps to be encountered and new zones are going in all the time.

Come by and see our MUD. Create a character and get in on the fun. You can have as many characters as you think you can handle, just keep in mind that you may only be logged into one character at any time. See you there!

mud.name: Star Wars: Dark Forces RPG
mud.desc: Star Wars: Dark Forces RPG has had a long history. Emperor Palpatine was defeated at Endor thirty-five years ago, thrown into the Abyss by Darth Vader. Now the Yuuzhan Vong, a race from another galaxy, hope to conquer and enslave all. The Empire has been reborn as the Imperial Alliance, trying to stop the Vong while at the same time attempting to establish order in the galaxy.

The New Republic is crumbling, its members leaving to join the Imperial Alliance or being killed by the Vong. Many small factions have risen, hoping to end the chaos which has come about hte galaxy. Are you ready to serve the Empire or save the crumbling Republic? Or perhaps there might be profit to make as a self-server. Nevertheless, this is a time of Dark Forces.

This is very popular MUD which has grown tremendously, with all original zones and original programming. Roleplay is encouraged here, and rewarded if done. The immortals participate in the events of the game, but it is the mortals that shape our history. Give us a try, and you will see that you have a new addiction.

mud.name: Akanbar
mud.desc: Akanbar is a Role Playing Game. A land of magic, mystery and fantasy where you the player help to weave the ever changing storyline.

Akanbar is a fantasy role playing game created by a team of developers who have spent much of their lives both playing and creating role playing worlds. Akanbar is a land that is constantly evolving and cared for by its creators.

The setting could be considered an era of medieval fantasy where dragons, ogres and magic exist. You enter the realm as a young male or female who has just matured into adulthood. You must then decide upon how you wish to live your life. Some may simply wish to own a small shop selling herbs to heal others, others may wish to ultimately conquer the entire realm. This is what makes Akanbar so special. There are no set goals, no set aims. It is up to you what path you will follow.

In Akanbar Online RPG you will find a refreshing break from reality where you will be able to roleplay with and maybe against players from all corners of the globe. We hope you find as much enjoyment from it as we do.

mud.name: Payne Source
mud.desc: Payne Source is an online extreme paintball game. Players from around the world can battle each other in games with weapons as simple as guns all the way up to grenade and rocket launchers. Payne Source takes elements from normal paintball and combines them with extreme ideas to make an extremely enjoyable and exciting environment.
Please visit http://www.paynesource.com to read about the game and download the client.

mud.name: Forever Darkness3
mud.desc: Hello people. I like to welcome you all to forever darkness. I hope you come by and give us a try. Lots changes are being made to the mud. So please stop by and have some fun.
see you all soon Lilmouse

mud.name: Dragon Ball Z World: Reloaded
mud.desc: Dragonball Z World is back. One of the greatest Dragonball Z muds in existance has come back under new ownership. Myself (Vegetto, Owner) and Cell (Co-Owner) are working constantly on adding additions to the game, both in game, and in the code. We are trying to build on all the sucecsses of DBZW, and create a game with more challenges, and more chances for you to customize your character. We have just recently instituted 100% player run clans, and made many changes, to give more of the game to the players. We have faccets of the game tailored to RP players, as well as a large portion of the game tailored to people who like to PK.
So if you're looking for a new MUD, or just want to find a place to come and have fun, look no further, DBZW:R is the place for you!

mud.name: 8bitMUSH
mud.desc: â–ˆ 8BitMUSH is a collaborative virtual world, â–ˆ â–“â–ˆ where every player is encouraged to extend â–ˆâ–“ â–’â–“â–ˆ the game with their own creations. 8Bit is â–ˆâ–“â–’ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ text-based, enhanced with 256 colors and â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ over a hundred symbol, shading, and â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ line-drawing characters. Players combine â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ them in clever ways (using our mouse-driven â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ paint program) to draw FANSI Artwork. The â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ community is very social, with over 10 â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ years of history, real life gatherings, and â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ a unique culture consisting of lava hats, â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ cosmic mules and meeple hunting. â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ A virtual economy allows players to run â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ their own companies, invest in the stock â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ market, and buy and sell products from â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ various shops and vendors. Blast off into â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ space and mine minerals and colonize â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ planets. Explore the ocean in search of â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ treasure, battling monsters and gaining â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ experience. Solve interactive fiction â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ puzzles, play board and arcade games, â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ gamble at the casino, and explore hundreds â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ of player-built areas. If THAT isn't enough â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–‘â–’â–“â–ˆ to convince you: we also single-handedly â–ˆâ–“â–’â–‘ â–’â–“â–ˆ won MUSH World War II, defeating tyranny â–ˆâ–“â–’ â–“â–ˆ and securing freedom for the entire MU* â–ˆâ–“ â–ˆ Community. You're welcome. â–ˆ

mud.name: DeimosMUD
mud.desc: DeimosMUD is a CircleMUD that offers a lot of enhancements and features. Come see our unique multi-classing, intuitive skill system, and completely original world.

mud.name: Stonia (The Cruel and Lost World of Stonia)
mud.codebase: [Dikumud] Bases on Diku, ROM 2.3; about 70-80% recodings, 90% new areas
mud.desc: Since the theme of Cruel and Lost World of Stonia is the struggle of good against evil, playerkilling is the backbone of this mud. There is a trohpy list and ranking system to see most powerful players. Monthly statistics of killings are also provided. Our world is Cruel and Lost, so you must take care of yourself.

Although Stonia do not have extended class selection, we have many skills and spells depending on your class. You can compose character to your taste by choosing spells and skills. It is also possible to unlearn skills/spells and buy extra practise points.
To make levelling and gathering of equipment more interesting there are many quests built into the mud and often immortals make live quests which is good way to get great fight and good equipment.

We also have Deity points. Deity points are received via sacrificing enemy corpses, good equipment or special DP items to your God. Eventually your God may reward you if you have collected enough deity points.

Levelling will be pretty fast once you get the hang of it. There is 50 normal levels which can be gained and lost by getting or losing experience points. If you advance to Hero level (51), you no longer have to fear about losing levels and you can concentrate on PK. If you are especially good at killing and collect enough War Points, you will become Warlord (level 53) or Avatar (level 55).
Stonia is newbie friendly: we have HINT system to help new players and immortals will always help new players if 'prayed' for help.
Stonia is constantly developing: we have active area-builders, code-masters and questmasters. The lethargy is over and the second wind is blowing :)

mud.name: DopeMUD
mud.codebase: [Circlemud] slightly modified currently, more mods planned
mud.desc: Set in the world of Cronica, DopeMUD is just about having some fun in the MUD.

mud.name: Whispers of Times Lost
mud.desc: Whispers of Times Lost is back, and better than ever!

WOTL is a medieval fantasy mud designed around a custom world unlike any other.Balanced classes and races promote fair play and a challenging environment for our players. With twenty four races, ten classes, and over 400 skills and spells, WOTL allows players to truly customize their characters abilities.

Quest style races are available in the form of werewolves and vampires, and our three-tiered remort system keep players interest in progressing in both renown and power. Special roleplay monitors award experience to those who prefer to roleplay, and our safe and active systems in regards to PK allows those who wish to remain peaceful to do so, while still providing a challenging environment.

The world is constantly being upgraded to present a more life-like & challenging game environment, and we strive to be different any other mud out there. If you looking for something different, and ready for a challenge, visit Whispers of Times Lost. We promise you won't be disappointed.

Features Include: * Over 23,000 Rooms. Including: areas, wilderness, air and underwater. * Roleplay Enforced * Friendly Immortal Staff * Twenty Spoken Languages * 91 Mortal Levels with earnable advanced races * Peaceful and Active options for playerkilling * Approximatly 400 skills and spells * Extensive say, sayto, emote and social commands * Roleplay is awarded with experience * Own your own home or shop * Cooking, Fishing, Mining, Armor/Weaponsmithing skills and more! * Shapechanging lycanthropes, vampires, changlings and dragons * Intricate magic/skill learning system * Realistic Weather * Some Towns have Laws & Will Arrest for In Character Crimes * Mounts of all kinds * Friendly Player Base

mud.name: The Vortex (Original)
mud.desc: For anybody that used to play on 'The Vortex' over 4 years ago, it is now back at the request of a player or two bugging me on AIM ;)
The game has changed slightly from 3 years ago, mostly bug fixes, cosmetics, and player suggestions. The core of the game is still the same, though!
We currently offer a unique \"build your own\" class in addition to a few more \"standard\" ones with our own little twists, and a system of mining for ore and gems to build equipment.
Available classes: Alien, Apocryphic, Dragon, Drow, Highlander, Mage, Monk, Shadow, Vampire, Werewolf.
So if you used to play, or want to try a new PVP mud, drop on in :)
-Kline

mud.name: The Unofficial Unknown Armies Mush
mud.desc: Wanted to play Unknown Armies but don't have anyone close enough to do it? If your reading this you obviously have a computer connection so perhaps your only a few steps away in joining what will hopefully be a booming group of like minded people who enjoy a bit of terror, suspense and more importantly post modern fun!

mud.name: StrangeMUD
mud.desc: StrangeMUD - where thinking might become a prerequisite(tm).

StrangeMUD is a dynamic, growing mud that's been up for approximately two years now, and is constantly adding players, areas, skills, and nifty new code. Our theme is 'Anything Goes'. We're wacky and zany, and have the mobs to prove it - from Elvira, who gets _really_ peeved if you pinch her tush, to Bill Clinton, who wanders around town cleaning up the Whitewater affair. Most, if not all of our areas have 'interesting' mobs - that is, those who don't just sit there while you kill them. Mob progs and spec procs were added to tons and tons of mobs to make playing here a more remarkable experience than it already is.
It should be pretty clear that we're proud of our mud, with good reason. Years of work have gone into it, and it's a damn fine mud, with great gods and players.

mud.name: Fossworld The Arcade
mud.desc: - 20 Classes - 20 Races - Weapon Proficency System - Central area from which any game genre can be entered - Genre's include - Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Cyberpunk, and Historical - Many newbie areas and lots of unique starting eqipment - No XP loss on death and no death rooms - Loads of spells and skills - No naked mobs! All mobs have clothes and treasure where applicable - 35 body locations for equipment - Over 12,000 rooms! 176 zones and more being added all the time! - Very users friendly info on items

mud.name: SumuMud
mud.desc: SumuMUD is a Finland based mud, founded 1996 and based on fantasy genre, on a structure of multiguild, universal skill & spell system and multiple races. SumuMUD is an equipment mud, where one of the goals of the game is to gain good equipment, that can be saved through reboots in rental lockers or in castles.

Co-operating with other players is encouraged, as the players can not solve most of the quests just by themselves, but need an organized party. Players can build castles where they can store equipment. The castles are fully customizable, allowing custom descriptions, and guards, traps, doors and other items. Examples of guilds players can join are fighters, berserkers, priests, magicians, sorcerers, necromancers, abjurers and so on.

Player killing is allowed for certain limits if the killer has a valid reason. Generally, the world of SumuMUD is is a complex place where you act as you would act in real life in similar environment.

mud.name: Blood Dusk
mud.desc: The most unique mud on the Internet returns in its fourth version. On Dusk you'll find...

- Dark pre-industrial theme - All areas 100% original and unique to Blood Dusk - A slot-based skill group system which allows detailed character customization while avoiding the 'jack of all trades' syndrome - A unique combat system with hundreds of distinct moves, four stats (pain, fatigue, unbalance, and fear), and finishing moves - Distinctive fighting styles including brawler, fencer, soldier, taoken, gladiator, berserker, knifer, staff fighter, wardancer - Non-combat skill groups including theology, stealth, witchcraft, beastmastery, craftsmanship, medicine, apocruphyc - Player-run factions which can build fortresses, hire NPC assistants, collect treasure, and ally and declare war - Expansive home city of Ravenfall (~500 rooms) - Hundreds of special abilities to customize your character, such as beer belly, stoicism, cloak of night, and eldritch aura

Dusk is also refreshingly free of annoying mud-isms such as rent, corpse retrieval (combat is non-fatal), hunger & thirst, and arbitrary command delay. Every element in the game is designed for exactly one thing: to enhance the fun of your experience!
If you're tired of trolls, hobbits, magic missle, bash, and glowing jewel-bedecked swords of uberpower, then this is the mud for you.

We also have a focus on making it easy for players without a lot of time to devote to the game to play and still find it enjoyable. Of course there are plenty of \"elder games\" for those that do have a lot of time to spend. Dusk accomodates many styles of play. It's even possible to play a character with no combat skills whatsoever.
Now six years old, Dusk's diverse playerbase is as friendly as they are devoted. Log on today and see what you've been missing.

mud.name: NowMOO
mud.desc: Imagine yourself walking trough the meadows. Suddenly you encounter a cow, standing by the side of the fence, staring at you. You decide to take a closer look, but as soon as you're within grasping range, the cow approaches you and eats you whole! After a short trip through his intestines you find your way out. That's NowMOO.

Talking flowers, dwarfs giving away crying babies, or just improving your skills while attacking fierce, hairy monsters with sharp razors, it's all part of NowMOO. The stranger the things you can think of, the better we'll like you. The wizards of NowMOO are skilled and as well as friendly.
Although at the moment the MOO is mostly Dutch, we have English support in the core and an English village that will be extended as soon as the first ten English visitors have arrived.

mud.name: TransGenesis
mud.desc: For some reason it isn't giving the whole TCP/IP. vermaxhosting.com port: 5555

Transgenesis MUD is based in a modernesque world where magic has become real via a book called the Amekh-Ta. A company got hold of this archeological find, and began using it in animal and human testing.
A full history can be found at the URL, which is under construction. As is the MUD itself. Feel free to login to the message boards and make suggestions and comments about the game.
The MUD is looking for play-testers to make suggestions and give good feedback. Be gentle, as this MUD has practically just been born. :)
The world is all-original and copywrited under the name of the owner.
Stop in, take a look around. At this stage in the development, your suggestions might become a part of the MUD as a whole!

mud.name: Gundam: Operation Meteor
mud.desc: Gundam: Operation Meteor is back again for another round and isn't pulling punches. It was out of the picture for a while but that's history and it now features a new, more colorful playerbase and more features for you to enjoy! The game also features in-depth space combat and realistic mobile suitcombat, as well as an all original

mud.name: Teenagers From Outer Space MUX (TFOS)
mud.desc: Alien Contact. Something Humans have long dreamed of. The knowledge that we are no longer alone in this great big Universe. The ability to communicate with species so much more advanced than us, exchange ideas, and live in harmony with the Universe.
This MUX has nothing to do with that.

WAKE UP! Earth has been discovered by Aliens and their teenagers are enrolled in our schools, shopping in our malls, and eating the same fast food. High School is never going to be the same again. Tribbles are going to date your kid sister and silicon based life forms are going to poke at lunch and wonder exactly what the heck it is. Wait a sec...perhaps it won't be so different after all.

You'll find yourself partying down with Near Humans & Real Weirdies, have epic adventures battling the Alien Control Officers and defeating the Xerox copies from Neptune while finishing your homework on time so you can go out Friday night. You thought dragons were tough? Wait until you meet the Vice Principal.
Teenagers From Outer Space MUX is based on the popular Anime/Silly RPG by R. Talsorian Games. It is a pure Roleplaying MUX with RP enforced.

mud.name: The Mage's Lair
mud.desc: Let The Mages Lair take you to a place were the Gods rule and the mortals kill. A place where fantasy becomes reality and reality becomes fantasy. Roleplaying is encouraged, you can get married and then kill your spouse without any remorse! Friends become enemies and enemies become friends! Let TML take you from your real life problems today!

Game Description: Clan Wars based mud with extensive questing to enhance your character. Engage in Player Killing Clans or Non-PK clans as you advance and improve yourself. We include unique Classes such as Bards who sing and use music as weapons, Alchemist who brew and toss there potions, and Scholars who study wands, scrolls and staves to learn there magic!

The Mage's Lair (TML) has been around for over 10 years. It is based on a codebase called Vile Intent that is based on the released codebase called Sacred (www.tmlogs.com/sacred.php). We are longtime players who love to see new blood and challenges.
Newly coded forger system for each clan, clan eq also available.
The Mage's Lair is where Fantasy becomes Addiction, and Addiction becomes Reality. The time is now. The power is yours. Use it wisely as you enter the addiction that is knows as The Mage's Lair.
The Mage's Lair is part of The Mage's Lair Online Gaming Service. www.tmlogs.com

mud.name: StickMUD
mud.desc: StickMUD is a fairly traditional LPMUD. It still carries some features of the origianl LPMUDs, but most of the game is unique to Stick. StickMUD has been around over 10 years now, and still has some of its original or early coders and players around. This tightly knit group creates the athmosphere of StickMUD.

StickMUD has no real level or stat limits for your character. Your character can evolve forever, though, the higher levels can be very difficult to reach. In fact, StickMUD was one of the first, if not the first, LPMUD to extend the 20-level playing experience.

Stick has a number of distinct races and guilds to choose from. Each guild has its loyal supporters and favorite races. Guild wars and disputes are fairly common, since we allow limited player killing and fairly liberal self governance for players.
StickMUD has a loyal group of supporters who keep playing year after year, but the game is easy for newbies as well. You are welcome to play with us.
NOTE: We are currently adding new areas and a new universal skill system.

mud.name: Tempora Heroica
mud.desc: Tempora Heroica is a free-to-play, text-based online game known to most people as a MUD or multi-user dungeon. The mud has over ten years of development and has many things that distinguishes it from other online games, including a magic system based on Ars Magica and a detailed, well-written, scratch-built fantasy game world that has a quirky, small-town atmosphere and is filled with colorful players and NPCs.

Tempora Heroica has several features to assist new and first-time players, Such as an expansive in-game help system that is constantly being updated and expanded and a on-demand mapping system that provides a 9x9 grid of the surrounding area. For players who enjoy diversity, TH has many races available for play: humans, halflings, giants, trolls, ogres, gnomes, dwarves, goblins, elves, selkies, pixies, and brownies.
Additionally, the experienced mudder that is looking for a new home will find play on TH rewarding.

mud.name: TempusMUD
mud.desc: High magic and futuristic technology collide in one of the foremost MUDs of its class.
With past and future time periods, intricate game mechanics and a unique environment, Tempus aims to be the best there is.

TempusMUD is an immersive fantasy role playing game set in an evolving universe of ancient magic and futuristic technology. As a time-traveling adventurer you choose your own path to power in this intensive multi-player experience.

Set apart from other MUDs by dovetailing diverse genres, the worlds of Tempus range from the visceral to the ethereal. Temporal rifts in time weave together a medieval fantasy past, a cyberpunk future, and the great elemental planes into a sweeping universe taking you to the outer regions of existence and back again.

Like an interactive novel, the online text environment ignites the mind and imagination with diverse character classes, immortal quests, exotic races and religions, powerful clans, welcoming players and countless features.
The players and Immortals of TempusMUD invite you to alter our world.

mud.name: Wormhole MUD
mud.desc: Ten years in the making, Wormhole MUD was based upon the popular EliteMUD game engine, although with 100% original areas - nothing you've seen elsewhere. All our areas have a science fiction theme, either original or based upon favourites such as Star Wars, Terminator, Babylon 5, Star Trek and more...

The Wormhole itself is a white hole that spews out matter from a thousand spacefaring civilisations. Alien artefacts, the hulks of starships... and occasional survivors such as our players. They find themselves in a game-world of great opportunity - and great menace.
Wormhole MUD's expanded game engine includes a number of special features that support the science fiction theme.

Having trouble with a tough opponent? Why noy leave a trail of landmines for it to blunder into? Still having a hard time? Try throwing in a grenade from an adjacent room. Or sniping. Or get yourself powered up with a selection from almost 100 psi powers, fire up your lightsaber and go toe-to-toe. You decide.

Keep an eye out for components that you can use to build upgraded weapons, vehicles, potions and more. Enjoy our scripted questing system, automated remorting system, and the ability to fly starships between planetary and orbital facilities, and beyond. Join a clan... or form one of your own.
We invite you to join us. Resistance... is futile.

mud.name: TerraFirmA
mud.desc: TerraFirmA is a complete world inhabited by many strange and fascinating people and creatures. Its wide and varied landscape ranges from burning deserts to frozen wastes, from violent seas to thriving settlements of every size. The world is filled with quests for you to solve in your journey to the highest levels of the game; a journey that will bring you excitement and fun and challenge you in every way. Can you battle through ancient Rome? Can you find the lost children of Hamelin, or steal a pirate ship and sail it across a dangerous sea? Do you dare journey alone through dark and ancient tunnels, stirring up the dust of centuries and risking the traps and plots of cunning minds whose maniacal laughter echoes all around you? Somewhere, deep inside all of us is a little bit of magic. You just have to know how to use it. TerraFirmA lets you make the most of it. With 4 spheres and 5 levels of magic, ranging from Gerald's Dimishing Dimmer to Sensation Shining Spark we have it all.

TerraFirmA offers a unique experience in the Aber community. A heavily re-written code engine offers a substantial set of unique features. These include : a full monetary system (banks, stores, pubs, + more), mobiles with intelligence, substantial interaction, newbie friendly admin with a custom written newbie area, over 40 unique quests found nowhere else, degradable equipment, sliding attitude scales, plus plenty more!! Drop by and enjoy!

mud.name: Avatar Mush
mud.desc: In a world different from our own, there are peoples with the ability control the four elements. Earth. Water, Fire and Air. These people are known as benders. They formed into four different nations. The proud Fire Nation, on their large Island. The adoptive Northern and Southern Water tribes that inhabit the cold icy poles. The stout Earth Kingdom and their imminence continent. The un-materialistic Air Nomads and their isolated temples of the world. And of all these nations, there is one person who can control all the elements; The Avatar who tries to bring balance to the world.

Like all worlds there is strife, and a man named Kazuki, a powerful skilled Earthbender has created a Fifth Nation, the New Kingdom during a time when the Fire and Earth nations were gearing for war. He took advantage of the turmoil under the banner of world peace. He gathered the support of EarthBenders and riled the Northern Tribes under him due to piracy promoted by Earth and Fire nations.
He took to the other nations with unceasing violence. He wrought the Northern Tribe to their knees, he scorched the vast continent of the Earth Kingdom and he razed the temples of the Air nomads.
Now the world is beaten and the horizon is bleak as everyone makes their way to the final standing country; The Fire Nation, as refugees.
Will you help take back these lands or will you join in arms for world peace?
~ Gizmo - Crazy Wiki/Web PR/Website Dude ~

mud.name: Tharsis Gate
mud.desc: Tharsis Gate is a medieval mud, devoted mainly towards providing its players with an opportunity to stick a sharp pointy object into a horrible monster. It incorporates a very extensive skill/stat system which allows players to improve indefinitely with no maximum level.
Races, guilds and cross-guild training allow players to become whatever type of character they wish, specialising in any or all disciplines.
Our web pages provide help for getting new players started as well as offering tips for older players.
Tharsis Gate is actively seeking new coders and world builders and will give almost anyone a chance to prove themselves.

mud.name: Thieves World
mud.desc: ***The Official Thieves World MUD***
Enter a world of mystery, intrigue, magic and adventure. Will you be a warrior, a druid or maybe one of the thieves?

Thieves World is a well established fantasy mud (started orignally in 1993) that has a vast world to explore. We currently have over 146 areas, many of which were built specifically for Thieves World, with more orignal zones in construction. Officially recongnised by the trademark holder and licensed to use the name, we pride ourselves on the high standards of our staff and the pleasent gaming experience we provide.

We offer 125 levels, 11 classes, 26 races, tri-classing available for some races and remort for pure classes. We are sure you will find enough diversity to keep you occupied for hours. Our Immortal Staff are active on a daily basis and work hard to provide the best mudding experience you'll ever have.
Newbies are welcome. We have areas designed for them to explore and learn how to play muds if completly new to the world of mudding.

We have long and short term quests assigned by our questing staff and a couple question mobs, Clans available for those who like to belong and the occasional pkill free for all (don't worry, you don't lose a thing if you're murdered during the pkill specials).
Come join us and see how long it takes to get addicted to;

mud.name: Starlane: The Arcturus Game
mud.desc: Starlane is an abstract, multi-player, network, real-time, persistent-world strategy game of intersteller empire-building and diplomacy. Starlane players take on the role of leaders of a galactic power group, issuing commands to units such as starships, bases and armies in order to achive their chosen goals; be they survial, prosperity or galactic domination.

While player's orders are processed in real time and take effect immediately, Starlane was designed to be played over an extended period of time, with negotiations between players occuring through e-mail. The ideal Starlane game would involve tens (or hundreds) of players, thousands of star systems, and the kind of Byzantine diplomacy that would make Kofi Annan want to curl up and die.
Starlane requires the download of a custom Java client.

mud.name: ThunderDome
mud.desc: Entering its 12th year of existence, ThunderDome can now boast of being one of the longest running MUDs in the history of the internet. In those years, ThunderDome has done much to advance the quality of game play, while adding much to the notions of what a diku-style mud should be. Tdome offers a dark, and at times, humorous perspective on a futuristic world set sometime after the earth's destruction. Human society, formed mostly of roughly governed gangs, must now contend with aliens and mutated beasts for control of tdome's 13k rooms. Toward that end, players can choose between 13 different classes, and are allowed to log 3 of these characters on at once.

Guns (dozens are offered) and magic vie for superiority in the tdome world, while biological implants and learned skills offer additional methods by which a character might improve his lot in a life filled to the brim with danger and adventure. Inexperienced players soon learn that the inherent danger can be tempered by joining one of tdome's many gangs which offer a variety of advantages. Sanctioned gangs have their own bunkers from which to operate, and which offer cut rate rent costs and equipment repair.
If you are the sort that enjoys walking on the wild side, come seek the challenge of survival in a world gone mad. There should be plenty of room to accommodate you...Hell ain't half full yet. :)

mud.name: Naruto The Way Of The Ninja
mud.desc: Well we started the mud about 2 years ago now, just a few pople who were dedicated, along the way some quit and some stayed. After some delays, We are back at it! And Striving to provide player's with the best Naruto based mud out there! We are making the mud like no other, our coder is going all out with a fresh new Handseal system to perform all your favorite Jutsu's plus some that you may have forgotten. We currently have clans and are still building the Naruto world, we are trying out hardest to get as many missions in as we can to provide a mission based system for the Ninja trying to improve his rank! We are also improvin the Jutsu's so that a player is able to perform any Jutsu that is performed on The Naruto Series. This will take a lot of time and effort and at current we require more builders, for the builders that are hired, promotion is available to those that work hard.We Also are featuring Villages, in which a single player may become Hokage/Kazekage/Mizukage/Tsuchikage/Raikage and any other kage you can think of and you got to be the best Ninja to stay on top with challenges being accepted for a take over, only the best will stay on top and lead their people into War against other villages, Not only do we have clan wars but also Village wars will be possible in due time!As any player or admin can see, we are a mud with a dream and we are a mud trying our hardest to give the player's what they want! So if you want to lend a hand then sign on or leave a email at the admin's email or msc68136@bigpond.net.au and I'll get back to you asap.
Gaara, Co-Owner Of Naruto: The Way Of The Ninja!

mud.name: Time of Darkness
mud.desc: Time of Darkness has moved. This is the first step towards the future. Nineteen months of planning are about to result in a complete overhaul of the code. The new Time of Darkness is soon to be born.

Coming soon: 30 races, racial language sytem, racial skills and areas, class/race based eq for better RP, over 100 new skills and spells, full clan raid system, inter-room weaponry, new arena system, global war, deity worship, new eq slots, alignment based hometowns, lockers, **85** new and original areas, ALL remaining areas edited so every one is worth going to, over 200 working shops, new clans, clan spells, over twelve Hero runs, full help files and TRUE balance of the races and classes.
We are about a month away from all of this. Stop by and get in on it before it happens or get on the mailing list at the site to receive information.
The juju is strong and good, come be a part of the Darkness. Meow.

mud.name: Eternal Bliss
mud.desc: Formerly Malicious Bliss, we decided to totally overhaul the entire mud due to to many bugs and what not. We are currently under construction. Looking to hire decent builders and a coder to help us get underway. If you're savy enough to run with the big dogs. Come with it! Lets roll with this and get'er done!

mud.name: Celathryan : The Uncharted
mud.desc: Over a thousand years since the Shattered Wars, the world has become very much rebuilt and the dragons, although still around, seem to have relinquished control. Three lands have risen to become civilizations, the most prosperous still looked after by dragon kind but each having its own ruling government: The first a realm where things that humans would have considered fantasy have become common. Not just dragons but also elfkin and others have claimed it as a homeland, all ruled over by an unpredictable Elven king. A second land, under a human Empress, has become a prosperous one that's strikingly medieval in feel. Mostly a human population this land also controls the largest of ports and is often a stop for travellers also giving the most motley assortment of peoples to be found. Finally the third land, one that has tried to rebuild the advancements that humans once had, is a slowly rebuilding reminder of the post-apocalyptic future that humans have had to endure. Controlled by the iron fist of a General, this land ranges from the broken runes of the old world to newer buildings and some suspect hidden technologies.

mud.name: TinyTIM
mud.desc: TinyTIM is the world's oldest continual MU* in existance. We have a blistering social scene with frequent headache-producing events and various other things that make your stomach hurt. Most people never live through the experience, but that doesn't stop them. Our wizards are utterly arbitrary, and we've been known to turn people into lawn chairs for using the letter 'o' in their name. We have a Pern Weyr that's really nice, except the carpeting is very ugly. Come on down and hang out in the TinyTIM Main Area Place (the Nexus), which we stole from TinyHell and they can't have it back, the bastards. It likes us better anyhow.

We're run by a cow and a fish and some Klingons and a few dragonriders and an ancient Native American god and a guy who's really both a guy and a girl, plus some others. Sometimes it gets confusing, and often frightening. But hey, you only live once. Oh! Nearly forgot. We're not just a big game; we're a REALLY big game.

mud.name: Sentience
mud.codebase: [Rom] Extensive modification and additions; no stock areas
mud.desc: Sentience is a heavily modified Rom/Diku based mud that features a massive, 100% unique world. Some of the key elements of the mud are:

* 11 playable races * 12 mortal classes and 12 remort classes * Hundreds of unique spells and skills * Discreet yet extremely useful compass rose displays exits instead of a garbled exit line. * Restricted player kill in three flavors: * lawful, neutral, and chaotic * Player run churches * Gigantic virtual wilderness area * Sail the oceans and engage in ship vs ship combat * Engaging and immersive areas * RP encouraged but never required * Automated quest system * Immortal hosted RP events and global quests * Newbie friendly atmosphere * Administrative staff are always willing to listen to player ideas, comments, or criticisms

This mud is built by people who are sick of the unoriginal, cliche ridden, hack and slash muds that are out there. If you're looking for a unique experience and a friendly atmosphere, we encourage you to give Sentience a try.

mud.name: Tempered Steel
mud.desc: Tempered Steel has a lot to offer some of them being: No Stock Areas! Interactive mprogs! Unique Auction System! Remort and Double Remorting! Scanning for Several Rooms, No death traps! Well Balanced Game System, 100 levels. And many many more innovative features.

We are a casual group with an often times mature sense of humor, we would like to see new people, however we are extremely relaxed. Their is building going on, however the mud recently went through a change in ownership and in doing so lost semi critical parts. If your up for fun we can still provide it!

mud.name: Tormented Soul
mud.desc: Tormented Soul is no longer available to the general public.

mud.name: Persona MUSH
mud.desc: The power of the human mind is both infinite and terrible. Mankind is capable of both selfless love and unfathomable cruelty. Each of us possesses a world beyond the senses, a world which is the backbeat and underpinning of the waking, conscious world. There are those who have the power to channel the archetypes within them to achieve superhuman feats. This power is called 'Persona'. These are the stories of those people, who have, for better or for worse, have been granted great power... And how they decide to use it.

Those who confront this realm of the unconscious are forever changed by the experience. Some are erased, some are twisted. But others find that they and the reflections they walk among are one and the same, and through this, prosper. Great forces have been set into motion by those who understand this power, forces that could either save humanity, or doom it. What mask will you wear to confront the hardships of life? That choice is yours alone to make.

Within the shadows of the cities of Japan, strange and incredible things occur. Where rumors become real, the reflection of a television might conceal the door to another world, and at midnight, time itself stands still. This all lurks just below the surface of the common, everyday waking life of the world, where by day men and women work and go to school, and by night seek out the reasons for this fantastic existence.

PersonaMUSH is a new game based on Atlus' Shin Megami Tensei: Persona franchise. As Persona and Shadow are two sides of the same coin, both those who command the power of Persona and those who have allowed their Shadow to rule over them are available for application.
And do watch out for the butterflies...

mud.name: Myth's and Legends MUX
mud.desc: Myth's and Legends is currently under development and only seeking, at this time, people who are willing to help build the game from the ground up and work with the owner to create a unique game.
Im currently searching for builders and coders to get the main system setup so we can accept players.

mud.name: KinslayerMUD
mud.desc: The Wheel of Time turns and Ages come and pass. What was, what will be, and what is, may yet fall under the Shadow. A world of kings, queens, and Aes Sedai, women who can tap the True Source and wield the One Power. At the moment of Creation, the Creator bound the Dark One away from the world of humankind, but more than three thousand years ago, Aes Sedai, then both men and women, unknowingly bored into that prison outside of time. The Dark One was able to touch the world only lightly before the hole was soon sealed over. But the Dark One's taint settled on saidin, the male half of the Power, and every male Aes Sedai went mad. In the Breaking of the World they destroyed civilization and changed the very face of the earth, sinking mountains beneath the sea and bringing new seas where land had been. Now only women bear the title Aes Sedai, men still are born who can learn to channel the Power, or worse, who will channel one day whether they try to or not. Doomed to madness, destruction, and death by the taint of the saidin, they are hunted down by the Aes Sedai and gentled, cut off forever from the Power for the safety of the world. Explore new lands in search of lost treasures and artifacts. We have more than 10,000 rooms open and many more on the way. Pit your skills in battle against the trolloc horde or the human infestation! Roleplay you character to its fullest potential and gain acceptance to and possibly lead one of our numerous clans! For the darkside we offer the following clans: Gho'blin, Dha'vol, Kho'mon, Al'ghol, Ko'bal, Chosen, Draghkar (soon to come) with hard work and much dedication trollocs can first become master then eventually become Myrddraal or Gray Men For the Lightside we offer: Borderguard, queens Guard, Gaidin, White Tower, Green Ajah (more Ajah in the works), Murandian, Calvary, Wolfbrothers, Asha'man

mud.name: Traveller's Mud (Trav)
mud.desc: TravMud has been around since fall 1991 and is a long-running, stable environment. Using a highly modified 2.4.5 mudlib, we have created a fun environment without the complexities involved with many of today's newer systems. Though an older system, we offer many features to increase a player's fun. A guild system exists that allows players to specialize their character's abilities, as they explore the world of TravMud through our many areas. These areas span from medieval fantasy to science fiction, but still manage to keep those areas seperate. We have a few, very challenging quests which are only required for advancement to creator status. Player Killing is by registration only, with registered players fighting amongth themselves without limit. Finally, we have a responsive wizard staff who are open to suggestions for improvement, and are currently working on cleaning up some of the more pernicious bugs, and making the MUD more navigable. Come by and see TravMud. See how much fun simplicity can be for a change.

mud.name: TrekMUSH - Among The Stars
mud.desc: ATS is set 25 years past DS9's Way of the Warrior episode, however many canon events have been incorporated into the timeline. The MUSH has 8 active factions: UFP, Klingons, Romulans, Cardassians, Ferengi, Pryan (Maquis) and Orions. The MUSH also includes a new original faction known as the Zhrakhadi Orders. There are many NPC controlled factions, ranging from the canon Borg, Hirogen, Kazon, Dominion and Tholians as well as original NPC empires Aurellans, Tyrixx, Veridan and Galactic Terran Imperium. ATS is the home of Aspace, which is a complete and fully- featured space system. There are also full economy and combat systems, all being constantly upgrading to further enhance the gameplay. There are also a number of features in space including nebulae, anomalies, planets, bases and ships. Each faction also has its own unique race and ship attributes. ATS is not a mud. ATS is a Role Playing MUSH. You will need to RP in order to gain rank, access to ships or to fully experience all that ATS has to offer. You must earn rank and standing by RPing your way to the top - there is competition, so you must be the best. ATS invites all applicants to come and enjoy the vast universe that ATS has to offer.

mud.name: Tsunami
mud.desc: A MUD that has existed for nearly 20 years, with many players and wizards who have been around for the same amount of time. A fantasy experience that is incredibly rich in detail, and growing every single day. Come and experience the Tsunami.

mud.name: Age of Destiny: Empire MUD
mud.desc: Come and stake your claim!
Based on Paul Clarke's EmpireMUD code base.

Empire MUD offers: * A HUGE world that players can shape to their desires * ASCII map navigation * Day/Night cycles * Building creation * Crafting * Chop trees, gather sticks, mine ore. * Encrust jewels, assemble catapults, manufacture ships * Gain wealth and build to become the most famous of all empires.

mud.name: Turf
