mud.desc: Turf is a multi-themed MUD with entirely unique areas ranging from 'Two-Tier Britain', a then-and-now look at the UK, to future-oriented areas such as Space Station Krios and Star Wars, Star Trek, and Babylon 5 areas, with everything in between from gothic horror to Monty Python's Flying Circus, and several areas too unique to even describe in under twenty lines. 65 areas in total, all of which have been carefully checked for interesting content rather than sheer size.
PK is restricted to members of clans who have voted to be involved in player-killing. Player stealing is regulated in the same way.

Turf began as a Merc 2.2 in 1994 and has had an evolving code base since, with a bent on stability as well as features. In addition to the flashy features found on all quality MUDs Turf adds stability, averaging under four crashes in a year. Turf is rebooted approximately once a month for code and area file updates, so there is always something new to play with.

mud.name: DragonKnigth
mud.desc: A Webbased MUD all you relly do is go around and kill mosters gaining EXP and leveling up And also getting gold.
Relly simple Newbie-friendly. Easy to learn how to play

mud.name: Black Tower
mud.desc: Black Tower is the name a of new mud game I am working on it is based on smaug server code. Black Tower is set on a planet named Abyss which has recently been colonized by the humans. Original prospecting of the planet laid it out as a lush and resource bountiful world but probe scans failed to pick up on some important information. The planet is already inhabited. The Gaians are a race of people who have evolved and developed technologically to co exist perfectly with nature, they are genetic engineering experts. When the colony ship first landed on Abyss all seemed to be going well further scans of the planet showed rich nodes of precious metal scattered through the mountain scape near which they had landed. But when clear cutting began for the new settlement which the humans wanted to build. The Gaians reacted the only way they could; they attacked.
Alright so thats a little taste of the story line there will be three player selectable races humans, gaians and the human ally androids.

I still have allot of work to do on this game and my main reason for making this posting is that i need help if any of you are interested please visit my website. oh and as a side note I run this server from my home computer, I dont have a dedicated server yet so if you attempt to log in and find the server not running just send me an email and we will setup a time.
--Thanks --Tadasu

mud.name: Twilight
mud.desc: Twilight is a roleplay-intensive environment, whose pivotal element is that of the myths and legends of creatures and beings hidden from the human world but very much part of it. Players should either make their characters into beings that can appear as human, or at least as a normal animal (such as a domestic dog or a sewer rat) in public, and have a true nature somewhat more paranormal (ie: Vampire, Werewolf, Mage, Faerie, etc.). Alternately, players can also play true humans, who may or may not have some kind of education in this strange world going on right beneath their noses. The city is dark, techno-gothic, and should have plenty of mystery.

To get a better feel for the MUCK, we recommend visiting Twilight as a guest before you send email for a character. Innovation and creativity are encouraged in both character creation and tinyplot development! Players are allowed to make up their own 'race' to accomodate their needs, so long as it remains in theme and not overly powerful.

mud.name: testing
mud.desc: Come Check Us Out
Flurry - Owner-Coder-Builder

mud.name: Stick in the MUD
mud.desc: Stick in the MUD, founded in February 1994, was one of the first ROM-based MUDs online. Originally a hangout for displaced ROM players and University of Toronto engineering students, it quickly became populated with new mudders and evolved its own identity.

Stick attracts beginning and experienced mudders who are looking for a simple, friendly, relatively clean ROM-based mud to explore. It retains mudders who enjoy the diversity and spirit of community that endure year after year -- and it retains mudders who just... can't... resist... the urge to log on....

As a game, Stick in the MUD is much like its name. It doesn't change quickly. This is not a 1000-area 80-race MUD with 100 people on at all times. The implementors are a couple of boring ol' computer professionals who try hard not to take the game, their roles, or themselves too seriously. They keep good backups, fix bugs, and otherwise sit around and socialize like most everyone else.
For the player who prefers to keep running around killing monsters after reaching immortality, Stick offers a reincarnation option with expanded race/class selections.

mud.name: The Two Towers
mud.codebase: [LP] Highly customized TMI-2 1.1.1 mudlib on MudOS v22
mud.desc: The Two Towers MUD is a free Multiplayer Online Roleplaying Game set entirely within Tolkien's world of Middle-Earth. We have extensively re-created the lands of Middle-Earth in a rich text environment, from Mithlond to Mordor and the lands of Harad beyond. With over 100,000 rooms and always growing, The Two Towers is a richly developed and highly interactive world. There are hundreds of quests, with rewards great and small, for you to discover.
The Two Towers has an active community of players from around the world who come together to play online in the same world. Players join together to create guilds, raid enemy lands, and more.

Online continuously since 1994, The Two Towers is one of the longest running Multiplayer games on the internet and is maintained by a staff of hardworking volunteers who love Tolkien and multiplayer gaming.

mud.name: UglyMug
mud.desc: UglyMUG is one of the longest-established talkers in the UK (up since 1990). It's seen thousands of players over the years, and much building. The structure is free-form: no role-playing is required and anyone is allowed to build. We have large adventuring areas available, created and extended over many years, and everyone is free to extend them further.

No registration is required: simply connect and create a new character. We have several friendly admin who are on throughout the day to help newcomers, and full online documentation for all the game commands and areas, including many programming examples.

mud.name: The Godwars: War of Legend
mud.desc: }> }< The Godwars: War of Legend O[(O):::<=======================> }< }>

Are you tired of the same old Godwars muds? Maybe you like them, but wish there were more classes to choose from. Perhaps you enjoy a place where you get to completely destroy your enemies. Does this describe you? If so, welcome to War of Legend.

Here we offer a broad variety of classes, most of which are completely original and exclusive to this MUD. Those that aren’t original have completely revamped skills and abilities. With 6 base classes, 15 subclasses, countless variations of each and hundreds of skills to choose from, you have the ability to customize your characters like nowhere else.

War of Legend does not play like a typical Godwars MUD. Statistics play a significant role in your success. Items are generated with the randomness similar to that in Diablo II. No two pieces of equipment obtained from creatures are ever exactly the same. There is also a set of unique items to purchase that will advance you to the highest levels of strength.

War of Legend offers a special system of forging to enhance and upgrade your weapons and armor as you see fit. With this system you can advance your equipment through six tiers of growth, each building on the previous tier. With socketable jewels that add special bonuses to all of your equipment you can become a serious force among your adversaries.

Gold is the currency here. With it, you have the means to purchase uniques and forge your equipment. You can purchase tattoos, which add a vast array of stats and enhancements to make you stronger. Materia are available, which is an item that grows as you grow, each with a different and substantially powerful affect.

You will journey through a progression of one hundred levels. At the end of that journey you will have an opportunity to achieve mastery of your class. With mastery you gain an item and ability unique to your class that sets you apart from your peers as well as puts a definitive stamp on that class. With each passing level you grow in strength, receive access to more skills, and develop more of a combat prowess.

Combat in War of Legend is dynamic and diverse. Skills and abilities exist that support ranged combat, stealth combat, damage over time spells, arena combat and countless other features. The more you fight and win, the stronger you can become.

So whether you prefer to shoot your enemies from a safe distance with a bow as a Sentinel, sneak up on them from the shadows as a Ninja, rip them to pieces as a Demon, call upon the forces of death as a Wraith or annihilate them with the jumping skills of a Dragoon, come see if you have what it takes to fight in the War of Legend.

mud.name: Dragonheart - Est. 1995
mud.codebase: [LP] LP Mud base, heavily modified, unique world
mud.desc: Dragonheart was established in 1995 by Daniel Huber. Over the years it has been added to, and changed many times, which has let it evolve into what it is today.

Dragonheart is a heavily customized LP Mud that was originally a heaven 7 mudlib. The world is 100% unique with a strong base of players, some of which have been around since the mud's inception over 14 years ago.

The mud is currently operated by a group of ex-players who have played or coded on Dragonheart for some or all of the last decade. Multiple classes and races are available to allow for a wide variety of character customizations.
With zones continually being added, the challenge stays fresh and Dragonheart continues to thrive. Come check us out and see what it's all about.

mud.name: Alsherok
mud.desc: Alsherok is a medieval/fantasy mud using the AFKMud codebase, which is derived from the SMAUG 1.02a/1.4a codebase. We have many features, such as:

* A unique character creation system where you create your character in play. * Choose from 19 races and 11 classes. * An original 9,000+ room world, connected by an extensive overland map system. * A more realistic auction system with automated auctioneers. * Variable display layouts for things like score, who, etc. * Highly customizable ANSI color. * Guilds for peaceful players, Clans for PK. * Internal command aliasing. * Mud eXtension Protocol (MXP) enhancements. [Requires client-side support] * Mud Sound Protocol (MSP) enhancements. [Requires client-side support] * MCCP compression to reduce outgoing bandwidth. [Requires client-side support] * Integrated webserver supporting who, wizlist, areas list, and helpfile index. * Intermud-3 and IMC2 chat network links. * A staff of helpful, friendly immortals. Cliche, but at least it's true :)
Need more incentive? Drop by our webpage at www.alsherok.net. It's full of helpful tips on playing on Alsherok and has a number of other goodies such as a stories section.
There are a lot of things to see and do in Alsherok, and we hope to see you there!
Adventure beckons in the lands of mystique.... Samson - Implementor of Alsherok

mud.name: TableMUSH
mud.desc: Since ancient Senet, man has been fascinated with games that could be played around a table. The concept of Board Games and Tabletop Games predates most forms of writing, or so say the historians. From Mills to Chess, and Chess to wargames, and from wargames into Dungeons & Dragons, gaming has evolved and grown until it became one of the most popular pasttimes for families and friends the world over.

TableMUSH is a social environment; a world of gaming whose philosophy is that all games--no matter how they are played or why, so long as they bring two or more players together, they should be welcomed here. Although the focus of TableMUSH is on modern role-playing games such as Dungeons & Dragons, Werewolf or Shadowrun, no game that involves two or more players and can be played within the policies of the community will ever be turned away.
Come, play, and enjoy.

mud.name: The Underworld
mud.desc: An invitation to explore the Underworld.... Since 1988 the Underworld has been providing a unique mudding experience for mudders of all levels. With over 10000 rooms and growing, there is always something new and exciting to explore!

*8 Classes (including multiclassing) and 10 races *65 Levels of Mortal play and 10 active Immortal levels *Automated Auction system *Active clans *Over 120 Zones, 3400 Distinct Mobs, and 3700 Objects *Quests and Chaos Nights *Hospital where you can buy things with money and experience Freedom from hunger and thirst Hitpoints and mana for single class characters Increases in str/int/wis/dex/con/cha for any player *Optional Player Killing

Based on sillymud, the code is very stable and has been majorly reworked for optimum performance and enjoyment. Lag is non-existant, as the Underworld is running on an dedicate pentium server which is connected to the net on two very lightly used T3s.

mud.name: KorongilMUSH
mud.desc: Korongil is a world of fantasy, where demons and sorcerers battle knights and kings. The darkness of evil Moralan is growing once more, and the forces of light build their strength to rise up and oppose it. What will happen? Is war inevitable? Within this struggle you will find common men and women who shall rise to become legends, will you be one of them? Only time, and RP, will tell. The theme of Korongil is a pseudo-medieval setting of fantastic proportions. The struggle between good and evil is spread throughout all levels of existance, from the lives of mortals, the world's nations, even to the deities responsible for this reality. The tides of war and peace flow throughout the past, present, and future, carrying the whims of mortals and immortals alike. The essence of sorcery surrounds all that exists, offering its power to all who have the strength to wield it. Fantastic creatures inhabit the wilds as the sentient races build Korongil's nations within their cities. The path the world will take relies upon the choices of those who struggle within its reality. KorongilMUSH offers interesting Role-Playing within its original fantasy world. You can portray one of the many inhabitants of this vast and varied world. Select to play any of our standard races, from the dour dwarves to the brutish xyloks, and perhaps earn the role of one of our more restricted species. Explore the nations of Elduran and Moralan while taking part in the intrigues and events that swirl around you. Your actions can shape the world. Justice or tyranny, life or death, the choice is yours.

mud.name: SoulMUD
mud.desc: A quad class DIKU mud which supports single/dual/triple classing, in 6 base classes, and allows for advancement in 15 advanced classes. Full array of prime and non prime skills for all classes, though each class has its strengths and weak- nesses. Advanced classes may participate in Order vs Chaos pvp. Grouping bonuses are extravagant. A land were even objects level and some turn into artifacts, no 2 leveled objects will end up the same. A fast, fast paced mud environment, not for the feint of heart. Players may also choose difficulties, such a roughneck for life based perma death, hardcore for only one life, or opt out by being normal. For an added challenge, Anarchy characters may spend their existence being aggro-magnets to the entire realm. Travel system allows for transport from towns to unlocked zones, while the squad system attempts to incorp- orate many standard client functions. The event and quest generator offers a dynamic land which is ever changing in its hostile nature. A land where all mobiles grow and get stronger over time, and even have emotions which change based on character actions, a world rich in treasures and power, for those who survive. Ability descriptions are now available in the practice window, covering all of the 320 available levels a character may attain, and levels are far cheaper across the entire spectrum. For exploration, there are some 140 zones to explore, 870+ abilities, even an unlimited, gold based storage vault for each character.

Features like scan, astrological bonuses, a calendar and solar/lunar holiday system, forges, uncrippled-throw, dual wield, permanent tattoos, spell memorization, weapon proficiencies, in-game exp counters, auto stabbers, health reporters, autoloot/split/sac, with a variety of prompts and a very swift split second combat system.
Level 40 is the new level 1 for all new characters. Are you up for the challenges this harsh and foreboding land has to offer? Risk and reward!

mud.name: Watch the Fall
mud.desc: WTF is an LPMud with a post apocalyptic theme to it.

I'm in the process of creating a world that players can relate to. I think that it is important to not have mindless fights and grinds, but to instead watch your character grow and watch the world/people around you grow.

And of course you can have your grinding, but I try to make it as non- mindless as possible by trying to create mobs that you'll remember or quests that you'll want to keep on playing over in your head.

WTF features 3 dungeons (1 is functional while the other 2 are still under construction). Each dungeon will have 3 or more bosses to it and each boss will have their own unique dialog, story, and equipment.
The world is new and molding why not try it out before everyone comes pouring in to play?
-Ghost

mud.name: Unicorn Valley
mud.desc: Welcome to Unicorn Valley. Here it is possible to become a number of different things. Become a warrior, wizard, gypsy, swashbuckler, just to name a few. As for race, try life as a Dragonkin, Svirfneblin Tabaxi, or the traditional Elf, Dwarf, etc. Explore vast new areas, encounter large imposing monsters, greet friends and enjoy the amiable atmosphere. Pkill and peaceful roam the lands together, peaceful multy-ing is allowed. The immortal staff are here to make your life in the Valley enjoyable. Come and explore the Valley.

mud.name: United Federation of Planets
mud.desc: United Federation of Planets started out as a small mud and has grown in size and features. We are well known for our work at helping new mud players. We have had U.F.P. mud since back in 1994 and are still running and changing. That's 12 years of knocking goblins in the head with a standard issue sword and lighting your path with a small orb of magical fire. A very long time indeed. Some of the original players still play the same characters they started back when we were just beginning. We encourgage new players as well as players that have been to many muds to give us a try. Our mud environment is newbie-friendly and there is a great spirit of helping and caring among those of us here. It is a great place to come and be with friends and kick back and relax. If you don't feel like killing Romulans, you can just chat about things going on in your life and the world with others who share your views.

We are adding new areas and themes which are unique and fun for players. Player ideas are encouraged and often added to our world, including ideas for new areas. Our mud blends Star Trek with D&D and a bit of the things you grew up with all in one place. You can walk through Starfleet command headquarters and interact with the personnel, or you can board the Enterprise and fight the Romulans and Klingons side-by-side with the crew. You can even take a shuttlecraft from area to area or board the New York subway. Some areas are quite challenging and keep even the high level players on their toes. In a time where graphical MMORPG are leading the pack for internet gaming, it is nice to return to a simplier time and a way that anyone could do and didn't mean funnelling a lot of cash into online subscription fees, upgraded graphics cards or buying player files. The old way of 'just mud and have fun' is still vital and important. Muds are still here, we will continue to be here as long as there are still orcs and goblin over-running Midgaard and Moria.
Live long and prosper.

mud.name: UNItopia
mud.desc: UNItopia is the first german native language, multi-genre fantasy mud, located in Stuttgart, Germany.

UNItopia consists of two parts, a virtual implementation of the University of Stuttgart campus, the serious part and the fantasy world Magyra, the fun part. Magyra itself consists of many different continents, featuring different genres: Tolkien's Middle-Earth, antique Celts, Greek mythology... etween these continents players may travel with own, self designed vessels or be transported by said so reliable ferry crafts. Long playing species may ascend to angel or god status, to add to our dimensions, to be Lord of stormy waters and harsh lands... Come and have fun.

mud.name: Dark Metal
mud.desc: Dark Metal MUSH: Cyberpunk-themed Old World of Darkness - set in a battered post-apocalyptic world after the Fall in which the existence of the supernatural was irrevocably proven to the eyes of humanity. This is Corp-controlled LATMA (the Los Angeles-Tijuana Metropolitan Area), where Bright citizens have all the rights under the watchful eye of the Consortium, and Dark residents don't even exist legally - which some of them prefer.
Plots are ongoing and lively, with both staff plots and strong encouragement for players to develop and run their own. Here are some of the things currently ongoing:
Having retaken a fallen caern, the GAROU begin the efforts to build it into a stronghold in the midst of the city, to hold against the pervasive influences of the Wyrm.
The MAGES and SORCERERS, having secured a strange temporal shard, undertake to shape it into a safe space for magic-workers.

LATMA has long been a frontier territory for the CAMARILLA, with success that waxes and wanes - a strategic location for Kindred as well as mortal politics. Now, however, they have begun creation of a center of power in Escondido, and are recruiting support from the long-time residents toward developing a secure Elysium location.

The SABBAT have made a recent discovery of a 'psychic space' called the Oubliette. The Oubliette is a place of both wonder and horror with ancient roots that may contain the power to start or stop Gehenna.

Like a southern California fog, the ragtag LATMA pride of BASTET fade in and out of view. Recent events have put them on the path of a dubious artifact, to say nothing of the other myriad secrets the cats pursue.
CORPORATE warfare is a constant; want to run errands doing their dirty laundry, dodge Metropolitan Security, or maybe try to take over a corp of your own?

Dark Metal MUSH is open-chargen across the board for starting-level characters - Vampire, Mage, Sorcerer, Garou, Ratkin, Bastet, Corax, and cyber-enhanced Human. Plots are open to the playerbase at large - if you want to get involved with any of the above, just drop a word to a staffer. We'll work you in. Got an idea for a plot of your own? Our guidelines for running Player-Run-Plots not only allow but encourage it. Come tell your stories.

Averaging from 20-40+ players, there's plenty going on for anyone to get involved in, supported by extensive, ever-evolving and maintained custom code. Also, have a look at our webpage for extensive theme and information files, active forums and rules discussions, staff agenda, and other up-to-the-minute information.

mud.name: Marked For Death II
mud.desc: we got sick of playing muds, Spending time there and then poof the muds gone a month later, So we opened up marked for death 2. A code one of the owners has worked on for nearly 4 years, We are a pure player-killing mud with alot of extra's and changes under way, So stop by and have some fun take a few heads off while your at it.
Xain and Kodiak

mud.name: Apocalypse
mud.desc: A fun Abermud stocked with lots of fun areas to romp, some new, some old. Lots of mudtoys for runners to gear up with as they face their adventures.

mud.name: Utopia
mud.desc: Come to our Utopia! Extremely helpful players and powers abound in this huge virtual world built from a blend of Aber, Dyrt, and Dirt codes.

Utopia is a friendly place of fellowship, but beware! There are evil wizards, Gods, and worse that try to rip our delicate balance (and you) to shreds! Come fast, and quiet that everbabbling dragon Puff with one fell THUD from Thor's mjolnir!
Team up with your fellow adventurers to rid the ancient cathedral from its vampyric taint. (and those were only 2 of our over 100 zones!)

mud.name: Kallisti MUD
mud.desc: Founded in 1992, Kallisti MUD boasts an exciting and unique world with over 12,500+ rooms to explore. Characters enjoy a wide variety of classes and races to choose from, along with 60+ levels including nobility ranks. Characters can also choose to expand their lineage by creating bloodlines or further enhance their characters with our unique meta system.
Extras: Sound support (MSP), builder options, automated quests, clans, special events, experienced player base and a HUGE world to explore.
Incredibly addictive - you won't be disappointed.

mud.name: Valhalla MUD
mud.desc: The labyrinth which you find yourself trapped in is dark. It's impossible to tell the different pathways from each other, and all attempts to retrace your own steps have failed. You are hopelessly lost.

But... is that a faint glow in the distance? You haven't noticed that light before, perhaps it leads to the outside! Your heart leaps as you quickly stride toward its source, your mind so focused on the distant light that you fail to notice the claw marks and patches of scorched blackness on the surrounding walls.

Finally you find yourself in a large cave, and at last you see the source of the light, the flaming maw of a dragon! You try to flee, but panic seizes you, and your feet freeze in their tracks. In what seems like an eternity to your racing mind, the dragon lowers its massive and scaly head and crushes you in its powerful jaws!

You fall into the arms of a tall powerful woman, dressed in a sparkling suit of full armour, and wearing her long hair in twin braids down her back. She cradles you in her arms like you were a child and whispers, \"Fear not, warrior. I am a Valkyrie, sent by the gods to take you to...\" VALHALLA The MUD, from the programmers who created the original DIKU MUD and now maintained by Whistler. * A fully automated \"Newbie Guide\", for those completely new to MUDs, or just wanting a little bit of a helping hand to start.
* All your old favorite zones (like Tiamat and Isle of the Dead) along with many brand new ones!
* Hundreds of interactive quests.
* And, of course, Valhalla, where the slain adventurer may rest in peace.... The books of history are not yet closed, Adventurer... Make the journey now!

Valhalla MUD is the home of the developers of the Valhalla MUD Engine (VME),(diku II)derivitive. There are well over 200 automated quests that require from a few minutes to several months to complete. Char descriptions, body parts, communication channels, color and prompts are customizable. Over 14000 rooms and growing still (some of which we offer with the VME release).
So come visit Valhalla MUD and have fun, make new friends and look out for the dragons!.

mud.name: Valheru Mud
mud.desc: Valheru - the next step in Dikumuds created by the team who brought you the original Dikumud and DikuII (Valhalla). Our many features include:

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- * A richly defined world which is constantly growing * Extensive class system consisting of over a dozen guilds and flexible multi-classing capabilities. * AI-driven world allows interaction with mobiles, objects and the world around you. You'll end up in conversation with some of our mobiles unwittingly! * The friendliest immortals you will find, helping to make your stay a truly warm experience. You will feel welcome here immediately! * Completely automated newbie guide to help introduce you to the game and take you on a tour through your hometown. * Online (real-time) and automated quests to challenge your skill and ingenuity. -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
If there is one mud you visit make it Valheru, you will be thoroughly entertained!

mud.name: AnsibleMOO
mud.desc: Ansible is a Role-Playing (non-combat, non-PK) Game set 10 years prior to the events depicted on the battle school from Orson Scott Card's novel 'Ender's Game'.

The players take on the roles of students on an International Fleet space station and interact with each other and the teachers. Specially selected children (chosen for their intelligence and determination) arrive to the station as 'launchies', the low of the low newbies, of approximately 6 years in age.

Eventually, these students are promoted to 'armies' that compete in battle games set up by the teachers. Some of these soldiers will become Toon Leaders. A few, Commanders. By the time of graduation, at about age 14, each child will have made many friends and a few enemies, and learned the abilities they need to become skilled soldiers, strategists, and pilots for the International Fleet.

That is, so long as the teachers don't break the young recruits by pushing them too hard, desperate to discover the child commander destined to lead Earth to victory against a deadly alien race, the Formics.

mud.name: Valley of the Nile
mud.desc: Valley of the Nile is a 2.5D graphical chat environment built entirely with DHTML and Cold Fusion. You can participate using any 4.0 or higher web browser--without downloading any kind of software or plug-in. The site is free and people interested in building their own rooms may request a web-based tool for doing so. The interface is entirely free of controls or other clutter. Visitors simply click where they want their avatar to go and type to communicate.

mud.name: Vampire Wars
mud.desc: Vampire Wars is purely a vampire mud: it has no werewolves, demons or mages. As such, it allows us to concentrate on vampires. With the return of the Cappadocian and Tremere clans we now have 8 vampire clans and mortals. We plan to add more disciplines and clans in the near future.
Status is gained outside of the clan by player killing. The game has a lot of unique features, far more than one could do justice to in abrief description; come take a look for yourself!
We hope to add more features yet maintain a retro style of gameplay.
Vampire Wars is still run by many admin who have been around for years,drop by - you never know who you might run into (for better or worse).
We make no promises and set no deadlines about what we may add to the game, but we plan to continue the expanding and adjusting our world.

mud.name: VargonMUD
mud.desc: VargonMUD is a genre-less, ofttimes funny MUD that would appeal to a person with a sense of humor, who is not easily offended and who enjoys the occasional monster killing.
We have several unique areas and guilds scattered throughout our realm and are adding more and more everyday.
Our themes cover the range of human experience from the sublime to the absurd (emphasis on the absurd).

VargonMUD is an older MUD that has undergone serious renovation and improvement over the past few years. We have a committed team of coders and admins striving to create the most unique and sometimes outlandish MUDding experience around.
So, come join our particular brand of insanity. :)

mud.name: Kara's Storm Mud
mud.desc: Travel through a world of everchanging troubles where once you found yourself amidst a vast city, you then find yourself at the ends of reality where various creatures of good and evil wage war upon the land. Immerse in the deep splender of seventeen races and eight classes across 4 other planes of existance, and pray that no one wants your hide in The Killing Fields.

When you enter the mud, please go through Mud School on your first character as thats where you will obtain your starting gear. We also have a language policy as this is a family mud. We are also International and have players log in from Russia, China, Hawaii, Canada, Europe, Denmark, etc.
Also, read HELP HELP, or HELP A, HELP B, HELP C, etc.
Swiftsword Admin of Kara's Storm swiftsword@karastorm.org admin@karastorm.org

mud.name: VikingMUD
mud.desc: Viking runs in DGD and offers several guilds (classes) for players, including for example Samurai, Monks, Frog (an easy-to-learn guild mainly for newbies), Frost (cold-hearted mages), and others. It is based in Norway, and usually yields an average of 50 players connected at a time. Players are separated into three main classes.

From lowest to highest, they are: mortals, eternals, and wizards. Mortals are the newbies, eternals are more experienced players, and wizards are those who choose wizardry instead of becoming an eternal. Wizards cannot interfere with game play, but are granted more sys privileges and have the ability to code new areas for the mud. It's a very structurally organized mud with friendly people, and any user would enjoy it.
Alternate server information site: www.vikingmud.no

mud.name: Vincent's Hollow
mud.desc: Vincent's Hollow LPMUD, established on April 28, 1991, is one of the older LPMUDs on the Internet. Its founders come from the classic LPMUDs of the 1990-1991, such as SunMUD, SherlockMUD, GraniteMUD, Darker Realms, and Shattered World. VH, as it is affectionately called by its players and wizards, was established with the simple principle of being different, at a time when a lot of LPMUDs were constructed of the same stock world with a church, a humpedback bridge, an orcs' cave, and Leo the Lion. It was one of the first LPMUDs to install a player-operated guild system, multi-class and skill system, and advanced magic casting. VH also focuses on other 'fun' factors other than your everyday 'role-playing'. We have various on-line games you can play with your fellow adventurers. We also sponsor real life parties (most of them in Iowa) where players and wizards from around the country come and join us couple times a year to have real life fun (usually for Halloween and New Year).

mud.name: Virtual Realities
mud.desc: Virtual Realities -- a long time home to many people.
Virtual Realities has undergone major changes in the past couple years, from rebuilding the entire city to changing locations. Stop by, have a beer, socialize with the wizards. We even have Uno!

mud.name: Virtual Writing Center MOO (VWCMOO)
mud.desc: The Virtual Writing Center is an educational environment where people can gather and

1. Take college composition courses 2. Discuss their writing with writing tutors 3. Gather with colleagues and talk about writing, teaching, distance education, and educational uses of MOO's. 4. Discuss the social constructions of language.

mud.name: Foo MOO
mud.desc: A non-themed MOO, partly social, partly programming/building. FooMOO welcomes anyone, programmers and builders alike, as well as those interested in learning MOOcode, or just looking for a MOO with a free environment to just hang out and chat on. Programmer bits will be given on request, provided that the person requesting it understands that they are responsible for learning any aspects of MOOcode that they do not know, and the wizards are not a helpdesk. The rules are very loose on FooMOO, there is no rule regarding language so explicit language could be present, but is not generally encouraged.

mud.name: Balderdash
mud.codebase: [Rom] Very strong modifier by Russian Coders.
mud.desc: Russian MUD for RolePlay - fantasy.

Fully Russian MUD. English commands allowed also. There are few not standart races, many deites and home cities. Many weapons skills, restricted gain system. Clan and not clan PK but you must think about something... All Russian players welcome!
Our MUD is RolePlay and Roleplay-PK MUD.

mud.name: Ages of Despair
mud.codebase: [LP] MudOS driver on a modified TMI-2 mudlib
mud.desc: AoD has been in development since early 1998. We have strived to create a unique medieval-fantasy world powered by the imaginations of our experienced administration and talented coders. Since then, the MUD has taken on a life of its own, and our wizards and players continue to shape this enchanting world that we call home. AoD is NOT another one of those low quality mud that is here today and gone tomorrow. Since our offical opening in March of 2000, the mud has developed a steady base of regular players. You can find an average of 20-40 people online at all times. Our friendly players and wizards, in addition to our high quality vivid world, provide an enjoyable fun environment for new and experienced players.

mud.name: Escape from Destiny
mud.desc: Escape offers both a challenging environment for more experienced mudders as well as a constructive learning environment for newbies. The immortals work hard to be informative and helpful whenever possible without being overbearing or affecting game balance.

We have taken basic Smaug coding and made heavy modifications to several different aspects of it. With a unique multi-class system as well as a broad array of race/class combinations combined with a group based combat/experience system, we have tried to promote all of what we feel are the best aspects of mudding in general. We do allow level restricted player killing, but a bounty system will allow players to take action against each other where the game will not allow them to.
We welcome any comments which can be made via a note to immortal within the mud, or via email (escape@alcatraz.wolfpaw.net) if that is easier.
We hope you can enjoy playing in the world we are creating, The Staff of Escape from Destiny

mud.name: War of Gods
mud.desc: The land Kellwar is very detailed and a consistent world with rich history. Lands of light and lands of shadow lie within reach of all. A world awaits, a land where the craft of magic and the skill of the blade forge alliances, create legends, and write history. A continent of legends, both of the past and in the making, where also you can become part of an endlessly unfolding tale. You may build your reputation and become a respected or feared member of society. All the while you are part of the unfolding history of a world in which you can play a major or even guiding part. Choose between playing good or evil and join neverending war between light and darkness.

War of Gods has many features to make the game more enjoyable. Ansi color support, ansi graphical overland map connecting the zones, ability to party with other players, many original features including spells, skills and abilities, learning through use, huge manuals and help files and balanced races and classes

mud.name: Petria
mud.desc: Petria es un juego multiusuario en modo texto ambientado en la Ã©poca medieval, en el que interactÃºas con gente de todo el mundo. En Petria darÃ¡s vida a un personaje, dotado de una profesiÃ³n y raza a tu elecciÃ³n, a objeto de ir subiendo niveles y hacerte cada vez mas poderoso, para lo cual debes ir matando todo tipo de \"bichos\" que te irÃ¡n dando los puntos de experiencia necesarios. PodrÃ¡s escoger entre 8 clases o profesiones diferentes: guerrero, mago, clÃ©rigo, paladÃ­n, rÃ¡nger, ladrÃ³n, asesino o brujo. Las razas disponibles son: gigante, humano, enano, hobit, gnomo, orco, elfo y drow, cada una de ellas con propiedades especÃ­ficas y afinidades especiales. Como mÃ¡ximo, llegarÃ¡s a nivel 111, tras lo cual trendrÃ¡s la opciÃ³n de volver a encarnar en profesiones remort. Estas profesiones son: Seguidor de Oteren, Seguidor de Runk y Elemental, y podras elegir entre 4 nuevas razas: Centauro, Elian-lal, Gork-ror o Draconiano. Si te esfuerzas, podras llegar a ser inmortal.

Siempre que lo desees, podrÃ¡s hacerte miembro de cualquiera de los 5 clanes existentes y jugar en contra de otros jugadores, por lo cual harÃ¡s tanto amigos como enemigos... Â¡e igual consigues salir con novio/a! ;)

----------------------------------------------------------------- Petria is a multiuser text-based game set in medieval times, which interact with people around all the world. You start by giving life to a character, endowed with a profession and race of your choice: Warrior,mage,cleric,thief,paladin,ranger,murderer or sorcerer. The available races are: giant,dwarf,human,drow,elf,orc,gnome and hobbit. After level 111, you can remort into more powerful classes and races, and become inmortal. Whenever you want, you can become a member of any 5 existing clans and play against other players, so which will make both friends and enemies ... and just get out with girl/boy friend! ;)

mud.name: Waterdeep
mud.desc: Looking for a place where everybody knows your name? Sick and tired of the cold sterile feeling you can get from MMORPGs? Want to take up a hobby that jogs your imagination, sharpens your reading skills and vastly improves your typing skills? Looking for a mud with friendly people and a dedicate staff who treats (almost) everyone as human?

Waterdeep is a Forgotten Realms / Final Fantasy (6 & 7) RoT 1.5b2 mud with extensive work and additions to its stock format. Most of this work been concentrated on additional codes, features, zones and stock code repairs. Our Class - Race - Level System very much retains the original 101 level 2 tier system with 23 races and 7 classes.

We feature Quests, Banks, Equipment Runs, Mini-Quests, Area Quests, One on One Arena Matches, Mass Arenas, Hero Skills, Gambling, Ascii Maps, Political Factions, purchasable and customizable Airships, purchasable and customizable Player Housing (Property) which players get to create their own mini-area.

Our world is split into two continents and 34,000 rooms. The Great Realms continent contains many well known stock areas and vast new zones, while the Faerun Realm has been built in close replication to the Sword Coast, and features areas such as Icewind Dale, Waterdeep, Baldur's Gate, Shadowdale, Myth Drannor and Candlekeep.

Our roleplaying world resembles Forgotten Realmian medieval times with steampunk influences such as FF6. Our global campaign is an on going story of Governmental Wars, the struggle for power and the evils of technology. Yet as politicians blind the common people, the true threat to the world continues to grown unnoticed, the return of an out casted deity in the form of a meteor. Details on our web site.
Here comes the soul collecting Train of Murder a-Comin' It longs to take your putrid blackened soul away from you...
WaterdeepMUD, Entertaining Globally for over a decade.

mud.name: Dragonball Galaxies
mud.desc: Dragonball Galaxies is a work in progress.
The mud is currently running all the standard areas and races that were in the Dragonball Saga's MUD.

The theme of Dragonball Galaxies will be based on a different part of the galaxy than the normal one you are used to. We plan to have completely new races, skills, transformations and planets (up to 20 or more) for players to explore. There will also be a more in depth roleplaying environment that will actually effect the games planets and areas.
We are currently hiring builders, so if you want to help out in creating this world that we have in mind please email or come on and leave a personal note to a administrator.

mud.name: Dragon' s Era
mud.codebase: [Custom] It has its own downloadable Client and a Telnet address for backup: telnet://tenko.mooo.co
mud.desc: Dragon's Era is free to play Mud which is hosted on its own private server. Newbie friendly and Role play Enforced. In Dragon's Era you can enjoy a fantasy world without the threats of OOC.

mud.name: Wheel of Time
mud.desc: Open since 1993, WoTMUD IV, The Wheel of Time MUD is the most popular MUD based on the 'Wheel of Time' novels by Robert Jordan. 100% unique you'll find no stock zones, mobs or features anywhere here. Our game philosophy is to leave the choice of the type of game that you wish to play up to you: we're a good old-fashioned mud with as few rules as is reasonably possible.

o We have Robert Jordan's personal permission to run a MUD with this theme. o For pkillers, The Wheel of Time MUD is set amidst a three-way race war, each race having its own defined 'homeland' and boundary. o For the explorer, The Wheel of Time MUD has more than 300 zones each checked for accuracy against the books. No stock here at all. o For roleplayers, The Wheel of Time MUD's 50+ clans includes almost every faction that you would expect to find in the books. o For socialisers, The Wheel of Time MUD is a large, busy & talkative mud, which peaks at more than 220 people connected! o For adventurers, The Wheel of Time MUD has different topical quests for every clan with large global quests determining the fate of the world.
To let others speak for us:

o The Wheel of Time has been a Mud Connector 'Mud of the Month' o 'The Bee's Knees' (games.com), o 'The Internet at it's best' (freelaunch.com) o 'A Killer World' (about.com) o 'A Must See' (wheeloftime.org). o 'If you are interested in Role Playing and the Wheel of Time, then The Wheel of Time mud is definitely a place you should check out.' (dragonmount.com)

mud.name: Realms of Lythosia
mud.desc: I am hiring a full Immortal staff now, logon for an interview today!

mud.name: Godwars Dystopia Mudders Delight
mud.desc: Our Address is : loohosting.com Port : 5000

Mudders Delight offers a variety of balanced classes. We recently added a shinigami and quincy class based on the popular anime \"Bleach\". In addition to rune eq, we offer chaos and senesce eq which far surpasses class eq. PK is encourage, however there is a fightarena for friendly sparring. Each class has its own class recall, giving each class an added bonus for residing in its \"home\". Mudders Delight was founded in 2002, but I recently decided to resurrect it from the dead. For more information check out http://muddersdelight.co.cc

mud.name: StarMUD
mud.desc: StarMUD is a decade old and is a completely original code-base. The only true way to understand StarMUD is to try it for yourself, and have an open mind.

Primarily scifi in focus, StarMUD is certainly not limited to that. We offer many different options in chracter creation character advancement that could satisfy any player's taste - from newbie to experienced MUDder.

StarMUD has always been a work in progress. Builders and coders add new areas and features on a regular basis, and StarMUD offers an extensive in-game news system with which to discuss ideas and notify players of the ever evolving code-base. We are also always looking for innovative and eager new coders willing to work hard and help our world grow.
Mention this ad to Ravnos after creating a new character and get a free cookie. :)
Hope to see you there.

mud.name: ElementMUD
mud.codebase: [Unknown] Slightly Modified Code, All custom content

mud.name: ADAMANT : World of the Rings
mud.desc: A world of heroes and dragons, where heroic deeds and horrible creatures are possible ...

A world of powerful magic and mighty weapons ... A world of steel and mithril, where you can go and slay powerful creatures or you can seek smart quests and receive great rewards, cool weapons, and destructive spells ... This is the neverending story of the great battle between DARKNESS and LIGHT This is ADAMANT : World of the Rings !!! * 17 races & 9 classes * 30 levels of well balanced gameplay. * Intelligent monsters * Over 70 only ORIGINAL zones, over 5500 rooms * Quest Zones and Automated quest system * Customizable character stats (no rolling) * Helpful gods and mortals. Nice WWW page with help etc... * 100% Russian MUD

mud.name: WolvesBane Rock
mud.desc: The Rock has been in existence for about 8 years now. We have implemented lots of new areas and are always working on more, with the goal of all original areas eventually. The Rock has a helpful and friendly admin staff willing to assist you in learning your way around,whether you're new to mudding or an old hand. Our coders are always working to improve the stability and implement new and interesting ideas.

We also have a 'deja community' where the players are informed of new changes and ideas, and are encouraged to relay their opinions. Within the mud we also have a voting board where large changes are usually posted for opinions to be had.
Wolvesbane Rock has 100 player levels, with multiclassing and multiplay. The option to remort will become available in time, the idea is on the list. :)
Thanks for your interest in the Rock and happy mudding!
- Cilissa and admin staff of Wolvesbane Rock

mud.name: Wonderland
mud.desc: Wonderland has undergone lots of changes recently. Now we are looking for new players!!! We would be pleased if you came in, took a look, and tried a few levels... We think you'd like what you see! Cool Wonderland data:

* We are connected to the net by a T1 link (No lag!) * We have a NEW 2 MBit link to the US! (Even less lag!) * The MUD God owns the site (Big plus!) * Wizards have ftp access * Option to play unlimited eternal levels or wiz at lvl 20 * 10+ original quests * Friendly and helpful wizards * Powerful and reliable server (Over 100 days between reboots - Only to upgrade gameplay.) * Good looking ANSI color schemes * MSP sounds. * MXP enhancement - Virtually every object and room is MXP ehanced! As the MXP standard evolves, so does Wonderland! * Pueblo enhancement - Less typing! More sounds! More to come! * Much much more!!!
Wizzing is somewhat easy for the time being, so if you are interested in becoming a builder, and eventually an admin, give it a try!

mud.name: Fall of the Jedi
mud.desc: Fall Of the Jedi is a expanding game. Finished and operational, but not to the max of detail. Our mud is open for suggestions and is readily available for coding. It is based on the Star Wars themes and information. It is halfway classless, but

mud.name: Aadarian Realms 2 - The New World
mud.desc: Taelomi, the new hometown of Aadaria is a village abandoned from the former town of Ga'al. After many hundred years of life in a peaceful land, Aadaria has thrived in becoming a land almost untold.
The generation of new peasants, lords, knights and kings have established a new world, a new land recreated but nothing of the past realms of Aadaria.

Once ruled by Shimtis, the mortal followers of Jaal, Praegus, Neka and Tziru and the others have ventured into different realms ... only one, Defari has since then lived in the inner realm of Aadaria.

In hiding, Defari had an apprentice, Rzarecta, who spent many years living in hiding. The apprentice grew and aged and is now the lone ruler of the Aadarian realms. After his travels through distant lands, Rzarecta came upon two entities, Alton and Shryp who were creators and overseers of the new Aadaria. The two deities helped recreate the world with the old and has provided new creations for adventurers and travellers.
What they did not know was that their creation also brought an evil existence somewhere in Aadaria, somewhere still unknown.
Many adventurers, travellers have come to find this evil force and to rid of it. Those living in the realms of Aadaria have scattered about. Some hiding out while others remain around the area.
Aadaria: TNW features the following ...

- 101 Mortal Levels - 3 Class Tiers - An Arena System - PK Interference Prevention System - Automated Questing System - Alias code - Detailed PK record logging - Combat Spam Toggle commands - PKill Looting Limits - Cloak command to hide equipment - Racial command to control racial affects - Storage of Items Extra - New areas
UPCOMING:
- 1001 mortal levels (That's right) - Newer skills/spells for all races - More new areas - Refixed areas with stats revised (Need Builders) - Clan Forts
Rzarecta - Epic

mud.name: Twin Cities - Closed
mud.desc: Twin Cities is closed and currently inactive.

mud.name: Wunderland
mud.desc: The Wunderland is based on an extended russian version of 'Wizard of OZ' (by A. Wolkow).

You follow the paths of little Elli through this phantastic land of magic and wonder, where you could even find elements of 'Alice in Wounderland' (L. Carrol) and other famous fantasy stories. Behind great mountains and a deep desert begins the Outer World (Aussenwelt). More horrors and dangers are lurking there which you have to overcome to ascent into the circle of the seers, prophets or even illuminates.

We provide a challenging level system, 5 humanoid races, 6 guilds from magicans to barbarians and 34 quests. Exploration helps you to improve your level, just combating is not sufficiant. A very friendly atmosphere provides even familial feelings between players and wizards.

mud.name: Aarchon
mud.desc: Aarchon takes place in a realm where space, time, and reality itself have been shattered, leaving death dead and making all things possible. We have a relaxed social atmosphere, which we strive to keep hospitable to players both new and old to mudding. We spent almost a year overhauling things prior to going public in December of 1997, and continue to aggressively enhance gameplay with original code and areas. While we will always be evolving and improving, we are focused on stability and balance. There will be no player wipes - ever! We have 6 remort/rebirth opportunities in place, and plans to expand to 10. We currently offer 15 classes, and 59 races (19 of which are available at creation). We also offer optional pk, both standard and hardcore, as well as a unique grading system. Feel free to come spend some timme with us, as we strive to have something for everyone!

mud.name: Dragonball Oblivion
mud.desc: Welcome everone to DBO! I am trying to make a new dbz mud so bare with me please..

mud.name: X-Men: Mythologies
mud.desc: X-Men Mythologies is an X-Men/Marvel Comics themed game centered around the fabled students of Professor Charles Xavier. Unlike most other X-MU*'s (as they are so fondly called), X-Men Mythologies has five total playable 'worlds' in which to choose from once you've applied for a character. The cutoff date for the Mainstream world is about the time of 'Legion Quest' (And the Age of Apocalypse). Non X-Men characters *are* permitted, as long as they are from a Marvel Comic. As well Non Feature/Orginal characters are welcome, but must be Earth-based and not cosmic powered Mutants.

The other four worlds outside of the Mainstream world are: Days of Future Past - A dark future where mutants are hunted and killed or placed into concentration camps by the massive Sentinel robots that dominate America.
The Age of Apocalypse - The High Lord Apocalypse rules America in this alternate reality and mutants reign supreme through his 'survival of the fittest' dogma.
Medieval Utopia - A completely original and invented medieval fantasy setting.

Millennium - Somewhat like a 'Year One' theme (for you DC fans), the Millennium world is not unlike the X-Men Evolution cartoon. Note, however, that it is *not* an X-Men: Evolutions world. Closer to the short run/limited Children of the Atom comic.

mud.name: Xyllomer
mud.desc: Xyllomer exists since 1991 and is run by a Club on an own dedicated machine.

It offers a huge complex world in a fantasy setting, where roleplay is strongly emphasized. We don't have any global channels or shouts, but a wide variety of guilds, player-owned houses and ships, and it is entirely up to you if you partake in the constant struggle of the 'good' vs. the 'dark' side, thus risking your life in the hope your god may protect you - or if you prefer to stand aside and dedicate your time to music and beer, peacefully study the arcane art of magic or train your mind until you are in perfect control of your body.
The world governs itself through the players, which elect judges, create the law and live the role. Xyllomer has a very active Wizard and Player community that meets frequently for real life parties.
Be a part of this! Join us on Xyllomer.

mud.name: Ashavar's Legacy
mud.desc: Ashavar's Legacy is a mud that is challenging and realistic while still being a lot of fun. Its focus is more on using your brain than pure hack and slash, player killing, or role-playing. There are puzzles built into the game and randomized quests available. Players can ask most humanoid mobiles questions about how to find stores, guildmasters, or puzzle hints.

This mud uses a race-less and class-less system. The players choices of stats determines what spells and skills he or she can learn. Players can increase their spells or skills by using them, instead of spending practice sessions. Players can also learn skills like mining, wood working, and leather working so that they can forge their own equipment. They can find gems to give bonuses to forged items, runes to make their weapons cast spells during combat, and glyphs to give their shields protection from a spell.

There are also many client-like features built right into the mud, for example aliases, autoactions, and some very advanced wimpy commands. Other unique features include specialized containers, a dress command that can calculate the best equipment in your inventory and wear it, and the ability to study a given room, then teleport to it later. We also offer a free client on our web page.

mud.name: Shadows of Humanity
mud.desc: ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Shadows of Humanity has been around the internet, though with revised names and areas over the years, since 1997. We have gone through a recent 'downtime' but have reloaded the database and are working on making improvements based on player suggestions. Were currently in a 'semi-open' phase in which we will stat characters, work on chargen, and run a few 'light' plots.

The game is based in Horizon City and is in a 'reboot' phase. This means were starting over, no old characters will be 'resurrected' (see our policy on character resurrection), and players are welcome to restart their characters or make something new. Were a small game, but hope to expand to the 50+ nightly connections again.
We would love to hear from old players again and get their imput on what were doing, good or bad.

mud.name: Crystal Mush
mud.desc: CrystalMUSH is dated after the three Crystal Singer books, by Anne McCaffery, perhaps several hundred years after Crystal Line. However, we have *not* incorporated the changes Lars Dahl made to Guild Operations. IE, singers don't make day trips with supplied site coordinates, nor is the Guild openly recruiting candidates. This also means that Full Disclosure is still necessary, as the Ballybran symbiont is still a closely guarded Guild secret. People applying to the Heptite Guild for membership should not have knowledge of the symbiont until after disclosure.

mud.name: Zee MUD
mud.desc: Zee MUD is based on the old favorite 'Mudde Pathetique',and is run by old M.P. staff. Our world is predominantly original sections, though we do have some areas that are 'golden oldies'. While many Dikumuds emphasize the hack-and-slash approach to playing, many of our newer sections emphasize rich descriptions and puzzles to solve, that the careful, observant player will enjoy.

mud.name: ZombieMUD
mud.desc: --------------------------===[ UPDATE! ]===------------------------- ZombieMUD has been chosen as the Game of the Month for February 2006 by www.MudMagic.com! Mudwide celebration has ensued, so feel free to join the party now! -----------------------------

Since 1994, ZombieMUD has been on-line and bringing orc-butchering fun to the masses from our home base in Oulu, Finland. We're a pretty friendly bunch, with well over 100 players at any given time logging in from all over the globe to test their skill in our medieval role-playing environment.

Like freedom? With sixteen seperate guilds (classes), over fifty sub-guilds, and thrice a dozen races to choose from, you can play any sort of character you wish. Should you become tired of one class, then have no fear, simply take a near painless reincarnation and start your life with us anew without losing all your precious experience gained in the past. Your choices are near endless, and you can even play a character as odd as a mage-fighter if you desire. In the end, we leave it up to you.

Love to collect? On ZombieMUD you are given the opportunity to build and customize your own personal and permanant castle. Within its stone walls you may hoard chest upon chest of goodies, gathered from througout the realm. You may even amass your own standing army to defend your castle from wiley intruders.

Want quests? We've got them. Well over 200 various quests and specially designed 'Equipment mobs' stand ready to challenge your skill in battle with more tricks than Houdini himself. Hate quests? That's fine too, as while doing quests will lessen level costs, they are absolutely not required for advancement within the game.

Enjoy interaction? On ZombieMUD we love to party. Fightin' and Killin' being specialties of ours most enjoyed in mass. While fighting solo is a staple of some player's diets, others enjoy the thrill of the group hunt. During a party you team your skills with the skills of other guilds to bring down foes of legendary size and strength. Whether you're a soloer or one who loves to interact, you will find your niche here.

Admire progress? ZombieMUD has been continuously growing and changing for over a decade, and it shows. Our lands are vast and our treasures varied. Our staff is active and attentive to the mud itself, constantly adding new areas, or improving the old to be certain that Zombie and its players always have something new to discover.
Dare to begin? Check out our webpages and read up on the information listed there for new players. Join us at zombiemud.org, and see for yourself what all the fuss is really about.

mud.name: Kyerme
mud.desc: Not ready yet. Still writing from scratch but will be looking for testers soon.

mud.name: Crossroads of Twilight
mud.desc: The Crossroads of Twilight was originally known as The Fires of Heaven. For all those who remember the Fires of Heaven, you will find that the mud has been restored to the same state it was in at closing. For those of you that are new to the mud, you will find a world rich in custom areas, custom skills/spells, and an overall great atmosphere.
Old players, your pfiles have been saved and will be uploaded to the server (to include your storage files) upon your request. Please email me at cotadmin@genesismuds.com.
Old Immortals and builders, please email me if you are still interested in being a part of the MUD administration. You will be restored to your former position without question.
Good luck to all and I look forward to seeing you on the mud!
Greg, aka Lews Therin

mud.name: Tamedhon
mud.desc: Hierher hat sich Merlin, der alte Zauberer zurueckgezogen, als er damals von seiner Schuelerin in Stein gebannt wurde, um unentdeckt sich auf eine Rueckkehr vorbereiten zu koennen. Dabei stiess er auf so einige einheimische Voelker und so manche Geheimnisse, die ihm in den Bann zogen ... Im Tamedhon erwartet dich eine gute beschriebene und ausbalancierte Fantasywelt, die einem leicht dem Alltag vergessen laesst und zum Spielen einlaedt. Es versucht, wirklich Fantasy und eine stimmige Mittelalteratmosphaere durchzuhalten, ohne neuzeitliche Klischees einzubauen oder staendige Referenzen zu diversen Romanreihen zu enthalten. Das MUD waechst bestaendig und bietet auch ungewoehnlichere Voelker zum Spielen an. Ausserdem ist sehr anfaengerfreundlich gestaltet.

Auch wenn der Fokus mehr auf das gesellige Beisammensein liegt, bietet das Tamedhon auch weniger friedvolle Naturen genuegend Platz, um Drachen, boesen Schatten, fiesen Zauberern und untote Horden, die nach dem Blut der Lebenden duersten, mit Schwert und Magie Einhalt zu gebieten. Wer will, kann sich sogar als Kopfgeldjaeger betaetigen, dieser Spielerschlag scheint sich im Tamedhon besonders wohl zu fuehlen....

mud.name: Might and Magic
mud.desc: Might and Magic is a large fantasy realm containing 17 different races, 15+ terrain types and well over 300+ different spells and skills. The unique spell and fighting arrangement creates a powerful yet balanced combat system for all levels.

Both players and immortals are very friendly, offering help whenever it is needed, so come along and join the fun, enter the world of Might and Magic, discover the secret it holds, unlock your destiny and learn the fate held within. For your life is about to change, your journey is just beginning.....

mud.name: Evening Tide - The Buffyverse in New England
mud.desc: The world has moved on. It has been just over six years since the city of Sunnydale was swallowed by the world's largest sinkhole. It has been five years since the bizarre events in Los Angeles where people claim to have seen a dragon and the Wolfram & Hart building was destroyed. All around the world, new Slayers have battled vampires and demons at the direction of the Watcher's Council. The world hasn't ended yet so they must be doing an ok job.

While the world has kept on spinning, no heroes have risen to the status of Buffy the Vampire Slayer. It is time for new legends to earn their chops. It is time for new monsters to steal the stage from those defeated and faded away. The west coast has been done. It time for another state of mind. Come join us at

mud.name: MORFS MUSH
mud.desc: MORFS was originally launched on the world's population by means of a genetically engineered virus. It had been started as an attempt at a biological weapon by a group of terrorists back in the early 2000s. The virus spread unnoticed across the globe. All life forms that experience some form of puberty were affected. This virus altered the strand of DNA that is supposed to protect and regulate the integrity of an individual's genome. The mutated portion essentially disables all or part of that activity, thus allowing many other mutations and gene swaps to appear and survive. This altered DNA was passed down to all subsequent generations and now each child is faced with the chance of undergoing life changing mutations in their teenage years.

The MUSH revolves primarily around the interactions between those who have been changed by MORFS and those who were not. MORFS has changed the face of the world as humans know it, but some things remain the same. Those who were affected have, for the most part, been accepted in society. However, as always there are some people that view MORFS victims as lesser beings, especially those that have become animal hybrids. There are even some religious fanatics groups that believe those affected by MORFS are possessed by demons. The affected are not entirely blameless either, however. There have been groups of MORFS victims that have banded together, believing that they are superior to humans in all ways.
The changes MORFS can have on a person are almost limitless. So come join us and enter the world of MORFS.

mud.name: Weyrmount II
mud.desc: This new Weyrmount is the virtual home of members of the Ultima Dragons- Internet Chapter. It is modeled after the ideal world of a host of turmoil-sick dragons -- intelligent dragons, with the knowledge and power to build beautiful cities in the mountains and wonderous tools and works of art. Most Dragons hold close kinship with the mystical land of Britannia (the land in the majority of Origin's Ultima series) but, as the concept is of dragons who have fled terrible catastrophy on Britannia through a magical portal, this new land is -not- Britannia. Perhaps it is one of the other lost continents of that world; perhaps it is an entirely new world altogether. There are still two moons in the sky (Trammel and Felucca, by observation) and much of the wildlife is the same, but there the similarities end. The Dragons are all pioneers here, out to explore and tame this fabulous new world, and make it their new home.

mud.name: Cthulhumud
mud.desc: Cthulhumud is BACK!

The original Lovecraftian horror mud is back in operation, complete with all the original areas, and an immstaff of new and old imms. All old players are welcome to return, and new ones more than welcome.

Cthulhumud is set sometime in the 1920's, with an additional fantasy Dreamlands area. In a setting where the elder gods reign from afar, foreign invaders lurk around the corner, and your sanity is threatened at every turn, Cthulhumud builders do their best to remain faithful to the works they read (or claim they do at least).

We are currently small in population, but are looking to bring old players back and regain our previous size. We are still using the heavily modified DIKU mud (Driver: Cthulhumud v9.x), however a brand new C/SQL driven code base is nearing completion. Come by and visit the Mud and our website to keep up with the new developments. Even under normal circumstances we do not have a static world- this is a place that keeps you on you toes from the first day and for years to come. We have a little over 8000 rooms right now with over 7000 new rooms in the works. Each room is done individually by the Immortal staff; none of it is computer generated.

mud.name: Anime Planet
mud.desc: We, the players of Anime Planet, wish to share with you the MUD we have come to hold close to our hearts. Thriving for over 9 years, our friendly staff strives to bring the best elements of the anime and gaming world to life in Anime Planet.

Discover a brand new world. Leave the drab reality behind as you explore regions from notable anime series, meet with people that share the same interests, and recognize a few game references. Popular anime such as Dragonball Z, Sailor Moon, Ranma 1/2, Trigun, Ghost in the Shell, Ronin Warriors, and many others are referenced throughout the world. Though anime is the primary theme of Anime Planet, you are not required to know anything about it to be successful or have a good time. Jump in and become one of the players; there may not be hundreds of us, but those that are here are more of a family than just nameless faces. If nothing more, it is fun to be in a nice atmosphere with good company!

So, come to Anime Planet and see what we offer. Take part in various types of quests, or party with someone to level up. Experience the thrill of evolving into a Super Saiyan, Super Sailor Senshi, Gundam, or any other of our races, each with their own evolution trees! Take part in pk wars and ctf matches, try our own personal version of 21, or even try one of the simulators to see how tough you really are.

Players have been enjoying all that Anime Planet has to offer for a long time now, you should too! With constant updates and new additions suggested primarily by our player base, there is always something new worth checking out!
Come visit us at animeplanet.genesismuds.com:3334.

mud.name: Infinite Dreams
mud.desc: Hey everyone,

Some of you may remember me - Jace. I ran this mud several years back, but had to take it down because I had other life issues pressing me, and I needed a break from coding. Well, it's back, and I'm hoping to get some interest in it going. It's a heavily modified GodWars, I forget which base it originally comes from, but it's not like any other GodWars out there. We feature:

* Custom coded fight code. * No more stances, martial arts instead (still being modified, but fully integrated). * Only custom classes, not a whole bunch right now, but working on more. * Options for Cybernetics or Magic Tattoos to help customize your character. * Custom coded quest code, still adding more features to it. * Currently working on a random item generator for when you kill mobiles, for treasure, you know?
*** A FULLY WORKING OLC INCLUDING MOBPROGS *** ** Currently looking to hire builders **
Please, stop on by and say hi if I'm around, or leave a note on the message boards. I'd love to see some of my old players, and new ones too!
- Jace -

mud.name: Akashat
mud.desc: * WARNING: MUD CONTAINS ADULT CONTENT * Akashat, the city of dreams. A nexus point for the collective subconscious of all humanity, indeed, of perhaps even worlds yet explored. It is here one may find the most powerful of dreamers, those taken from their former lives, remade in an often stylized image of themselves, and trapped within the city.

The city moves, floating from one end of an expansive desert to the other, never twice at the same place, never truly more then ethereal. Dreams are the only way to access the city and those who first began to find themselves here soon organized a caste system. The three classes, the Nobles, who rule, the Citizens, who usually run businesses, and the slaves, used and abused, who are cared for and pampered by the other two classes.

Created from the very essence, the very souls of each trapped dreamer, the City dreamed into being two rulers for itself. Taking their names from the mythical fae of legend, Titania and Oberon control access to the outside minds of the slumbering. With the aid of the Dream Mercenaries, they control access to the true world's dreams and harvesting whatever they could find within them, be it riches, goods or souls. The Royal Couple now rules over Akashat, aided by a Triumvirat comprising the Emir, the Crimson Cardinal and the Saharan head of the Asrag Reejal. To help (or hinder) the Triumvirat, a House of Lords sits under the watchful eye of the Speaker of the House.
Members of the Nobility plots and plans, in turn watching the Governement's every move, in between hosting lavish parties in their domains when there's no uprising or doom looming at the horizon.
Come dream with us in the elusive city, where anything within imagination is welcome.

mud.name: Dreamverse
mud.desc: Dreamverse is an LPMud that has been around for about 15 years. The mudlib is based on the Nightmare IV library but has undergone extensive modification over the years.

Dreamverse moved to a new server on 15 March 2005 and is now administered by Hilapdatus. Hilapdatus was around when Dreamverse first came into existence. After a hiatus lasting several years he returned to Dreamverse with renewed energy and a strong desire and willingness to revitalize and reenergize the Dreamverse community which he cares much about.

The world of Dreamverse has incredible potential. If you wish to poke around and play, are interested in building, or possibly even helping hack the mudlib and driver, please log into the mud, say hello, ask some questions, and shoot out a few emails.

The world of Dreamverse consists of a large wilderness system that is used to link areas together and provide a sense of depth and distance. All outdoor rooms have an aerial counterpart and water-based rooms have surface as well as underwater components.
Visit http://www.dreamverse.org for additional information, to view the Wiki-based documentation, or file bug reports and feature requests.

mud.name: War in the Shadows
mud.desc: War in the Shadows is a paradox type of a mud, highly changed, 3 tiers, balanced classes, all i can say is check it out and you wont be dissapointed.

mud.name: Icesus
mud.desc: Probably the coolest dungeon on the net. Come and test us out!

The world of Icesus is set upon the planet Aegic, a planet created long ago by a clash of the elemental planes. As a result of battles between the elemental Gods, the planet was recently covered completely in ice, except for the valley of Icesus. Having recovered from the shock and starting to rebuild cities and nations, the races of Icesus have already had one major war. Prepare to enter the changing and rapidly growing world of Icesus.

Icesus is a very original LPMUD set in a seamless fantasy theme, and a vast world full of secrets to explore. Apart from the all original realistic combat system and an innovative spell system, Icesus also has a variety of interesting features sure to distract you from mindless expmaking. The overall feeling and mood of the world will hold you in its grip like an icy cold hand of a wraith. Run on a dedicated server/connection by an equally dedicated staff, Icesus is truly a refreshing exception in the general mud genre.

mud.name: Black Sands MUD
mud.desc: Black Sands MUD - Founded in September of 2007 is a Role-Play Enforced MUD running the Project Argila code, derived from Shadows of Isildur. The project has been heavily modified from its original condition and the world is all original. Come and join in on the action where a sieging army of Mora - The dreaded creatures created by the Dark Warlord and the Hellish Tarpits, attempt to strike the city on almost a daily basis, fighting their way closer and closer to victory. Will you fight off the invasion and become victors, bringing peace to the land or should you fall and become slave to the enemy so hated that most would rather kill themselves than suffer under the Dark Warlord, it's up to you to decide the fate of Bal-Travas, the small outpost in which you will reside, build and fortify your defenses and bring the Morian armies down, rise up and expand into the wastes, create a city or fall and have everything you know destroyed, only to be rebuilt again. With player driven plots like those mentioned above, you are sure to influence the world around you in ways never thought of before. An in-depth karma/respect system will ensure that NPCs act accordingly to your status in areas of the game and that by doing certain activities, your karma may be altered and the same NPCs you spoke to earlier may now become your enemies because you killed their child â€“ Your fate is up to you, you decide.

mud.name: Aladon MUD
mud.desc: Fully Russian MUD. English commands allowed also. There are few not standart races, many deites and home cities. Many weapons skills, restricted gain system. Full PK... but you must think about something... All Russian players welcome! We need new ideas and zone builders.

mud.name: PMC MOO
mud.desc: PMC MOO, one of the ten oldest MOO on the net, still operates, but has broken ties with the PMC Journal that launched it in the spring of 1993. It recently relocated to a server in Australia. Telnet pmcmoo.org 7777 Old and new welcomed.

mud.name: Crystal Chronicles
mud.desc: Hello, and thank you for taking the time to read this. Crystal Chronicles is a Sailor Moon / DBZ/GT themed MUD. We are currently still under heavy construction, but new additions are being added often. If you have any questions, please E-Mail me. Thank you.

mud.name: Rupert
mud.desc: Rupert is a text based virtual environment dedicated to the humor of Douglas Adams' Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy. Rupert houses the official SunNET distribution, a networking application that can be used to connect other virtual environments. We have a free player creation and programmer policy and multiple players are permitted upon request.

mud.name: Sociopolitical Ramifications
mud.desc: Welcome to Sociopolitical Ramifications! SPR is a freestyle, furry-based MUCK, located in Linkoping, Sweden...but with players from around the world! Founded in 1994, SPR grew rapidly from its humble beginnings of few dedicated players and staff to its' current position among the top three, non-themed furry- based MUCKS. SPR boasts a many things not found on other furry MUCKS, such as

1) No server lag! Our hardware is kept up to date with the size of our database and number of connections. 2) No building quotas.
