Players may build as little or as much as they like! 3) Friendly players and large helpstaff! 4) While no overall theme is enforced, creation of themed areas by players is allowed. 5) All players can experience learning MUF, the programming language of MUCKS, as M1 programmer status is available to those that ask.

mud.name: MOOsaico
mud.desc: The theme of MOOsaico is one cultural connectivity. MOOsaico, like the world, is woven together out of the individual fabrics of a variety of local cultures.

Although real world cultures vary from one to another, they are forced by circumstance to co-exist in the tiny confines of the globe, and whatever they collectively form comes to define the world as we know it. So, too, with MOOsaico.

What is important in MOOsaico is not what you build, but that you take a sense of pride in it and that you work to integrate it well with its local surroundings in order to create a MOO world that all can explore and learn from.

mud.name: Altered Reality
mud.desc: Long ago, in the distant past, SHiNGEN Takeda and his select group of gods and immortals created the lands of Altered Reality. Over the years, through our long history, it has grown to become a place of heroes and magic, honor and deception, nitemares and harmony. Through both war and peace, the inhabitants of Altered Reality have survived and prospered. Journey to the realm of Altered Reality and explore distant lands, battle strange and fantastic creatures, or join a clan that supports your beliefs. Join us, where life is whatever adventure you choose to make of it.

'Very small amount of ROM left, and shrinking as fast as possible' - Overhauled fighting and casting. (no more rounds) - Overhauled regeneration and timing. (no ticks) - Overhauled Stat system with 10 stats. - Overhauled skill practicing. (no practices and trains) - Good grouping system encourages teamwork - Group Skills (Combine your skills with another player) - Fully persistant world - *everything* saves.

120 spells; 80 skills; 7 classes; 17 races; over 100 areas Intelligent ANSI color; VT100 Prompt bar; Speedwalks; Automated and Immortal run quests; 100% player run clans Multiple battle arenas; Good, up-to-date helpfiles

mud.name: Star Wars: Generations
mud.desc: The Old Republic: (3653 BBY)

For 25 years the war between the Sith Empire and the Republic has continued. Utilizing various ruthless tactics, including the recruitment of the Mandalorians, the Sith continue to seize territories such as the Minos Cluster, while destroying the shipyards at Sluis Van. With many in the Senate believing the war unwinnable, a peace summit is called. While in attendance, a strike force of Sith led by Darth Malgus assaults Coruscant, destroying the Jedi Temple there and forcing the signing of the unbalanced Treaty of Coruscant and ending the war.

Factions within factions abound as Jedi and Republic military splinter cells believe that the fight should continue, many disagreeing on how. Struggles for power within the Sith, as the mysterious Sith Emperor disappears, also aid in the propogation of a new Cold War between the Sith and the Republic and tensions are high as every sentient in the galaxy watches nervously for signs of another Great War.

Will you join the Sith Empire or aid a recovering Republic? Will you follow the Light Side of the Force or gain power in the darkness of the Sith? Forge new hyperspace lanes in your own ship or smuggle much-needed (and quite valuable) goods to those who can make it worth your while? Make your choice, make history.

The Rebellion Era: (1BBY) It is a time of great strife and confusion throughout the galaxy. Order 66 failed to completely wipe out all of the Jedi, giving each a terrible choice. Go into hiding, choosing exile and isolation in the hopes that the Force would reveal what their course of action should be, or join the new Galactic Empire, becoming Sith apprentices under Lord Vader's guidance and falling to the Dark Side of the Force as they ruthlessly begin the hunt for their previous allies.

Yet there is hope. A resistance movement has begun to be whispered about amongst those who yearn for freedom from the yoke of the Empire. Cells have sprung into being in small pockets across the galaxy, multiplying and spreading until at last, now, a fledgling Rebellion has taken root.

Will you heed the call to arms of the Rebellion? Will you hunt these rebels into extinction and forever crush the idea of resisting the mighty Empire? Or will you remain on the sides, making profit and staying out of affairs that do not concern you unless you are paid to be concerned?

Our MUSH takes place during two different times in the Star Wars universe. The Old Republic side begins just before the Jedi Civil War, roughly 3653 BBY while our other timeline begins at the dawn of the Rebellion era, at 1 BBY. You are able to create characters in BOTH timelines, though for obvious reasons these characters won't be able to ICly interact. Each generation will have a separate grid to RP on with old fan favorite locales as well as some new places to experience and explore. We are a modified D6 system, with code generously ported from Star Wars: Unsung Heroes with permission and modified by our staff.

mud.name: Killer MUD
mud.desc: Killer is a mud based on medieval fantasy with some additional ideas which enhanced the mud. Many different playing styles are possible, from questing to pure hack-and-slash.
Try it and you will see why!

mud.name: The Shadow Wars
mud.desc: Loosely based on Robert Jordan's Wheel of Time series, this mud is a mix of Roleplay, Mobkill, and Playerkilling. We have recently opened up our doors for the beginning of our first Turn. Our time setting is a few years before the Aiel/Cairhienin war. Our guilds are just getting going, and we have many leadership positions open. The world of Tel'aran'rhiod has recently been opened up, our talents and channeling code are closely based on those found in the books. Wolfkin are available, as is blademaster. There is an unofficial webpage built by one of our players at theshadowwars.tripod.com.

mud.name: Earth: Expanding Empire
mud.desc: Earth has been devastated with Nuclear War. The last 3 standing governments, the US, the Chinese, and Russia, are the sole surviving intact governments. Thanks to the US already having built cities on the Moon and on Mars, approximately 1 Billion people survived. Earth now lies in ruins, covered in a nuclear haze, the polar caps have melted, and all living things have died on the planet. Mankind managed to develop the technology to travel faster then light, and searches for ways to rebuild itself and its dead planet. Thanks to coming into contact with other alien cultures, mankind can now rebuild what it has lost, as well as worry about other hostile powers that are out there. --- Earth: Expanding Empire, is a new original theme space based mush, in early development. We are currently looking for builders, coders, and empire administration. If you are interested please stop by at powernet.homeunix.net port 2200. Help shape a new original theme. The focus of our game is RP, specifically in the areas of: Politics, Economics, Military, and Science. Complete original softcode systems, using PennMUSH, and modified HSpace.

mud.name: ShadowHunter
mud.desc: ShadowHunter is graphic MUD that is located on lasthalfofdarkness.com website - it might not be considered a true MUD type game - although players who like MUDs may enjoy this game as well - so i thought i'd let you know about this unique game.

mud.name: Drums in the Dark
mud.desc: Drums in the Dark is a roleplaying game that tells the stories of the outcasts, entrepreneurs and explorers who have taken the leap of moving to the recently formed colony of Kassoa. The decadent Su'ndari Empire owns the colony and it is from within those arid shores that the characters were drawn. Miles and miles of Ocean seperate the colony from the mainland and the jungles are both unfamiliar and deadly to those who do not understand their mysteries.. There are many riches to be had for those brave enough to venture into those humid depths. Will you be the one to find them?
Drums in the Dark is a heavily modified roleplaying MUX with a custom theme, detailed combat system and creative character advancement system. It is currently in alpha and player testers are welcome.

mud.name: Star Wars: Legends
mud.desc: Star Wars: Legends is going to be set a theme designed loosely around the time period of 10 ABY. Grand Admiral Thrawn led the Galactic Empire into a new era, restoring some of it's former glory and managing to secure several key systems for the Empire before falling victim to an assassination at the hands of his personal Noghri. Unable to secure Coruscant as the Imperial seat of power, the Empire has claimed Bastion as their throne world and established numerous bases and fleets in the systems and sectors surrounding it.

In reponse to the threat that Grand Admiral Thrawn posed and the threat that the Galactic Empire continues to pose, the New Republic under the leadership of Chief of State Leia Organa Solo remains vigilant in their defense and protection of their member worlds. Military funding remains a key focus and diplomatic relations with Independent organizations and worlds continues to be top priority for the fledgling government.

Stuck in between both sides are the Independents who are struggling against two powers that are vying for each others destruction. Some have managed to capitalize on the war, serving both sides and drawing a tidy profit, while others have fallen victim to it, their entire livelihoods destroyed within the blink of a eye. Mercenaries, Bounty Hunters and Smugglers run rampant in the galaxy, while businessbeings of all sides are now forced to choose who they are going to support.

Will the New Republic be able to finally bring peace to the galaxy, or will the Galactic Empire once more thrust the galaxy into a state of chaos-laden war? Only time will tell. Join the fight and help make a difference for the side of your choice.

mud.name: Insymnia
mud.desc: Insymnia Mud is a circle based mud, extensively modified, initially created in 2001, and with a current selection of 8 races and 9 classes.

Insymnia is a unique world, with all (except one, Haon-Dor forest) unique areas, we also have brand new equipment randomizer system, that creates random equip while you kill mobs, which combined with the equipment that you get normally, and from quests, makes the your character quite unique.

Leveling wise, we have a 100 level system, with two possible remorts, one of them avaliable to all the players, and the last one, which consists of a Hero class, and that is only avaliable to the best, of the best, turning your character into an incredibly powerfull foe.
Insymnia is a pkill mud, but those that decide to roleplay are not only welcome but rewarded as well.

mud.name: Heroes Dreams: Rebirth
mud.desc: \"Look, up in the sky...!\"

You know the rest. Whether you're spotting Superman or Warbird, fighting bigotry alongside the X-Men, or prowling the streets of Gotham with Batman, you know that feeling. Heroes Dreams is a MUX founded on the belief some characters deserve to be played and fit well into a shared universe. Maybe you remember the \"good old days\" of superhero MU*'s, or perhaps you look back fondly on a time when you felt more connected to the comics. Maybe you're new to the genre, or perhaps you've read all the latest issues. Whatever sort of player you are... welcome!

In the world of Heroes Dreams, we have reimagined DC and Marvel comics into one shared universe. At present, the MUX's theme lies somewhere between \"year five\" and \"year ten\" -- The Justice League and Avengers are well known heroes, the original X-Men are in their twenties, and Xavier's school has expanded to include many new students as the Mutant population grows and the public still grapples with how to accept them.
Come and visit our website and MUX wiki if you like, or just drop in and say hello!

mud.name: Macross: New Horizon
mud.desc: Macross: New Horizon is a roleplay MUSH based upon the anime series Super Dimension Fortress: Macross (a.k.a. Robotech the Macross Saga).

Set 40 years after the events of Space War I the MUSH chronicles the travels of the Horizon colony fleet, a massive city in space that's being sent to the other side of the Milky Way galaxy. This is not a safe journey either as the route is rife with mercenaries, pirates, and even the AUN - a terrorist/guerilla force that is opposed to the current UN government that's responsible for keeping the current alliance of humanity and the Zentradi (a race of humanoid giants originally created as weapons) in check.

The MUSH itself sports an extensive knowledge base, making it accessible to people who are both new to Macross and new to MUSHing. All you need is a love for sci-fi, mecha, rock and roll, and giant space amazons (no, we're not kidding). Feel free to swing by our website or log straight into the MUSH to see it all for yourself!

mud.name: Eternal Visions
mud.desc: Eternal Visions is set in the world of Anea and the majority of the game play happens on the continent of Etouria. It is a world at war right now, for the Elder Gods are long gone and the Clerics are spreading the word of the New Gods, the Young Ones. There are those who seek to rebel against the New Gods, and others who do not believe they have truly arrived, while still others merely wish to continue as they have been for the last four hundred years.

Anea is the land of Eternal Visions. Known for the unique (code) systems: class, combat, proficiencies, organizations, vegetation, mapping and magic casting, Eternal Visions offers both newbie comfort and advanced challenges. Based on role playing under a realistic environment, a score of folk have been providing a portal for many adventurers to experience an exciting, new and realistic world.

mud.name: Cleft of Dimension
mud.desc: Cleft is a mud that is great if you love to rp. Things from all places and times come together to form one very strange world. In cleft, you are the person they write stories about. You are the Villain or the Hero that shapes the destiny of the world around you. We have everything from rune mages to mech pilots. Join the eternal struggle for Balance between Chaos and Order, or just nail people to burning crosses... There is room for any type of storyline you wish to write.

We have several basic classes: Ninja, Fighter, Knight, Mage (with perhaps more on the way), as well as prestige classes like: Dancer, Dragoon, Monk, Samurai, Summoner that you can apply for if your rp warrants it. We pride ourselves on the uniqueness of things we have come up with. If your race that you want to rp is not one of the races we have availible for creation, ask an immortal to change your ICrace and we can let you show up on the wholist as anything up to 9 characters in length. We also have customizable equipment slots and strings, letting you choose what you call the places you wear your equipment or even what order they are in if you wish. Our areas are all original (though you may recognize some of them from Final Fantasy or such). We have a world map that connects one area to another instead of your normal 'nnnneeeesssswwww' direction to another area its more like, 'Well you go kinda north east from Figaro, I'm sure you wont miss it.' We try and use progs to keep our city mobs up to date on gossip and world events, as well as filled with in area quests for you to solve for better equipment and items.

mud.name: Frandum
mud.desc: A jewel in the dark, a spark among countless stars... Zoom in to a world, green, blue, white and brown... A landmass among others, a mainland clasped between icy fingers north and scorching sands south, bordered by three seas... Zoom in: green fields and dense forests, a wild land dotted with smoking villages, disturbing clusters in this primal scenery. Zoom in: a battlefield, two armies mixing, bronze sword against rough leather shield, shamans clad in beast skins rythming the fray with their blunt drums. A time of heroes. Suddenly, a lonely figure upon a hill, a feral vision: a girl covered by the sunlight... A single sun. The fight seems to stop, heads turn and breath is caught. A raised hand... Lightning pouring down from the heavens, destroying, consuming the warriors. Screams and shouts, death and destruction... Havoc.
Uncovering this mystery will drive your journey in Frandum:

What you need to do: - quest! There are currently around 1000 quests in Frandum! - explore and use the multiple automaps, discover the history (learn) - use and combine items to solve puzzles (think) - talk to mobiles and (only) sometimes fight them (interact) - roleplay, talk with our friendly Wizards and admins (live)

What will help you do it: - almost unique code base (only 1 other MUD shares it) - very friendly parser supporting an extensive command list - extensive spell list (much more than: hurt, hurt more, hurt deadly) - original skill system (yes, there is more to skills than percentages and fighting) - PK limited to Wizards or a parallel world (the Tournament of Death) - Objects, monsters and room categories and sub-categories offering a limitless gameplay

What will make you do it: - killing is not needed to gain experience: only questing is rewarding - coherent and original fantasy world, consistent background, encompassing world history. - guilds scattered throughout the world: quest to gain power and influence (Wizards can also choose a class) - a cosmic balance between the three gods can both change and be changed by every player - a unique language system, based on your race (hey, what did this elf just say?)

mud.name: LoX Mud
mud.desc: That's right, Legends of Xenobia is back! After an extended break, we are back online, and ready to go. We are picking up largely where we left off, and are going to be moving in the direction we used to. If you played with us before, we eagerly await your return.

If you've never seen our mud, allow me to provide a brief description. We are based on an entirely original world, that has over 20k rooms in numerous areas, and even an overland area for you to explore. We have several cities, and a multitude of creatures and items in our world.

We have some original classes and concepts, including squires, who can become Paladins and Anti-Paladins, and rogues which become Assassins. We strictly enforce RP, but our PK system is not restricted by code. PK must be RP'd to be legal, and we deal quickly and effectively with bad players. We try hard to be as newbie friendly as possible, we have a helpful staff and our playerbase is quickly returning. In addition, we offer a system of faith-based Orders, that have places for players to assume leadership positions.

If you're looking for a good place to RP with fun, friendly players, please check us out. Also on the horizon is an OOC voice chat system that players will have access to, and a web page is in the works. We had over 5 years of development before, and now we're back, and looking to move into the future. Give us a shot, and I think you'll be pleased.
Thanks for your interest in the Legends of Xenobia Mud!

mud.name: Yu Yu Hakusho: Legends
mud.desc: After two years of hiatus, we are finally back and better than ever -- of course that sounds like a cliche, but it's true! :D

This is a newly created MUD derived from the SMAUGFUSS codebase, which has been heavilty modified to fit the Yu Yu Hakusho anime theme. We have created a unique playing field for Yu Yu Hakusho mudders and mudders alike.
We will soon be adding new additions to our MUD that will open up a whole new race, new techniques, and along with something else, that of course is a suprise. :P
We are confident that once you try out our MUD and see all of the additions, you'll be back for more. We have a good, growing community that continues to grow each day.

Our MUD offers the player the choice to create from many of your favorite Yu Yu Hakusho races such as: Human, Ice-Demon, Fire-Demon, Thunder-Demon, and much more. We also have the majority of skills seen on Yu Yu Hakusho available!
If you are a hardcore anime fan chances are you will enjoy your stay with us! So come join us and be a part of our MUD!
On a side note we are currently hiring Builders and if you are interested visit our site for more information!

mud.name: Hiervard
mud.desc: Fantasy-MUD by books of famous Russian writer Nick Perumov. We created some worlds, described in his books 'The Death of The Gods', 'The Warrior of The Great Darkness' and 'The Land without Happiness'. Also we tried to introduce easy-to-remember rules, peacefull Gods, able to help in any case and interesting zones. Our MUD is 'By people and for people'. The main idea is that YOU can easily submit your own Zones, Mobs and Stuff. We will include it into the game after a short while.

mud.name: Dark Skies
mud.desc: Dark Skies is based upon a modified diku/merc codebase. WE ARE BACK!!!!!!!! We have the following classes: Demon, Werewolf, Vampire, Samurai, Drow, Assassin, Ninja, Lich, Shapeshifter, Tanarri, Angel, Undead Knight, Droid, Avenger, Dragon, Fire Shinobi, Earth Shinobi, Wind Shinobi, Water Shinobi, Shadow Shinobi, Holy Shinobi, Taijutsu Shinobi, Zombie, Kekkaishi, Sorceror, Phoenix

We have getquest, regular questing and casino. We also have IQP for special things. We are open to ideas and suggestions if placed nicely:).. We also have momentum to earn special eq. Currently classes are being re-written and balanced to try and get the classes better and involve more skill. Our immortal staff is friendly and helpful. We try to be fair, and not play favorties. Come visit and view all of our additional features for yourself... darkskies.ginkosoft.com port 2000

mud.name: Beleriand
mud.desc: ____ _____ _ _____ ____ ______ _____ _ _____ ( _ \\ ( __ \\( \\ ( __ \\( _ \\ \\_ _/( _ )( ( /|( _ \\ | (_) )| (_ \\/| ( | (_ \\/| (_) ) ) ( | (_) || \\ ( || ( \\ ) | _ ( | _) | | | _) | _ ./ | | | _ || (\\\\) || | ) | | )_) )| (__/\\| (_/\\| (__/\\| )\\ \\___) (__| ) ( || ) \\ || (_/ ) |/ \\_/ (_____/(____/(_____/|/ \\_/\\_____/|/ \\||/ )_)(_____/ +--------------------------------------------------------------------+ | Beleriand is a world for roleplaying based on THE SILMARILLION | | and THE LAYS OF BELERIAND by J.R.R. Tolkien. It was founded in | | 1995 by players from Elendor, with the goal of creating a similar | | game for the First Age. Ever since then, Beleriand has been the | | premier site on the Net dedicated to the First Age. A highly | | social environment, with dozens of bulletin boards and chat | | channels, Beleriand is nevertheless primarily known for quality | | interactive roleplaying. | | New players may choose from Men, Dwarves, Orcs, and three | | races of Elves. Werewolves, Great Eagles, Balrogs, and others are | | available to experienced players. Most players belong to one of | | eight different cultures which are based in different areas of | | Beleriand. | | The world is entirely laid out into 2800 beautifully described | | rooms. Great attention to accuracy in recreating the world of | | Tolkien's books has been paid in every aspect of the MUSH. | | Beleriand features a full-featured combat system based on stats | | and training; diverse weather; languages; mail; and lots of other | | informational and helpful global and local code. | | The players and staff of Beleriand are very friendly and know- | | ledgeable, and always eager to help those who are new to MUSHes | | or Tolkien's world or both. Our players come from all hemispheres | | and time zones, but mainly North America, Europe, and Australia. | +--------------------------------------------------------------------+ In valleys woven with deceit and washed with waters bitter-sweet dark magic lurked in gulf and glen; but out away beyond the ken of mortal sight the eagle's eye from dizzy towers that pierced the sky might grey and gleaming see afar, as sheen on water under star, Beleriand, Beleriand, the borders of the Elven-land.

mud.name: The Green Leaf
mud.desc: Website: http://www.the-green-leaf.de/ (no idea, why this information is listed crippled)
This is my very own little virtual world i am working on, when i have the time for it.
The theme of the world is fantasy, medieval. Role playing is welcome, but not required to play.
The world right now is quite small (2545 rooms loaded...), but big enough to go exploring and have some fun for some time. But the world will expand soon.
The basic idea of The Green Leaf is to have a world, where you can log on and have some fun, and not that the game forces you (too much) to do given things.
Want to meet people, friends, and chat with them? Fine, go ahead!
Do you want to be a strong warrior and kill the stongest monsters available? Okay, have fun!
Want to make as much gold as possible? Maybe you can be a trader or a manufacturer, whatever you like.
Are you bored with your earlier decision and want to try something else? Okay, no class system hinders you to change your profession, it's all up to you.
Want to play quests? The server has a quest engine, and the first few quests are avaliable, more will follow.

Do you want to play contests, like hide&seek contests, PM contests, PK contests and such, and win prices? I am going to host such contests from time to time and you can host your own contests there too.
Do you have ideas, suggestions? The server has a report command to report single line messages, and a forum is available, where you can post your ideas, critics too.
Another interesting thing is, *HOW* you can play.
1. using a telnet client or a MUD client of your choice (please read the rules about MUD clients and bots and automatism)
2. using the applet client and play using a browser, which supports java (at the website of the green leaf)
3. using a mobile phone/PDA/whatever using a telnet client

So The Green Leaf is under development, but at least playable using various clients to connect, has a mediveal base, is classless and offers you more or less the freedom to do there what you want, by respecting the rules of the game (type rules in game).
Rule #1 is: Use common sense and behave yourself.
That should'nt be that hard to follow. Please don't be an idiot and respect the right of other players to enjoy the game, and everything should be fine :)
Please keep in mind, playing The Green Leaf is a privilege, not a right, so breaking of the in game rules might, but must not be punished.

mud.name: Dragon's Exodus
mud.desc: The lands have changed. What was once the legend of history has been proven false. Lies are overturning, and the past is returning. Elder gods have begun to arise from slumber, and some have begun to break the charade once played. With the departure of Corin-Mur, the lands rest at ease. For the moment, at least. Will the dragon return? Or will a new terror surface to take his place? With the dawning of this new age, will YOU help decide the outcome of the coming struggles?
* 14 classes, option to multiclass * 18 races * Clans * Dwarven Forged Equipment * Player-Owned Houses * Automated Quests and Static Quests
Come make your new home here with our newbie friendly staff and players.

mud.name: The World Called Hollow
mud.desc: Enter the world called Hollow. From Xalious Mountains, home to the mages, to Cenril City, the major trade center. Including homelands for mages, rangers, and warriors. Offering an extensive battle system, and many more features included.

mud.name: Ryksyll MOO
mud.desc: Ryksyll MOO is a relatively new world. It is an adult- restricted game, though not necessarily adult oriented. CyberSex is allowed in most semi-public areas, and in most public areas as well. Character setup is detailed, and done easily through a webpage, something that most games do not have. The webpage allows you to setup almost all aspects of your character, from description and gender, to the clothing objects he or she wears.
We're still looking for builders and coders. But a MOO like Ryksyll is never fully coded.

Ryksyll MOO is a strongly themed and Roleplay intensive game. It is based on the world of Mycle which is the foundations for some books in progress. The stories can be found at http://ryksyll.com/~durpost/ Characters must be requested from the webpage at http://moo.ryksyll.com:8889/request/. We offer mutliple guilds and temples to join, as well as several different species.

mud.name: Fantasy Moon
mud.codebase: [MUSH] Rhost Mush with Reality Levels Defined
mud.desc: Come join the fun at Fantasy Moon. We are loosely based on the works of Takeuchi Naoko-sama, and will accept any attacks and backround from the movies, anime, or manga. We also accept original characters, and normal, unpowered characters as well. We also allow minor powers on those who are otherwise mortals. We would like the feature characters played somewhat canon, but the rp tends to be wildly off canon. There are characters from all walks of life, including very rich, very poor, and disabled. Through the magic of RhostMush reality levels, we even have Spirits that only some people are capable of seeing.

The main admin (Punk) tries to follow a schedule of primarily admin work on Tuesdays and Thursdays, and primarily roleplay on Fridays and Saturdays. Sometimes, she will appear on Monday, Tuesday, or Wednesday evenings, but don't expect to see her then.

In the in-character world, our time period is some time after the defeat of Galaxia, after she was given the task of redistributing the starseeds. Something broke through a dimensional rift however, and captured her. In haste, she threw all the starseeds she still had remaining, so they scattered every which way, reawakening sometimes in different people or in the wrong place. The timeline has been effected by the dimensional shift as well, so nothing is quite like it should be. News plot and news theme give details, once you connect as a guest.

New characters will most likely not have the old canon names but we are not disallowing it. Also, you can have your pick of arriving already awakened, or rping a scene (or several) that bring you to an awareness of your powered self.

mud.name: HaLoMUd
mud.desc: HaLoMUd 2.0 is a version of Circle3.1, MatrixMUd modified. All rooms objects, mobs, zones are original.

The invasion of the fierce Covenant Horde has occured, the outbreak of the Vile Gravemind has spread across the universe.... Stand Alone or Battle it out in this PvP race war mud based upon Halo collection. Or choose to complete the various levels of Campaign Mode. Arm yourself as a tactical marine, stealth kill as a warrior of the Covenant horde, spread the infection of the Flood Union, or become another hero of the UNSC Spartan Divison... Travel across 15 fully stocked planets and orbiting space stations. Each race has it's own recall and zones to explore. Fight in the tundra of Toral, or sneak around the humid jungle flood infested planet of Solia. HaLoMud 2.0 offers a variety of tasks/missions to gain rewards. Fully newbie friendly and in-depth vision of Circa and his team....

Exclusive Feature: All new weapon customzation stages all races. Scopes, bipods, barrels, extended mags, custom grips and laser aims now available for weaponary attachment eq slots. Stage two triple attachment slots coming soon...

Combat Features: HaLoMUd 2.0 offers a wide variety of weapons from pistols to fuel rod launchers to infested whip attachments to the ulitmate heavy swinger the Grav Hammer. Also, we offer an mixture of 72 class abilities including these few Toss, Prone, Stealth, Melee, Ram, Leech, Headbutt, and Focus. Totalling over 150 weapons, and long-range guns. Also, each weapon has sub-abilities attached such as Scope, Blast, and our favorite 'Hammer'. Powerdrains, Flares, a variety of grenades and other gadgets available...
Pk Features: All new exclusive Medal Achievements based upon the players pk record. Seven-teen stat boosting achievements available to unlock so far... <PKWeaponary, PKTEq, PK Hall of Fame>
Tasks: 21 offered from FFa to Oddball, Paintball to Warthog Matches
Clan Objectives: Clan bases & ships, CTeq, CWeapons Find and capture Command posts, Collect Cp <clan points>
Not Affilated With Microsoft All 'Covenant', 'Flood', 'Halo', and all related material, unless otherwise specified, are trademarks of Microsoft. All rights reserved.

mud.name: Dragonball - RoT
mud.desc: DBrT is back by popular demand. The best DBT based mud is back up and running. We offer a wide selection of races with many unique skills not seen in any other DBZ based MUDs, and an extremely in depth Role Play system. We also offer fishing system for when players need a a break from training and/or role playing as well as an Exp. Modifier that will multiply the amount of Exp. gained from killing mobs.
We're looking forward to seeing you there. Staff of DBrT.

mud.name: Walraven
mud.desc: Walraven is the mud that goes along with the from-scratch SIMud mudlib project. We're gearing up for beta, and we're looking for playtesters and a few more coders to help.

Some of our neater features: * Mapped world, down to being able to walk around inside rooms * Plants that grow and sprout fruit * Realistic clothing: wear padding over your shirt, under your chainmail * Automatic grammar parsing: no more writing three messages for one string * Integrated website with forums (bugs/ideas get autoposted) * Built-in full screen text editor; web based file editing * Channels for debugging and error messages for team programming * Friendly, intelligent, experienced, non-domineering wizards

We're currently working on: * Mining and other natural resources to fuel: * Broad, realistic crafting skills to create: * A dynamic player economy with hireable NPCs in: * Buildings, cities and empires built, run and destroyed by players.
So if you're looking to do cool things you didn't think you could do on muds, we're looking for you. Find out more about us at http://www.simud.org

mud.name: Nanvaent
mud.desc: Nanvaent is not a simple game. It cannot be finished, for it expands continuously. It cannot be beaten, for its first and last goal is to provide you, the player, with entertainment. It can be approached in a myriad ways, and success at it is not reached by rote or mere button pushing. To become great in Nanvaent, you will need the talents simpler games do not require - cleverness and quickness of thought, communicativeness and cunning, perseverance and passion. We believe Nanvaent is enjoyed best through deep involvement with others, making friends - and sometimes enemies, debating and joking, forging alliances and competing with your fellow travelers in our world. At its most exciting, Nanvaent is a scene of touching friendships and bitter conflicts - a place of extremes, of both honour and villainy, and not a sugary, bland environment of easy progress, pointless experience gathering, or tedious, impersonal killing.

mud.name: Tauros
mud.desc: Time passes. Old worlds die and new worlds arise to take their place in the Universe. The Tauros that was is gone forever. Now a new era is upon us. The Rebirth of Tauros has begun. Join us and be welcome.

Some people may remember Old Tauros. A great cataclysm befell us and everything was reduced to ashes. From the ashes, however, a new MUD is rising. Built from scratch on a strong medieval fantasy theme, Tauros is a place where great adventures await you.

The rebuild of Tauros is almost totally complete. Our team has done an astonishing job reworking the old lib into what it is today, a professional, many-featured mudlib that's easy to use and designed with the builder in mind.
If you are interested in coding or building on an original codebase, send email to daryth@taurosmud.com or stop by the game and check us out. --Daryth

mud.name: Arkadia
mud.desc: Arkadia is a Hard Fantasy, roleplaying, Polish-language LPMud. Thanks to the generosity of Genesis, it runs on CD gamedriver and mudlib, changed and further developed by us. The main changes have been made to fit the Polish declension, to hide out-of-character information from the players, and to make some things more realistic. Thanks to this, Arkadia has a rich, highly detailed and realistic world, making a perfect roleplaying environment.

Currently, we have domains based upon Andrzej Sapkowski's Wiedzmin saga and Warhammers's Old World. Players have six classical fantasy races to choose from, and some rich-background race and occupational guilds and clubs to join. All elements of the world are subject to strict coding standards, which assures them to be detailed and unique, and to follow their domain's theme.

All of the above wouldn't weigh a lot without the excellent players we have. They create most of the magnificent atmosphere and make the world vivid. If you feel you would like to be part of Arkadia, learn some Polish and join us! ;)

mud.name: Marvel Revolution
mud.desc: Marvel Revolution is a text based roleplaying game, a MUCK, set in a fictional version of New York within the Marvel Universe. We welcome character ideas, Featured Characters, or Original Characters, from plethora of Marvel Comic titles. While we will have GM run plots from time to time, Marvel Revolution is a mainly player-driver community, which means you create the story! Marvel Revolution takes place in theMarvel Universe is heavily based on the 616-Universe. Civil War and House of M. So come join us and join the Revolution!

mud.name: Jotopia
mud.desc: Come play and help build the newly founded world of Jotopia! (now with integrated ascii automaper)

mud.name: Pendulus
mud.desc: Back and forth doth the Pendulum swing. A never ending shift from Darkness, to Light, to Darkness once again. Through the centuries the Pendulum hast swung its unending metronomic course, never waivering from its predestined path. Wars arose and bequelled themselves as did times of great prosperity gave way to times of balance, to times of utter despair and back to balance and prosperity again. The Pendulum swings, the world changes, the names and faces of the powers of the world change, but they doth fill the same roles as their ancestors, the battle between the Darkness and the Light, the existence of the world in what it knows as life.

mud.name: Bsmud
mud.desc: This is a skill-tree mud and is in ALPHA testing at the moment, Am accepting testers to hop online and try crash it as much as possible
Damages are not balanced will happen in due course..

mud.name: Cruentus Apocalypsis
mud.desc: Cruentus Apocalypsis is a post-apocalyptic World of Darkness implementation. Currently, the MUD is in transition from a globally-based, logged RP-chat form of RP to a more involved and room based form of RP. The logs are freely available both within the game world and from our website.

Create a vampire, a stalker of the night that has to feed from the blood of the living to persist day to day, teetering on the loss of their humanity. Become the werewolf, the Earth Spirit's guardian and protector, thrust into a world of wildlife encroachment and potent waste being dumped on the Earth Mother. Climb from the Abyss as one of the third of angels that were cast out of Heaven as a result of The Morning Star's question of authority. And we're just starting with the possibilities...
Note: We are hiring builders!
We recently switched to a new Codebase: (Scratch:www.dragonssquare.com)

mud.name: Mirrors of the Wheel
mud.desc: *** Watch out for news on our Fall Release of new *** *** Races, Zones, a brand new Web Community *** *** as well as many other changes. ***

===================================================================== Step back in time, into an age of Kings, Queens, Fades, Trollocs and the Game of Houses. Step into a Mirror of the Wheel, where the Creator weaves the Patterns of an age into Age Lace. Find your fate, your thread, be it commoner, merchant, soldier, lord or lady, Aes Sedai or Warder. Some things in the web you may choose...but beware, others may be chosen for you.

We support an interactive playing experience between mobs, players and Immortals. 50+ easily accessible player run clans, plus other player created, in theme clans, will be available. A great combat system has been implemented with 54 forms available to certain clans, as well as a true WOT channeling system with 80 true WoT weaves in and lots more planned. All the WOT races will be coming in; so far we have Wetlander and Aiel and Trolloc. We have too many features to mention here, but rest assured we have or will be including everything we can to make this a real world in which to lose yourself.

Players comment constantly on our attention to detail, theme adherence and creativeness in creating our world, so come find where your thread fits and add to Ta'maral'ailen, the Web of Destiny. =====================================================================

mud.name: Haelrahv
mud.codebase: [Custom] Custom, Supports the Wizard Front End
mud.desc: Haelrahv is a mixed bag of science fiction and fantasy, leaning more toward fantasy. While high-tech weapons, droids and other devices are a part of the world, so are magic, psionic abilities and classic weaponry.

Haelrahv is not combat-oriented, though combat is a significant feature. Players can choose from twelve distinct classes and five races. All of the races in Haelrahv are completely original other than humans.

The game features: - Perks for subscribers; by far most of the game content is free. - A complex housing system. - Equipment/item storage options and advanced inventory management. - A number of craft-oriented activities. - Many spells, psionic abilities, spellsongs and other abilities. - Lots of rewarding leisure activities such as fishing. - Many character customization options, cosmetic and substantial. - A traits and flaws system (optional).

mud.name: Castle Perilous
mud.codebase: [Circlemud] Heavily modified CircleMud 3 to include custom OLC and custom gameplay additions.
mud.desc: Castle perilous is based around a castle that opens up into 144,000 different worlds(not all of which are accessible.) We have tried to make it a lot less hack&slash and more puzzle/quest oriented. Each world has its own techno-magic ratio which allows only certain objects to work in certain worlds.
Come help us make this a truly different MUD.

mud.name: DarkBlade
mud.desc: DarkBlade is a hybrid split into 2 sides. One is CHAOS, the MUD, a gangland city filled with plotting and evil, killing and bribery. Gangs fight for the city, while the corrupt mayor Backy stands between. The staff and players are _very_ friendly. DB includes the basic MUD attributes, plus it's modern and includes programs for elevators, subways, mobile phones, apartments, swipe keys, item caches, heavy safes, a helicopter, planes, and more.

The MUCK is a Portal linking Countries, each a theme created/built by players. These include Reciprocity, a covert (spy) RP country with secrets to be revealed; Recreations, a player-built country for re-enacting movies, TV and books; the Pueblo-enhanced area with sounds and pictures which can be added by players [get Pueblo at the site!]; FreeForm, a player-built area which allows ANYONE to edit ANYTHING, no matter who built what! We're waiting for the newest Country, Sci-Fi Colonies. The MUCK also contains new programs, including a Computer system for personal and public-access files and mail and the chance for any player to build major game areas and join the staff.

mud.name: Banished Lands
mud.desc: Banished Lands is based on DentinMud code, which plays much like Diku. Banished Lands was started as an off shoot of Alter Aeon, the original DentinMUD, sometime in the hazy year of 1995. Much like most muds Banished began life with a medevil D&D type theme, but then Wyvren, our creator, got bored and began to mix more sci-fi and fantasy into the game. Her eventual goal is to have a Babylon 5 meets H.P. Lovecraft inspired world of horror and delight.

mud.name: Dark Isles
mud.desc: Dark Isles is an intense, text-based roleplaying adventure for those interested in developing an intricate character and joining other like-minded people to create a continually evolving story based within an originally themed world. Here you will find no levels or classes, but instead tools to help tell the story, provide focus and background for your character and the setting. Your character can set up shop and sell clothes that you make with leather that someone else has cured from a hide that another character has hunted. You can build a hut, dig up shell-fish or scavenge the high-tide for useful items that may have washed up at the beach. Your character can gather herbs and experiment with alchemy using a mortar and pestle. The possibilities are endless. ICly the game is set on two main islands, Heas (the Human homeland) and Tarkas (the Skrel'eth homeland). The world is populated with original races that have some basis on races found in a more traditional fantasy theme as well as the option of playing one of four special characters: Wolfkin - People with the ability to transform into wolves. Dryth - People with the ability to read minds. Vek - People who follow the cursed one and require the blood of others to survive. Channeler - People with the ability to channel kha (the magical energy of Dark Isles). Dark Isles is now officially open and accepting roleplayers who want to have an influence on the muds development, take on interesting roles, become the heroes and villains that people will talk about for years to come. And if you have an idea on ways we can improve the mud, we would love to hear it and discuss whether it would be suitable to incorporate into our plan for Dark Isles. Note: Dark Isles is completely free to play. Roleplay/ICness is strictly enforced and a way of life.

mud.name: Winter Moon
mud.desc: Winter Moon is a stable and reliable mud, with excellent connection consistency.
If you come by to check us out, here are some of the features you'll find.

28 Remort classes (32 total) Gain up to 999 levels with your character Choose one of 4 cities for your home Unique pk reward system Item creation skills for every class family Scribe/Brew - set spell level, choose up to 4 spells Forge - make all your own eq out of raw steel Morph a skill you have mastered to gain new powers Find eq to enhance your skills or add skills you didnt have before Challenge a friend to a game of chess with our in-game chess system Fight duels with other characters
Duke it out with other characters in the arena
Current updates are a campaign system in a race to kill to win points towards prizes, An arena to battle through to be rewarded at the end, extnesive mini-quests that lead onto more
Tiering is now in! remort 9 times to tier into new races gaining new and impressive skills along the way!
Come check us out, theres more then enough to keep you occupied and a great playerbase to get tons of laughs out of!
Come check us out!
PS. Godshone does NOT have our permission to use our codebase.

mud.name: Land of Neverending War
mud.desc: PWIPE JUST OCCURED OCTOBER 6 2010.

Our mud based on godwars was fully recoded adding alot of uniques things. You can pk make alliances, join Kingdoms, increase your char forever. We just pwiped here to add some more changes and balance better our game. The mud pwiped october 6 2010 and is opened now to everyone.
You have a lot of different classes, special remort code, qpsimprove for your char, unlimited raising of hit, dam, move stats, status powers and more.
Come here and play.
Thanks Flea (main coder and owner of the mud).

mud.name: The Void
mud.desc: Fancy a change from casting spells and hacking other players limb from limb? Drop in to the Void and make love not war! Void has all the things you would expect from a multi-player game,puzzles, spells, worlds to explore all with the aim of making you a Demon Lord/Lady or an Arch Angel. But will you truly belong and add your own identity to the game, can you really role-play? Chat, play or role-play (sexual or otherwise) the choice is yours, in a truly newbie friendly game. Void is a internet port of a late 80's dialup game and has appeared as the 'Vortex' in the book Cybergypsies. *** Void is an adult orientated role-playing games and *** *** although the game does not contain explicit material *** *** role-playing of a sexual nature does happen. Obscene *** *** or aggressive behaviour is not tolerated ***

mud.name: Anomaly TrekMUX
mud.desc: Perched in the silent void of the Dulcais sector sits one of the Federation's most strategic outposts; Station 419. At the edge of the Klingon and Romulan borders, 419 keeps a watchful eye on the new Romulan/Federation alliance against the Dominion aggressors and their Cardassian lapdogs. It is here that the Federation is attempting a grand experiment of peace in this difficult time of war. With a crew made up of both Starfleet and Romulan officers, Station 419 is poised to usher in a new era of peace with the Romulan people, or destroy the notion once and for all. Anomaly is concentrated on story, theme and character and not simulated space. We run episodes tabletop style as well as Tiny Plots. If you think you have what it takes to make it into the cast, then come by and check us out. We're very different from other Trek MU*s out there.

mud.name: Golden Realms Muck
mud.desc: Started in May of 1999, Golden Realms Muck began on a collection of fantasy-world based islands each with its own society and/or theme. We are still today as much as we were then, although the Decades (Superhero) RP setting may be found there, as well.
Gameplay is mainly centered in New Krassis City, and players are encouraged to socially interact with others in an In Character manner.

Players are given a choice of species, classes, starting locations, and encouraged to create a minor background of where their characters came from and how they came to be in the world of Golden Realms Muck.

mud.name: The Resort Online
mud.desc: The Resort is a virtual community, comprised of rooms owned by residents who are the regular users of the program. There are many features to make your stay more enjoyable, and we guarantee that anything that is done in private, cannot be snooped upon or monitored in any way, except by the parties involved. It's a good idea to get 'residency'. Residency simply means that you can use the more advanced features, such as: a password (so no-one else can use your character), your own rooms, mail, news and more.

mud.name: Accursed Lands
mud.desc: Accursed Lands is a free Multi User Domain, a game that lets you take on a character and interact with people all over the world in a medieval, fantasy setting.

Explore the vast world of Terrinor and its six million plus fully-detailed locations. Fortune is waiting for those who dare to venture into its far reaches. Perhaps your journey will take you flying through the clouds, or exploring the depths of the oceans in our underwater cities. Or maybe you'd prefer to keep your feet firmly on dry ground, even searching the dark depths of the colossal underdark caverns for wealth and glory. Only the bold or cunning survive on Terrinor's scarred surface, but perhaps you might just make your fortune... and then set down your roots and build a home, a town, or even an empire?

Accursed Lands is set to mark the next generation in online text environments with some of the most sophisticated features ever seen in a multi-user domain. To find out more about this amazing place, have a look at our features section, and once you've seen enough, come in and enter our world.

mud.name: Shattered Lands
mud.desc: Welcome to Shattered Lands!

Shattered Lands was started in 1992, based on the popular series Forgotten Realms. It is a stable, well rounded MUD offering both Role-Play and Player-Killing with countless features added to both aspects of the game. We offer extended class and race selection, subraces, and encourage participation in clans and Role-Play. Class balance is taken very seriously, and with the hundreds of added spells, weapon capability and racial skills we ensure each race and class is not only fun, but fair.

On Shattered Lands there is always something to do, from storming the enemies Clan Hall, the Battle Arena, Role-Playing or PK-ing with other players, Questing for new items at the town Quest Master or seeking the many quests scattered throughout the areas for a broad range of rewards.
While we are fully developed, we are not stagnant about coding new features. Players are encouraged to post new ideas on the idea board, as we work to maintain a unique and growing world.
Visit us today at mudserver.dvrdns.org 6666

mud.name: New Eden
mud.desc: Are you ready to experience new eden? You stand upon a mountain top overlooking the vast continent of Eden. It looks and exiting and inviting place with everything you could ever imagine there!
Ahead of you you see a sign with a warning, If you have no sense of humour turn back now!
New Eden is a mature mud that was around until 1998, when it disappeared - now back to fight another day!

mud.name: Paradise
mud.desc: The black silhouettes of dormant volcanoes, draped in mantles of verdant jungle, ringed in pristine white beaches, surrounded by expansive coral reefs, scatter across warm tropical waters. The native people are friendly, having welcomed outsiders into their lands and given them ample permission to build and relaxed laws under which to live. The economy is robust, bolstered by the visitation of 250,000 tourists every year. Resorts and casinos sit opposite the lagoon from corporate headquarters and an exotic marketplace.

Beneath the glitter grows the universal cancer of corruption, seeded centuries ago. It has taken root, as insidious a poison as one can conceive. Non-extradition laws make the islands a refuge for some of the world's most vile criminals; an utter lack of firearms and drug laws encourage trafficking of items and substances prohibited and illegal in many other countries. Human lives are bought and sold here, where slavery is an acceptable practice.

Age-old tradition weighs one side of a balance against a swift influx of modernization and technology: ancient practices oppose new industries, medicine and industrialization. The volcanoes are mined for precious diamonds and emeralds; the waters are hunted for fish. The natives still honor the old ways, even sentencing the worst violators of their immortal laws to three days on an island from which none has ever returned. What dwells in the deep jungle? What lives on islands not walked by man? What hunts in the vast sea?
Welcome to Paradise.
Open Spheres: mortal, mortal+, shifter, vampire.

mud.name: Worlds of Carnage
mud.desc: The Worlds of Carnage is different from many of the other MUDs you have played. At the outset you can choose from many of the standard races for most muds, and you can choose from several places to make your home. Additionally you can choose to play with a class or without. Within the world the skills you obtain depend on the skills you have learnt formerly. Additionally, your primary stats have a bearing on the quality of your skills, so any race can learn any skill up to 99%, but depending on the relevant primary stats the effectiveness may be more or less.

The Worlds of Carnage also runs on a micro gains and micro ticks system. This means that whenever you kill a creature, or perform a quest that has an experience reward, you make rolls for various stat gains at that time and not when you gain a level. On that note, there are levels in the game, but your level is dependent on your experience and as such can go up and down as your experience increases or decreases. Micro ticks are like normal ticks except rather than have you receive some kind of regen bonus every 60 seconds or so, the bonus you would have received is broken into multiple slices and applied over much shorter intervals.

For the adventurer who likes attention to detail and variety, the Worlds of Carnage is almost entirely original with only a couple of small stock areas kept for historical reasons (and they are heavily modified). With 16 years of existence much time has passed to create rich and woderful places to adventure. Additionally, the Worlds of Carnage recently absorbed the MUD formerly known as Cythera (which originally split from WoC about 10 years ago). This has created a diverse system with multiple continents for adventure.

Finally, for those that like the wierd and wonderful, or those who might be interested in building areas for WoC, we have a Web-based world editor which allows changes to be made from anywhere and reloaded into the game on the fly. Rooms, mobiles, and objects can take advantage of the BlobbieScript MUD scripting language to create amazing affects and behaviours. BlobbieScript is 100% backward compatible with the old easyacts system upon which even mobprogs are based. The difference is that BlobbieScript is a true scripting language and allows for on the fly variables, running context management, over 200 built in functions to do almost anything, and the -> operator to access virtually every data element of rooms, mobiles, and objects. Additionally, commands, skills, and spells in the game can be completely written in BlobbieScript allowing for live update within the game without the need to reboot.
So what are you waiting for, come get started and immerse yourself in a world full of challenge and entertainment.

mud.name: Mortal Realms
mud.desc: Mortal Realms is a long time, highly customized mud that is now under new management. It features a VT102 tactical interface unparalleled by other games. Pkill is available in voluntary and restricted involuntary forms. Our world is mostly original areas, with 10,000+ rooms.

mud.name: Twilight Falling
mud.desc: Ever wanted to sail across the sky in a floating ship? Or pilot a giant mechanical behemoth across rugged desert terrain in defense of your homeland? All that and more is possible on Twilight Falling, an original fantasy MUSH. We specialize in strong roleplay in an exotic setting that features strange hints of a connection to the Earth we are so familiar with.
Twilight Falling MUSH is currently opening for alpha testers willing to explore and experiment with GM'd plots and character development. Come have a look for yourself. :)

mud.name: Kingdoms3
mud.desc: Kingdoms3 is a web based strategy game built where you, as a kingdom ruler, must build your kingdom from the ground up, while at the same time compteting against other players. Currently we have 5 different races you can choose from when joining. We have Humans, Elves, Demons, Beasts, and Draconians. Each race has completely different buildings, military units, and spells to choose from.

Kingdoms3 supports a full market system, as well as a clans system which comes complete with a ranking system and private forums dedicated to the clan alone. Clan creators are able to create clan parent topics as they wish.
Kingdoms3 is open and ready to accept players. Come check us out, we're averaging 30-40 players on during the day.

mud.name: Star Wars MUSH
mud.desc: The first Star Wars MUSH is still going strong. Featuring complete coded and operational space, economy, trading, space combat, personal combat, chargen, languages and a unique Virtual Object System that makes IC objects easy to create and maintain. We run the current PennMUSH patchlevel and our own custom hard code modifications.

mud.name: Medieval Theatre
mud.desc: Every game has its types of players. Some play the hero, while others the villain. From the fool, the thief, and the merchant to the scientist, the mystic, and the noble, there is always a niche someone fits into. The MUD experience is a theatre of personalities playing out their egos on the game stage. Whether a player comes to conquer all or to setup a tavern, we want it all to be possible at Medieval Theatre.

At this time, we are a development site that is about one year old (started Jan 7 2001). We are seeking coders and builders to help make our world, however, because of a recent influx of new wizards, we would like you to write a significant letter of purpose that would clarify your goals as a wizard and the projects you are interested in. Try not to be particularly fixated in this letter as your plans must be flexible enough to fit into the type of game world that MT is, which of course, you must look at before making any implementation level decisions. To apply, send your e-mail to the listed address. Our content is not very extreme, but we should say that this is not a 'family mud.' If you watch television, however, most of the content should be suitable for you.

mud.name: Dark Mists
mud.desc: Dark Mists is a multi-user RPG game with 17 distinct races, 11 classes, 9 of which are divided even further into subclasses, dozens of quests (with more on the way!), and hundreds of skills and spells unique to their class, subclass, or race. We've developed a dynamic clan system and worshiping system where the players have an amazing amount of control over their clan and are directly in touch with their God. The Gods of Dark Mists are actively seen in the game and their wrath, and blessings, can be felt in all aspects of a character's life, and throughout the year there are days set aside as Immortal Holidays where the players receive periodic blessings from the Immortal whose holiday is being celebrated. Our administrators are devoted to the game and friendly to the playerbase, yet we are firm in maintaining the rule of law. The playerbase themselves are creative and competitive, and quite friendly. But be warned, the atmosphere at Dark Mists is vibrant with roleplay and playerkilling both required to make a successful and strong character. You will need a strong heart and quick wit to carve out your legacy in Dark Mists. The game is always evolving, always changing. There is always something new and exciting to learn or explore or to see. Come see for yourself.

(8/15/2010: Dark Mists is now on a privately owned server. The long awaited warrior subs have been in since mid-March 2009, and since December 2009 the Houses have vied for the gods' favor -- stat boosts -- with House War Weekend. Alchemy was recoded to give each Enchanter a personal set of formulas, but they can be taught by one Enchanter to another Enchanter in game. Our 14th anniversary is coming up on October 21, 2010. The players have been clamoring for new players, so if you join us and are brand new to our game, be sure to say so in the question while rolling so that you can go through our newbie help area, and use the ooctell command -- ooctell [name of player] *message* -- to ask the current players for any clarification or guidance you may need. Some players have the word 'Helper' in front of their names, but even those who do not can prove helpful. Learning to die and re-arm yourself is important, as only the Immortals are immune to death.)

mud.name: Bakhara
mud.desc: Bakhara is unfinished. Mostly the gods sit around and trade *nix and ISP administration tips. But, it's getting a little more playable each week.
Well, we like company. Fresh blood would be truly exciting. Oh, and although we do need more coders: don't ask about being a coder/builder/immortal. When we get to know you, we may ask you.
We've started regular playtesting sessions. They are very fun. Every Monday, Wednesday, and Thursday at 20:00 EST. Check the website for details.

mud.name: Eye of the Cyclops II
mud.desc: Eye of the Cyclops 2.3 Started from Quickmud, Eotc Has rapidly evolved over the years. Allowing players to have 4 classes makes it take a while to max, and allows a wide variety of skills. Recently the rom world was replaced with the ROT->SD world.. All Area loading, reseting and the olc. Im the only active staff member and am looking for another coder to help the progress of EotC advance at previously unprecidented levels. Thousands and thousands of hours have gone into this codebase and it will be around for a long time to come.. So stop by and see what eotc has to offer you. -Xrakisis (www.ianshirm.net)

* 10 Classes (Sorcerer, Bishop, Ninja, Hoplite, Templar, Avenger, Lich, Shaman, Druid, Assassin) -Each class gets a round time and spellpower... -You get your roundtime or spellpower from your first class * Custom coded Multiclassing up to four classes * Lots of class only skills/spells, more coming. * 206 Mortal Levels * 40 Player Races * Becomedragon command for Draconians to become Dragons!! * Custom coded Leveling/Customizable Weapons -Custom Consecrate to advance a weapon through its points * Blacksmithing * Fighting Stances, basic and advanced * Player Quest system - UPDATE:New questing System * 21 Dragonlance Pantheon Gods * The ability to become a Werewolf, Vampire, Demon, Undead in addition to class/race * Accounts System * Level command to gain levels for one of four classes or sublevel with restore * Clan System * Large 3x3 asciimap * Replaced Berserk, now you attack a bunch of mobs at the same time * Directions command * Vitality, Charisma, Luck, Agility and Discipline Ability scores, all max at 250 (on top of regular 5) * Hunger and Thirst that kills, Sataite skill for not having to eat/drink * Roundtime, each class has a differant ammount of time for the next round of hits to come. * Spellpower, increased the effect of all spells based on the casters class * Player owned homes. * Ticket, Multi-Item Auction System * Spell Colors * Player focus, choose one for bonues.. advance them by exping * Artifact armor, levels to 10, each level gives AC * Random Loading Objects * Rot, SD world.. Quicmud codebase with all ROT areas * Weapon Diversity, weapons act differantly in combat * 1000 Sublevels, exp needed for these goes up with each level * Changes command with board to list the progression of the mud. - as of oct, 24, 2010: 578 changes listed.. some huge some small. * Menu based creation * 7 Tiers that give resistances, immunities, spellpower/roundtime bonuses, and spell affects * Leaderboard * Update:Removed accounts system/did a pwipe * Put timed casting back in and fixed it
* Coding work done daily
Currently looking to hire Coders, Builders and a help file writer. -Xrakisis marcusironfist@hotmail.com

mud.name: The Territories: Wasteland
mud.desc: This is Earth, only 2000 years in the future. Magic has replaced science, and most modern technology has been lost. The world is rough and violent, ruled by barbarians and wizards. If fighting is not your thing, you can sail the open ocean, searching for distance islands to explore, trade with various villages, or mine raw materials yourself to produce unique goods. There are many quests to complete, with new ones added weekly, and friendly folks to help new players get acquainted with the system.

mud.name: CombatMud::The Soldiers Side
mud.desc: A world at war, full of death, disease, and destruction. Radiation seeps from the core of the earth. As atom bombs drop from the lucid skies above. Blood smears across the streets as it showers from the heavens as the battle rages on. Alliance and Rebellion clash of the ages, blood spills for anyone who dare make good with either sect. Enter the world where war is now. And the fates of all whom dare enter, truly affect the world around.

Features: 7 Classes - Each class with 3 subclasses. 9 Races - Each with their own racial skill/ability. Turn based / Room 2 Room Combat 9 million room worldmap system RTS (real time strategy) System (Build and blow up the world!) Hundreds of skills/spells. Guns and Explosives Automated Quests / Global Quests Automated War / Hometown Raids Mud Client Compression Protocol Ivans Online Creation 1.81 Automapper Code And many, many other features, while some cosmetic, some not. The mud is RP-PVP-RTS * Currently Seeking Talented builders.

mud.name: Rillaspora
mud.desc: Rillaspora, actually isn't a MUD. It's an MMO Space Trading/Combat sim; A run off of the hugely popular Diaspora. There are many ship plans, classes, guns, missles, etc to keep you interested, along with the concept of trading goods and contraband between planets.

This game is 2D in graphics, and again, isn't a MUD. If you have an interest of flying a ship through space, hunting down other players or even bots, or trading through perilous territory to get that cargo safely to it's destination, then you've come to the right place. Come try out Rillaspora, and I'm sure you will be suprised.
The website is = http://www.rillaspora.net

mud.name: Deaths Journey
mud.desc: Go on a Quest for Deaths Scythe too kill the Demon Dragon Asjryn. it will take hard work, Skill, and the Best Equipment that the World of Malakarni can Provide!

mud.name: All That Jazz
mud.desc: Chicago, 1925. The skirts are getting shorter, the films are getting better, and there's no end to Prohibition in sight. Of course, that doesn't mean there's no booze! G-men chase mobsters down blind alleys as chanteuses sing sultry songs on speakeasy stages. From its high society to its seamy underbelly, the Windy City has endless opportunities for excitement and drama. Play mafia muscle, captains of industry, bluestockings, rich idlers, Communist agitators, actors, singers, dancers, private investigators...build empires or blow them apart. And don't forget, Thompson sub-machine guns can be ordered from Sears!

\"All That Jazz\" is a brand new historical Mini-Mu* located on Gateway Mush (the former OGR). We'll be adding new features, including a wiki, over the next months, but our doors are opening today. Come create a character and begin roleplaying!
Directions: connect.mu-gateway.net Port: 6700
After agreeing to the Gateway rules, type @tel me = #318, which is our OOC area. From there, you may speak with staffers Jeeves or Meadows, and find a link to the Character Generation room.
Thanks!

mud.name: Star Wars: Hurrian Galaxy
mud.desc: The galaxy is controlled by the three superpowers, The New Republic The Empire and the Corporate Authority. There are smaller clans, but they don't have nearly as large of an impact as these. Within these there are many smaller organization, like the Order of Jedis or the Imperial Navy. Bettween these struggles are the Jedi and the Sith, who manage to find themselves thrwn against each other all too often. Each seeking their own perspective goals of light and dark. Still yet, there are the shadier groups, these are the smugglers, bounty hunters and mercenaries hired to do the dark deeds no one wants to do. So, whether you are a NR Soldier, an Imperial, a smuggler making runs to secret Imperial outposts on NR worlds, or just a scruffy nerf herder trying to make your way in the galaxy, you have a home in the Hurrian Galaxy!

mud.name: VanciaMUD
mud.desc: Vanciamud is an continously developing RP oriented MUD, both by its universe and its functionality. A team of builders constantly gives its best to expand the game world and create new quests. The orientation of the characters is a little different from most existing MUD and certain commands or concepts deserve further explanation. Therefore a small in-game tutorial was developed to help you discover them at your own pace. More explanations on this MUD are given below in French:

VanciaMUD est un mud fortement orientÃ© RP. L'univers, mÃ©diÃ©valo- fantastique, est dans l'ensemble assez sauvage et conÃ§u pour inciter le joueur Ã trouver par lui-mÃªme des moyens de survivre et de progresser. Le systÃ¨me de progression a Ã©tÃ© dÃ©veloppÃ© pour que, Ã la diffÃ©rence de beaucoup de MUDs, il ne soit pas indispensable de combattre pour gagner des niveaux. Les guerriers, bien entendu, ont une place dans l'univers, et une part non-nÃ©gligeable des talents. Toutefois, on peut Ã©galement monter un personnage magicien et, prochainement, devenir alchimiste ou botaniste (aucune limite n'est fixÃ©e Ã ces orientations). Le systÃ¨me de classe Ã©tant largement informel, il est parfaitement possible d'avoir un joueur qui cumule plusieurs de ces aptitudes, mÃªme si Ã un niveau moins grand bien entendu. Dans ces conditions, les quÃªtes prennent une importance primordiale dans l'univers, et les bÃ¢tisseurs s'attachent Ã en dÃ©velopper un nombre toujours croissant. Les fonctionnalitÃ©s mises en place jouent plus sur l'intÃ©rÃªt et le rÃ©alisme que sur les dÃ©tails que l'on associe gÃ©nÃ©ralement Ã ce type d'univers. Cela ne signifie pas que les dits dÃ©tails ne seront jamais implÃ©mentÃ©s. Vous avez pour l'instant largement de quoi faire avec le combat, la magie et les autres occupations plus inhabituelles (chasse, pÃªche, cuisine sur feu de camp...).

mud.name: Chiaroscuro
mud.desc: Chiaroscuro: The Interactive Fantasy Saga Telnet: jointhesaga.com 3005 Web: http://chia.jointhesaga.com Wiki: http://otherverse.wikia.com

Online since 2003, Chiaroscuro is an original-theme online roleplaying game that takes place in three primary regions: Fastheld, a walled city-state where magic is feared; Halagh, a series of mountain cities inhabited by gadget-loving Halaghi; and the Weeping Stones Islands, a cluster of islands in the sea off the coast of the continent where the pantheon-worshiping Moss Men dwell.

Our primary focus is on roleplaying – acting out scenes involving multiple players – from small chance meetings to massive world-changing events. But we’ve got other features that make the game attractive for players around the clock:

-More than 2,000 player-craftable items, which can be made and sold to other players, automated shopkeepers and auctioneers. -Lots to explore. It takes about 33 real-time hours, for example, to walk around the perimeter of Fastheld’s great Aegis wall. -MUDQuests, which allow players to test their skills for the chance to win coin and experience points. -Deedgivers, which reward players for completing a variety of tasks. -Trade system that lets players earn money and develop influence in the realm.
Own land. Build a shop. Get a customized castle. Lead a guild. Insert yourself into webs of noble intrigue. Make a name for yourself as a superstar roleplayer or an eminent crafter.

We’re always looking for new players to bring our realms to life. Some established players offer suggestions for new characters to move in their RP circles in the Wanted Characters section of our informational Wiki knowledgebase at http://otherverse.wikia.com
The game is free to play, although we do offer some paid in-game enhancements (extra crafting minutes, fast horses, luck cards, and other goodies).
The Wiki is where we’re building up a vast amount of information about the game world and its associated coded systems, as well as logs of roleplaying activities.
Check us out today at http://chia.jointhesaga.com and via Telnet at jointhesaga.com 3005.
Low bandwidth. High creativity. Join the saga today!

mud.name: Cosrin
mud.desc: TMC Note: Mud now requires connection via the mud's dedicated client, see mud website for more info.
Cosrin is a well established, roleplaying and adventure MUD in a fantasy setting. Friendly and easy enough to get into, but challenging, with simply huge longevity for all players.

Now, for the stat-minded, there are some 8000+ locations, with more being coded and tweaked all the time. Over 400 quests, ranging from the elementary, to the truly mind bending. Hundreds upon hundreds of foes to battle against, and a similar number of non combatant 'innocents' to add flavour around town. Eight different races, and eight character classes provide a wide range of choices when it comes to tailoring your persona, with four large Guilds to join, and sub-guilds too at later levels. The environment is non PvP, with a strong emphasis on roleplaying, the players ably assisted by the helpful staff to create a truly immersive gameworld. Help files are extensive, and all Guilds have their own mentor programs designed to ease newcomers into their new home. Cosrin is perfect for experienced roleplayers, who will fit right in and find the wealth of material they have to work with is only limited by their imagination. Cosrin is also *the* ideal choice for any true beginner, in both the roleplay and MUD sense - players use it's own trademark 'Wizard' front end to access it, which is fully configurable to your needs, but not so overwhelming that you are sent running for the hills by a three inch thick manual!

Aside from the above, I can only suggest that you drop in and visit, you'll find plenty of people to help you upon your arrival, and we're always glad to see new faces across the bar! See you there...first drink is on us...

mud.name: Amitoune
mud.desc: Finally, after 4 years of careful development we are now in BETA release to balance equipment, spells, and skills. Welcome! Partial list of Enhancements: NEW: Extensive MXP Protocol Use and ROA WebWindows, and sounds Unique Class/Guild/Order/Profession System Player-Owned Vendors & Houses, Secure Trading Interface Easier-To-use and More Powerful Build Interface Richly Detailable Mobs, Objs and Rooms Dual-Race System and Racial Skills Pets and Familiars that Level and Gain Abilities Ranged and Thrown Weapons and Usable Furniture Bard Songs, Barbarian WarCries and Grappling Maneuvers More Powerful Global Note System Over 250 New Spells and Skills Connectable and Set Items, Multi-Room Affecting Spells Package Mailing System and Enhanced Storerooms Enhanced Brewing, Scribing, Imbuing and Enchanting Enhanced Immunity/Resistance/Susceptibility System Enhanced WeaponSpell System In-game Character Creation

mud.name: FoxMUD
mud.codebase: [Merc] Way modified - snippets from lots of codebases
mud.desc: FoxMUD has been around in one form or another for the past 12 years. Custom coded from the Diku/Merc codebase, and built extensively over its long history, FoxMUD offers 4 continents of exploring and adventuring for its multi-classed character base. Extensive challenges are available in the forms of exploration and combat and a Lord system that pits the forces of Evil against Good. With alignment based skills, and over 160 levels of mortal playtime, a clan system, custom equipment for characters through its quest system, FoxMUD offers the Fantasy gamer an enjoyable romp through the middle ages. Note: FoxMUD is dedicated to NEVER Pwipe (that's NEVER!). Though we experienced some tragic loss while we were down for a year and a half, we are back, and some of the original creators have expressed interest. We have a dedicated crew, and are waiting to continue having FUN! Come try us out. FoxMUD has undergone a lot of changes in 2006. Please see 'news' on site for a complete list. Familiars gain levels! , Letters of Credit, new Fellport areas now open, Darkwood area now open, Krush's new area, Item of the Day, Mole tunnels open..MUCH MUCH MORE!

mud.name: Evolutions: A Pokemon MUSH (PokeMUSH)
mud.desc: On PokeMUSH: Pokemon Evolutions, role-play comes first. Our tight application process ensures a quality RP experience.

You can choose to be a human character [trainer, Team Rocket member, PokeForce (cop)] or you can become one of many pokemon types. Once you have your character you can interact with the 'Feature Characters' (the ones from the show, like Ash or Misty), as well as RP with other original characters. We have a system that allows you catch wild pokemon, as well as a helpful and very friendly staff. Since high-quality role-play is our goal, we do have an application that must be filled out. We welcome guests on our game, so feel free to drop by and check things out!
