mud.name: SidaliciaMUD
mud.desc: In elden times, it is now said, Dragons ruled. They created a civilization of immense beauty, sophistication, justice and law. And then Sidal descended, and chaos ruled. Now the races that were ur-races in Dragon times are struggling for power and control in this modern age. Humans are ascendant from their main cities of New Draconia and Sidalicia, but never discount the others; the Faea, Grulorten, Ertlorten, Korylani, Velinga and Jotuni.

This mud features carefully crafted zones, with detailed descriptions which change depending on daylight and season. Mobs have personality, many offer quests, some offer puzzles, or jokes, many have tricks up their sleeves. The world of Sidalicia is intended to age, rulers of kingdoms will change, years and seasons will be marked in their passing. Here weather and geography are important, and magical control and knowlege of both is possible. Sidalicia is a new mud, just opened for players, and is therefore small and intimate. It is a complex mud in some ways, many things have been changed from stock Circle, including the factors affecting combat. Much thought has gone into making Sidalicia original, thoughtful and absorbing. Roleplaying is encouraged but not strictly enforced and Sidalicia is exploring other ways, besides hack and slash to advance a character (most based on questing and knowledge of the MUD). Come and join us, and fall under the spell of... SIDALICIA!

mud.name: Hogwarts: Dark Rising
mud.desc: \"It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more. \" -Albus Dumbledore

1994. The Tri-Wizard tournament has left a sour note on Harry Potter's Fourth Year at Hogwarts. Death has come to the school right before a long, dreary summer of drought and murmurs of the Risen Lord Voldemort. The old loyals to the Dark Master, the Death Eaters, have broken free from Azkaban in the June of 1995 and have not been seen or heard from since. Some say it is a sign of the end, but many know this is foolish. The ministry has it's ears and eyes closed, turning a blind eye towards the matter. Harry Potter is a frequent topic in the Daily Prophet, his claims of He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named being tossed aside as irresponsible rumors of a deranged teenager. There are rumors that Dumbledore is being asked to step down as Headmaster at Hogwarts. There are worse rumors that Dumbledore is being forced to step down. Witches and Wizards are going into hiding. Some children are not returning to Hogwarts. Half of Hogsmeade is closed, Diagon Alley shops are shutting down.
This is not the world Harry Potter found four years ago. This is a different and dark world.
Who's side will you choose?
Game-Canon Books and Movies:
* The Philospher's Stone * The Chamber of Secrets * The Prisoner of Azkaban * The Goblet of Fire

mud.name: Arrant Destiny
mud.desc: There is a storm on all horizons of Oerth. Iuz's army of demons has all but crushed the Shield Lands and clashes with the might forces of Good in the Kingdom of Furyondy. Turrosh Mok plots the demise of the entire Wild Coast and most notably the City of Greyhawk. All the while, Queen Yolande sits quiet, unwilling to commit elven lives to human wars. Paranoia strickens every government as the Scarlet Brotherhood seems capable of infiltrating even the most closed kingdoms. Immortals with their motives sit high above, watching their followers and enemies closely. Heroes of every alignment fight for their cause, while others fight for survival. This is the World of Greyhawk, this is Arrant Destiny.

mud.name: Evolution of Nepharia
mud.desc: As of November 28th 2006, we're proud to present EoN version 2: Evolution of Nepharia: The Chronicles
Open in BETA Status.

Open beta status is a period in which players are allowed to enjoy the game with the understanding that they are playing in an active work zone. From one day to the next things may be changed with little warning during this stage and players are expected to be respectful of the work being put in for them. We cannot promise balance or to be bug-free during this period, only that we will do our best to correct issues as they show up.

Features include: * Large World Map (40,000 rooms, not including areas) - Includes: Air, Lava, Underwater and Wilderness sectors * Old Player \"Level Bank\" Reimbursement (see admin) * Unique Item Assembly Code * Portal Stone Travel System

mud.name: Creeping Death
mud.desc: Would you like to witness loads of disembowelments? Buckets of blood and gore?Make your foes beg on their knees before you finally release their worthless souls? Hrm...so do I, so here is the NEXT BEST THING. This MUD aims at maximum playability and enjoyment. There's death,blood,gore and other delightful things *grin*.

Creeping Death II features an automated quest system, which lets players go on quests without IMM interference,as well as old-fashioned quests, configurable ANSI colors,banks,extra classes and races....blah blah blah...you get the idea. So if you want a taste of the extraordinary, come on down. You won't be disappointed.
Random acts of sensless violence are always welcome, so reach out and backstab somebody. New players are always welcome. Sounds too good to be true? Cross over to the other side and see for yourself.

mud.name: Carnival of Carnage
mud.desc: Carnival of Carnage is a GodWars based Mud that is the beginning phases of Alpha-testing.

The Carnival has optional PK status, where additional skills can be gained through researching PK Powers. Also available are Status Powers where extra skills are available to them with the proper PK points. Currently there are 3 classes open to play which are expanded on regularly with 3 more classes in development.
The world uses a mixture of \"overland\" and \"mapper\" style graphical outputs, although minimal exit display is in the works for blind players who require the usage of screen readers.
Quests can be acquired from mobiles through the mob program system and extra equipment can be gained through treasure chests from slain mobiles, quests and shops.

Builders and world designers are being hired although the OLC system isn't entirely the most friendly due to the mapper system. The fact that there is only builder at the moment is why OLC system has not yet been refined for ease of building.
Drop in and check us out, all ideas for expansion and alpha testers are welcome...
CoC Dev Team

mud.name: Illindir
mud.desc: Illindir is a medieval fantasy containing sex, violence, and magic. Heavy inspiration has been drawn from actual cultures. We have also incorporated elements of traditional fantasy.

Illindir is proud to boast a player-driven world. Players can build and destroy cities and clans to shape the land. Races evolve through the rp and choices of players. Our indepth crafting system ensures a working economy.

Illindir also offers many ways for characters to spend their time. * Uncover mysteries left behind by the old Gods. * Slay monstrous creatures in untamed lands. * Become a master craftsman unrivalled by any other. * Wage war on neighboring cities. * Build your wealth through trade and theft.

Staff strives to make Illindir an ever-exciting world for all players. Constantly changing and improving, our world is never stagnant. Reality cannot compare to the world we have made for our players.

mud.name: Alalia
mud.desc: Right now Alalia is in the building phase. We are still attempting to create a world that is still true to the stock dystopia format but is unique. New areas and classes will be coming soon.
Players that come to Alalia can simply play. They can test and supply feedback if they wish but it is not required. The mud is there for their benefit and fun and requires nothing of them.

mud.name: AnimeMUD II
mud.desc: AnimeMUD is a newbie-friendly mud based on many popular anime, manga and video game titles- our influences take the form of specially designed original areas. The mud has a very laid-back and friendly atmosphere, with mudwide ooc conversations the norm. We support a challenging pk environment as well as free form roleplay. As well, the local quest immortals frequently throw original world quests with prizes, ranging in difficulty to include as many people as possible. We have a total of seven classes and eleven races, many new to break the \"stock theme\", and feature a system of evolutions. Demons, espers and another neutral evolution soon to come that evolve from the \"base races\" and are more powerful in terms of stats and skills. An in-game housing system provides for those who want to have a place to call their own, with structures and decorations buyable with permits. This mud is in a period of extensive improvement, and we are always seeking to make ourselves better. Come join us and experience the feel of an eight-plus year old mud made new again.
~//Aurcaen

mud.name: Star Wars: Galactic Horizon
mud.desc: Galactic Horizons is a FotE MUD that has a dedicated staff of builders and coders. We are always looking for more to help build and code. If you are experienced please feel free to email the owner (conyers0184@gmail.com) or stop by in game and talk to Grube or Russman. They may be Invis =)

We have a dedicated player base that enjoy meeting new players, and helping out. The Force system is controlled by the Owner, and is offered as a reward as well as being randomly generated. There are several clans, most of which are still in need of dedicated members, and a Jedi Order. The New Republic and Empire still need leaders, and we are taking steps to improve the system of war to make things more interesting for the Governments, clans and Guilds.
While there are currently few modification, we are planning on adding a custom combat system, droids/pets, atmospheric flight for ships and armospheric vehicles, player owned shops and much more!
Thanks, and hope to see you in game!
The War is kicking off! Will you answer the call, sit on the side, forge your own way or profit from the war? No matter where you stand you can always see the GALACTIC HORIZON!

mud.name: Currently based on Visonmud (Legend of the Six Kingdoms) <-- official
mud.desc: It is a CircleMUD 3.0 Based on the VisionMud Coding Base. Heavily modified with original and stock worlds.
OLC (limited) is included. Buildwalk / Aedit is being implimented.
Clans Available.
Classes Available
Planned: will have multiple races soon
Currently under construction and not open to players We are interviewing coders mostly.

mud.name: Star Trek: Foundations (bDv2)
mud.desc: Star Trek: Foundations is the first Star Trek-themed game based in the era of the \"Enterprise\" TV show. Star Trek: Foundations (previously known as bDv) has been in production since 2001 and first opened for players in 2002. In the fall of 2004, it was announced that the game was being redesigned from the ground up in terms of code - a project which would streamline the game and ensure that all aspects worked together. ST:Foundations (bDv2) opened in March of 2005, and the playerbase was transferred over. The game takes place a few years after the show. However, after 2154, we follow an original timeline.

The year is 2163, and the galaxy is in turmoil. Many talks have been initiated by various empires to discuss the need for an alliance of major powers. The Terran Confederation is trying to prove itself to larger, more-established empires like the proud Andorian Imperium or the stoic Vulcan Federation. The warrior Klingon Empire shows little mercy to those foolish enough to stand in the way of the Empire's goals, and the secretive Romulans watch all from the safety of cloaked vessels. Other, independent worlds are in the middle of it all, some trying to make a profit while others side with larger empires or conduct illegal business.

Will you play a part in forming an alliance of governments? Will you command a raiding party of pirates? Will you lay siege to a weaker empire, or will you foster the bonds of peace? All of these options are available to you here.

mud.name: NetherLand
mud.desc: Dedicated to newbies and experienced players alike, NetherLand features a huge, mostly original world of fantasy, providing nearly limitless possibilities for exploration. For the pkillers, you can take part in a clan war, getting war points for your clan. For the explorer, you can hop on a horse (or, why not, a dragon) and use the automated quest system to get quest points that will be used to improve or modify your gear, while discovering new areas. For the newbies, you can be sure to receive help from your fellow players (we like the 'homely' atmosphere of a relatively small player base). If you ever get bored, you can participate in one of the regularly run games (capture the flag, treasure hunt, base domination to name a few). Or you could accumulate gold and buy your own castle! But the levelling possibilities are nearly limitless, with remorts (allowing multi-classing) and more than 300 races to choose from when you reincarnate.
New features are being implemented on a daily basis by the active immortal team. Check out our webpage, or just log on and check us out :)

mud.name: Naruto Universe
mud.desc: Naruto Universe is based on the anime/manga of Naruto. We are attempting to keep the game as accurate to the anime and manga as we can. We are a small mud, very small staff, virtually no players as we just opened for alpha testing. We are looking for builders, and players alike, come give us a try, I think you'll like us.

mud.name: RPG Basement
mud.desc: A lively RPG community with hundreds of active players. Friendly immortals who love to chat are always in stock here. An infinite world where anything can happen and often does. Check us out. I promise you won't want to leave!
- Final Legend

mud.name: Dragonball Terror
mud.desc: In Progress. -.-

mud.name: FieryMUD
mud.desc: FieryMUD was origionally based on copper gamma and completly concept initiated, hosted, coded and Implemented by Chris Camacho as this c coding project that just went awry. He'd no idea some psychos would actually like it and play there all the time. As a result of his efforts in the face of an 'all frills or bust' mudding community he quietly kept running one of the oldest Diku muds on the internet. It has only taken massive hardware failure to allow Scott Davis a crack at vaguely more modern code to allow FieryMUD interim possession of a different and challanging player interface. The origional vision of FieryMUD was to create a challanging MUD for advanced players. This new reborne Fiery is a hope to bring back the goals of the past by inflicting certain death on unsuspecting players... FieryMUD will continue to grow and change through the coming years and those players who seek challange and possess imagination will come in search of what the 3D world fails to offer them.... - Zzur

mud.name: R3 mud is back!
mud.desc: R3 Is Finally back up
This is not a clone and not stock. Red Ribbon Reborn (R3) is a custom DBZ mud, based on the original Dragonball saga.

We have a fully involved IMM staff dedicated to making this MUD an original and fun place to play; you will not find power tripping or favoritism here. What you WILL find is an IMM staff with over 40 years combined mudding experience - we ve seen the good and the bad and know what kinds of things keep a MUD ticking, including new code and a willingness to listen to (if not always implement) players ideas. You ll also find a different twist on how the world of Dragonball should work, PvP that really feels like Dragonball, RP if you look for it, and a thoroughly custom way of building a character. To keep you coming back, there is no cap on levels. Once you reach level 91, you can keep going into the hero levels, continually increasing your power level as you do. Power level 9000 is just a START!
Come check us out and say hello. We think you ll be glad you did.

mud.name: Ages of Glory
mud.desc: Chronicles of Aelia: Ages of Glory is a brand-new free browser-based strategy/roleplaying game. Coded entirely with PHP, Ages of Glory requires nothing more than a recent version of IE or MoZilla to play. It has been extensively beta-tested over a period of about a year to ensure stability and balance.

Ages of Glory is a strong step ahead of most other free browser-based games. It features a graphical map and icons rather than the pure text found in most free games. A unique combination of strategic and roleplaying elements, Ages of Glory allows you to control individual characters thrust into the middle of a world at war. Train your skills, gather equipment and ancient artifacts, amass a treasury, learn spells, and enhance your power. Build cities, recruit and train armies, and lay enemy settlements to waste.
Inspired by Civilization, Master of Magic, Romance of the Three Kingdoms, and popular browser games, Ages of Glory offers an experience unlike any other, and at no cost. So what are you waiting for?

mud.name: AtlantisMUX
mud.desc: Nestled in the eternal expanse of the Okeanos sea, Atlantis --the land of legend-- lives on. It serves as the heart of a thriving civilization comprised of several island nations. While all may seem peaceful, looks can be decieving. The sea is large and largely uncharted, new islands and new enemies are revealed and discovered regularly. There are enemies within as well, political struggles keeping the fragile heirarchy of each island teetering on the edge of shattering.

Start your life as a gladiator on the rise to fame or an early grave, begin as a simple seamstress watching the plots unfold.. or perhaps claw your way to the top to become absolute power of one of the many islands.

AtlantisMUX was created by staffers dedicated to good RP and rich plots full of twists and turns. Be as involved as you wish with the IC history of the world or merely take a back seat and dabble in the daily lives of the people.

We are currently in the final stages of preparation but are open to guests who wish to peruse our files. Talk to a staffer, get your questions answered, and perhaps get a character created now to be one of the founding players of a MU* that strives to bring true RP back to the internet.

mud.name: Denver: Dark Alliance
mud.desc: Denver: Dark Alliance is a long running game which has recently been re-adapted in early 2008 by a new group of staffers. The game supports the classic Old World of Darkness Mage: The Ascension game.

In Denver, Colorado, an eclectic chantry of the Council of Nine Mystick Traditions face nearly insurmountable odds against the stalwart forces of the Technocratic Union and their mortal sympathizers in the real world, and explore the strange, massive, and often dangerous wonderland of a chaotic \"other dimension\", a horizon realm birthed from the chantry's own node. Amid all this, rumors of a dark force which seeks not to consume simply our reality, but ALL realities persist. Will the power of the Awakened and their allies be enough to prevent the end of all realities?
Magick and technology, friendship and love, and humor and horror combine into an exciting story adventure.

We accept Tradition magi and their supporters only (mortals and psychics allied with the Traditions) but we are willing to discuss quite a few different concepts. We have an excellent group of very dedicated roleplayers who love the game, and a system that rewards cleverness, curiosity, and creativity.
We do require that all players AND the characters they portray be at least 18 years of age.

mud.name: Legends of Excalibur (LoE)
mud.desc: For many years, the kingdoms of Dhanloria, Britannica, and the Farlands were united under the banner of King Arthur Pendragon. But this time of peace would not last. King Arthur eventually passed on, and the three kingdoms split, bickering over who should hold power. Alliances formed, and the world fell to chaos.

Some formed clans and orders, becoming self-sufficient. Others follow closely to their kingdom, swearing allegiance and working on making them the rightful power in the realms, and still others flee underground, swearing no alliance, but forming small bands of mercenaries and brigands.

The path before you is not an easy one, but no path is wrong. We implore you to come and play, and enjoy what we have to offer. 500 levels, 16 classes, and several races create a rich and vibrant world, filled with kind people, and plenty of game play.

mud.name: Transformers: Decepticon Dominion
mud.desc: Decepticon Dominion Mush breaks new ground with the concept of a single-faction Transformer Mush, which allows a continued sense of progress, a steady change, and a history that builds upon itself. Decepticon interactions among themselves are every bit as fascinating, perhaps more so, than the usual Decepticon/Autobot conflict - because there's forever a fine balance between the sense of team loyalty and the continued drive to better oneself. There's tremendous interpersonal RP possibility, and even greater opportunity on a larger scale.

This universe is firmly grounded in the pre-Movie cartoons, and characterizations are true to those given on the show. Excellent characters from other eras and universes are scheduled to be added as needed, to present the best possible mix of the greatest of the Decepticons, all brought together in one place.
In the context of our theme, TFDD is committed to a non-restrictive and respectful environment for its players, and seeks to attract dedicated roleplayers who would like to be part of the adventure.

mud.name: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic
mud.desc: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic is a Star Wars D20 game using the Saga Edition rules. We are a Role- play oriented Mush. Our thematic focus revolves around the Jedi Civil War that occurred took place after the Mandalorian Wars about 4000 years before the Battle of Yavin. Our game has gone through it's first Story Arc, which saw the Sith Empire come from the wilds of Space and devastate the Galaxy. We are now moving into our second Story Arc.

mud.name: Aldria OpenMush
mud.desc: Aldria Open Mush... The first of its kind.

The world of Aldria is as open as it can be, when you arrive there, you'll find a place where players create the present and future. Little has been written about the lands' past and present, less has been written about the races that roam the lands, and why is that?

It is because this mush is made by the players. As more join, as more things happen, the rules will be written. How will magic work? The first to write it down will provide the base for those that follow, ever expanding, ever getting better and constantly adapting to the new realities.

As of now it is known that there are 5 different 'nations' in the world. As time passes, some might vanish, others might appear... But the starting place for all, the one nation already partly set to stone is a magical kingdom on a mesa, one that resembles any other fantasy kingdom. And that's where your story starts (for now).

mud.name: Star Wars: The New Empire
mud.desc: Okay, we've been running this MUD for awhile and have come a long way. Though we are still in a BETA testing phase we are coming nearer to perfection. We are now in the stage of builing a perfect immortal staff. Come visit us and possibly hand out a few suggestions to improve our MUD. Have fun!

mud.name: X-Men Evolution MOO
mud.desc: X-Men Evolution II MOO is set just after the end of the X-Men Evolution cartoon series. When the credits roll on the end of the last episode, that's where we start! That gives plenty of history to all the characters and to the world in which the characters live for everyone to role play in. FC's and OC's alike are welcome on the game and an easy application encourages new ideas.
So far, there has been a Sentinel attack, exposing mutants to the world. While there is some further acceptance than initially, humans still fear and loathe mutants on a whole.

Raven Darkholme, aka Mystique, is no longer principle of Bayville High. After losing the fight with Storm, and not being chosen to join Magneto on Asteroid M to go through his device which was supposed to bring mutants to their full potential, she snuck up herself, and got caught in the machine. However, she maintained her presence at the school, in the form of Risty. And though everyone thinks she was turned into stone to release Apocalypse, then broken into many pieces, she re-appears, her powers being amplified by Apocalypse, once he's released.

Xavier's Institute for Gifted Youngsters, along with the Brotherhood of (Evil) Mutants have been exposed as havens for mutantkind, and the X-Men not only helped to keep Magneto from realizing his plan of world domination, but they defeated Juggernaut, Xavier's half-brother, when he came in search of Xavier.
Everything that happened in the series, from start to finish, is the past as the game starts just at the rolling of the final credits on Ascension pt 2. The show is the past, time for the future.

mud.name: TriochMARE
mud.desc: The world of TriochMARE once existed in harmony under the rule of the three sisters. The sisters left the world over a thousand years ago and now evil has started to creep up into the world.

TriochMARE is a world with a completely player driven economy. Players can gather their own resources and make their own equipment. It is completely possible to play the entire game without ever engaging in combat. The economy system is fully implemented at this time.

The game will feature three unique storylines around a single background. Players will be able to complete the storyline and start over on the same or a different storyline. Players who defeat the storyline will be allowed to keep skills permenantly allowing them to unlock new areas of the world.

As the economy is driven by the players, a player base is needed. Early players in the game will have opportunities to gain more skills than the typical player will have. Playtesters are also adequately rewarded. In addition, all players who help describe a room in the game get a reward of their choice.

mud.name: Zebedee
mud.desc: What makes Zeb great?
We have dedicated newbie helper players, or if you prefer, a newbie tutorial (in the game, not in a MUD school).
All our areas are fully reviewed before activation. We have a wide variety of original objects and imaginative opponents, and 25 challenging quests.

Our 7 (and counting) classes play totally differently! Play a Necromancer and control a group of 30 minions - real monsters that follow and obey you. Or play an Alchemist and have to search the MUD for spell components.
Playerkilling is allowed above level 1 but is carefully balanced (and we find it makes the game much more interesting!)
At level 20 players become a Legend, and gain access to more items. They get more skills, and an Estate to defend.
Zebedee is a popular traditional LPMUD that has been running for 10 years, but with an international user base. Our loyal players will testify to its quality :)

mud.name: Anime: Ground Zero
mud.codebase: [Rom] Heavilly Modded/Hacked and slaughtered Turning Wheel Code Base
mud.desc: AGZ offers anything and everything that AnimeMUD had offered. Race Evolutions into Demons/Espers depending upon alignment and between levels. A great Newbie Friendly staff that suppo- rts all questions when available. Wonderful Pk environment, along with RP being all-owed. Clans and quests and imm driven quests also available. AGZ is based around Anime, Video Games, Fantasy and other loved things that people in the MUD- DING world enjoy the most of. Great character cus-tomization for your skills/spells. So please, come and join us in our ve- nture to creating something wonderful once again with this 1337 code!

mud.name: Silmaril
mud.desc: Questo MUD italiano e' caratterizzato da un'atmosfera fantasy dalle contaminazioni tolkeniane, in cui i giocatori potranno scegliere tra 9 razze iniziali e 15 classi per muoversi in un ampio mondo e combattere le loro guerre, partecipare a quest e riunirsi in clan, per decidere il destino del regno.

La struttura del MUD e' molto influenzata dal regolamento di AD&D, in particolare per la gestione degli immortali che, in seguito al cammino intrapreso in vita mortale, potranno giocare ulteriori 36 livelli con una concezione di gioco ben piu' elevata dell'hack&slash, basata esclusivamente sullo sviluppo della propria religione. Se non bastasse, Silmaril conta su una comunita' di giocatori poco ampia ma molto compatta, che ha sempre dimostrato di saper accogliere neofiti per guidarli alla conoscenza di questo stupendo mondo.

In this Italian MUD, players can choose between 9 starting races and 15 professions in a Tolkien-influenced fantasy world, where they can explore a wide world and fight their wars, joining quests and founding clans and guilds to decide the realm's fate.

The AD&D rules exert great influence on the Mud's structure, especially about Immortals who, after a chosen way in their mortal lives, could play 36 further levels, developing their personal religions and disregarding the hack&slash way of life. Besides, Silmaril is constituted by a not large group of very united players, who always have received newbies, leading them to the discovery of this wonderful world.

mud.name: FutaMUX
mud.desc: FutaMUX is an Adult-Only roleplaying environment specifically centered on transgendered themes. The name comes from 'Futanari', which is often used to described transgendered characters in anime/manga, but we are definitely not limited to that genre. All types of characters are welcome, both original and non-original. You can draw non-original character ideas from any fictional source with the exception of live action movies and TV series (unless it is derived from a novel or comic, for example).

Our staff is friendly and ready to help anyone new to a MU* environment. Please feel free to log in as a guest, or check out our website for more detailed information about the game, and if it sounds like something that might interest you, we'd love to have you play! Please bear in mind though that we've just opened on June 13th, 2007, so our playerbase is still growing!

mud.name: Dragonball Z Legends
mud.desc: Dragonball Z: Legends is not simply an online game; nor even a glorified DBZ near-death experience - it is the hard work & dedication of several of the best coders and builders to encapsulate you into the world of Dragonball Z like never experienced before. Goku and Piccolo will have nothing on you, as you plunge deep into this realm - enjoying the unique experience that only Dragonball Z: Legends can offer you.

To introduce you into this realm, I will summarize its history as a timeline of sorts. First there was Dragonball Saga - the first DBZ codebase that took mudding into the future for Dragonball fans. It was glorious, supporting, at times, over 400+ people from all over the globe. Then, tragically, as time went on, it faded and finally colapsed. Over several years, the codebase leaked out and several \"clones\" were introduced - each degrading the original experience more than the last. Now we get to Dragonball Z: Legends; which has areas that were in the original DBS, along with several, uniquely built areas by our team of dedicated administrators.

What seperates Dragonball Z: Legends from other muds, or even other clones, is that there are several additions and expansions on the original mud that will leave you coming back for more. These range from more ki attacks, which are described as accurately to the show and manga as possible, to new transformations and new races never before seen in the realm of Dragonball Z! These include:
- Hylians, from the realm of Zelda - Reploid, from the realm of Megaman - Shinigami, from the realm of Bleach (still in progress) - Fierian, a uniquely built race

The world of Dragonball Z: Legends is a constantly changing environment, which means as you play the game, it will evolve around you. The administrators are always hard at work making the player feel at home, both in the game as well as during conversation. They hold quests(which offer rewards), release supermobs(which drop rare items), and increase powerlevel gains during peak hours of gameplay. If all of this wasn't enough, it gets better - they also openly accept new ideas which, if well-organized, will be implemented. The administrators of Dragonball Z: Legends are:

- Kalisto, the owner of Draonball Z: Legends and coder. - Zynon, an amazing coder and Kalisto's right-hand man. - Builders, including Serena, Ryusei, Dominic and Sepharic. - and always looking for more staff to enhance the experience.

From everyone here at Dragonball Z: Legends, we welcome you into our home and will treat you as a favored guest. Everything that is ours, is now yours - we only ask that you respect administrators and other players as you wish to be respected yourself. Have fun, and remember to enjoy yourself.

mud.name: Avalon (German)
mud.desc: Renowned for its beautiful and detailed descriptions, Avalon is one of the established popular German MUDs. Yes: Everything is in German! But while most Avaloniacs are native speakers, we also welcome a steady stream of international connoisseurs.

Avalon is a consistent strict fantasy world which has shown to be able to fascinate its players for years and years on end. It is actively maintained and evolves continually, aiming at the best possible non-commercial, _completely_ free game play and fantasy atmosphere.

The world itself is huge, containing three main continents with sub- continents, many very large metropolises to hidden villages, deserts, barren hunting grounds and, of course, the Underworld. A colourized map of your vicinity can be displayed everywhere you are to help your orientation. Each race and class/guild has its unique look, form of expressions and a specific way to it being played. Avalon strives to make each character you play a very distinct experience.

Avalon officially went out of its beta-phase on August 15th 1995. At the time of this writing (2009) it has been greatly enhanced and still is one of the prime addresses for German speaking text-based gamers.

mud.name: Aesir 2
mud.desc: In a world ruled by Deities with powers beyond mortal comprehension, mortal man and his sentient beastly kindred walk among some of the greatest heroes and villains ever to exist in the human consciousness.

Emperor Palpatine and Lord Vader inhabit the same world as Sir Lancelot and the Greco-Roman Gods. Choose your path among the mortals, honour always the deities, and be sure to watch your back; the wolves here bite.
Aesir currently has 6 tribes, run by mortals, that aid in roleplay and player interaction. Most of our areas are original and we will accept and review areas from anyone, not just immortals.

We have Rebirth and Remort systems in the game. Remort will brings 8 advanced classes into the game. Questing is optional and the rewards are as variable as the types of quests. We like to try to keep a light, relaxed atmosphere, while at the same time keeping an open forum for opposing views.

Feel free to stop by anytime and if you should need anything, don't hesitate to ask! Aesir II is a dedication to the origional Aesir (asgard.viviano.net). It was an incredible piece of work so the mud is being relaunched on a new port under new management.
Same great mud, better flavor! Also, it has been redone from the areas it had a long time ago so this is a nostalgia trip that only the gods could brew up. Happy mudding and see you there!

mud.name: Hogwarts: School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
mud.desc: Hogwarts: School of Witchcraft and Wizardry is a completely roleplay world based on JK Rowling's classic Harry Potter world.
The game itself is based in an alternate reality to that of the book, meaning Harry Potter, and other characters from the books never existed.
The MU uses attributes, abilities, and recorded spells for each character. This creates uniqueness from character to character.
Characters can play quiditch, excel in areas, create their own spells, etc.

mud.name: Soulfire MUSH
mud.desc: Soulfire MUSH is based on the Dresden Files by Jim Butcher. We've set the game in Post-Katrina New Orleans in 2007, right around the time that the events of \"Small Favor\" are happening up in Chicago. Join the adventure today!

mud.name: Bloodlands
mud.desc: Vampires have been increasing in number, many from different origins with different beleifs and values. Some are willing to live peacefully with humans and lycan, others have a lust for blood and seek total destruction of all who stand in the way of their domination.

Different races and types of vampires have different skills, strengths and weaknesses. Sunlight is deadly to almost all vampires, forcing them to do the majority of their activity at night. Race, align, night and day are of great importance in this world and to the creatures in it.
Bloodlands is newbie friendly, but gets more difficult as one progresses through the lands and advances in level. New players are always welcome.

mud.name: Eternal Night II
mud.codebase: [GodWars] heavily modified GodWars code, EN code 2.99
mud.desc: Eternal Night II is based on a very heavily modified Godwars 95 code base. Its two classes are Vampires and Werewolves, which have been meticulously balanced. This mud is totally PK oriented, but includes character building aspects as well. We offer an extensive clan system that is unique, and is also the driving force behind most conflict on the game. A class remort system is in place and there are no stat or experience limits. Of course the main reason we all play online games is the other players, and our mud has the best group of people you are likely to meet in an online game. We have an active and helpful staff, players willing to help newbies, and an extensive help file system. It shouldn’t take you long to feel comfortable in the Eternal Night, but it takes a lot skill and effort to rise above the rest and own the Night.
Drink the Blood, it will make you stronger.

mud.name: judyMUD
mud.codebase: [Dikumud] Longest running DikuMUD ever -- heavily modified, but retains major elements of original D
mud.desc: This would seem like your typical DikuMUD. It started with classes, and 30 to 50 levels, and in fact, a silly and modified version of that is currently up -- a very interesting class system, and challenging, oldschool style. Essentially we have an archive of over 27 years of versions of this mud-all which are radically different from each other. This particular version, as stated above, consists of your typical dikumud areas, along with some interesting higher level areas, and several attempts at humor hidden within these areas, and equipment within, added throughout the years. It truly is fun, andthere usually is someone on willing to help newbies. If you've ever played a traditional circlemud or dikumud, you'll be able to figure this out while enjoying it. And remember -- this is the longest running DikuMUD EVER. There's a reason for that: it was always at either judy.indstate.edu 2150, henry.indstate.edu, fred.indstate.edu, laurel, and ramsey.indstate.edu, and now it is on laurel.indstate.edu 2150, so unfortunately we've lost a lost of players. However you're welcome to come! There is always someone on wanting to give you the secrets of the game, and help you out! This post was put up in the hopes that the old players will have the opportunity to find these versions, should they try to search, but ultimately, everyone is welcome! Cheers!

mud.name: Battletech 3060
mud.codebase: [MUX] BattleTech MUX 0.7.0-rc4+HUD+HAG+ALG RELEASE svn revision 1334 'Fly' build #14
mud.desc: Battletech 3060 is a real-time, text based battletech simulator where you control a single mech on the battlefield and fight alongside other players AGAINST other players as well as AI on a completely hex based system: The world is small entirely because the game does not conform to rooms, it really is a giant map just like the board game!
The learning curve is steep, the game is complex. Do you have what it takes to compete with the pros? Get started today!

Special note: This game, while playable with pure telnet, is best played with a HUD client like xperthud or THUD. These clients update the map in real time with a graphical interface and make the game far easier for new players.

mud.name: FoF
mud.desc: FoF bedeutet : Fight of Fantasy! Weitere Informationen finden Sie auf der Seite : www.fof.ucoz.de
Dieses Spiel ist komplett aud Deutsch! The game is in German!

mud.name: Ancient Empires
mud.desc: In the beginning, there was Coder's Haven. Then there was Defiance. And now, there is Ancient Empires. Get all the news on the Mud which is up on a new server. There have been a few new areas added, with a lot of new quests as well. Most of the old guilds you remember are back. We are trying to make the game as fun as possible, while creating an easier learning experience for new players. More changes will be coming soon. Join us at ae.satori-assoc.com 5011 today.

mud.name: Star Wars: Schism
mud.desc: Set in the Star Wars universe this MUD takes place shortly after the New Jedi Order series of books. The Imperial Remnant was reorganized into the Imperial Dynasty by Empress Talia Oliska-Matsumoto and the galaxy experienced a peace between the Dynasty and the Republic. However, that peace was destroyed when the Sith Empire arose and gutted the Republic nearly overnight. Joining together the Galactic Alliance has been formed from the ashes of the Republic and the defense of the Dynasty. Meanwhile, the Jedi Order has also suffered many losses as the new Sith Empire has driven them almost to the point of extinction.

The MUD hosts Immortals that don't carry around a lot of drama and will always enforce their rules fairly. Roleplaying is highly encouraged and there are many immortal run Quests for the players to participate in. Currently the MUD is working on adding new planets for you to explore and experience.
We hope to see you soon.

mud.name: The Outlands - 4th Age
mud.desc: Outlands Mud...

Highly modified tartarus code based on Rom 2.4. This is a roleplaying mud in planescape setting with unique character creation and many in-game quests to discover. We offer 32 highly detailed races and 12 base classes which also extend with unique subclasses.
Also offering an exceptional environment with a unique combat system in an enormous world awaiting for you to explore.
Playerkilling is allowed and encouraged. Houses to join with different philosophies and skillsets. Random magical, rare, set and unique items with many diverse properties.

mud.name: Cygnus
mud.codebase: [Merc] Heavily recoded. Inspirations from Daleken, Rom and similar
mud.desc: Cygnus is a wacky, generally fantasy-based mud with a twist. It is a rather hack&slash mud that tries to be as convenient about it as possible. The player community is helpful, intelligent and friendly. Gods do try take part in the game. They sometimes help, sometimes don't, but it's all within reason. We do have female players too :-) The areas are very often very funny to explore. The actions and descriptions often relate to known classic movies, books, games and other.

mud.name: M*U*S*H
mud.desc: M*U*S*H is an eclectic community of artists, experimenters, learners, and teachers. Here, players can create things that will move others intellectually or emotionally, explore uncharted territories in interactive text-based environments, and freely share knowledge and skills in a constructive and friendly setting.

mud.name: Kingdoms of the Lost
mud.desc: Welcome to a world of imagination and roleplay. Kingdoms of the Lost (KotL) is a roleplay encouraged MUD, featuring over 100 completely original areas. The vast landscape brings to you the continent of Olerax, and the divided kingdoms of the land. Barbarian, undead, sky people, woodsman and more make up the colorful kingdoms, and any one may be selected upon creation.

KotL provides a location where fun is the essential element. While the theme is a mature one, we provide a welcome environment to players of all ages. Swords and sorcery fare is the backdrop of the game. Our immortals are dedicated to bringing new improvements to the game.

Features found are: Multiple auto-quest locations. Easy and detailed character creation. Tier system that develops classes over 200 levels. An evolution system to strengthen your race. Stats grow through use, not from a trainer. Mana pools that vary by class. Custom weapons and armor. Player kill is an option, but not required. Roleplaying experience earned by interacting with other players. 20 different religions. Gems and moxes that can be socketed into equipment. Runic equipment that gains levels with you. Details: Scars, clothing to cover them and physical characteristics that others can actually see.

mud.name: Trigunmud
mud.desc: The game is based on the Trigun anime series, and after creating your character, you will join a dry, sandy world populated by many other players and characters. You will interact with the submersive environment to complete quests, chase bad guys and work your way to the top. Do you have what it takes to become the best?

mud.name: Scattergood School for the Magical Arts
mud.desc: In 1747 the second school of magic in America was founded in Silverdale, Pennsylvania, outside of a young Philadelphia. The school was named Scattergood school of the Magical Arts, reflecting the Quaker influence of the Eastern Pennsylvania area.

Scattergood was founded by graduates of the famed Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry in Scotland. The five founders of Scattergood wished to share their love of knowledge and education by assuring that magical families in the Pennsylvania area would have a safe, welcoming place for their children to learn the prestegious art of magic.

The town of Silverdale is an all-wizard community about 30 miles west of Philadelphia. Located in the hills, Silverdale is far enough from Philadelphia to be considered rural, but close enough to the city to allow residents to enjoy the conveniences of the city.

Silverdale was founded in 1703 by Wizards and Witches who wished to get away from Muggle settlements and practice magic away from prying eyes, motivated mostly by the International Statue of Wizarding Secrecy of 1692. Now, in the year 1950, Silverdale is home to about 1500 residents and its economy blossoms for nine months out of the year while school is in session at nearby Scattergood and students pour money into the local economy.
Players take on the roles of students, staff, and townfolk in this roleplay based game. All character actions are roleplayed. We have no coded spells, levels, battles, etc.

mud.name: Persistance of Memory
mud.desc: 2005- US at war with Columbia, There exists a state of military readiness, and already many of the military laws have been put into action, For the Safety of the People. The people of Boston, and the world, struggle through this deterioration of structure, a society that has lost it’s sense of morality and limits. The players grasp for a greater social consciousness, and struggle to help make a difference. Many walk the earth blind unawakened, and unaware. They are the tools, pawns and playthings of the more powerful supernatural characters that live, run, and fight their own wars in this busy and important military port. Persistance of Memory is set in Boston 2005, and based on the WoD RPG. We have an established playerbase and well developed grid. All spheres are open and accepting applications.
Persistance of Memory csmctmto.apt.net 4321 or 208.143.160.250 4321%r

mud.name: Eldorado
mud.desc: Gaily bedight, A gallant knight, In sunshine and in shadow, Had journeyed long, Singing a song, In search of Eldorado.
But he grew old- This knight so bold- And o'er his heart a shadow Fell as he found No spot of ground That looked like Eldorado.
And, as his strength Failed him at length, He met a pilgrim shadow- 'Shadow,' said he, 'Where can it be- This land of Eldorado?'
'Over the Mountains Of the Moon, Down the Valley of the Shadow, Ride, boldly ride,' The shade replied- 'If you seek for Eldorado!'
by Edgar Allan Poe

Come join us in the land of Eldorado, where priest walk the streets during the day, and vampires come out to play at night. Explore a world where almost anything is possible. Play in the fishbowl, hang out with Dragons, visit a Gothic Castle. Test your skill against monters that want to eat you for dinner. Join a Clan and become apart of a group of like minded individuals.
We offer:

Extended Race Selection Extended Class Selection Equipment Saved Ansi Color Quests Available Character Approval Unnecessary Roleplaying Is Accepted Newbie friendly Level-Based Training System Level-Based Equipment System Clans Offered World is mostly original Medium World (3,000+ rooms and growing) Imm run quests with unique rewards Approachable Imms
if you want to start looking for your Eldorado today, then visit us at eldoradomud.com port 9000
Visit our web page at www.eldymud.com

mud.name: Aarwen
mud.desc: Greetings from Aarwen,

We are newly created and looking for help, will be implementing origional methods of character enhancement, new battle system, working economy, Player run city-states/Kingdoms.. if this sounds interesting, please stop by and let us know! we would love to meet you!
reloaded.dune.net 6555 Aarwen_staff@hotmail.com
We will be accepting applicants for all positions! NEW BUILDERS need a place to learn how? WE'LL HELP! see Argyle or Selene online for more info!

mud.name: Your Mind's Eye
mud.desc: The Mind's Eye has just been created and I am looking for creative people to help me build this. Most importantly I'm looking for a good coder and good builders!!! Log on after 8:00 EST and speak with Lorya about building or coding.

mud.name: Isengard
mud.desc: This Tolkien-based mud has been around for as long as Mordor has existed. In fact, some of the original coders of Mordor still develop for Isengard. With a wonderful and extensive monster, item, and character database, this mud is famous among Mordor fans and non- Mordor fans alike for its diversity and it's mix of exciting combat and depth of its monster and item database.

The combat system is loosely based on D&D and AD&D, and people familiar with the combat system of these famous games will no doubt enjoy the experience of playing on Isengard. There are constant improvements and new areas being added.
With the addition of clans, guilds, and player shops, this mud has quite a bit of depth while maintaining the simplicity that it has always been known for.

mud.name: ConQUEST
mud.desc: Every effort has been put into creating an interactive, interesting, detailed world. ConQUEST features its main city, Moonhaven, where adventurers can explore and interact with its residents. Once you learn the ropes of the game, venture out into the wilderness and explore dungeons, build guild houses, gain prestige throughout the land, and craft ancient artifacts!

Current features include: * fast-paced, interactive combat system * over 300 skills and spells * detailed crafting and trading system * All equipment outside of the newbie zone is player made * advancement through quests and puzzle solving * interactive NPCs; learn by talking to NPCs and questing * classless, level-less advancement * guilds and player-created guild houses * framework for players to submit their own monster and recipe ideas which become part of the game when approved. * custom client available

mud.name: Passion and Pain
mud.desc: Passion and pain has reopened its doors. It's political, it's evil, it's good, it's RP at it's very best. In a world where power is a struggle and survival is sometimes lies, sometimes love, sometimes sex, you will always find a surprise.

If you are a mature adult who has great RP skills then come and apply for one of the key roles. Our powers RP their way to the top and for a limited time there is nobility and holy blooded roles to fill.
Warning, Passion And Pain has extreme content. It has its own religion and its own magic base. It is a plot based game and player input is welcomed.
Notice: To play on Passion and Pain, you must agree to our terms and disclaimer.

mud.name: 2001's Eternal Darkness
mud.desc: 2001 Eternal Darkness We Have Moved! Our new address is: ed.wolfpaw.net 9700 Come join the adventure, mayhem, and fun of Eternal Darkness 2001, one of the most unique and exciting muds on the net! Great new zones, terrifying foes, and plenty of surprises await the true adventurer to discover and conquer. An extensive clan system, equipment forge system, and rare loads are some of the features of the game. Players may choose to rise to unlimited levels, or to remort to our Dragon levels. After reaching Eternal Dragon status, continue on to our newest feature - Titan levels! With our extensive spell spheres, gods, and guilds, players will have unique combinations which will make them different from any other player on the game! Become top dog on ED! Are you up to the challenge? Show us who's boss and what you are made of. Will you be one of the survivors in this dark and desolate land? See you soon!

mud.name: Land of Lore
mud.desc: This MUD offers a friendly environment, has good people for staff/players, has a steady rock hard source, 60k+ rooms! 800 awesome lvls, legend quests after the 800 levels. and some killer equipment! This mud also has nice balanced stats, tons of classes/races to choose from. And more in the making.

mud.name: OneRing
mud.desc: OneRing MUSH is a Tolkien-based role-playing MUSH, with a timeline which takes off immediately following Bilbo's journey as written in 'The Hobbit'. Most, but not all areas on the MUSH center around places mentioned in The Hobbit, also. There is a basic combat system in place, which is meant to enhance roleplay but not take its place. Some areas are still under construction and builders are always welcome. Characters which do not require administrative approval to start include hobbits, elves, orcs, and humans. Other types of characters are also available on a limited basis. OneRing is still a very small MUSH, so there are not always players connected at any given time. Automatic scripts to keep you logged in while you idle around are perfectly acceptable.

mud.name: Shadowlands
mud.desc: Realm of Shadowlands is forgoing a lot of changes to thier code base. Currently looking for a couple more coders to help out with class revamp, combat revamp, and other systems. Also looking for excited Builders to help make our world larger and better.
Please come join us in our little corner of the MUD world we have a family-oriented atmosphere with our players, and would love to have you come and join it.

mud.name: Anarres II
mud.codebase: [Custom] MudOS A2-0.99.x series experimental LP driver
mud.desc: Anarres II is an LPMud written from scratch with the objective of creating a powerful and versatile LPC library. The library environment for creators is modelled on the Unix operating system with clones of many important Unix daemons and commands. Features include an extensible capability based security system and extensible in-shell scripting. Anarres II uses an internal messaging system to allow internal and external AIs to interact with the world on the same basis as human players.
In mid 2001, the emphasis of Anarres II turned to building area code to demonstrate the library, but development of the driver and the library are actively ongoing as ever.

We encourage technically minded visitors to drop in and have a look around, the codebase is visible from when you log in. The regular users have backgrounds in a wide variety of both technical (and nontechnical) disciplines and welcome discussion.

mud.name: Chronicles of Arcanum
mud.desc: The Chronicles of Arcanum A High Fantasy, original realm to adventure in and Roleplay. The Chronicles of Arcanum started on August 1996 and ran till February of 2005. It has been down since that time. It has been recompiled and back up and running. The Chronicles of Arcanus operates on ROM 2.4b4 Main Source Code and is a post-beta rewrite, renamed Dragon Mud 3.0. Dragon Mud 3.0 includes a large portion of its internal functions rewritten, a multitude of internal function changes and a score of additions, bug fixes, and improvement tweaks. Ivan's OLC 1.71b has been reworked and rewritten to an improved and more versatile OLC module, titled Enigma OLC 2.5. Additional custom code modules have been written and installed, namely Creation Point Module 2.5, and Fight_code 3.4. Dragon Mud 3.0 is designed to be a self contained, re-coded ROM code base. Mud now seeks a new staff to both moderate and build and aid in building a new player base.

mud.name: Alveus: Hollow World
mud.desc: Alveus is a world in peril. Ancient wounds from the wars between gods and daemons are splitting open on the very surface of its land. Upon the continent of Sanctum--a land rocked by decades of civil war--a new nation struggles to find its identity beneath the standard of a man just as much tyrant as saviour. The nobles have been summoned to the Council of Lords in the city of Precipice. Join our quickly growing community of refugees, criminals, heroes, villains, cutthroats and politicians. Step into a world where every character truly matters, as all struggle to survive in this Hollow World.

mud.name: Final Fantasy: Spirits' Legacy
mud.desc: Welcome to a MUSH where the fantasy never dies... the Final Fantasy, that is! Set in an all-new world hundreds of years beyong the end of the series, Final Fantasy: Spirits' Legacy offers a whole new take on the Final Fantasy theme.
New political entities fight it out with old ones. Join forces with the Summoners' Guild, the Neo-Magitek Empire, the Machine Faction, Church of Yevon, or even the rebelious Red Rock Revolution!

Log on as a guest and see what we are all about. Since the Final Fantasy series offers races in all kinds of shapes and sizes, furry characters are more than welcome to join and explore the world as only furries can!

mud.name: Edge of Creation
mud.desc: The Edge of Creation is a Smaug based MUD with a unique history and a large number of original areas, including the main city of the land and the newbie academy and training guilds. We have an extensive range of races and classes of all alignments, with guilds for each class and orders for players to join. There are 100 player levels, and we offer a choice between single classing and specialized subclasses at level 20 or multiclassing with up to three classes. We are very newbie friendly, but offer much for experienced players, as well. The Immortal Staff is friendly and are always open to questions and suggestions. Roleplaying is encouraged and rewarded.

The Edge is a very newbie friendly place, but we also offer much for experienced players. Questmasters to send players on specialized quests across the lands, and with over 700+ skills and spells no two characters are alike.
The IMMS are friendly and are always open to questions and suggestions.
Log on and check us out!
We would love to have you visit us and hope you can find a MUD home with us.

mud.name: New Worlds
mud.desc: New Worlds Ateraan is a full featured Intensive Roleplaying Game. Offering several unique and powerful guilds, races, politics, religion, justice, economy, and a storyline that is dominately player controlled with a history and background based on a novel for more robust roleplay direction.

The Guilds range from your standard Fighter and Mage to the strange Retter and unique Merchant which is widely accepted as an enhanced roleplaying Guild with exciting features like guard hiring caravans, ship building and repair, clan building, house builing, auction houses, theater control, and reparations of weapons and armour.

Religion is a topic of large debate and conflict, but definately not the only one. With racial cities and two distinct nations of varying loyalty and politics, Ateraan abounds in opportunities for the new immigrant and the long time established player. Social standing can be as important as strength of arms and starting in New Worlds is simple and direct with staff members, guides and experience players to assist you.

Murder and intrique can find you in dark alleys or on a highway, or you can seek gold and fame with groups ranging in size to solo or twenty or more adventurers raiding a stronghold, or you can relax on an open beach while fishing, digging for clams, finding crabs, or swimming in shark infested waters.

The diversity of roleplay and adventure in New Worlds is astounding as you will find yourself aligned with a faith or clan, race or guild, or on a romantic get away to an inn or resturaunt with intelligent servers, or perhaps smoking gnome pipes while watching a theatrical performance in a fully operational and player run grand theater. And the serious roleplay only matches the hundreds of weapons, armours, creaturs, artifacts, and items of power.

A newest feature is the massive shipyards that boast several unique styles of ships from the tiny two man dingy to the sleek and fast cutter, to the huge fifteen crew and multiple room yacht, to the fortress of the sea war galleon that boasts over nine distinct and seperate weapons.

Our ships and seas offer exciting quests, deep sea fishing, cargo caravan runs from various ports, pirate hoves and enemy ships, the ability to board and sink opposing ships, go on whaling runs, and battle other players at sea, even to the point of massive armada combat.

All we ask of our roleplay focused playerbase is that you remain in character while in the game. While there are out of character areas, the game thrives and demands strict roleplaying, giving New Worlds the magic of a well written, yet unscripted story.

What most have said about New Worlds, \"Play it for a week, and show your style of roleplay, and we guarantee you will find a home here.\" We have a player base that is 50/50 ratio of men and women, and a wide age range, so all will find their nitch.
Check it out, you won't be disappointed. We encourage you to visit the website to see the features of this game.

mud.name: DoomMUD 3
mud.desc: DoomMUD has returned once again. We are very excited about the many changes we have brought to the game. We have retained the old multiclassing system however we have added a few twists, including a detailed remort system with over 10 remort only classes to choose from. Aswell we have designed a unique trade system, choose to become an armorsmith, a weaponsmith or even an alchemist. Use your knowledge to raid keeps, gaining the ability to take control of a keep for your clan. We have implemented a huge clan system which includes many titled ranks for members, huge clan compounds, clan treasuries and many other unique features. The newest change that we are very excited about is our own unique mobile trigger system which has been implemented alongside an 'active quest' system. Take part in huge quest arcs that make it seem as though the creatures are interacting with you just as much as you are with them.
Whether you are an old veteran or a new player to DoomMUD, come out and have a good time, we are always looking for new faces.

mud.name: Jungle Mud
mud.desc: The Jungle Mud is a revived ROM2.4, heavily modified and under new ownership.

The Jungle Mud is made up of animal races and species. Players level from 1-100, then have the option to remort (become reincarnated) into a different species. New species become available as the amount of times you remort increases and there are also benefits available to specific species. There is a full staff with help files galore; very newbie friendly!
What you will get! ------------------
a.) Help Files b.) Originality c.) Full Staff d.) Friendly Environment
What could be better then that?

mud.name: Showdown
mud.desc: Would you like to drop into a bull stance and smash a chair over your opponents head? How about lurking in the shadows, injecting morphine into your bloodstream to repair your damaged limbs? It is all possible in this unique setting. We have seven classes available to choose from, each with unique characteristics. There are guns, bombs, implants that are programmable, stances, and many more additions. Showdown emphasizes multi-playing, allowing and encouraging you to have three characters online at once. The world has been custom built using themes from movies, television, and original ideas from our group of builders. The staff and players are willing to help, so come give us a try. You won't be sorry!!
Showdown Mud mudhost.com 4445
Keeper

mud.name: The Eternal Forest
mud.desc: (The Eternal Forest is a derivative of The Forest's Edge base)

The world of the Eternal Forest stems from the depths of fantasy, a world in which conjurers and con artists mingle with warmongers and holymen. It is a realm where clans battle for superiority...as do individuals who care nothing for the unity the organizations provide.

It is a world of high fantasy, imagery with which everyone is familiar, though the texture of the world is different. New cities, forests, swamps...areas of all kinds wait to be explored by the brave and to claim the lives of the cowardly.
Come and explore this brave, new world...join those who have already survived the seasons of The Eternal Forest.
Special Features Include:
* Hierarchy based skill system where skills improve with use.
* Areas - We have including old favorites and new additions.
* Large range of areas new and old for all levels and classes.
* Areas that are suitable for either grouping or solo.
* Settable aliases.
* Automated auction.
* Body-part based combat system.
* All items/pets save and there is no rent.
* Introduction/Befriend Commands with no limits.
* Mail System.
* Reagent based magic system with spells that can be leeched.
* Shops can customize items given the correct ingredients.
* Hierarchy based skill system where skills improve with use.
* Multiple items treated correctly, i.e. 2*loaf = two loaves of bread.
* Races which make a difference - trolls can eat corpses, etc.
* Expanded bank account limits which can store gold as well as equipment.
* Socials that vary from race to race.
* Skinnable player corpses.
* Optional classes for remorting purposes.
* Channels have a scrollback ability so you can see what you may have missed.
* Objects appear differently before/after identification. A bluish brown cloak becomes a cloak of The Eternal Forest +2.
* Complex internal scripting language allowing levers that open gates, gravesites you can dig, etc.
* Clans and Strongholds in which to enhance your gameplay.

mud.name: Shadowrun - Denver
mud.desc: Denver is now THE most popular Shadowrun MUSH on the Internet. A quick thanks to all the players who are making this possible is in order.

Shadowrun - Denver is oriented towards players who have had some experience in RPing in Shadowrun, whether online or in TT play. It has a very friendly, open atmosphere between players and staff, and is intended for people to have fun, not model a 'realistic' Shadowrun world. To apply, connect to the MUSH, read the application policy, and follow the instructions there.

Our chargen has often been said to have the best code of any of the Shadowrun MUSHs. You can create anything from a gun-toting Street Samurai to a Rogue Doctor plying the shadows to help who he can and make a profit. We are currently using SR3, Magic in the Shadows, the Cannon Companion, Man and Machine, the Matrix, some portions of Rigger 3, and State of the Art. All character types are welcome, with no slot restrictions.

For more information, why not visit our Web site? The document system has been fully integrated into our home page - you can view the +news and +help online without even logging in! You can also use the Java based MUSH client on our page to log in to the MUSH from any computer connected to the 'net.

mud.name: Star Dart Alpha
mud.codebase: [Unknown] Derived from the Star Dart codebase by Fred Haslam
mud.desc: Star Dart alpha is an engrossing Java-based combat mud, where your only quest is to surpass the other players and achieve galactic domination.

Star Dart alpha became stable in January 2002, and new features are still being added on a daily basis. We encourage players to interact with the development team in-game and in our forums, and this interaction is frequently the basis of upgrades to the game.

Unique to Star Dart alpha is the concept of a periodic reset of the universe; depending on the arena, the universe may revert to it's unaltered original form at some interval between a few hours and a week, depending on how the admins have set up the arena. This way players can chose their their level of committment to the game (since playing Star Dart alpha is generally an intense experience).

mud.name: Bajor3D
mud.desc: Furry space themed MUCK with a trek twist. Features real time 3D flights, multiple empires, and missions. Both IC and OOC play accepted.

mud.name: Narnia MUCK
mud.desc: -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- Welcome to Narnia, the charming mythological realm as created by C.S. Lewis in the 7-book series, _The Chronicles of Narnia_. -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- The year is Narnian 1006, just six Narnian years after the fall of the White Witch from the Lion, The Witch and the Wardrobe. The Sons of Adam and Daughters of Eve sit on the thrones at Cair Paravel, and Narnia is enjoying the beginning of what will later be known as its Golden Age. But all is not completely well. The Witch's evil minions still lurk in the shadows of Narnia and its borderlands, plotting both to avenge their mistress and recover the land they now believe is rightfully theirs. The Royalty has made it their business to eradicate them altogether, but it's difficult. Evils are sneaky. Moreover, the savage Giants of Ettinsmoor are restless, and they're constantly bickering and warring with each other. The fallout of these battles sometimes falls across the borders, so Narnia stands to need to do something about them soon. -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

mud.name: Evolution Rising
mud.desc: *~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~* \"When an individual acquires great power, the use or misuse of that power is everything. Will it be used for the greater good, or will it be used for personal or destructive ends?\" - Professor Charles Xavier

Sharing has never been humanityâ€™s defining attribute. Everyone responds to mutants in a different way and in general their power is feared, but there are those who see that power as a tool. There are no clear lines of good and evil in this world, merely shades of gray.
Some fight for acceptance. Some fight for survival. And some, well, they fight just for the hell of it.
The game takes advantage of the histories established in the X-Men movie universe with the exception of X3. Here, original and familiar faces co-exist on equal footing.
Please see the website for more information! If you connect, feel free to chat with Harley.

mud.name: Tower of High Sorcery Major Mud
mud.desc: The Tower of High Sorcery runs 2 Muds. On the Annex we run Major Mud for WorldGroup with a new addon beginning soon called Mud Revolution which will allow 255 levels and tons more races and classes. We have all the add-ons. We have many players of all levels and look forward to getting more. It is entirely free to play. Telnet login for MajorMud: tohs.dyndns.org:2323 (Port 2323)

The Tower's other mud is DoorMud on the Synchronet BBS server. This has added rooms and created monsters and weapons - We are always adding on to this! We make it unique! Telnet login for Doormud is tohs.dyndns.org (port 23)

mud.name: Allandria
mud.codebase: [Unknown] katmud -- scratch code, but has D&D/Diku stylings
mud.desc: Allandria is a 100% from scratch code base that plays similar to Diku, but offers a number of surprises. The code is largely modeled after D&D 2nd edition rules, and is one of the more faithful conversions (although some fudging was done in terms of what plays well on a MUD). The dungeon is randomly generated like Diablo, and is setup to regenerate anew when the goal of killing the final boss is achieved. More notable features include:

* monsters that group and cooperate in and out of combat * persistant bosses * run time random treasure on monsters that use eq * monsters make full use of spells/magic items * inititive based combat that does not always resolve all in one pass. * true multi classing for non-humans as per AD&D 2E * true dual classing for humans (mostly) as in AD&D 2E
It is a dungeon crawl, but there is fun to be had as one never knows when a monster will load a wand of lightning to claim... if you can survive it trying to kill you with it.

mud.name: Reanimation
mud.desc: Welcome to a MUD where the code around you is constantly trying to improve itself to become one of the best out there. It's setting is fantasy-medieval. We have 91 levels of playing with an incremental experience leveling system. Immortal, Vassago's, and Thri's Quest code. For those who don't know, Vassago's quest code is a go here get this or kill this mob. Thri's quest code is a mob driven code where you do a task for that given mob that has one for you. All area's are original, but still use an easy to follow map layout to make joining here more pleasant and easier to find your way around. Many thanks to my builders for helping to continually grow the world around us. Offers Newbie help when the Immortals are online, and Newbie school is very helpful to new MUDders. We offer a clan system. We offer a unique worshipping system. We have an automapper system. All spells/skills are given upon creation, and are being driven to be more specific by the users choices. Currently Warriors are asked to choose a weapon to specialize in. Later other classes will follow a specialization. Colourful, not a one colour mud. All builders are welcome. Roleplaying is encouraged, but not enforced. For those who always think they have a better way, or a great idea for a mud, I don't just throw them into the wind. All player idea's are seriously thought upon, and if it's within my coding capabilities and I like it, I give it a shot.
Stop in and give us a chance to be called your \"Home\".
Still looking for players to test for bugs, builders to build, and a few more coders.

mud.name: Shattered Gem MUSH
mud.desc: Imagine!
One moment you were minding your own business, killing ShinRa suits when...
Or you were fireballing bandits in the forest with your best buds the Rock Boys and Justice Chick when...
Suddenly, in a flash of light you discover that you’re standing in a field of yellow grass and looming high above is a giant red planet. This sure isn’t Kansas, Toto!

Welcome to Hashura: a land where the future is uncertain, where things from the size of rocks to entire buildings pop into existence from other dimensions, and evil balances the forces of good, but only barely. Feel like playing your favorite character from an anime, book, or game, or maybe even something original, but have nowhere to play them? Then come join us at Shattered Gem where the admin is cute, the players are great writers, and the possibilities are endless!

mud.name: Realm of Shadows
mud.desc: Realm of Shadows was founded in 7-2001 and made its online debut in 2 Feb 2002. Since its arrival to the online scene it has grown and evolved into a unique game play experience set within a world of magic and monsters. What you become is up to you, some people are deadly assassins that do nothing other than wait for unsuspecting victims and then strike. Perhaps you could become a merchant, you would search the realm for unique and powerful items that are randomly generated and then trade or make a profit off them. Some players will become brave mortals who will take on any quest the quest master will give them, and perhaps even some of them will ascend into immortality! The possibilities are endless. Explore thousands of rooms hacking and slashing your way through various creatures to climb to the top of the food chain. Thousands of random items can be found all over the game! After being offline for nearly 5 years, Realm of Shadows has returned to pick up where it left off. Join us today!

Realm of Shadows Features - * Multiclassing (Dual and Triple Classes can be elected) * God based follower system. * 3 types of automated quests. * Random item system. * Progressive experience levels. * Classes with multiple tiers. * 95% original areas. * Newbie friendly. -- (Players are prompted upon creation, will have flag until 10th level) ---- Corpses will pop next to player in death room. ---- Reduced damage in NPC combat. ---- Experience point bonuses. * Stat training. * Rerolling upon creation. ***** MUCH, MUCH MORE!

mud.name: Phantasia Garden MUX
mud.desc: The evils of the Galaxy: Chaos, Garland, Sephiroth, Ultimicia, Sin, and the Empire of Blood, are but a few things that stand in the way of bringing about a galactic utopia. To combat thease evils, SeeD has been re-enstated.

SeeD once formed to combat any sorceress that threatend their planet known as Terra. Now, 1,000 years later, with the Galactic alliance spreading across more planets: Earth, Jenova, Terra, Gaia, Spira, Vana'Del, and Ivallice, they are hard pressed to keep their enemies at bay.

It's been one hundred years since the re opening of SeeD in their new Galactic Garden called 'Phantasia Garden'. and they have been offerd a Contract with the Galaxtic Alliance to spear head the war against the Empire of Blood and their Magi-Tek knights. Will you be a Member of SeeD and fight for the good of the Alliance? Or perhaps a Member of the Magi-tek Knights, who use old, lost machines to bring about their conquest.
MUX is currently Closed, We are looking for Coders and Builders and Game masters who have vast knowledge of Final Fantasy.
Send all inquireies to Legionofblood@gmail.com

mud.name: Dream MUSHeen
mud.desc: Dream MUSHeen is a strictly role-playing game set in the distant future, in the year 2468 to be exact. Life has become impossible on the surface of Earth do to hundreds of years of pollution, from vehicle emissions to nuclear war, that has led to the eroding away of the atmosphere. A couple thousand miles beneath Earth's surface rests a large facility, accessible only by a long elevator chute that has long been collapsed. All that remains of the human species resides here, living out the rest of their days in a dull and very boring existence. Their only release is an ancient machine invented long ago that was deemed too dangerous for use and locked away in this very facility; a machine known as the Dream Machine. A few wires bearing needles inserted along the length of your spine and you're ready to experience the endless dreams the machine can simulate for you. However, this machine was locked away for good reason...

mud.name: Dark City
mud.desc: Dark City is BACK!!
What is Dark City?

Dark City was the follow on to the original GodWars MUD created by KaVir. Whereas GW featured Vampires, Werwolves, Demons and Mages, Dark City only featured two of those classes, Vampires and Werewolves, which were both totally recoded making them more World of Darkness like. Dark City was also the basis for the GodWars Deluxe code release.
Way back in 2000, i was given permission to run Dark City. Our aim then, as it is now was to bring the BEST of Dark City back to life.
