Dark City has a wilderness where you can mine, fish, chop down trees to build houses, lay roads and much much more.
Our Vampires and Werewolves are as close as they can be to WoD Vampires and Werewolves in a PK setting.
If you have played this MUD since 2000, you will find that your player files are still there.
So come on by, and give us a go, and remember just how it was to play the Dark City.
-Tijer 25-MAY-2009

mud.name: Dragonball finally born
mud.desc: DragonBall Finally Born is an evolving MUD based around the DB theme not limited to it. DBFB currently has several races, several planets 13,000 rooms to explore. We have unique skills and transformations for all the races to make them a different experience. Each race has their own recall and planet to call their home. None of the races are the same and they all have their pros and cons.

We have a vast amount of equipment sets and weapons to pick from. All sorts of items can be found from killing MOBs and completing different quests spread around the universe. Some items can be created by blacksmiths or tempered(upgraded) for a price. Also, clans receive badges, scouters and food/drink items that can be bought in their clan shop. To help sort all the items you may have, our inventory system has been broken up into 4 categories for easier viewing.

Each race has unique powerlevel and ki from their bonus and level gains. Some transformations give new skills or upgrade one of your skills to do more damage and knockdown the MOB. Grouping is encouraged when leveling and players who group can receive a group experience bonus. Also, our spar system allows you to focus on either powerlevel or ki when sparring.

DBFB has 12 PK zones with more to come in the future. Bloodlust has been coded in so that players with this flag can PK each other at anytime. Bounties are very popular in DBFB and usually have very good rewards. PKing can cause you to lose some stats if you are killed, so be warned. We also have PK Wars for the top PKers to test their skills.

We currently have over 30 mini quests ranging from basic newbie to hours of grouping to achieve one goal. Solo quests are another type of quest where only one person can complete it and be rewarded from it. Recently a custom Questmaster system was coded in that has 6 difficulties, which puts DBFB's quest total over 50.

Some other unique features in DBFB is our pet system that allows you to train them to fight other pets or to help you in battle. Our scouters have a special set of channels (frequencies) where you can talk in private or with a group of people like your clan. Space travel was recoded to make the travel times more random and allow the players to converse while in the ship.

We have many more projects and zones to come in the future. DBFB is the evolution of the DB theme and will continue evolving as time goes by. So if you would like to see the DBFB of the is a new mud. DBFB is newcome play , come check us out!
Thanks DENSHI and the staff of DBFB

mud.name: Nightmist
mud.desc: Nightmist Online is a Partially Text-based MuD ( Multi-User Dungeon). That is to say, there are many players from around the world at the same time interacting together. You begin by generating your own character, with strengths and weaknesses which are individual to you. You choose your class, and your race. Next you are put into a medieval world, where there are monsters, and players, shops, taverns, guilds, and all sorts of other things. What will you do? Perhaps you will seek out the legendary Gorgon Beast, and bring back some trophy? Or maybe you would prefer to become a thief, hiding and stealing gold off players and monsters. It is your choice, so choose wisely!

The best way to experience this game is for you and some friends to download it, and play together. It can be a little confusing at first, but there is an ingame help section (activated by typing 'help' at any time). Remember, have fun!
The Background of Nightmist is available from www.nightmist.co.uk

mud.name: The Chatting Zone (TCZ)
mud.desc: With a highly international userbase, The Chatting Zone (TCZ) is a popular social mud with the option of exploring the many games and locations built by the userbase as well as creating your own. Many games are available to play, including Scrabble, LORD (RPG), GO, Poker, Boggle, Monopoly, Dominoes, Chess, Connect 4, Yahtzee, Lights Out, Bridge, Cribbage, Jeopardy and many, many more. Regular tournaments are held! A heavily used Bulletin Board System with many topics of discussion. The ability to create your own rooms/locations/games with the easy-to-learn/easy-to-master custom coding language. A 24-hour mud with a friendly and helpful admin team who are here to guide you through the first steps of being a newbie in a new world. Get chatting - Get on TCZ!

mud.name: The Ministry
mud.desc: Monolithic skyscrapers. Bizarre, praeterhuman sculpture. Miles of city streets, crammed with shops and galleries, oddities and objects d'horreur. A secret sleeping beneath the city, slumbering but growing ever more hungry for light and life. A city lost in time and space, surrounded by an endless black desert under a blood-red sky.

mud.name: Dragonball Reality
mud.desc: Dragonball Reality is a fairly new mud. The Mud just opened recently and we are in need of some staff. Builders, a Coder and Rp Admins are needed.

The mud has opened for player testing and will soon be open to all. Roleplay is encouraged and we hope to find some good rp'ers. The mud has all areas currently on the saga2.5 codebase, though the CoU battle system is messed.
Qwests will be offered and they will be held often. Mostly qwests will be held when a fair amount of players are present. Tag, Drunk race and lotto are just a few.
More areas are getting built, so ya never know what to expect.
We work with what we have. So if ya wanna give us a try, Check us out.

mud.name: Blood Fire Death
mud.desc: A casually created game with a friendly atmosphere. We provide nations in place of races, adventure over grind. Reputation system, player crafting system. We would love to welcome new creators and players alike.

mud.name: Le Jardin Mystique
mud.desc: * WARNING: Adult Content *

Le Jardin Mystique is an ADULTS ONLY BDSM MUCK, a forum for roleplay and exploration socially and sexually. We believe in education regarding Safe, Sane, and Consensual BDSM, and personal research in that area is encouraged. Based in a world of enchantment, magic, and fantasy, we welcome all forms, furry, humanoid, or otherwise, we are roughly 50% furry and 50% otherwise. All users must be over the age of 18 and @pcreates are based either on an email sent to request@lejardin.org with a character name and a valid email address or by contacting a Wizard online. No requests from freemail addresses will be accepted.

While the theme is based on BDSM, that is, Bondage and Discipline, Dominance and submission, and Sadism and Masochism, roleplay of all sorts is encouraged and areas to evoke roleplay will develop and grow as the world does. We have no quota system for building and plenty of room for expansion and new ideas, all new public areas must pass an inspection by the building staff.
Currently we are open to new players, builders, and coders to fill our world with excitement, roleplay, and adventure.

mud.name: Ugas Daos
mud.desc: Ugas Daos is a web-based mud, no telnet client is needed or required. It currently supports 11 Races and 10 different Classes. Each class has it's own skill set, and each race has it's own advantages and/or quirks. You can customize your character look also, including uploading your own character picture. The game is somewhat based of AD&D 2nd Edition rules, including stats, training, and skills.
The world is growing everyday, and with starting locations based on race, the game is it's own world, that has a life of it's own.

mud.name: Ragnarok
mud.desc: RagnarÃ¶k is a growing realm set to a nordic/medieval/fantasy theme. The driver is a heavily modified and enhanced LPmud. (Or at least, it was â€œadvancedâ€ many years ago... there are plans afoot to upgrade the driver code in the near future.)

We have a decidedly silly and frivolous atmosphere and a â€œdo-it-yourselfâ€ spirit. Our main focus is quality over quantity. You can look at almost everything here, and youâ€™re encouraged to slow down, relax, enjoy the scenery and the small, cozy atmosphere. Silliness is always afoot in RagnarÃ¶k!

The players and wizards here are a fun and friendly group, and we mean to keep it that way. You donâ€™t have to â€œconformâ€, but you do have to exercise good judgement. We wonâ€™t tolerate abusive or offensive players who clearly donâ€™t appreciate our goals and ideals. RagnarÃ¶k is a place where you check your â€œreal lifeâ€ at the door and come to a comfortable environment to be with friends.

mud.name: Zaugin Wars
mud.desc: This is a great mud for Pkiller experts and we have many classes to give our players, please try it out and enjoy your time AND DO NOT TRUST ANYONE .... /Bloody
Well enjoy it thats the main reason to play..
Let ty soul be ever dark and ty blade ever sharp. /KaVir

mud.name: Imperian: The Sundered Heavens
mud.desc: The three moons of Aetherius, constantly shifting and changing the planet beneath them. Their shifting influence and unpredictable influence over the land has brought new life, change and terror to the land. Magick washes across Imperian in waves, new races and mortal powers have been born, and demons walk the earth. Only the quick witted and strong will survive.

Imperian is a professionally-developed and run MUD that offers thousands of rooms to explore, hundreds of unique skills, quests, player on player combat, player-run cities, clans, councils and guilds. We have tons of quests, unique player items and houses. Because of our full-time staff, we develop at an incredibly quick pace. There is often a new area introduced weekly.

mud.name: Intrigue
mud.desc: Intrigue Mux is an original, historical-influenced fantasy mux. It is a world of political, economic and social intrigue. The main part of the game is set in Adonica, Cambria and Bavell'sisstk, Niershindal. With the heavy weight of world economics and racial peace upon the shoulders of politicians and traders, it is a world filled with wonder and betrayal.

There is much to be had within Adonica. The capital is filled with trade, low-level politics, the budding Academy, law enforcement, the criminal insane, and the gossip of the unfaithful. The intense trade and travel between Adonica and the open-minded Bavell'sisstk bring much to light. The opening Elven travel, the intense interference from the Dragon Halfs, and the strife between trade vs. raiding with the Badlands creates an interactive and boiling world. One should also not forget the exotic flavor of jousting, rare races, and magic.
The World of Intrigue is a rich, highly developed world and theme. One meant to breathe life to the imagination and adept to the players within. So come all and one! To the World of Intrigue!

mud.name: Shadows of Isildur
mud.desc: It is the 25th Century of the Third Age. Based several hundred years before the War of the Rings, just before Rohan existed as a nation, when Sauron was still an old legend and the Witch King was returned to Minas Morgul nursing the wound Boromir I delivered when Osgiliath was attacked and ruined in 2474 of the Third Age. Our world has been lovingly crafted, and our playerbase is active and of extremely high calibre. Download a MUD Client or use telnet and come join us today.

Online and serving the community since early 2002, Shadows of Isildur is a roleplay-intensive, completely free and non-commercial Tolkien- based MUD. We have created a vast, breathtakingly beautiful and stunningly detailed rendition of Tolkien's masterpiece.

Shadows of Isildur in 2010 brings: - All play focused on the battle for North Ithilien - All players on a single map - Power: face the mighty forces of Middle Earth! - Bases for capturing and holding - Mordor opens to orcs, Haradrim and Balchoth - Trade and Caravans: ambush and stop the supplies - Major combat improvements - Wiki expanded and improved even more - Web-based browser submissions - Politics, Spies, Power, Money, Corruption and War

mud.name: Eye of the World MUD
mud.desc: Picture yourself immersed in the world of Robert Jordan's Wheel of Time, surrounded by everything you loved so much in the books. Haven't read the books? Don't worry, you can have a great time without them!

Venture out into the 30,000+ rooms of the world as a Darkfriend or as one who walks in the Light, slaying your foes through outright combat, stealthy assassination, deadly poison, or powerful channeling. If it is other adventurers you choose to hunt, you risk the complex country-based and noble-controlled law system and its fines and executions! Or, choose the available pk flag option to force enemy adventurers to challenge you to combat. If you wish, choose to not be involved in playerkilling at all. It is completely up to you.

Enjoy the flexibility of choosing whether to join our active group of roleplayers, and whether to associate with other people who share your interests, or be a lone wolf, spurning all. Rise up to become a noble, controlling one of the kingdoms of Randland, or choose to be a commoner. You might plot the overthrow of a hated kingdom...or to be a Blademaster in its service...

We have an elegantly coded MUD, employing professional coders with 50+ combined years of MUD coding experience. After six years of active improvement, we provide a very rich and mature play experience that is being improved on a daily basis to enhance your experience of WoT.

Two of our most popular attractions are the extensive combat system and the unique channeling (magic) system. The combat system is not boring, with combat messages indicating location of hits, parries, blocks, and utilizing various weapon skills. The channeling system is unique and original, designed to be as close to Jordan's One Power as possible while still being fun and playable. Other features include room-to-room ranged combat, a first-class mount system, multiple races, thematic and realistic professions, wolfbrothers, in-game AND web-based help files, balanced player interactions, and a thriving economy.
Come on by, give us a try, and get ready to fall in love!

mud.name: Tales of the Order
mud.desc: Tales of the Order is a free-form roleplaying game that is just getting ready to open up. The code base is finished and the initial area is built and we plan to have a big opening night of RP soon but in the meantime we're open for players to log in, look around, create their characters and get their feet wet with a little pre-opening RP.

The game takes place in a fictional world where magic is real and humans have come a long way since the dark ages following the Human-Fae war over a thousand years ago. In an era similar to the late Renaissance period, the storyline follows a new group of students entering the Academy of Magic, an institution of higher learning located in the nation of Ryland.

More detail can be found on the web page, including a \"Getting Started Guide\" that will get you right to the information you need to get a feel for the game, the world it takes place in and getting setup to play.

mud.name: YaoiMuffin MUSH
mud.desc: WARNING: Adult-Themed Mud ----------------------------

A semi-isolated coastal village with a nearly-all-male population -- half of which crossdresses! A catboy who pilots a giant robot but is too lazy to do much in the way of asserting his dominion! An Improbability Generator which ensures that nearly everyone who comes to the island is a hot yaoi-guy, left in place by a long-absent team of mad-scientist yaoi fangirls! A BDSM-esque system of slavery! The word 'muffin' is thrown about indiscriminately! And, of course, there's plenty of seme-on-uke naughty gay fun!

... What, you don't like that kind of thing in your shounen-ai/anime/ manga RP? That's okay, we encourage players to ignore the theme in the name of having whatever fun they want! (As long as they're all boys.)

Since we're barely just created, there's not much on the grid yet, so we'd like players who are interested in contributing! A nice (i.e. not overwhelmingly small) ratio of semes to ukes would also be good, too!

mud.name: GemStone IV
mud.desc: GemStone III (www.gemstone.net), the biggest multiplayer text-based game ever, has been enjoyed by hundreds of thousands of players since 1989, and gets better every day! Explore up to 30,000 unique rooms, enjoy custom items and character appearances, hundreds of intelligent creatures to hunt and interact with, unique spells, festivals, roleplaying events, and constant improvements and expansions.
Visit the documenation section on our website for detailed info on our races, professions, organizations, in-depth history, items and more. http://www.play.net/gs3/info/index_of_docs.asp.

With a staff of over 100 professional GameMasters working day and night, GemStone III is continually improving and expanding to meet your needs and wishes. Over 1000 players during prime hours share the fun every day - sign up for a FREE TRIAL and join the adventure! Or contact melissam@simutronics.com directly if you would like a free trial without the hassle of providing a credit card.

mud.name: Mediterranean Nights
mud.desc: Come join the rich the famous and the dead in the old city of Monaco. Set below a fictional French countryside, lies the very busy and hectic city of Monaco. Stone buildlings with red tiled roofs line the streets with the occasional old world villa looming over older, short stone buildings. The city is a tourist attraction and the playground of the very wealthy, but what lurks behind an old stone alley, or hides in the cliffs looking over the Mediterranean Sea? Do you dare to look?

mud.name: Chihuahua Mud
mud.desc: This game is set in a modern world in which rulers rule the entire world and you can make stop the current ruler from ruling the area and make a new ruler rule the area. Also we will be putting more features in the game like beeing able to drive and fly and lots more.

mud.name: Nigrimancy: Sepulchre of the Damned
mud.desc: The original mud concept began in 1997 between two friends however over the years, the mud code has changed and even been lost at one time.

Today, the mud has a stable home without fear of ever being lost again but as the years have gone on, going much further than a concept has been hard.A few years ago I decided to revive the concept and have worked on it over time designing concepts for the game.
Today I am in need of Coders / Programmers who are willing to at least take a look at the plans for the mud code, to help redefine the base of the mud.
If you are in interested coder who wants to learn more about the mud and willing to rewrite a good amount of code, to help re-invent the mud, then please, by all means do so.

This mud is in Late Alpha - Early Beta. Please understand the mud has frequent downtime but the Forums are always open to people who wish to post about the mud out of game at http://nigrimancy.com/forums/

mud.name: Project Twilight
mud.desc: Come see an innovative rendition of White Wolf Studio's World of Darkness setting. Role play is a major part of life in the city, and our world is ready to include grandiose schemes and personal narratives in ways that will shape the world. Project Twilight is a player moderated role playing environment.

Currently Project Twilight has: Completely original areas and expanded area format, adapted Ivan's OLC, Storyteller utilities, Setting and systems true to White Wolf's games, Employment, Elections, Combo based combat system, and Support for Vampire: The Masquerade, Werewolf: The Apocalypse.
Features in development: Mob AI, Vehicles, Support for Changeling: The Dreaming, Mage: The Ascension, Wraith: The Oblivion.

mud.name: Echoes of Albion
mud.desc: Our game takes place in Great Britain, in a time when the wild things that lurked in the woods were powerful enough to fight against the Roman Empireâ€™s fiercest Legions, and the mysticism that centuries of generations later would look at with awe, was still a normal part of life. Simple lives are led, still, though the introduction of enemies has begun the inevitable change that all things eventually undergo.

Celtic Britain has been the source of unusual magicks for centuries, the presence of the ancient Sidhe able to be felt all around. Tribe and family are oneâ€™s priority, and Rome his enemy. Love is deep, death is simply another door to be passed through, and honor is everything. Into this world steps the Roman Empire, with its organization, its blazing ideals and its unshakable conviction, governed by an Emperor whoâ€™s arm stretches across the known world.

This world is heavily inspired by history, both in culture and in timeline, but it is important to understand that there are differences. Romeâ€™s victory is not yet assured, nor are things necessarily as they seem. The mythic is real, and the â€˜realâ€™ is possibly not such at all. There are differences between the peoples portrayed within the context of the game, and their real-life counterparts. While, as a team decision, we have chosen to stick closely to what research provides, some differences will be noted by those who study up extensively on the setting. We encourage you to browse our web site, forums, wiki and explore the game itself, to unravel the rich cultures detailed here: Although places like Wikipedia are filled to the brim with knowledge, brevity and playability necessitate that not all that WAS, in real life, IS, within our game.

We are out of alpha testing now and are currently in our open, playable Beta. The game world is ever evolving and our code is being updated by our skilled team of coders as we work to make sure the game adapts to the needs and demands of our players.

mud.name: Fires of Kaos
mud.desc: Raised from the ashes of the once popular KAOS HQ and beyond the realms of the land, was created Fires of Kaos. A role-playing fantasy game where strong violence and absurd interaction is socially acceptable.
The newly formed mud has the experience of several immortals who have built, maintained and assisted in other worlds existence.

With approximately 145 areas, 8 character classes, spells, special skills, and inventive functions, the mud has offers a robust game experience for anyone. Game features also include mud mail, purchasing of personal houses, and future plans of detailed permenent quests (for high level adventurers only)

Fight the evils of the world, or become evil yourself and fight the goodies of the realm, or just fight anyone. There is no punishment for killing mobiles, bravery has its rewards. FOK also has a no-nuke policy. Lots of fun for anyone!
Similar Muds : Renegate Outpost, Kaos HQ, The Land, WinterMute, Forbidden Lands, Temporal Rifts, and Joynt, and other DIKU based worlds.

mud.name: Twisted Kingdoms
mud.desc: The Mist surrounds us. It pervades us, flows through us, and gives us life. It would surely be our God, if it hadn't provided us with Gods of our own. And even the Gods fear the will of the Mist.

Are we real? The Nostrites say that we dreamed the Mist, and that—so given form—the Mist in turn dreamed us. They say that—someday—the Mist will wake up, and then it will devour us all, man, God, and beast. Some say that it has already begun.
Of this alone can we be sure, that we are geist given flesh and purpose. We live, and die, on the tides of the Mist. It is our life, our home, and our fall.
Twisted Kingdoms Dream it. Be it.

mud.name: Star Conquest
mud.desc: Humanity has just emerged from the lowest point in its collective history, and the closest it has been to extinction since the advent of agriculture. By the year 2304, the Coalition of humans and their alien allies the Jinu had spread across the stars, and thought themselves powerful. But the Outsiders, an alien empire occupying vast reaches of Rimward space, proved them wrong. First, contact between the two allies was severed, and suddenly humanity was alone. Then the Outsiders attacked in force, and human planets and governments fell one by one.
It was the apocalypse.

But contrary to the beliefs of many, not all hope was lost. After five years, a single starship, the Percival Lowell, returned from Rimward space, bringing with it the means to nullify the Outsiders' greatest weapon. With this, and the help of many other brave pilots, the occupying Outsiders were driven off human worlds and back to where they came from.

Humanity is now trying to rebuild, and trying to regain what it has lost. The Outsiders are finished with occupation, and now desire only to see humans extinct. New threats and new mysteries seem to appear every day. In the midst of it all, civilian starships span the stars, maintaining an open threat against any new invasion and trying to make a few credits while they're at it.

You too have felt the lure of this; the desire for a unique freedom that most citizens will never know, the drive to explore, the need to defend your species, and yes, greed for the vast wealth that is to be had.
It is time to take to the stars.

mud.name: San Diego
mud.desc: Santa Anas blow dust from the desert over the mountains, hazing the sky brown; on a clear day, dust devils swirl down F St. behind buses and cars. The curved Bay Bridge shimmer like a ring on the finger of the harbor and in the distance, a tugboat guides a naval destroyer out to sea. Across the bridge, vacationers and college students dot the white beaches of Coronado, swimming and tanning. The 5 slashes the city in half like a grey scar. At the border, the freeway widens like a dammed river and the cars glitter in the sun; further south, Mexico is a realm of dust and rock. North of the city, curved roads wind through thick trees up steep hills and massive mansions crown high cliffs overlooking the rushing sea.
San Diego in the afternoon.

Walk the city at night. Pass the Mexican whores and the guy who wants to park your car for five bucks, even though you're not driving. Pass the La Jolla trophy wives who snipe their best friends with vicious gossip while smiling supermodel smiles. Pass the punk kids and the surfers smoking dope on the grass by Mission Bay.

Then leave them behind, and slip into the Dream of San Diego as it was and will be: a dangerous and dusty border town, a coldly elegant city of promise, a crash of skewed buildings and wandering streets, a tangle of gears and copper pipes and half-exploded gadgets.
But wait. There's more....

After an extensive beta-testing period, San Diego opened to the public on December 3. We're trying an innovative approach to many game systems, particularly abilities and XP spends; come check us out!

mud.name: The Oriental Dojo
mud.desc: The Oriental Dojo is a fast paced PvP game with an Asian martial arts theme. It used the bMUD engine, a custom mud engine written entirely in Ruby. We are currently in the early stages of production and are aiming to be test ready as soon as we can. Game Features: ** Classless and level less skill system ** Co-ordinate based map system ** Unique combat system ** Unique quest system ** Unique mobile spawn system ** Generated mobiles and items ** Regular events

mud.name: Gundam Wing: Operation Meteor
mud.desc: In the year After Colony 196, Zechs Marquise was succesful in dropping the Battleship: Libra onto Earth, and thereby turned the Earth into a baren wasteland. However, White Fang's reign over space was short lived, as the remnants of the Earth Sphere Unified Nation reformed on M02 and independant colonies to oppose them. Oz also reformed, seeming to oppose any order which was not there own. The Maganac Core split off from the ESUN and created there own elite group of mercinaries. Later on, the refugees from the destroyed Earth took to Mars in a massive terraforming project which brought about the creation of New Earth. Some of the cities from the old earth have been reconstructed there, and most of the old earths population have fled to it. Those remaining on the old earth fell into different clans, and wage war for pitiful reasons on one another. And as for the Gundam Pilots, they all dissapeared into different parts of the galaxy, humiliated and beaten, never wanting to show themselves again. The fate of the galaxy is in your hands, what will you do with the fate of mankind?

This MUD is oriented around the anime series of Gundam Wing. We offer clans, a high level for training, a PK system which even works while in suits. Customizable suits, a targettable suit system. Many mini games, gambling. A building port for anyone who wants to build for the MUD, and much MUCH more. More will be added as time goes on, seeing as how we have plenty of ideas.

mud.name: HyperMUX
mud.desc: The newly revamped HyperMux is again open for buisness! We offer players a exceptionally large and detailed grid. Which includes the cities of Metropolis, Manhattan, and Gotham City, as well as various other smaller locales. While we are set in the canon DC Universe we allow many characters from other serious comic book companies to apply via the DC Hypertime concept. Marvel Comics characters may app as year one characters just starting their heroic careers alongside the various established DC Legends. Many Feature Characters are still available to be apped, and we welcome original concepts as well without any bias.

HyperMux is just getting started and is still growing, allowing new uncharted vistas for players to RP in and explore all the time. Come by and ask some questions, read our extensive newsfiles, make a character, and bring to life a legend of your own to stand shoulder to shoulder with the likes of Superman, The Batman, or Wonder Woman at HyperMux, the Infinite Possabilities!

mud.name: Sovereign Dawn
mud.desc: ** Opening promotion! ** All new characters will receive 15% higher experience gains on an upgradable item - for free! This item is normally only available to heroes for a small fortune in game!

** Opening promotion! ** All players reaching max level will receive five max-level pieces of gear for free to help them on the right foot! In addition, the first hero of every class will receive a commemorative statue in town!
Ever wanted something fresh? A new dawn? Something you could walk in and feel just like you were at home? Sovereign Dawn features an extraordinary world that's EASY to get involved in and learn.
Tired of visiting muds where you're expected to read through 480 helpfiles, news, and changes and memorize the 12 page list of rules before you're able to play?
So were we.
Tired of unbalanced gameplay, boring grinds, non-challenging PVE content, and an apathetic PVP system?
So were we.
Tired of immortal drama, corruption, over-bearing administrators, and never-ending political tug-of-war in the higher ranks?
So were we.

When we set out to create Sovereign Dawn, we wanted something new. We're using a tried-and-true codebase that has been modified over 14 years from ROM 2.4 classic, but still holds true to the fundamentals that cause you to play ROM. Our sleek character creation system gets you in the game and playing - fast. No need to read the TOME of information before you start playing - we know you'll read things when you get around to it.
Get in, get playing, have fun.

Featuring 8 amazingly unique classes, 2 remorts, 15 races and an amazing amount of PVE content, we're a brand new mud without the brand new lack of content. Top our in-game highscores boards, found your clan, and bring yourself to legendary status within our fun and exciting game world.
See you there!

mud.name: La Tierra de Nadie
mud.desc: El nuevo mud de ReinoRol.com totalmente nuevas las areas, haci como las clases y algunas razas, el mud La Tierra de Nadie esta totalmente diponible para la creacion de agrupaciones de jugadores con distintos sistemas de gobierno los cuales llegan desde una dictadura a un cenado y mas.

Este mud es muy nuevo y solo esta a prueba haci que aprovechenlo para que se quede online ademas pues claro de participar el la web, reinorol.com y foro.reinorol.com para mas informacion visita estas direcciones.

mud.name: textMUD
mud.desc: This is a unique MUD written from stratch! Currently in Alpha testing. You can expect from this MUD. We will have many races to choose from, each with thier own advantages and disadvantages! Some classes currently are: Paladin, Rogue, Monk, Ranger, Berserker, Cleric,Warlock, and Wizard. We also have many race ideas still in the concept phase.

mud.name: Hell's Kitchen: The Revivel
mud.desc: Hell's Kitchen is now on their 4 year of being online. We are please to welcome you to our mud. The mud is based off of Jobo's Dystopia 1.2.7 & SaGe's LoW4, but all in all its a Godwars. We are currently working on revamping alot of the mud. We also have a good and loyal Pbase. As well as the mindless pricks people love to hate.
Currently we have the following classes: * Angel, Demon, Dragon, Drow, Undeadknight, * Tanar'ri, Monk, Ninja, Samurai, Vampire, * Werewolf, Shapeshifter, Cyborg, Wizard, Jedi, & Sith.
There are some new classes are in the making.

Here is a list of things we have added to the code: * Custom Kingdom Code (with ranks & alliances) * Legends(LoW4 * Status based pking and powers.(LoW4) * Unique Eq that randomly drops off mobs.(Custom) * True Arena, Death Arena, and a Regular Arena.(Custom)
A dedicated team of Implementors, Admin, and Owners do their best to make this a nice place to spend your time, and to keep the mud running as well as possible.
We hope you'll find the mud an enjoyable place to spend time, and welcome you to our mud.
The Hell's Kitchen staff

mud.name: AFTERMATH 2054
mud.desc: AFTERMATH

Soviets detonate a set of 4 large nuclear warheads in a pattern 100,000 feet above the US, causing a massive electromagnetic pulse that cripples computers, electronics, and car ignitions across the country.
Immediately after, NORAD detects a series of Soviet satellites deploying warheads. In thirty-six minutes, the war is over, with Europe and North America suffering from nuclear strikes.

The series of warheads detonated with a combined force of 20 megatons of TNT. The explosion rips through NYC, flooding the subways with seawater and igniting Brooklyn. Making your way through the wreckage, when it is safe to escape, you face a new life in the Wastes.

Many cities are razed by the nuclear attack. The dusting of the Midwest and Central Plains by radioactive materials causes a famine that kills additional millions of people. Even after these catastrophes, a constant danger of radiation is present even for those far away from the blasts.

As well as the human cost, the war left its mark on the economy and politics of the country. Due to the EMP burst, virtually all bank accounts, transactions, and other electronic assets simply vanish. Because of this, money undergoes a rapid deflation, with the cost of buying a home reduced to 800 gold dollars. In addition, electronic machinery and devices are rendered useless, which further limits the economy. Geopolitics as a whole has become an abandoned concept considering the cause of the War.

mud.name: Rhynian Front
mud.desc: Rhynian Front is a warfare MUD based on the Ground Zero codebase. It was made to provide an exciting experience, with players constantly running around and fragging eachother. It is currently under development, but plans have been made to add squad(clan) based warfare, capture the flag, and more game modes. Right now it's almost a carbon copy of the original Ground Zero, which is fun in its own right. The original Ground Zero featured things like droids you can assemble to fight for you, tanks you can man with two other friends to slaughter your enemies, and a myriad of explosives.

mud.name: Angelic Layer MUSH
mud.desc: Present day. Present time! ^_^; ...okay, well, last year, to be honest.
Enjoy our super-secret recipe!

* First - Eriol Gakuen, Tokyo. A school that has seen it all - Pocky, Shibuya fashion, handheld games, tamagochi, pocket monsters, you name it! * Second - Students of all grades from kindergarten to high school. Clubs, dances, fairs... and (gasp!) homework. ^_^;; * Third - A ball of chocolate fudge sundae. * Fourth - One modern megapolis. * Fifth - A cup of green tea. * Sixth - A 333-meter tall TV tower. * Seventh - The latest high tech game, so great that it makes grown engineers weep with joy!
Mix well. Shake. Sprinkle liberally with secrets and mysteries.
Serve exuberantly.
It is never too late to have a happy childhood!

mud.name: Warlock
mud.desc: Warlock was created in April 1997, but since then it evolwed into totaly new Warlock.

Many of wizards have retired, many new came... And then, after years of testing, we opened in august 2003. World has two domains: Orchia and Arda. Orchia is based on polish RPG 'Krysztaly Czasu', and Arda is based on J.R.R. Tolkien's 'Lord of the Rings'.
There are some common races: Dwarf, Elf, Halfling, Ork, Reptile, Goblin, Human, Gnome, and one new, Kmaran, which is half-human, half-cat.
We offer player crafting system, horses, spellcasting, multiple guilds...
This mud is totaly polish (and it's still being polished...), so zapraszam wszystkich znajacych ten jezyk i chcacych sie dobrze pobawic.
Garagoth, Warlock Admin and Lord of Orchia.

mud.name: Star Wars: Uprising
mud.desc: \"A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away....\" The events and players are very familiar, yet, things have changed.

The galaxy had become an even darker place than during the rise of the Empire. Treacherously, Luke Skywalker fell to the Dark Side and joined his father, earning himself the title of Darth Fatalis. Together, this pair of villains not only destroyed the Rebel Alliance, but ended the reign of Emperor Palpatine as they banded together to kill him. This last fact was hidden from the Imperial troops and the Galaxy at large, until, the Hand of the Emperor, Mara Jade, brought the truth to life.

In a shocking turn of events, the Empire was split into two factions. A new Galactic Civil War emerged, but this time, not as a battle of Good versus Evil, but something more sinister. However, Darth Sidious was prepared for the Skywalkers' treachery. Using Mara Jade's body, the Emperor had resurrected himself, and as he revealed himself once more to the Galaxy, led Jade's forces in a siege on Coruscant. Sparking the new Golden Age of Sith, he used his new Sith warriors to destroy the Skywalker traitors, and he personally revealed himself to the fallen pair of Jedi, before slaughtering them.

With the Empire being once more brought under Palpatine's control, it seemed all hope was lost. Things have a tendency to come full circle; however. New rebellions emerged, led by surviving members of the former Rebel Alliance.
Now, the Rebel Alliance has been reborn, though the Rebels have a great task ahead of them. The Empire is stronger than ever, but there is at last a glimmer of hope.
This is the dark world of Star Wars: Uprising.

* Play as almost any race and character concept your imagination can come up with (within reason), from nearly any race in the Star Wars universe, to pilot almost any ship in Star Wars, and mastery of the enigmatic Force can even be had!
* Our unique stat system allows characters to start with a ship, money, weapons, and more, so your first day you are ready to accomplish epic roleplay.
* A heavily expanded version of WEG's acclaimed D6 system; We use specializations, martial arts, cybernetics, advantages/disadvantages, and a robust, organic language code.
Join Star Wars: Uprising at swuprising.net 1138 or read more about the theme at http://swu.wikia.com/wiki/Main_Page.

mud.name: Beyond the Veil of Shadows
mud.desc: The tall Silvery Blue figure watched silently as the orb depicted the growing alliance between the Orcs and the Human races. Befuddled by this unlikely covenant he racked his brain for some way to ensure that this would not come to fruition. The Drake continent would surely never be able to withstand an assault from both these races. His thoughts turned to the Evil One who had been banished so long ago. A shiver ran down his spine. Was Mordenaire even alive? Would unleashing the Pattern Reave be the Drake's salvation or their epitaph? Behemut needed time to ponder all these things. Time he didn't have. Time he needed to bolster his dwindling Drake population. The great one lifted his head and once again took slowly to the sky. For now he would continue to grant his gift to the few deserving heroes he could find. Perhaps if he could find enough of them, he could forget the Reave altogether.
He let loose a gutteral bugle and in a blink was gone...

mud.name: Renegade Outpost
mud.desc: RO is a heavily modified DIKU mud which has spawned over 1,000 clones on the internet today. RO has evolved to become a mud that strives to create a creative balance between the players and the mud. Each zone is unique and offers players of ALL levels an intersting mudding experience. We offer ten classes to chose from, each with unique abilities.

mud.name: Star Wars: The Hurrian Realm
mud.desc: Hurrian realm is currently under development, however we welcome player testing, and have an ever growing player base! We currently have 40+ players, around 10 of which are on throughout the day. We are currently searching for competent, active and dedicated players for: Clan/Gov Leaders, Roleplaying Admins, Builders (Can Train, but requires some knowledge)

We are currently looking for in game builders. People with any SWR or SW:FotE building experience would be a welcome addition to our building team. We also need Roleplaying Admins. These lower level Imms would help players and clans to roleplay in situations that require them, and would also observe and reward Roleplaying.

Immortals are required to register @ our website: (hurrianrealm.exofire.net/1). On our \"Help Wanted\" Forum you may post your Resume's. Include What position you want and why you think you qualify or would be good at the job!
See you around!

mud.name: God Wars II
mud.desc: God Wars II is a fast and furious PK mud, designed to test player skill in terms of pre-battle preparation and on-the-spot reflexes, as well as the ability to adapt quickly to new situations. Take on the role of a godlike supernatural being in a fight for supremacy.
About your character:

* Three different types of character creation. * Levelless advancement through stats, skills, talents and powers. * Over a hundred and fifty specialised talents. * Over a hundred unique powers divided among six classes. * Redesign your character freely - only name and class are fixed.
About the world:

* Roomless coordinate-based world with weather, tides, etc. * Dynamically generated object, world and creature descriptions. * Three scales of ASCII map for the world, and one for weather. * Other planes of existence, distorted mirrors of the main world. * Every player has their own terraformable home plane.
About the combat:

* Manual combat requires simultaneous control of 4-6 locations. * Over 11,000 fighting techniques, with dozens of combat tables. * Each weapon type has its own fighting moves and combinations. * Different types of wound, each with their own penalties. * Unique spell system, fully compatible with the combat system.
About equipment:

* Object Oriented design: All items (and small mobs) are weapons. * Layered clothing and armour, which can cover multiple locations. * Randomly generated magical items, with type-specific bonuses. * Numerous ways to craft and customise your weapons and armour. * Epic items: Powerful items with fully-customisable bonuses.
About exploration:

* Earn rewards and unlock quests as you explore the world. * Various one-shot quests each with their own challenges. * Randomly generated dungeons, with rewards for killing the boss. * Hundreds of different monsters with unique skills and tactics. * Maps which can be deciphered, providing another way to advance.
Other features:

* Different pets that can be trained, equipped, and issued orders. * Shapechanging powers, including a fully customisable demon form. * Boost system, which rewards casual play and discourages botting. * The WAR mini-game; order your worshippers to slay the heathens! * Lock-picking puzzle system based completely on player skill.

mud.name: Balzhur
mud.desc: Balzhur es un mud basado en smaug 1.4, totalmente traducido al castellano. Consta de 80 niveles de mortales, cinco de los cuales son de pk puro y 15 de inmortales. En él hay clanes (para los pks) y cofradias para los que prefieren no luchar con otros jugadores. Es un mud nuevo por lo que constantemente estamos añadiendo nuevas áreas e incorporando mejoras al código. Precisamente, al ser un mud que está en sus inicios, es un sitio ideal para aprender a jugar ya que suele haber algún dios dispuesto a ayudarte y jugadores dispuestos a enseñar, el ambiente que se respira es muy amigable :) Así que no lo dudes, te esperamos en Balzhur, tienes todo un mundo entero por descubrir :) Un saludo de los dioses de Balzhur :) ----- Balzhur is a Smaug 1.4 based mud, completely translated into spanish. It has 80 mortal (last 5 pure pk) levels and 15 of inmortal. There are clans for PK and guilds for those who prefer not to fight with others players. It's a brand new mud, so we're constantly adding new areas and improving code. Due to the fact that it's a new mud, it's a great place to learn how to play, 'cause almost all the time there are IMPS to help you and players willing to teach you. Our environment is great and friendly :) So don't hesitate no more, we're waiting for you in Balzhur... a whole world to discover :)) Imps of Balzhur

mud.name: Geas
mud.desc: If you are tired of each 'new' MUD being the same as all the others, Geas is the mud for you. Geas is unique, not a standard mudlib. There are NO stock areas, no levels, no classes. There are no 'global shouts.'

Geas features a 100% original world with a rich, detailed background. Races are truly different, in stats and appearances, in their history, traditions, and the reactions of other people. Geas boasts a fully formed pantheon of gods, each with their own aspects, powers, and relationships.

In many MUDs, advancement is limited solely to monster killing. Not so in Geas, which features a realistic learning-by-doing skill system. Players improve the stats and skills they use - no fighting trolls to improve int. A player can focus on the fighting skills of a warrior, the sneakiness of a thief, or the craftsmanship of a master smith. Four kinds of guilds are available: professional, layman, race, and craft, and a player may join one of each type - or choose to go it alone.

When it comes to fighting, Geas offers a realistic combat system, involving much more than just sitting back and watching hits scroll by. Players take an active part in fighting through a variety of specials. Armours are layered and crafted to protect specific body parts, while weapons have different capabilities, depending on weapon and armour type. Oftentimes in combat, strategy is the difference between life and death.

The world of Geas has been more than three years in the making before being offered to the general public, and it is anything but static. It is growing and changing through a staff of active and knowledgable wizards, with help and ideas gladly accepted from players as well. To learn more, come in and try it out for yourself. A whole world is waiting for you.

mud.name: Star Wars: Fate of The Republic
mud.desc: Fate of the Republic is one of the oldest running SWRs out there, just with a new face. Since 1997, the staff of FotR (Formally RitS) has worked hard to create a MUD that truly captures the essence of the Star Wars universe, a calling that most miss. Through advances in both our code, building and with the help of our loyal players and staff, I am proud to say that I believe we have done just that, shedding our SMAUG skin to become the first truly immersive Star Wars MUD, where the player steps out of our world and into the world of Jedi and Sith, where the Sith Empire dominates the landscape, having smashed the Republic and the Alliance that followed to their very foundations.

Our code supports several key features that are unique to our MUD, including a brand new level system, a player-driven quest system and a completely unique profession-based level system that allows for quite a bit of customization. We have also recently finished an unique combat system that is slightly more than the usual 'whoever has the biggest blaster wins'.

We've diverted from canon these past two years, and now we're playing out our own timeline. Palpatine died at the end of the Clone Wars, the CIS crushed the Republic under the leadership of a Sith Lord, who went on to establish the Sith Empire. From the ashes of the Republic a new Alliance of Free Planets sprung up, but after a long and drawn out fight they too were crushed under the heel of the mighty Empire. The appearance of the Yuuzhan Vong has severely sapped the Empire's resources, and though these unnatural invaders are all but defeated it has come at great cost to the Empire. In their weakened state many systems now question whether the Emperor is still fit to rule.

mud.name: Devil's Silence MUD
mud.desc: Since the beginning of time there has existed a base struggle between the forces of good and the forces of evil. Until now. Long ago, the land was dominated by two major immortal forces, one, the champion of good (whose name has been lost in the ages), and the Devil, champion of evil. Within their immortal hordes were angels, demons and all other forms of magical beings. Eternally they warred, never winning, never losing. Little did they realize that their true power lied in their mortal followers. Neither of the two paid any attention to the mortal plane..allowing it to fall to chaos. This only increased the power of the Devil, for as the land became more chaotic in nature, the true evil of man's heart became known. By the time the champion of good had noticed this, it was too late. His power had dwindled too much and there was little left he could do. Evil had won out and the Devil ruled the realms, both immortal and mortal.

What followed can only be termed as hell. The Devil turned the world into a torturous experience for mankind, forcing the masses to work and slave their lives away. Whisperings of rebellion were heard throughout the mortal realm. Gradually these whisperings grew into a roar. The people of the realm were not looking to fight for good, but to fight against evil. It was rumored that the Devil had lost his immortality during the great battle with his nemesis. It was the truth of this rumor that a group of powerful wizards were staking their lives on. These wizards had been born and raised in magical seclusion. No one knows their exact origins, only that they existed. This group of wizards, known simply as the Seven, fought their way into the Devil's immense castle and there engaged a magnificent battle. They gathered their collective energy and cast a suicide spell on the Devil, sending him and six of their members into oblivion.

This magical cataclysm tore the world asunder, shattering any concept of time or space. Everything was shifted and torn from their rightful places. The world left from this is a nexus, combining places and people from times and worlds beyond. Into this realm stepped the only one of the ancient Seven to survive the grand battle with the Devil, Lady Alecca. She vowed to try and restore what order they could in this new realm. She assumed the role of the gods and forged into this world left by the Devil's Silence.

-Devil's Silence - A highly addictive RoT PK mud. Sometimes, in order to make friends, you have to KILL them! 26 classes, 36 races, daily immortal, auto, and equipment quests, an arena, multitudes of areas, and plenty of attitude. Devil's Silence offers clans as well as player housing. Newer and better things are currently in progress as well. Come on over and see what this phenomenon is all about.

mud.name: Dragonheart - The Original
mud.codebase: [LP] LPMud, Heavily Customized, H7 back in the day
mud.desc: Dragonheart was originally opened in 1995 by a gentleman named Daniel Huber. He started with a basic Heaven 7 system and added all custom zones and gear. As the years went by, he continued to change the world and add new, exciting content.

Within the past few years, Mr. Huber has followed his dreams and is currently teaching in China. The most current lib and driver were made available to a group of players who took the mud under control to keep it going. Since Mr. Huber's departure, several zones, gear, and quests were added to the game to make it even more fun. With content continuously being added, Dragonheart stays fresh, while maintaining the classic original Heaven 7 feel.

The current Dragonheart is a heavily customized LP Mud with restricted pk, a 100 level cap, 4 classes, 10 races, special abilities per class/race, quests, etc. It is a fully functional mud waiting for you to come by and give it a try. Several of the players, including the site operator, have been playing Dragonheart or coding on Dragonheart since its inception over 14 years ago.
The mud is beautifully colored, with an extensive skill, spell, and level-based advancement system. An active administration team ensures that the players' needs are always being taken care of.

mud.name: Castle Marrach
mud.desc: You awaken in a small chamber deep beneath the Castle Marrach. Who are you? How did you come to be here? You explore the labrynthine corridors of the Castle and the questions seem to multiply. What are the plots of the Castle elders? Why has the drawbridge not been let down in living memory? Mystery, intrigue, and romance combine in the story of Castle Marrach.

This is a socialization- and consent-based online multiplayer text-based game with Skotos Tech's state of the art parser technology behind it, based on the DGD codebase. Our custom client and parser include features not found in any other online text-based game. We welcome you to try it out!

Skotos Tech published several games, including Castle Marrach, Grendel's Revenge, The Eternal City, and Galactic Emperor: Hegemony. Access is free for the first month trial period and inexpensive thereafter to access all the games we offer!
See http://www.skotos.net for more details!

mud.name: A Midnight Fantasy
mud.desc: A Midnight Fantasy is a world where a player can choose to live an alternate life, one of adventure. Utalizing a experience system to advance player levels and a quest system to advance guild levels, hopefully players will find hours of enjoyment either hunting, questing, or just chatting.

mud.name: Mud of Chance
mud.desc: This is a brand new mud that is finally going public. We have been working on it for the last 4 years and are finally going to allow players to come play. We hope to see a lot of new people and offer the newest form of leveling. There is also a new way to multi-class. This mud is almost all original and the only thing that might be the same is some of the areas. We are still in the process of adding more to the mud so if you ever have a question feel free to ask.

mud.name: Revelation
mud.codebase: [Custom] Server uses a custom protocol and own client, NOT telnet.
mud.desc: Revelation: Lands of Kaldana is a non-standard MUD because it cannot be played via telnet. Instead Revelation has its own client which can be downloaded from the website. The client offers a wide range of features which extend the game beyond that of text-only. This includes a World Map, and customisable Inventory, Button and Spell Icon pictures. Please note that the client is only available to Windows.

The game itself is not hard to play and easy to enjoy. It is set in the fantasy world of Kaldana and players can explore and fight their way through many areas across three different continents from the starting town of Myronmet. The playerbase while not extensive is very close knit and sociable. This can make starting out a bit easier as all you need to do is ask any questions you have in Broadcast (the open chat channel). There are many quests which can be completed and vary depending on your chosen class as you level up through the game to a very open and extensive range of endgame group-based encounters or raids.

The client can be downloaded from the homepage and a useful guide for new players can be found at http://www.kaldana.com/index.php?page=003 as well as the game’s own player-maintained Wiki database http://revelation.a.wiki-site.com/index.php/Main_Page
The game has some fun additions over a generic Telnet MUD and we encourage you to come and try it.

mud.name: Cuendillar MUSH
mud.desc: A wind rises in the Mountains of Mist, sweeping down through the streets of Caemlyn, circling around the straightlaced avenues of Cairhien, swirling about the mountains a wary man calls The Dragonwall. It was not the beginning. There are no beginnings nor endings in the Wheel of Time. But it was _a_ beginning.

Cuendillar is set in a mirror world, as established by Jordan in his works, where the events of the novels have not come to pass in exactly the same manner. The world sets forth towards its own destination, striking its own path along the way. Characters from the novels will not be present, but the game offers many of the same character types one would find in the books.
Cuendillar is operated with the permission of Robert Jordan. All players are required to read: NEWS PERMISSION when they log into the game.

mud.name: Hallowed Realms
mud.codebase: [Rom] Heavily modified with flavours of LP and SMAUG
mud.desc: Hallowed Realms, an ongoing project for a number of years has recently been revived. The plans are to have it up and running from here on out. There have been huge changes to the codebase. We started out on LP, decided to change to SMAUG and then restarted with ROM. Yet we have retained the flavour of all our previous codebases. The OLC has also been considerably modified, and uses auto-config tables for standardization. A lot of effort has gone into balancing the game with regard to levels, races and classes. There are 100 mortal levels. players start out as 1 of the 4 defaults. (war, mage, cleric, or thief). Reclasses (specialization) are at levels 11, and 75. Each reclass provides the character with a more finely tuned set of abilities. We are currently experimenting with a combat-less form of growth (leveling). Using crafts (such as woodwork, metal-smithing, and leather-crafting). As well as with alternative forms of magic [monks can chant, bards can sing, etc]. We feature all unique areas, questing, an arena, economy, and exponential EXP system. Whilst the game is totally playable right now, we are looking to flesh it out a bit,with a crew of Builders, as well as PR and admin-type immortals.
So feel free to drop by to play, ... or to build.

mud.name: ChaosMUCK
mud.desc: ChaosMUCK is a role-playing forum based primarily on the SatAM Sonic The Hedgehog cartoon, comics, player fanfiction, and other works. We require character detailed character applications to join; however, this process is easy and worthwhile as it can be integrated into your public profile if so desired. We offer a balanced system of role- play and powerlevels using a system of self-governed and staff assisted referees. We encourage 'pure' role-playing and character developement, and fun!

mud.name: Neronis
mud.desc: World of Neronis is online game in the style of medieval fantasy, which anyone can play absolutely free.

Neronis created in the best traditions of the genre. It is a world populated light-hearted forest elves, evil trolls, gloomy orcs, tireless dvarves, humans and many other races. In the world there are high mountains and dense forests, vast cities and small villages, affluent rivers and raging seas, dark caves with hidden treasures.

You are waiting for all sorts of monsters, hundreds of thousands of items, the countless number of interesting tasks and quests for every taste and a huge world out of more than 8 thousand of locations!

It can be a lot of hours to describe all the diversity of the natural world of Neronis, talk about its amazing and unique places, full of riddles and mysteries, but as the saying goes, better to see once than hear a hundred times.
So, welcome to the world of Neronis!

mud.name: Ascension
mud.desc: PK PK PK is back. if you scrolling looking for a good mud with fun gameplay and alot of PK. put the hostname and port in and join us.
-coheed & insane-

mud.name: Dibrova II
mud.desc: Welcome back to Dibrova, After a long time being down, we are now back and better than ever. This mud used to have 100+ players playing at one time. I'd like to see that happen again. We have 150 Mortal levels. We have 150 remort levels. Then an infinte amount of Immortal levels with tiers. Come check us out at moemuds.webhop.net 4000.

mud.name: Azereth
mud.desc: Azereth is an endlessly growing mud with many special features like a 100 level system with endless remorts, Many races to choose from along with advanced racial wear spots and racial spells and skills, gambling, unique leveling weapons with class and remort capabilities, pet familiars, fishing, romance, a large world that is always growing, and much much more! Come and enjoy yourself.

mud.name: Tapestries MUCK
mud.desc: ** WARNING: Adult Content **

Tapestries MUCK is an adult social/roleplay muck with the theme of sexual exploration within a Furry Theme. Tapestries MUCK is one of the largest Furry themed mucks, regularly having 600+ players on in the evenings as of this writing. The muck provides a stable environment, having been in operation for over 10 years.

mud.name: After...
mud.desc: Many seasons have passed since everything changed. There are no more masters, no more lights, no more metal monsters, no more endless noise. The city and its constructs are quiet now. It is unlikely any being still lives who remembers 'Before'. Beyond the mountains is wasteland. Even with how much time has passed, peoples of all kinds still make their way to our haven. All are welcome here, though it is left to them to govern their own tribes. We keep to the dark places. We remain hidden. It is better that way. Cities are overgrown, buildings are crumbling. Cars were left to rust on pavement collapsing into sewers below. Wilderness is reclaiming civilization. Animals moved into places previously occupied by humans, thriving - or perishing - in their masters' absence. Creatures have adapted to their new, strange habitat Zoo animals were freed. Some died, unable to care for themselves, but many survived and have formed their own tribes (herds, packs, etc). After...MUCK is a 'talking animal' wildlife role-play MUCK set in a fictional world after the mysterious disappearance of humanity. Approximately 50-70 years have passed since the cities were abandoned and left to the ravages of nature. Our setting is roughly based on a Northern California/Northwest US environment, but it is not a specific real-world location. RP on the MUCK will focus on the animals and their interactions and lives in this post-human world with its new species with which to contend and all of its hazards. Time on the MUCK passes naturally, one IC day = one RL day, as such, seasons and time of day are roughly synched with real life west coast North America. Please note that Nature is a cruel, cruel mistress. Life is hard, and the RP on the MUCK is likely to involve MATURE themes. Strong language, violence, death, injury and possibly sex.

mud.name: The Lands of Evermore
mud.desc: The Lands of Evermore is a fantasy mud project.

The Lands of Evermore is a medium-sized but richly detailed fantasy MUD. Forget about stock areas, player hostility, and endless XP mills! A classical choice of races and classes, each with unique features of its own, will appeal to D&D fans. Every room is a hand tailored, one-of-a-kind thrill involving prizes, secret passages, or well-hidden monsters. A thoroughly unique advancement system suggests a flexible choice of game styles, equally rewarding intrepid explorers, attentive questers, and diehard killing machines. Religion, economy and languages are developed into arts of their own, and a variety of crafts are offered to those of less violent inclination. The number of advanced features - like an automated minimap - is growing weekly. In absence of PK, all players are friendly and cooperative. Newbies can easily navigate around using interactive maps posted on the website. And a special bonus: Lands of Evermore runs on a decicated server and uses port 23, open by most office firewalls.
Enjoy!

mud.name: Dark Lair
mud.desc: Welcome mortal... or something like that. Honestly, I don't remember what I said before, so here goes again.

Basically, Dark Lair is a modified Godwars mud, with the focus on more facets of player interaction, rather than just the standards fatality counter. While PK is allowed, there should be reasons for it.

Classes currently available are Garou, Vampire, Ghoul, Mages, and mortals. To be classed, kill at least 5 mobs, look through the helpfiles on classing and the various bits useful to your chosen class, and then check for an immortal to set your class, or use the selfclass to set yourself as a Vampire or Garou.

Garou are done. Level 1-5 gifts completed for all breeds, auspices, and tribes. Do think about which of each you want before you get classed. As per in actual WoD, gifts are limited by your rank, so it will take you a few days before you'll actually be able to use them...

Vampires and Ghouls are done. Ghouls use the proper limits, which means that except for RP and as a sort of training level, you're probably going to hate their power levels. Vampire disciplines generally have powers from levels 1-5, except for some that go up to 10, and a few which either don't have any powers or only a few... These are noted during classing, which is one of the reasons for the classing system.

Mages aren't as... unbalanced as most Godwars players are used to. It's an odd blend of custom and standard, which will take most players several weeks to months before they can actually chant anything except rune spells. Additionally, with Mages, you are expected to know enough about them to know which tradition or what you're asking to join. If you don't even know that, you will NOT be classed as a Mage.

mud.name: Dark Castle
mud.codebase: [Dikumud] Completely redeveloped by the DC Code Team.
mud.desc: o-)-- D A R K C A S T L E --> Are you afraid of the Dark? Dark Castle is an exciting and long-standing MUD open to players of all ages. DC boasts an active and free thinking Immortal staff who rarely censor language, violence, or actions. With several expansive continents and over 100 original areas, Dark Castle MUD is a challenge to both new and experienced mudders alike. A few of Dark Castle's original features include: * A detailed and highly developed player-run CLAN SYSTEM. * A 'META-PHYSICIAN' where attributes and upgrades can be purchased. * A vast array of items, mobs, areas, and storylines. * A variety of well-developed races and classes. * Professions for character and class specialization. * An all-original CASINO utilizing actual rules and odds. * An exciting fully automated QUEST system. * A LEADERBOARD to compare your character to the competition. * A flexible, unique combat system full of gore and mayhem. * Free player VAULTS for storing, saving, and sharing your loot! * A player-run AUCTION HOUSE for buying and selling goods. * Comprehensive helpfiles for both new and veteran players. * Many more ORIGINAL FEATURES only found on Dark Castle! Players new to mudding: feel free to seek an Immortal for advice as not all of the Dark Castle denizens work for the 'good-guys'. With stable, consistent coding and balance and an exciting new quest and character development system, Dark Castle is still the most sh*t- kicking game around! Join the adventure that got zMUD's Zugg himself started! Dark Castle: because chicks dig swords.

mud.name: The Dragonball
mud.desc: The Dragonball is a customized Dragonball Z MUD that is not based upon any current DBZ codebase. This MUD provides a very unique experience that is true to how a MUD should play. Other DBZ MUDs allow a new character to reach godlike status very quickly, but advancement is more controlled in The Dragonball.

Transformations are achieved through a unique system. Fighting builds your character's rage, and rage must be 'focused' in battle for the transformation to occur. Gaining each transformation is not a trivial task and will be something to be proud of once acheived. Also unique to The Dragonball is a strength maintenance system. Your character can workout and gravity train to increase its muscle mass and gravity adaptation, which increses your STR. If your character does not train regularly, its muscle mass slowly depletes and your STR is affected.

Playable races include Saiyans, Icers, Mutants, Halfbreeds, Demons, Androids, and Bio-androids. Currently, Androids and Bio-androids cannot be created but a feature in development will allow any character to be transformed into a Bio-android or Android.

The Dragonball is a very friendly place and newbies are welcomed. RP is encouraged and occasionally an RP quest for the Dragonballs grants a lucky player a wish. The MUD is under constant development and new features are being added often. If you are looking for a challenging DBZ experience that doesn't hand a godlike character to you with little work, The Dragonball is an excellent MUD to play.

mud.name: NostalgiaMUD
mud.desc: NostalgiaMUD is still in the very early stages of development. This LPMud aims to fulfill those happy memories of the good, clean fun provided by visits to a well-designed text-based fantasy world.

NostalgiaMUD will adhere to strict standards of quality control in all aspects of our world, particularly the written descriptions and text as these are the fabric of a MUD reality. The world will be rich and interactive while providing a pleasant and relaxing experience.

You will enjoy a unique and dynamic combat system that will attract both the lone warrior as well as parties that will find great synergy in bringing together different guilds. An interactive world and economy will be ripe for you to explore, nurture, cooperate with, or exploit. Individuals as well as groups will have many avenues by which to create social order or a lack of it.
Players will be free to participate in the various facets of the MUD as they see fit; tailoring their experience to be as shallow or deep as they please.

mud.name: Aabosolom's Legacy BTVOS V3
mud.desc: As his warped magic secrets began to shred the known planes, Mordenaire played his final card to escape from eternal imprisonment. A millenium was plenty of time to prepare for his final gambit, 'Undeath'. After successfully escaping his captivity, he thought, \"Perhaps to make the transformation complete, a new name was in order. After all, Mordenaire was dead, and he had been reborn into something new. Time to write a new book in history, something that will never be forgotten. A legacy. That was it, 'Aabsolom's Legacy'.\"

**Quicklist of Features** *Aabsolom's Legacy is a fantasy mud with different races/hometowns *Awesome clan code with guards, and eq you create *Quest areas with mini tasks for the chance to learn new skills or spells, and gain special equipment *Active immortals run games and quests for rewards *Quests, gambling, crafting *Tier system where players can choose to become a more powerful version of their class, or branch to learn the skills of a new class. *Scattered tokens and Random equipment give the players incentives for exploring the planes *Over 300 unique spells/skills *New room types, eq/weapon flags, exits, and item types. *Item upgrade system, to customize and improve your eq.

mud.name: Throes of Creation
mud.desc: \"You got smarts, seekin' me out, kid,\" grunts the villainous-looking soldier before you. He is unshaven and grubby, approaching middle age, but looks fit and vaguely menacing. His stained and worn black uniform bears the insignia of a captain.

\"As it so happens, I kin use folks like you,\" the soldier continues. \"I know you want to tell me all about what you kin do, but it dun really matter to me. Soldier, mage, priest or assassin, I kin use all types. We got places for tradesmen who dun wanna fight at all.\"
\"Now them necromancer folks...\" the soldier shudders for a moment, then continues, \"...they scare me a bit with all the undead following them about. Nothin' against them, but they be worrisome.\"

The soldier scratches the stubble on his chin thoughtfully. \"I reckon I should tell you a few things to give you an idea of what to expect. We're at war, and folks like you are gonna determine how this plays out. So listen up, kid!\"

ROLEPLAY. \"Some folks is jest killers by nature.\" The soldier pauses for a moment, as if remembering a happy thought. \"If that's you, I ain't got no problem with that. Jest remember, I expect you to act true to yer nature while yer with us. If'n you feels the need to go hunting and killing other folks like yerself, you best be able to show that you're just being true to yer nature, and that you has good reason ta be doing such.\"

CRAFTING. \"Everyone kin and should learn something about crafting.\" With a sharp knife, the soldier whittles idly on a piece of bone as he speaks. \"Some folks canna stomach killing at all. That's all right. If yer an Artisan, you kin do just fine getting materials and building stuff, right from the start. Artisans makes the best equipment that can be used, and folks likes them.\"

CLANS. \"It kin be tough ta get by on yer own.\" The soldier make a half-hearted attempt to straighten out his threadbare uniform, but loses interest quickly. \"Depending on how you see things, you kin hook up with other like-minded folks and form yer own clan. Mebbe yer a religious type. Mebbe yer a military man, like myself. Mebbe yer even a thieving rat. Joining a clan, or forming one, gives you a safe place to catch yer breath and mates who will watch yer back. Mostly. Of course, whether yer in a clan or not, you kin always get yer own house and furnish it as you like.\"

PLAYERS HELP SHAPE THE WORLD. \"It makes my head hurt ta think about it,\" grumbles the soldier, looking uneasy. \"But that's the way it is. Folks like you kin help, er, discover the history of the world. Discover lost kingdoms, that sort of thing. I hear we got good people working on that right now. Good people. Solid. But...\", the soldier points a grubby finger at you, \"It be folks like you that will determine what kind of place the world will be.\"

With a rasping cough, the soldier spits an evil-looking glob of yellowish phlegm onto the floor with satisfaction. He turns back to you and raises an eyebrow. \"You still here? Whadda ya waiting for? Get out there, kid, and change the world!\" ___________________________________________________________________
Come join a world where your input is always considered, and where you can help shape the world (even the above description was written by a player!). We look forward to meeting you.

mud.name: Star Wars: Legacy of the Sith
mud.desc: Years have passed since the destruction of the deathstar, and the rebellion has become The New Republic. The Empire is on the rise again, and organised crime is growing. On LoTS, you become part of this world, choosing from our many races and classes and skills to build your character. We have many new and unique features, such as a detailed cargo system, 35 races, 8 classes, new skill additions, upgrades of old skills, an arena, ship simulators, com-frequecies, introduction system, and countless other code additions. Though LotS is open to the public we're still an evolving SWR. Player ideas are welcome and encouraged, and much of the time used. On LoTS, while PK is legal under certain conditions, such as in clans, it must be kept in character, and newbie killing is illegal. Most who clan choose to join one of the two major governments (The Empire or The New Republic), however, there are smaller factions as well. Our players and imm-staff are friendly and helpful. We are a role-playing enforced mud, and require both a biography and description for characters above level 6, as well as a name appropriate for their race. We're currently hiring Builders and RolePlay Enforcement Immortals, log on and speak with an Immortal if your interested. Please Log on or send email for any further information

mud.name: Dragonball X: Journey to Power
mud.desc: Welcome fans and newbies alike, we are proud to announced as promised. The original Dragonball X: Journey to Power created by your favorite Immortal Shinshi. Many people have been persis- tently asking for us to bring back the mud all know and love. Well as of April 13, 2007 your wish has come true. The mud you all enjoy has been reconnected thanks to time well spent by Shinshi. We are sorry for the prolonged delay of the reconnection of the mud, due to uncontrollable circumstances. Changes will be made to the mud and we ask that you be patient with us. We plan on making improvements and maintaining just as we always have. Thanks for your time and loyalty. As always enjoy your stay on Dragonball X: Journey to Power.

mud.name: Big Damn MUSH :: Be a Hero
mud.desc: If you're a fan of Firefly/Serenity and looking to get in on the ground level of the Best Damn MUSH out there with a bunch of friendly & hardworking folks, give us a shout! Help to build a place true to canon, where RP is valued and you get to work and play somewhere that kicks ass and takes names. Not to mention we all want to be Big Damn Heroes... and ain't we just?

Currently in development, BDM is being designed and inspired by Joss Whedon's Firefly Series and the Serenity Movie, using CobraMUSH (a PennMUSH Derivative) combined with FSpace (the Frontier Space Engine designed and coded by Ari Johnson) to create the 'Verse.
Interested in contributing to the design of the campaign or helping to build the world? Want to share your ideas & suggestions for features?
Contact us via BDMadmin@gmail.com if you're interested in contributing or login to the website forum at:
WWW.BIGDAMN.COM/FORUM
or log in directly at: bigdamn.com 7777

mud.name: Seattle 2064
mud.desc: Seattle 2064 is a Shadowrun-based MUD. It was originally based on Circle code, but has evolved extensively. Currently, we're moving towards full SR 3rd edition compliance. Seattle 2064 supports all the major SR character types: deckers, riggers, shamen, mages, street samurai and physical adepts. We have a wide variety of both coded and roleplay-only abilities and skills as well. The MUD world is dynamic, detailed and constantly growing. There are a lot of areas to explore and roleplay in - including the Sea-Tac area, Portland and parts of the NAN new places are perpetually being added.

Seattle 2064 is an RP-encouraged MUD, although most any in-game rewards are obtained via RP, and gives its players many ways to customize their characters and their items - whether via detailed description commands or the restring command. Though there are many autoquests available, we encourage and reward good roleplay - whether with karma, money or even special items/abilities.
