Both players and immortal quest staffers run all kinds of RP events, ranging from simple fights or short encounters to huge, world-changing epic runs.

Seattle 2064 is a beta MUD, and much needs to be done to fill it out and bring it into full 3rd edition compliance. But it's a great place in a constant state of development, one which tries hard to stay true to SR 3rd-ed. in look, feel, game mechanics and spirit.

mud.name: The Eye of Heaven
mud.desc: The Eye of Heaven is in shadow. Deep within the tunnels of an interdimensional cyst, the ancient city of the Mote teems with the refugees and misfortunates from countless worlds. They have been trapped by the portals that lead down into the darkness, and their lives are commonly brief and cruelly ended.

But not all are meant for victimhood at the hands of slavers or savage tribesmen. Some have a spark of promise beyond common measure, and the boldness and strength of will to make a better life in the darkness of the Mote. Some are trapped castaways or refugees from other worlds. Others are natives of the Mote with an uncommon drive.

Players take the roles of these exceptional figures, each seeking to make what life they would in the shadows of the tunnels. Whether seeking wealth and glory in the ruins and hidden lairs that surround the Mote, simply trying to survive their neighbors, or even venturing to find a way to escape the House of the Eye, their lives promise to be interesting- if perhaps short.

Interested players can even arrange to run their own campaigns set in the worlds that lead to the Mote. A vast selection of classes and races are permitted for play, and within the scope of your own campaign you're welcome to set your own game rules. The game uses the Open Gaming License provided by Wizards of the Coast, and we gladly invite others to come join the fun.

mud.name: Islands of Myth
mud.desc: Islands of Myth is a very stable LIMA based mud that has been running since July 1996 with continual modification and customization.
Currently we are seeing 20-50 players online, and recent statistics are available on our webpage.
We feature 13 primary (alpha) guilds and approximately 100 additional guilds for later advancement, and multiclassing. With 27 races to choose from, the possibilities are nearly endless.

Islands of Myth has a rich newbie-friendly environment that includes 16 different areas easily available from a single location, events specifically driven for newbies (players level 15 or under) as well as several other bonus features.

For the higher level player we offers endless advancement and expansion of the player. The reincarnation system allows you to retain 80-100% of your character's total experience and build your character again, beginning with race and class selection. This allows high level players to experiment with different guilds, combinations, and 'builds'. There is also an option to split your single body into two or more, retaining benefits like access to your castle and equipment, but letting you play several different builds more freely.

mud.name: Marvel Untold
mud.desc: Marvel Untold

Our theme is simple; It's the Marvel Universe. No peanut butter in my chocolate or chocolate in my peanut butter (multiverse). No strange staff character centric version, no year one, no gender bending, no sandboxing. Just the Marvel Universe. Pure and simple.

It all started with that fateful flight of Marvel's first family, the Fantastic Four. Then the tale exploded with countless adventures of thousands of characters. It's here, at Marvel Untold that you can expound upon those adventures. Essentially, writing your own and making those Untold stories come to life.

Our cutoff is timeless. This isn't saying that we're a Year One, nor is it saying that we're current comics either. Essentially our cutoff is just before Inferno. The Golden Age of Marvel Comics when life was good and not so convoluted in story that a player cannot keep up with all that happened to the character in issue 367, page 8, panel 2. We also allow for current characters (if IC events have unfolded).

With that said, character backgrounds are to be bullet-pointed. We do not want lengthy paragraphs. Character traits are necessary, but also brief in nature - Cover the key points and you're good to go. The staff at Marvel Untold want to make your online experience one that focuses on the RP'ability of the character, not the writeup.
Come join us at Marvel Untold. We welcome FCs and OCs alike.
mo.mushpark.com:2012 http://sniktbub.wikidot.com/start

mud.name: CaveMUSH
mud.desc: CaveMUSH is a mush in the grand tradition of social-building-coding mushes. The main body of the MUSH lay underground, but that need not limit its content to only subterrainian venues. Links to the Modern, above-ground world do exist. The story below ground deals with a race of small peoples known as 'Gnomes,' for lack of a better term, (they are different than the small, docile creatures of which you may have heard) and their struggle against an oppressive race of snake-men known as Syphians, who also live underground. At this point in Gnomish history, contact with humanity is limited, with only a few humans knowing of the Gnomish world, but with most Gnomes knowing of the human world, but hiding because of their past together (ancient humans initially drove them underground). As a human entering the Gnomish world, you will discover the Gnomes way of life, and perhaps help them win an epic struggle against the Syphians, their greatest foe. Player building and coding is highly encouraged -- in any theme (floating areas acceptable). There is no quota and no building limits. Friendly people. The core's the limit!

mud.name: Dragonball: Path Of Destiny
mud.desc: Dragonball - Path Of Destiny ------------------------------------------ Dragonball:Path of Destiny is a Circle Codebase unlike most Dragonball Z muds. It does not increase PL gradually but by a boost system which is based off of 3 stats. Constitution, Intelligence, and Wisdom. Each stat increases the amount of Power, Ki, and Learning Points you get per boost. Skills are learned by the learn command instead of the practice command. The way this works is you only have to learn a skill once for it to be 100% but how often it suceeds depends on your Ki Skill, Upper Body Skill or Lower Body Skill. Both UBS and LBS are entwined together so if you raise 1 in UBS you will lower 1 in LBS. The features included in this mud are: 15 Races all from Dragonball/Dragonball Z/Dragonball GT Classless System Fishing System Extended and Unique Roleplaying System (Encouraged Use) - RP Characters - Saiyans and Majins restricted to RPer's. Over 13.5k Unique Rooms to the Mud (115 zones) Planets Include: - Earth - Vegeta - Namek - Konack - Frigid - Orainas Newbie Friendly Helpful Staff Immquests Newbie School Top Lists Limited PK System Transformations All Races have Unique Skills

mud.name: Erandia
mud.desc: Erandia is a MUD set on recreating and improving the atmosphere created by the now defunct 'Rogue Winds' MUD.
The following are the key features of Erandia:

* Advance in a skill-based, levelless, classless environment. * Fair and helpful admins and newbie helpers to answer your questions. * Newbies are protected, for the first ten hours losing nothing for dying. * Get involved in a rich roleplaying environment, in a fully realized world, with a deep storyline. * Learn magical talents, gain skill and power. * Virtually unlimited character advancement. * Utilize a versatile entirely new magic system. * No annoying spell lag. Channeling magic is handled more intelligently. * Beautiful Ansi color used liberally, but not every word a different color. * Explore a vast world, and gain experience and knowledge from your explorations. * Discover strange, new worlds, each with their own moons, climate, and atmosphere. * Travel many different terrains, from ice fields, lava lakes, swamps, to deep oceans. * Follow the tracks left in the dirt or snow by other creatures. * Choose from a wide selection of over two hundred races. * Any type of character you wish to play is open to you. * Some races can be ridden by other players. Play a dragonrider, or their dragon! * Found clans, start a family, interact with other players. * Fight battles, learn combat and weapon skills. * Realistic equipment system involving size and bodyparts, protecting only the part it is worn on. * Different races have different bodyparts, which can bleed, be broken, or severed. * Communicate with player created and controlled channels. * Fashion your own equipment from raw ores, and enchant it with whatever effects you wish. * Find rare magical gems to affix to your equipment to increase your power. * Hire NPC's to mine ore, harvest ingredients, or funnel mana into equipment for you. * Mix alchemical ingredients into potions, salves, or just bake cakes. * Brew and ferment your own alcohol. * Browse shops that randomly stock themselves with various items appropriate to the shop. * Buy and manage your own shop, with or without a shopkeeper hired to create items for you. * Write your own books. * Construct or buy a vehicle to drive, fly, or sail in, even spaceships and submarines. * Watch your back on Mezulbryst, the deadly playerkilling world where anything goes. * Never wait for a repop again, mobs only exist right where you want them! * Randomly generated mobs and equipment. You never know which mob will have a powerful artifact. * Named mobs get random names. Every time it's a different character. * Mobs that will react to your socials in a logical way, and use equipment and fight intelligently. * Venture on quests to gain experience, gold, and talent points to raise power in talents. * No random quests. Most quests are run by NPC's with different problems, and not all involve killing something. * The only rule is: So long as it harms no one, you may do as you will.

mud.name: Shadow Siege
mud.desc: Shadow Siege is an originally themed roleplaying game set in the world of Aagos. We are a strictly roleplay enforced mud, and thus the focus of the mud to develop your character over time through roleplay and interactions with other characters. Many of our players have compared the quality and style of roleplay found on Shadow Siege to that more commonly seen in the MUSHing community. Want to see an example yourself? Have a look at our Roleplay Section of our website: http://www.shadowsiege.com/rplog/index.html

In particular, note the stories, logs and roleplay blogs many of our players have set up. If you're still not sure if Shadow Siege is the roleplaying game for you, have a look at some of our TMC reviews.

What role will you take? A conservative Telantha shocked at the sudden changes to their idyllic world? Horrified at the appearance of brothels and other more shady elements? A refugee from Yarsin forced to flee the great metropolitan city... forced to scrape a living amongst the conservative Telanthans? Or something else ...?
Join us. Immerse yourself in the rich fantasy world of Aagos.

mud.name: Harry Potter: Alere Flammas MUSH
mud.desc: Harry Potter: Alere Flammas MUSH picked up the story of Harry Potter where _Goblet of Fire_ left off.

With Voldemort once more defeated, the wizarding world now tries to put itself back together without the constant threat of You Know Who to keep people looking over their shoulders. The scene of his demise, Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, is perhaps more and yet less affected by the events which took place there. The students have a new confidence: not only did they beat back the worst threat to the Wizarding World in nearly twenty years, but they did it with only the help of each other and their teachers.
But the Ministry is looking to redeem itself, and with Lucius Malfoy about to be inaugurated into the position of Minister of Magic, it's not clear what form that redemption might take.
Feature Characters are available. Open areas currently include Hogwarts School, Hogsmeade, and London (Muggle and Wizarding). Based on the books by J.K. Rowling.

mud.name: Firan
mud.desc: Play a part in the epic struggle of the Firan people against invading armies, meddling Gods, and the internal enemies that Fate has pit against them. Set in the capital city of Anarinuell, characters are a product of a rich heritage in which a divine wager and an historic marriage plunged the world into a war that has consumed three generations -- creating heroes, villains, and victims. Characters also share in common a large and powerful city of residence; a charismatic leader; and a common enemy. But Anarinuell is not a city about sameness, and roleplay focuses upon dramatic interactions among characters from different clans and different social strata with widely divergent religious and political views.

Firan's coded systems are designed to exploit these differences -- allowing social, economic, and physical combat. Enhance your reputation in the community by earning social points. Use those social points to spy, to call upon favors, to supress witnesses against you or to sabotage another person's reputation. Use your economic skills to negotiate better prices, or to deplete the city's supply of a given resource -- driving up the market, or instigating riots and strikes! In physical combat you can pummel a foe with your fists, or run him through with your sword. You can even bring your assailant to justice with the legal system. Come be a part of the myth-making on Firan!

mud.name: The Gathering...
mud.desc: The realm of Tirradyn has been an active and role-play intensive wonder of words for folks from every lifestyle to participate in shaping the society in a variety of ways since 2004. We offer over 65,000 rooms, roughly 350 areas, including over 25 inns and boasting an excess of 2000 shops. Our world is made of ten continents, four moons and another planet, with areas of interest located on all lands. Sea ships offer transportation between the continents where one can witness the dolphins swimming alongside as they travel.

The unique role-play council of Immortals, along with active players often offers highly in-depth storylines for characters to get involved in, solve mysteries and be a part of molding the world, for better or worse. A questing office can be found in many of the large cities for characters to gain employment and rewards of coin as well as unique objects for work performed. Players can craft their own armor and weapons, tattoos, jewelry and containers! Our questing system allows for spell-boosted objects and custom pets.

Many areas are classified as Empires. In these lands, characters are encouraged to get involved in the society and can climb the proverbial ladder, eventually claiming a title of respect or a reputation that might instill fear! Like dragons? Youâ€™ll love our NPC Dragon Council!

A character can be a member of a guild and a religion. The religions reflect the roster of Gods and Goddesses of Tirradyn. Some members of the pantheon are highly visible and others prefer to keep a distance from the spotlight. As may be expected, the differences in such a wide world can present rising angers and heated debates that often turn to physical outcomes. We have skilled players in the art of role-play-combat and anticipate the option of PK being implemented in the future for those more inclined to that manner of battle.

Our players are dedicated in that they are repeat visitors. It is not common to meet a person in the IC world and not see them again for a week. It is easy to make a name for oneself, positively or negatively, depending on the style and preferences of the character/player. We appreciate and always consider ideas submitted by our players. We are proud of the fact that we have active nobles and a council for the player base. TG is home and a community that many of us spend the majority of our free time actively seeking to improve and enhance to an even better atmosphere. We welcome visitors to come and spend time with us and see if we may be the perfect place for your creativity.

mud.name: AstroMUDv2
mud.desc: AstroMUD is a place of dreams. Silly, serious or even terrifying.You choose the path you wish to walk. Will you be good or evil? Will you walk in the night with the undead or feel the sunlight on your face? AstroMUD's creation happened in a remote section of the universe, in a relatively small galactic cluster, a medium size mass of matter came together to form a planetary body. Thus AstroMUD was born.

Astro Scholars have long blamed the lack of true rules in the universe on this statistical improbability. However others believe that the universe simply needed a place to put 'stuff' it couldn't explain, but was probable.

AstroMUD is old in mud years and has more to offer than we could ever hope to explain here. We offer you an invitation to visit one of the most addictive games on earth. Come live in our world where dreams do come true.

mud.name: Final Fantasy Online
mud.desc: Final Fantasy Online (Compendium) has returned, with new features, new areas and a whole bunch of new experiences.

Features ----------------------------------- Over 500 different, unique quests. Functional Multi-World System including, but not limited to: Final Fantasy Tactics, Final Fanatsy 7, Final Fanatsy 6, Chrono Trigger, Final Fanatsy 4 A fully functional

mud.name: Erotic Labs
mud.desc: WARNING: Adult Content ========================

A relatively small, sedate building set away off to the side of the country road and bordered on one side by a lake, and on the other by an old growth forest. Pastoral. Picturesque. Quaint, even. Without any real signposts or labels, the labs housed within are incredibly inconspicuous. Though inside, any number of experiments - illogical, unethical, and perverse to the eyes of nature - can be found walking around as if every day and commonplace. Through these labs, every little experiment that no one else wants to come within shouting distance of, whether for abundance of scruples or fear for more 'physical' concerns. Yes, the Erotic Labs, home to the kinkiest research never before stumbled upon. Any number of roles are available for the medical lab staff, or for one of the experiments, or even for the in-house security or receptionists. Many options for adult roleplay abound, and all are welcome. Come join at: mucks.homeip.net:6969 Pfizer doesn't have a -thing- on us.

mud.name: Four Primes MUSH
mud.desc: Imagine, if you will, that something DID happen at Midnight on January 1st, 2000. Your computer, and TV flickers slightly, and goes back to normal. You keep drinking, and figure it's nothing. The next morning, if you're one of the lucky ones, you wake up and pop some asprin, then go back to your normal life.
If you're unlucky... something happened that night... You woke up and found that you were different somehow. Nothing changed physically, but you feel different.

After a few days at work, you have an outburst. You can't take it anymore, your boss is riding you like a bull, or treating you like a slab of meat. You yell at him, scream, wave your arms around, and tell him you hope he dies. As you storm out of the building and get in your car, you turn to look at the building one last time. It colapses, and everyone in the building dies. This is the fate of the unlucky.
It is later discovered that you can use powers, not unlike those of magical distinction. Only some people have had the reaction to the event. The unlucky were deemed: Magi.

**** The events on Four Primes happen 20 years after Y2K. The Mage and scientist activists created an island that was supposed to be used as a refuge for the Magi, so they could be away from theprejudice brought on by the intollerant people in the 'main world'.
Join us as one of the citizens on the island. Use your magical power to live your life on the island, make friends, and involve yourself in deep plots run by our wonderful Staff.
Or
Use your smarts and knowledge of science to create wonderful inventions to defend the island from intruders, or to help get to the bottom of a deep, and evil conspiracy.
We run Plots with our players as often as we can. We staff do also have jobs, and home lives, but we do everything we can to make your stay at Four Primes an enjoyable one.
From, Xen@frostmud.com

mud.name: Utopia Type Final
mud.desc: Greetings Pkers, Well after thinking long and hard I have decided to host my own version of Godwars: Utopia.. We will not shut down we will not keep the mud closed for months at a time and changes will be implemented on a regular basis.. I know from past experiances how hard it was playing on previous utopia versions when nothing ever got changed, fixxed or improved. Currently the mud is up and open and looking for testers to help iron out the bugs and give ideas to what you the players would like to change add or anything else you can imagine. The server is paid for a year so have no fear of us leaving anytime soon. We Offer. The features already in place make the game rich very fast paced and fun. So stop on by and let death rain down on your foes.

mud.name: MaddockMUX
mud.desc: Come roleplay in the Old West!

Maddock is a small town in the territory of Montana, in the American West in the year 1880. Maddock has a wide variety of residents and visitors -- travelers headed farther west, cowboys, ranchers, miners, businessmen, gamblers, farmers, and even the occasional outlaw. The town supports commerce for the numerous ranches and farms in the area, as well as the gold, silver, and ore mines located across the river to the west.

Maddock boasts an active group of long-time players who are always interested in drawing in new people. The game is a consensual-based roleplay system where staff and senior players are available to help. New players can develop an original character that suits what they would like to play and they will be offered assistance to weave them into the ongoing story and roleplay of this not-so-simple little town.

mud.name: xBLUE
mud.desc: A Discworld-inspirated enviroment with it's own theme and world-ideas.

mud.name: Utopia : Ascension
mud.desc: This is Utopia : Ascension! Currently running stock Utopia TYPE Final, I am currently in the process of implementing new features to encourage fun, high level PK!
Upcoming is an original Ascension system, where highly skilled players can begin ascension as demi-gods, powerful beings with a high degree of customization.
Also, we are currently running a vote to see whether kingdoms should be implement, and how it should be done. Come voice your opinion!
Currently we are looking for players that don't mind the stock environment and are willing to assist with testing the new features that will be coming in.

mud.name: Silent Eve
mud.desc: Welcome to Silent Eve! We are a new and growing MUD based in a modern WoD(World of Darkness) Los Angeles. Currently we are only accepting Vampires of the Camarilla sect with limited Mortals, however that will change in the future. We believe very strongly in players having a lot of interaction with each other and making each person feel like a vital point in the story. Our StoryTeller staff holds to a golden rule and understands that WE are here to provide YOU, the player with an enjoyable place to play first and foremost. We have set in place some custom systems which we strongly believe will enhance the value of your time playing within our world, these include but are not limited to the Status-System and the Domain-System, which you can find more information about on our website!
We look forward to having you join our growing family!

mud.name: Age of Legynds
mud.desc: This mud is inspired by a live action role-playing game in Georgia, US. I hope this mud will be a relaxed place where small groups of friends can explore the huge stock TBA world. Please feel free to come by and help us test it.

We have several race selections and 5 basic classes, many new critical attack skills have been added. This is not a complex mud with too many rules to learn, this is a simple system designed to mimic a live action game. If you are more interested in playing and having fun more than you are min/maxing or power leveling, I hope you'll stop by.
Thank you!
Ossified65

mud.name: NarutoMUD
mud.desc: NarutoMUD was born out of a passion for Naruto and lack of quality anime or Naruto themed MUDs. With years of hard work, from many talented people, it is our pleasure to let players enjoy this labor of love.

We welcome Naruto fans, and non-fans, to enjoy playing in our immersive world. Weâ€™ve painstaking constructed a world which feels like a digital slice of Japan. Weâ€™ve always ensured our game has the depth required to be in the Naruto theme, and do justice to a genre of MUD which typically is scoffed at.
It would be our honor for you to try us out and see for yourself, we strive for an â€œEverything must be coolâ€ approach, and I think youâ€™ll see why when you log in.

mud.name: QuarantineMUD: Chronicles
mud.desc: QuarantineMUD offers a challenging yet fun alternative to mudding today. While many MUDs concern themselves with the latest scripts and addons, we take a more laid back approach. We've been around for nearly 15 years now, and still have that Old-MUD quality that many of the modern MUDs lack. QuarantineMUD has a tradition of providing an excellent MUD'ing environment, knowledgeable and helpful staff, and many hours of enjoyment as you explore our large and diverse world. We also support an elaborate clan system, and we host a dedicated staff of Questing Immortals, who strive to bring even more excitement into your MUD life. Role-Playing is encouraged, but not required. However, most of all, we strive to make your time here on Quarantine to be fun and enjoyable - because that's what MUD'ing is all about!

mud.name: City Of Angels CoA
mud.desc: LA The city of Angels.
This World is based apon world of Darkness, where heros fall quickly and evil runs rampart. Vampires are hostling and jostling for possi tions ofm power.

The Sabbat are just sending scouts at the moment with the Camarilla just loosing thier elysium to the fire of rebellion. LA is Anarch territory where everone even the Anarchist must be carefull of thier actions.

Who will you side with, will it be the Fanatical Sabbat who with thier ritualistic Traditions make them very dangerious, Or will it be the Camarilla, the Vampires who see Humans as a threat to thier existance and with thier social structure semented in is the most secure for a young vampire.
or will you be an independant or Anarchist jumping up and down about freedom of expression.
Who ever you choose its going to be a long and hard road with many twists and turns.
The Storytellers are waiting for applications for new characters, they are very helpfully and get things done. Note: garou is closed untill further notice.

mud.name: ShadeMUCK
mud.desc: Welcome to ShadeMUCK! We are very proud to offer a 100% completly original MUCK for everyone to enjoy! We have a detailed list of possible races and classes, but if none of those suit your style, talk to a wiz! Most are very open and if your idea is reasonable, then usually you get to have it! Right now, there are a couple players, since this muck JUST started back up after a period of dormancy.
So come on in to ShadeMUCK for some Roleplay with nice and thoughtful players. Any styles are welcome, if you prefer longer poses or short, it can be adapted to. Whatcha waitin fer, come on in!

mud.name: Galactic Horizon
mud.desc: Galactic Horizon is an active Star Wars MUD with a rather active player base. We have most clan spots filled, but are still looking for active leaders.

We have a dedicated Admin team, and have very skilled builders working constantly to add to the content in game. We are opening new areas and adding planets constantly. We have a couple of casual coders who have added to our code, and helped minimize MUD crashes.
We are always looking for knowledgable builders and coders to help continually add to our game. Feel free to post in the

mud.name: Dystopium
mud.desc: Dystopium has been in development on and off for about five years. It's now getting to the point where I can begin weaving together the various coded systems to achieve something that's actually playable and fun. Dystopium uses the MOO codebase.

The game is set mainly in the city of Vigil at the moment, but there is a lot more in the game than just one city (although very few people in-game actually know this as of yet). In the 2500s in Vigil, most technology has taken a mechanical-electronic route, combining the strengths of cybernetics and heavy machinery. The North and South sectors of Vigil are as divided and opposing as black and white, with North a filthy collapsing anarchic slum and South a shimmering arcology of law and order.

At the moment I'm concentrating on polishing up and completing what I have: the North half of the city of Vigil (quite a large area), and a lot of basic working code for AI, combat, theft, shops, skills, player customisation & advancement etc.
I'm accepting players who'd like to test the game in its current alpha state, and I'd also accept help from the right kind of applicants.

mud.name: Star Trek: Redemption
mud.desc: The year is 2379. Four years since the end of the Dominion War, which devastated a large portion of Starfleet's Fleet, and barely almost a year since the Romulans opened negotiations. But there are still challenges to be faced, and as much as it looks like things are finally changing for the better there is always that chance that something unexpected may happen. Knowing this chance existed, in 2376 the Federation Council, based on the presentation of Starfleet Command, authorized the 'Redemption Project'. Redemption-class starships were designed to be heavier variants of the Sovereign-class starships. To start, Starfleet Corps of Engineers took the design of the Sovereign and expanded on it. A new warp drive was commissioned to be built by venerable earth-based General Electric. In addition, a whole new platform of equipment was to be designed for ship, with the hopes that she would become the most sophisticated ship of her kind.

mud.name: DragonBall Series: Revival
mud.desc: Based 400 years past the events of DragonBall GT the famous z-warriors have become nothing more then a bedtime story. As time has past on the universe has become a place of constant war between rival civilizations for resource rich planets.
Play from 16 different species and span the cosmos in your own search for ultimate power in the SWR based mud.

mud.name: ST: Darkness Within
mud.desc: Star Trek: Darkness Within is a Star Trek-themed MUSH set in the mirror universe during the period between the Enterprise television show and the original series of Star Trek. Since the majority of the details during this period (and in this timeline) are unknown, we follow canon as much as possible and have a unique history to fill in the many gaps.

The year is 2199, and the Terran Empire rules the majority of space with an iron fist. Having conquered most of the major powers, the Terran Empire's reach extends throughout the galaxy. Laying siege to those who stand in their way, the Terran Empire is feared throughout the alpha and beta quadrants. Within the last ten years, however, a growing force of resistance has become a thorn in the massive paw of the Terran Empire. Battles between the Imperial Starfleet and the resistance dot the blackness of space with brief flashes of explosions and death. Independent factions hope not to get involved, and resistance members try their hardest to rally support for the cause.

With reports that the Empire has finally been able to reconstruct a Constitution class warship from the plans of the futuristic USS Defiant (NCC-1764), the resistance may have a tough time standing up to the firepower of this new threat. Will you fight for the glory of the Terran Empire as an officer in the Imperial Starfleet? Will you side with the rebellion and lead covert missions into enemy space to secure the freedom of your race? Or will you be a wealthy merchant dealing in trade goods and secrets? Without the light, there can be no shadow - only the darkness within.
Game Forums: http://forums.darknessmush.net Game Wiki: http://wiki.darknessmush.net

mud.name: Dalila3
mud.desc: Dalila3 is based on the fantasy books of David Eddings

mud.name: Static Chaos: Reborn
mud.desc: This mud is Alathon's Static Chaos (aka Chaosium). After cruising the mudding community over the past six months I was sadly disappointed with all of the player killing muds that I found and tried. They were all unbalanced and sadly unoriginal. There may have been minor deviations between each one...but no matter where you go it is your same old style of Vampires, Werewolves, Skyknights, blah blah blah. Thus it is with pride that I present to you a rebirth of an oldie but goodie. I spent the last couple week's bringing Alathon's code up to par with current environments and will be continuing development on the mud.
Static Chaos was built by Alathon using Merc 2.2 as a base and it emulates the player killing environment of GodWars. Similarities are there but that's about all they are.
There are 5 classes:

Saiyan - Masterful warriors using Ki Patryn - Masters of Rune magic and mystic tattoos Sorcerer - Mystic art masters wielding powerful Chants Fist - Hand to Hand warriors using powerful combos Mazoku - Shapeshifting astral beings
PK ranges are set in a tier system that many of us are familiar with and lower Tiers are protected by a working Paradox system.
There are many custom areas not found anywhere else. Need more destructive capability than you already possess? Then get a mobile suit and take down your enemies in a DeathScythe today!

mud.name: Elan Vital
mud.desc: Millenia into the future, the Interstellar Human Empire had grown too populous to support all its subjects on the planets it held. The Empress Titania, faced with this crisis, decided to solve it by combining a mission of expansion and exploration with a dispersal of the human population across the stars.

From Earth, hundreds of colony ships set out into the black, carrying millions of people among them to find new worlds to live on. Among these ships was the SS Starfall, a colony ship carrying little more than a thousand individuals, and led by the Houses Petakova and Stocklin.

Over decades, the Starfall drifted through space, exploring star system after star system to no avail. In the end, however, they came across a planet with its single moon where they could live. The moon they called Pomona, the planet they called Voltumnus.

Life on the planet was not easy, however. They soon found that all manner of terrible beasts lived there, wielding a force that could only be called magic. The creatures besieged their city, named for their Empress, and the more powerful of them decimated the colonists' ability to reach the sky again.
The colony survived, however, and in time the same magic that the monsters wielded began to show up in Titania's citizens.
Seven hundred years have passed since the founding of the city. Petakova champions magic, and Stocklin champions science. Both aim for domination. Which side do you choose?

mud.name: Aragond: The Chronicles
mud.desc: This is a Medieval Fantasy/High Magic ROM based mud with several features to set it above the rest of your cookie cutter stock muds, including but not limited to:

- Massive amounts of non-stock spells/skills. - Multi-classing. - A completely unique questing system. - Skill trees based on skill prerequisites and stat requirements. - Player owned and operated ships. - A living economy (affected by almost everything) - Extended immortal functions (for running in game quests and such) - Weapon specialization for fighters. - Elemental specialization for wizards. - Favored enemies for rangers, and a unique tracking system. - Wizards learn spells from scrolls, and can scribe them to teach other Wizards. - Traps, trap detection, caltrops, throwing for Thieves. - Resource gathering: foraging, mining, prospecting, etc.. - Detailed crafting, requiring the right tools, ingredients, and recipe/plans. - Detailed weather system, which affects your character in many ways. - Many, MANY expansions for OLC to give new areas more flavor. (oprogs/rprogs, new sectors, new flags (for objs/rooms), Qedit (online quest editor), almost 200 npc races, and tons of features to make building a breeze. - Complete removal of stock areas. We're in the process of rebuilding our world from scratch. Only stock area left is the academy which we've nearly completely refaced. - Factions, led by players, made up of areas, which can produce money, materials, etc.. for global trade.
Features/Systems planned in the future:

- caravans which take goods from one city to another, which can at times be ambushed. - new combat system, initiative based, involving weapon speeds, etc... - 'instanced' dragons, with smart AI who can devastate towns and then run to hide in their lair. - and much much more.
So, if you're interested in building/playtesting here, please let me know. Drop by aragond.com:9000 or just email me at drew.haley@gmail.com. Hope to see you there!

mud.name: The Builder Academy
mud.desc: The Builder Academy is foremost a training academy for anyone willing to learn or teach how to build a virtual World. Due to our success and the stagnation of the CircleMUD codebase we have also released our code for anyone desiring a stable and functional codebase.
tbaMUD is the continued development of the codebase formerly known as CircleMUD. And we use it to mean both the Academy for training, and the codebase that is made freely available to the community.

The most challenging aspect of running a mud is finding good builders. You will hear this from the admin of every MUD that has ever been. In the past it has always been up to each individual MUD to find and usually train their own builders. This works, but I think the MUDding community can come up with something better. That is why I created The Builder Academy.

TBA has trained 1000's of builders and has an extensive tutorial and help file system. No pressure, no deadline, just come learn, teach, or help develop the tbaMUD codebase. Give back to the community we have all taken so much from. TBA is a MUDding resource. Take advantage of it so we can improve the entire MUDding community.
TBA can also be used by other MUDs as a builder's port. Just send us your newbie builders. We will teach them and then you can have them back with the zones they built.
We are always open to anyone willing to learn, teach, or help develop our newly released tbaMUD codebase (the codebase formerly known as CircleMUD).

mud.name: Mega Man Mush
mud.desc: The theme has brought together the timelines of most of the Megaman games and melded it into one complete story. Four major factions fight for the fate of the world:

Repliforce (Led by General, a group of reploids who serves the official defense force of the world), The Maverick Hunters (Led by Dr. Light and Rock (Megaman, X), an elite gathering of reploids that work outside of government regulations), The Mavericks (Led by Sigma, a group of reploids infected by the Maverick Virus, causing them to have an uncontrollable hate for mankind), and the Robot Masters (Led by Dr. Wily and Bass (Forte), a group of androids built by Dr. Wily, who is bent on world domination.). Along with these four factions, the fifth faction, the Civilians, consists of humans, androids, and reploids, with functions ranging from regular citizen, to Secretary-General of the UN, to a member of the Yakuza, to an elite Strider.
We are always accepting applications and the entire staff will be happy to help you in any way possible.
http://www.megamanmush.com megamanmush.com port 1997

mud.name: Lac
mud.desc: Lac is a polish, fantasy oriented mud with polish language enforced. All information is provided by our web site at http://lac.pl/ This include information about available races (human, elf, halfelf, drow, dwarf, halfdwarf, hobbit, gnome, sectoid and vampire) and classes (warrior, mage, cleric, thief, spy, assasin, monk, psionicist, necromancer and paladin).

Few words for polish-speaking people: Oferujemy ci gre na w pelni polskim mudzie. Do wyboru masz 10 profesji oraz 9 ras (istnieje takze mozliwosc gry wampirem w przypadku zarazenia sie wampiryzmem). Lac to glownie gra bitewna. Do wyboru masz walki solo i w grupach, z graczami i z postaciami komputerowymi. Poza walka na Lacu znajdziesz takze zadania, popijawy, nocne kapiele, sluby, zabojcow i ich lowcow i wiele, wiele innych rzeczy. Sprawdz sam.

mud.name: Dragon Ball : Genuine
mud.desc: Open For player Testing

mud.name: Promage
mud.desc: Promage is a mud coded from scratch in Visual Basic. We have rooms, monsters, objects, grouping, skills, damage and healing spells, ansi color, auto-mapping, shops, mailing, storage, banking, automated questing, training, 5 races and 7 classes. In contrary to most muds, monsters and objects don't have fixed stats, but the level determines the stats. This allows unique abilities like leveling up objects and monsters.

Objects level up by simply wearing them and killing monsters equal in power, making them stronger in defense, attack and/or damage. They can load on monsters, in rooms and chests and can tweak or have many different attributes. Tweaking means the object is either slightly better of worse than normal, an iron sword +7 means is 7% better. Attributes load at random, for example a chance to pierce armor.
On slow times, the mud switches servers and is run on promage.hopto.org 6000, while port 4000 is shutdown.
The game is currently down due to connection problems.

mud.name: Dungeon Runners
mud.desc: Dungeon Runners is a mostly stock Rom mud where players and admins of the website mudmagic.com come to discuss online text game issues. Swing in and grab a few levels and speak with the developers of mudmagic.com.

mud.name: Tribal Dawn
mud.desc: Well, this is a new mud based in a medieval fantasy world. Coded from scratch yet trying to maintain familiarities of more popular code bases to lower the learning curve. The idea behind the mud is a world broken up into kingdoms and tribes. Player run governments extensive crafting and a world that is alive all make this game unique. At the moment we have just finished the base engine code and are adding content and features slowly but surely. That means that the game is not much of a game right now, but it is ready for input from players. The forums will be up soon for player input as to the current systems as the game grows. Please do not log on looking for a game to play. I am only posting this for people who enjoy bug testing and getting in on the ground floor of a project. Any questions can be sent to my email.

mud.name: Mythara: Remnants of a Shattered World
mud.desc: It is a land of promise... a land of intrigue, guile, alliances and deceit. It is a land where wars are waged, diplomacy sought. It is a land of fantasy, of magic and myth.

It is called Mythara... but it once was called Earth. Mankind ruined it, abandoned it, and after killing himself off, left it to heal itself. Mankind has been neither seen nor heard in more millennia than even the eldest of races can recall.
Many would argue that this is a good thing.

Welcome to Mythara: Remnants of a Shattered World! We are a semi-high fantasy MUX with a unique twist: the races you've come to know and love in fantasy fiction are shockingly different, our own legends mere shades of their reality. God-like beings walk the planet, and interact on a personal basis with its inhabitants. Mythological beasts roam the countryside unhindered... and the ancient technologies of the destroyer race, mankind, are not only forgotten, but also long gone to dust.

Aside from the occasional political dispute, this world is practically idyllic. Then mankind had to show up again, and mess with everything. That was two years ago, with men and women from our own time, preserved through time by a magic they had no conception of, finding themselves in a world unlike their own. And, unlike the stories from their past, this time they had no fallen technology to reply upon.

So, be a human, and help the struggling race climb from the ashes... or, if it suits your tastes more, play as one of eleven other player races in this dice-less, freeform role-play environment. The story is yours to write.
Our game is currently open for playtest and chargen. Don't mind the dust, we're still moving in!

mud.name: The Land
mud.codebase: [Dikumud] Heavily Modified from Diku and Renegade Outpost
mud.desc: After many variations, the mud is still around. From Kaos HQ to The Land, The Land is now running on a new server with many of the old players, and of course some new ones. There has been a lot of change in the immortal staff, and a lot of changes have been done already, with more in store. So stop in and check it out.

mud.name: Inferno3
mud.desc: O Inferno3 Ã© um RPG Online cujo projeto teve inÃ­cio em 1998.

Trata-se de um 'MUD' (Multi-User Dungeon), um gÃªnero de RPG Online precursor dos MMORPG's atuais que consiste em apresentar ao jogador, por meio de textos, descriÃ§Ãµes e idÃ©ias, um universo vasto e vivo, auto-sustentÃ¡vel e sofrendo poucas interferÃªncias administrativas em seu curso.
Criado e mantido como um hobby de seus fundadores e colaboradores, o Inferno3 nÃ£o possui fins lucrativos e nada Ã© cobrado de seus jogadores.
Muitas pessoas jÃ¡ passaram pela nossa equipe, cada uma deixando sua importante marca em nossa histÃ³ria.

mud.name: Divided Sky
mud.desc: The wizards confronted Torban about his actions, but he would not listen to their pleas. Torban soon disappeared from view all together, to wait upon a time when he would release the bonds he had placed on the mana sites.

That was more than 500 years ago. Since that time, the races that had fled underground returned to the surface to find a world changed beyond all recognition. And recently people have discovered new ways to gain mana, and to work their way around the blocks between worlds with word controlled portals. A new age of magic is here.

The population of Delsance returned to the surface to find their land all but destroyed by the furious wars. What had once been a magnificent land, had been reduced to little more than a desert. The only inhabitants of this area were the nomadic Delsan, the only race that did not seek shelter underground, with their caravans moving about scavenging the desert slowly of its remaining resources. It is in this desert that the great wizard Torban is rumoured to live, in the last of the ancient mana towers, which is protected by an oasis to confuse the wily explorers.

The people dispersed, to seek new homes. Most moved to an area known as the Salyes Plains in the centre of the continent, whilst others returned to the underground, satisfied with their new home. These new kingdoms have flourished in the five centuries since the mana was blocked, and the way is open for bold young adventurers to seek fame and glory on the new frontier...

mud.name: Threshold RPG
mud.desc: On Threshold, Role Playing is not just a feature- it is a requirement! This completely original world evolves based on the actions of the player base. The detailed religions, governments, economies, guilds, clans, and legal system are all player run. There are scores of intricate plot lines constantly evolving that make the game into a living, breathing world.

Threshold is one of the most successful role playing required online games. If you have not experienced it you are missing out on a wonderful opportunity to express your creativity and your imagination in a mature, safe environment.
* In operation for 12 years. (Founded June 1996)
* 14 GUILDS, 10 RACES, 12 RELIGIONS, Over 500 spells and abilities.
* PLAYER RUN Religions, Government, Guilds, Clans, Legal System, and Economy.
* HUGE WORLD to explore with exciting (yet optional) quests. All areas are totally unique to Threshold and will stretch your imagination.
* COMBAT system that requires tactics, planning, and a cool head.
* MINI-GAMES: Tons of non-combat mini games where players can compete with each other (dueling, Quail Hunt, chess, fishing, Trial Arcanus, and many more).
* STABILITY: Top notch internet connection and extremely stable and powerful servers.
* NEWBIE FRIENDLY: We'll help you feel right at home.

mud.name: Tower mud development
mud.desc: The timeline is in earths distant future. When mankind has mostly made peace with themselves. Parapsychics have Helped mankind reach the stars quickly. There abilities make. them the elite group. It takes a rare qift to do what a Prime, is responsible for. *This mud is a development project for a job email Jasontift@united.net*

mud.name: LA: A House Divided
mud.desc: \"Pick your enemies carefully or you'll never make it in Los Angeles.\" - Rona Barrett

A House Divided is a MUSH based on Vampire: The Masquerade. The setting is modern Los Angeles, a sprawling metropolis with over 15 million mortals and scores of undead who hunt them. Upon this canvass, our goal is to create the finest, most engaging and politically complex Vampire MUSH in the world.

\"How are you different from the other White Wolf MUSHes on the net?\" * We focus *only* on the setting of Vampire: the Masquerade; we don't even bother trying to fold in the other World of Darkness games. * We have a streamlined role-play system designed to take advantage of the MUSH environment. Everything you need to play is available online. * We have an extensive stat-locked lore system that provides ample surprises and mysteries for the most jaded of players. * We support cooperative RP - a philosophy that draws on the maturity of the players to provide realistic and player-driven role-play. * Any player can play a neonate level vampire; it's a Vampire MUSH. Ghouls and mortals are more freely available. Older vampires are application-only. * Our focus is Camarilla society, with its politics and intrigue. While mortal society is present as a backdrop, our MUSH revolves around vampires.

mud.name: Straits of Manzaleh
mud.desc: The decision was made to rebuild the game from the ground up. Currently we are still building, but are structurally sound and are open for RP. Straits of Manzaleh currently offers:
- Player-centrific Courier system. Run your own cargo with no ship required.
- A turn-based space system. No, not Aspace, S-Pace. Our own homebrew space system. Ever want to attack starships with ground weaponry? Well, this system does it with a load of options to boot.
- Sectional Armor System. Yes, now you can wear iron gauntlets and a kevlar vest. Blow off body parts or just get knocked down.
- Unique virtual weapon/equipment/medical/repair system. One command runs them all, and to use some of them you'd better have levels high enough to use them or...they don't work.
- Skills! Yeah, we broke down and went with skills. As we go, we will be raising the number of skills. Right now we have 30 skills in play.
- Our patented Furnace Crafting system. Don't like the choices of equipment on the game? Make your own!
- Six species to choose from with four others currently App-only.
- Coming soon: Quests! Yup, perform tasks for cash or prizes.
- And much, much more.

mud.name: Ancient Chaos
mud.desc: \"The best way to predict the future is to invent it.\"
Ancient Chaos has sprung from minds and souls of many VERY experienced and long time players of MUDs, particularly SMAUG muds.
These people have joined to create an incredible world of conflict, puzzling quests and groups of people that love to play in a fantasy text-based world.
We are new-player friendly as well as savvy in the wants and desires of extremely experienced players. Our Immortals are approachable and available to help you with your concerns and problems.

We have already created MANY new areas (and our staff is constantly working at constructing new ones). There are also many new features in Ancient Chaos including a fully integrated marriage code system that allows you to MUD marry and have a special command called \"Soulmate\" to immediately transfer you to your mate wherever they may be (except for a few limited places).
Our Deity system is fully reworked and uses an extremely complicated variable system which gives our many Deities unique and diverse attributes.
We are currently still in the design stages, but open to the public, so come and join a new MUD where your views, opinions and time can actually make a difference to shape the path of our MUD.

We allow infinite character creations and currently allow up to 8 peaceful characters per player (ip) to play simultaneously so that you may help one character with others. Deadly (PKill or PVP) players are limited to ONE DEADLY character per ip logged at any one time.

************************************************** We are currently looking for builders who have vision and GOOD knowledge of the spelling and grammar of the English language. (Sowwy ... We dunt wunna rewright all your aryas no madder how awesum yur dreems.)

Successful applicants will be able to create areas (using the SMAUG codebase (and our custom builders' commands and variables as they come along)) that will conform to the current balance and mob/equipment limits which exist on the MUD at present. He or she will be able to create areas within a bracketed level range and not ONLY be interested in building Multi-Avatar level areas.

Applicants will be asked to level to level 20 in order to get to become familiar with our MUD and its staff and players somewhat as well as have time to check news, notes and help files. It does not take a lot of work to accomplish this.
We are currently coding new custom building commands with extended variables to make your every construction dream a consuming reality for our players.
Feel free to contact us at any time with inquiries either through our website or email address.

mud.name: SluggyMARE
mud.desc: We are a Sluggy Freelance (http://www.sluggy.com) themed MARE. There are various Sluggy characters running around, Bunbun, Zoe (in both human and camel form depending on the circumstances), Kiki, KZK, and more, and a number of familiar Sluggy locations. (Hoggelrynth, The Brie Meighsaton house, The Isle of Ployees) Players get their own personal and private area to build and customize.
The world expands as the Sluggy storyline does, and current projects include The Storm Breaker Saga and the Dimension of Pain.

mud.name: Clandestine
mud.desc: Clandestine is a friendly MUD where fun is the highest priority. A healthy mix of roleplay and hack'n'slash, Clandestine is still growing, and player ideas are always considered and frequently implemented. Its success has led to its selection as Mud Connector's Mud of the Month for December, 1998. Clandestine offers 50 races and 30 classes to suit just about everyone's roleplaying needs. Twelve religions, from good to evil, lawful to chaotic, each have their own religion spells. Player-killing (PK) is allowed, and even encouraged, with level and religious rank based limits. Clandestine has many features not found on most ROM muds, including multiclassing, an online casino with working card games, relic weapons that increase power as you use them, and much more! Our website includes an up-to-date map of the world and you can browse races, classes, and spell group information to make your character creation easier.

mud.name: Darkness Falling
mud.desc: Why is it so cold here? It had forgotten what it was like to be in this realm. This physical world and all it's feelings. Pain and pleasure, all of these things it had forgotten about eons ago. It has returned though. Escaped the tortures of hell and free to roam creation once more. This night it shall repay the sons of Adam for their treachery. They forsook those who loved them and repaid our love with hate. They shall feel the pain that it has felt for an eternity at the tip it's claws.

The demon peers down from the rooftop at the hapless people below never realizing that another knew of it's coming. In the shadows across from it sits a tall thin fellow in dark clothes smoking a cigarette. We always know, we are the faithful and the Creator still speaks to us. These beings have been long since condemned and we will see to it that their hatred doesn't touch humanity. We are the last of the Angels, returned from the Creator to watch over the children of Adam and restore this place to what it was meant to be. Before the final darkness falls..

mud.name: MUCK University
mud.desc: MUCK University is provided as a learning tool for those wanting to learn out to build, administer, and write programs for Mucks, particularly GlowMUCK derived Mucks. An ongoing project in developing course material and testing tools continues to be the main goal of University.

It is also the primary Beta server for GlowMUCK development. The latest beta versions of the GlowMUCK server and MUF/MPI programs are tested on University before being released to the public. This provides an opportunity for other GlowMUCK Administrators to see the changes in 'action' before they are released.

mud.name: SporkMUCK
mud.desc: Spork is a small, social MUCK open to any and all; roleplayers, geeks, furries, people who just want to hang out and chat. The dust is still settling as many features are being revamped or replaced entirely, but we have big plans for the future of this place and most everyone is welcome to join us.

Unique features include the majority of the core systems being custom coded, a number of games ranging from poker and other card games to our ever-popular custom slot machines, and some half-crazed inventions that you've never seen before, such as travelling with Nexus Jump Boots. We've also got an intricate MUD-style combat system under development, and a number of other features being worked on for the near future.

mud.name: Forgotten Kingdoms
mud.desc: Forgotten Kingdoms is an RPI (Role-Play Intensive) game which is set in the Forgotten Realms multiverse. The game has over 250 unique areas and is still growing rapidly, thanks to a large team of builders who continuously update existing areas as well as adding new areas and challenges.

New characters can choose from a huge range of races and subraces, including shield dwarves, moon elves, mountain orcs and even planetouched characters such as genasi, aasimar or tieflings. Once you have selected your characters race, you must choose a base class of Warrior, Wizard, Rogue or Priest, each of which offers a different roleplay experience, and can be further customised by joining one of almost 50 guilds. The last major decision to be made by any new character is to decide where they grew up - possibilities include several famous Forgotten Realms locations, including Waterdeep, Zhentil Keep, Menzoberranzan and Mithril Hall.
Additional key or unique features of Forgotten Kingdoms include:
1. A large range of feat trees and meta-magic feats, ranging from 'celestial bloodline' to 'crippling strike' through to 'spell-casting prodigy'.
2. A unique 'spell memorisation' system based on system used in Dungeons and Dragons. This means no mana!
3. Well over 300 spells to choose from.

4. Many avenues for character development, including joining up with factions such as the Black Network or the Grey Hands, joining the inner circle or even becoming the high priest of one of 30 faiths...the possibilities are myriad!

5. Close, but not slavish reproduction of Forgotten Realms lore - as a result of various wide-ranging plots and the actions of our players, our world has taken a different path to a different present...
Forgotten Kingdom's greatest strength is its large population of superb role-players, who ensure that there are always several ongoing plots to be a part of.
Come join our online community, we promise you an excellent role-playing experience!

mud.name: Neo Infinity
mud.desc: Neo Infinity will not be based just on Dragonball, I like other Animes also and have yet to see a good mud that uses multiple Animes, created on the Smaug Codebase, so I decided to make one. The only other one I know about was created by me almost three years ago and was stolen. I started this mud back when I was in Highschool like 6 years ago and never got to do anything with it. The Highschool Computers wouldn't allow me to do much back then.

Let me start over, I am opening a very newbie friendly mud, I need a full staff pretty much, I am very picky about who I hire, but I do want a staff that at least knows what they are doing. I am willing to train anyone who wants to learn to build. I am not hiring coders at the moment. The entire mud is pretty much stock DBSaga areas, but I am trying to add on to them. I want to keep them as a Tribute to DBSaga.
I encourage Roleplaying because I enjoy watching the crazy stuff some of the players come up with.

Currently I will be porting over a few new Races that I have created on DBTFF before I had a mental block and quit working there. Fierians, Hylians and Reploids. Reploids, when they are installed, will not have much based on Abilities, but I will be trying to redo them so they play more like in the Megaman games. I am also open to creating more new races based on players Ideas, but that is an in mud issue once you have made yourself at home.
-Arbin-

mud.name: Sandbox
mud.desc: A non-themed, social, programming/building moo. Sandbox welcomes anyone, programmers and builders alike, as well as those interested in learning MOOcode, or just looking for a MOO with a free environment to just hang out and chat on. Programmer bits will be given on request. The rules are very loose on Sandbox, there is no rule regarding language so explicit language could be present, but is not generally encouraged.

mud.name: Towers
mud.desc: We have a rich history that the players over the past 12 years have built and added to themselves. We have 4 clans that are run by mortals. We have 6 base classes and if you do multiples using our remort system other classes become available. We also have a multiclassing system that isn't fully implemented meaning that if you wish to multiclass you need an immortal to allow you to do it. The clans are small right now and some need leaders. Clans also have elder positions available and imm positions known as essences available. If you feel you are a good rp'er and could bring some new rp ideas and life please log in and give us a try. If you have immortal experience feel free to log on and learn the mud from a mortals perspective and should you learn the mud well an essence position or other immortal position could be your calling. We have available quests that any can do once the minimum level is achieved. We have numerous races that are good at various things and a couple races specific to our mud.

mud.name: Ashirion: The Broken Sphere
mud.desc: Ashirion: The Broken Sphere is a High Fantasy, Original Theme gameworld that combines a storytelling element with a very low level of code. Set on a world that was once whole, the Broken Sphere is now a broken world held together by powerful magic and some say - hope. Ashirion is the result of 6 years of work online and 23-4 years of work offline, from Wolf. Ashirion is a dark universe of danger and adventure, where the forces of light strive to battle the ever growing menace of a triad of despicable foes. The Shadoen, merciless and ruthless servants of the Shadow Lord. The Void, instruments of a mad God, and the Risen - Undead that think, and reason, footsoldiers in the endless twisted games these beings play.

Many events have transpired on Ashirion since the beginning and they are part of the world's history now, heroes have come and gone...shaped the very essence of the Broken Sphere and still they strive to banish the darkness forever.

mud.name: the-night.com
mud.desc: The city of 'Straford' in 'the-night.com' is a hotbed of crime, mystery, paranormal activity, and (best of all) role-playing.

Established in 1999, 'TNC' (formerly 'Stormy Nights') has a new owner and a new direction. The game focuses more on non-stop player-instigated role-play with staff assistance (and from time to time a staff-instigated role-playing session). A player-run newspaper (complete with reports, editors, newsrooms, bulletin boards, and, of course, newspapers) reports the activities of the players, including the player-run police department and organization that often conflicts with one of the player-run mafias. These run-ins often lead to player lawyers representing both sides in our realistic courtroom design with a concealed jury system.

With new professions being enhanced for player-run role-playing all the time, 'the-night.com' is constantly improving itself. Currently featuring a real-time camera/film/theatre system, cars, houses, offices, postal system, phones, casino, three towns (two habitable), television system, auction system, player-run bars, airplanes, trains, musical instruments, accent system, identity-concealing masks, access to staff assistance, and more!
Coming soon: player created (filmed, written, edited by and starring) films, medical system (player-run hospital), and more!
'the-night.com' now supports the Wizard Front End client for those who wish to use it. Access information can be found at www.the-night.com.

mud.name: Final Fantasy Compendium
mud.codebase: [Rom] Highly Modified to suit the Square Worlds
mud.desc: Final Fantasy Compendium, is the All Encompassing Final Fantasy Series based MUD. We cover the grounds of Final Fantasy Tactics and Final Fantasy 7 Currently. Additions are being made daily to prepare for the addition of Final Fantasy 6 and Chrono Trigger.
Currently sporting a thick, highly developed Roleplay Environment, as well as various completely unique systems, such as:

- The Ability and Job Systems, striaght from FFT & Materia(FF7) - A fully functional gate system for travel between the parallel worlds, complete with gate keys. - Completely Player ran cities and environment, down to owning Houses, Shop's and entire Continents! - 100% Custom Quest System, with over 30 quests in game linking to chain quests, and 500 planned out quests pending approval or activation. - A Room Mapping System, as well as a fully unique Worldmap System, which is completely divided for each world.
FFC is based on: FFT&FF7 Soon With: CT, FF4,5,6,8,9,X. Suikoden 1 and 2. As well as Seiken Dentetsu 2 and 3.

mud.name: Dragonlance: Age of Mortals
mud.desc: After a forty-three year sleep, the gods have returned to Krynn. The night sky does not reveal the constellations of Paladine, the benefactor who now walks as a mortal, nor Takhisis, the dark lady whose presence has forever departed this world. The forces of good and evil, however, still wage an epic battle across all of Ansalon. Come join us and leave reality for an hour or two. Join a world where dragons fly overhead, elves roam the streets, and knights seek to restore order. The first Arc of our MUSH is up and running! Join the travelers and citizens of Sanction as the plot thickens. Investigate why Chaos is at work within Sanction, join forces with the Knights of Neraka to reconquer the city for evil, or help the Solamnic Knighthood defeat the besiegers.. The choice is only limited to your imagination. Curious? Stop over! Utilizing the newly released Dragonlance Campaign Setting and Age of Mortals accessory, we are the first Age of Mortals Dragonlance 3.5e d20 roleplaying MUSH on the Internet. Through a unique blend of quality roleplay, excellent code, and ethical staff, we hope you find us to be a game of both quality and quantity; with roleplay available whenever you may be searching for it. We are open for guests to log in so that we can answer any questions that you might have about the theme or the game in general. You can visit our website at http://www.dlaom.org to take a look around or stop by the game at dlaom.org 2063. Character registration is a painless process with our web application system. It will not be longer than 48 hours before you are logging in to create your custom character or select one of the many interesting pregenerated characters from our +ledger. We look foreward to seeing you there!

mud.name: ROT: New Midgaard
mud.codebase: [Rot] Derived from Rom 2.4, Merc, Diku, Rot
mud.desc: A RUNDOWN OF SOME OF THE MUD'S FEATURES:
1. 90% of ROM's stock areas are gone. The stock areas that are left have been completely relocated. Brand new areas have been added!!!!
2. POWERLEVELLING!
3. There is a Top 50 list of difference categories: - Top 50 Assists, Bountys, Damage, Experience, Mobdeaths, Mobkills, Pdeaths, PKills and PKPoints.
4. The experience table has been raised!
5. 3 Reincarnate Tiers! -- 151 levels!
6. Customize your WHO screen!!!!
7. An Automatic Global Quest System!
8. Jog/Run command to get you to areas!
9. Random Quest EQ located throughout the entire world!
10. Storage command to store items!
11. Revive command to recover lost corpses!
STORYLINE:

The Realms of Thoth was (Rot) once a world well-known. All those inhabiting the realm are now a new generation. Thoth is a world long foretold but all around ... new lands and manifestations have risen in the unknown parts. But the races of past lore are still being told till this very day. Enter the universe where the old and new have merged. Old and new entities of good and evil are about. What will you do, the adventurer in this place where the legend still lives?

mud.name: La Dominante
mud.desc: Another Update!! We are opening an Old World of Darkness MUSH, based in Venice, Italy in the year 1252 AD (Chose because according to actual history and White Wolf history, this is the year that the Pope gave his blessing for the Inquisition to start using torture). As we come closer and closer to beta testing the need for staff is becoming more and more prevalent. The focus of the game will fall on the Mortal/Mortal+ Spheres, Inquisitors and Dark Ages Vampire (Revised). We are not yet open to players. So, this post is ideally being made in the hopes of finding the following: Coder Assistant- While most of the games systems and what not are installed and being tested , we will still appreciate and accept any help. Builders â€“ The main grid is still underway and being created as Venice is actually proving to be more difficult at building while still retaining some of the cities most important aspects. Currently, we are seeking builders who enjoy creating the descs and what not as well any building help would be greatly appreciated. Storytellers â€“ HELP! Lolâ€¦. Right now, we are currently seeking Storytellers who are willing to help get the RP and Spheres up and running. As with all other positions, we are looking for reliable people to join the team. Right now, we are seeking Storytellers to run the following spheres: Mortals, Mortal+(Sorcerors, Numina, etc etc), Inquisitor and Vampire. f this sounds like something that appeals to you, please do not hesitate to log in, those who are interested in joining the team please contact Trentino and/or Veneto.

mud.name: Castle D'Image
mud.desc: Castle D'Image MUSH centers on an ancient enchanted castle that has stood shrouded in mystery for some six thousand years. This castle lies near the nexus of the lines of magical energy, the Dragon Lines,that run throughout the world. After hundreds of years of warlord rule, a strong line of rulers rose up to claim the castle for their own under the direction of Nicole Myris Taysinne Alian Rinarra D'Image and her consort Mikel. Queen Nicole D'Image founded a Dynasty that has so far lasted for five hundred years.

The Castle D'Image and its neighboring city of Waes are at times peaceful and harmonious while at other times troubled by turbulence and violence. Its position at the center of all magic in the world has brought both prosperity and trouble from those who would seize its power for their own. Over the years the Castle has drawn a myriad of people to its heart. Royalty, nobles, ambassadors, knights, mages, scholars, adventurers, scoundrels, villains, and even simple folk have lived and died within its walls.

The world of Castle D'Image is a world in which intrigue and romance, adventure and magic are commonplace. It is a land of possibilities, where almost anything an and does happen. For reference purposes, it can best be described as falling roughly into a late medieval - early renaissance timeframe.

Applications are required for characters who are nonhuman, magical, and/or of noble birth. All other characters can be created and played immediately. The MUSH boasts 1-2 long term, MUSHwide TPs per year, usually running 1-2 RL months in length, with other player-run plots and day to day RP occuring in between.
CDI is one of the longest running online roleplay games (MUSH)on the net, having been founded in 1991. Old and new, come and join us at mux.net 5555.

mud.name: Arthnor
mud.desc: Arthnor is set in a fairly generic 'Medieval' world. Players can fight with NPCs and other players, and a number of skills are available (including various forms of crafting e.g. making weapons, armour, cooking, fishing, mining, ...).
It is still being created but is quite playable, and players are encouraged to contribute (players can create their own rooms and objects).

mud.name: EntropyMud
mud.desc: Entropy Mud has been around since 1992. Join us and explore our world. Player grouping is encouraged. All classes and races have distinct skills and spells. Join one of eight clans including Avenchien, Wolf, Fellowship of the Dark, Dark Horde, Black Company, Dynasty and Enigma. Clans range from the purest of good to the darkest of evil. Most players will want to reach the supreme guild classes of Legends and Incognitos, or even our highest player level of Demigod. Go against mobs or players.

Entropy consists of leveling by monster or player killing. It's pure Tier based and best of all it has a unique random generation of skills and spells that you can roll for. Or just sit back and relax you can even earn levels through role play.

mud.name: Crimson Fate
mud.desc: In Prerelease Beta - Rewarding early players with gear, homes, clans, custom pets, and other tokens of appreciation. Come in!

For some hundred years the inhabitants of the Nine Nations of Atleah have peered fearfully from their windows by the light of a molten moon. Tortured by the strains of war and a crushing empire, they have watched by that red light for the impending invasion of slavering demons, of foreign armies, of all the nightmares of war and the dark.

In the midst of all this, the four gods who betrayed a now missing creator manipulate mankind and all else in the guise of mortals themselves. With a stranglehold on rebirth, where for every death there is but one life allowed to be be born, the four Sentinels have devised a way to purge the world of men and other innocents - and replace them with their own kind.

mud.name: Star Trek: Faded Glory
mud.desc: With the conclusion of the Khitomer Accords, peace between the Klingon Empire and the United Federation of Planets is finally a reality. Citizens of both factions can finally look forward to an era in which they need no longer view their neighbours with suspicion and fear and the Klingon Neutral Zone is a historical relic. Only the militaristic elements in Starfleet are displeased, for they face dismantling the old Neutral Zone defenses and disposing of a sudden, vast amount of extra hardware and officers that have come into their hands.

Luckily, the eye of Starfleet Command is always wandering, and with the Klingons friendly, they begin to look with concern at the Romulans. The space around the Romulan Neutral Zone is largely uncharted, and more than one science vessel sent in has not returned. At last, Starfleet can afford to explore in force, and an old dreadnought, the USS Federation, is rapidly recommissioned, crudely refit, and sent into the breach.

But the operation is better optically than strategically. The Federation is forty years old, a ragged old ship that was never properly refit or upgraded and is held together with string, glue, and willpower. The officers and crew are largely a gang of youngsters, misfits, and hasbeens, sent off because they're the ones Starfleet can afford to lose. And the obstacles they will face will be as great as any that a starship has met before.

Star Trek: Faded Glory is a Star Trek MUSH set two years after the events of Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country, on what was once the pride of Starfleet before most of the ship's crew were even born. Run as a project of the god of Corporate Expanse: From the Cradle, Faded Glory is meant to capture the atmosphere of an overstressed ship and an overstressed crew plunged in way over their heads.
For more information, please connect to mush.stfadedglory.com port 2100.

mud.name: Akarian Dawn: Shadows of an Empire
mud.desc: Raughir is dead, and the Last Rift War is over. With the death of its Demonic Emperor, the empire of Uruadum has disintegrated into civil war and chaos. But from the ashes of defeat, the ancient city of Tenigul has arisen and asserted its independence and dominance over the vast province of Akar.

It has been a difficult path to independence, however. Enemies on all sides have beset the city and its province; old alliances have been broken and from them have come new enmities. The collossal Durnalian Empire to the Northeast, across the Kunyori Sea, has established trade with Tenigul, but there is often a grave mistrust for the Durnalians; they were bitter enemies in the Last Rift War. This is a delicate time for Tenigul, and its people. Many and varying Factions within the city and without it are at constant odds with each other, and at any moment an old rivalry may erupt into war. Such is the Kingdom of Akar. These are days when friendships are made and broken overnight; when personal gain is the primary loyalty of most men.

So what will your role be here, traveller? Will you profit greatly here, or will you become the pawn of the powerful? Whom will you serve? Or will you serve yourself? The decision is yours, but beware whom you befriend. Not all is as it seems in the City of Tenigul.

mud.name: Star Wars: Hurrian Realm
mud.desc: Hurrian realm is currently under development, however we welcome player testing, and have an ever growing player base! We currently have 40+ players, around 10 of which are on throughout the day. We are currently searching for competent, active and dedicated players for: Clan/Gov Leaders Roleplaying Admins Builders (Can Train, but requires some knowledge)

We are currently looking for in game builders. People with any SWR or SW:FotE building experience would be a welcome addition to our building team. We are always expanding and adding builders/imms. We also need Roleplaying Admins. These lower level Imms would help players and clans to roleplay in situations that require them, and would also observe and reward Roleplaying.

Immortals are required to register @ our website: (hurrianrealm.exofire.net/1). We also have a \"Help Wanted\" Forum there to post your Resume's. Include What position you want and why you think you qualify or would be good at the job!
See you around!
conyers0184@gmail.com

mud.name: Night War
