mud.desc: Night War. A paradox source ROT PK Mud. Alot of work is going on right now. Please do not abuse MY MUD and crash it because you know how to abuse a BUG. If you know of BUGS please inform the Immortal staff so we can fix the problem.
To apply for an immortal postion please note one of the Owners.
Right now im looking for mainly builders. I will hire a full immortal staff.

mud.name: Shattered World
mud.desc: Fourteen (14) years of active development. Administered by professional software developers and published authors. This mud has a complex, detailed and sprawling world. This is a player-centric mud supported by innovative and interesting economic, legal and ecological systems. Players run guilds, players operate stores, players set prices, and players build structures throughout the world.

That said, it is a challenging mud. It's tough at the bottom as a newbie because this mud has unique and complicated game play; established players won't just roll over and give up their turf (or cash!). Its also tough at the top with Lords and Guild Leaders responsible for administrative and legal decisions which maybe unpopular with lesser players. This encourages an active and participative society. If you take the time and effort to learn the mud you'll find it unique and engrossing. Many of our 'hard core' players have been active for over five years.

There are many ways to 'play'; it's not a killfest, we strongly encourage role players and a responsible community. But it's also a tough simulation; so the traditional 'warrior' adventurer will find plenty to fulfill them. You'll find 9 innovative races, 11 guilds, 32 quests, like you've never seen before. Tough adventuring, big fantasy world, friends and foes. Take the time to know Shattered World and you'll be richly rewarded!

mud.name: Dawn of the Ages
mud.desc: Dawn of the Ages offers 22 basic races, 11 reincarnate races, several professions and numerous careers. Our clan system offers more options and powers to those who want to join. We have stock areas and tailored areas both, although the former is decreasing as the latter increases. Our PK system is optional, but limited equipment is available to PK-joined players. Dawn of the Ages is newbie friendly if people want to try it out.

mud.name: Rising Sun
mud.desc: Rising Sun is a Harry Potter game with a strong background in Japanese legend and myth. Set on a great flying island hidden from muggle view, the game takes place in a world full of stories and exotic tales. A rebirth has occured, with the old ways slowly coming back into favor and practice,while those of the west fall by the wayside. The game is designed for fun and playability,featuring a small but highly detailed grid and an easy to use reference system to answer any questions you may have. We feature a limited open character generation system,with first through fourth dan (year) student characters being approved automatically. Adult, upper classmen, and special characters still require applications; but the staff strive to make that approval system as fast as possible.

mud.name: Gueldenland
mud.desc: Gueldenland offers a german-language, rich fantasy world based on the pen&paper role playing game 'The Dark Eye'. Roleplaying is encouraged and in some areas, enforced. PK is allowed as long as it can be explained by your character's role.

mud.name: Imperial v3.5
mud.desc: Completely revised, Imperial has transformed into a world of continents, oceans and islands reaching its third incarnation, Imperial version 3.5 Imperial has been online for over 11 years and this newest version has been active for one year. It is one of the most stable and diverse MUD's in the world, with over 200 original areas to explore and MANY original cities located on three enormous, completely original continents. Players work together to progress up to level 50, through 8 races and 4 base classes that branch off into 12 finishing classes, having a choice to become an immortal and help run the mud, or begin to work on honor ranks. There are ten honor ranks and they provide long-term playability for the serious player taking up to one year to reach the final rank of Emperor. Imperial has excellent newbie areas and an extensive help-file system for new players, while helpful immortals and ranked players take new players under their wing. Imperial has a meta system to improve your characters statistics and an auction system to find just the right gear for him or her. Dragons are often seen in the air above the capital city of Kial-Qwyn. Sometimes these are the famous Emperors and Empresses returning from a hard campaign, but sometimes it might be a marauding dragon from the near by dragon's lairs. If danger, fame, fortune might be your calling then come and join us. Become part of the history that is Imperial.

mud.name: Age Of Glory
mud.desc: Ages Of Glory is an Anatolia Mud with some changes. The mud is edited for rpg playing

mud.name: Allanthya: Apocalypse
mud.desc: Allanthya MUD is a family mud based upon the Chronicles of Thomas Covenant the Unbeliever, a series of books written by Stephen Donaldson. It is now updated to use the CircleMUD version 3 patch level 14 codebase. Literally tens of thousands lines of code have been added or modified to turn the mud into what it is today.

mud.name: Legacies
mud.desc: Legacies is currently in early development (Early Alpha). Many of the functions popular with most environments will be non-working at this time. However, keep in mind that what we are looking to accomplish is that of the utmost quality, rather than quantity. We are building a foundation that will be both detailed and fun.

While most games offer achievements and advancement that is just a variation of what you had before, we are going to offer something much more rich in detail. Much of our focus will be on lore, mechanics and the specific details surrounding each aspect. This is where the players come in. Through your observations and suggestions, implementation of the ideas you propose will be possible.

We strive to make player contributions a part of the game. No matter if you are a coder, builder, or long term player of other realms, this is a chance to make a difference. Be a part of something truly unique and join Legacies today to offer your insight.
February:

- Socials, Commands and other Verbage (In development) - Basic Room Design (In testing) - Unique Combat System (In testing) - Initial Monster AI (In testing and development) - Storyline and Detailed Lore (In development) March-June:

- Inventories - Stores and Shops - NPCs and Monsters - Specific Beginning Hunting Grounds - Four to Six Town Foundations - Lockpicking and Tools - Spell System - Health System - Death Mechanics - And More

mud.name: Thud! - A Discworld MUD
mud.desc: Thud! - A Discworld MUD ------------------------ Welcome to Thud!, over the next few months it will be expanding heavily. As there are currently plenty of areas to level in, I've decided to open Thud! to the public while we're in the process of changing the areas over to a strict Discworld Theme. It doesn't hurt to have a strong playerbase backing your changes!

We're also looking for Builders! Builders will be treated like PEOPLE, not employees. You're HELPING us by building areas and contributing to the project, so that's the way you'll be treated. Stop on in and check us out!

mud.name: Netrunners
mud.desc: The year is 2030. Nanotechnology has improved our society in many ways. Nanobots are active in our bodies to fight diseases and enable us to wirelessly interface with devices such as cars, planes, robots and computer networks.

When your nanobots log you onto the net, you leave your body behind and your mind enters cyberspace, a visual representations of computer systems and data. You can navigate this space with your computer persona, an avatar in this world. Your programs and all other programs in this space look like real objects and people, the design only limited by the creatorâ€™s creativity.

Everything in Cyberspace is created by the players and their organizations. Every player can create their own organization or join an existing one. Organizations offer a wage and the ability to team work to take on bigger targets.
Join one of these organizations, create your own computer systems and populate it with offensive and defensive programs to earn money, information and to protect it from other hackers.
If you prefer to support your organization with custom made offensive and defensive programs, you can also just hang out in your organizationâ€™s systems and code modules for them.

The beta server was made public in January 2010. There is a customised client for Android devices and the tutorial system is made for those devices. As an experienced mud player you should be alright with using the game regardless of this. There are over 4000 accounts created already and there are around 10 to 20 players online. This is because of the Android client. I am now announcing this server here to get more old-school MUD players in.
Check out www.totalmadownage.net/nethak for more information!

mud.name: Ice Dragon
mud.desc: Ice Dragon Mud

mud.name: Divisent
mud.desc: Long ago, in ancient times, a great demon arose from the darkest depths of the world. Bringing forth large armies of evil warriors from the west and south, consuming Divisent and other great cities in its path of destruction, they annihilated most of the good natured races. However, some survived...

The Dryads managed to use their vast knowledge of magic to evade most of the evil forces and rebuild their homeland. The Dwarves returned to their roots, reconstructing their kingdom in the mountains of the east. The Elves suffered tragic losses, losing some of their magical abilities, but were able to evolve with their new surroundings to form a new bond with nature. The Humans survived, both good and evil.

Other less civilized beings thrived easily, as they didn't participate nor were exposed to the violent war. The Yetis and Giants lived in their mountains and forests, their societies untouched. Evil felt no downfall. It was sheer luck along that the Elves were able to gain the upper hand and lock evil deep beyond the Alpinolae Mountains forever.

Recently, something has been lurking in the shadows. The presence of darkness has become more frequent in the land beyond. Evil is trying to take back its reign... Though as it stands, the land is in a state of division.

Divisent offers unique features and skills such as mining, fishing, and gathering herbs. Our system offers skill and spell learning through exploration, not inherency. One must spend their time exploring the realm to discover new skills and spells to learn. Divisent also offers a pk system, a remort system, a constantly growing world, a friendly immortal staff and a vast imagination. Come check us out!

mud.name: The Isles: Dreams of Kltara
mud.desc: NiMUD is a periodically updated MUD software that has been in production since 1992.

It is released under the Artistic License 2.0 and its documentation, help files, NIMscripts and area files are distributed under CCA-3.0 BY-SA licenses. It was chiefly engineered by Locke, the pseudonym of Herb Gilliland. Parts of the editor are (c) 1993 Herb Gilliland and Chris Woodward. A long, long time ago (1993) it was based on Merc 2.0c; and is released in good faith under its current licensing conditions.

The Isles NiMUD, the origination point for OLC, is an expansive, automated world full of interesting features. Unlike many other MUDs, The Isles NiMUD has a fully unique world with complex interactions.
Over 7 times the number of lines present in a Merc/Diku MUD, The Isles has a rich, unique and original code-base that contains familiar commands common to many MUDs.
-Hire a monk, fighter or ranger to assist you in your adventures
-Visit the deepest dungeons and highest mountains in your quest to acquire magic, power and notoriety
-Become a hero and commission your own castle to fight in an ongoing global conquest between like kingdoms
-Establish your name in history by defeating monsters and completing quests
-Cast powerful spells from a variety of different magick circles including necromancy, elemental magicks and natural magicks
-Explore hundreds of unique locations and the thousands of rooms while fighting, exploring and spelunking your way to treasure in a classic dungeon adventure
-Help build the world with a powerful modal OLC that has been used on thousands of online games and is refined by its surviving author
-Travel the seven seas and fight pirates or merchants in ongoing adventures you can share with your friends
-Group with like-minded adventurers and combine your assets to rule the realm and leave no stone unturned

mud.name: Forgetown
mud.desc: Forgetown is a MUD based on Games Workshop's popular Warhammer 40k spinoff 'Necromunda'.

The setting is deep within a dark industrial hive-city, where the law extends only to how many guns you can carry, and how much backup you can afford. The game is set in and around the old mining settlement of Forgetown. All six of the major Houses have a presence in the town, and vie for power, taking territory and contracts to gain advantage over their rivals.
Players will all start as a certain class, derived from their House choice, but aren't limited to following the local House gang present in the area.
In The Underhive, you may stand with others, but you'll fall alone..
The IC grid has recently been expanded to include the nearby settlements of Broken Stone and Reacher's Folly.
Login or check our wiki for more info.

mud.name: The Shadow's Embrace
mud.desc: The Shadow's Embrace is based on the long-running As the Wheel Weaves code, a multi-user, text based game where you can interact with dozens of people from around the world. Explore thousands of rooms in hundreds of zones, do battle with evil, or seek to bring darkness to the lands. Sail the high seas and climb to the tops of the mountain peaks as you seek to complete quests and find new lands.

Players can choose to belong to any of the dozens of Wheel of Time races -- even aiel, trollocs, fades, and others while working with or competing against other players in the quest for fame, glory, and power. If you prefer roleplaying to slaughtering, TSE is highly role-play encouraged and there are several code features in place to support it.
Come along for the ride and you never know, you may not want to leave!

mud.name: Revival World
mud.desc: Revival World is a Chinese Language LPMud in Taiwan

mud.name: Dragonball: Forgotten Times
mud.desc: Dragonball Forgotten Times is based 1000 years before Dragonball.
It is in a time before a galactic cataclysm forced the galaxy into remission, leading to the storyline of the show.

First and foremost I want to preach THIS IS AN RP MUD! Training is command based, but has longterm effects on your characters physical development. XP is gained through RP, and used to buy Personally Crafted Powers.
Combat is ROLEPLAYED, through a storyteller, rolling dice while the player emotes(poses) their actions and the results.
New players will never be

mud.name: New Horizons
mud.desc: Greetings! I am Blackus the Herald. *Blackus purrs contently* I bring news of two MUDs that have combined to form a greater more powerful MUD.
Shades of the Past and Kivekian Dawn have formed, *Blackus flicks his claw out* NEW HORIZONS. It's a clash of two worlds!
What happens when worlds collide and Gods suddenly rub shoulders?

This is no ordinary MUD. It's built for players, by players. Role-playing is necessary, and indeed greatly rewarded! It's your choice to hack your way to greatness, or beguile with mouth and mind! *Blackus's black and silver eyes swirl with excitement*
Bring your own color into the lands and paint an intriguing masterpiece with your deeds, thoughts and ways!
*Blackus yawns displaying a row of white fangs* I must hunt and eat, but I will Herald more information later.
Until then, come to the new MUD at nh.horizonz.co.uk port 1234.
*Blackus pads into the shadows but looks back to you* Until we meet as mortals.
*Blackus melts from view*

mud.name: Moomellow
mud.desc: Moomellow is an online community of men and women from different backgrounds who have joined together to create a thriving social community. Its players are marked by a strong sense of humor, thick skin, and a willingness to help one another. Many of the players have been active for over seven years. The moo maintains a group blog and has completed numerous projects, including two old time radio shows in mp3 format. So come on in and join in the fun.

mud.name: SneezyMUD
mud.desc: Are you looking for a challenge? Looking for a MUD with a vibrant and cohesive world to explore? Looking for originality, lighthearted depth and complexity? Looking for a MUD with active development and world expansion, enthusiastic immortals and players? If you answered yes to any of these questions, then your search may be over. SneezyMUD is an all-original, intricate and exciting game that challenges new players and keeps long term players returning for more, year after year. We have been developing our MUD and constantly improving our code since 1992. SneezyMUD offers an immense, detailed world to explore and adventure in and many paths to take as a character. Care to be a necrophobic, alcoholic cleric? A thief turned vampire, feeding off the innocent? A warrior by day and lumberjack by night? A pious but blind deikhan with secret Psionic abilities? A powerful fae-touched shaman? Find all this and more at SneezyMUD. Discover our complex character creation options, the creative skills that add depth to the usual hack and slash and most of all, our friendly and welcoming playerbase. We look forward to seeing you there!
SneezyMUD website: http://www.sneezymud.com SneezyMUD calendar: http://www.sneezymud.com/calendar SneezyMUD wiki: http://wiki.sneezymud.com SneezyMUD forums: http://forums.sneezymud.com/smf/
Come see what's new at one of the most loved MUDs since 1992.

mud.name: Urban Livin'
mud.desc: This mud is going to be completly Modern Day when it is finished. We are currently hiring builders and coders only.
Please contact Vex via email: RoboCop@twcny.rr.com for further information on jobs.
Visit us on the mud for builder or coder jobs also.

mud.name: Duskwood
mud.desc: Duskwood is a fantasy theme MUD. We had started with stock areas, but while for now, we keep the updated stock areas,we have add a lot of areas with new server feutures. We support the idea, that areas must feel alive and have a reason to be created. So each areas bring something new to the game :)

Features ======== 12 classes, with unique gameplay its one 19 player races class and level base skill system quest system imbue system craft system cabals system (like clans) range battle system spell combine and stats check system remort classes (reborn chars with special adds) and many more...

New players, that have never play a mud, maybe found this mud difficult. But I promise that if you give some time, you will have a good and always updated hobby :) After all the implementors are old players, that making this mud for fun, but with love ;P

mud.name: Legends Untold
mud.desc: Welcome to Legends Untold!
We have brought LU back for your gaming enjoyment!
More detailed description coming soon.
Come check us out!
lowmud.org 8000

mud.name: Cursed Lands of Waevern
mud.desc: Cursed Lands of Waevern is a DoT mud. Here at CLoW we offer a large array of classes, skills, and races. We have many races and classes like skindancers and skeletons to name a few. Playerkilling is allowed but is restricted whereas roleplaying is mandatory. We have a

mud.name: Lost Power
mud.desc: This mud is a medieval based mud. It has many diffrent races. Newest races are Demon and Dragon. There are many diffrent types of weapons. Many diffrent kinds of classes. This mud has over 3000 rooms to explore, you can do quests, or you can even go around slaying everything in your path.

mud.name: Pandora's Box Mud
mud.desc: A world where chaos reigns supreme. A world of infinite possibilites, and near-zero probabilities. A world where anything can happen. A world of random whatnot. A world of overdramatic introductions. This world... is Pandora's Box!
Do you dare to open the box? Chaos (and weird humor) awaits!

mud.name: Dragon Knight 2
mud.desc: It's a Web based MUD, You Explore the world looking for Enemies, Once you are Level 30, You get ownership of a kingdom! with this kingdom you can battle other players to gain more land and, then more units can be made, then this all costs alot fo gold! so you have to be steadly roaming around the map killing mosters and gaining levels, now this game has 390 differnt moster, 180 weapons 60 armor, and 40 differnt items that will all help you build your kingdom, NOTE:this game is beta so I'll be adding more mosters and items often, please post in the fourms if you have any ideas on what should be changed, also comming soon is pure PvP

mud.name: The Greatest Generation
mud.codebase: [MUSH] Vanilla server but lots of softcode
mud.desc: The Greatest Generation offers historical wartime roleplay in the 20th century, from 1918 to 1945. It is a tinyplot driven mush with battle scenarios handled by code but with staff supervision.

Currently it is 1936, and the setting is the XI International Brigade fighting in the Spanish Civil War : one of the hardest fought and bitterest wars of the 20th century, a war of atrocities and political genocide, and a military testing ground before the Second World War for the Russians, Italians and Germans whose Condor Legion so notoriously destroyed Guernica.
In the past we have tackled World War 1, in the future we will move on to 'The Big One', World War 2.

The combat code is fairly extensive, and offers such concepts as fighter pilots, tankers, riflemen, machine gunners, medical staff and more besides. Warships are not currently coded but we do plan on at least one story arc involving a U-boat when we reach World War 2.

mud.name: Questionable Sanity
mud.desc: QS offers:
15 races 14 classes 4 remort classes 200 level mortal teir 200 level remort teir no rent
we have 120+ zones with more on the way
intense PK system, along with arena system(with betting and such)
clan system, with clan halls, clan recall, corpse recall and rankings

QS was originally founded by Ghost, Delia, and Bub and has steadily been added and improved by many others(since 1996). We are continuously in search of talented builders as well as coders. We take pride in our immortal staff, particularly our quest team- they are quite exceptional.
recently added, QS forums: https://www.smwa.net/forums/index.php
QS groups: groups.msn.com/QuestionableSanityGroup

mud.name: Road to Amber
mud.desc: The Road to Amber is a roleplaying MUSH based on Roger Zelazny's Amber novels. Set just after the end of _The Guns of Avalon_, the game is focused entirely on Amber and the Golden Circle. Our aim is to capture the spirit of Corwin's Chronicles, with its pulp feel, potent heroes, and epic intrigues.

In October 2009, we began the second phase of our story, a tale shaped entirely by our players. The Pattern in Rebma has been destroyed, the exact cause unknown, but Moire has put a price on Caine's head following the resulting earthquake. The consequences of this form the thematic core of this episode. Adding to Amber's internal strife, with the Crown in the hands of a beleaguered Julian, and troubles in the Golden Circle, there are greater concerns. Corwin attempts to create his own realm at the edge of Chaos, claiming it is a bulwark against the Black Road, but those who have seen him claim that Corwin himself has been corrupted by the power of the Road. And Brand claims to have discovered a fourth Pattern, one of fire, with strange and improbable properties.
We have four guiding principles:

- All characters are awesome. - Conflict mandates choice, which leads to change, which creates story. - The currency of play is Things to Do, and Interesting Meaningful Things To Talk About. - Drama and play creation trumps realism.
Our innovative RPG approach is inspired not only by the Amber Diceless RPG, but by a variety of story games, such as FATE, Everway, Polaris, and Ganakagok.

We welcome first-time MUSHers. Character approval is easy, quick, and painless -- no lengthy applications to write, just come up with a concept and you're good to go. Player characters are on par with the characters in the novels, and their abilities can be entirely unique.

We also welcome players without any familiarity with the Amber theme. Of late, people have been wandering out of the Forest of Arden, people without much if any memory of their past, or how they came to be in Amber. You can get an instant amnesiac and begin playing immediately, so you can learn the game both IC and OOC from scratch.

mud.name: Marvel Genesis
mud.desc: Imagine a world where only a few students have found training and refuge at the Xavier Institute for Higher Learning, and the Brotherhood is only just forming under Magneto. Where Jean Grey, and Scott Summers are embarking on young adulthood, learning to become teachers for the next generation of mutants that may find their way within the hallowed halls of the Institute. A world where Peter Parker has just been bitten by that radioactive spider. Where Captain America has only recently been unfrozen from the ice after more than fifty years...
This is our world.

One where mutants are not known publicly for the most part. The Xavier Institute for Higher Learning is known as a privately funded institution, and it is only now that Professor Charles Xavier is starting to go out and bring other young mutants into a safe place of learning where there is no discrimination.
But he is not the only one recruiting.
Magneto, Sebastian Shaw, Tony Stark, the government... all are trying to find ways to change the world around them for various reasons - money, power, racial superiority.
It will be a difficult road for many, with multiple twists, turns, and unexpected ruts which will shake their resolve. There will be few havens, few shelters for those with extraordinary powers.
And yet there is hope.

Whispered in the shadows, a beacon which may guide many into the light, rumors about New York - that perhaps there they can find a meeting place, to find help and shelter among others of their own kind - no matter which decision they ultimately choose.

mud.name: Anodyne
mud.desc: Anodyne is a class-less, level-less system modeled on Runequest, Rolemaster, Palladium, and other RPGs.

Players learn skills and run quests from mobiles and acquire random equipment as they explore the world. Every skill and ability is improved by use, including mana and hit points! If you want to create a certain type of character, learn the skills and put them to use. There's very little limit to character advancement.
Randomly placed dungeons in grid areas with dynamic descriptions insure that no adventure is the same each time.
The game has opened after a long absence from the community, and playerfiles have been wiped. Players can enjoy a clean slate as they try to make their reputations in the city of Ys.

mud.name: Xaos
mud.desc: Xaos is a gigantic framework that eagerly caters to both the casual and hardcore player. Some of the highlights:

35+ PC races to choose, each with a distinct culture & region A defined limit of trains to pick from over 500 skills & spells Two dozen Combat styles that each influence your char's melee Max hp/mana etc adjust dynamically as stats do, no lvling gear Earn hero points from levels and quests, spend to define your char Dynamic application of racial traits if you have such an ability 40+ crafting and enchanting abilities to make & improve things Possible to be part of unlimited amount of clans at once, NPCs too A persistent world that saves all objects on ground vMap - The mud's vast outdoors is mapped in intuitive asci live Vast and automated arena system with over 150 NPC & PC competitors Random item generator extremely popular for randomized loot Enormous world, over 400 live areas (160K vnums) Religions are deep, containing castes and unique traits etc Mighty hero-inclined areas designed for groups of high-end PCs

Apart from all that its got a growing community of players and staff from around the world all working towards making the place interesting and fun. Our two coders (Altair and Ragnar) work at a pretty constant rate to provide an influx of code changes and our builder staff led by Obscillesk strives to generate encompassing areas and expand the world's landscape with new places to explore, assault and conquer. Also with everyone on the account system the out of character channel keeps the familiarity of that player regardless of which character they are using while still allowing them to mask the true owner of one if they wish. Our forum is also linked directly to these accounts and as such most of our more formal OOC communication occurs within it.

We joke that Xaos will always been in a perpetual Beta state but it boils down to the mud is constantly evolving on every front. As it is right now Xaos is 160,000 lines of code and occupies 170MB of ram when running, comparing that to its roots which were 35K lines of code occupying 5MB of ram...its grown a lot and will keep doing so. Come join us, there is definitely something here for everyone.

mud.name: Star Wars: A Cloned Galaxy
mud.desc: This mud is based in the Clone Wars era.

mud.name: Twilight Days
mud.desc: There has always been change in the world. Some call it progression, others adaptation, but things have a way of turning from one thing to another. The city of Miyajima, set upon the island of Avalon, is just like any other in the world. It has its own share of crime and broken dreams, but there are also mothers who sing lullabies to their children. This is the world as it is...

This is a world destined to change. No one expected that the meteor shower that came one summer would awaken something that had slumbered beneath the surface for many countless centuries. There was an explosion, one smoldering rock striking just beyond the city limits. The wave that followed was enough of a catalyst to jar the old gods from their eternal sleep. The world is in danger once more, and the powers long forgotten must reawaken to fight.
These are the twilight days...

mud.name: /TG/MUD
mud.desc: TGMUD is a MUD created originally for /tg/chan (now quest.lv) which is now a general MUD for both 4chan /tg/ and /tg/chan players.
There is very little overarching theme, with the main area being a hub network with portals to different areas.
Roleplaying is optional but it is generally considered fairly boring simply grinding.
Looking only for new archons with some kind of previous worldbuilding experience.
IRC: #tgmud on irc.rizon.net

mud.name: Animud
mud.desc: Animud is an anime themed roleplaying based world. We have a medium sized world of mostly original content. Most of our areas and world are based on various anime. We are always expanding it and looking for builders. We offer anime based races that are well themed for creating your dream character. Everything is balanced and we guarantee you will love our quest system. Animud offers an open clan(guild) system where players create their own clans, with extended ranks and clan hall options. Equipment is level restricted within 50 levels, keeping low level players from abusing high level equipment, while still providing freedom of eq choice. We are a 200 level mud, our races are; Human, Elf, Dwarf, Saiyan, Third(android), Juraian, and Skeleton. We have the following classes: Mage, Cleric, Thief, Warrior and Vampire.

We do allow and encourage playerkilling within the roleplay model. This is not to say we are a PK mud, we simply believe that roleplay is more fun and lasting with the danger of death involved. Staff resides over everything and we are very strict about removing griefers from this system.
New players are welcome and our help system is specifically designed to cater to the skill level of the player. We hope to see you!

mud.name: Elusive Dreams
mud.desc: ..and as had been foretold, the Cataclysm occurred. It was not the end of the world as many had feared, but nothing would ever be the same again. Humans could no longer continue their blinkered existance. The old realities had been forever shattered and the dreams had been let loose in the land. Drawing on this new power, the Ancient Races re-appeared. No longer did they have to cloak their comings and goings. The very earth hummed with power and even the most sceptical had to acknowledge that the safe order of things was no more. Reactions varied: some embraced the old ways and magic returned to the lands, some retreated to sheltered enclaves and developed new and amazing technologies, some gained the stars, some lost their minds. It was a dangerous and chaotic world, but the rewards were great for those brave enough to embrace the dream. Elusive Dreams has been up and running for over 5 years now and has developed some unique and interesting features. Roleplaying is strongly encouraged by clans which are totally player created and run. If there isn't one to suit your tastes, then you can always start your own! 219 levels and 15 remorts gives you plenty of time to create some depth to your character. Come on by!

mud.name: TestMUD1
mud.desc: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vivamus sed dolor. Suspendisse potenti. Phasellus est erat, porttitor sed, dictum in, venenatis sit amet, metus. Pellentesque vel augue id felis pellentesque sagittis. Proin auctor aliquet nisl. Nunc cursus ligula sed arcu. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae; Nullam id tellus ornare nibh cursus porta. Integer sed arcu vitae lectus ornare auctor. Nullam a est vitae risus pharetra ultrices. Fusce molestie.

Curabitur est quam, bibendum non, posuere at, aliquet sed, enim. Maecenas fermentum, orci eu mollis porttitor, nisi lacus tempus augue, nec imperdiet purus sapien eget risus. Curabitur tempor risus a magna. Vivamus placerat velit eget augue. Nullam vitae lorem. Mauris a orci. Nam laoreet arcu non orci. Vivamus ut sem. Nulla id nisl nec est congue gravida. Etiam ornare augue et mi. Sed nec risus a magna

mud.name: Dragonball: Resurrection of Truth
mud.desc: In a world where you can be anything you want to be. A Human, a Namek, a Icer or a Saiya-Jin. Such is the world of Dragonball: Resurrection of Truth. We invite you to stop by and meet some new people, slaughter some ugly mobs, and just have a good time. The mud is still in the processes of being built, so there will be some errors here and there. Please bare with us, and just note any problems you find and email them to us. They will be fixed as soon as possible. Hope to see you there.
Staff of Dragonball: Resurrection of Truth

mud.name: Breaking Point
mud.desc: The year is 2120, and the earth has fallen victim to a nuclear holocaust. The world was all but destroyed, but small factions of humans continued on. The radioactivity cause some special people to mutate, and became stronger and smarter than normal humans.
In the late century, those mutants came together to declare themselves a new race. They called themselves the PSI. They could also use energy with thier minds.
The humans despised the PSI for thier powers, but the PSI tried to work with the humans to help each other.
Eventually both races separated into different parts of the world. The humans claimed the lower parts of new york for their new capitol city, because thier were still buildings there.
The PSI took a deserted city in upper russia to build thier city. They called it Aureal City.

mud.name: Star Wars: Chaos
mud.desc: We are a new mud opening for the first time on 3/5/05. We firmly believe in being friendly to all people, and welcome you into our world. If you are looking for a place to just be able to log in and chit chat or become a big bad bounty hunter, assassin , or perhaps you just like to craft we have you covered. So come on in , give u s a change and check us out! we look foward to meeting you!

mud.name: Holy Mission - Remains from the Past
mud.desc: Shattered by a war between creators of the highest ranks, the following tyranny of those who won has turned a living place into a cold and desolate void.

The first exodus happened in 1993, when the 'Linzer' admins, led by Patience, departed to create a new world. They handed Holy Mission to the Archwizards who had chosen to stay, and the MUD prospered. Packed with quests, legendary monsters, and a wide selection of guilds, some of them hidden and very restricted, the world was highly populated, easily reaching the cap of 60 simultaneous players. The broad community, comprised of many nationalities and all walks of life, made Holy Mission a fun place be.

Good things never last, though. The old administration drifted away, and new Archwizards took their place. However, there was one amongst their ranks who did all he could do to destroy what other wizards and players had created. Alongside his highly-promoted friends, he sat back and watched as the lands around him died. A fearsome battle was fought in the early months of 1999, and although Holy Mission fell, he retained his power. When no living thing crawled over the damned world anymore, even he moved on.

Today a few fans are working on restoring the MUD to give old players the chance to return and remember, and to give new players the chance to see what a mud looked like back in 1991. Holy Mission is nothing compared to modern muds like Achaea or BatMud, but its an original with a out-of-the box village from 2.4.5 lib and Padrone's castle.
We look forward to welcoming you to our godforsaken lands.
Kiri of Holy Mission - Remains from the Past

mud.name: Enden's Keep
mud.desc: Fully immersive fantasy roleplay environment, Enden's Keep has been in development for a number of years, only recently opening and accepting new players, Enden's Keep caters exclusively to the needs of roleplay/adventure fans. Numerous classes, extended character creation, multiclassing options, and a countless array of spells, offer the player endless options for adventure and exploration. Administered by fans of the Advanced Dungeons And Dragons (AD&D) gaming experience, the game is fully interactive and aimed at the ultimate goal of enjoyable roleplay.
Come and join the legacy at Enden's Keep.

mud.name: Sancara
mud.codebase: [CoffeeMud] Highly modified, Constantly changing, Lots of Custom
mud.desc: Sancara. is a text based Multi User Dungeon and is expanding in spurts, bursts and explosions. One minute its chugging along nicely, the next a new feature appears, and the testers go wild.
Primary Features
AI Monsters, that think, breath, grow and advance, just as players do.

An economic system with fluctuating market values for all resources, meaning one day the price of gold may be high, the next it might be at rock bottom price, depending on supply and demand as well as rarity. Self-Sustaining ecosystems, that grow and evolve, s pawning their own merit of roleplay, invasion, death chaos and fun fun fun!
Own your own land, build a house, make or buy some furniture and throw a house warming party.

Designed for both the roleplayer, and the killer in you, this game will grab you by the pants, swing you twice round the tower of shadows, and drop you right back in your seat, covered in the blood of a decade of battles, woes, losses, adventure and excitment.

While still in pre-alpha, and being built with speed, we are always looking for new additions. Be you here to explore what we have so far, and check out our ever growing features, or to build areas yourself, to expand our world.
All are welcome, none are turned away.

mud.name: Legends of Elysian
mud.desc: Legends of Elysian is a mud that is going to be under massive re-construction for the next several months. The mud will include much of the old smaug 1.02 code as well as added Storm 1.0 code. The goal is to also incorporate snippets from codes such as God Wars and Fear. The mud is open to all ideas, many of which will be implemented. Classes will be changed, leveling system will be changed. Changes are forthcoming so it is hard to describe the mud as whole at this point.
This will be updated periodically as the mud transforms.

mud.name: Static Chaos - Still Alive
mud.desc: Static Chaos - Still Alive

Static Chaos, known in the past as Chaosium, is a God Wars style MUD built on a Merc codebase. Creator, Alathon, used the idea of God Wars to create an unparalleled PvP experience that is both balanced and fun.

The game's pace is slow at first, giving newbies an opportunity to adjust. Also, stock areas are used to give newer players an idea of where to start. Leveling up is difficult and does take time. Unlike some Dystopia muds, you actually have to put effort into maxxing out character attributes, and aquiring equipment.
Playable classes are broken down by race. Each race has its own defined class:

Fist--Human warriors who harness the power of their spirit. Mazoku--Demonic astral being who feed on mortal emotions. Patryn--Demihuman masters of rune magic. Saiyan--A race of warriors with tremendous innate strength. Sorcerer--Human mystics who wield the three schools of magic.
Race/class selection is limited, but only because balance is of the utmost importance.

In addition to player-killing, players have one other duty: being social. In addition to being an exciting PvP environment, it's important to converse with fellow players. There are no filters in Static Chaos so players have the freedom (most of the time) to say and do as they please... this is a double-edged sword. If you're easily offended, you might want to second guess entering. Otherwise, we'd love to have you.
--Dekkum

mud.name: Haven
mud.desc: Haven is a highly detailed, extremely large world with a very small playerbase. We need more players to grow!
Experience-point system complete with detailed combat and non-combat skills, highly detailed magic system, player-run economics and even player-ownable ships!
18+ Player Races, 20+ Player Towns, 8 Religions 3 Continents! 4 Planes of existence!
Newbie-friendly but geared towards grown-ups, run by grown-ups with multiple years of experience.

mud.name: Fantasy Legends MUSH
mud.desc: The Heartless have attacked the worlds of Final Fantasy, weakening the borders between the realms and opening portals between each world. In their search for the Princesses of Heart, they were relentless, utterly destroying some worlds while reducing others to scorched wastelands. But some-- no, many-- people resisted, refusing to surrender. Small rebel factions joined forces, tyrannical empires combined their might, and numerous people went to wander the Worlds and the space in between then, alone but still fighting, refusing to give up hope and determined to learn more about what those strange creatures had done to their homes. Even though threats-- some new, some old, some beyond all imagination-- lurk just around the corner, the people refuse to give up, continuously pushing forward. And so their story begins...Based on Kingdom Hearts, sans the Disney, Fantasy Legends offers a take on the Final Fantasy and Kingdom Hearts series with a new twist added in.

mud.name: Matrix MUD
mud.desc: Matrix MUD is currently undergoign a lot of changes to change us from the Shattered Dream name, which was with the MUD. We need Coders and builders to help us change the world into a Matrix oriented world. If you are interested i neither positin, e-mail or IM me on MSN at Nocturnal_Coyote@hotmail.co.uk and I will meet with you to set up everything. Please help uis make our world better?

mud.name: Pokemon Tarnish
mud.desc: Join the world of Pokemon, up close and personal, but as you've never seen it before. Set in Kanto, the setting for many of the Pokemon titles, we rejoin the world twenty years after the events of Pokemon FireRed and LeafGreen. Humans and pokemon work alongside one another, with the nefarious Team Rocket working behind the scenes on all manner of organized (and disorganized) crime, seeking money and influence.
Of course, in the intervening two decades, Rocket has been far from idle...and a malfunction in their Snag Ball technology has caused a new sort of being, the pokemorph, to come into existence!
Take up the banner of the noble Kanto police force, join the ranks of Team Rocket for glory and money, or adopt the mantle of Sassy Neutral and mock the foolishness of both.
As the game grows, Gyms will become available, as well as the coveted Elite Four tournament.

mud.name: Lusternia: Age of Ascension
mud.desc: Those daring to enter the exciting fantasy universe of Lusternia will find themselves plunged into a multi-planar realm where factions struggle to amass reservoirs of magical energy simply to survive. Within the Basin of Life, an alien evil has corrupted much of the land and people, making Lusternia a broken and perilous place. With the return of those Elder Gods who escaped the ancient Divine wars, a new age of uncertainty dawns. What power shall next ascend to dominate the world's limited resources?

Lusternia: Age of Ascension, the latest award-winning text game released by Iron Realms Entertainment, breaks new ground by presenting a dynamic roleplaying environment that pioneers innovative new features, quests and skills. Lusternia is sure to challenge experienced gamers and delight those new to the genre of text worlds.

mud.name: Bedlam
mud.desc: Based on the richly customized world of AnotherWorld, a MUD that ran for over a decade, Bedlam offers memorable areas to explore and tough NPC's to take down.

While character development is important, the main driving force is the open-ended hunt for artifacts. Enjoy exploring, solving puzzles, and mastering killing strategies in groups or as a loner. There is no quantity limit to artifacts in the game so any time is a good time to join the hunt!

We offer a relaxed role-play environment, perfect for both serious and casual play. No-one is reprimanded for doing too little, or too much, role-play. Our immos are cordial but strict. Public channels are moderated.
Limited PvP is allowed in an arena setting. Both parties must agree to engage in a duel. Winners have a chance to gain trophies that can be crafted into useful items.

We have just started building a player base--the best time to join! Our main attraction is a dedicated and highly advanced graphical iPhone client app (http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/bedlam /id332137487?mt=8) which is available in the AppStore.
A dedicated implementor rolls out updates and tweaks on a regular basis. Areas are also being added periodically, with launch quests by a human QuestMaster.
Visit our forum site at http://www.bedlamforums.com for plenty of resources to help you get started. Or ask anyone in game!

mud.name: Let The End Times Roll
mud.desc: \"The world is older than any of you know, and contrary to popular mythology, it did not begin as a paradise. For untold eons, demons walked the earth; made it their home... their Hell. In time they lost their purchase on this reality, and the way was made for the mortal animals. For Man. What remains of the Old Ones are vestiges: certain magicks, certain creatures.\"

Let The End Times Roll is a modern Buffy/Angelverse game set in sparkling Sin City -- the desert jewel -- Las Vegas. Beneath the flashing bright lights and glitzy glamour there's a darker side to the city. An underbelly that needs to be fed, and it's often the souls of the poor fools drawn to the lies and false promises on which she feeds. What will you be in this multi-layered world where dreams are made or broken on the throw of the dice or the flip of a card? Whatever your choice, you can be certain that nothing in Las Vegas is ever as it seems.

We are utilizing the Unisystem Buffy the Vampire Slayer and Angel RPG rules. We have a fully coded Character Generation and dice- resolution system. You don't need any of the published rulebooks to play; our news files are very extensive and the code handles almost all of the work!

mud.name: Maiden Desmodus
mud.desc: Set in an original world with a fantasy horror theme and powered by a custom game engine, Maiden Desmodus offers an intense multiplayer role-playing environment.

When the Kneyan Kingdom was conquered a hundred years ago and the Kneyan people of the mainland exterminated, The Isle became an independent kingdom. With the trade routes decimated by war, the Kneyans of The Isle settled into a peaceful and self-reliant existence. That is, until the arrival of a dark being that came to be known by the islanders as the Maiden Desmodus.

The Maiden Desmodus, described as a witch by some, a vampire or demon by others, began feeding off of the population. Great efforts were made to slay the Maiden, yet all were futile. In time, the Kneyans forged an unspoken truce with â€œThe Crimson Goddessâ€ and blood was soon being offered in worship at temples throughout The Isle.

However, a rebellion against the practices of traditional Desmoduism led to the fracturing of the Kneyan Kingdom, and now the emerging Kingdom of Thiria wages a brutal war with their former brothers to the south.

Features include description driven character interaction, non automated combat, a player driven economy with extensive crafting, mass warfare and conquest, player run factions and political intrigue, hundreds of unique skills to learn, all original areas to explore, advanced custom web clientâ€¦ and much much more.
Join us now and discover a more interesting world to inhabit!

mud.name: Federation II
mud.desc: Federation 2 - Play for Free

Forget about the orcs and monsters in other games - Fed 2 has real challenges for grownups! Like day trading commodities futures and launching an IPO for your own company. Like bigger and better planets, a vastly enhanced events system, interactive mobiles and more.
There's even an ATM machine on the far side of the Sun!
Remember, Federation 2 is about commerce, politics, intrigue, power and money.

Things that matter in real life. Federation 2 is a newly rewritten version of the original Federation with all the charm and humor of the original but adding new features and challenges based on our 15 years of multiplayer game experience and players requests. There are new ranks, new planets, new features, new challenges, new things to do.

BUILD YOUR OWN PLANETS - design and build your own custom planet! Run your economy, let others build factories on your planet, build infrastructure, build a spaceport, make a fortune, build an empire!
Come play Federation 2for free and enjoy the excitement again. We'll even throw in a set of starter maps of the Solar System.
Now Announcing:
NEW VERSION OF FEDTERM ADDS LOTS OF EXTRA FEATURES

Fed Term is the new GRAPHICAL front end for Federation 2. This means players will be able to supply their own custom avatar picture to display on their own computer as well as all the other players while in the game. It also means pictures of your ship.
And it also means AutoMapping! Really easy to use, intuitive automapping built in, ready to use.

And it means, graphic stat displays for you and your spaceship. And, a new multi-tabbed pane to display and communicate with all the other players in the game and a special friends panel. And many more useful and nifty features players have asked for!
The new Fed Term makes playing Federation 2 more than a text game. It's becoming an exciting synthesis of Graphic and Text!

mud.name: Darkness Beneath the Fog: London by Night
mud.desc: Darkness Beneath the Fog: Welcome to modern day London, England. But this new London is not the one that we know and love. Rather, this is a London filled with Vampires, Shapeshifters, Magic, and a labour government. In this London, a place beneath the world mortals see exists. A darker place. A world of Darkness. The streets of London are no longer a safe place for children to play, for adults to stroll leisurely, for law enforcement to patrol. So frightening has the city become that law enforcement can't always be counted on to maintain the safety of London's inhabitants. Take head...you are on your own.

Darkness Beneath the Fog is a newly opened World of Darkness MUSH based off the White Wolf World of Darkness, using a combination of 2nd and 3rd edition rules to encourage RP as well as alternative thinking. The game currently supports Shifters, Changeling, Kindred, and Mage, with some Demons thrown in for good measure. The Shifter sphere is accepting Garou, Bete, Corax, Ratkin, and many other Tribes. The Kindred sphere is open for Anarchs, Independents, Camarilla and Sabbat. Mage has openings for almost all the various mages including Verbena, VA, CoE, and Hermes (but not limited to those). Technocrats will be accepted in the near future. The Changeling sphere will be open for Seelie, Unseelie and Motley, and group apps are encouraged. Demons are being accepted on a case by case basis, and the wraith sphere will be opening once the game is in full swing. London has a strong staff committed to making the RP experience an enjoyable one for all players involved. There are a great many opportunities to get involved in one of the many sphere and mush- wide TPs constantly being planned, and staff welcomes players who wish to be a TP hook for a new TP. Stop in and check us out...we'll be watching for you.

mud.name: Dragonball: Lost Time
mud.desc: The Dragonball is an exciting, very unique Dragon Ball Z mud, that has been in development for about 7 years. This mud strives to be different from the rest, to really submerge the player in the Dragon ball Z universe, and give them an experience they deserve.

The Dragonball contains many unique features, which set it apart from the rest of the DBZ muds. One of which is a room coordinate system which allows for actual objects and mobs to be placed for the player to move around in the room to interact with. Another is the skill system which is well thought out and uniquely developed, with each skill having its own level, and features an unique skill evolution system to learn new skills by leveling the older ones, as well as many skills around the Dragonball world to be learned. On top of that we have devised a unique system that separates powerlevel from xp, which inturn is mixed with a very balanced, intelligent battle system. The Dragonball is of a moderate size, over 7,500 rooms, with more added each day. But it is the quality not the quantity of these areas, which makes the mud stand out There are 9 races available right now. Those are -- Human -- Saiyan -- Halfbreed -- Icer -- Demon -- Namek -- Mutant -- Android -- Bio-Android

Once again though, we are not your normal run of the mill DBZ mud. You canâ€™t become the strongest or reach the maximum level in a couple of days. Infact there is no limit in The Dragonball. We know that isnâ€™t for everybody, and if you do have a problem with that, please donâ€™t bother to join up because thatâ€™s not what we are about and Iâ€™m sure you can find another saga clone to go play.

If you are looking for something where you have to make an effort to be someone and not just have things handed to you, come in and enjoy a unique Dragon Ball Z experience within The Dragonball. Where a newbie friendly environment and many friends and enemies await to be made and conquered as you work your way to the universes most strongest

mud.name: NoMUD - Realm of Dreams
mud.desc: By what name do you wish to be known?

mud.name: Legends of Ashrak
mud.desc: The Legends of Ashrak is currently looking for builders that are willing to learn a completely new OLC system. A better description is coming soon!

mud.name: Final Fantasy Tactics Online
mud.desc: The Final Fantasy Tactics Online mud has come back! Before it was refered to as Final Fantasy Compendium (FFC) but now has been more focused on Tactics as of right now, until completion. We have weekly, and monthly events for our players, to ensure the fun never stops!
Currently sporting a thick, highly developed Roleplay Environment, as well as various completely unique systems, such as:

- The Ability and Job Systems, striaght from FFT & Materia(FF7) - A fully functional gate system for travel between the parallel worlds, complete with gate keys. - Completely Player ran cities and environment, down to owning Houses, Shop's and entire Continents! - 100% Custom Quest System, with over 30 quests in game linking to chain quests, and 500 planned out quests pending approval or activation. - A Room Mapping System, as well as a fully unique Worldmap System, which is completely divided for each world.

mud.name: The Eternal Battle
mud.desc: The decades of peace have ended. The kingdom of the south has begun to amass its armies; the kingdom of the east has started to venture back into the light; and the kingdom of the west has started to fortify their defenses.

The High Priest Lazia of Tier has ordered the armies to defend the kingdom at all costs. In the last century, Kael was a strong force that blocked everyone from living in peace within Tier’s walls, and this time Lazia wants to be ready. The Matron Mother of Sheol has slowly been sending out more scouts. The reports she has received were prophesied by the Oracle; she knows she must strike. With the threat of intruders into Kael, the General recalls some of his forces.

The kingdoms are at war once again. The gods have decided that they will let the battles decide who the winner is. The mortals have the knowledge they need to fight and survive, but in this world, only the strong will survive. Only the strong will be able to outwit, outfight and survive in this extreme world.
New warriors sign up to join the ranks of each kingdom, which kingdom they join is up to them. Which one will you fight for?

mud.name: Forgotten Skies
mud.desc: Based on a fantasy world that incorporates the mythos of varying cultures; ranging from the arcane mages and mystical druids of the west to the pious monks and crafty ninjas of the east. Equipment and areas are based entirely on the unique flavor of these major (or perhaps just plainly popular) cultures. Our world begins in the west, roughly that of Mid-Western Europe, as we continue to form a world filled with sights and sounds, occasional caravans bringing rare items will visit major cities bringing rumors, and tales of adventures as a taste of what is to come. When a unique region is opened to the players, so will the chance to create a new character based on a class exclusive to that territory be given. As knowledge of the unknown world is revealed the known world continues to change and evolve. Epic struggles of power, fame, and greed rage on in a land filled with myth, legend, and intrigue.

mud.name: Astrum Metaphora
mud.desc: World of the high-tech and magic WARS. Clans should conquer world for its own rulership.

mud.name: TA Platinum
mud.desc: Ta Platinum is a text rpg

mud.name: Awakened Worlds
mud.desc: Awakened Worlds is a highly evolved Shadowrun MUD based originally on Circle code, but evolved quite extensively to follow the Shadowrun rules system. Awake has a Matrix, rigging, functional cyberware and bioware, shamanic and hermetic magic, and physical adepts. There are many areas to explore and improve yourself in, from Downtown Seattle, a robust area with alot in it, to more distant locales like the NAN and Tir Tairngire.

All major archetypes are fully functional, with a recent magic upgrade bringing mages and shamans into their own. The code and areas are constantly evolving, bringing lots of new features, fixes and areas into play almost everyday.

Awakened Worlds stays true to 3rd edition Shadowrun rules from Fanpro, but will sometimes favour playability over realism. We are RP optional, with plenty of players looking for RP, and many opportunities to get involved an both player and immortal created events.

We have a full staff of dedicated immortals, builders, coders and player helpers who are eager to help you learn your way around the sprawl. Check out our message boards for just a taste of what is going on both in and out of character.

So do you want to be a cyberdeck riding decker? A rigger with an army of remote control drones? A street samurai loaded to the gills with body upgrades? or maybe just a wandering shaman, helping people out in return for a place to sleep? Then come join us!

mud.name: Land of Legends
mud.desc: The Land of Legends focuses on a medieval fantasy setting with role-play strongly encouraged. We have guilds, orders, and clans available along with 141 areas currently online with additional areas currently in production. We currently offer 30 races and 15 classes to choose from, and to multi-class amongst, though we have several new races and classes on the way. There have been a great many changes to code, skills, spells, etc with much more still on the way. We are always looking for ways to futher improve our Lands.
* We have an online alias system so you don't need a specialized mud client to be an effective player.
* We issue every new player with a very comprehensive newbie guide.
* We feature a customizable prompt system that can even include a 'bar graph' reflecting your opponents remaining life.
* We have a buddy notification system to let you know when your friends log on or off or when they gain a level.

* Our help system is very well maintained and we have a corresponding help file for ever command, skill, spell, area, and for most other common subjects, of course, most of the help topics are also covered in your newbie guide.
* We offer online weddings between those who desire a permanent bond.
* Our whole mud color theme is customizable for each player.
* We have hotboot capabilities, so game play almost never needs to be interrupted for a reboot.

* We now even have mobs who will sell tattoos, arrange for travel between areas for you, cast spells on you, provide banking services (including transfers between players), and even generate quests for you!
* We still have much more in the works as well.
Come test your mettle and see if you can attain Avatar powers today!

We enjoy a very close and friendly community among those who play regularly & we warmly welcome any who would like to join that group. Like other muds, the number of players we have online varies widely at different times of the day/week/month/year. We often have less than 10 people online at a time, but do see 10-24 frequently and have peaked above that in the past.

mud.name: Ten Nations
mud.desc: After years of rest, Ten Nations is back up and running ! we are still doing some building and coding changes. we are a 50 level Diku based mud based on Robert Jordans Wheel of Time books. Following the Breaking of the World ten nations emerged as roughly equal powers in the Westlands. The threat of darkfriends and the fear that shadowspawn could once more pour forth from The Blight led to a general feeling that an overarching organisation was needed. The memories of the utopian Second Age were still fresh, but none would relinquish sovereignty. In 209 AB, ten nations came togeather to sign a mutual defence pact that would become the Compact of the Ten Nations. We have an auto Questor, Guilds and friendly Admins. We are still updating the Areas and building more, come by and visit us !

mud.name: Erra Pater: The Burning Post
mud.desc: Centuries ago, mages and men worked together throughout the realms. The Seven, those most powerful mages of the realms, guided both man and mage alike as needed.

But in Sun Calendar 109, King Dav ab Harmon of Lithmore disregarded the advice of the Seven. To warn him, or scare him perhaps, into acceding to their wishes, the Royal Apartments were immolated in fire. Either accidentally or intentionally, the Royal Family was slain that day, for all but King Dav himself were there. Grief-stricken, Dav ran to the mountains, leaving all behind. He was gone for over two months, and his seneschal oversaw the Royal Funerals and daily matters of the land. Finally, Authryn ab Sidharr, the seneschal, convened a Royal Council to determine the succession.

King Dav returned during the time the Council was meeting, bedraggled and somewhat emaciated but very much alive. Insane with grief and rage, the returned King pronounced to his Council that no longer would users of magic be suffered unto his land. He ordered a bounty for all known mages, and called for their deaths.

And so it was that King Dav began the Consolidation, by taking through force of arms all Kingdoms which bordered his, and putting to death any he caught who used magic. Gradually kingdom after kingdom fell to the onslaught of Dav's armies till in the end only the kingdom of Vavard remained to oppose the might of Lithmore.

The Burning Post is set in the early period the inquisition. The small island of New Yarsith located at the mouth of the Bren river serves as a focal point for events in the new kingdom in the years following King Dav's War of Consolidation. Dubbed the city of borders, representatives from every major guild, duchy, and even the kingdom of Vavard have gathered there at the behest of the King. At New Yarsith they will each vie to shape the future of the consolidated realm to their advantage in a bitter game of politics and intrigue. Lords and commoners both work to better their lot amidst the backdrop of intense religious inquisition.

Written within the chronicles of Urth, what part of the story will you play? Will you make your mark on the history of Urth or simply be a pawn? Perhaps you will be rise through the ranks from a lowly steward of your cause to become a someone embroiled in the politics that drive it. Or strike out on your own as a free agent, offering your services and sword to the highest bidder. Perhaps even stake your own claim to Urth as an autocrat, beholden to no ones goals but yours.

Be the noble knight who relentlessly hunts the vile users of magic, or the scheming thief on the lookout for pockets to pilfer, the mage who hides away and patiently bides the time till he masters the arcane arts or the inquisitor who brings the question to all and cleanses with fire. Are you the bard who plays with an amiable smile, whilst listening intently for secrets to glean or the mercenary just looking for another job and bread to fill your stomach. The possibilities are endless.
We're currently in open beta and welcome everyone to play in this intensive roleplay environment.
We have two websites, one for the actual mud, burningpost.net, and one for the game world, errapater.com.

mud.name: Solar Eclipse
mud.desc: Welcome to Solar Eclipse!

-201 levels Remort system (after you reach hero at 201, you can restart at level 1 as a new race and class and keep your skills, spells, and 1/8th of your hitpoints and mana) -27 unique races with race abilities, such as illithid with mindflay, machina with circuit overload -11 character classes : (mage, templar, thief, warrior, paladin, monk, bladesinger, bard, ranger, warlock, necromancer) -Class promotion system to obtain additional skills -Close to 100 original areas, over 12000 rooms -Monster Capture system to fight in coliseum and obtain prizes -Mine precious metals to make your own weapons and armor -Automatic quest master that gives 5 types of quests according to your level -Area quests, numerous quests by builders available from the Adeventurer's Guild in town. trade reputation points for rare items -NEW! Quest equipments worn ON TOP of regular eq -NEW! Poach monsters to receive rare items reward -NEW! Reputation system, earn points by playing the game comprehensively -Trade reputation points for rare items -Player-owned houses and shops -MXP support (HP gauges, click-navigation, smart menus, and more...) -Portal-enhanced mudding -Much more
We have a friendly atmosphere and are helpful to new players. So come on in and enjoy this game.

mud.name: Final Fantasy World
mud.desc: Welcome to Dragonball Battlezone: Vendetta. We offer extended roleplay, along with a detailed storyline, mortal games, PK, and clans. We welcome new players and ideas happily.

mud.name: Averis
mud.desc: The most advanced chat system available today.

mud.name: Land of the Unforgiven
mud.desc: Land of the Unforgiven is a heavily modified Dystopia Gold. The areas have been COMPLETELY wiped and all exp areas and Midgaard are from scratch. At the moment the world is fairly small, but plenty of room for a lot of exping and PK. There are new areas being added EVERY DAY. There are 18 classes at the moment, with more to come, possibly including Skyblades from MCloud and Wraiths from EoD. The statcap is 20k with 4k added per kill, but the classes and equipment are modified to reflect this. The average test player has taken two to three hours to max a character, but mastery is possible in half an hour or less with the stancetrain, spelltrain, and weapontrain commands.
This is a breath of fresh air from every kid who thinks he can run his own EoD, and when all end up looking the same. Give us a try, you won't want to leave.
Raymond Head Coder Head Builder

mud.name: Galactic MUD
mud.desc: if you have played Elite series of game, then you know what inspired me to do this MUD. Also books written by 'Harry Harrison' especially 'Deathworld' and 'Stainless Steel Rat'

the story: [not even started to making areas* - all stock now] mars was colonized and partially terraformed. none other planet in Sol couldnt be. but on every bigger piece of rock is a kind of base or colony. so there is much trade [also done by players] then other planets were found. [star names and locations based upon astromomisal data, still working on it] some of them having their own lifeforms [just like in \"deathworld\" :)] others being only mining colonies or factories. so that way the Earth Federation was formed. it's member were all earth countries and their colonies. but some bigger colonies [with heavier industry and science] started rebellion, against that \"Earth Empire\" and in several interstellar wars formed \"League of Free Worlds\". and then the play begins...

technicals: - modules to upgrade your ships - more realistic space ships** - possibility to land ANYWHERE on the planet** - building of houses on planet surfaces** - destroying and bombing them** - players making and running colonies** - hiding behind the barrels, crates.** - armor has no AC. instead when hit IN CERTAIN BODY PART armor on THAT PART reduces the damage** - characters could have families, and leave their cash and position to their offsprings** - medicine: doctors, breaking bones, diseases, etc. **

*)looking for area builders. mail me if you want to help building earth. it should be dark and cyberpunk-like. full of drugs and violence. but ranged weapons [blasters/grenades] should be HIGHLY illegal and anyone having it will be shot dead by the police. but there also will be 'higher class' of citizents.living in \"Garden of Eden\"s closed for normal people. **) to be added.

mud.name: Eternal Shadow
mud.desc: THIS MUD SUCKS, DONT COME HERE. DONT DO IT!!!!!

mud.name: BSAE: Beyond Shadow And Empire
mud.desc: BSAE is a circlemud 3.1 based mud with oasis OLC and dgscripts. It's been in operation about 3 years, in closed alpha development. The theme is star wars, and the idea is to create a world that is as authentic and roleplayable as possible, as well as stunning to the imagination. BSAE runs on a dedicated dell poweredge 400sc, off a cable line. Most of the programming work thats been put in, has been to a project we call the builder bot. This is a bot that pulls randomly from seed files, and creates enormous worlds for players to explore. The idea behind this being to leave the filler rooms to the bot, and let the builders do the fun stuff. BSAE is a mud that will be a far cry from traditional mudding experiences. we have vision, we have talent, we have a wide variety of resources, and we are quite determined; Come check us out.

mud.name: World of Phoenix - ONLY LEGAL COPY
mud.desc: In the beginning of the realm, there came a light in the vast darkness of the condition known as existence. The one known as F'nor came and claimed the lands around as his own. He was kind, and the light he brought was very appreciated by the masses of people that had been living in darkness for so long. F'nor, and his dragon Canth, were Gods in the eyes of those around. But there was one who remembered the darkness. One who found the light to be oppressing, and not as benevolent as those around. Her heart was as pitch, black and thick with hatred. This one was Alys. Alys had seenhow F'nor did his tricks and powers, and soon taught herself to emulate those powers, although she could not match F'nor's power in those skills. She planned to overthrow F'nor and return the world to the state of darkness it was before, the way she remembered and loved....
This is the begining of A Phoenix's Tale.
Come, and write your chapter.....

mud.name: Veritas Star Wars MUD
mud.codebase: [Smaug] codebase is SWFOTEFUSS, derived from SMAUG
mud.desc: We are a very new MUD, currently looking for builders/coders and individuals who can collaborate with the admin team on new and cool ideas for the game. It is based on the Star Wars: Rise In Power game, which I played a while back when it was running. The general idea I have in mind is to create new planets, new ships, add lots more code.. here's an outline of what I have in mind:

- create special areas with very tough NPCs and puzzles that you have to solve, like in legend of zelda. You'd have to group to enter these areas as well, we might have to code a grouping/loot distribution system.
- create new technology, such as transporters that allow cargo and people to be transported between orbitting ships and planets.

- we could create defined roles so that players would have more of an idea what to do in the game. There are already classes like pilot, smuggler, combat... but we could elaborate upon them: mercenary, bodyguard, intelligence officer, cargo transporter, diplomatic envoy, etc.
- We will work together to make the best possible gaming experience for our players!
- By the way, I have checked items in this MUD entry that are not necessarily in the game at this time. However, I do plan to add them eventually.
If you are a player, feel free to join our game at any time. Since we're using a well developed codebase, there's lots to do. Enjoy!

mud.name: Chaotic Crossroads
mud.desc: Chaotic Crossroads was built with newbie players
in mind. Chaotic crossroads allows player killing
as well as we encourage role playing. The clans
in the mud range from only player killing, to
justice to goddess, clan of teh innocent. Most of the mud is
origionally done by the coders that work for Chaotic crossroads.
There are also alot of other original charactoristics of the
like classes races, and so on.

mud.name: Universal Conflict: Shattered Times
mud.desc: The year is 2030 and man kind has finally colonized the planets but a new trouble has arisen as the planets are ruled over by earth the colonists become to be more angry for they believe that the outer planets(mars,pluto,jupiter, ect.) should be ruled by them seeing they know what goes on there the Federal Earth Goverment refuses to give up control and the Universal Planetary Alliances arises to fight against the FEG and finally become independant as the war rages on more soldiers are needed will you fight in this bloody war or will you hide?......

mud.name: TerraMUDX
mud.desc: ______ |______| __ __ _ _ __ __|____@_|__\\ \\ / / | | | | / _| \" (')') \\ \\ /\\ / /__ _ __| | __| | ___ | |_ C _) \\ \\/ \\/ / _ \\| '__| |/ _` | / _ \\| _| \\ _| \\ /\\ / (_) | | | | (_| | | (_) | | \\__/ \\/ \\/ \\___/|_| |_|\\__,_| \\___/|_| <___Y> _______ __ __ _ _ _____ / \\ /\\\\ |__ __| | \\/ | | | | __ \\ / | \\|\\ | | ___ _ __ _ __ __ _| \\ / | | | | | | | |___| \\|/\\ | |/ _ \\ '__| '__/ _` | |\\/| | | | | | | | | | \\|\\ \\ | | __/ | | | | (_| | | | | |__| | |__| | \\ \\ v| \\ \\_|_|\\___|_| |_| \\__,_|_| |_|\\____/|_____/ \\ \\==[| \\\\\\ ///` || A massively [well, fairly big anyway] multiplayer | || first-person text-based online role play game hosted by | )) St. Joseph's College,Gregory Terrace, Brisbane, Australia. | || | || Full of texty goodness, battle in and around the remains [___]] of an Inner-City College, now in ruins. Collect gear |____)) and riches & excercise your imagination, if you dare. Newbies Guide: http://www.wonko.info/mud/ Forum: http://www.wonko.info/mud/forum/

mud.name: AlteredHorizons
mud.desc: Altered Horizons is a new multithemed MUSH that welcomes various characters from different types of sources from comics, movies, books, cartoons, video games, and television shows to name a few.

There is faction based role play that involves the forces of good vs’ the evilness of villain tyranny on an alternate Earth that consists of a major continent and warp gates that allow for travel to parts of other worlds that exist. There are cities from various canons that litter the ground that are fought for by Alliance who are the forces of good against the Coalition the forces of evil, resources that can tip the balance of the war, civilians who want nothing to do with the war are quickly swept up to defend or to contribute to the major efforts.

mud.name: Hidden Nirvana
mud.desc: Set in one of the most biologically diverse areas of the world, Hidden Nirvana is a non-anthro wildlife roleplaying game set the Indian peninsula. Players are strongly encouraged to add their own creativity and originality to the MUCK's direction, plotlines, and groups. While realism is valued and encouraged, so is having a good time. With a wide variety of species to choose from and a rich culture to draw ideas from, you can find a niche for your character or make your own.

mud.name: Atlantic BDSM Forum
mud.desc: We are in the scratch, start up process!

The Atlantic BDSM Forum is going to be a MUD dedicated to adult role play, with emphases on social interacting and behaviors in the realm of BDSM, S&m, and slavery, allowing for consensual and non-consensual social play.
We do not have much of anything yet, because the code has only started, but things are moving quickly!

I am looking for people who have ideas they would like to see included in a social, role play world. If you have interesting thoughts or ideas which you'd like to contribute, please come by and visit.

- We will not be a combat MUD. - We will be based on social engineering and role play only. - Focus will be on society and civilization, instead of combat. - MUD will be BDSM and D/s based, with complete restraint system. - Based on as much

mud.name: Epocas de Caos
mud.desc: Epocas de Caos recrea un mundo fantastico donde poder disfrutar de gratas y sorprendentes aventuras. Podeis elegir entre 12 razas, 20 gremios, 3 bandos y multitud de ciudades y lugares por descubrir. Esta basado en el desaparecido Ancient Kingdoms, pero con todo, desde el mapeado a los objetos, las quests, los gremios, los comandos, los hechizos, etc, totalmente nuevo.
Por supuesto es gratuito y esta completamente operativo.
Se realizan mejoras y se aÃ±aden nuevas quests con regularidad.
Solo faltan los jugadores para que se convierta en una autentica experiencia rolera para todos.
Os esperamos !!!!

mud.name: The Elder Scrolls: Shadowkinn
