mud.desc: The Elder Scrolls: Shadowkinn... Create and play any character from the noble warrior to the sinister assassin. All-new manual combat and magic system based on the players skill(timing). Increase your stats, gain levels, do quests, and destroy many creatures. Battle with Online rivals, and join many guilds. Game uses an ASCII map to move, and very unique movement! If interested in, please email me, or AIM me at porternhl11. If you want screenshots, do the same...
~Trace Avadi~

mud.name: Unification Wars
mud.desc: Unification Wars is a free Massively Online Game with over 350,000 members !You are the leader of an empire, recruit and level up your minister(s) to assist you to expand your economy, military and power by diplomatic or military means. Enslave all intelligent life to unify them all !

mud.name: DragonBall GT: Rebirth
mud.desc: This is my first mud in a long time. This mud is gonna cover all of DB DBZ and DBGT. There will be quests soon but as of right now we are working on them. Tournaments will be hosted once a month when the mud opens up. SSJ isnt in yet still trying to figure out how to code it in. As of right now Goku and Vegeta are the owners. And are currently the only ones building and coding. So that means we are hiring alot of people we have opening for coders builders RP enforcers player assistants so if you are interested send us an email or stop bye in the game for an interview.

mud.name: The Minds Eye
mud.desc: The Mind's Eye offers 72 levels with two remorts.
Heavily modified based off of ROM 2.4.
Friendly player-base.
Check us out

mud.name: Harry Potter: Into The Fire
mud.desc: \"It was dark times, Harry. Dark times.\" - Rubeus Hagrid to Harry Potter

And indeed that is just what is the current situation. As the students return to Hogwarts, there are whispers on the wind about the possible return of the Dark Lord Voldemort. Whispers that are ignored by most, including the Ministry of Magic. Minister Cornelius Fudge has stated in public broadcasts on the Wizard Wireless Networks, that \"Mister Potter's claims that He Who Shall Not Be Named is close to returning are nothing more than the creative imagination of a child desperately seeking attention. We should instead be be focusing our efforts on the apprehension of escaped murderer Sirius Black.\"
With Sirius Black still at large, and the rumors of the possible return of Voldemort, it seems the wizarding world stands on the event horizon of the start of dark times. But, only time will tell.
Staring in 1994, in the summer, HP: Into The Fire seeks to bring the fun of the Harry Potter world to you.
So stop by, check us out, and ask questions. :)

mud.name: God Wars: Blood:Stained
mud.desc: Let the dark side take over has an old school mud, we aim too be alittle more challanging then your the new hack and slash. We push too be a truly skill for mud where there is no upper class just the upper skill, can you match skill for skill with everyone else or will you resort too age old ganging, its Free for all where the Blood truly stains the ground.
*Note currently in beta testing, when we open testers will be granted A bonus head starts when we leave beta.

mud.name: Kituwah
mud.codebase: [Custom] Code is written using Euphoria programming language (http://www.rapideuphoria.com)
mud.desc: The inhabitants of Earth knew this day would come eventually. Still, when it finally came, no one could believe it was really true. The population of Earth had grown beyond the limited space of the planet. The solution was clear. It had been discussed for years. A planet much like a very primitive Earth had been discovered many light years away. Thankfully, space travel had now advanced to the point that the distance could be covered in a relatively short time. The problem now was that no one wanted to leave Earth. So, who would go? The solution came relatively quickly. Orphans, criminals and other outcasts from society would be sent to the new planet to live. From a statistics perspective, it was a good decision. The ones who would be left on Earth could keep all of their resources, because they did not feel the resources should be

mud.name: Dead Society
mud.codebase: [AFKMud] Patched with latest 1.77 critical bug fixes.
mud.desc: This MUD will be in the cyberpunk/distopic future genre. Along the lines of William Gibson and Philip K. Dick novels. We are currently looking for builders/coders. If you are interested, please send an email to oshuma@wearefriendly.org.

mud.name: Age of Destiny 2
mud.desc: Yet another version of the wonder Roleplay-based MUD that is Age of Destiny. Paul Clarke (Gideon x) Did a wonderful job coding it and in the past it has been hosted by many different groups. The head admin of this version has been playing the mud frequently for years now and enjoys it so much that he's decided to host his own version. The MUD's character classes include Humans, Vampires, and Werewolves based on the rules of the White-Wolf Roleplaying Games.

mud.name: Angel City MUSH
mud.desc: Los Angeles. Land of sun, palm trees, and smog. Its glittering surface promises opportunity, productivity, and perhaps even glamour and fame. A place where the rich, the poor, the old, the young, and all those in between live out their lives in the great rat race.

Claw your way past the glitter though, and Los Angeles is another city entirely. For it harbors a darker side a side. A side filled with the promise of violence, of blood, of things spoken of only in tales of horror.

There are those who make it their mission to protect the unfortunates, but just as there are guardians, there are also adversaries. It's a constant struggle to stay one step ahead of the opposition, and the stakes are high. So high that the entirety of humanity will be affected if good men fail.
Welcome to the City of Angels.

Angel City MUSH is set in 2001 Los Angeles, just after the finales of Angel Season 2 and Buffy Season 5. Angel and the gang returned from the dimension of Pylea as heroes, having rescued Cordelia and Fred. But their victory is diminished by the sorrowful news brought to them by Willow: Buffy has died, having sacrificed herself to prevent the destruction of the world.

And with the world saved, it would seem that everything would go back to normal, right? Think again. Demons, vampires, along with other monsters and beings of power continue to roam the city. The monolith law firm of Wolfram and Hart continues its nefarious pursuits. The apocalypse has only been delayed.
Will you help prevent it, or bring it about?

mud.name: Titans Go!
mud.desc: Titans go is a brand new Mud currently in the heavy editing process, while players are welcome to try it out, there is a greater need for coders and builders at the moment.

There are several classes including Tameranian, Human, Changeling, Cybernetic, demon, and half-demon. Roleplay is strongly encouraged, and one can earn bonuses from the roleplay. There are many worlds and areas to visit and even the Titan Tower. Come and enjoy the friendly atmosphere, after all, Imortals can make the playing better when they listen to the players!

mud.name: WWII: The Pacific Theater
mud.desc: A World War II based MUSH with special attention devoted to naval and aerial warfare. Once completed, we will have all the major and minor countries that were involved in the Pacific Theater represented in our MUSH, as well as an Independent faction for those that don't quite fit in anywhere else. We will have our own

mud.name: RavenMUD
mud.desc: RavenMUD was originally started by a handful of people from Da Shadow's Domain and ShadowMUD. After many modifications from its original code Raven now has many unique features including: improved A.I. Mobs (NPCs) using special procedures and more recently DG Scripts, multi functional magic items, numerous operational cities, and an online creation system, just to list a few. Player grouping and role playing are quite popular with 11 classes and 11 standard plus 9 remort races to choose from. Exploring Raven's vast and ever expanding areas will not be a hassle, with saved aliases and abbreviated commands to ease the amount of typing. Clans and custom clan housing that offers to many options to list add greatly to an already rich role playing environment. Planned and impromptu quests are frequently run with various themes and objectives that range from capture the flag, city defense, seek and destroy, rescue missions, treasure hunts, capture the flag, and many many more. A talented Imm and mortal staff continuously produce original areas and improve game play in many facets. An entire city is devoted to players new to MUDs is available to start in with helpful and informative mobs and help files to get your journey underway. Raven is very stable and has been around for quite sometime and will continue to exist indefinitely. Whether new to the game or a veteran this is everything you are looking for in a MUD.

mud.name: Synergy
mud.desc: Synergy is a renowned fantasy mud. We are a very friendly mud in our two functions of providing an enriched gaming experience to our players and an exciting, creative environment for our staff.

mud.name: Legend of Rowena
mud.desc: Come play Legend of Rowena!
We have the following classes: Vampires, Werewolves, Demons, Magi, Highlanders, Drow, Ninjas, Monks, Faes, Wraiths, and Dragons. (Coming soon Priests and Bastet)
Each of which has been extensively fixed to be made alot of fun to play. Our Magi, Highlanders and Ninjas have alot of new things added to them.
We have recently recoded clans. Our clans now have a clan bank, which can be used by all members.
We have an arena, where players can safely spar without the worry of being decapitated. We have status arenas, where players can win status. Wars - Last man standing, and Team.

We have a variable status window, which means that each day at MIDNIGHT server time it is reset. We have status tokens - which allow players to gain status upon eating (there is also a chance that they lose status too) Random experience, and quest point modifiers, which can co up to 5 x. We also have a \"parasite\", which is a form of experience, combat or quest point modifier, which is a personal modifier to the player.

Our MUD is heavily based upon player killing, so we have bonuses for the amount of pkills, which vary from random status tokens, shortening of times between modifiers, status window lowering, and all of the previous.
-Rowena

mud.name: DynamixMUSH
mud.desc: Dynamix is a social MUSH with a general theme centered on Dynamic City, a place for building, coding, and socializing with no quota restrictions. The public sector, Central Square, has fun surprises and places to explore.

Take a ride on the DC Train and visit several uniquely coded themed areas. There is Comfort Farm in the Plains & Hills, the Pyramid Adventure in the Desert, The Boardwalk at Oceanside including the casino, the arcade, the soda shoppe, the Ocena Adventure and more!

Stop by Cape Carnival and blast into space! You can get your own starship and explore a potentially infinite universe. Transfer minerals from the planets you find and buy over ten different types of upgrades for your ship. Invite your friends and do battle with phasers or torpedoes. Colonize planets, build starbases, and actually @dig out your world for others to explore. If you are interested in space themes will certainly want to give DynamixMUSH's United Earth Space Exploration Coalition a try.

Here's what one of our players said about DynamixMUSH!: * A great mush with years of softcoding (est. 1996) * general theme * no registration, no quota * ANSI color * dynamic structure building * tons of interesting places to visit * cool staff
We do indeed have a lot to offer at DynamixMUSH. Stop by and visit with one of our friendly admins, explore, and enjoy yourself. See you soon!

mud.name: Cryosphere
mud.desc: The year is 2063. Decades ago, space was opened up, for exploration, for development, and for colonisation. Now, the forces of competing nation-states are scrabbling to expand into the galaxy, fortifying and industrialising former frontier worlds, and searching for potential alien allies. One such system, located near the border of the demilitarised zone between British and French space, has been thrust into great importance, and now is host to an impressive military presence.
But not all is well, banditry and piracy are still rife, the development of the system barely begun, and the uneasy peace with the French starting to break down.
As a raw recruit to the Royal Space Navy, you must pass through the Academy, and then work your way up through the ranks by performing missions, eventually reaching the rank of Commander.

Cryosphere is a Sci-Fi themed MUD that has been built from scratch, with some Aber influence. We have equipment saving, stores, banks, insurance, hospitals, wilderness, an integrated ship and docking system, simulators that you can safely train in, an academy for new players, an original scenario, and many unique missions.

mud.name: The City By The Bay
mud.desc: The first vampire came to San Francisco during the Gold Rush. As the miners built the city, she built her fortress, the fortress which later became Alcatraz.

Thus started the City By The Bay in our adaptation of the Anitaverse, universe created by Laurell K. Hamilton through the Anita Blake: Vampire Hunter series. In this world, creatures of our myth are reality. Zombies are raised to settle contests of wills, vampires can vote, and people pay to see shifters dance.

We have opportunities for players to choose to create their own vampire, werewolf, wereleopard and more to enjoy role play in the Anitaverse. We enjoy creating and playing in tiny plots and on-the-spot RP.
We welcome you to join us in our adventures, set in the exciting city of San Francisco in our alternate universe. The world awaits you!

mud.name: Bloody Vengeance : Rebourn
mud.desc: Yes, Bloody Vengeance is back. If you are completly fed up with easy muds or muds that do not offer anything out of the ordinary, come by and take a look at Bloody Vengeance. I am currently working on some classes that will upgrade into the already known classes that Dystopia has as well as some classes that you may not be familiar with. Races are soon to be put in. Random eq is generated from mobs, Quests are offered whenever an immortal feels the need for it. An extensive kingdom system is in the making as well. I can not begin to explain what all this mud has been through but it is back now so come by and give it a look. -Sorian

mud.name: Thyris' MUD
mud.desc: Right now, it's mostly stock, ok. But massive changes coming soon!

mud.name: Simauria
mud.desc: Entra en Simauria, un mundo fantastico medieval repleto de aventuras inspirado en El Señor de los Anillos y en Dungeons and Dragons. Podras elegir entre numerosas razas y profesiones, visitaras multitud de lugares asombrosos, resolveras extraños enigmas, lucharas contra todo tipo de formidables enemigos, haras que tu personaje sea cada vez mas poderoso y acabaras envuelto en una apasionante historia.
¡Y todo ello en un mud en el que lo mas destacado es compañerismo entre los jugadores!
Conectate ahora en mud.simauria.org, puertos 23 o 8080.

mud.name: The Inquisition MUTT
mud.desc: \"Nothing good can ever come from a witch.\"
--Inquisitor Colwynn, right before throwing himself on the pyre of his mother, a mage

With the murder of the royal family, a grieving monarch set out to eradicate a great evil running rampant through the kingdom of Lithmore: magic. His fury and determination soon destroyed political alliances and forged a new empire from the ashes of his enemies. The genocide of all those who practice the magical arts, however, could not be completed in his day alone...

Centuries later, the struggle for survival still rages between all users of magic and ever-viligant might of the Holy Order. Immerse yourself in the suspicion and mystery of a realm embroiled in a clandestine holy war, where honor and politics all too frequently collide - and magic is real. Will you join in the fight to erase the evil taint of sorcery from the realm - or unlock the secrets of the forbidden arts, and rise against oppression?
+ The Inquisition features an original and comprehensive world with a theme of innate, yet entirely playable RP conflicts.
+ Player-driven role-play supported by staff through maintnence of rumors, surrounding IC \"framework\" events, and direct assistance purchased by players with accumulated QP.

+ The ability to create complete characters with history, style, and skills from the very start of play as well as the in-game means to document them throughout their lives with player note-taking systems.
+ A fully operational RP Award System that automatically awards and advances players without staff intervention or approval.
+ A completely classless and level-less game geared for immersive realism and a surpassing role-play experience.
+ A very secretive and uniquely coded magic system: immersive, thematic and intricate, the likes of which you will find nowhere else.
+ A full craft system, allowing skilled characters to create almost any object in the game for sale.
+ An automated player shop system, allowing characters to sell anything they want in a standard 'shop environment' whether online or not.
+ A realistic system of learning skills that causes them to advance meaningfully over time.
+ A responsive and skilled staff, always willing to offer help.

mud.name: Battlestar Hyperion
mud.desc: This MUSH is closed and this entry is awaiting deletion. Sorry!

mud.name: Gate of Elbenshire
mud.desc: Gate of Elbenshire is a new world just launched a few weeks ago. It is a dark,haunted,fantasy, multiplayer,rpg game. We have quests, plenty of gm time for new comers, clothing, weapon, and armor, alterations by our in game merchant (Lady Raven Willow) lots of level awards given to players. New races, including a new gargoyle race. Custom built houses upon request. And, much more if you want to drop in and check it out, I am always in game and avaliable. hope to see you there, Lady loxaliss.

mud.name: ScryMUD
mud.desc: This is the realm of a post apocalyptic earth. Magic has resurfaced but that was long ago. The Apocalypse almost destroyed Humans, but they survived, and changed, and new peoples appeared on the earth. The graceful elves of the woodlands, the stone dwelling dwarves, the solitary, nature loving anitre, the strong, if dim, ogrue, and the impish darklings. As is their nature, the new and ancient peoples divided up the land, peacefully at times, bloody at others...

mud.name: Reinos de Leyenda (Los Años Oscuros)
mud.desc: Reinos de Leyenda es un MUD de tipo LPC, más concretamente el código base es un driver llamado MudOS y una mudlib propia denominada Pusa que aunque originalmente fue basada en la mudlib FR, las modificaciones han sido tan grandes y numerosas tras sus primeros pasos allá en el 1996 que ya se la puede considerar como de origen propio.

Puede que todo eso te suene algo raro si no estás familiarizado con el mundo de los MUDs, en ese caso te bastará con saber que RL es un juego de rol en modo texto que se desarrolla en tiempo real a través de internet y con varios jugadores conectados al mismo tiempo. El juego está ambientado en un mundo fantástico propio llamado Eirea en el que habitan todo tipo de seres extraños y está formado por una topografía del todo fantástica. Aunque el entorno está influenciado por Reinos Olvidados, DragonLance, El Señor de los Anillos y Stormbringer y se pueden encontrar razas que aparecen en estas sagas y regiones del mundo que pueden recordar a ellas, la ambientación es c ompletamente original, y no se ajusta a una en concreto, con lo cual seguramente encontrarás diferencias entre como esperas que sea una raza, cultura o monstruo y como lo es realmente en Eirea. El mundo de Eirea es único y está diseñado especialmente para RL.

mud.name: LevensMOO
mud.desc: LevensMOO is based on the novel Imajica (Imagica in other countries) by Clive barker. We started by reproducing the 5th Domain of Imajica, which is Earth. Specifically the city of London (England).
Players do not need to know the backgrounds of Imajica, but it helps a lot.
LevensMOO spoken in dutch, is the same way as we would say levensmoe. Levensmoe means tired of life.

mud.name: Chaos Mud
mud.desc: Chaos is back, with a new administration. Come join us, as we improve the Chaos code, and bring back a place that people were upset about when it shut down. Lately we've been one of the fasting climbing MUDs on this site, and we are constantly updating and refining gameplay.

From the whirling blades of Barbarians to the heroic cleave of mental warriors like the Reaver, the magical mastery of Warlocks, Bards and Wizards to the trickery of a Ninja's smokebomb, you will have no problem finding a class to suit your fancy.

The races also add an extra dimension to gameplay. Shadows can slip through doors and into rooms unnoticed, and the reclusive halflings never fail to hide from the eyes of others. The blood of vampires runs hot in the middle of the night as they leech health from their victims, and demons cause a great blight to theirs. Angels rejoice with heavenâ€™s charge and grow in their heavenly union to create a bond of strength with their deity. Chaos is a heavily modified Merc code that was created for a fully customizable Fantasy world. We offer lots of original areas with mob interaction and mob-run quests, as well as a few customized, generic areas and an intricate system of roads, rivers, and oceans. We have 16 races, offer clans with clan rooms and associated bonuses, and a myriad other custom features. Chaos has 500 player levels where you play the first 100 levels in one of 6 main classes. Then at level 100 players must choose between three different specializations of their class, with each specialization having a unique skill set with their own weaknesses and strengths. There is a damage, utility, and tank specialization for each of the six main classes. After Level 500, there are the LEGEND levels, with their own unique skills, quests, and equipment.

If you would like to wield a legendary Chaos weapon and acquire special orbs through quests to increase your weapon's power, slay potent enemies with spells and skills like Were-dragon, Force Spikes, Ultimo, Assassinate, Midnight Blast, Dragon Strike, Swirling Blades, and Whirlwind or travel through the world with an Energy Vortex or a Ghostly Steed, then Chaos is the place for you. We hope to see you there!

mud.name: In Nomine: R&D
mud.desc: In Nomine is a roleplaying setting based on religious mythology, produced by Steve Jackson Games. In short, think \"angels and demons\". It is otherwise set in the modern day, and is mostly parallel with the real world.

In Nomine: R&D is set in the fictional northern Californian town of Advincula, home to a science park that has become an important landmark in the War between Heaven and Hell. A technology firm's office has become a \"Tether\", a spontaneously-forming supernatural link to other planes of existence. In this case, it's a link to Hell, to the \"Word\" of Technology.
Check the wiki (http://innomine.wikia.com) for detailed theme information and the chargen process.

mud.name: Chaotic Realms
mud.desc: One of THE best god wars MUDs available to the public. An expanded Dystopia, original classes, skills, and code. Very newbie-friendly and there is almost always an immortal available for questions and/or help.

mud.name: Vampire Wars: The New Era
mud.desc: Vampire Wars: The New Era is a new generation of VW (Vampire wars theme). The New Era offers a load of fantastical new areas, but we did keep stock in as well, so people will feel fairly comfortable at first and then progress to the newer areas that we have placed in the mud. We have made major changes in the code to allow mastery from lvl 1-10 in disciplines available. Diab will be introduced and allow people to diab each other for generation. Players will start at gen 12 and be able to reach gen 3. Justicars will be chosen and fought amongst by the players within each clan. There will be no admin favoritism, every person will have a fair chance and trial for any issues between people. Admins will rarely get involved unless an issue is VERY serious, other than that, player issues stay player issues. We encourage role-playing but don't enforce it, though it does add some flavor to the game. We are striving to make this one of the best and most active Vampire Wars of them all.

We are also introducing all 13 clans, including Caitiff for the first time in any VW mud. There will be clan specific disciplines on a master from 1-10 and general disciplines that players can choose from.

We make a promise that there will be some form of update at least once a month, if we do not meet this expectation, we will give out around 500 quest points to each player (Which is a fair amount of quest points for doing nothing). We will definitely be running quests and gearing the game towards players. If the majority of players want something a specific way, we will cater the mud towards that design. It is our mud to run, though we believe it is the players mud and they should shape the world in which they play with their opinions.
Our website is finished and our site can be accessed at www.newera-vampire.com. We opened on Sunday, December 29th.

mud.name: Ilyrias, the Aegadian Isles
mud.desc: Ilyrias, the Aegadian Isles is set in a world unlike any other. Carlean scholars have recently unlocked the system of the world, giving them unprecedented control over the forces of nature. Though some denounce this new science as magic and heretical. Meanwhile the Alberen natives in the south fight to keep their homelands safe from The destruction wrought by the Carleans

mud.name: Sarith's Revenge
mud.codebase: [GodWars] In the process of heavily modifying
mud.desc: We just started the mud, it's up and operational but we're no where near done with it =). We need competent builders so if you think your up to it, think about it some more and then get back to us. As for regular players, just come on in and have some fun, get your character built up before anyone else has the chance. We'll probably throw in bonuses for early players.

The reason its called Sarith's Revenge is 'cause Sarith is my character on most muds and we would get fed up with the crap and stupidity there, so we decided to make our own and leave all the crap behind. Hopefully this mud will be really fun for you guys. Sign up, screw around, do whatever. Just have fun.

mud.name: WindyCity MUX
mud.desc: Welcome to Windy City MUX, a non-World of Darkness game set in Chicago and based off the Anita Blake: Vampire Hunter series by Laurell K. Hamilton. It's a world where vampires have rights, zombies don't, shapeshifters are discriminated against despite it being illegal to do so, and humans can raise the dead for a living. In short, it's a modern world that will look mostly the same to you and me, but the monsters that we all thought were storybook creatures are out mingling with the rest of us.
Accepted concepts include all flavors of vampire, were-things, many sorts of fae, psychically talented humans, magically able humans, animators of the dead, and many others!

mud.name: PoopMud
mud.desc: PoopMud offers a fun dynamic environment, with new places of adventure added often. You can develop your character to a high powered adventurer, or explore a huge world, PoopMud provides an ideal environment for all types of mudding. Various means are used to ensure mobiles are diverse and unique. Enviromental changes are made possible through room progs and custom code. A personal spirit helps the novice mudder learn their way around, so being a newbie on PoopMud is not so daunting for the novice. Immortals and Elders are available to answer questions and give suggestions in order to help the novice mudder develop into a fully experienced player. A togglable hints channel gives the new player suggestions of useful information. At level 50, players may choose either a secondary class or the same class, to create either an expert or a more diverse character. Once reaching level 50 with the secondary class, statistics may be improved via the meta shop. A functioning arena is available for controlled PK games. There are over 100 automatic quests, plus imm-led quests. Quest Points earned can be used to buy Orbs and powerful scrolls and potions. The Well contains 20 levels of over 6000 randomly generated rooms and mobs. The mobs in The Well have fragments, which can be used to gain a super race called K'ta'viir (KTV). All in all, PoopMud is an enjoyable place to come forget the frustrations of every day life. Come join us!

mud.name: Syn's Place
mud.desc: we are a new mud looking for some people to playtest. We are also looking for coders builders and quest imm's. so y'all stop on in and see us ya hear.

mud.name: FuskerMud
mud.desc: Are you an old-school mudder? One for whom Midgaard feel like a second home? Quickâ€¦whatâ€™s the path from temple square to the Assassinâ€™s Guild? Your fingers never forget these things. Fondly rembember the thrill of killing trees? Do you ever sometimes feel that newer muds have become so hugely feature-rich and complex that all the math and tactics take all the fun out of the pure hack-n-slash? That, in retrospect, four classes and a handful of skills and spells were plenty to have a good time? Or are you brand-new to mudding? Want to cut your teeth on something simple and straightforward, not having to read a textbook just to get into the game and see if itâ€™s for you? Or do you play a modern Mud, but have always been curious about that text about something called â€œGammaâ€ at the login prompt and those strange, Scandinavian-sounding names? Wonder what life was like back at the damn of mudding time? If any of these ideas intrigue you, then you shoud definitely try FuskerMUD! FuskerMUD is one of the oldest Dikus still in existence. And itâ€™s about as close as youâ€™ll come these days to the original gamma experience. That doesnâ€™t mean here arenâ€™t any enhancements, of course. In fact, the code is highly reworked. But always, the philosophy has been to keep as close as possible to the classic gameplay. Warrior, Thief, Cleric, Wizard. Thatâ€™s all you get to start withâ€¦though once you max out these, thereâ€™s an Avatar class to keep progressing in. Yes, some areas are stock, but sometimes those old areas are, get this, actually FUN TO PLAY IN! And donâ€™t worry, thereâ€™s plenty of original areas too.

mud.name: Mists of Mercya
mud.desc: Life admist the battle of light and dark.

mud.name: Star Trek: The Final Frontier
mud.desc: It's six years after the events of Star Trek: Nemesis that threw the Romulan Empire into chaos. Commander Donatra has been named the Praetor, and after several years of consolidating the Romulan government it has finally stabilized. The Klingon Empire has fully recovered from its losses during the Dominion War under the leadership of Chancellor Martok. Martok continues to keep peaceful relations with the Federation, while others within the empire are becoming thirsty for battle again. The Cardassian Union is still rising from its ashes after its defeat in the Dominion War. Six years ago the interim government handed power over to the members of the new Detapa Council, marking the begin of the full withdrawal of allied forces from Cardassian space.

The United Federation of planets has relished in the relative peace that it has had for the past six years. Warships from the Dominion War are being refitted back into their original exploration configurations. New designs are being built at shipyards, made for discovery in a new era.
But will this era of peace last? Will the powers of the Alpha Quadrant fall back into old grudges? And what will Starfleet find in the reaches of deep space?

100 years after the launch of the USS Excelsior, the first of a long line of ships that would form the backbone of the fleet, a new class has been launched to replace it. The USS Vanguard is the second Excalibur-class ship launched, an entirely new design based upon the Excelsior and the classic Constitution lines, built with technology pioneered and improved upon in the Sovereign and other classes. The Vanguard is being launched on its 5-year mission, to explore strange, new worlds.

Star Trek: The Final Frontier is a 'one-ship' Star Trek MUSH, meaning everyone is a member of the same crew, aiming to capture the spirit of TOS and TNG with the crew exploring the galaxy and going on away missions. A story outline has been made already for it, and players are also encouraged to run their own plots, and are given the tools to do so. While an outline may already be in place, the story will adapt to player actions as the players help shape the narrative. We are RP-driven instead of code-driven, with code never replacing RP.

mud.name: Static Chaos: The Return
mud.desc: Static Chaos is a intense combination of timing, skill and a little bit of luck to fight your way to glory.
Offering 6 classes, in-depth clan system and a variety of fun toys to keep you occupied.

Some Features Include: - Train in and Mobile Combat Suits - Take over areas in the mud with a group of friends or a clan! - Take an active role in the MUDs economy with a real time market system that affects territories and professions! - In Depth Stats and weekly PK tournaments keep the comeptition fierce. - Need a break from PK? Florish in the Static Chaos Market as an expert crafter.
A dedicated staff and competitive friendly player base awaits this new challenge. Stay awhile, and quickly see what makes us unique.
http://static.godwars.net telnet://static.godwars.net:6500

mud.name: Solanis Realms
mud.desc: Newly started Steam Punk based mud with heavy emphasis on crafting. Online creation support for creating quests, blueprints, resources, and other extended features. Player owned housing, soon to be expanded to player owned and ran cities. Player owned vendors. New mprog commands for quest support.
We are in need of skilled builders who are willing to learn some new commands and some dedicated players to help with some play testing.

mud.name: Ensimud
mud.desc: Ensimud is a bilingual ( french & english ) hack & slash mud. Created in early 94, it has been heavily modified from its original code base ( Circle 2 ). Major additions are : AI'ed monsters, player house, chests & clan, treasures table to equip npcs, encounter tables to populate areas, custom autoquest script language, random generated quest zones, questlike craft system, and of course a switch to french texts.

The world is fantasy oriented, with circle 2.20 original areas and lots of custom zones,races,classes,spells... The mud is currently not very newbie friendly, but rather oriented toward high level characters grinding.
A rewriting of the mud is in process, orienting the game toward a turn by turn and tactical rpg, using an new and open source codebase.

mud.name: Demished Lands
mud.desc: N/A DESCRIPTION FOLLOWS WHEN WE'RE OPEN FOR PUBLIC PLAY.

mud.name: Abandoned Legacy: Returned
mud.desc: *Hi. If you're looking for a competitive, yet non-exhaustive environment, then you have found the right place. *Abandoned Legacy offers a Newbie-Friendly environment and an extensive pk system. Newbie protection is enforced by the code, to ensure that you are not killed when you first log in, but the choice remains for you to give up newbie protection. *The Mud is quite stable, with an auto-recover script that keeps the mud up and running 99.9% of the time. *All stock Low4 classes have been debugged, revamped and balanced to improve the PK aspect of the mud. *The custom class Dragon has been added and more classes will be added along the way. The mastery system brings new dimensions to the standard classes, along with various skills that have been added in. *Current Classes: Demon, Dragon, Drow, Mage, Monk, Ninja, Paladin, Vampire, Werewolf. *Two new questing systems are in - find the object, or the mob. And for those lucky players, gambling (both blackjack and craps) has been implemented. All three ways are great alternatives to standard questing. *Highly competitive kingdoms are offered, each with their own kingdom hall. *Original ideas are constantly implemented. -Raoul

mud.name: The MMORPG-Creator
mud.desc: Have you always dreamed of having your own Multiplayer online Roleplaying game(MMORPG) and create items, quests, maps and complete game worlds that can be enjoyed by dozens, hundreds or even thousands of players?
Now you finally have the chance to live your dream with the MMORPG-Creator!
You don't have to learn any difficult programming language, make graphics and animations or spend days on understanding how complex databases work.

The MMORPG-Creator is very easy to use and works right after installation! Creating an MMORPG usually takes many years of development and testing but with the MMORPG-Creator you can get started in just a few minutes and have your first players login in less than 10 minutes! The MMORPG-Creator comes with a complete gameworld already included! Over 100 maps, over 400 items, fully animated characters and monsters. Mapeditor, Itemeditor, NPCeditor, Monstereditor and much more all in one package.
Please also check out: www.shadowworlds.de

mud.name: Star Wars: Galactic Insights
mud.desc: Seven years after the Battle of Yavin, Darth Vader is dead, Palpatine is presumably dead, Yoda has passed away, and The New Republic have just taken Coruscant back from what remains of the Empire.
The Jedi Order is beginning to reform itself and slowly track down and train new Jedi. The Dark Jedi, in less conspicuous ways, are also beginning to reform.

Just one year ago, the New Republic stopped using Guerilla Warfare and began using open tactics of war to get what they wanted. They began capturing worlds in the Core Worlds with the idea of using Coruscant as their capitol.
The Empire struggles to regain what was once theirs and skirmishes still break out between the newly established Republic and the badly broken Empire.

Come forth and join us. Play in a world where Star Wars is brought to life. The Staff here at Sw:Gi are always struggling to make the mud as real as possible. There are many features here on Sw:Gi that are scarecly found anywhere else. Using the Star Wars: Galactic Insights codebase, a highly modified SWR 1.0 FUSS codebase, we have added new things and modified the old. Come and share your ideas and create your destiny in the world known as Star Wars. Create and define your destiny.
SW:GI is currently modified with 2500+ changes against a stock codebase. It is a three+ year project.

Galactic Insights has a steady, growing, ever-changing PBase. We are all unique in our own way. We LOVE to make additions to our playerbase! Our peak times are usually evenings and nightimes EST. Immortals are always on, though hidden. Don't leave if we're empty! Stay and we will grow! We LOVE the new people! Come give us a chance. So many others have.
Sw:Gi runs the Star Wars: Galactic Insights v2.0 code.

At Galactic Insights, we're devoted to promoting the SWR community as much as possible. We've recently developed the Loan system, allowing a player to take a loan for credits and pay it off in due time. Of course, there are repurcussions when you don't. :) This loan system is the first of it's kind on a developed SWR based MUD, and Sw:Gi did it first, and we did it best.

----- Features(NEW): **NEW** CREDIT LOAN SYSTEM. NOT FOUND on -ANY- OTHER SWR. LOTTERY system! -HEAVY- Roleplay Environment. Code changes on a daily basis. EXPERIENCED, MATURE, and REASONABLE staff members who *LISTEN*. Comm frequencies for enforced roleplay. No more 'tell name message'. ENFORCED roleplaying(ALL THE TIME). Ally/War system for clans - tracking the status. Heavily modified space system. ARENA mini-game(fun). FREEZE tag mini-game(more fun). LAZER tag mini-game(ultimate fun). HISCORE system - tracking player statistics. Compete for #1. MULTI-PLAY system for lans/computer labs. Mob-run questing system for earning quest points to purchase quest items. 0 fuel = death? Nope. RPPSET command for immortals to award RP to serious RP'ers. Command to purchase RP items, such as force, bonus levels, or skill percentages. Emergency copyover system - next to zero downtime. Excellent server - no lag for most people. Strict anti-cheating measures via MSM 1.5. Over 260+ skills. Over 100 forcer spells. 18 races. Slicer class ... 'nuff said. Keypadded doors. NEWBIE HELPER system. Rewards for them and help for you! Planetary Upgrade System(Shields and Barracks). Planetary bombing from space. Fighter ejection system, fighter afterburners, cloaking, ship alarm systems. Ship CARGO system. Ship DOCKING. Entex/extex .. set your own logon/logout message. Check WHO from logon.
Player opinion:
\"I've been through a few MUDs, some better than others, all better than RITS. One thing you don't see to often is one like this.\"
\"The game has good RPers and all around helpful people.\" -\"Mrgogo\"
\"Star Wars: Galactic Insights is one of the most motivating star wars muds I've played. All of the players I've run into thus far have been very helpful, as well as the staff.\" -Sharra
\"...it is an incredibly well put together mud with a very friendly playerbase.\"
\"It has been well built and alot of additions have been made to the mud since I first played there last year.\"
\"Star Wars Galactic insight is full of impressive features...\" -Suth
\"...by far one of the best star wars muds...\" -Scryn

mud.name: Shades_of_Grey
mud.desc: Come and visit the town of Ketchikan in Alaska! Both rural and city people will feel at home here, in Ketchikan with it's beautiful mountains and nature, famous for it's salmon fishing, native heritage culture centers, nightlife and vistas.

Shades of Grey is a World of Darkness mush set in Ketchikan, Alaska. We are a small mush of a few years old, looking for mostly lower level characters of all spheres, especially vampire, mage, demon and changeling. Other races might be welcome but would need discussion with staff.

We are a different game in that we have a preferences based system and the roleplay is cooperative, instead of the much more widely used competitive system. However, despite using a cooperative system, staff will keep an active hand in keeping the flavor and the dangers of living in the World of Darkness a threatening and challenging place and make sure players do not abuse the rp preferences (people cannot do anything they want without ic consequences, we just try to fit the consequences to what is interesting to roleplay). We are trying to stress the roleplay side of things more than the dice-rolling side, to be a place open to intersphere roleplay and different inter- pretations of the WoD system, and a heavy stress on non- linear storylines.

If you want to know more, feel free to come take a look at our website at http://www.shades-of-grey.info or the game at shades-of-grey.info port 2828 and feel free to ask any staff online any questions you might have!

mud.name: Coast of Seven Incarnations
mud.desc: Restricted PK system with 3 grade of PK (PvP) Extended clan system, allows players to change and rebuild clan mansion.

Unique: Realistic world model Alchemy Astrology Mining & Building allows player to create his own rooms and objects! New race features and balance 7 types automatic personal quests 2 types automatic team quests a lot of unique quests in areas Morphology of Russian language is TOTALLY supported, and player can choose to use russian or english commands. 9 different text encoding supported (transliteration included)
To builders: Powerful script (internal,open) language implemented, so builders can greatly improve areas, objects, mobs.

mud.name: Bloody Roar MUSH
mud.desc: From rumors of men growing fangs and turning into wolves under the light of a full moon, to tales of mystical shamen shapechanging into massive bears, the idea of a human beings transforming into animals has been around for as long as anyone could remember. But just as it is said, all legend is bound somehow in truth... Bloody Roar MUSH is a MUSH-based roleplaying game based in the world of the Bloody Roar video game series. An email application-only game, Bloody Roar MUSH allows Feature Characters as well as Original Characters, provided they fit the theme and structure of the game.

mud.name: Prophecies of the Pattern
mud.desc: The Prophecies of the Pattern world offers a unique twist and interpretation on the “Wheel of Time Series created by Robert Jordan”. In POTP we strive to make the game as close to the series as possible while also letting the hand of fate control the story. Our friendly staff and family orientated atmosphere will appeal to people of all ages to escape the troubles of the real world.

The Bowl of Winds did not make it to the hands of the followers of the Light and for now, the raging summer started by the Dark One continues. With it in the hands of the Shadow, things can only get worse...Chaos has taken hold in Ebou Dar, as an ancient storm assaulted the coast causing major damage to this sea port city. The Seanchan firmly have control of Falme/Toman Head and Tanchico/Tarabon.

Skirmishes occur on the borders of Arad Doman as they head north, while others look to Ebou Dar and Amador. As the nations plunge into chaos, the White Tower remains whole to protect humanity from the Shadow.
\"Embrace your Fate, before the Wheel does\"

mud.name: Harry Potter: Illusion & Delusion
mud.desc: It is July of 1998. Harry and his peers have graduated from Hogwarts. After the showdown between Albus Dumbledor and 'He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named' at the end of their Fifth year, things became rather quiet as the Dark Lord apparently took himself off to places unknown. This was fortunate as there was a great deal of cleanup to be done at the headquarters of the Ministry in London.

Sixth year passed calmly enough with only the usual school interactions. Seventh year began and seemed to be content to follow in the footsteps of the one preceding when rumours of a is concerting nature began to surface.

Tales of an increase in the dark population were heard, originating in Eastern Europe. Vampires and weres of all sorts were spotted and attacks began to be more and more commonplace. But this was far away and there was no reason to believe that it might be heading towards the more populated and civilized regions of the world.

It is currently summer and there are several weeks before the term begins with a new class of first years. In response to the rumours, the Ministry has begun some small efforts to keep the public educated but as nothing local has occurred, there doesn't seem to be much reason to worry and for the time being people are enjoying the sunny, warm days of summer.

mud.name: Kormar
mud.codebase: [Dikumud] Heavily Modified DikuMUD throughout the years.
mud.desc: -* Kormar mud is ran by ex-duris immortals. A small creation that broke the ground of traditional MUDs. Kormar mud boasts an incredible immortal staff with the passion for gaming Now with improved code and playability Kormar is back and live. Kormar Mud spawns from a list of games that stretch from Toril,Duris,Sojourn, and Basternae I. Now with completely re-written code and with a staff who listens, Kormar Mud is ready to rock.
-* Kormar is locked in an eternal battle between three race sides. The Surface Dwellers, The UnderDark Denizens, and the mind controlling Illithids (Coming soon!)

-* Each side has it's own original fully viewable ASCII map in real time. You can run after your enemy on the maps, find new zones, climb mountains to avoid being caught, and even see when other NPC's are wandering the map.
-* The mud has bountiful classes from warriors to rangers to sorcerers to even illusionists. All with original spells/skills.
-* The zones are completely original and new ones are discovered every day. Kormar mud can boast a full 200 plus zones!

-* Kormar Mud is a FULL PvP mud. The underlying story, and playability revolves around PvP. This mud caters to PvPcentric players, but, has stunning zones for the zoner. A unique part of Kormar is the zone changes. IE: You could be in a human town during the day that just doesn't seem right, once night time comes, you begin to notice shrieks in the distance, and this is when the vampires/beasts of the night have come to feast.
-* Kormar Mud is for people who are looking for a challenge in a generally stagnant hack and slash Mudding experience. Don't be afraid to log in and ask the IMMs any questions.
Cheers and Happy Mudding!

mud.name: Bleach Relived
mud.desc: I've been brainstorming on this for weeks and now have a set plan. I need the manpower to do it. If you can help.... Build, Code (Java), Write, whatever, come by and help will be gratefully accepted.

mud.name: Kingdom Wars
mud.desc: Welcome to Kingdom Wars, one of the few great medieval/fantasy MUDs around. We have over 70 areas, and many many features that have been added in to make the MUD more exciting for players. To list some of the things: A Ship System, a better designed automated quest system, player run clans, In-Game quests, and much more. There is something here for every medieval/fantasy fanatic. Many new skills for all of the classes, as well as every race having an automatic racial ability. Leveling has been made more difficult, meaning you wont reach level 130 in 1 day. Some of the things Im planning on putting in are customizable weapons, and new skills/spells. So if you want to experience a new type of medieval/fantasy experience, drop on by and check us out.

mud.name: The Adult Playground
mud.desc: *** Im sorry, this site is closed ***

mud.name: Rocca d'Argento
mud.desc: RdA e' un MUD in ITALIANO, orientato al Fantasy-Medievale in via di sviluppo. Il lavoro fin qui svolto non ha puntato a produrre radicali innovazioni, ma semplicemente a riprendere e, se possibile, migliorare, quelle meccaniche che giocando su vari mud ci sono sono apparse piu' divertenti e stimolanti.
RdA e' un MUD non di facile impatto, e per farsi apprezzare una certa perseveranza puo' essere neccessaria. Questo vale, in particolare, per chi non ha esperienze muddiche pregresse.
...L'avventura ha inizo presso la Rocca d'Argento, un'antica roccaforte a dirupo sul mare sorta nel bel mezzo delle terre di Waverlay (continua su rdamud.afraid.org 4000)...

mud.name: StarCraft MUD 2
mud.desc: Come play as Terran, Protoss, Zerg, or the independent Infested Terrans. Explore a galaxy in ships you can fly and engage in space combat with other players. Use a wide range of weapons from visceral blades and claws to high powered plasma launchers, long range sniper rifles, or even a variety of grenades.
You've played the game, NOW LIVE IT!

mud.name: Lunar Mud
mud.desc: Lunar Mud is just starting currently hiring coders and builders mud is not operational untill 01/25/05

mud.name: Black Ice
mud.desc: A lightning fast server located at the world's largest open terascale computing center in Pittsburgh, PA. World's first operating NiM5 server on a fiber optic T3.
Building allowed, multiplaying allowed, bots allowed, clients encouraged, custom combat and magic system, interactive world including various historic areas.
Area

mud.name: Drag(*)nball Z: Reality
mud.desc: DBZ Reality is a Dragon Ball Z MUD, run on a custom codebase (rather than a generic codebase). It is an open PVP game, though the primary focus is PVE. Roleplaying is allowed, though not enforced. The MUD has quite an impressive set of features: multiple different types of characters such as saiyans, androids, biological android, nameks and more, all the various transformations from the series. The combat style is unique to any MUD. Instead of finding a mob and doing

mud.name: Abandoned Reality
mud.desc: Dressed in the most fashionable silks or tattered dirty clothing, traveling across Ellandor is always a rewarding experience. A world filled with many extravagant quests for money, treasures and fame. Protecting the innocents of the main city Devenon. A life of twisted words and loot would be great if one were accepted into the Crimson Fang Pirate Gang. Joining the Imperial Army to rid the world of magic users and Sylari races. Training in the deep twisted mines of volcanoes, heavily wooded forests, and rocky mountain trails.

Abandoned Reality is a great mud for first timers, with easy directions and commands. The world map is great for the ones that love to explore the land, also easy to navigate through. Plenty of player and organization owned boats to travel across the bodies of water. Easy character creation with a well made newbie area for those inexperienced players.

Abandoned Reality was the first mud that I had ever tried and probably the only one I will ever play and work on. I found it easy to pick up the commands, spells, directions. There aren't any northwest/northeast/southeast/southwest directions, which helped out a lot. The world map and boats have to be my favorite part about Abandoned Reality myself. Many of the experienced players are friendly and offer plenty of help for those that need any questions answered.

mud.name: Imperial Reign
mud.desc: Imperial Reign is a new project MUD based on CircleMUD, with lots of modifications.
NEW: We will soon be offering monthly building contests with cash prizes. If you like to build on muds, and have a strong will to work, here is your chance to make a little loot on the side!
We are seeking talented builders that can handle building on a complex and detail-oriented system.

Our goal is to create a more relaxed, adventure style fantasy theme environment that players can lose themselves in. Player's senses are enhanced on IR, enabling sight, sound, touch, hearing and even smell to enhance the game feel and environment.
Players are not coerced into killing to make thier way, but rather they can take up a profession and follow it until thier character's untimely and permanent death.
Players are welcome to test our system and provide feedback to the staff.
We are currently seeking staff to fill the following positions: Builders, Scripters, Data Creators, Quest Coders

Builders will create the general game environment. Scripters will breathe life into the game's elements. Data Creators provide general information and balance to the game. Quest Coders will provide scripted quests and transportation.

mud.name: Draconis Forensis
mud.desc: The dragons have returned to the world.
Choose from 15 races and 13 classes to breathe life into your character.
Will you help save the world from fiery destruction, or slay those who would oppose the dragons?
We are currently hiring builders, coders, and people to populate the MUD. It just went up, and we will appreciate help :)
-- Chrimon Crystalwing de'Kai

mud.name: Dragon's Bane
mud.desc: Mud is open for players, also we are looking for Coders and Builders.
The mud is still mostly stock, lots work to be done.
Need some players, if you know how to build/code thats even better.
The mud is based fantasy, plenty of races and classes to be chosen.
Roleplaying is up to you, if you like to, you can.

mud.name: Shattered Reality
mud.desc: We are very new, mostly stock right now, and we're looking for people to test and staff. If you would like to apply that's great, but don't get on a talk trash about our knowingly stock world.

Right now we're looking for a coder and a builder, no more. We need a highly qualified coder, not some newbie, you actually have to know what you're doing. I am not a coder, I don't intend to implement the countless ideas that I have for my mud by myself unless I have to.
There are basically no rules right now except

mud.name: FireflyMUX
mud.desc: \"After the Earth was used up, we found a new solar system and hundreds of new Earths were terraformed and colonized. The Central Planets formed the Alliance and decided all the planets had to join under their rule.
There was some disagreement on that point.

After the war, many of the Independents who had fought and lost, drifted to the edges of the system far from Alliance control. Out here, people struggle to get by with the most basic technologies. A ship would bring you work. A gun would help you keep it. A captain's goal was simple: Find a crew, find a job. Keep flying.\"

Welcome to FireflyMUX! When \"Firefly\" first aired in 2002, Joss Whedon painted a gritty, realistic sci-fi world based in the 26th century - a rich, colourful and diverse civilization five hundred years in the future where cultures collide and blend seamlessly. With the intriguing genre of \"space western\" tied to its name, it brings up combined images of spaceships and horses, high technology and the old frontier, corrupt government and gunfights. Then, when \"Serenity\" hit the big screen this fall, we were given more insight, more adventure, and more danger. But overall, it's all about people ... their freedom and survival, their very human triumphs and losses. Today, this world provides us with a unique opportunity for roleplay. It provides us with FireflyMUX.

mud.name: X-Men: Evolution (Mutant Oddities Unit)
mud.desc: Go visit the website

mud.name: SnapMUD
mud.desc: This is a work in progress, anything goes, rules-lite (do we even have rules?) sort of affair.
Feel free to mess with anything and or everything, especially feel free to break things...
We don't require areas to be 'themed' or well thought out, or even coherent, the focus is on fun, blowing off a little steam and not taking \"it\" too seriously.
The lack of level limitations on equipment makes for lots and lots of evilhappydeathfun! (...well, then it SHOULD be a word...)
Thieves gain extra experience by stealing things, and enchanters by enchanting things...
There are over one thousand mortal levels, with 29 classes and 29 races to choose from.
-- Enjoy!

mud.name: DragonBall Reincarnated
mud.desc: This is just a continuation of the normal series

mud.name: MUX: The Series
mud.desc: Inspired by a meshing of original cable television series, MUX: The Series centers around the life and times of the citizens of Los Angeles, California. Hailing from all walks of life and headed in every which direction but loose, these people struggle to keep some sense of normalcy in their abnormal world. Chock full of cinematic flair and over-the-top situations, MUX: The Series hopes to bridge the gap between watching your favorite shows and playing in a similar universe that has brought us characters that we've grown to love.
You can play any kind of character you want ... so long as they are

mud.name: Project: Classified
mud.desc: The Earth as you currently know it in Real Life no longer exists. The buildings that humans once occupied have corroded and decayed. There are no stars or moon in the night sky and the sun does not shine in the day. Determining what the actual time is near impossible and the handful of most survivors arent old enough to remember the old world. Finding food is almost always a struggle. Most weapons are makeshift pointy sticks and working weapons are worth their weight in gold, assuming anyone had any gold. The industrialized industries no long exist everything must be made from hand unless someone has a \"secret\" way for acquiring the objects. And then there are the creatures . . .
Odd creatures find their way to this Earth through various means; some may have been exiled to the world while others may have awoken from a dream to find themselves here.
Survivors whisper the name Ro Ann Oak and the fact that she is searching for an answer, one day she will return and save them from this hell on Earth.
Feel free to stop on by and take a look at classified.isunlimited.net port 7776. You can also review our files at http://classified.isunlimited.net.

mud.name: Miriani
mud.desc: With terraforming becoming a popular event, much of the galaxy is occupied in the year 2395. The humans have divided themselves into three alliances, mostly based on strict political ideals. Even after a long-lasting bloody war against the aggresive alien species designated WEH-83D, renamed Praelor, the people are still divided. Space travel through wormholes is as common as air travel was in the 20th century, and it's rare for a person not to own a ship and bounce from planet to planet at their leisure, for there is much to do in Miriani. From shopping for clothes to hauling asteroids for cash to space combat missions for experience, few find themselves with nothing to do. Gaining the experience of small combat is essential for young pilots, because there is always talk of the Praelor returning to claim Miriani space as their own. Vicious creatures that will let nothing stand in their way, the Praelor have little regard for lives that are not their own. Will you be a pilot brave enough to get scratched up, sacrifice a ship and some sanity?

Miriani is now in open-beta. Anyone can join and create a character. Once complete, Miriani will be a MOO with a rich backstory, beautiful and original planets to explore, and many fun ways to earn credits or points. So come check us out! Make some friends, make some enemies and just generally have a good time. We have very active and friendly staff who are willing to answer all of your questions and help you get started.

mud.name: Legacy of Chaos
mud.desc: The mud is open to all, looking for players. Also looking for coders/builders. Mud is still quite stock, but lots of non-stock stuff. Offers lots of races to choose from, and plenty of classes. Roleplaying is up to the player, we accept any roleplaying. Looking for experience coders and builders.

mud.name: WOTL II
mud.desc: Whispers of Times Lost is back, and better than ever!

WOTL is a medieval fantasy mud designed around a custom world unlike any other.Balanced classes and races promote fair play and a challenging environment for our players. With twenty four races, ten classes, and over 400 skills and spells, WOTL allows players to truly customize their characters abilities.

Quest style races are available in the form of werewolves and vampires, and our three-tiered remort system keep players interest in progressing in both renown and power. Special roleplay monitors award experience to those who prefer to roleplay, and our safe and active systems in regards to PK allows those who wish to remain peaceful to do so, while still providing a challenging environment.

The world is constantly being upgraded to present a more life-like & challenging game environment, and we strive to be different any other mud out there. If you looking for something different, and ready for a challenge, visit Whispers of Times Lost. We promise you won't be disappointed.

Features Include: * Over 23,000 Rooms. Including: areas, wilderness, air and underwater. * Roleplay Enforced * Friendly Immortal Staff * Twenty Spoken Languages * 91 Mortal Levels with earnable advanced races * Peaceful and Active options for playerkilling * Approximatly 400 skills and spells * Extensive say, sayto, emote and social commands * Roleplay is awarded with experience * Own your own home or shop * Cooking, Fishing, Mining, Armor/Weaponsmithing skills and more! * Shapechanging lycanthropes, vampires, changlings and dragons * Intricate magic/skill learning system * Realistic Weather * Some Towns have Laws & Will Arrest for In Character Crimes * Mounts of all kinds * Friendly Player Base

mud.name: HodgePodge
mud.desc: This is a new mud and is in the initial development stage. I am looking for coders/builders who would like some creative license to help build the game. There is no set theme for this mud, and the builder is king. Want to write an area based on heavy metal rock bands? This is the place... Like to write a Monty Python area? Here is where you can do it. Your imagination is the limit. Nothing pornographic, of course, and it should be accessible to all ages. Come have some fun! It's a Freeforall!!!

mud.name: Dragon Ball : Warrios of the Cosmos
mud.desc: This DB MUD has now been out for a good time. We have an EXCELLENT coder, whom has made this MUD change drastically in style, and looks. The players here are very friendly, and are always willing to help a new player get on there feet. Clans have been completely re-coded, as will many other aspects. Come take a look, I'm quite sure you will enjoy. Friendly MUD Owners, DragonBall: WOTC Vetex / Machina / Mazoku

I'd like to add, as a friendly warning, that this MUD is of a more mature playerbase. The language used on this particular game DOES NOT suite those of a younger age. Please, if you have a problem with obscene words, or actions over public channels, do not choose this MUD.

mud.name: The Laboratory
mud.desc: You are in a laboratory in the midst of Nevada, where unknown experiments take place. Rumours from the nearest cities tell of vulgar experiments involving sexual depravity, such as civilised people have never dreamed of.

The lab itself is self funding, a free flow of information is provided to its sister research centres, and is founded on land now deemed as international. Here, the laws are made by the senior administration of the laboratory, and summary execution is also permitted. The main premise of the lab is to advance the human understanding of life, and has military backup when required, courtesy of Area 51, to which the labs staff are the only civilian organisation allowed access. As such, humans, and often aliens, are quite common in equal measure, though some 'aliens' are merely genetically modified human life-forms.

One common element of this lab, is that, although the place is guarded, anyone is free to step up to the building and enter, though from eye-witness reports, nothing, and no-one EVER comes out, not even in a box. This is because, in an effort to protect both the general populace, and to prevent information leaks, any escapee is promptly killed on sight, by one of the many automated weapons systems, hidden around the grounds.

mud.name: Talia
mud.desc: Talia is a growing MUD with many new additions on the way. We are hiring a Builder Staff And we are hiring a administration staff.

mud.name: T-Mush
mud.desc: ******************************************* *** THIS IS NOT AN ADULT ORIENTED SITE *** *** Adult situations is not encouraged..*** *** nor is it forbidden... BE WARNED. *** *******************************************
T-Mush (TM) is ran by a close group of friends.

The Mush was originally deigned as a code Haven for newbies and masters. The Grid is deigned into a living environment, complete with a mapping system. As a player, you have the choice of evolving yourself in a small RP session with friends, chatting with admin and other users, or developing and testing your code. Periodically, the mush will host a small discussion/class ranging from coding tips, coding practices, admining, or a whole range of topics. Your options are endless.
To further the option for Role playing, HSpace has been installed for all you Trekies.. and Star war fans. The pace system contains many planets, ships, and bases... and more to come.

For all you newbies, The mush is always looking to help newbies in general.. or coding. The player base is always willing to 'help' you with those mind boggling problem... and if we can't.. we can always provide resources for you to look into.
Give us a try. I realize we are small, but all good things comes in time. Give us a chance.

mud.name: gero's judymud
mud.codebase: [Dikumud] DikuMUD based on fred/judy/henry, heavily modified-major elements of original DikuMUD. - C
mud.desc: This would seem like your typical DikuMUD. It started with classes, and 30 to 50 levels, and in fact, sometimes we put that version up. Essentially we have an archive of over 27 years of versions of this mud-all which are radically different from each other. The particular one we are running, and plan to be running for a long time, has 5000 levels(you become immortal when you reach level 5000)and consists of your typical dikumud areas, along with some interesting higher level areas, and several attempts at humor hidden within these areas, and equipment within, added throughout the years. It truly is fun, and there usually is someone on willing to help newbies. If you've ever played a traditional circlemud or dikumud, you'll be able to figure this out. And remember -- this is the longest running DikuMUD EVER. There's a reason for that: it was always at either judy.indstate.edu 2150, henry.indstate.edu, or fred.indstate.edu, and now it is on blackshell.com 2150, so unfortunately we've lost a lost of players. However you're welcome to come! There is always someone on wanting to give you the secrets of the game, and help you out! Cheers!

mud.name: The Legends Of Zaphrian
mud.codebase: [Rom] Stock now, But Will Be heavly Modifityed, and Improved
mud.desc: We are open to new players, There is up's and down on the code right now, but will be only getting better. Items to be soon Added, Multi Rerolling, More Levels for players. and Deity worship. But the Story is as follows.

The Gods are fightting. Mortals Waring with the thoughts of there gods behind them. War is the main belife of life, and Warship of the gods are the only thing people live for. So Fight for your God/dess kill the Heritics, and bring peace to the land.

mud.name: 2005's Caer Dubrin
mud.desc: 2005's Caer Dubrin is a mud that is still in beta phase. However the code offers very unique features to players. This includes a learning system based on spheres, which are set depending on what race, guild, and god you choose. That is another thing we use, a system based little on the 5 classes (all they do is determine what guilds you can join), but entirely on the combination of race/guild/god you choose. We also make use of DG Scripts, including automatic quests using the scripts. None of these are implemented as yet, because in addition to the code being in a beta state the world is still being built. We also offer an extended remort system with 50 total remorts. The first 30 remorts are considered normal remorts, while the last 20 are considered quest remorts. If you're interested in play testing, OR in becoming a builder, please email me using the link that is in this listing :)

mud.name: 2060 And Beyond
mud.desc: Hey everyone :)
We are hiring a group of creative, dedicated and unique individuals of all types for a futuristic Godwars mud.
We are looking for coders with a good amount of experience with the codebase and who is willing to work and not just copy and paste snippets or just rename classes.
Head builders need to know shops and mprogs as well as the usual building commands. There is a possibility you might need to teach some newbie builders.
Builders of all skill levels are very much needed.
A Webmaster and an Artist are also needed to create a fun and creative webpage. Please submit a portfolio of artwork to drimitz@gmail.com.
Thanks,
Drimitz

mud.name: NexusMUSH
mud.desc: Wouldn't it be odd if we got a Mogwai, a catgirl, a clockwork dragon, a dimension-hopping crime fighter, a Jedi, a small plush gryphon, an American tourist, and a rock golem in the same room, and then let them talk over a few drinks? Many roleplay worlds gather together people of similar circumstances, and let them interact in this way. Such play is no doubt very enjoyable, but here at Nexus, we like doing the unusual. In a world where you might be completely unique, or at best merely one of a scant few, how would you react? Could you forge yourself a living?

NexusMUSH is a world built around an unstable portal. Beings being droppped here quite unexpectedly from all across the universe have done their best to make a world for themselves. In a world where you can run into dragons, dinosaurs, robots and more, your imagination (and just a little common sense) is the limit.

Utilities, mostly coded in-house, are present to assist and facilitate roleplay, which is the focus and purpose of NexusMUSH. Character creation is open, so none of that 'waiting several weeks for a reply' of some other MUSHes! We're not elitist, and our wizards are very newbie-friendly; all we seek is people who are willing and able to engage in wholesome, developing roleplay within our multilayered setting. Our world grows as our playerbase does, too.

Nexus, by its very definition, has something that everyone can enjoy, and in a world crossed with drastically varied mixtures of technology and magic, our aim is for a place that is truly beyond imagination. If you're interested, connect as a guest and read the story of Nexus, or talk to other players and hear about their characters and their views. We hope to see you there!

mud.name: Necronium
mud.codebase: [Circlemud] CircleMUD 3.1; CWG Suntzu; OasisOLC 2.0.6; ASCII PFiles; and
mud.desc: No Information Yet.

mud.name: Draconia MUD
mud.desc: Draconia is a land ruled by fearfull Dragons... this evil creatures are commanded by the Draconians, and the evil god of Draconos. You can choose to be part in this world joining forces with the draconians, or fighting them with the Great Alliance, commanded by the good god Zhekk. You can choose to be a Warrior, a Mage, a Druid, a Vampire, a Ranger, or a Paladin. Also, you can select many races: Elf, Dwarf, Halfling, Human, Lizardman, etc.

mud.name: Rydinia
mud.desc: Still being processed. Based off AOL Roleplay.

mud.name: Primal Fear
mud.desc: So, you want to know about Primal Fear? Well, lets start here... What is Primal Fear? Primal Fear is the prodigal child of numerous snippets of Godwars, Mindcloud, and Dystopia code. It's a PK MUD, and I'll go ahead and say it right now: It's NOT for pansies. If you're gonna log on and ask \"What's PK?\", just do me a favor and ingest some Drano now. This is kill or be killed, and the sooner that is realized, the sooner you'll be climbing to the top. Yes, you'll probably die a few times getting started, but contrary to popular belief, the players here will be more than happy to help you... (But only so they can kill you later).

Now that we've got that out of the way, I can answer your next question. \"Why should I play Primal Fear?\" PF has been around for a long time. Changes and updates are a fluent part of the PF experience. In all honesty, there are far too many changes for me to list here. As of this moment, there are 811 logged changes; Some major, some minor.

Here's the bottom line. If you're competitive, enjoy killing people, enjoy frequent changes, and appreciate staff members that listen to suggestions, you need to play this MUD... Plain and simple... If you whine or you're an effeminate hippie, you can play anyway, but you probably won't get very far. Why are you still reading this? Log on already.

mud.name: Lands of Lore
mud.desc: Lands of Lore is set up in a medieval atmosphere. We offer 14 classes, and 16 races for players to choose from upon creation. Two new classes are in the works. There are currently 800 levels a player can achieve, and a quest at level 800 to become of LEGEND status. Playerkilling(PK) was recently added and is optional for players (if turned on it can be turned off, it's not permanent). Also, rather than PKing, Lands of Lore has battle arenas where different level battles can be opened and players in the range can fight. Players can also join clans once achieving the correct level. Clan enhancements (such as shops, portals, mounts, rooms, healers, bank, furniture, etc.) can be bought for the clan hall. Quests for players occur at certain level increments(149, 199, 249, 299, 349) to gain differnt titles, as well as other quests for equipment and other items. Immortals are on often and will help when asked, as well as offer random spellups and sometimes a game of trivia. Lands of Lore offers a bit for everyone and is easy to learn and fun to play. The only thing we ask is for players to follow rules, and enjoy the game. Visit the website for updates on the game and log in and check us out!
-The Lands of Lore Staff

mud.name: X-Men Evolution II MOO
mud.desc: X-Men Evolution II MOO is set just after the end of the X-Men Evolution cartoon series. When the credits roll on the end of the last episode, that's where we start! That gives plenty of history to all the characters and to the world in which the characters live for everyone to role play in. FC's and OC's alike are welcome on the game and an easy application encourages new ideas.
So far, there has been a Sentinel attack, exposing mutants to the world. While there is some further acceptance than initially, humans still fear and loathe mutants on a whole.

Raven Darkholme, aka Mystique, is no longer principle of Bayville High. After losing the fight with Storm, and not being chosen to join Magneto on Asteroid M to go through his device which was supposed to bring mutants to their full potential, she snuck up herself, and got caught in the machine. However, she maintained her presence at the school, in the form of Risty. And though everyone thinks she was turned into stone to release Apocalypse, then broken into many pieces, she re-appears, her powers being amplified by Apocalypse, once he's released.

Xavier's Institute for Gifted Youngsters, along with the Brotherhood of (Evil) Mutants have been exposed as havens for mutantkind, and the X-Men not only helped to keep Magneto from realizing his plan of world domination, but they defeated Juggernaut, Xavier's half-brother, when he came in search of Xavier.
Everything that happened in the series, from start to finish, is the past as the game starts just at the rolling of the final credits on Ascension pt 2. The show is the past, time for the future.

mud.name: Draconic
mud.desc: The MUD is currently closed to players while it is updated to run with MySQL.

Draconic is now in a coding/building state. Please be aware of this when connecting. The MUD is open for beta testing, however, it is the beginning stages so do not expect a nearly finished MUD. That being said, all are welcome to connect, check it out, and play test if you choose to stay.
Justin Implementor of Draconic

mud.name: Rek-Mud
mud.desc: This is a brand new Rek Mud that is up and running and looking for players that want to have fun.. The Mud has 24 Classes to choose from at the moment each with their own ups and downs. The mud is mostly based on strategy and skillful PK Fights. There are also 2 warring kingdoms and 2 neutral kingdoms to choose from as well as warring religions. If you want to have some Fun come join us..

mud.name: Tempora Sanguinis 2
mud.desc: Tempora Sanguinis 2 is an italian dalemud, it has many intresting features: formations, auction system, player guilds, player killing arena, new classes (12), new races and a lot of new scripts. It's in italian, so you can play it only if you know this language.

mud.name: Stargate: Atlantis MUSH
mud.desc: Nights veil had sunken yet again on the young world and the stars faded away in the onyx sky as dark storm clouds arose on the oceans horizon. The water was yet calm, but a cold breeze brought a blush on her cheeks. Gravely, she received his thoughts, but as he left she knew it was inevitable. And so the city rose. High above the world and high above the clouds, vanishing into universe's ether.

Atlantis. A name that brings up many question and quickens imagination. Much has there been written and much has been said.
