Uncountable songs sung about the city that was buried by the ocean; but, several million years later, we know the truth. It was the city of the ancients that rose instead of drowned.

Yet, this secret was concealed for so long. It had to take the courage of four humans to discover the truth. It nearly took their lives. But they survived and protected whole humankind against a powerful enemy. No doubt, the SG-1 team will never be forgotten.

Opening Earths horizon by traveling through a gate that opens ways between stars, they have fought many enemies, but now that they have discovered Atlantis an even greater enemy awaits and threatens mankind. The Wraith.

Stargate: Atlantis MUSH opened its doors to players on July 1st, to share in the countdown of the last 15 days until Season 2 of this highly acclaimed Science Fiction TV series began airing on July 15th. Feature Characters and Original Characters alike are welcomed to join us as we continue the story alongside the show. Get connected and make your bid for your favourite Feature Character from the show, or custom tailor your own original character in our Tri-Stat dX based Chargen system and prepare to take on the dangers of the Pegasus galaxy.
NOTE: Stargate: Atlantis MUSH is not a MUD - there are no coded monsters to run around and kill, and the focus of play is upon roleplay, not hack and slash.

mud.name: A Reflection of the Wheel
mud.desc: A Reflection of the Wheel is a game set in the Pre-Book Wheel of Time world. Originally open for five years, Reflections has gone through a major overhaul, trying to become the best of the best in Wheel of Time roleplaying.

Key cities in the setting have been created, such as Tar Valon, Caemlyn, Aringill, Bandar Eban and Fal Dara - as well as the Two Rivers, starting place of the books. A system of roads, carts, ferries and boats connects the entire world. Though the road system hasn't been completely described, it is -complete- letting you explore every corner of the world.

Reflections of the Wheel offers unique crafting opportunities for any level of player - from smithing to cooking, mixing various ingredients with tools to create new items from scratch, and even have a chance for \"High Quality\" items that are above the norm. With a completely coded Auction House, items can be bought, sold, and traded even when the potential buyers and sellers aren't online.

Roleplay is, as always, the mainstay at Reflections of the Wheel. Though the codebase is unique, robust, and incredible for the mobbing experience, certain advantages - and ability points to gain them - can only be gained through active participation in roleplay.
Currently looking for active staff. The code, world and playerbase is constantly improving.

mud.name: Full Metal Alchemist MUSH: Equivalent Exchange
mud.desc: FMA:EE is now open for Beta-Testing! Our official opening will be on Halloween 2006. The game hosts a wide variety of rooms that give our player-base the option of exploring a vast environment without being over crowded.

Our theme starts mid-season of the anime Full Metal Alchemist Series. (Around Episode 22-24). This means that Greed has escaped with the Chimeras from Lab 5, Ed and Al have learned the dark secret behind the creation of the Philospher's Stone, and other important events. We felt starting mid-season would allow our feature characters room to play and grow without having some of them already dead/dying like Hughes or Greed. We’ve left this theme semi-vague in hopes of allowing time for OC characters to develop themselves and establish their own IC adventures alongside the main Feature Characters. (As well as allow people to apply and fill roles of Feature Characters like Sloth, Ed, Winry, and others.)

Feel free to stop by the game and ask us questions. Our game is based on a RP system and not Combat. Original characters (as well as FCs) may hunt for the Philosopher's Stone, pick up a 'craft', work in the Military, be an Alchemist or even play a Chimera. In addition, we've a set of OC-created (7)Homunculi that are slowly looking to be filled!

Some features we’ve established on our game: -A wide variety of lands, occupations, ranks. -Have a wide variety of IC Positions/Ranks! -Play your own original State Alchemist, Chimera, or Miliary person among many others! -Earn special features/rewards through RP and our cookie program. -Play Homunculi or Chimeras like Martel, and Wrath. -Establish your own OC Groups within a given position (like Military) or form a gang that's in the city.
We hope to see you there!
-Charity of FMA:EE

mud.name: Hell's Dimension
mud.desc: This MUD at the moment is not playable. I am in the works of turning ROM into a monster. When it is done, I can promise a very well-balanced, and enjoyable MUD. I have plans for a remort system to allow the character to remort into a new class, rolling over his old skills from his last class. Then a very detailed character creation system, to make your char exactly how you want, character traits, and hometowns are available. This MUD will be half-and-half of PK and RP. I was brought up on a MUD of that mannor, so I find that mix is perfect. Then there will be 12 classes, and 7 races. To top it all, besides the system, I have a very well thought-up, and interesting story for the MUD, which will be released soon. I currently have positions for 1 IMP, and unlimited positions for builders. If you wish to apply, send an e-mail with answers to the questions bellow, and I will get to you as soon as possible.

Name: Age: E-Mail: How Long Have You Been Playing MUDs: How long have you been an IMP, Builder, or Imm: List of MUDs you have played on: Experience in the field you are applying for (200 char minimum): Describe why you are suited for the position(300 char minimum):
E-mail that to monk_of_despair@msn.com

mud.name: Portalis
mud.desc: Standard Smaug MUD up and running, reliably hosted at GuildPortal.com.

mud.name: Tainted Wars
mud.desc: Heavily modified from EOD/MCLOUD2 derived from Godwars. Multiple classes exist giving players a wide variety from all 3 types of muds, many of which are unique to Kaotic Warfare. We encourage players to input ideas on how to improve the mud, all ideas posted will responded too. Players are rewarded for bringing new players to the mud. Imm staff is friendly and fair, however we are always looking for new help whether coding, building, enforcing, or public relations. With over 15,000 rooms, 28 classes and more to come, players always have something to do, whether maxing, new equipment, questing, or exploring.

mud.name: Orfal's WRT54G MUD
mud.desc: I invite you to this 'proof of concept' MUD : Orfal's WRT54G MUD.
Address : orfal.game-host.org:4000 MUD-type: ROM (2.4) Purpose : proof of concept

The reason for this MUD's existance is two-fold: test the possibility to run a full-blown MUD on cheap ( < 100$) hardware with minimal powerconsumption and nominal speed. Enhance the MUD and eventually release detailed instructions for any person to do this on his own (Linux-based) router.

Hardware on which the MUD is running : Linksys WRT-54G router 32Mb RAM You read it right: this MUD runs on a Linksys router running Linux 2.4 (Sveasoft kernel), 32 Mb of RAM and a 200 Mhz MIPS-processor - no harddrive.
The whole ROM MUD is therefore backed up regularly to remote storage. In case the router is rebooted, the MUD is restored within 15 minutes (backed up ever 30 minutes).
The MUD itself is very basic, and I hope you will give it a try so I can see the real-world implications of running an embedded Linux MUD :)

mud.name: Eternal Empire
mud.desc: Eternal Empire is a 4th edition DnD rules based MUSH. Our emphasis is on player driven stories, proactive player actions which impact the theme and direction of the game, and encouraging player creativity. Barriers to entry are low and players new to text games or to MUSHes are welcome.

An Empire has risen from the ashes of the collapsed Nerath era and is spreading her influence across the untamed lands. Her newest jewel is the city of Xylara, a recently completed colonial town far from the heart of the Empire which offers countless possibilities to homesteaders, settlers, and explorers of her lands. What is to become of these lands, who rules them, and what are their goals is up to those whom come to fill her shops and streets.
Eternal Empire is a strict RP enforced MUSH with no mobs or other coded combat systems. Fights are up to the imagination of players and judges.

mud.name: All Good Things...
mud.desc: The Kalandra Sector is one of the most densely populated regions in the Alpha Quadrant, with the native worlds of the Farians, the Galdorans, the Klaestron, the Kressari, the Trill, and a Federation colony on Caldik Prime. United for three centuries by a loose trading alliance, the sector had known peace for as long as the worlds in that sector had the capability to travel in space.

This all began to change in the early 2300s. A neighboring race known as the Tzenkethi started raiding the Trill System. This continued for several months until the Trill were admitted into the United Federation of Planets. In late 2310, the Tzenkethi started with even more raids. With that, the Kalandra Interplanetary Coalition (referred to commonly as \"The Coalition\") was formed in March of 2316.

By November 2325, the Coalition feared an invasion was imminent, and they sent out a call to the United Federation of Planets to provide assistance. The fact that the Federation colony on Caldik Prime and the Federation member world of Trill were in the direct line of fire from Tzenkethi assaults forced their involvement.

Along with the Coalition, it was determined that a central base of operations for starships would be required as the facilities at the Caldik Prime installation were not able to support increased starship traffic. In May of 2327, construction was completed and the station was christened \"Delos Station.\"

mud.name: KoTOR MuD
mud.desc: KoTORMud's a Knights of the old republic timeline SWR

mud.name: Crisis Choas
mud.desc: No be upadate meaning till the mud is finish

mud.name: EQmud
mud.desc: Still getting it up a running, but will be very nice when it is the way I want it. For now there are no new races/classes right now. I am trying to learn everything myself, so it's kind of slow, but any help would be nice.

mud.name: Naruto Mush: Rivalry
mud.desc: Before the Invasion of the Sand and Sound on Hidden Leaf. Before the Attack of the Nine Tail Fox Demon. The great city walls of Hidden Leaf were used to contain the bubbling unrest of its populace. Trying to act as common bound to their goals. To try and separate the old ways from the new. These walls were founded by the Great First Hokage. The city within was his legacy. Its creation an attempt to unite the clans and stop their blood shed to make the Land of Fire unbreakable. The mortar on the city street still not dry is our story. Where the first graduates from the Ninja Academy don their forehead protectors with the name of the Village. The clans make pity ruses to claim dominance of village. The young Genin are set free to shape this village. To make history and prove that concept of unity is right. This is our story. The founding of the Hidden Leaf.
How will your life effect the shaping of history?
The following villages are open to play and each have their own clans: - Sunagakure (Sand) - Iwagakure (Stone) - Kirigakure (Mist) - Kumogakure (Cloud) - Konohagakure (Leaf)

mud.name: Zeldafront RPG Stone
mud.desc: Zeldafront RPG Stone: Live the Legend! An online RPG made by-fans-for-fans and it's coming on the 1st of May!
You can find the website (where you will be playing as well) at http://www.zeldafront.com/!
If you wish to contact us, send an e-mail to atake@zeldafront.com.
Development took a long time, and a total of 7 staff members have worked on it for a whole year. We have adjusted some things in the original story, to make it suitable for a perfect MMORPG!

We used the atmosphere and world of Zelda, and adjusted it so everyone can play in it. This time, there won’t be just one or two storylines, there will be hundreds! And you can influence them all as a player!It all takes place in Hyrule, the Hyrule that starred in Ocarina of Time.

This MMORPG isn’t just a normal game, it’s text-based. Meaning you get all the freedom you can get, and you can have your own character, in it’s own quest for it’s own goal. You write what you (=your character) does.
Everything is interactive, since you decide what you do and what happens. Of course there are some rules,to make sure things won’t get out of hand.

Players will have many things to do, such as just becoming a great warrior, or living in Kakariko Village as a carpenter. Or you could try to find a girlfriend and spend romantic evenings watching the stars above Lake Hylia, or... well, just think of somethingyourself!

The regular and special Events are great fun for the players, and they can –sometimes- even earn a special item or other rewards. In this game you don’t just play to become strong, and there is no final ending. It’s about living your character’s life, and reaching your goal.
We hope to attract many Zelda fans from all around the globe, and offer them the ultimate Zelda experience.

Zeldafront RPG Stone: Live the Legend! * Fast server, quick connection * Shops with all of the items you had in Ocarina of Time. * Simple-to-use – easy-to-understand RP System. * Meet other players and start your epic adventures together! * Almost total freedom in what you do with your character. * Assistance is available 24/7! * Free! Release date: 01-05-2005 24:00 (GMT+1)

mud.name: Star Wars: Jedi Underground
mud.desc: Time Period: Approx 3 to 5 years before Star wars Episode 4

We are a developing mud still working to make the areas fit the time period and be original. For this task we are looking to hire dedicated builders, Experience prefered(though not required). Also, as I am always working on new code, players are always welcome to come in and chck things out and help us get any bugs worked out. active playtesters will be rewarded upon official opening. As we are currently undergoing many changes, you can expect things to look or feel different from time to time. Some things may work differently than you are used to but i believe all of the changes to be positive, and I'm always open to suggestions.
feel free to stop in and play around.

mud.name: Inheritance
mud.desc: Inheritance is a MUCK based on the Inheritance Cycle. It's set in medieval Alagaesia. Inheritance is a role play game with a few MUD features. It's run with GlowMuck server.

mud.name: Star Wars: Hand of Thrawn MUSH
mud.desc: Theme: It is 9 ABY, Grand Admiral Thrawn has consolidated the Imperial Fleet and begun his assault to reclaim territory lost and rebuild the Empire. The fledgling New Republic stuggles to fight back as political issues mount. However, while on the outside, this is a simple conflict between the Empire and New Republic, rumors abound that Thrawn is also fortifying against unnamed threats from the Unknown Regions.

mud.name: Helliconia
mud.desc: Awaken in a world bursting with combat and adventures. You can choose your character from a large variety of classes and races, all with unique spells and skills, fun to raise and very powerful in the end. After dropping the newbie protection, all sorts of multi-combatant battles against other players and/or monsters await you. Clans with opposing philosophies, societies, guilds, towns, and religions of the many gods of Helliconia provide a broad base to choose your favorite role. Or you search adventures exploring all those areas in groups or alone, solving quests or deeds, collecting artefacts from the vast number of mysterious items that can be found in Helliconia. Helliconia is an advanced long-running roleplay, level-restricted playerkilling spectacle.

Unique game features: - 15 races: from ordinary fantasy humans/elves/dwarves up to draconians/centaurs/vampires - more than 10 unique classes, each has 2-3 styles to choose with unique skills/spells. - 6 clans that fight for their ideals (raid/reraid/defend system) - more than 10000 rooms, including more than 30 areas written by immortals of Helliconia specially for this MUD.
About 10 immortals currently supervise, develop and extend the MUD with a growing interest in special friendly treatment of newbies and encouragement of roleplay.
Connect now: telnet://217.10.9.41:9000

mud.name: SilverMUD
mud.desc: Enter the realm of SilverMUD. The Lords of Silver welcome you into their alternate dimension. Step into a world of fun, excitement, dangers and friendship.
The Lords and Ladies of SilverMUD have created for you a new and exciting world, offering Clans, Quests and other fun things.
However, the world is still being shaped into the best world ever.
Feel free to drop by.
The Lords of SilverMUD

mud.name: The Live-Action Roleplaying Module
mud.desc: After a year of work, this MUD-MUCK hybrid is alive!

The Live-Action Roleplaying Module (TLARM) is a relaxed place. After you create a main account with us, you can either hang out with the gang OOCly, or you can play in other people's tabletop and LARP games by converting your characters to our system. You can also request space to create your own games through our module. We encourage World of Darkness games, but Dungeons & Dragons, Cyberpunk, and even original universes are welcome. We allow all themes, from General to Adult-Oriented (locks available at your request). TLARM's features include:

-Out-of-character area for relaxation and chatting -Dice-roll command (supports modifiers) -Simple MUCK-like commands such as say, pose, find, spoof, and page -Capability to create your own rooms and areas -Everything is live, entered commands are instantaneous -Friendly and personable atmosphere!

mud.name: Twisted innocence
mud.desc: need builders and player testers

mud.name: World of the Slayer
mud.desc: \"In every generation... there is a Chosen One....\"

Ah, the perfect Cali night, The clear skies, spotted with twinkling stars, beaming down over the cool waves as the beat their way to the beach, the vamp sucking on the neck of the cheerleader... ok, maybe it's not the perfect night, but it's the usual kind for Sunnydale. Well, what do you expect when your home town is situated on the Mouth of Hell? Schools about to let back in, and for Sunnydale High, it's time for it's students to head back to class and try to survive another year... literally!

Welcome to World of the Slayer, a BuffyVerse Tinymux2.3 adventure. We are opening in one week and are looking to fill alot of our Feature Character Spots. We have a grid that's over a 1000 rooms, which you can see the map we did for it at http://wots.mushpark.com/sunnydale.jpg. We're going to be the BTVS Remix... starting at Buffy's move to Sunnydale, nothing is canon after that, except for what the Characters, you, write it as. We also have some great coding on the grid to take care of slow times, like that brand new Gothic Game, \"GOTH VAMPS MUST DIE!\", a fully functions bowling alley, mini-putt putt golf course, LAZER Tag game, Economy system, huge cemetaries for the vamps, an extensive sewer system for them to hide out in, and lots more. And coming soon, AngelVerse, as well as CharmedVerse, in the coming weeks.... Some things are already different, like we have a Dawn and Tara already for the first season... so come over and check us out. :) The World of the Slayer...

mud.name: HighVelocity Paintball (HVPB)
mud.desc: Connect Via HVPB Client (http://www.hvpb.com/downloads.php)

HighVelocity Paintball is an online multiplayer 2d graphical MUD, composed in VB. Free to play, extremely addicting, and loads of fun! Come on in and splat your friends in this action-packed game. Choose from a large variety of equipment and enter different game types such as capture the flag, hold the fort, survival, last team standing, hunt, invaders, and much, much more! Get character classes such as scout, heavy weapons, infiltrator, etc. and utilize their special abilities to your benefit in games. There is unlimited room for improvement. Download now! Administration is always standing by to help.

mud.name: Santa Carla by Night
mud.desc: Santa Carla by Night is a nWoD game set in the fictional city of Santa Carla California. We're a vampire-centric game but we do allow for limited numbers of Ferals, Psychics and Thaumaturges. The city is rebuilding after a decade long power vacuum and is populated mainly by young kindred looking to make a name for themselves and establish their own powerbases.

mud.name: Nystagmos
mud.desc: Nystagmos is the great upcoming predecessor of Dragon's Era. Both are custom MUDs written from scratch in VB6.

Nystagmos offers a player-written library for the creation of gamelore, easy GUIs for builders, and amazingly enough, a trigger system which builders can use to make their areas richly unique and interactive.

The administrator of Nystagmos will be sharing 30% of all incoming donations with the player assistants (builders, moderators, ministers). The goal is for the players to make themselves a truly remarkable MUD.

Features: * Item Forging system which will use procedural generation to secure 'secret recipes' discovered by players. * Optional PvP resource wars oriented between race and class. * Triggers. Had fun making maps in Starcraft? You gotta check this out. * Completely free! You will never be charged to play.
Nystagmos is a level-less system. Players are given a full amount of stat points and training points from the very start, and can earn new stat points and training points by completing quests.
No more grind - no more endless hunts, no more

mud.name: The Hidden Grotto
mud.codebase: [Circlemud] Heavily Modified, Guilds & Clan system in place
mud.desc: Welcome The Hidden Grotto Reborn! We are back after a 4 year hiatus with a new direction for the future. A world were non-playing RP chatters and gamers co-exist in a well written , well balanced and challenging enviornment. Role Play is not only encouraged but enforced. Clans , Homes and Guild are player ownable. 12 races 6 Light 6 Dark and several classes.

For the gamers we offer challenging areas in all levels great eq, loads of spells and skills, 100 levels with the possibility of 200 with remort. For chatters we offer an amazingly realistic virtual world to fulfill your Role Playing desires, who knows you might even learn to play an incredibly social and fun game. We are adult oriented So players 18 and up. Here you will find an unusual mix of sword and sorcery fantasy with some Gorean theme added in nicely.

The Hidden Grotto is Newbie friendly for gamers as well as non-gamers, helpful Immortals and plentiful help files. Soon we will be implementing newbie guides,MPS code and many new additions and features. Come give us try you won't be disappointed!

mud.name: KitsuMUCK
mud.desc: KitsuMUCK is a kitsune themed MUCK centered around an ongoing storyline. In spite of the dominant kitsune theme and population, all species are welcome.

In this MUCK, you can travel between several worlds, namely Kitsuria, S'Fyra, and a post-apocalyptic Earth. Kitsuria and S'Fyra are both heavily populated by kitsune - Kitsuria being more technologically advanced and set in more modern times than S'Fyra.

KitsuMUCK features a free-form roleplaying system that allows you to define your own attacks and character build. The main website has a front-end that makes character setup and alt creation more convenient.
You can find out most of the background information by checking out the MUCK's wiki.

mud.name: Dark Dreams
mud.desc: Hiring builders for the time being, not open for full playing. Playtesters welcome.

mud.name: Raze the Dead
mud.desc: The dead and recently deceased have been reanimated by cosmic radiation, unleashing them from their graves to devour the flesh of the living. Human society has since imploded, leaving scattered pockets of survivors in the form of settlements across the countryside. The time has come for the final battle between the living and the dead for dominion of the Earth.
Raze the Dead is celebrating its fourth anniversary Oct 2009 by officially dropping beta status! Some of our many features include:

* 100% unique and original game world * Unlimited levelling system * Skills increase in proficiency through use * Hand-to-hand, throwable, and firearm weapons * Detailed firearm system * Lawncare weapons - weedwhackers, chainsaws, LAWNMOWERS * Equipment upgrade system for weapons and armor * Barricading exits * 3 classes - soldier, scientist, survivalist * Slaughter zombies indiscriminately for loot * Salvage the game world for equipment * Salvage the game world for survival resources * Fill your survival pack with survival items * Damage and repair equipment * Auction equipment on the mercantile * 4-player open squad system to encourage grouping * Communicate on global channels or shortwave radios * Global who list shows all players * Walk, run, or sneak past zombies * Set up camp to rest and heal at * Detailed help on the game forums
-- Ben/Team Zombie

mud.name: Dragonball Alive
mud.desc: We are a fairly new mud running DBSC2.5.2 and we are currently looking for new players builders, and coders so stop on in.

mud.name: Crimson II Mud
mud.desc: Crimson II Mud has withstood the tests of time and is still standing. With over 9000 rooms, well over 200 zones, and creative zoners and friendly players Crimson II Mud is an atmosphere to relax and not worry about anything except having fun.

mud.name: Et in Barcino Ego...
mud.desc: EiBE is a WOD-based game in Spanish set in Barcelona in 2010. We support Vampire, Changeling and Mortal/+. Our aim is to create a small familiar place where we can toy with different ingredients of storytelling and concoct a few good recipes for all to enjoy. We open for RP in March 1 2006. So, if you're looking for a game in Spanish and feel the hunger, come check us out. Extended info in our website.

mud.name: Eventide MUSH
mud.desc: Eventide MUSH takes place in the sleepy and rain-laden town of Port Angeles, Washington, not so very far from the sleepy and rain-laden town of Forks. Aside from the seemingly safe and hip downtown environment the city provides, and breathtaking natural beauty of the surrounding area, there's something else to boast: it is home to the largest supernatural population in the US. While many people go about their lives oblivious about the town's darker side, others struggle to cope with knowing that outside of the questionably safe confines on their homes, vampires, werewolves, and shape-shifters blend in nearly seamlessly with society.

Many vampires, however, are not content to blend in. There have been a tad too many murders and disappearances for a small, reverential town as of late - it's spurred some of nature's greatest protectors, the shifters and the werewolves, to action. Will their action be enough, or will it take a true uprising of heroes, partnering together with humanity to save the Olympic Peninsula?

Eventide is loosely based on the Twilight series by Stephenie Meyer. The game explores an alternate to the route taken in the books, introducing a variety of paths for original character concepts and themes, including Children of the Moon (werewolves) and the possibility of other supernaturals. The theme provides unlimited possibilities. Every vampire is not bad - some aren't even murderers! Every wolf doesn't come from the nearby town of La Push, and every human is not a pawn.

Features: * Mostly original characters with pre-made and feature characters available * Settings in Port Angeles, Forks, La Push, and Volterra * Extensive news files - no prior knowledge of the theme necessary * NPC code to try out the game before CharGen * Active playerbase with regularly-run TPs and PrPs * Statless, roleplay-based combat

mud.name: enigma
mud.desc: at the moment were only hiring builders and coders. ... more info later.

mud.name: KushielMUX
mud.desc: KushielMUX, based on the Kushiel's Legacy series of novels by Jacqueline Carey, focuses intently on political intrigue Roleplay based on the powerful, prosperous, and liberated country of Terre d'Ange, an alternate-timeline late Medieval France. The tools of political power are many and varied; personal influence, the authority to deal with people, the rumor mill, loyalty, even the use of one's own body as a weapon to gather intelligence - the Royal Court is always rife with plots within plots. Want to play as a noble or a politician or even potential royalty? Simply make a Feature Character and apply. Want to make something more simple? A peasant, a blacksmith, a Cassiline warrior-monk? Go ahead - none of these require approval or inspection first (Features do, since they begin with a good deal of authority and thematic ability).

What more could you want in a game? Factions, NPCs, a well-described grid, friendly and experienced staff members, a brand new world to play in, change, and integrate yourself with, a rich and detailed setting, political intrigue, backstabbery, fetes and coronations, masques and balls. The potential is infinite. Even if you have never heard of the Kushiel's Legacy series, fret not -- our help and news files are large, easy to understand, and perfectly comprehensive and the Wiki is a perfect place to get started if you're new to MUXes or MUSHes.
Come try KushielMUX out: kushiel.dreamspheres.net, port 7448, or visit our Wiki for more details and a MU*ing guide: http://www.kushielmux.com/wiki

mud.name: ATR: Second Coming
mud.desc: **A TWILIGHT RISING IS BACK! THE SECOND COMING, OPENING JUNE 2008!**

We're back and better than ever, open for BETA testing, we will be fully operational by June 2008! We've changed the setting, in the same world but a different place, all new map, new code, new challenges!
If you're interested in building or beta testing contact the admin email! We know you're looking forward to the second coming!

mud.name: spaceworlds
mud.desc: Futureistic

mud.name: Shades of Truth
mud.desc: What is Shades of Truth? It is one of the most intense and in-depth online roleplaying games that has ever existed on the internet. If you enjoy \"hardcore roleplaying\" then this is one of the best games available for you to play. Taking place in a collectively shared Dreamstate, characters can determine the fate of an entire city. They can lead a House, study the nature of the world around them, battle forces that threaten the Dream, or become one of the most notorious villains in the City of Dream's history. The choice is entirely up to the player! There is no limit to the scope of the story the player wants to create while within the game. Shades of Truth is headed by a group of volunteers and is entirely 100% FREE to download and play. The current version of Shades of Truth is available for use while the project team develops and prepares the approaching release of an updated 3D client! So what are you waiting for? The City of Dreams awaits you!

mud.name: Attack The Four Towers
mud.desc: Hey, The Four Towers mud has been in progress since July 2006. This only shows that we will be sticking around once we have accomplished everything. The mud features basic manual combat, and a limited race and element selection at the moment. The mud is based on dystopia 1.4 and uses all custom areas and equipment, classes, races. With a player created combination system our mud is starting to develop. However, we are still in beta and the majority of our systems are not fully finished. We welcome players to come and try our game and tell us what you think. -Ivlin, Zemus The Four Towers

mud.name: Fleets Of Anarchy
mud.desc: This is totally online. It is free and a lot of fun. We have a lot of players and most of them are willing to help new people. We are still building every day and there are noticiable changes every day.

mud.name: Bloody Nightmares
mud.desc: Bloody Nightmares was designed by mudders for mudders. We have designed everything to be bigger, badder, and better.

We feature a tri-classing system, max level 400. We also feature a new skill system that allows crusaders (level 400 characters) to continue to grow ever stronger, increasing replay value. We also have areas specially designed for the crusaders: ultra-big and ultra-tough.

The code base is heavily modified, updated with some of the latest snippets, including heavy original modifications. We have over 350 areas (30k rooms) and are always adding more original areas. We have clans and orders with equipment and areas also.
NEW: A multi-dimensional ascii world map system. All our areas are connected to this system so that you now reach areas via the world map - complete with terrain, water, flying in the air, etc.
Drop by and play. We are always making many improvements so things are in a state of constant change. Hope you enjoy it here.
Regards, Bloody Nightmares Staff.

mud.name: Dragonball Z - Online
mud.codebase: [Smaug] Heavily modified from the DBSaga 2.5.2 code
mud.desc: We have just recently come back up and we are looking for a slue of builders who are fluent in SMAUG building. Please either email your resumes to rbouch@gmail.com or send an in game mail to Taylor with your qualifications.

mud.name: Bloodlines Mud
mud.desc: Bloodlines Mud follows the history of a family as it goes from ruling an Empire to it demise. Twin brothers are Heir to a dead father but there is only one throne.
Follow the History of this family as it unfolds.
Looking for staff members

mud.name: Gil Galadus: Fall of the Empire
mud.desc: Quests and Roleplay, war between Burning Legion and The New Republic grow strong.

mud.name: Empire City
mud.desc: Last weeks big news story involved Batgirl being kidnapped by Sabertooth only to be rescued by the mutant strikeforce known as Youngblood. Normally this story would be impossible as each of those involved belong to different dimensional realities. What if they weren't? What if these heroes, and the villains they fight, suddenly found themselves sharing not only a dimension or a single world but a single city? Imagine Spawn matching wits against the Joker or the X-Men having to muster their forces against the Cyborg Superman. In the universe of a place called Empire City anything is possible. Heroes are drawn from all over the multiverse and thrust into the city with no fanfare or preperation. One moment Batman is leaping from rooftop to rooftop chasing after Hush the next he's looking out at an unfamiliar skyline with no sign of his enemy in sight.

Empire City could be called a 'blended universe' mux as we allow characters from pretty much any universe to be apped for and played in one unified setting. These characters didn't grow up in Empire City, however, they were drawn from their home realities and deposited here by something scientists have dubbed the infinity wave. Not only can players app characters from Marvel, DC, Image or where ever but they can take characters from any related multiverse as well. Want to play evil Beast from Age of Apocalypse? No problem. Want to play Hyperion from Earth-712? Go for it. Other than that we're very open. You can even create your own unique take on classic characters!

Empire City is designed to welcome any character from comics but it also has its own unique flavor. The universe of Empire City is a bit darker than most. Our goal is to allow for a bit more 'adult' oriented RP. Think along the lines of The Killing Joke, Watchmen and the Maximum Power universes and you get the idea. Even our more 4 color areas have a grey tinge to them. Empire City is a universe where the villains are a bit more brazen, the public a bit more cynical and the heroes perhaps a bit more jaded. Each character is unique, however,and every player has the ability to outline their RP preferences listing what they are and are not comfortable with RP wise.

Finally, while we are an RP based mux we do use the Mutants & Masterminds roleplaying game to flesh out characters. This allows for a rapid application process and helps ensure 'equality' among the various denizens of the Empire universe.

mud.name: Darkened Horizons
mud.desc: Harmony
Balance
Love
...Good and Evil

Kalith, spawned of darkness and that which 'is not' yet always there, Elestra, spawned of the abscess of the darkness in the formation of something that 'is'. The storyline is described in further detail in game, but the underlying theme is Kalith was what is and always has been where there is nothing. Elestra is a rogue spirit once servant to Kalith like all the other spirits, born of desire to be different and be more. So Elestra created the world, and Kalith decided it was a practical game and maintained the balance between his dark and her light until she was strong enough to hold her own with 'Father' Kalith. And so it became that the two geat beings over the world are Mother Elestra and Father Kalith, more power between the two of them than is imaginable, so the minor duties of safekeeping the world was left to minor dieties (which is why we need more immortals). Kalith chose his servants and vassal of power, and Elestra chose her helpers and keepers of good will. The balance is set.

Here is where you, as a new player or staff, come into the picture. We need testers, builder, law immortals, and roleplay immortals... So if you're interested in having a hand, send me an email at dhmud_adm@drop.io with your username and I'll send you the addy and port.
We're sad to say that, as it stands, if you've any current connections with the MUD 'The Gathering...' you're not eligible for a player or staff position.

mud.name: Star Wars: The Fight For Freedom
mud.desc: This texted base game is based about Star Wars and how it would feel if you was in the Star Wars universe. There is a variety of clan's you can join. There is 9 choices of class's to choose from and many planets to visit and explore. There is quest's for you to do and great ship's to fly. Player killing is allowed if you have a good reason. Roleplaying is strongly enforced.

mud.name: EdenMUSH
mud.desc: EdenMUSH is a social roleplaying mush set in a cyberpunk near-future similar to the world envisioned in William Gibson's Sprawl trilogy. The majority of EdenMUSH is not centered around life on Earth however, but instead on the lives of those living and vacationing in the space habitat known as New Eden.

New Eden is a Bernal sphere type space station, 223m in radius with an internal area of 630,210 square meters. The habitat supports as many as 9,000 - 10,000 residents and generates near-earth gravity along it's 'equator' by rotating along its central axis at 2rpm. Residents and visitors are afforded all the luxuries of earth-bound life, with amenities mirroring those of any similarly sized resort.

With EdenMUSH it is hoped that the players are offered an interesting and exciting roleplaying environment, while still leaving room for expansion and growth based upon the ideas of the player's themselves.
Please visit our mush wiki at: http://edenmush.wiki-site.com/

mud.name: Btech: Futurewarfare
mud.desc: This is a new Btech Mux we just started. I need Soft Coders mostly to help me built up the Mux. I am hoping to port it to tiny as well anyteam i will attemp to compensate with money or gifts to show appreciation for help.

mud.name: Endless Void
mud.desc: We have converted from a star wars setting to a future earth setting with elements from star wars, star trek, stargate, and much much more. So come on by, and if you see me, Michael afk, please note that if I will probably be there momentarily so please stick around.
Ok, its 07/04/09 and we are up and running and doing alot of work.
If you have any questions feel free to post on the forum or E-mail the admin at: phoenixdracul@aol.com
Forums are located at: http://s11.invisionfree.com/Endless_Void/index.php?

mud.name: Galactic Wars 2163
mud.desc: Galactic Wars 2163. Combines adventure & exploration with strategy and cooperative play. You compete against other Players to be the most powerful trader. Independent traders can compete effectively against corporations. Traders can be

mud.name: Dragon Ball Saga: Warriors of the Cosmos
mud.desc: This DB MUD has now been out for a good time. We have an EXCELLENT coder, whom has made this MUD change drastically in style, and looks. The players here are very friendly, and are always willing to help a new player get on there feet. Clans have been completely re-coded, as will many other aspects. Come take a look, I'm quite sure you will enjoy. Friendly MUD Owners, DragonBall: WOTC Hayden / Machina / Mazoku
We are now Hosted by Wolfpaw!

I'd like to add, as a friendly warning, that this MUD is of a more mature playerbase. The language used on this particular game DOES NOT suite those of a younger age. Please, if you have a problem with obscene words, or actions over public channels, do not choose this MUD.
Currently we are undergoing many projects, one of them is re-coding the entire combat system. Please bare with any changes. They are for the better!

mud.name: Battle of the Immortals
mud.desc: The Battle of the Immortals has returned!
Yes, my friends. BotI is back, in full effect, as of June 19, 2005. We are currently still in development, but are open to player testing, and shouldn't be having any pwipes anytime soon.
Stock GW Deluxe classes are in:
Mages Vampires Werewolves Demons Baali etc...
If you were a player of the old BOTI and would like to take another \"stab\" at it, come on in! We'd love to see you there.
Malach, the God of War (formerly Lupus) Battle of the Immortals

mud.name: DreamScape
mud.desc: DreamScape is a original place. One that allows you to truly be free of the norm. It is of constant evolution, and neer endless possibilities. http://drscape.proboards44.com/ (And it just got started Tuesday, May 17th, 2005)

mud.name: eTrek
mud.codebase: [MUSH] PennMUSH 1.8.2p1 w/ aspace, linux host, up 24/7.
mud.desc: Welcome to eTrek, an Enterprise themed MUSH environment. If you are looking for a MUSH that is canon to your typical Star Trek Universe, then this is not the one to choose. The only canon thing about eTrek is our Enterprise theme. The timeline begins shortly after the final season of Star Trek: Enterprise. Any technology, races, events and/or characters created going forward will be the outcome of events taken place in the MUSH environment by our administration and player-base community.

mud.name: Majestic
mud.desc: \"I pray thee,\" spake Neteru, \"how might I become a disciple of the one that speaks to me in my dreams teacher?\" The most famous text ever recorded being spoke, these words uttered by Neteru as a mortal when she was but a twelve year old child at the altar of the sun in Midgaard.

Here on Majestic, we encourage the players to become part of our Online book! It has been a time since we were up and running, but, we are finally back up and in full swing again. We are currently making new and exciting changes that are added everyday.
Our class selections include: Vampire Werewolf Demon Angel Elemental Gargoyle Drow Highlander Assassin Moogle Battlemage Wytche Hknight Amazon Draconian Timelord Soulreaver Golem

We have new and improved areas, as well as a Tier System upgrade, which in order to find out more about, you gotta come play. We don't want to give too many secrets out. But come join me and my great staff, and see for yourself.
-Neteru

mud.name: GTA-MUD
mud.desc: GTA-MUD is based on the GTA universe, and aims to allow the players to do everything they might have wanted to do in the game but couldn't. In this game, gangsters, pimps and cops wander around a city looking for action. You can walk around a living, breathing city doing whatever you want to do, as long as you're prepared to pay the consequences. Want to rob a bank? No problem as long as you don't mind the police being on your back. Want to help the police by being a bounty hunter? Don't expect your bounty to give himself up easily. Want to just live a normal life? Then keep out the way!

The game is quite small at the moment, but that is partly intentional. I'm trying to encourage as much inter-player communication as possible, and I don't want players to have to wander around thousands of rooms looking for someone else.

I'm also trying to create an environment that has full cause-and-effect. If you do something, like rob a bank, expect the police to be after you. If you drink too much at the bar, expect to fall over. And if you get into a fight, expect the local heavies to weigh in.

mud.name: Safekeep
mud.desc: Safekeep is a skill-based MUD with no levels or classes, featuring a semi-unique world, basic questing, and randomized items which appear in shops and drop randomly off of mobs. Characters may gain new skills, practice them, or train their core attributes from anywhere by using Character Points, which are gained from questing and from killing mobs. Quest items are extremely powerful but also random, creating a natural endgame for experienced characters.

To use magic in Safekeep, players must gain \"school\" skills (evocation, restoration, etc.) to cast spells, and most spells must be learned by using the study skill on random scroll drops found in the game. Players may also gain a set of basic starter spells for a few Character Points.

This MUD is currently in development but is stable, lag-free, and very addictive. We have only a handful of players, but the MUD is designed to be fun enough to play alone, so feel free to stop on by and check it out.
Send all comments and/or suggestions to Theran via an in-game note (type \"help note\" in-game for instructions on how to send a note).

mud.name: Alkarain
mud.desc: Alkarain is a world built for those with imagination, if you can dream it, you can have it. Here at Alkarain we have constant interaction with players with anything from line discussions to one of our many whole mud quests. Alkarain gives you the ability to transform your character into one of our many quest races/classes, or own a kingdom or guild. We have a guild or kingdom for everyone, or you can simply be a loner and take on the world with your strength. Our immortals are always open to feedback on what can be changed, what bugs are found, or just a nice chat. Become a winged drow, avariel, angel, demon, vampire, dragon, or one of our many other highly quested for races. Build a house, a family, an entire life in our fantasy realm. Our immortals work around the clock to please the players, all ideas are welcome. You can even apply to help build our world with us. It’s all up to you, come shape your new life in Alkarain!

mud.name: Twilight Days MUSH (discontinued)
mud.desc: (This MUSH is closed.)

mud.name: Revolutions
mud.desc: This is a Mindcloud 2 clone gimmick yada yada.
This mud is owned by someone who DESPISES every Godwars currently out there in this spinning little internet sphere, but loves the concept of what each one TRIES to be.
I chose Mindcloud because, even though every one I've ever played is extremely unbalanced and unplayable unless you have a horde of friends backing you 24/7, I like the way it plays.

I'm not big on spending a month maxxing out a character to PK, so don't count on spending countless hours here killing mobs. This mud is designed for Player Killing, and that's it. I've upped the normal Mindcloud Statcap from 50k to 500k. I am however leaving status statcap the way it is, at an additional 10k per status you have. The reason for this is, because I beleive that while being

mud.name: SoE
mud.desc: Tired of the same cookie cutter mud? SoE is a new mud where almost all requests made by players on it's parent mud Shadow of Eternity have been implemented and refined.
Here is a list of what you can expect:

Ranged Weapons/Spells Kingdom System for cross clan/kingdom wars Entirely player ran clan systems Arena System for PK without penalty Battle system when you can find NPC's in several challenge modes Player ran Shops Multiple automated quest types Artificial Intelligent NPC's for more challenging gameplay Extensive class based skill/spell system Max level 60 with unlimited rebirth potential Rebirth Skills/Spells Leveling Pets Dream system Death World (for those unfortunate enough to die) No immortal politics to speak of Coaches for transporting to other areas Ability to place bounties upon players Ability to hire NPCs to assinate others Ownered Equipment which can be

mud.name: BlackDawn
mud.desc: The Realms of BlackDawn are full of adventures, magical and strange items and beings, new things are being added all the time.
For those who are not in too the train and adventure and just want some where to chat your quite welcome too even if you just want to idle most of the time.

mud.name: Act of War: ReBirth
mud.desc: ActofWar has been around for a long time. Once several hundred played at a time. Past times brought high excitement levels and serious PK. This game is open to play and if youd like to join please feel free.

mud.name: Forgotten Reign
mud.desc: In a time when the gods rebelled against their creators, the world of Vael was pulled into a cataclysmic series of events which led to the destruction of many of it's inhabitants. In an effort to safe their world, the remaining gods blanketed the world and placed those that remained in a deep sleep to awaken when the world was once again whole.

Forgotten Reign is based around RolePlay and has many custom enhancements done by Veratio to expand the level of RP as well as some backend work on the codebase. Currently in beta, the staff is working on building the entire world and creating a safe environment for RolePlay with PlayerKilling.

mud.name: Lost Dragon Chronicles
mud.codebase: [Custom] Custom Code using some ROM areas
mud.desc: Dragonlance, Forgotten realms based mud with unique classes, skills, leveling, questing,heart thumping war and fusion systems. You dont choose a class, you choose the skills according to how much your brain can hold, and the class will be assigned to you.This works great for multi classing.

The leveling system extends to 50, and upon there, you gain the ability to fuse with another player(mix both your genes and race) and restart at level 5, next generation (more powerful), being something you have never been before. This makes for endless replaying and customising. Note: This is NOT remort.

During fusion any of the other players limbs and/or genes can be transferred to you and vice versa, but be careful, genes can also be lost. Stats and attributes will also increase or decrease accordingly. No two players will ever be the same.

With the exception of standard weapon attacks, combat and spell casting time is not randomised, you employ full control of when you cast the next spell or strike the next hit through our unique action point system.
Try us out to see it in action.
\"Nothing is predictable. Until your enemy's last breath, you are not the victor.\"

mud.name: Project Bob
mud.desc: This Project has been under heavy development for 4 years. While it is fully playable, we are also continuing with Beta testing. The mud is generally very stable with regular code additions. There are already dozens of interesting features that provide lasting gameplay. This is the mud for anyone who loves computer role playing games.

* Vast random equipment system based loosely on Diablo. * Research and crafting help narrow down item searches. * Diverse skill groups allow for deep class customization while effective classes can be chosen for simplicity. * Numerous event and quest options for a fresher experience. * Strong emphasis on player enjoyment and conveniences. * Territorial clan control system. * Free grouping system for players of all levels to team up. * Deep combat stat system where players may succeed through specialization or balance. * Perk advancement system offers nearly endless development beyond a player's mastered skills and max level. Upgrade abilities, boost talents, raise important stats and more. * Newbie friendly Admin staff and game information. There is much to learn, but everything is geared towards helping. * NPC trading system for passive item acquisition. * Random exploration events provide alternate leveling methods.
! Former players will recognize this as MatMud. And former players from the Age of Legends at terminal.org are missed as well!

The majority of the codebase has been revamped or replaced resulting in over three times the original program size. A more fantasy-based theme is under consideration, but you will find countless ways to adventure and actually play your character in our ever-growing world. Some will even have the opportunity to help us shape it.

mud.name: Star Wars: Jedi Civil War KoTOR
mud.desc: This is a basic attempt at making a delve into the knights of the old republic. Here we would like to roleplay what it was like before Vader, and Before Palpatine.
We are Currently hiring all building positions, and very limited coding hiring may be done.

mud.name: DBZ: EoC
mud.desc: We are a very relaxed MUD that is not just your average DBS clone. We take pride in having a highly updated stock area plus many new ones which are available for you to explore. At Dragonball Z, The Edge of Chaos (DBZ EoC), we have a very active RP player base too and welcome any others who may want to experience a more immersive environment through the active storyline content. This is the first version of the Edge code and version 2 is just around the corner. We take pride in maintaining friendly players and a Immortal staff which will help guide you through the many fun quests we offer. In this world the universes are colliding, leaving us on the Edge of Chaos. This creates the ability for us to allow many different fantasy worlds on here as well. However, we are still primarily based on DBZ, so our themes will essentially revolve around those. We want to encourage you to feel free to visit and check us out for our test of this first version of many more to come. We are confident you will like what you see.

mud.name: Worlds of Fantasy
mud.desc: This is a new mud that a group of avid game players has started to build. The world is currently composed mostly of imported prebuilt areas. We are working on it constantly, and many rooms and areas are added daily. We are looking for players to come and help us test the server and quests and such. Rewards for helping us out will be large. We are not looking for more builders, but if anyone has any ideas for new items, mobs, etc. be sure and let us know. Thanks for checking us out.

mud.name: Galactic Era
mud.desc: We just opened up a few days ago and are currently fully operational. There are some things that need work. W are also not running a stock fote code. Thats about all I have to say about the mud. Other than we are currently looking for players. Come check it out and have fun.

mud.name: Age of Dro'xundus
mud.desc: Improve your english while playing our fantastic rol play game! Interact with real players and intelligent mobs! Discover the great virtual world by wondering around! Droâ€™xundus is an Anatolia2.2 based mud game. It has many modifications. Playing is more and more easy. The game has a lot of new classes with their many different spells and skills..

mud.name: Bloodlines MUSH
mud.desc: Every morning the sun rises on Ellensburg, Washington - a flourishing town complete with a long-standing historical background, a flourishing tourist trade, and a thriving college within its all-American borders. Every morning, the school busses run, the college students sleep off hangovers, and the town gossips circulate the latest about racy middle-aged affairs that nobody actually wants to envision. In short, mornings in Ellensburg bring about normalcy...something the town has a bit of an /issue/ with at night.

No, there's not much evidence of it, really. Sure, there have been an odd number of disappearances lately. And yeah, it can be a little creepy near the woods at night, but who goes out there anyway? Oh! And some of the elders in town sometimes tell stories about the town's mythical or magical past or something, but it's all talk. That's what they like to believe, anyway.

In truth, Ellensburg is much more than the northwest's hundredth clone of Smalltown, USA. It's a meeting place for the outcasts of the daylight - the vampires, the werewolves, the ones with magical abilities. Maybe it's because of the high deposit of precious gems in the earth below the town, or the rich historical past, maybe not. It sure is something - a something that the residents have yet to discuss over the morning paper. Hold on, Ellensburg.

Bloodlines is a MUSH set within the theme of the Vampire Diaries series. The game takes place in a different town without any of the characters from the series and is based mostly around college-aged characters. Original and creative concepts welcomed.

mud.name: Dragonball Z - World of Darkness
mud.desc: Dragonball Z -World of Darkness is a level based dbz mud. We are a growing mud adding things in all the time.
We hope you will join us we have a staff to help all your needs.

mud.name: Age Of Tyranny
mud.desc: Age Of Tyranny (AoT) is a new MUD based on the CircleMUD3.1 platform. We have rewritten the entire skill/spell system as well as altered the combat system so that battles involve a tad more skill then just attacking something and waiting to see if it dies. We are a classless mud with expertise based skill and spell system. You assign points (earned by leveling) into one of many different areas of expertise and can then learn skills and spells based on your level of knowledge in that certain area of expertise (ie: Diablo II). We are also working on the ability to have Player controlled cities with an advanced economic system.

The MUD itself is based on custom world called Ultima Terra (Latin translated means the last land). Players start in a city called Kel-Moraine which is off the coast of Damaar. Kel-Moraine is under attack from several rival cities including Astoria and its Tyrant ruler. All zones will be custom made and will include extensive triggers to ensure that each zone has a true

mud.name: Rise of the Empire
mud.desc: Under Construction.

mud.name: Redemption Of The Universe
mud.codebase: [SWR] New Skills, Commands, functionality added. Bugs squashed.
mud.desc: Redemption Of The Universe is evolving all the time. It's from the FOTE base, which, in turn is based off of SWR. We have a devoted coder, and a builder, we expanding the stock areas and developing the code. We have squashed a lot of bugs and restored stability to it. We greatly anticipate our playerbase to grow.
We invite you to join our mud.

mud.name: Apocalyptic Gate
mud.desc: It was a time of peace and joyful endings for decades. Wars were unheard of in this realm until a strange man by the name of Yerte summoned a strange gate. He called this gate the Apocalyptic Gate.. The citizens gathered around the strange gate for days until one day it opened. As it opened a large demon exited the gate decapitating them one by one. The citizens cried for help as the fiend devoured them, but in the distance a howls could be heard. From out of nowhere a pack of black and white furred beasts came to assist the citizens. As they grew close more demons poured out of the gate. It was that time, the war had finally arrived. Awaken all creatures of the realm and take your side, but their can only be one champion.
Apocalyptic Gate offers:
Classes: Mage, Demon, Werewolf, Angel, Monk, Ninja, Fae, and Vampire.
Hybrids: Nephandi, Skindancer, Lich, Abomination, Black Spiral Dancer, Baali, Hakken, Baiken, Starlit Cherub, Celestial Assassin, Celestial Howler, Defyler, Majestic Shadow, and Sohei.
*Classes in the works: Drow, Highlander, Kote, Dragons *Hybrids in the works: Lloth, Sennin, and Elementalist *Random Bonus EXP and QP system installed *Removed clans to add kingdoms later

Currently we are still in the building process and are far from opening considering the classes, hybrids, helpfiles, and areas that need to be created. You may drop in to chat or if you are a builder possibly aid in the construction of the Apocalyptic Gate.
-Apocalyptic Gate Staff

mud.name: BrMUD
mud.desc: O BrMUD Ã© um MUD totalmente diferente dos que voce ja jogou atÃ© hoje, nÃ³s construimos um mundo completamente original, todas as areas foram construidas especialmente para o BrMUD, vocÃª nÃ£o encontrarÃ¡ nenhuma Midgaard ou Sundhaven nele, porem terÃ¡:

- Sistema de Casas - Sistema de ClÃ£s - Sistema de Arenas - Sistema de LeilÃ£o Automatico - Sistema de Montarias e EnfeitiÃ§ar Animais - Sistema de Combate a Longa Distancia - Sistema de Morte que voce nao precisa buscar seu corpo - Bau pessoal para guardar seus itens ao explorar - Sistema de PK (diverte quem participa, protege quem nÃ£o quer) - Personagens altamente customizaveis - Prompt e cores customizaveis - Sistema de criacao de itens, podendo criar entre 71 armas, 54 armaduras e 26 tipos de materiais - 12 raÃ§as BEM distintas: Humano, Meio-Elfo, Gnomo, Anao, Elfo, Fada / Sprite, Troll, Ogro, Orc, Hobgoblin, Elfo-Negro e Illithid - Alinhamentos: Cruzado, Benfeitor, Rebelde, Juiz, Indeciso, Inconstante, Dominador, Malfeitor, Destruidor - Sistema sem classes, podendo escolher entre qualquer combinaÃ§Ã£o dentre as 154 habilidades existentes para aprender com os monstros - Sistema de pesquisa de magias completamente inovador onde voce pesquisa suas prÃ³prias magias, com o nome que quiser, acertando o alvo que quiser, com o dano que quiser e os efeitos que quiser, lembrando que nao temos NENHUMA magia pre-definida - Itens aleatorios deixados por monstros, utilizando prefixos e sufixos (bem estilo diablo 2), gerando itens bastante unicos - Sistema de Aventuras onde voce tem um caderno de aventuras e Ã© atualizado quando monstros pedem ajuda entre outros eventos - Sistema de monstros aleatorios espalhados pelo mundo http://brmud.com.br -> MUD feito por brasileiros, para brasileiros.

mud.name: Renegade Outpost 5
mud.desc: Renegade Outpost was originally created in 1992 using Diku but was quickly replaced with Silly Mud beta code. Over the years many amazing coders have had their hands on the code. The end result is a Mud with some completely unique versions of popular character classes.

One example is Monk which a completely No-EQ Class that relies totally on their knowledge of Kung-Fu. Their prowess is defined by the Kung-Fu style they have mastered. The top style is Drunken Master, and actually makes all the alcohol available in the world useful!

The world is mostly unique with a few stock areas like Midgaard (modified). Many areas are inspired by Tolkien, Robert Jordan, famous fantasy films, music, and some incredibly original zones as well. With nearly 10,000 rooms currently in the world (9991 to be exact) the mud has plenty of areas to find just the right mood for you.
We invite you to come see what the hype is all about!

mud.name: Dungeons and Dragons Destiny and Desire
mud.codebase: [Unknown] Derived from Anatolia. Mostly original Code
mud.desc: You have stumbled into a world filled with fantasy and driven by imagination. Anything is possible in this fantasy world. The fate of the world lies in your hands and in your ability to manipulate it. In this world you can join many different clans or organizations to aid you in your world domination, but beware these clans and organizations can hinder you as well. This world is a place where you can escape the ramblings of the real world, a place where you can be that evil person you have always wanted to be, or the kind and loving healer. You can live out the fantasies of your imagination in this world of fantasy. Stop being that real world robot and step into the realms of Dungeons and Dragons Destiny and Desire.

mud.name: Cosmic Cuttlefish
mud.desc: Welcome to the Cosmic Cuttlefish, winner of the 2159 \"Most Disorganized Spaceship\" Prize. You would be able to see the trophy in the museum, if management hadn't lost it. Rumors say it's in one of the cells of the security area, eaten by one of the animals of the zoo. If you're wondering what zoo animals are doing in the security area... welcome to the Cosmic Cuttlefish. Play a member of our crew! Engage in dangerous missions! Discover new planets, hang out in their bars, and try to come back healthy enough so that you don't have to see the doctor! Or play a member of the medical personel and have fun at the expense of those crew members that didn't know better than insulting the local thug while drunk! This is a comedy retro sci-fi MUSH. We encourage originality and experimentation. Join the weird bunch that is our playerbase, and have fun!
Because retro sci fi can be comedic!

mud.name: Age of Shadows
mud.desc: Our MUD, Realm of Aluria (name is still pending), is currently under testing, and NOT open to new characters, yet. If you want a new character, you can contact the administrator of the MUD, but you would have to be a tester, and would have to be willing to contribute to the MUD, not just play. Our MUD is based in medieval times, and is generally rung around fantasy. Our world is mostly stock as of now, but we are avidly working to make it PURE originality, save perhaps the immortal zones. Until our name is sorted out, we do not have a permanent website, but we will have our forum.

mud.name: Final Fantasy: Tales of Time
mud.desc: This is a new Final Fantasy mud on the net. The mud goes though all of the games of the Final Fantasy series. It includes many of the same attacks and many of the quests from the games also.

mud.name: Galatic Era
mud.desc: Bugs have been fixed.We are currently open to the public, and are still looking for builders. This mud is a SWR/Smaug/FotE mix,and is heavily modifed. Come check it out today! Based during post-endor years. The Empire is still currently in power. Though falling quickly. The New Republic is coming back in to command. As, they need your help.

mud.name: Recalling Faith
mud.desc: WE ARE CURRENTLY HIRING BUILDERS, IF YOU ARE AN EXPERIENCED ROM BUILDER DROP ON BY AND APPLY WITH US TODAY!!!!

mud.name: XIAIX
mud.desc: XIAIX is a fantasy based MUD with 100% custom created areas and creatures. This game was heavily influenced by the feel and look of Warhammer Fantasy Role-Play, and D&D 2nd Edition Dragon Lance series. XIAIX has an extensive and detailed timeline and history for players that desire to delve into pure role-play. We have many game mechanics and enhanced back end features that make XIAIX truly stand out from among most other 'stock' games out there. The staff within XIAIX are immediately responsive to requests for help, ideas, bugs, or any questions that players may need to have answered. Customer service and player satisfaction is our main goal while maintaining a safe and fair gaming system for everyone to enjoy. To that end, we offer open lines of communication via email, website forums, instant messaging, and voice communication via Ventrilo and/or TeamSpeak. Log onto our site, www.xiaix.com, and create your account with us today with the Player Signup link. We'll be thrilled to have you try us out and see a nice change of pace from the 'same-old' MUD you're probably used to.

mud.name: Aesir
mud.desc: Aesir is a heavy Player Killer game focusing on group aspects of PK. We have redone many of the classic LOW4 classes and added new ones: Werewolf, Vampire, Drow, Monk, Ninja, Demon, Renshai, Necromancer, Ranger, Dragons, with Daggers, Guardians, and Highlanders almost complete. We have subclassing which allows you to have more than one class on your pfile as well as 3 seperate endgame arenas.

Clans have a chance each week to capture a fully upgraded castle and then have to defend it in the next week. Status will be reset each month so there is always PK tobe had instead of people eventually quitting because noone in their range logs in. Card questing has been taken out in favor of expmode which allows you to choose whether you gain exp or qp from mobs.

We would love for our players to give their input so we can make this a changing and growing mud to keep players engaged. We have helpful Immortals and fully upgraded help files so even if you have never played a LOW4 before come on in and try it out!
Aesir has had its first castle sieges and many players have said that it was some of the most fun they have ever had on a mud!

mud.name: Ninja/Pirate - PwnWars MUD
mud.desc: The only place where Ninjas can gather to fight Pirates, and vice versa! Players are englufed in a new land of chaos, where pirates control the waters and ninjas control...everything else! Ninjas can use any and all weapons on this MUD, while pirates are forced to use

mud.name: Dragonball: Legends
mud.desc: Hello All, Currently we are looking for Builders, Coders, and all staff that we can get. Our MUD isn't that original just yet because we need people to mold the MUD from their imagination. If you would like to stop by then go to: crazee-records.ath.cx:1234 And talk to Norphin or Shadow. My (Norphin) email is johnosbourn@comcast.net Email me if you are interested, or just have any questions about it. Again we are still under heavy heavy heavy modifications, and there is way to much for us to do by ourselves, so we would really appreciate the help!
-Norphin

mud.name: Alcheminia
mud.codebase: [GodWars] Dystopia Derivative of GW Heavily Modified
mud.desc: This Mud Is Still Very Much A Work In Progress. I'm working on improving a code used by a friend of mine a while back, which he has given up on. Feedback and ideas from players is very much encouraged. If you're interested in a staff position. See;DeSade aka Discord -OR- Zero aka Gabriel [Update] We have filled all Coder postions. We have several unfilled builder positions. Which we are currently hiring for.

mud.name: Mordor Mud (Chileno)
mud.desc: HISTORIA A lo largo de centurias los diferentes mundos han permanecido separados; realidades distintas se desarrollaban paralelamente en un continuo avance... Antiguas profesias anunciaban la venida de una nueva Era en la cual las dimensiones se unirian en una sola, dando paso a la ultima gran Era de lostiempos. La Era anunciada ha llegado!, la conjuncion universal se ha llevado a cabo y en ella solo los mas fuertes sobreviven. Diferentes mundos y guerreros han sido convocados..., desde la noble realidad celestial de los Arcangeles, hasta la temida realidad Infernal de los Demonios.....esta escrito que solo una Prevalecera. La nueva Era es la prueba Ultima de los dioses para los guerreros que buscan Poder , Honor y Gloria. Aqui nacen las Leyendas.... Este es Mordor, La tierra oscura.

mud.name: Tribunal of Orion
mud.desc: Humans made a push for the stars that almost completely depleted the resources of their native planet- and while hundreds of thousands sought their destiny amongst the stars, many millions were left to the ravages of time on their home world-- with no way of maintaining the industrial technical they had so come to depend upon and enjoy.

500 years later the fabric of society has all but completely disintegrated, with concepts like brotherhood, nationality and loyalty having become nothing more than the ramblings of madmen and prophets.
Current plans allot for 99 player levels with the opportunity to improve their base class at level 35, 70 and/or 90 depending upon base-class as well as alignment.
The currently planned classes include: BASE: Thief Fighter Mage Healer

Level 35 Classes [from good to evil]: Thief: Wanderer, Rogue, Brigand, Cutthroat Fighter: Crusader, Soldier, Mercenary, Renegade Mage: Seer, Wizard, Occultist, Witch Healer: Priest, Cleric, Shaman, Heretic

Level 70 Classes [from good to evil]: Thief: Treasure Hunter, Adventurer, Prowler, Assassin Fighter: Knight, Veteran, Professional, Warlord Mage: Diviner, Mystic, Sorceror, Warlock Healer: Bishop, Doctor, Witchdoctor, Zealot
Level 90 Classes [true-neutral only]: Thief: Gambler Fighter: Sentinel Mage: Magician Healer: Medic
Lots of work to do! Needs coders and writers with talent and desire. The storyline is very much open for input and suggestion Likewise with classes, skills and so forth.

mud.name: Ancient Realm of The Underworld
mud.desc: The Realm has - Stances - A very smart AI system - Mobiles that can advance - A new pk feature that requires new pkers to qualify themselves and gives them a chance to try it out before its permanent, - A pk gear system that enables pkers to aquire special equipment, - AutoQuest - Global Socials - Global Emote - Autostance - Dodge and Parry revamped, - Arena code - Four tiers - Dual class at third tier - A special way to advance to the next tier, you keep your original and create a new character at the next tier - Special types of attacks and more. - Much more.
Visit The Realm of The Underworld at titan.mudmagic.com port 4000

mud.name: Eternal Darkness
mud.desc: Eternal Darkness has been reborn. The mud is based on Low4 and Dystopia. 3 years ago the mud was created and became one of the most popular godwars muds. Now we hope to make that happen again.
Things that can be found on the mud:
17 classes Kingdoms Quests Clan Wars Custom Eq and much more to come.
We hope you will come back if your an old player. If your a new one we hope that you will enjoy your stay and have fun. (All pfiles are still here).
-Sebeq

mud.name: Untold Tales
mud.desc: Ummm All of the information was not really accurate, were still in building process.. It will be extended class, And race, yes pking is allowed, multi-classing ofcourse Lots of role playing hopefully, newbie welcome ofcourse, etc. Looking for builders and Coders right now, always open for new ideas and looking for a fun group to work with :)

mud.name: Another Shades of Night
mud.desc: Another Shades of Night is from a mud named StolenMUD. StolenMUD was up a while back go but is now up once again but renamed to Shades of Night. I hope we see some familiar faces and a lot of new ones. I am changing things on here frequently. Hope to see everyone here. Come and check it out. I am not going to sit here type everything that the mud has because I want you to come on in and check it out for yourself. Echo

mud.name: Manifest Destiny
mud.desc: Manifest Destiny is currently under development. We are currently looking for a competent staff willing to work in order to better the MOO. We need at least one builder and three coders, so if you are willing please drop in. The actual plot of the MOO at the moment is a fairly protected secret, but it takes placed in an advanced society featuring starships ,space stations, and other interesting features.

mud.name: Tranquility Found in Destruction
mud.desc: You will journy through lands of mysterie and some of pure terror. But you must keep on your toes because head-hunters are every where. They will not stop till they have your head and your belongings. You will find mystical armor and weapons that makes your journey through this magical world easyer to accomplish. If you make it past the head hunters you will become a mighty warrior indeed.
So please come in and enjoy the wounderfull world of Tranquility Found In Destruction. (ENTER IF YOU ARE BRAVE ENOUGH)
Leviathan & Craven

mud.name: Witchcraft and Wizardry
mud.desc: ----------------================(@v@)================----------------- Uninstalled heavily modified Storyteller System & Character Generation Game Status: Alpha Stage. IC Grid is Off-Line. RP Sandboxes Available. IC year: 1935. U.K. Citizen/Resident only. Players Age: 18+ years old. ----------------================(@v@)================----------------- Starting 'races' that will be available: Muggles (Mortals) and Wizards Available 'races' with 'Dirty Socks'(Community/Brownie Points) spends: Centaur, Goblin, Part-Giant, Part-Veela, House-Elf, Vampire & Werewolf A +roster of characters both original and canon -will- be available. ----------------================(@v@)================----------------- Witchcraft and Wizardry is a TinyMUX based on the magical world of J.K. Rowling of the Harry Potter series. Set in the U.K. during the era of World War II, starting in the year 1935. This date is so that a buffer of time is given to the playerbase to get settled before WWII breaks out officially on September 1, 1939. The staff and player base is a warm family like community. ATM we have no HELP or NEWS files installed so we honestly aren't very newbie friendly. Those who are familiar with WoD MUs should hopefully feel at home. The magic system is very much in construction mode, mostly being tested in tabletop. It will combine elements of the Mage and Changeling magic systems, re-worked to have a more Harry Potter feel. Though we use the Storyteller System and have alot of the same races at first glance. Don't be fooled this is not a WoD game set in the UK pretending to be a Harry Potter setting. The world is J.K. Rowling not World of Darkness. Please keep in mind the game is under development so come with a play testers spirit and a willingness to help build the game. ----------------================(@v@)================-----------------

mud.name: Infinite Journey
mud.desc: Infinite Journey is a an adult-orientated MUCK dedicated to diversity, originality (as best as anyone can manage in this day and age) and creativity in play. As thus, we maintain a friendly atmosphere towards newcomers and old friends alike. We do have a set theme, but it is more than broad enough to allow players to create nearly anything they desire and join the storytelling fun.

mud.name: Archons of Avenshar
mud.desc: Welcome to Avenshar, kingdom to those of adventurous spirit, kingdom of noble lords and ladies, and kingdom to craftsmen and merchants. Avenshar is a kingdom steeped in magic and legend, forged through time by the very blood and sweat of its denizens. Though Avenshar's history is marked by long periods of war and conquest, recent times have not been so bloody, nor glorious, nor exciting. As a matter of fact, the last century or so has been a time of peaceful existence...

Yet, across the Nivaron Sea, the outpost city of Kehl has begun to take shape. The king has put out a call to all stalwart adventurers: cross the dangerous waters of the Nivaron Sea and put your skills to work assisting the growth of Kehl and ultimately the Kingdom. Be you a noble, a merchant, or a mercenary, the rewards of fortune and glory can be yours!

Archons of Avenshar is a fantasy themed game played through a custom, browser based Flash client. AoA features an all original world and storyline. Roleplaying, while not strictly enforced, is strongly encouraged. Enjoy countless hours interacting with other players, advancing your character's goals, or simply partaking in casual gaming in the main city's tavern. AoA features include, but are not limited to: * Custom Client meant to enhance the game world * Equipment that saves on exit * Limited racial selection * Guilds to learn from * Character customization through description editing * In game message boards, mail, help system and more

mud.name: VirtuaPern
mud.desc: VirtuaPern exists approximately 800+ turns after the Ninth Pass. We're working under the assumption that all the things in the book /did/ happen though AIVAS was more damaged than believed, thus causing a few calculation errors in the plan to push the Red Star out of orbit, and from there... the story continues.
