After the death of Robinton, things took a rather morose turn. With such tragedy hanging over Landing, people gradually drew away from AVIAS and it's knowledge. Pern never reaches the level of technology that the Colonists had originally set up except for some minor advancements in the medical technology and for some over improvements in living conditions at Hold and Weyr. The Weyrs having fulfilled it's plans to eradicate Thread, fight out the rest of the Pass, but with the eventual death of F'lar and the greatly decreasing sizes of dragon clutches, the Weyrs only made a partial attempt to settle in the South at Honshu and Eastern Weyr. Over the next 450 turns the Weyrs diminish as the number of new dragons never exceeded the number of existing dragons, to the point where now in the present only two Weyrs are still open, the rest moving to Fort and Benden to make only two full sized Weyrs. It was during the celebration of the 3rd Millennium that the Weyrleader of Benden, V'lin of bronze Chendath decided to once again bring attention to dragonkind by renaming the Weyr after one of the orbiting colony ships forming the Dawn Sisters: Bahrain. He wished to revitalize the Weyr against the demoralization of the decreasing dragon population and to celebrate the anniversary of Landing, believing that the great ships did far more for Pern than just one single man who captained them. Despite the change, the riders continued to fall into disfavor and most folk, riders included, still call it Benden. The Holds spread out further, many minor Holds growing in large sizes to the point where they almost match the size of the old major Holds. Though some still tithed to the last two Weyrs, the majority felt that they were a drain on the growing economy. In fact, tensions grew intolerable in the current generation, to the point where a rift grew between Fort Hold and Weyr, the conflict extending to encompass the other Holds and Weyr. Tithes were withheld and finally situation grew intolerable to the Bahrain Weyrleaders, so they packed up and established Xanadu Weyr in the depths of the Southern Continent beside the Sea of Azov. With them came Crafters and Holders who still believed in upholding the dragonfolk. Thus Xanadu Hold was built beside the new Weyr as well as several new halls for Smith, Weaver, and Beastcraft. Earthquakes and volcanic activity as well as an unusually severe monsoon season made many of the areas once reclaimed from the Southern Continent's jungle uninhabitable. Refugees began to flood into Xanadu Hold and Weyr, many voicing the opinion that they would all be much better off returning North and to their traditional homes. With the growing population in such a small area and the pressure to feed and house so many, the decision was made to give into the demands and move as many as wished to go back to the Northern Continent. Benden Weyr-for the name and its past has been reclaimed- once again houses a full compliment of riders, and the Red Star still hovers over the horizon, each turn drawing closer and closer. Rumors that the clutches at the Weyrs are growing in size and frequency as riders once again fly out to Search outside the Weyr and that Thread might fall again. Only time will tell...

mud.name: Koitola
mud.desc: Koitola is an RPG based in it's own Fantasy world, players are placed in a world as mere objects of the game and will be one who can save the world', each player makes a difference, but not a large one, it takes make small acts to take notice in the world.

Monsters are not based on level, you must know what monsters you can fight, don't just rush in because an opponent says 'Level 1' Study your surroundings, talk to friends, and just listen to the name, if it sounds like it would be a tough fight, it probably will be.
Each enemy has their own level system, so a level 1 snake, will never be as easy to kill as a level 1 Blood Orc. You need to watch what is going on before you fight them.

There are several races to choose from, each with their own weaknesses, there are no restricted classes or races, but some classes will benefit from one race that another one might not. We are always looking to add things to the game, make it better, and if a certain feature is disliked by a large quantity of players, we will generally change it, if it is for the good of the players.
Welcome, to Koitola!

mud.name: Darren Reid's The Half Broken Crown: The Broken Kingdoms
mud.desc: The Broken Kingdoms is a brand new Online Adventure Game that brings people from all over the world together to solve puzzles and complete quests. Based upon bestselling author Darren Reid's epic fantasy tale The Half Broken Crown offers you a complete world to explore starting in the village of Ardara. These are dark times and the glory days of the Old Empire are long gone. Everywhere in the world there are great ruined cities to explore, abandoned fortresses and forgotten magic. Join together with your friends or make new companions in the game and strike out to solve the mysteries of this crumbling world.

mud.name: Star Trek: Gamma One
mud.desc: It is now 2379, four years after the end of the Dominion War, and recently, a task force has completed work on the first permanent Alliance base in the Gamma Quadrant. Now crewed by some of the officers from the ships which built it, with new blood transferred in as needed, Alliance Outpost Gamma One is the oasis, the safe harbor, for the dreams of Federation and Empires in the Gamma Quadrant. And if building an outpost far from Federation space and supply lines wasn't hard enough, there are new races to make diplomatic contacts with, old enemies to contend with, and new rivals lying in wait...

mud.name: The Lost Lands Of Arion
mud.desc: The Lost Lands of Arion ----------------------------------------------- The Lost Lands of Arion is an advanced player killing, role-playing mud. We have 4 different kingdoms (each kingdom have different races) and the war is between different kingdoms - goodness (the army of Gondor) VS evilness ( the minions of Sauron ). Also you may reincarnate - to get the new class - gaining more skills and spells.
Also we have different war rankings and kingdom scores, what are always up-to-date and you can check them, at any time.
Our world is 100% original and it based on J.R.R. Tolkien books. Not all, but most. Also we have very interesting MOBprogs - not usual \"hack'n slash\" quests.
If you think that this MUD for You, feel free to check us out at telnet://carlnet.ee 4242

mud.name: STAR WARS: Unsung Heroes
mud.desc: STAR WARS: UNSUNG HEROES

It has been a hard-fought battle, but the fledgling NEW REPUBLIC has won several major victories over its enemies in rapid succession. Grand Admiral Thrawn has been defeated. Admiral Daala has been removed from the Maw Installation and the super-weapon research there has been halted. Even the resurrected Emperor has been destroyed for all time, consumed by the Dark Side. The Jedi Knight Luke Skywalker has set up a Jedi Academy on the world of YAVIN IV, and many candidates are stepping forward to join the ranks of the New Jedi Knights, to help usher in a new era of peace and prosperity for the citizens of the galaxy.

But the darkness has not passed fully. Remnants of the EVIL GALACTIC EMPIRE are even now marshalling their forces and consolidating power around the Imperial stronghold world known as BASTION. Lead by Admiral Daala and Vice-Admiral Pellaeon, the Imperial war machine seeks to regain lost territory and reestablish its former glory. But even more disturbing, there have been stirrings on the old Sith world of KORRIBAN. The seductive call of the Dark Side of the Force is being heard by many would-be Sith Masters who are following its siren's voice to a new destiny...

UNSUNG HEROES is set in the Star Wars universe roughly eight years after the destruction of the second Death Star at Endor, just a short while after the events of th Jedi Academy novel series. While the Feature Characters of Star Wars (Luke, Leia, Han, etc.) are still around, they are NPC 'background' characters. It could be that your character may run into or interact with one of these feature characters, but we focus on the heroic (or evil!) pursuits of the players' characters and not on the feature characters of the Star Wars universe.
Some features of the game: * Force Users (Jedi, Sith, or Non-Aligned) are available by open application.
* You can play up to four different characters, two of which can be 'special' characters such as Force users or characters who are in leadership roles.
* While our primary focus is roleplay, we have fully coded skill, space, and combat systems: For those times when talking just isn't going to get the job done!
Come and join us at unsungheroesgame.com 1138!

mud.name: Legend of Dark Gaia
mud.desc: We're no strangers to online games, having played them for years. We know the rules, and so do you. A MUD has to be fun, it has to be worthy of commitment.
Legend of Dark Gaia is one game that you will never give up. We could go on about its features, but you'll understand better if you just come in and run around for a bit.

mud.name: Threads of Time
mud.desc: Threads of Time : A Carpathian Tapestry

Treachery, like fine wine, flows freely though the halls of power. And where soft words conspire, sharp steel waits just out of sight, like a dagger beside a goblet of gold. The Eastern European Renaissance is a banquet of such delights, and a person who would share tables with rich and highborn folk had better keep his own wine and daggers close at hand.

'Threads of Time' offers adventures in a genre that is epitomized by courtly backgrounds, conspiracy, high stakes, grand style, rapid swordplay, daring deeds, binding honor and a fair helping of seduction. These adventures have a flavor all their own, a heady mix of style, trickery and graceful violence. Although such adventures can take place anywhere, it is only in the Renaissance Era one is at home in and around the court. Any muscle can hack and slash his way across a battle field, but the delicate gamesmanship and sudden reversals of highborn politics demands quick wits and a ready blade. More time then night, you cannot just pull out a sword and kill your foe in court or manor. Such matters must be handled with more... delicacy... than force. Which is not to say that such matters is not deadly Au contraire! Where a soldier gambles with his own fate in a single combat, the courtier or merchant prince tosses the dice with dozens, sometimes hundreds or even thousands of lives. It is not a game for fools or cowards, but can be more rewarding than a pile of gold coins - if you live to collect the rewards, that is.

This weaving of art, commerce, technology, religious conflict, moral and sexual licenses and political intrigue sets this era apart from the other's tapestries. Add to that, the anti- heroes themselves - dark, evil figures whose passions are no longer human. The Undead, Lycanthropes and witches lend to the weavings a dark horror steeped with fear and sensuality; the heart beats in time with the tapping of a talon on the window pane, a victim feels the fangs of a vampiress pressing into his neck he feels them denting his flesh, even before they pierce the skin and the low, mournful howl in the copse rises to a feverish pitch. Tangled yards of thread, spun to create a world wide tapestry - the weaving of seduction, intrigue, assassination and villainy most vile.

In this setting, we use the tools that White Wolf has provided us in the 'World of Darkness' with a mixture of Advanced Dungeons & Dragons' Ravenloft theme and our own imagination to create a world that is weaved uniquely into...
Threads of Time : A Carpathian Tapestry A Renaissance Age Mux threadsoftime.org 1548 217 .160.253.100 1548

mud.name: Faith Of Dark Immortals
mud.desc: Just a place to have fun and to kill!

mud.name: Neverwinter Nights (Cotton City)
mud.desc: Hi My name is Kleptomas this is not a new codebase I have been working on it for some while now. Alot of things is subject to change but I gurantee you will love the codebase. I wanna do a mid evel theme with a bit of command and conqure. I am currently hiring Coders and Builders so please feel free to stop in. ________________________________________________________________ There is more comming very soon but welcolme to Neverwinter Nights

mud.name: Hogwarts MUD
mud.desc: Hello, and welcome to Hogwarts MUD. Right now the mud is almost 100% stock Circle Code, but that will change quickly enough.
We could use some help, though! If you're a coder, builder, or just want to player test and bounce ideas back and forth with me, please contact me at:
hogwarts@stormbringer.sysconn.com
Thank you!
Adiar

mud.name: Yesterday's Voyage TrekMU
mud.desc: 2343 Before the Destruction of the Enterprise-C at Narenda III Space, the Final Frontier. With these words, one of the great TV shows of the modern era was launched. This show was Star Trek, which forms the base history of Star Trek: Yesterday's Voyages. We are set in what has been dubbed one of 'The Lost Eras', between the Khitomer Accords and thelaunch of the USS Enterprise-D. To be more precise, we're set in 2343, a full twenty years before the launch of that great ship. The Dominion is unheard of, the Borg are but a rumour, and a great age of adventure is taking place.

The three powers we focus on are the United Federation of Planets, the Romulan Star Empire, and the Klingon Empire. On the fringes of known space are a variety of powers, both major (such as the Cardassian Union, discovered by the Federation eight years ago), and minor.

mud.name: I Spy Mush
mud.desc: These events take place in our world. Our time. We take this world and turn it on its ear. We expose an underbelly thick with espionage, private wars, and technology races. Assassination plots, corporate sabotage, and kidnappings are commonplace.

We show you the things you aren't meant to see. We show you what skilled, determined men and women can accomplish. We show you the measures they must resort to, the trials they must experience, and the stories they tell.

Our storytellers are the spies, mercenaries, and security consultants who manipulate this world within our world. They fight and die for a cause, for a paycheck, even for a thrill. Whatever their motivation, whoever their employer, for good or ill, we greet them with open arms. Here, we are brothers and sisters all.
Welcome to the family.
-- I, Spy

mud.name: Star wars: A New Story
mud.desc: New mud based on SW:FOTEfuss.. Still getting it all worked out but we are up and running and willing to entertain new players.
Force users much more common that SWR code base, still room for leaders in the orginizations.
Admin looking to pump up players a bit to get an orginization of clan structure in place.
Easy on death right now, death is not so perma as we are all still learning. Just hit up an admin if you manage to die for got.

mud.name: Starfall
mud.desc: In year 2010, the world has changed. Astral bodies falling from space strike the Earth to devastating results. The impacts do not cause many deaths, but dust from impact is thrown up into the air, the inhalation of which decimates the population. As scientists begin to study these fallen rocks, they become increasingly aware that the world has changed. It seems that this stardust can warp the very fabric of reality.

As the years pass, strange phenomena become more accepted. Things that were once thought mere fantasy became real. Wizards able to command the elements come forth and show the world that human will can shape the world. Aliens come to Earth to study these mysterious objects (and apologize for all of those illicit abductions). Arco brings forth technology that has only been seen in science fiction. Some born after impact become innately able to do the impossible.

Fast forward to 2038, New Ashenham, the epicenter of all this weirdness. Arco is still running, trying to capture rogue Starborn and run experiments. The Remnants of the devastated city are partially rebuilt, but the surrounding Wasteland is still hostile and wild, filled with gangs and rogues. The 12th sphere meets in secret to decide when and where they will meddle with these changing affairs. HARM maintains the peace with several alien ambassadors. The Incendiary Order brings forth their fiery brand of justice. And sinister things lurk, enabled by all these strange phenomena, ready to tip the balance and bring chaos to all inhabitants of the area.
Welcome to Starfall, where fantasy has become reality and the world as we know it has ended.

mud.name: Midnight Dreams: Final Nightmare
mud.desc: MDFN was originally started back in Feb of 2000 after the original Midnight Dreams went down. I've kept it as close to the play style of the original as possible while fixing all the bugs and imbalances I could find.

MDFN has 14 distinct classes, Vampire, Werewolf, Demon, Drow, Mage, Ninja, Amazon, Monk, Highlander, Jedi, Shapeshifter, Hunter, Mecha Pilot, and Terminators, with some classes having a few subclasses (aka Mages having different colors plus the subclasses Illus, Necro, Invoker).

The mud is pretty much finished as it is, but if you have any suggestions please write up a note in the game or send me an email, also be sure to read the rules PLEASE, most of them are common sense so they shouldn't be a problem.
Thanks, Calendros

P.S. Much thanks goes to Bryantos, Jace, Neka and last but not least by any means Smoo for all their help and support. There are others but this list probably wouldn't hold them all, you know who you are so thanks.

mud.name: Dragonball - Deception
mud.desc: Dragonball - Deception is based off the DBTv1.7 codebase created by Iovan, Kuvok, Solbet, and many others.

We are a 'clone' but please don't let that discourage you from coming to Dragonball - Deception. We are not 'just another clone' who is going to be down in a week and never to be seen again or have tons of bugs and mass amounts of pwipes. Dragonball - Deception offers a fully operational DBT mud.

Here at Dragonball - Deception is doing everything the way we believe the original staff of DBT would have made given the time. We offer a huge selection of races each having their own unique skills and race abilites. We have also brought back the Casyr that was brought into DBT just before it crashed. We offer an extrodanaraly in depth role play system, skills that cannot be found in anyother DBZ mud, a massavie world of 8000+ rooms.
We have added an Exp Modifier that multiplies the amount of exp a player gets per kill to what ever it is set to and for the grand opening we are going to keep it a double the amount for one week!
So nows your time to come and stop by Dragonball - Deception! We await your visit.
We have joined forces with the Edgur, the original owner of Drqgonball -Ressurection of Truth and have decided to bring back DBRT. You can still connect with the same info.

mud.name: Legends and Lore
mud.desc: Legends and Lore is a roleplaying mud with a heavy emphasis on Player-Killing and clan interaction.

There are currently eight clans to choose from, based on your desire to protect the innocent, overthrow the gods, punish lawbreakers, cause panic and confusion, or take over the world, spreading darkness and despair. Whatever role you wish to play, you're likely to find allies with common goals and ambitions within these clans to help you achieve your aim.

We're a very newbie-friendly mud, with veteran players always willing to help out new ones and a unique newbie option that allows new players to explore the world and learn the ropes without having to worry about getting PK'd.

We have active coders and builders on staff, generating about one new area a month. New skills and spells are added all the time. We are a long way from the original Icey Depths 0.9 codebase we started with. The game mechanics get more complex all the time.
If you're looking for something more than \"WTF i p0wned u\", and don't want the usual \"everybody play nice\" RP environment, this is the place for you.

mud.name: Realm of the Magi
mud.desc: Imagine a world of fantasy, where anything is possible, and where you can be the hero that stories will speak of for ages to come. Imagine a world of dreams where fantastic races and creatures are as common as people are seen here. In this world, you have the freedom to live and die as you see fit, if you wish to fight monsters you can, if you wish to fight other players you can, and if you wish to become a fisherman, carpenter, blacksmith or one of dozens of other craftsmen you can. The only limitation is your own imagination.

Realm of the Magi (RotM) formally DragonStorm is a real-time, text-based, immersive, dark & magical fantasy game world built upon a LPMud 3.2 driver and custom-designed mudlib. Our world features fully interactive non-player characters, a driven skill and spell-casting dice-based combat system, an assortment of player-driven classes, the ability to experience 'dragon flight', a truely, interactive PvP and PvE combat action system, a unique quest & reputation system, and hundreds of 'emotion' feelings to express!
We have re-opened to the general public, so everyone is welcome!

mud.name: RivaMUSH
mud.desc: RivaMUSH (also known for a while as Beyond Belgariad) is a fairly old MU* that shut down in 1999 and is currently in the process of being revived with some new staff, although the grid remains mostly unchanged.
The game is based on the popular Belgariad novels by David Eddings. The action will start at the end of the second series (The Mallorean).
We are still working on the chargen, but in the meantime players are welcome to login and look around or even start RP'ing. Just keep in mind you will need to go through chargen when it is up.
Many staff positions are currently open. Page, e-mail or +mail Sith if you are interested or want more information.

mud.name: Mobile Suit Gundam: New Beginning
mud.desc: Mobile Suit Gundam: New Beginning is a MUD set in an alternate Universal Century 0080 in which Char Aznable doesn't kill Kycilia Zabi. The broken Zeon forces led by Kycilia Zabi limp back to Side 3. The Federation fleet retreats with the crew of the White Base back to Solomon. A new stalemate has begun.

We have been slowly progressing as host problems and personal problems of the staff have plagued us for over two years, but we have yet to give up trying to provide fans of Gundam with a quality MUD. We anticipate to be open for beta testing by Winter of 2008.

mud.name: Wild ARMs (Not Operational Yet)
mud.desc: Once upon a time, there was a majestic world where magic flourished and the mythical became real. Brave hearts and pure souls roamed this land, and it was called Filgaia. Then the discovery of Elw artifacts led to the uncovering of peculiar items dubbed \"ARMs\"...devices capable of killing with a mere gesture. These objects quickly spread across the world, and covered Filgaia in blood and gold. While there were men and women who could wield these mysterious artifacts without ill sentiment, for the majority of the population, there was nothing but greed and the thirst for power--power which came from wielding the most powerful weapons ever seen. Heroes and villains clashed, battles passed into legend, towns crumbled to time and cities arose in their place. Civilization bettered itself technologically, and at the same time, the entropy which fed on the guns unearthed in Elw ruins deteriorated it.

Over the years, Filgaia saw an explosion of crime, and the great emergence of outlaws and bounty hunters, and from the ashes of peace sprang a war the likes of which the world had never seen. ARMs grew prolific while the presence of magic dwindled away until even the memories became myth. Some said those who could use magic had sealed themselves away in another world to escape the escalating violence of their environment...others claimed that magic had merely lost potency in the face of the almighty ARM. There were even rumors that the Guardians themselves, the deities of the main religion of Filgaia, had abandoned them in their darkest hour. A shadow passed over the world, and mankind mourned the loss of its innocence.
Then one day, rumors began about the sudden appearance of those who could use magic, and stories of grotesque monsters wandering the desert....

mud.name: Dragon ball z :Evolution Reloaded
mud.desc: Dragon ball z :Evolution Reloaded is my Second mud. It uses DBS codebase, and is still mostly stock, but will eventually have its own new world little by little!

mud.name: Illuisa: Quest for the Eternals
mud.desc: Illusia: Quest for the Eternals features exciting gameplay in a semi-graphical, text-based world. All original, 100% free to play, Illusia features an all-original combat system unseen in any other game. With a friendly community of helpful players, human Hero guides to introduce players to the game, and a 100% original codebase, Illusia promises to rock the world of normal text-based gaming.

2 Seperate Race Alliances, 10 player races, 12 Guilds (classes), Player-run Orders, 75+ Skills/Spells (including area effect, passive, ranged, summoning, and even alchemy!) A massive, detailed world with involved areas and wide opportunities for fun. Leveless, experience-based system.

Includes on-going quests, like the King Wars! Pick an alliance, join the conflict! Static, automated quests, staff run events, and reset items/weapons! Also featuring non-reset items: random drop generation based on NPC difficulty. It is everything you've been looking for, with a detailed and easy-to-use stand-alone client.

mud.name: Distant Lands
mud.desc: Now over a decade old, Distant Lands is a (100% FREE) fun and exciting role playing game. It features a completely custom world and largely custom codebase. Distant Lands is constantly growing and changing as new features are added. If you are looking for a game to call home, this is it!

mud.name: Comic Adventures Mux
mud.desc: A two grid game that is all about comic books and comic characters from the DC and Marvel universes. The DC game is to provide new twists to old characters and give flexibility and chances to apply adapted Feature Characters. The Marvel game is to give the chance to play favorite Feature Characters without the weight of heavy and too complicated histories. It is also meant to make it easy to write in characters that haven't appeared yet in the early timeline. Furthermore, both games are being built to be OC friendly. We opened officially on April 16, 2010.
Marvel: In The Beginning...

This is a Marvel game that starts at a sort of 'year one'. The X-Men have only be active for about a year or so, having just a skeleton crew. Xavier has grand plans however as he searches desperately for teachers and students alike to make Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters a true haven. Iron Man is the bodyguard of the infamous Tony Stark, the playboy and trouble maker. Still, Iron Man has started to do more than just protect Stark Industries; he is doing truly heroic things. Even he feels the anger build at the injustice of it all, and is thinking about doing something about it. Yet, what can he do alone?

SHIELD is an international organization that is in the beginning stages under the U.N. influence. Nick Fury was beyond shocked at what was built before him, and as he places his hands on the reins it is only just in time before the world seems to explode. The Friends of Humanity is becoming more terrorists than activist group, developing a bad name even in the public eye. Yet the fear is growing as mutants and super-powered individuals appear. Just wait till the aliens start to arrive!
DC: The Guardians

This is an else-world, where many things are different or just a little off. Selina Kyle is the owner of Kyle Enterprises and secretly prowls at Catwoman. Batman has been dead for a few years, a murderer and thief, as well as the dead husband to Selina Kyle. Superman has left Earth for New Krypton, leaving a grown Superboy to step into his shoes as Superman. Green Arrow continues to make her mark, proving that Robin Hood should have been born female. After the destruction of the JSA, the government is finally overturning their anti-superhero ruling thanks to the continued brave efforts of heroes like Wonder Woman, Superman, Green Lantern and Hawkman. Stepping forward, Catwoman is now putting out a call to found the Justice League though many of the old heroes are finally turning in their uniforms for retirement. Who will take up their mantels to honor them?

mud.name: OurPlace MUD
mud.desc: Our Place Mud is an Online Multi-User Community all about challenge, roleplaying and having fun. Stop by and save some damsels or slay a few dragons. OP has fully automated Battle area, games such as Scrabble, Running man, Sieges, and quests.A well established game, with tons of equipment, tons of zones, and plenty of class diversity, all that remains to be added are more great players.
Stop by and get some blood on your weapon.

mud.name: Dragonball Return of Darkness
mud.desc: Dragonball Return of Darkness is a Converted Dbx into a Sfp. That Tuskino and Xylam first worked on together. We the Staff of Darkness have converted it over in many and yet not enough ways to become the newest and hottest mud out there.The mud has the basic Race selection in. Saiyans -Truffle's and Aliens.The Code for the Transformations are nearly done for the new Ssj levels behondy that of Ssj4.We the staff of Darkness welcome and invite everyone to join this great project, and life time work of greatness put on by the Staff. There is a Great Dice ( Roleplay ) System set up.Levels to train, quest, Dragonballs Earth - Dark and Shadow balls.
Sincerly Staff of Darkness

mud.name: Star Wars: Legacy
mud.desc: We're back! After some server issues, we're up and running once again with a slightly new timeline as follows:
140 ABY - PrimeTech Industries and the Galactic Consortium emerge as potential rivals for the New Galactic Empire's rule. A galactic cold war begins between the three.

150 ABY - Various attacks and threats occur between the three major factions. No one is claiming responsibility for the attacks, despite evidence pointing towards each other as being the culprit. Tension begins to mount, and one wrong move could throw the galaxy into a conflict unlike any it would ever have seen before...

So come on in! Get involved in the plot and shape the galaxy! Will you be the hero or the villain? Will you try to save the galaxy, destroy it, conquer it, or are you just trying to get by in the constant turmoil?
Whatever your choice, its within your grasp! So come on and be a part of the legacy, Star Wars: Legacy!

mud.name: Raptured Souls
mud.desc: In a time when chaos reigned and bodies burned. Death and destruction had all but consumed what was left of this desolate wasteland. It would take time. And it would take only the best to rebuild. But it would have to embrace death before it gave life. Sirus and Gromald founded the land on their journey away from the nightmares. But deep down, somehow those nightmares crept through the silence of slumber. For every now and then, even they were taken back to the place.. Their journey to this land was not a lonely one for long. For others began to appear before them in this land. They had heard of this place on the whisper of the wings of evil creatures that embraced the night. It was not long after that Kaelex and Ella joined their ranks. Rising quickly to the stature of an Immortal. Sirus and Gromald knew they had made wise choices. Carefully they watched, dedication was definately a plus. Loyalty a must. Death was just a bonus. Purgatory would be their judgement. Justice their executioner. For now they walked amungst the RAPTURED SOULS...

-Multi planes for exping (size of player dependant) -Group exp -Arena system -Unique quest system -Original and custom classes -Several options for bridding/multiclassing available. -Unique death system -Credit system -Bloodhunt, Armageddon and Bounty -Trivia system and Token Quest

mud.name: Godwars A Moment Of Hatred
mud.desc: A Moment Of Hatred is based of the Crusade codebase. For those of you who are not familiar with the Crusade, it's better known as Planes of Hades. This mud is a traditional style godwars, you won't be maxxing in a days worth of time here. MoH is currently offereing the following classes: Demon, Drow, Highlander, Mage, Monk, Ninja, Vampire, and Werewolf. Please know that there are requirements to get classed here. If you don't like to take a little time on your character this place isn't going to be for you. I'm offering a remort system which in time will allow all classes to have a secondary class. The mud title is based of the good old days when you and your buddies logged on a mud together and did a bunch of group player killing and status hording. A Moment Of Hatred. Give it a shot? Moment Of Hatred Staff

mud.name: Project Carthage
mud.desc: Imagine a world very similar to your own. Every day seeming normal, though under your feet takes place numerous feats of genetic engineering that borders on impossible.

Project Carthage takes place in a small suburb of Paris, France, centered around your average boarding school that houses many students. Whether it's the resident telekinetic student teacher, the teenager with the sonic vocal chords, or just your average resident psychic in town who's capable of so much more. Those who have been gifted with these powers have made it their duty to keep it all a secret for fear of a violent backlash against the French government. For it has been their work over the past three decades that have fused various residents with these powers against their will. Of course none of this protects the public from the inevitable...

[PC] Welcomes all players through a relatively simplest Character Generation and admin-approval process. Power-enabled characters will be accepted through an approval process. Average characters are accepted following a fairly quick character review. Characters ranging from 10 to 30 years of age accepted with exceptions given a thought out explanation.
Currently we are running open beta testing and welcome new players to join up. Check us out, give us your opinion. Try out a fresh new roleplay community. :)
Web: pc.servegame.org MUSH: pc.servegame.org:4201 Email: admin@pc.servegame.org

mud.name: The Oracle
mud.codebase: [GodWars] First authorised mud using Legend of Chrystancia code
mud.desc: The Oracle is based in the Legend of Chrystancia code from July 2006, this has been authorised by the creator of Legend of Chrystancia, Tijer.
The mud currently offers all the classes which LoC had, but also a whole range of new hybrids are currently being tested.
We are recoding how hybrids work, and also the class powers, as they were done in a \"quick fix\" way before.
More details to follow.
Graham - Owner of The Oracle

mud.name: Fate of Kingdoms
mud.desc: Your allies have pledged their lives to your cause, and stand ready for war. What will your next move be? You can wield great magical power...energy to heal or destroy souls. A long journey on the path from common mortal to uncommon glory lies before you. The Fate of Kingdoms rests in the palm of your hand. Is that hand the fist of war, or the outstretched palm of peace?

Fate of Kingdoms is a MUD with a long history, having been online and running since 1997. The game is now up, back online, and actively seeking new adventurous souls! Fate of Kingdoms is beloved by players who have made this MUD their home for many years...some for well over a decade! We offer 18 fully playable classes, as well as 17 races; each with their own unique racial ability. It's good to be king, right? Well, grab some friends and work up a roleplay! You have the ability to forge your own mighty Kingdom and take over areas in the game to gain some hard-earned tax money.
Fate offers a relaxed atmosphere that also rewards good roleplay. Our staff is dedicated to honoring the MUDs past and taking it into a new future -- one that hopefully includes YOU!

mud.name: Moral Decay
mud.desc: Moral Decay is an advanced fantasy LPMUD. Its main features include:

* A detailed, limb-based combat system * A dynamic, player-run economy featuring 6 available types of businesses * Eight interesting and diverse classes * Weapon and non-weapon skills, trained through use * Racial language system, also trainable through use * Wide variety of original areas, including six major cities * Built-in party system to allow player cooperation * Player Killing allowed, but discouraged... not a PK-wild mud * Experienced players willing to help newbies get started * Well-established environment: Moral Decay was started in 1992 * Lots of fun!

mud.name: Revolution
mud.desc: We are a general themed mud. We have been developing for at least 3 years now and would like you to come and check it out. Give us your input or even join the team.
Trimaster

mud.name: Dragon Realms
mud.desc: Dragon Realms, the popular Australian MUD, was created in 1995 by Topaz, Elwyn, Scarabae and a host of others. We went off line in 2000, to concentrate on careers, family and life in general.

The game is well developed with dozens of totally original areas that you will not find on any other mud. All of the areas relate to the Dragon Realms world and its story. The game heavily emphasises roleplaying, rather than hack-n-slash. Most areas have challenging quests.
Dragon Realms differs from many other MUDs because of its focus on roleplay. It attempts to create the experience of table top roleplaying games, in an online environment.

It rewards good characterisation and story creation, and tries to have a consistent fantasy theme with rich world history. Players who prefer pkilling or min-max style gaming will probably find the game unsuitable.
All of the areas relate to the Dragon Realms world and its story. The game heavily emphasises roleplaying, rather than hack-n-slash. Most areas have challenging quests.

mud.name: Dopewars
mud.desc: Dopewars is a very unique mud that offers players a modern day theme complete with cell phones, drugs, cops, organized crime, a judicial system, a space program for exploring other planets, and more! The code base has been completely rewritten. Other ways to pass time on the MUD include sniper, taxi driver, ambulance, drug truck driver and police missions. There are also a wide variety of sports that we have incorporated into this unique world. We have set up a newbie area that has a walkthrough on the web page to assist people that are new to this MUD as well as MUD's in general. This is a MUD that is currently like no other. So, stop in and say hello to the owners Ominous, Kage, Leer and Raven. See you online soon!

mud.name: Forgotten Dungeon
mud.desc: The best PK-World, based on russian language

mud.name: Battlestar Cerberus
mud.desc: Based on the Battlestar Galactica series.

mud.name: Transformers Mush
mud.desc: After crashing on Earth millions of years ago, the Autobots and Decepticons lie dormant until an earthquake in the year 2009 reactivates them. As their struggle begins anew, the opposing forces waste no time in trying to adapt to life on a new world. Led by Optimus Prime, the Autobots do their best to stop Megatron's forces while still keeping their existence secret. With the dawning of 2010, the battle continues unabated, with Earth caught in the middle.

Come join us at Transformers MUSH. We offer a unique take on Feature Characters with updated alternative modes while still keeping to the early cast of the Generation 1 cartoon. Original characters are welcome; we have a broad range of abilities and attacks from which to choose. Stop by and check us out; we look forward to seeing you.

mud.name: Cabulka Cabulsa
mud.desc: Anatolia 3.0 tabanlý Türkçe Mud. ---------------------------- A Turkish Mud based on Anatolia 3.0.

mud.name: The Cortex
mud.desc: The Cortex - An unending stream of information, flowing through the 'Verse. Data, images, pictures, money, lives. All affected by the ebb and flow of the Waves floating across the Black. It has been five years since the events of 'Serenity'. Life goes on for the citizens of the 'Verse, much as before. Ships fly, their owners keeping themselves free and in the skies. Ranchers Farm, and Soldiers patrol the spacelines. Life in the Core is serene and peaceful. Life on the Rim is hard, but the rewards are still there. As for that broadcast? Well, Alliance says it was just a hoax, a bad piece of propaganda from some Browncoat sympathizers, holdouts from the War. Sure, 'twas an amusing piece of tall tale, but them Reavers ain't human. No way, no how. Certainly, not even the Alliance could be that Evil. --- The Cortex is an open RPG server, where players can roleplay out life in Joss Whedon's Firefly/Serenity Universe. Five years after \"The Signal\" was sent out, the 'Verse still has plenty of adventure for the people who want to reach out and grab it. The Cortex uses a unique RP-based Economy. The more you RP, and the more RP you generate for others, the more Karma you generate for yourself, allowing you to control a bit of the 'Verse. Karma can be used to acquire equipment, vehicles, or even your own Spaceship, as well as many other activities. A simple skill-based system allows for the guidance and resolution of conflicts, allowing players to not have to worry about 'stat buffing'. The FreeFORM2 RPG System is designed for high adventure, as well as small character-interaction-based roleplay.

mud.name: Medieval Times MUD
mud.codebase: [Circlemud] [Circlemud heavily modified with an SQL backend]
mud.desc: Welcome to Medieval Times, where magic users and melee types come together to defeat powerful dragons, grand wizards, and the evilest demons known to the land. Medieval Times has pure and hybrid classes, like Psionist or Necromancer which can become a Mindflayer or Death Mage and races, we have a physical and elemental damage system, trade type skills, auctioning system, Arena-type battlefield, ANSI color, 100's of unique zones, millions of NPCs, AI scripts that interact with players, gem socketing, level based armor and weapons, along with class and race restrictions and bonuses. We have a remort system where as a level 50 mortal, you may choose to remort, starting back at level 1 but you now can achieve level 100 (Hero), gain your skills back at a sooner level, acquire new skills, and special rage attacks and defenses at 50+. We here at MT love ANSI graphics and provide a unique coloring display designed to enhance your playing experience. You can also do much more than hack and slash, we incorporate mob classification and random items are dropped that can be used in certain trade skills and quests. There is a newbie automatic quest system that has been recently overhauled and is tailored specifically for the new player. Any player that completes the quests is rewarded with experience points as well as beginner equipment. They will also gain the invaluable knowledge on basic commands and resources available throughout the MUD. It is a great way to jumpstart a character! Come conquer our realm!

mud.name: FurryFaire
mud.desc: FurryFaire is a 100% anthro, middle-ages roleplaying MUCK. It uses a unique roleplaying system, allowing character growth and flexibility. Players can choose from a variety of races, groups, nations, and magical styles, granting them plenty of options for character design.

mud.name: HeroMUD
mud.desc: HeroMUD is based in the fantasy world of Eluna, a huge planed filled with life of all shapes and sizes. 18 major cities span 12 countries and 3 continents. Some countries are peace-loving republics and other countries are power-hungry dictatorships, while yet other countries cover everything in between. ---------------------------------------------------------------------- HeroMUD puts world-changing decisions in the player's hands. 3 main story lines hold endless possibilities for the world of Eluna. 1.) As two countries wage war, the player must choose which country to side with and which country to oppose. Or the player can choose to remain neutral in the war, and watch the warring countries tear each other apart. 2.) Cataclysmic events are occuring all across Eluna. Long dormant volcanoes have begun to erupt again, the trees have begun to sing a song of mourning, and the stones of Eluna have begun to rattle under the feet of man. The race is on to uncover the source of these events and, if possible, put an end to that source. 3.) Reports of pirate attacks have begun coming in at an ever increasing rate. The Port Authority, based in Vorrell City (the capital of the strictly neutral country of Vorrell), have almost completely shut down ocean travel. Eluna's seaports are outraged and have begun hiring mercenaries to deal with the Pirate menace. In order to deal with the mercenary threat, the Pirate clans have begun to enlist new members in their ranks. Which side will be victorious? ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Though HeroMUD is but a fledgling MUD and wholy unfinished, the staff at HeroMUD work vigilantly to increase the size of Eluna. As of the post date, the world is hardly habitable. Perspective builders and coders are more than welcome to stop by and have a look.

mud.name: The Secret of Atlas
mud.codebase: [Mordor] Heavily modified based on Mordor v3.0
mud.desc: Unlock the secret of atlas, a virtual world filled with magic and intrigue. The secret of atlas is a total immersion role playing game, set in Medieval times, that is unlike other Multi-User-Dungeons (MUDs). We are sure you will see why many players have been with the game for over a decade!

We try to make Atlas as enjoyable as possible for everyone. Atlas is a PG-13 world, which enables people of all ages to partake in the fun. Individuals from around the world gather in Atlas, without language barriers or negative responses.

Choose from different classes, such as Bard, Mage, Cleric, Ranger, Barbarian and Vampire, each with their own unique abilities. Learn spells that can potentially immolate your victim, or heal you instantaneously. Purchase a shop to sell novelties, or even buy the virtual home of your dreams. Your destiny awaits!

mud.name: Smaug Building Institute
mud.desc: The Smaug Institute is a place where anyone can come and learn how to build in Smaug. Simply sign up and we give you an Immortal character with a new area. While we will not teach you it step-by-step, we are here to answer any questions you have with building. We provide many links to Smaug building guides. You teach yourself Smaug OLC at your own pace, and no prior knowledge is required to join.

mud.name: Earth 2246 - Rise of the Dark Ages
mud.desc: The year is 2246. A strife contrast to the 21st century and the return of magic in 2012. The Earth has been ravaged with war, pollution and new terminal retroviruses. People look for hope in the cosmos, fleeing the world of their ancestors. The newly terraformed Mars, is one of these so-called havens but is strife with Terran Union oppression and whispers of rebellion are in the air. Information is power now that many of the technologies and wisdom have been lost to the ages of violence. Will you be a glimmer of hope in this broken world or will you take advantage and make profit off its toxic state? The choice is yours.

We are a very new MUD, still in alpha stages. Player testing won't be open till beta. I'm very serious about this MUD and hope to provide a fun and engaging environment, loaded with thrilling RP story arcs and grueling player versus player action, player ran governments, space colonies, armies and planetary city states. Hiring all positions! I need a devoted team that will be determined as I am to make this game happen. Builders and Coders Wanted! Apply by email - tylerwillcutyou@hotmail.com or AIM - Hakosho

mud.name: The PrideLand Chronicles
mud.desc: It is the end of an era. The evil tyrant Scar has been overthrown, and the dry season has passed. The Pridelands are once again a rich paradise, and King Simba and Queen Nala have begun their rightful rule in a time of peace - with a pair of lovely new cubs. The Circle of Life is complete once more.

However, not all is perfect under the sun. Beyond the northern borders, the shadowy places look more menacing than ever. The Graveyard hyenas have lost their reign over the lush Pridelands, betrayed by their former ally, and they've got a bone to pick with Simba. And with the death of Scar, a new queen has risen among the ranks of his followers who were banished to the barren Outlands with only one thing on her mind - revenge.

Following the majesty of the original film, The PrideLand Chronicles MUCK begins where The Lion King left off, allowing for an open slate for the continuation of the stories and characters of the Pridelands. Will Zira succeed in her vengeful mission, or is Kovu destined to fall in love with Kiara? Will you play a happy Pridelands cub, a disgruntled hyena, or perhaps even one of the original movie characters? The choice is yours!

mud.name: Eternal Battlegrounds
mud.desc: I started Eternal Battlegrounds because i was tired of playing muds with bad immortals and players. If you want to have fun pking with people and a great staff then this is for you, we have many classes and new areas and equipment. Please stop by and check us out.
Cirith, Owner

mud.name: Dragon
mud.desc: Dragon is a very old mud, founded 5 July 1991 at RWTH Aachen. We began as an AberIV, but changed to Dyrt around 1994. In 1999, we moved from Germany to the UK. In 2005, we moved to the US.

Many may have assumed Dragon was dead and gone, but we have been online more or less continuously, in one form or another, and we have no plans to close. If you have found this listing, then you have found a real relic from the heyday of text muds.
The mud will most likely be empty, but please feel free to come in and have a look.
- Kenneach 7 June 2009

mud.name: 6 Dragons
mud.desc: 6 Dragons is a completely original high fantasy mud coded from the smaug code base. We have a friendly Staff that work for us, and we have something to offer for everyone. Whether it be monster bashing, player killing, trade skills, role playing, or one of our hundreds of quests.
We are addictive as anything you have tried! But don't just take our word for it, check out our reviews:
Player Albrecht says, 'I knew 6 Dragons was different from the moment I logged on. The game pops at you with interactivity and flavor.'

Player Sarkai says, 'Looking for a mud you can call “home”? Looking for a place that offers something new? How about a mud that is constantly improving? How about a mud that welcomes new players, and values them greatly? Well, look no further! You have found your new home.'
Player Payle says, 'While I have just started on 6 Dragons, I have really enjoyed my experience and found it to be very unique when compared to other muds.'
Player Vagnor says, 'The first thing that caught my eye was the very interactive and original tutorial system. It is actually the only tutorial I have ever fully enjoyed and haven't skipped. :P'

mud.name: Viva Mud
mud.desc: its gonna have 50 classes 20 races 2000 skills 10000 equipment

mud.name: Death Rising II: A Darker Reality
mud.desc: Death Rising is a Fantasy/ Modern day mix where fun is the highest priority. A healthy mix of roleplay and hack'n'slash. Death Rising is still growing, and player ideas are always considered and frequently implemented. Player-kill (PK) is allowed and even encouraged.
Currently hiring builders and coders.

mud.name: Arcane Ages
mud.desc: A vast wasteland spreads out in all directions. Desert winds swirl restlessly, and the smell of death hangs heavily in the air. The ground has been churned and spoiled, stained red and green from battle. Hacked and bloody corpses litter the landscape like broken dolls, and five weary figures emerge, victors perhaps. Five explorers from five different walks of life, with five different allegiances, become comrades in arms from necessity. Exhausted from battle, injured, their magical reserves low, they cautiously explore this land. Heliav, Spyro, Valerian, Kaji, and Sheean, a motley crew at best. Interested in playing a starring role in this storyline? Then come visit us. Whether your interests are warriors, thieves, wizards, clerics, or something else entirely, we have something for you. With one of the most diverse codebases and worlds in existence, you are guaranteed to find a home with us. 99 mortal levels, 20 hero levels, 20 avatar levels, and 10 celestial levels leave lots of room for you to grow. So come make your mark on the world.

mud.name: TwistedMUCK
mud.desc: Formerly known as ChronoMUCK, our game's world was expanded beyond the simple world of Chronos. It is now a massive number of fully conceived worlds with Twisted Street as it's hub. Players can create characters and live out their lives on worlds and universes complete with rich histories and unique locations, or go out and discover the vast existence around them. Twisted is a place where worlds and universes connect and almost anything can happen. However, it's not all a free ticket. Certain worlds are isolated until they reach a level where they can join the rest of the multi-verse. Characters traveling back and forth between these worlds have to deal with forces like TASK, who dedicate themselves to preserving the integrity of these worlds to keep contamination to a minimum. Even the forces of Hell have recently tried taking control of Twisted Street to plunge it's inhabitants into their dark secretive plans. With so many stories, worlds, and characters at their disposal, the players imaginations are free to run wild and no one is left alone and in the cold. For more details about the places and people of Twisted simply visit our website or log on and speak with any of our helpful staff. Remember, there's a million stories to be told. It's up to you to write yours...

mud.name: Hrielith
mud.desc: Hrielith is an all-orginal world, lovingly handcrafted during over 45,000 man hours of development. We are huge role-playing enthusiasts, and encourage as well as reward imaginative role-playing. Our system is unique, and very engaging, allowing for in-room movement, which adds new dimensions to combat and exploration. We offer a wonderful and supportive player environment, and will reward common players who role-play well with homes in the primary city. Hrielith's plot is deep and unique, as you will see when you examine the player guide and story pages. High-fantasty RP in a carefully handcrafted environment gives you the opportunity to deeply explore your own role-playing passions!
We encourage new players, and have a long history of supporting text-based environments over image-based environments because the text-based model actually -encourages- imagination and role-playing.
We look forward to seeing you online, and would be very excited to hear from those interested in joining our project as players, immortals, builders, or coders.

********************************************************* * ~*~ Hrielith ~*~ * * Purpose: The creation of a working virtual world where * * living systems can be explored, built upon, and evolve; * * where players can interact with and learn from these * * sentient systems, and understand the vital connectivity * * shared by all; where magic (in the form of communities) * * can be created in a haven of creativity and heartful * * co-operation. Where we re-discover the miracles we are. * * ~*~ Are you ready? ~*~ * *********************************************************
PS: Our server is a lineage child of Mordor and Aalynor's Nexus...

mud.name: Harry Potter MUD
mud.desc: A full feature MUD.

mud.name: Between Darkness and Light
mud.desc: Between Darkness and Light MUX (BDnL) The year is 2005, and the world that surrounds you is not far removed from that which you see around you every day. International concerns like terrorism, global warming, ecological and economic dangers and disasters shape everything and everyone. Many look to the supposed glory of days past, and strive to recreate those times in a new climate, though they have little chance of success. Every individual is faced with the dilemna of choosing whether to embrace hope and strive for a better world, or to embrace the grit of realism and simply make due with the often shabby and sometimes painful truths of a world that can never live up to those ideals.

It has been decades since the world last saw those who dared to stand apart and try to change the course and fabric of humanity and history. Those who called themselves 'heroes' and 'heroines' ... and those who have been named by history as 'villains'. These figures who stood larger than life faded into obscurity, becoming little more than modern myth and legend despite the very real truth of their presence. And yet, rumors abound now, far more loudly than since the dark days of Hitler's rise to power long ago. Those rumors hint that other men and women, with powers and abilities beyond those of normal mortals, have returned to the world. And some are those who believe that it is these figures who may yet shape the next age of mankind.
It is a world torn between the Darkness and the Light. Which side will you choose?

BDnL MUX is a superheroic roleplaying environment, based on a near-real world, and including within its fabric characters from DC, Marvel, and other comics as well as selected other sources. We are starting with New York as our main campaign city, but we are open to expanding the grid to include other cities (including Gotham, Metropolis, Washington DC, and others) as the playerbase grows to support that expansion. Newly opened, most all of the Featured Characters are open for application, and we also strongly encourage original characters.

mud.name: Dragonball: The Forsaken Future
mud.desc: DBZ: TFF is set about 40000 years after the Kid Buu and ShadowDragon sagas of DBZ, set in the DBZ universe. New races from alternate universes have been found and are starting to live among the others more common to the DBZ universe. I'm not really good with descriptions so the best thing i can tell you about it is to just come and try us out. We are very newbie friendly and are already Fully Operational..

mud.name: Godwars: Lords of Death
mud.desc: CLASSES: Angel Drow Monk Ninja Samurai Tanar'ri Werewolf Vampire UndeadKnight Demon Jedi Sith Wraith Dragon Wizard

With more to come. We are a newly opened mud with only a couple players who have been around since the beginning as testers. We are now fully open and functional with openings for experienced Coders, Builders, Enforcers, and Public Relations personel as well as players. Stop in and hang out and if you enjoy yourself invite your friends for a free for all killing spree. I personally am on quite a bit and will be willing to help you with anything I can as long as it is not asking for a handout :P everyone earns their killing stripes on their own in my world but if you have questions feel free to ask myself or Jamie if you see him around. All applications are to be submitted in a note for those of you potential Imms. Note me with a personal note with the following information..
Real Name: Age: Years Mudded: Position Desired: Previous Experience: Mud References:(muds you formally helped work on) Any Additional Info you think I may need:
Note all of the above to me and I will read it and get back to you within a couple days and get back to you in a note of my own.
Thank you all ahead of time and I hope to see you and your friends shortly, my name is Monoxide.

mud.name: Hapes Consortium on LotJ
mud.desc: The Hapes Consortium on LotJ Decades ago, the Lorell Raiders roamed the space routes, seizing Republic vessels and ransacking Republican worlds. Among the wealth stolen were select woman who were the most beautiful and tallented of the human race. Having deposited the women on their hidden planet, the Lorell Raiders would leave for great lengths at a time to continue their raiding and pirating. The Captive women grew independent, and began to crave their freedom. In time, they would come to plot and scheme against their captors, finding ways to relay messages to the core worlds and enlist the aid of outsiders in their fight for independence.

When the women were finally victorious over the oppresive Raiders, they formed the Hapes Consortium, a government ruled by women who vowed never to allow a man to rule over them again. They started out in ships left over from the uprising, and searched the Transitory Mists, combing every sector to see what else the pirates might have been hiding. To their delight, they found many planets with temperate atmospheres, all bearing natural resources and wealth beyond their wildest imaginations. The Hapan people divided themselves up into various houses from Royal, to Noble to Honorable, and settled themselves throughout the worlds. Over time, they developed allies, and made enemies amongst themselves in their persuits to advance themselves and their families. While the threat from the Lorell Raiders was gone, their offspring flourished, secretly seeking dominance.

A note from the Staff: The Hapes Consortium is a game within a game on Legends of the Jedi. The Consortium operates on an RP style that can best be described as a mix between a mush and a mud. The Hapes Consortium on LotJ is ideal for Star Wars and science fiction fans who enjoy the detailed storyline of a mush, and the action and adventure of a mud. The Hapes Consortium on LotJ is an adult only area where RP storylines are generally unrestricted. For this reason, an age minimum of 18 has been established. If you are younger than 18 years of age please consider our main game, Legends of the Jedi which operates on the same port. We are a player kill environment, but we require all player kills to be supported with a strong, well conceived RP cause. Restores are issued for any kill that does not meet the RP standards as determined by our player-elected Role Play Council (RPC).

Our Statistical Data is more accurately displayed below: - We are an SWR codebase, operating the HC on LOTJ as a blend between a MUSH and a MUD. - LotJ hosts up to 80 players at a time during evening, EST hours. The Hapes Consortium is expected to see between 5 and 15 players during evening EST hours.

mud.name: Star Wars Erotica
mud.desc: Currently in our testing phase, Star Wars Erotica plans on taking it's MUD to new heights. We are a dedicated Star Wars Mud, with a little extra flare. And I’m sure you can tell what that flare is, just from reading our name. Of course, like all muds..we have an abundance of races and classes from which to choose from. There are many clans for which you can join and experience many new things.

Atlhough there will be the normal RP (such as emote and the like), we have implemented a new channel of sorts, which is the Erotic RP channel or EP for short. You can use this channel to RP slavery, torture, and..the like. Or you can just use other channels, whichever you prefer. Should you wish to e-mail or notify us of these RP sessions, you will receive RP points. With these points, you can purchase things such as Special Equipment, Ships, and even your very own Asteroids which consist of around 20 rooms.
Because we are RP Enforced, it is required that you create for yourself both a biography and a description if you are over level 20.
While we are a flexible mud, we do not tolerate harassment and the act of forcing another OOCly to do something they do not wish to.

We are currently hiring people who are interested in being an Immortal (Buidling, Coding, and Enforcing). If you wish to become an Immortal, please either log onto the mud and make a request directly, or send us an e-mail.
We are also open to as well as welcome new ideas and suggestions that you may have for us. Or if you require further information on our mud or have anything else to say, please email us or log on.

mud.name: Utopia Type-Final
mud.codebase: [GodWars] Very unique, heavily modified, fast-paced. Nothing like original GodWars, at all.
mud.desc: It's true! Read on! Chrasilis has set up the newest version of the Utopia source code to bring to you one of the most fast-paced, pick up and play, extensive PK MUDs ever to exist! A truely customizable masterpiece, Utopia will have you scratching your head for hours trying to decide what type of character to build! Then, when you've finally built it, Utopia offers many hours of endless, fast-paced player killing with a very experienced fanbase. The MUD is very newbie friendly with it's extensive newbie helpfiles. The fanbase is always willing to help a new player learn. Simply ask a question and it will be answered as soon as possible, assuming anyone who may help you is on at the time. Both the old vets and the future newbies: Stop by and check it out! I guarantee you'll have a blast!
-Utopia Staff
Base Classes: 8 Specialize Classes: 17 Ascend Classes: 31 Total: 56
There may very well be more classes on the way. For that, you'll have to play and see what the future holds.
That enough for ya? Stop by and find out for yourself.
UPDATE: BACK AND AT IT AGAIN! As of December 2nd, 2007, Chrasilis has YET AGAIN Resurrected Utopia! Log on and join in on the fun! We need our fans back, as well as new players!

mud.name: Ultraviolence
mud.desc: Ultraviolence is a pure player kill mud. Medieval ideas of levels, classes, and races are completely dispensed with and replaced with guns, explosives, and a focus on pure violence and destruction. Players log on and are randomly assigned to a blue or red team. The objective is to capture the flag of the opposing team, killing members of the opposite team who get in your way while avoiding being killed. Players navigate a randomly generated maze filled with weapons, ammunition, bombs, and random mobiles and other players out to kill you. Once the goal is achieved (the flag is captured) the game resets. While the game is conceptually simple, there is a deeper level of strategy beneath the surface. Whether you choose to focus on playing as a lone warrior with a big gun or a suicide bomber out to take as many with you as you can is up to you.
Ultraviolence is based in design on a much older game called Ground Zero, although it was recoded from scratch. Source code for the game will be ultimately available.

mud.name: Azeroth
mud.desc: Azeroth was created based on the input of many experienced players and will continure to run that way until it dies.
Pure playability is the key goal of Azeroth. With a unique dual class and remort system hundreds of character templates can be discovered, each with thier own skills, spells and combat systems.
Azeroth is currently in play test stages, and welcomes new and experienced coder, builders and players to share thier ideas of what makes the perfect mud.

mud.name: Adventurers Alley
mud.desc: Adventurers Alley has all stock rom areas, added Lopes colour, added ranged weapons, added Mounts, and a whole lot of extras. Housing for the players. Players can go upto Bob Vela and purchase a home. While in their home they can purchase a NPC for their home. Come and check it out. What will it hurt?
Also I am looking for some experienced builders with experience with OLC with MOBPROGs. Drop me an Email at sysop@ratsnest.synchro.net.
Again I am looking for some experienced Coders with experience with ANSI C. If your interested in coding for a new MUD in town drop me a Email sysop@ratsnest.synchro.net.

I will also start a message area on my website so folks don't have to use the online editor in the MUD to write messages. Just get on your favorite web browser and goto ratsnest.synchro.net logon and go into the message areas look for General and then look for Adventurers Alley Message Sub. You can type a message to me through this message area via HTTP or logon to my BBS via telnet ratsnest.synchro.net port 23.
Come and be part of a new MUD and a fresh beginning. See ya there!

mud.name: Unknown
mud.desc: Well I am just getting started, so there isn't much to say at the moment. Ive begun reworking a few small things atm; I reduced exp, but also removed the group exp penalty. Hopefully, this will encourage players to group together in order to tackle harder monsters for greater rewards. I've also begun working on the classes, and am going to try to work together some semblance of balance, even though we all know that it is almost not even worth trying for these sorts of codes :P As always, player feedback will help the most with this process.
Basically, if you enjoyed playing mindcloud, you will find the same environment here at the moment. However, stop by and leave me some feedback, and we'll see what we can do with this place.
I am only hiring builders at the moment, in order to help expand the world a bit, and create some sort of

mud.name: Omphalos
mud.desc: Omphalos is a vaguely classical-era mush. It's a reconstruction of the Mediterranean area and beyond. It's currently in its infancy: but we're looking for new builders and new friends. You can build or roleplay anything or anyone from 10,000 BC up to around the end of the Steam Era. Omphalos is for those who love text, geography and the sense of times past. Oh, and we like a joke too.

mud.name: The Worlds of Katarra
mud.desc: The Worlds of Katarra is a free MUD.
Focusing on the planets orbiting the star Katarra, everyday life is rarely simple.
Explore the jungle-laden planet of Viridis and come face-to-face with its natives, the Gahreia and the Aellirin.
If the fires that tempt you, head to Coniecto and meet the Oryne and the Wahfertin.
The icy planet of Kaldur offers the Yeslehc and the Hydraumi for company.
Provectus harbours technology unmatched, courtesy of the Prescient and Covozak.
Atran is shrouded in darkness, inhabited by the virus-ridden Dirth and the Havlin.
Bellator lacks the means to sustain life on the surface, hence the underground-dwelling Kernai and Krothen.
Batai is a planet central to all, home of the near-extinct, yet immeasurably powerful Vox, whose bitterness is exceeded only by their wrath.
So come and being your adventure, and leave your stamp on the history of Katarra...
We are currently looking for programmers. Email Zelig@Katarra.net if interested.

mud.name: Planets: Rise to Power
mud.desc: Welcome to...
Planets: Rise to Power

This mud is newly launched, most every bug squashed but certainly not bug free by any means. I am opening my doors for player testing right now but I'm not against players casually role playing and developing planets for the future of the mud. I strongly believe in the potential behind SWR 2.0 and I hope to find others like minded in the future. Come make this mud your place to call home as I have and endure the hardships of killing hordes of aliens as they attack planets, join a clan and soldier on through the ranks killing the foul scourge that plagues each planet every so often. Become an architect and shape the very landscape you walk on, or a weapon smith and create better and more deadly weapons for soldiers to mow down aliens with. Assassinate the leader of some other clan or take on a bounty and track them down across the galaxy gloriously severing their head from their body. Many opportunities can arise in a world completely player created you just have to show up and contribute your part to the cause or simply add to the role playing atmosphere if you feel you don't have a creative bone in your body. In any case you are bound to have fun whatever you decide to do!
-Dream, Planets: Rise to Power Admin.

mud.name: Realms of the Blood Sea
mud.desc: RBS is based on ADR 2.5b which was derived from ROT. The stock Aadarian Realms areas have been removed and are currently being replaced. We are looking for builders and beta test players to add valuable input. RBS will have two seperate worlds: one holy world and one evil world seperated by the impassable (supposedly) Blood Sea. 106 levels, 10 tiers, 9 classes, plenty of races. Please stop by and help out if you have time :)

mud.name: Realms of the Blood Sea
mud.desc: RBS is based on ADR 2.5b which was derived from ROT. The stock Aadarian Realms areas have been removed and are currently being replaced. We are looking for builders and beta test players to add valuable input. RBS will have two seperate worlds: one holy world and one evil world seperated by the impassable (supposedly) Blood Sea. 106 levels, 10 tiers, 9 classes, plenty of races. Please stop by and help out if you have time :)

mud.name: Star Wars: Insurgency
mud.desc: Three years after the Death Star was destroyed in the Yavin system, the Empire struck back dealing a heavy blow to the Rebellion by destroying one of their primary bases on Hoth. With the rebel leadership scattered and their fleet on the run in deep space, the Galactic Empire has bought themselves time to finish construction of their newest secret weapon in the Endor system.

All is not lost for the rebellion though, as support for the rebels grows by the day amongst those who have felt the cold oppression of the Empire as it tries to maintain order. Will you join the insurgency and fight for freedom, or fight to maintain order and preserve the Galactic Empire?

Welcome to Star Wars: Insurgency. On SW:I, you become part of the tapestry that is the original era of Star Wars. You can pick your side - The Galactic Empire, which controls most of the galaxy, the Rebellion, which has supporters everywhere or just do it for the cold hard feel of credits. Your destiny - and ultimately, the fate of others, is in your own hands
Insurgency is a heavily modified SWR, with thousands of changes compared to the stock codebase. Previously, the MUD was known as Rogue Threat/Time of Darkness (2002-2006).

Below are some of the changes compared to stock * Custom Space System - One complete universe - Ship parts system - Hull breach system - Better be wearing a flight suit if you get into battle - Navicomp - Hidden star systems - Much much more
* Faction Points for the Rebels/Empire - More renown as a rebel / imperial - Mobs will act different towards you
* Slicer class
* Many planets
* Major code changes planned for future patches

mud.name: Startrek chaos abound
mud.desc: Its just after the war witht he founders. The federation for the most part has fallen. Also now there is a power struggle between the empires. They are fighting for control for the now unclaimed areas. Also at this time, the vulcans and romulans have unified.
Now hiring builders and coders, player creations isn't ready. Please come and help this game be one of the best. Also any other staff is needed.

mud.name: Phidar
mud.desc: Phidar is a fantastic MUD with a rich history that is trying to revitalize a somewhat entrenched, but newbie friendly, playerbase. It has a phenomenal amount of quests built into zones, a system that is both cooperative and competitive. Come try us out!

mud.name: Dragonball Z: Battle of the Clans
mud.codebase: [Smaug] DBNA1.7(DBZBOTCv1 moderately modified code, stock areas)
mud.desc: Me and Zaphyre have been hard at work making alot of changes lately like critical damage,customized pl ranks, several bug fixes, etc.. We are currently going through balancing races and adding new attacks, etc. Much more to come but we are in dire need of builders to help revamp the areas. We are always accepting new ideas and we will be putting much more in. A few things to come are a gravity system, a better balanced combat system(rather then purely focusing on PL stats will have a more signifant outcome), Weapon type/detailed fighting stance specialization, and clans! Stop on in and be a part of history in the making! If you any chance you are looking to build and i'm not on the MUD, you can leave me a gnote or contact me at email/MSN messenger j_miller8809@yahoo.com.
-Faton

mud.name: Gamma World
mud.desc: The world used to be a paradise. The sages say everyone had plenty of food, and robots that served their every need, from cleaning to picking the fleas off of people. No one was ever sad, as wondrous medicine kept everyone happy. Coke, Pepsi, Starbucks, and the rest of the pantheon of gods watched over everyone, but every person were as gods themselves. This came to an end. No one remembers precisely how. Most agree there was a war, even though nobody know what it was fought over, or who participated in it, but what precisely ended it all remains a mystery. Weapons of mass destruction? Climate changes? Massive pollution? Robot or genetically engineered slave rebellion? Terrorists? Crazy artificial intelligence? Invading aliens? No one knows, although it's pretty certain it featured some really awesome explosions. Even so, there were survivors. Nobody knows how long ago the apocalypse took place, but the world has begun to heal. A few cities have even been formed, and technological progress is finally being made once again. Why, your grandfather might remember a time when people had to hunt with bow and arrow, but this new fangled black powder is really the bee's knees. Even so, the world hasn't escaped the ravages of the End yet. Pure humans are few, with a far greater amount of mutants around, but even sentient plants and animals exist. Artifacts from the Ancients still appear from time to time, bringing with them wealth and prosperity or death and destruction.

Welcome to Gamma World. We're a new MUX based on Gamma World 4th Edition. The first real post apocalyptic RPG to be published, inspiring many of the RPGs and CRPGs that followed. Still, you youngsters can just think of it as \"you know, sorta like Fallout.\" The MUX is centered around Glowtown, a town near the nation of Bonparr. You can play a pure human, altered human, mutated animal or a sentient plant. Venture into the wasteland to encounter metaphors of the dangers of technological progress, and then shoot them for XP and domar.

mud.name: Multiverse Crisis MUSH
mud.desc: Twelve years ago, reality came crashing down around our respective ears. All of our ears. And never stopped. Thousands of possible universes merged; forming a new reality. A vast world, composed of countless millions of Earths and other worlds linked from horizon to horizon; oceans and jungles the size of planets, and new and incomprehensible laws of physics at every turn. But such drastic changes do not come without social upheaval, plunging the world into a war between two supernations. The Union, dedicated to preserving the rights of its citizens, and the Confederacy, determined to unite all of existence under a single flag. Its own flag, of course.

Multiverse Crisis MUSH is open for applications. A multi-theme environment which allows most series, including non-canon variants, to be applied for. Using a power-scaling system which levels out the playing field, television, anime, video games, books, movies and more are all allowed. Come and pick up the character you've always wanted, pick up an original character, or feel free to explore the concepts of 'what if' within a series. If you're tired of what's out there, want something interesting and new, want an active RP community, or want to bring your unique or underused theme or idea to light, give us a try.

mud.name: Star Trek: A Fury Unleashed
mud.desc: UPDATE: November 2009 - WE'RE BACCCKKKK
