After a rather extended hosting struggle, we're back in business. We're looking for coders and builders to help us get this MUSH started. -- Welcome to Star Trek: A Fury Unleashed.
This is not your typical TrekMUSH. We cater to the... less noble... among us and the deviant inside of us.

Starfleet now polices the quadrant's warp corridors, struggling to bring back the glory days of free passage and grand exploration. Independents -- some with good and some with bad -- intentions roam the galaxy, flaunting Starfleet's perceived authority.
Our philosophy promotes heavier use of space and econ systems, combined with heavier interaction between factions, alliances, and organizations.

To thrive on your own here you MUST understand that there is a risk. More space traffic and more fractured population groups means more chance for combat, argument, and debate, which we hope you interpret as enjoyment. Other TrekMUSHes can be sterile at times with lots of downtime, minimal risk, and TPs that all feel the same. Here we want you to create your own MP (Mega Plot) and do what YOU want to do and have other people adapt around it. Let chaos run rampant... everybody deserves to have fun and break out of the box that typical faction admins constrain them to.

mud.name: Kindred Spirits
mud.desc: Kindred Spirits is a Rot 1.4 codebase that begun in 2002 and had a long run with a loyal group of players.
Resurrected by the original owner Belmakor, Kindred Spirits is back and fully functional once again.
Kindred Spirits offers 20 classes split between 2 tiers and each class has been completely upgraded and tested to create a fully balanced world.
We also offer 23 finely balanced races each with their own unique abilities.

There is so much to keep a player occupied from automated quests to a wide variety of challenging areas full of specialized equipment that the only thing left to do is login and enjoy the world for yourself.

mud.name: Godwars: Saints from Shadows
mud.desc: Back online 3/2007 after a short hiatus...players are all starting fresh, so now is the time to come claim your glory!
A Features of Godwars: Saints from Shadows
*Classes include hellhound, dark elf, highlander, monk, mage, dragon, ninja, werewolf
*Most classes have been recoded all new angel coming soon as well as others yet to be disclosed.
*Classes are expanded with a remort system that allows you to gain all skills from up to 6 classes.
This makes pk based more on skill rather than just chosing the right class. It inherently balances the game. And because status is required to remort this also encourages pk.
*Forge system that allows players to use ore and gems to make some of the best equipment.
*Training cells with trainmode, allows players to train without fear of pk.
*Legend system build your characters damcap and ammount of attacks with legend.
Legend requires quest points as well as status. Encourages both pk and questing this gives players other things to do than just hack and slash.
*Recently added kingdoms
*Active and experienced imm and coding team.

This isn’t a mud that you can max a character quickly. It takes some time but is well worth the effort. Current players are typically friendly and willing to help out. There are lots of new players joining and staying.
Come check out the mud you won’t be disappointed

mud.name: Colorado Dreams
mud.desc: As a child, did you ever play cowboys and indians? Have you been fascinated with the outlaws of the old west? Have you ever dreamed of running from the law with a gang of outlaws? Dreamed of finding a gold mine and making it rich? Well, look no further. This is Colorado Dreams.
Colorado Dreams is centered around one town, Silver Creek, Colorado. Silver Creek is a small town in the mountains, about 80-90 miles north of Denver, which we may be adding sometime in the future.
So, come down and give us a visit. The staff is friendly and always ready to help.
- Charity and the rest of the Colorado Staff

mud.name: Nuclear Winter
mud.codebase: [Unknown] We are using NakedMud for our codebase. It has only very little mud functions, so it will
mud.desc: We are still in creation, so all the information you have read at the moment is what is planned.

Its many years in the future, the world has broken out into another world war. Can you help your country survive? Advance through the ranks of the military. Become a pilot, a spy, engineer, tank operator. Advance the ranks from Private to General. You will be able to command troops in battle, or retreat to safety. The decision is yours and yours alone.
We are currently hiring coders and builders. Because of what we have planned for this game we can use all the help we cant get.

mud.name: Extinction: The Next Age MUSH
mud.desc: Humankind has come close to its end many times throughout history. Ever since the invention of Nuclear weapons that became possible. Somehow we've been able to avoid that conflict.
In the near future.. we don't.
It is not known exactly how many thousand warheads detonated throughout the world. Humankind and much of the earth descended into a dark age like no other.

Only about 10 percent of the population has survived, however another species has arisen: Mutants. Such as the name suggests they were once indeed humans, however as generations began to pass.. It began doubtful that the two could co-exist peacefully.

In the middle of this survival between two species, a city located where Phoenix used to be, (Now called New Phoenix, or 'The Dome') as referenced by its large polycarbonate lead-lined glass geo-dome.
It is a place where humans did not have to adapt to the radiation but society indeed has changed... a virtual bee hive, each human given a task, each recieving all that they need to survive.
Outside the Dome lies Survivors, those who drift the desert looking for a better life, resistant against the radiation, due to their unique genes.

This is an original theme based on many of those games and movies that we love. Fallout, Judge Dredd, and Mad Max are all represented. Come join us. We are currently under construction, mostly for the combat/stat system.

mud.name: Novo Upanje
mud.desc: Interested in an open chargen nWoD game? Check out Novo Upanje. Not only is it open CG, it is even an open setting. PCs drive the setting's direction. Staff won't step in to protect a city from invaders, nor will staff step in and create peace. This World of Darkness is what you, the player, create. If it is a dark world with the various races at war with one another then it will be that way as players create this sort of World. If it is a World in which mortals globally discover they are not alone, then it will be due to player's actions working to expose the truth. No easy feat, but here on Novo Upanje anything is possible.

We even allow players to create new settings. What you see is not all that exists. If you have a vision of an nWoD setting, add it -- a new city, a park, whatever. How successful or large it becomes depends on you! Now after it is built, the Staff takes over the maintenance for the setting, so that everything remains in line with the rest of the game. This opens up the possibilities of settings to the imagination of all the players and allows the game to grow.

mud.name: CWG - Rasputin Beta Port
mud.desc: This is the live beta testing port of the popular CWG - Rasputin code. CWG is the Circle w/ Goodies project, and currently offers 3 different releases!

CWG - Rasputin is the latest project and is moving the CircleMUD code into the rules of the Open Gaming License, using the System Reference Document (v 3.5) as it's guidelines. We release updates to the code monthly, and this port is always running the current pre-release code for testing.
There is also a wealth of information and message boards to be found at http://cwg.lazuras.org

mud.name: Star Wars: Jedi vs Sith
mud.desc: A very long time ago, when the Sith were still in existance, they battled the Jedi for the universe. Destructive battles were faught against one-another destroying planets and huge ships. Unfortuneately...
That has not changed!!!
The Jedi Academy is open to all, and the Sith are corrupting all they can find to do their evil deeds. In this universe, no one is safe. Everything is possible and none shall survive in the end.

mud.name: Legend of the Green Dragon
mud.desc: Legend of the Green Dragon is a web-based multi-play game.

mud.name: Forbidden Dynasty II
mud.desc: This is my current project. This MUD already features: * New Classes coded from scratch. * Extended Random Loot tables. * An intricate Specialization system.

I am working on this project consistently. Adding new powers and fleshing out the current classes further. FDII is currently at a point where you can play in a very functional way, develop your character and gain your powers and as new ones becomes available you'll be able to gain them right away as well.

I am currently testing out quite a few things and am open to new and good ideas. If you have something you've wanted to see implemented stop by and chime in, if it fits the overall idea I have already then it's quite possible that I will implement it.

mud.name: Hexlan'
mud.desc: Hexlan' is a heavily modified Dawn of Time Codebase. You can expect to play without having to sleep all the time or be tired all the time. Roleplaying can be as simple as saying 'hello' as you pass by. You will not be put on stage and have a pressure performance. You do not have to talk in Medieval English. Adult content is dis- couraged on public channels but otherwise you are free. There is a three tiered Hero system: Hero level 151 Hero remort 1 level 161 Hero remort 2 level up to 1000 Area Count = 87 Unique Room count = 6145 Shop count = 218 Inn count = 5 Unique Mobile count = 2620 Mobile inuse count = 5538 Mobprog count = 994 Unique Object count = 4223 Help Entries count = 1076 Social count = 270 Type help class to see classes per remort. 18 classes, 12 hybrid classes. 29 races. Type raceskills. Features: Arena, auction, private channels, autoquest, scripted quests, duel system, clans, restring your own EQ at Hero, Guildmaster sends you to remort by request. Multiplaying allowed in Mekali city limits for EQ exchange. You are encouraged to make alts and they can aid your players but only within Mekali. You are not allowed to multi play when fighting. You must quit all but one. Most requests are taken seriously. Good ideas are appreciated. -Usually done with the note system. Come in, relax, and make yourself at home!

mud.name: Arcane Rift
mud.desc: We are currently closed to new players. We are still getting all coding and building done. Any who wish to apply may apply directly from our site. Once approved applicants will be allowed to create their immortal. We also provide our own OLC manual as well as have a message board. Please send all questions or concerns to Tzipphora or Alatar. Email listed above is Tzipphora's email. Alatar's email is: alpha0101010@hotmail.com.

mud.name: Prodigy Academy
mud.desc: Welcome once again to Prodigy Academy,where promising young minds are harnessed and molded to true greatness! You can now log into Prodigy Academy as a guest before choosing a character, to get yourself quainted with the place. Pueblo users connect on port 18009. Prodigy Academy is meant to be a drama, for you anime fans, think Please Save my Earth rather than Fist of the North Star or Dragonball. In other words, yeah, there's violence occasionally, but the point is how the students cope with their day to day lives in such an awful atmosphere. If you're logging in only to find yourself in bench clearing brawls or student rebellions every day, there's something wrong. And for those of you with an inkling to cause things like that, remember, the true point of a muck is to cultivate a good story, not prove your character is the best at everything.

mud.name: Endless Dreams
mud.desc: Come join us and help shape you're dream.

mud.name: A Kind of Magic MUSH
mud.desc: The Technocracy has control of Reality and you, Mage of the Traditions, must survive and strike back on your path towards Ascension. But will you make it or will you ally yourself with the Technocracy, become twisted by the Nephandi or worse?
The City awaits your arrival.
A Kind Of Magic utilizes a modified White Wolf system, Open CG (meaning there is no approval required for any character so long as they are Traditions (including Hollow Ones) or Orphan.)
A small background is required, mainly to allow our Storytellers to know what you're looking to play and get out of the RP experience.
At this time, we have fairly solid news files, Chargen works, the IC Grid is built out and the Umbra is coded.
The game will be ran in a 'Tabletop' fashion and our staff is comprised solely of Storytellers, whose job it is to run RP with the same responsibilities and latitudes as a 'Tabletop ST'.
We are in the process of assembling Storytellers for staff and are hiring. Apply by either emailing us at akindofmagicmush@gmail.com or visit us on-game.
Thanks for reading! We hope to see you on the game :)

mud.name: Knothole Kingdom
mud.desc: Way back in the day there was a MUCK by the name of Knothole Kingdom. There were those of us who went there for the fun and returned for the friends we made. And now there are those of us who wish to rebuild that which once was into something that can be once more. If you remember Knothole, send a message to the listed email. If you want to become a part of the new Knothole, just wait, we're working on bringing back as much as we can of the original. Stay tuned folks, Knothole Kingdom will live again.
A MU based on Sonic The Hedgehog.

mud.name: MalleableMud
mud.desc: MalleableMud is an entirely new breed of MUD. MalleableMud is Player-Driven. That is the players themselves control most aspects of the game in the game. The entire world has been built in game by players using building skills. Players also control every character in the game, from rats to Kings. All characters are playable. And you can also rise from janitor to King if you can make your way through the world. Players also control the

mud.name: Mudder Fuggers
mud.desc: Mudder Fuggers, the MUD where you can Fugg Mudders. We are a heavily rewritten CircleMUD so much so that the license for no pay-to-play allowed doesn't mean us! Yes, we really are that 1337ly coded! oneoneoneone111111!

<#!-- godwars d&d dungeons and dragons final fantasy phantasy star diablo darkness tolkien dragonlance wheel time epic best professional harry potter IRE Achaea Aeotolia RetroMUD Lusternia Imperian --#>

mud.name: FluxWorld
mud.desc: FluxWorld is a Futuristic Space Port and City set some 300 to 500 years in the future on a far away planet. Expect some alien artifacts to be laying around. (if not some aliens themselves)

The FluxWorld SpacePort itself is 5 stories tall internally, and there are many places to visit and things to find inside the SpacePort itself. There are also many other areas accessible from there (indoor and outdoor) Be SURE to think three-dimensionally as many things are as likely to be up or down as they are east, west, northeast, etc. There are other areas that are accessible only by ships on a river, as well as access only by air, and space to access the space station in orbit as well as our two moons (which are growing daily).
We have player and creature kill, bots that just converse, wearable clothing, mining (to earn money), repairs to devices on the electrical grid (earns money also) and more.
There are puzzle areas (Quests), where you might need certain objects to proceed. Finding these hidden areas also pays.

mud.name: Zombie Mud
mud.desc: Welcome to Zombie Mud. It is basically a bunch of cool functions and what not I like, hence the zombie name. I am going to try to take it the direction of a zombie outbreak in a modern city. There is a long way to go and we are looking for anyone sharing this vision!

mud.name: Ambardia
mud.desc: On a forgotten world, in an age of renewal and awakening, a civilization struggles to maintain balance between the powers of order and chaos in an ever expanding world. The denizens of Ambardia await you: come and live the adventure.
Classes: 11 Spells: 50 Items: 515 Shops: 64 NPC's: 348 Arrows: 15 Playable Maps: 832 Max Level: 500
6 Land Masses 14 Sailing Ships
28 Normal Quests 7 Class specific quests 24 Missions (Repeatable Quests for Order Board Rank) 3 Holiday Event Quests (Christmas, Halloween, Easter)
4 PVP Battle Arenas with scripted timed war events 5 Scripted Server Events
16 Skills 23 Custom Music Tracks
Custom In-Game MP3 player
Complete Scripted player controlled Chess Game
Tagged Guild System with personal, private Guild Halls(Expandable with donation)
Ambardia is a huge world with many areas to explore.

mud.name: STAR WARS: Dark Horizons
mud.desc: 'STAR WARS: Dark Horizons' is a MUSH dedicated to roleplaying just before and during the Clone Wars era of the Star Wars universe. Its canon is that of Episodes IV, V and VI as theatrically released. The prequels and the Extended Universe materials may be used as inspiration, but are not considered canon. Final say belongs to the wizards. SW:DH's dynamic roleplay environtment is supplemented by a robust code that includes a fully functioning IC economy that allows anything from weapons to ships to be bought or sold by players. Everything is then tied into a unique combat system that includes the aforementioned ships and weapons as well as personal armor, ground vehicles, etc. 'STAR WARS: Dark Horizons' is a growing, newbie-friendly game that intends to play out Episodes I, II and III the way they should have been.

mud.name: FurToonia
mud.desc: FurToonia is themed to furries, 'toons. Friendly chat and roleplay are encouraged. It has grown to become a HUGE world and surrounding Universe. There are themed areas for every taste.

mud.name: Network MUCK
mud.desc: The Network MUCK was made after the Library MUCK fell out of favour by a lot of its residents because of its management. It has a slightly Sci-Fi theme, though that is only really used to allow different genre areas to be made by any resident who asks and is accepted to make those new areas. Currently, it only has a small playerbase, but we are looking for all kinds of players (Adult, of course) who would be willing to join and contribute to this evolving world.

mud.name: Bleach MUSH: The Beginning
mud.desc: Ever wondered what would happen if Rukia and Ichigo never met and what would happen if the Bleach Universe turned out to be much different than it is now?

What would the consequences be if the Bount and Quincy actually still existed and attacked Soul Society with full force, and while this was happening the burning eyes of two Vasto Lords waited to finish the job?

The Soul Society is recovering from this war, and the surviving officers of the Gotei 13 being placed in Zero Division opens up the Seireitei to new fresh faces to take over the responsibilities of the Captains.
The possibilities are endless, with the Human World mostly still unsuspecting of the existence of monsters such as Hollows, the Bount and Quincy seem to inhabit it as well.
This is our Universe, your Universe.

Bleach MUSH: The Beginning was created to provide an RP environment in this twist on the exciting Bleach setting. We are intent on running plots and guarantee a RP experience that will not be forgotten. So come and see what we have to offer.

mud.name: Otherworld, the realm of Tirn Aill
mud.desc: Enter the chaotic realm of Tirn Aill -- the underworld. Rich with history of the many cultures that have passed into it through death and rebirth.
Here... the fallen rise.
Will your path lead to glory and honor, or will your fate be a blazing trail of infamy?
Your future lies before you, you need only to claim it!

We boast ninety-nine levels of standard advancement and another whole career after you attain hero status where you can level up another hundred times and pursue one of two original paths for your class.

Seventeen classes each with many customization abilities to ensure no two character are the same by the time they are max level. Over twenty different race choices, all which have at least four unique skills of their own and can excel in many fields.

Other features include: Extensively deep skill and combat system, dynamic questing, heavily detailed itemization, all unique areas to explore, balanced player-vs-player dueling (with some tournaments from time to time!)

Truly unique items -- including artifacts that only one person may possess at a time! Special events, ship combat, mercenaries and trainable pets, extensive tradecrafting and creation allowing you to make your own gear and allow you to modify it or existing items to further improve or customize them. We have an overworld to explore (like any good rpg,) expansive raiding and solo content and the ability to recruit and lead your own army into battle. There is always more on the horizon.
Come visit us. You'll soon find solace in the realm of the dead.
NOTE: We are entirely free to play. We do not have paid \"perk\" items and things of that nature.

mud.name: Crossroads MUSH
mud.desc: Crossroads. A land of possibilities, set on an island in the middle of a ring of islands, each separated by magic from the other, with Crossroads the port in between. Legend tells of a time before Crossroads existed, when the Lord of the Abyss ruled the land and the seas and the people were naught but slaves to its will. Demons, giants, dragons, ghouls, and creatures too dark to imagine feasted on men, fouling the very land on which they stood and enslaving all life. It was a time of torment, a darkness from which rose a Champion, blessed by Providence to defeat the evil that ravaged the lands.
Crossroads MUSH has a dedicated base of players and staff who eagerly work to continue building this world into something unique and interesting for all.
We've always got room for playeres seeking characters from all walks of life that are willing to participate in various arenas of politics, intrigue, nobility, criminal activity, or finance!
We can't wait to see you at Crossroads MUSH!

mud.name: Eternal War
mud.desc: Eternal War is a SMAUG based MUD that will be heavily Roleplay Enforced, We are just opening and a lot of changes are planned so we are not presently open for playing, we are looking for a good team of coders and builders.
- Sphynx

mud.name: Legends Of Troy
mud.desc: A new world. Only 1 immortal so far. This is my personal project. Come and see what its all about.

mud.name: Evolution Online
mud.codebase: [Dikumud] DikuMUD addepted to suit our own means
mud.desc: Welcome, prospective player, to Evolution OnLine Right now, this is a project by a bunch of friends, and we still need to do a lot of work to alter the codebase we have to our own needs, so we're not accepting players, builders, or coders at the moment. We DO need people to help testing, however, so if you think you can help, feel free to drop a mail. Now, on to the description.

What we plan to do with Evolution Online is to make a completely unique world that allows the players to shape their own destiny. It's a world filled with magic, and it has always been so, thus resulting in uniquely evolved races and many bizarre and strange creatures. The players will start off at the dawn of civilisation, and from their influence history with their own actions. Features that we plan to code in the future include, among others:

- player parents (yes, you'll actually be able to get born as the child of other players. - custom-designed equipment - player-run clans and governements - immortal-run quests that will influence the future of the entire mud - custom skillsets: You'll be allowed to fully customize your characters abilities. - real time combat - many styles of magic, weapons, and martial arts

mud.name: Distortions
mud.desc: The description is being written. We will be based in Mexico.

mud.name: Shards of Mythos MUX
mud.desc: Once upon a time, not so very long ago... It was a perfectly ordinary world. Neither pure good nor true evil had a stronger hold, as most catered only to self-interests. The masses toiled away supporting those at the top, all so they could go home at night, have a beer, and watch Survivor. It was a world of muted pastels in which most people had exchanged passion for safety, wonder replaced by the certainty of routine, mundane existence. The passing of time became remarkable only as old faces fell away to be replaced by new ones, part of the same cycle. All was perfect, an image reflected in a grayscape window. Then it shattered...

A few strange cults around the world did something -- no one was quite certain what -- but hints of a forgotten, ancient past began to bubble up from beneath the surface of this static world. Half-remembered stories were once again whispered around campfires and on stormy nights. Children again avoided the lonely old house at the end of the lane. Sometimes secret wishes would come true, whether wonderful or terrible. Nightmares and dreams alike began to stalk the hazy edges of mankind's consciousness. None could explain what had happened, but something became clear to those who dared believe... The stories were true.

mud.name: Marvel eXtreme 3.0
mud.desc: Marvel Extreme v. 3.0 is open for business - come experience a comic book game unlike any that has come before! Dubbed \"the trade paperback lightning edition,\" MXT3.0's philosophy focuses on tossing out long +trait applications and introducing a miniseries writer's approach to playing a character. Conflict abounds on the IC grid, reflecting a recent cutoff just after the tragic end of the Civil War:

--- Iron Man and his allies, in support of the Superhuman Registration Act, have come out victorious against Captain America and his Secret Avengers. All across the country, Iron Man's \"Initiative\" program is being implemented, and superheroes are being recruited into teams to protect each of the fifty states.

Other heroes, still resistant to the registration process, remain active in protest of the Act and its principles, effectively becoming not just costumed vigilantes but enemies of the state, hunted both by criminals and SHIELD \"cape-killer\" squads alike. ---

The game is open to OOC alt creation with a revolutionary coded IC character queue/tenure system. Plots are kicking off as we speak - heroes will be tested, villains will be feared, and the Marvel Universe will come to life more every day.
Check it out: mxtreme.mushpark.com 2004

mud.name: Shattered Realms II
mud.desc: Welcome to the Shattered Realms.
The owner of the \"Shattered Realms\" account has gone into hibernation, and the admins of the mud was forced to make a copy of the review until further notice.

Our world began in June of 1999, and was under constant construction the first year. Opened for players quite soon after it was started, though there has been heavy construction all along. A fully interactional LP MUD, with many player interactive systems. The Mud systems are now mostly self designed. We have 9 races and some 25 classes.

Roleplaying is encouraged, but not enforced. We have a consent based playerkilling system, where one actively has to register as playerkiller to be able to have fun. If one behaves badly or become high level, one just might be enforced to become a pk'er. Noone shall be too sure to not get in heavy troubble. Danger gives the game more nerve, however we have chosen to protect the young ones.
Playing is based as many AD&D medieval systems with xp hunting, though supported by other systems. One is encouraged to go questing.
Combat and magics are losely based on AD&D 2nd edition ruleset, heavily modified into our own tweaks. Currently in progress of a workover towards AD&D 3rd edition (D20) ruleset.

We also have positions available for coders at all experience levels. From builder, programmer and writer all the way up to admin levels currently available. We prefer LP MUD experience and a strong desire to build your dreams for others to enjoy them.
The Shattered Realms - a place unlike any other.

mud.name: PhantasyWorld
mud.desc: The theme on this MOO is Phantasy, set in a make-believe world. The lands are mostly Medieval in appearance. Sorcery and witchcraft are strong in this world. You are encouraged to explore these wonderful lands, settle down and add something unique of your own.

mud.name: Dark Swords
mud.desc: Dark Swords is a role-playing game of new generation. The action takes place in a unique world which doesn’t have analogues. Dark Swords combines the traditional role-playing system with innovative approach to the game process implementation, character development and social aspect. You can join the players from all parts of the world right now!

mud.name: Rise of the Rebels
mud.desc: Rise of the Rebels is a new and upcoming mud. The time setting is being set further then any of the star wars movies have covered. There are many races to choose from and even more to come. We are looking to put more then just the average fifteen to twenty planets in. Even with the size we are trying to achieve quality work can be expected. The base will be constantly built on and new items, equipment and many other things will be implemented. All our players will be able to contribute there ideas and what they would like to see implemented. Role Playing is encouraged and will be rewarded with advanced equipment credits or a number of other things. We aren't wizlocked at this point but there is much to do before opening to a player base.

mud.name: Elvana
mud.codebase: [Unknown] Now being made into a 3d PC game
mud.desc: The original MUD project has been discontinued as the development team has formed a game design company and are using Elvana as their first 3d PC game title.

Elvana, a futuristic world wrapped in secrets Elvana, a futuristic world wrapped in secrets buried in time that were never ment to be revealed, a place you will never want to leave. The world of Elvana is a speculative futuristic world where three races exist. The Elvani, Orci and Hu'Mas. Tolkien with a twist I suppose. It's a hard science concept though, with the Elvani having evolved and established a civilization in their ancestral grounds. A massive community on the continent that would one day become the mega city 'Motherholme'. The Elvani in what we would consider the technological period of the 1700's began exploring the rest of Elvana where they found the Orci whose society resembled that of our ancient Aztec culture. Having never encountered another sentient species before the Elvani discovered themselves to be highly xenophobic and soon returned with an armada which they used to enslave the Orci and deported them back to Motherholme. In this period of history one of the 7 Elvani dynasties rose to dominance and gave birth to an emperor who subjugated the other 6 dynasties and decreed the Orci slaves of the Empire. This reign lasted for over 600 years until an Orci called Char'Gunda escaped slavery and rallied an army that eventually overthrew the Emperor and his dynasty, setting the Elvani themselves free as well as his fellow Orci. His Elvani wife gave birth to the first Hu'Mas, a half-breed. 200 years later the game takes place in a world of futuristic technology where things like flying cars are common place (think Fifth Element to have a better picture). In this world the body is highly revered and controversial biological discoveries and genetic experiments are changing everything as this new field fast gains popularity.

mud.name: Project Fiction
mud.desc: Project Fiction is an absorbing roleplaying game set in White Wolf's (old) World of Darkness. We feature Mage: The Ascension, Changeling: The Dreaming and Demon: The Fallen and a fully mapped modern New Orleans.
Forums: http://projectfiction.s4.bizhat.com/ Community Wiki: http://projectfiction.wikidot.com/

mud.name: Mindcloud 3.0
mud.desc: Mindcloud 3.0 is back. This version of Mindcloud didn't stay open for long seeing as Mindcloud Muds slowly lost there players. I figured i would try to rerun this mud, since i see there are no Mindclouds running.
It was either Mindcloud or a Eod while i work on my other mud, and i figured Mindcloud is less of a headache as well as less of a memory hog.
This mud offers all the Stock Mindcloud classes. Nothing out of the ordinary.
Feel free to drop by if you wish to play. I most likely won't be doing must work to this mud. After all its just a play mud for players to mess around with while i work on my main mud.

mud.name: MaDDness
mud.desc: Welcome to the Realms of MaDDness

Come and join our world of sane and insane. New and unique areas with a few revamped stock areas. We have extended races. We have new and extended class slections. There is New quest system as well as immortal run quest. Rp is encouraged but not required. New code and areas are continually being added. We are over 9800 rooms and growing. We have a growing clan system join in and rival against enemy forces. The fun continues to grow here in the Crazy and Insane world of MaDDness.
maddness.dune.net port 6000 www.maddness.dune.net

mud.name: The Ascension
mud.desc: This is the begining of somehting great. We are using this current code base as a test platform for an advanced MUD system. We are looking for players with strong opinions, and not those looking for an easy ride to the top. We will be working with both code bases to ensure player satisfaction. We are looking to improve the current code, as well as laying ground work for our project code. As it sets the current Asecnsion code is partialy custom and offers alot of feature. Though some is simply in pure excess. due to involvment from a prior coder Ascension is currently unable to accept connects via Mud Connector. We are working to remedy this and a number of other draw backs associated with this code. Though wwe are working to get it back on track. All things aside we hope to see somethings changing soon.
-Thorn

mud.name: LifeMUD
mud.desc: LifeMUD is not a new game but is undergoing a dramatic relaunch!

We activly encourage and reward good roleplay, its the reas why the world exists. The Lifemud world has a rich history and political background which players are encouraged to get involved with. The clans and organisations are run by the players and give a great opportunity to police and run the various cities.
We have various religious cults and churches which are also player driven.

LifeMUD is still under development as this is basicly LifeMUD V2 featuring a new world and MANY new features not implemented anywhere else on the net!! Now would be a great time to join in and get acclimated to the environment and even gain the opportunity to become a staff member as an immortal and/or world builder.

mud.name: Insomnia MUD
mud.desc: Insomnia MUD.
Nuff said.

mud.name: Zeitgeist
mud.desc: Zeitgeist
http://zeitgeist.hopto.org/
A free browser-based graphical D&D/mud-style MMORPG based on the Phaos code.
At this point in time, Zeitgeist is in early stages of development but is fully functional.
Be one of the first to join this exciting new game!
Features include:

= Player-Player email/messaging system = Graphical User Interface = Browser based, no mud client required! = Public Tables (Inc. 10 Richest, Most Exp players) = Buy sell items to shops / players = Tiled travel system, click to go! (soon to be isometric!) = Integrated chat = Arena = Dungeon areas = Very friendly = Plus more, and more to come!
Click on the homepage link to get started! Hope to see you there!

mud.name: Twist of Fate
mud.codebase: [Dawn] Modified over the course of 3 years
mud.desc: Twist of Fate is a brand new world where players, builders, and coders can let their imaginations run wild. We offer original areas, challenging mini-quests as well as Immortal-run and Autoquests. Multiple races and classes will be available upon opening, and our many unique code enhancements will provide, along with the original areas constantly being added, a very unique playing experience! Join the team, or simply log on and play the game! We hope to see you soon!

mud.name: Heart of the Wyld
mud.desc:
Heart of the Wyld is set in the present day, and based around
Yellowstone National Park and its environs. While both the park
and the area around it are at least loosely based off the real
world, there are some notable differences between it and HotW's
version of Yellowstone in the World of Darkness which can be
found on the MUSH's +news files.

The game focuses on the Garou, Werewolves. While other character
types do definitely exist often on the game, they are mostly
relegated to NPC-type characters for use in stories. This is to
allow the main characters to shine brightly, rather than be
muddled by so many different 'spheres' trying to co-exist in one
place.

Character creation is by application. This is to make sure people
who are trying to play have enough of a grasp on proper
punctuation, grammar, basically all the things that allow a
player to interact with fellow roleplayers efficiently. In
addition, we want to make sure the character wanted fits well
with the current playerbase and the worldview of the MUSH. We
recommend you come on by the game and check out our +news files
on all relevant character generation information and
theme/setting. Our staff is always around and available for
answering your questions.

The theme of Werewolf: the Apocalypse is one of savage horror in
a world that is much like our own, yet twisted, with powerful
supernatural forces hidden behind the facade of modern life -- a
World of Darkness. Here at Heart of the Wyld, we focus strongly
on struggle. Internally, it is often the struggle between man and
wolf, between reason and the mindless fury of the Beast within
every Garou. Externally, this struggle manifests in such diverse
forms as inter (and intra) tribal conflict, and against any of a
myriad of external threats -- the Garou are at war, with the
Apocalypse looming on the horizon, and the inescapable fact is
that the Garou are losing. Some Garou lose hope -- their are
greater numbers of Ronin in the finals days than at any time in
history. Will that be your fate? Will you struggle in vain
against the nigh-overwhelming opposition that the Garou face in
their war? Or will you scoff at defeat, and go on to win
victories that are the stuff of legend?

mud.name: Dragonball Eternity
mud.desc: Ok guys this is my first actual mud to code on by myself as the owner. I coded for alot of other non dragonball games and did some building for quite some time. So the first thing i need is to hire some coders and builders. Now the coders have to have some EXP. I am not saying they have to be experts but if i am going to trust you not to crash my mud i want you to have a lil EXP. Another thing is builders. I will teach builders but i will not teach coders it is easier to teach a builder then a coder. If anyone is knowing they can perform one of the jobs you can email me at the admin email account which may take a while for me to reply to or you can email Vegeta at dracos_fang@yahoo.com my name is Goten and you can email my personal one at dakota44883@yahoo.com APPLICATIONS ONLY NO OTHER EMAILS TO ANY OF THEM!!!!!!!!!!!! the application must include experience optional for builders the name you want and the password you want if ya dont want to give out a password let me know and i will set you up with one then send it back to you in a reply mail you must have an age on there an email address you want to be reached at by the administration and pretty much about it except for if ya have experience i am going to hire you quicker then ones with out and let us know the muds ya worked on and if they are down or still up internet email address will be posted on the mud unless you have strict rules not to do that but the administration needs it to let you know about updates and if we switch servers or not yall will be the first to know trust me but stop on in if you have time and one of the owners are on we will set you up with an interview and decide if we wanna hire ya see yall in there

mud.name: Realmz of Insanity
mud.desc: Realmz of Insanity is back. if you like invasions and awesome fun and meeting new people to dungeon crawl with come on in. We have a full kingdom system for each city. and we offer clans, pk arena, as well as world pk. Come on in today and visit Realmz of Insanity.

mud.name: Majia, Realm of Magic
mud.desc: Majia, Realm of Magic.
Is currently being made as I type. I do however need the help of a few builders, if you are interested in joining my team, just come on in, and look for either Shi or Ravon and speak to one of them.

mud.name: GodWars: Revised
mud.desc: We are an OLD SCHOOL GodWars mud based upon the unreleased GodWars: FUSS codebase. Our aim is to bring back the ORIGINAL feel of GodWars from 1996.
We have the 5 base GodWars classes: Vampire, Werewolf, Demon, Mage and Highlander.
If you missed the ORIGINAL GodWars MUD when it originally ran come by and give us a go.. It will take you some time to build your character BUT i can assure you, it will be fun!

mud.name: SushiMUD
mud.desc: SushiMUD is pre-Alpha stage, but open for player testing. We anticipate several player-wipes, but hopefully they will advantageous for the player and not detrimental. Currently we are mostly stock, but are building rapidly. We do consider ourselves a

mud.name: AoE 4.3: Dawn of the Empires (EmpireMUD)
mud.desc: Come Join An Empire Or Start Your Own
Age of Empires 4.3: Dawn of the Empires = EmpireMUD Dawn of Empires is a MUD using the EmpireMUD codebase developed by Paul Clarke.

Its emphasis is on politics, trade, building, and resource management rather than combat. Players join existing empires or found their own and wage war (or peace) as they see fit. Alternatively, they can opt to play as a Werewolf or Vampire for the purpose of wrecking havoc for established empires.
DoE features
* Huge user-modifiable world * Levelless skill-based experience system * ASCII map navigation * Unique building & crafting system
Visit the homepage for Help or use the INFO command. Visit the bulletin board after creating your character, and JOIN AN EMPIRE to get started.

mud.name: Age of Reptiles
mud.desc: Some years ago, when I was self-publishing hardcopied and electronically-published roleplaying games, I designed an rpg based on a comic book world of dinosaur life created by artist/writer, Ricardo Delgado. Now, using the Unknown Regions SWReality codebase, I bring to you the Age of Reptiles mud. Unlike any other mud currently available, AoR takes place in prehistoric times in a quasi-factual setting and enables players to portray Deinonychus characters. AoR is role-playing enforced and fully player-killing capable, in fact, the setting is outright deadly. Players may form packs to better enable their survival and, in time, might become a pack's alpha or perhaps an outcast from it. Characters can also mate and sire fully playable hatchlings. As a whole, the goal for all players is survival and character development through pack/mate interaction.
Recent changes include the addition of three new areas and improvements to the mating system!

mud.name: Curso de RPG M
mud.desc: Cursos de RPG M. Saber em SaÃºde traz o melhor da reeducaÃ§Ã£o postural global. Mais informaÃ§Ãµes: www.saberemsaude.com.br

mud.name: MUD Valinor
mud.desc: Valinor is a Brazilian roleplay-friendly MUD focused on the Tolkienian legendarium. It is one of the few MUDs in Portuguese and the only Brazilian MUD dedicated exclusively to the work of J.R.R. Tolkien. There is a strict separation between IC and OOC actions and the system is designed to provide a rich roleplay experience for the PCs and enforce a consistent behavior for the NPCs. Players are also encouraged to submit roleplay logs of its character's adventures and findings.

mud.name: Highlands III
mud.desc: The time for Highlands III is now. In 2004/2005 a group of us got together and launched this project out of love and dedication and wanted to see the mud take its next step in hopefully becoming and even better mud. Some of the things we have added/brought back: 10 quest levels, Auto-Quests, Quest equipment, Battlefield is back, Clans are back, numerous commands, Automated auction system, New charmed system, Training system replaced the meta system, Made players stats more prominent in determining success rates of spells/skills, Lots of old zones have been revamped to make them more useful, Bunch of new zones. The current staff had discussion about what direction to take the mud in regards to our theme. We had several options. First change the name: we have always been highlands so that wasn’t an option we liked. Second to make it more like the movie/TV “Highlander”: we decided that wasn’t what we were after. We decided to go with the idea of making it “Highlands of Scotland” the best way to go. A fully comprehensible plan and map was created for developing our theme and storyline, and is currently being built. It contains over 70 zones nearly 400 rooms in roads all based in highlands from 1200-1600AD. There is room for more to be added once the goals of this build has been achieved. Each of these zones will contain mini-quests or quests. After the first 16 zones are entered and functional the development of a playable storyline quest/reward system will be implemented. Highlands III welcomes new players, and embraces old players that have lost their way. We currently are seeing builders to help with the theme build project. We have a fully functional OLC system, and combined with DG_scripts so builders can write there own spec_progs. For first time builders we have a bit of an online manual/guidelines and lots of resources to help you with creating your very first zone.

mud.name: judymud Roadie version
mud.codebase: [Dikumud] A late version of judymud stabilized by gero, run by Roadie for real-time FUN and challeng
mud.desc: Judymud has a few people right now that are keeping the torch lit. Roadie is one of them, and this is the current version he has up. Gero has another up, and Slug has the never-ending chat version of judymud up that he built from scratch, that can be found on here. All are playable versions, however they are each different. This one in particular is more geared towards giving the players whatever they want that the mud is capable of, without turning it into a pointless game of ease -- instead, players are able to find easteregg-like items here and there, and when monitored by immortals, they may end up with a surprise custom item or too. Basically it is purely to play without interference a more stable version of the particular distribution of judy/fred/henrymud, or to play while asking for help that will be limited, but often exactly what you would want, if it were your birthday. :)

mud.name: Vor
mud.desc: Welcome to Vorovski Mir. The year is 2039, the place is the fictional burgeoning metropolis of Vladivostok on the Eastern Seaboard of the former U.S.S.R.

In the depths of the mountains guerrillas hide from Government troops, sneaking out at night to sabotage and attack, while the Government's underpaid, poorly-trained army fearfully patrols the day. Recently, UN peacekeepers have been called in, as pictures of violent reprisals against guerrilla-aligned student protesters circulated through the world media. Like sharks scenting blood, Private Military Companies have come in, some for the guerrillas, some for the government, some for the UN, some for other interests, followed by arms dealers, black marketeers, adventurers, drug dealers, bodyguards, thieves, hustlers, and traders of worse things. |

Vladivostok has always been a city of energy, of progress, and the war has made little difference. Movie stars, fashion models, the rich and the beautiful, the noble, and the decadent are drawn here, the same scent of blood in the water that brings CNN and other news services brings a vast amount of the rest of the media with it. Organized crime thrives, preying off of the poor, the greedy, the desperate, and the gullible. The Russian mafia works from an uneasy truce with biker gangs and Asian mobs, while cash floods the \"Free\" City of Vladivostok, and even the police are not sure who all the criminals are or even what is a crime.

mud.name: Trangressions Of Man
mud.desc: The game is based upon the World of Darkness system of the following books: Dark Ages: Vampire Dark Ages: Werewolf Dark Ages: Mage THIS IS NOT REQUIEM OR FORSAKEN
Experience RP'ers are wanted. This is not a hack'n'slash, this is an RP MUCK.

mud.name: Dragonball: Dark Wars
mud.desc: Dragonball Dark Cloud/ God of War is based and themed fully upon dbz/Starwars. Collected infomation from Starwars and dbz has been put into a circle codebase. Rankless wholist. New Planets. Ripped out the old things, to make way for the totally new worlds. The mud was created by the fully operational team of Shadow Inc. Mudding Company. All though it is missing some key details upon the opening of the texted Mud. It offers a wide range of things most dbz mudders would like.
--> Clan system ( Clans Offered ) --> Role Play Channel Offered --> Skills can be gained through RP's from other Races. --> Newbie friendly with a HardCore char opation thanks to Smaug.
We are currutly not hiring for Builders, so please don't login in hopes of getting a immortal job.But eh. You never know what Shadow Inc. will need soon.
-Michael.

mud.name: LoreMUD
mud.desc: A new MUD currently looking for staff.
The theme is of fantasy while trying to maintain realism.
If heavily catering to a small interactive game-world, over an expansive one interests you. Check it out. The plotted direction can change at any time; nothing has been permanently decided yet.

mud.name: Aber-Phoenix
mud.desc: Phoenix is a themed medieval/fantasy MUD. We do not strictly enforce role-playing, but we do reward good RP and ask that player names, familiar names, travel messages, titles, profiles, etc. be appropriate for a medieval/fantasy environment. Player reviews etc that are found inappropriate for this environment may be removed by the Powers.

The object of the game is to explore the Land of Phoenix, kill monsters, solve puzzles (quests) and have a lot of fun. As you adventure through the realm you will accrue both experience points and quest points. Experience points are gained through sacrificing treasures to the gods by dropping items into the pits found at the Temple of Paradise, the Village Church and various other locations. Points are also gained for killing monsters. Traditional playerkilling is not allowed except during tournaments or if both players have entered into the combat arena. We also make playerkilling available through a subclass system that allows players to become vampires, seraphs, or werewolves. Quest points are gained by solving quests.
You may play more than one character at a time as long as certain conditions are met, check the multiplaying information file for details.

Once you have acquired the requisite amount of experience and quest points you are eligible to become a Novitiate Apprentice Wizard. At this time you can choose to become an immortal, or to reincarnate as mortal. If you choose immortality you may opt to reincarnate as a mortal at a later time. In order to be eligible to take a wizquiz and move beyond the apprentice wizard levels, you must achieve Adept status (complete the game in all guilds and complete all quests at some point in any incarnation). Once you are a Paragon Apprentice Wizard, you may apply for a wizquiz with an ArchWizard or higher. This test examines both your knowledge of the Land of Phoenix and your familiarity with policy. Upon successful completion of your wizquiz you are promoted to the rank of Adept Wizard.
If you can't find the answer to your question in any help or info file, feel free to ask an immortal or upper level player. Welcome to Phoenix, we're glad you're here. Enjoy!

mud.name: Star Wars : The Hurrian Galaxy
mud.desc: Star Wars Galaxies is a MUD based on the Time Line when the New Republic formes and is fighting the Empire for Control of the Galaxy. Other, smaller, organizations affect both sides, and, of course, there are those who choose not to get involved. Some profit from the war and others shun it.
You can choose a MAIN profession (Max level attainable) and a Secondary Profession (near max level attainable). The Force is decided by the Admins and RP Enforcers.
We are always looking for good roleplayers for spots like jedi, sith, government/clan/guild leaders, as well as for Admins, RP Enforcers, Builders, Coders and Imms.
Our code is Star Wars: Fall of the Empire version 2.1 which has MANY MANY mods and snippets added. Lots of new piloting skills and a completely seperate FORCE system.
If you are interested, simply log in and check us out! We are 100% newbie friendly (enforced) and look forward to seeing you there!

mud.name: Dragonball GX
mud.desc: Dragonball GX is a new mud. It has several races including Saiyans, Nameks, Icers. We encourage roleplaying and prizes will be handed out. Which will depend on your performance
This mud welcomes all newbies. So if you ever require help ask one of our immortals. You will be sure to get a response unless of course they are busy.
We are also planning on adding races and building new areas.

mud.name: RedFireChronicles
mud.codebase: [Unknown] The server is in it's christmas theme and will end after christmas and convert to it's ori
mud.desc: Have you ever wanted to step in and take a new life? Well welcome to Red Fire Chronicles. Can you slay the monsters and save the encursed land. Maybe if you become even more skilled you can buy a house maybe even run a shop? You could even marry. Who knows. The encursed land is full of obscatales. You must save your village from invasions attacks amd much more. Hey even a volcano or tornado could erupt. You decide your own fate. Bewarned darkness lies in every corner in Pikel. Contest will be thrown during the holidays. Every saturday the village will try and have a peaceful fun time at the bar. Who knows what will happen though. The city is always full of despair even on christmas. I might add though... the greatest challenge is destroying the mighty Kilo, a dark mighty beast. You may also tame and ride a dragon who knows what will happen?

mud.name: original Thieves-World
mud.desc: The city of Sanctuary is based off the book series Thieves World by Lynn Abbey. She has been kind enough to send us maps and documentation for the purpose of enhancing the city to make it even more as it is in the book. This project will always be a work in progress, because the book series is a continuing story.

Over the last 15 years, people from all over the world, of all age groups, skill levels, and toxicity levels have built and coded. Outside of the walls of Sanctuary is a clash of culture, time, and space. It is a place where Scotland meets the gods of Ancient Greece, Aztec warriors meet the nomads of The Great Eastern Desert, venomous spiders butt heads with fire breathing dragons, and where characters from many familiar stories live and breathe.

Thieves World is a place of tearful reunions, emotional turmoil, and hours of beautifully spent time. Since this mud has made a point of not getting pigeon holed into any one theme, it has just about anything for anyone. Both the players and admins are active, very friendly, and willing to help.
We also have a Facebook group called Thieves-World. If you are interested in learning more about what is currently going on in TW, please check us out.

mud.name: Isle of Wight
mud.desc: 1066 is considered one of those dates in Medieval England which is difficult to forget. At the start of 1066, England was ruled by Edward the Confessor. By the end of the year, a Norman - William the Conqueror - was king after defeating Edward's successor, Harold, at the Battle of Hastings. With three kings in one year, a legendary battle in October and a Norman in charge of England, it is little wonder that people rarely forget the year 1066. Many historians view 1066 as the start of Medieval England...And this is where our story starts. Come join the lands of change and the dark ages... Isle of Wight is a old World of Darkness roleplaying mush.
Currently we allow: Mortal, Mortal+, Vampire, Changeling, Shifter, and wraith.
We are currently in a /soft/ opening, featuring open chargen.
Come and join the fun today!

mud.name: Star Wars: Rebellion in the Stars
mud.desc: (Please note: There are two RitS. The other one is INVALID) Rebellion in the Stars was started back in 1997, when SWR was new. Since then, we have evolved and changed to become one of the most advanced SWR's out there. We don't have a huge playerbase, but because of that we can boast a more personalized experience, and be more community oriented. Due to problems with our last host, we have recently moved off our long time location at Wolfpaw to our brand new home on the blazing fast Infolaunch servers. Due to our move, we have had to playerwipe, and are currently offering a Christmas promotion, where newbies recieve a small boost at creation, which will allow them to better explore the game. If you're looking for a quality, friendly Star Wars themed MUD, Rebellion in the Stars is the place for you. Drop in and give us a try! ---------------------------- The Clone Wars have drawn to an end, but the peace some sought at the end of that bloody affair is no where to be seen. The Jedi, once honored protecters of the Galaxy, have been outlawed and hunted down... In the foreground, the Empire is a darkly dominating force. Those worlds that do not to bend to its will are forced to their knees by the might of the Imperial war machine. Corperations that can be of use to the Empire as seized and Imperialized, becoming just another cog in the wheel. There is hope on the horizen, however dim. Freedom fighters, dubbed terrorist by the Empire, are taking their toll, hindering the Empires progress whenever possible. Scattered and small, they offer little resistance, however there has been talk of something more... Join us at Rebellion in the Stars, and carve out your destiny!

mud.name: Voices of Dune
mud.desc: The destruction of Holtzman and the end of the Great Revolt by the forces of the Butlerian Jihad brought the people of the Known Universe a new sense of freedom and unity. No longer are we leashed and harvested to become non-intelligent slaves for the machine minds. It was a triumphant victory. Was it not? It is now a dozen years since that fateful day. Now we struggle with living without the aid of the machine-minds that we were heavily dependant on. With space travel slow and expensive, instant communication non-existant, and the loss of various luxuries, we struggle through the days to achieve the lives we once held dear. This struggle for complete unity within the Known Universe has been difficult to achieve then originally perceived. As we stand here on the planet Urbanus, recently named by the Landsraad Head Council as the Universal Centre, we make countless attempts to communicate with those we have lost after the Jihad. Now here we loom, looking to the vast skies hoping our messages have been received and complied for it is here we will begin a new era of unified humanity. Here together, we will join the universe in peace. --- Voices of Dune has opened the doors to the public recently and the VoD staff wish to invite you to the MUSH. We are set roughly 10,000 years before the events of Frank Herbert's first Dune novel. The theme, taken from information within the Dune Encyclopedia, we feel it is a perfect setting for original and interesting events that would lead up to the Battle of Corrin, or miss it entirely due to RP. We offer a mixture of feature and custom factions to expand levels of gameplay. Original code is in the making to help move RP and 'rate' factions on their progress as the game moves forward ICly pending on actions and decisions a faction would make. This means a whole new econ and faction system none have ever witnessed! We regret to inform you that we are not open for IC interaction at this time as we are still in the process of building. However, we plan to have our doors open for IC interaction on February 16th! If you wish for further information, log onto Voices of Dune at duneiv.mushpark.com Port: 4244 and ask for Quetzalcoatl.

mud.name: Haven the Third
mud.desc: A new incarnation of an old game that has been running since the 90's but was down for several years. Haven occurs in a future world where most of the planet has been infested by a shadowy enemy and the last holdout of civilization exists on Haven mesa beneath a magi-tech shield. Unfortunately, the betrayal of one of their trusted council members quickly led to the collapse of their original government and over time the people were reduced to a number of separate smaller villages with most of the residents seeing the shield and other ancient technology in a mystical or religious way. After a recent assault by the enemy, his Shadow, and the return of the original leader (or at least his animated corpse), people have begun to search for ancient technological and magical devices in the hopes of combining them to finally take back their planet. Race choices are virtually unlimited and many players may choose to import races from their favorite games or stories. Staff will attempt to fit any character into the theme. Everyone creates their own custom class, with anyone able to add new specials or items to the game (and an xp bonus if what you suggest is added). We wish this to be a mostly player built system and commands have been implemented which allow players to request additions without needing to code them The combat system is quite deadly, but ancient technology beneath the shield keeps death from being permanent. Adult and dark themed RP, as well as silly humorous role play, are both encouraged, with some scenes being both at the same time. This is a role play themed mud/muck, and thus thus character actions tend to have in character consequences. Being in the testing phase, we do not yet have a large population, but hope to continue growing as we advertise.

mud.name: True Blood: Dallas
mud.desc: From the ghostly shadows of this world, dark secrets have emerged.

The year is 2005; vampires have been out for 2 years. The world has been divided into two polarized opposites. Animals prowl the streets the moment the moon come out to play. Witches practice their occult magic behind closed doors. The Fellowship of the Sun have gathered together.
It is a modern world. It is a magical, mystical world; your world.

True Blood: Dallas is a game based off of the Southern Vampire series. It also draws inspiration from the HBO show, True Blood Playable races, for the moment, include: -humans -psychics -witches -vampires -shifters (including werewolves) The staff are welcoming and open to offering further possibilities.

Game Features include, but are not limited to: - High Powered Positions Available at a First come, First serve system - No Feature Characters - An easy, newbie-accessible Grid - Newbie Friendly News Files - prior knowledge needed - Consent-based Gameplay - No Stats to adhere to

mud.name: NeoDBZ
mud.desc: NeoDBZ is a game that has been running for roughly six years, and gone through a myriad of changes in that time. Originally hosted on WebRPG, it moved to OpenRPG in 2000 and has stayed there since. Using a tabeltop style persistant world, there are strong similarities to a MUSH/MUX and player advancement is handled in almost exactly the same way. With a player base that has peaked near a hundred and been as low as a handful, this game ebbs and flows but never stops. If you want to make a character with personality and impact on a Dragonball style setting, this is where you want to be.

mud.name: Midian
mud.desc: It is common for a MUD to die - it is almost unheard of for a MUD to make a comeback, let alone TWO! But Midian: Funnest Mud of All is doing just that.

Midian began in 1991, before surfin' the 'net was a phrase. In its first incarnation, it lasted until 1994, when its server went down. During that time it was highly original and well-respected. For 8 years, it existed only as a memory on Yahoo groups - until as much of the original code could be brought back together. It was restored in 2001, died again in 2003, and is back yet again as of December 2005.
Things that make Midian stand out:
* It uses LPC code. LPMuds were very common in the early 1990s. Now MUDs have much more sophisticated underlying code. But what made Midian great were the crazy ideas.

* The essence of fun. Midian is kooky and fun. One important social tradition of Midian is the Midian MUDwedding. You haven't seen a real MUDwedding until you've been to one on Midian. Note: MUDweddings are not to be taken seriously, although the crossover to RL HAS happened on Midian!

* But most importantly, it's the players and the ideas they bring to the MUD that make it so different. We have been up again only for two weeks, and already have many of our old players and wizzes back -- Midian has incredible loyalty, despite being down for 10 of the past fifteen years!
Come see what makes us the \"Funnest MUD of All\" (according to Galah)

mud.name: YorMUSH
mud.desc: YorMUX is a very new MUX at this point in time, and is a staged, phase-driven MUX that starts off simple and grows in complexity as the players advance the storyline. Currently in Phase One, the players are left with the freedom to do almost anything within a very small space, with exploration and expansion of the grid as one of the main goals. Player-built structures and actions will evolve the MUX itself.

The game uses an inbuilt Rating system to help keep adult activities from interfering with more general RP. It is a crossworlds MUX allowing both original creations and media characters(mostly from anime), with a confirmation process to categorize canonicity.

Initial access to materials and equipment is limited, but can be expanded through the activities of the community as a group effort. Eventually the goal is to have a functional, player-run town or two with an organized attempt to explore more of the world, when the MUX will move on to Phase Two.

This is a new and fairly experimental project for the admins, so there may be some adjustment and new code added frequently at first. The current incarnation is playable and open to new players, however.

mud.name: DragonBall Saga: Warriors-of-the-Cosmos
mud.desc: Welcome to Wotc!

mud.name: Babylon B.C.
mud.desc: The name Babylon B.C. stems from my fascination withn ancient mythology, Sumeria and Babylon stuck out, with epic tales of great heroes (read: Gilgamesh) and gods/godesses.
I decided what better way to share my hobby of godwars, and enjoyment of ancient mythology, than to make them both work together.

The game itself will be loosely based on the Babylonian and Summerian tales, mythology, and stories. This is where Dystopia, Dystopia2 and Godwars in general come into play, as they have the base line classes that can work with those tales. Also allowing me to add more.
My current projects are:
**> Profession system: including mining, herbalism, blacksmithing, alchemy, tailoring and a couple of others.
**> Copper, Gold and Silver currency system.
**> Rewritten oldschool Godwars classes.
**> Race additions: elves, gnomes, humans, orcs and the like.
Many more to come...

While the mud is currently playable, and fully functional while the changes are put into effect, I would ask that people who wish to test, locate bugs, build and or code send me an email, or leave me an ingame message on the personal board. Also all ideas and thoughts are welcome as well as suggestions, and criticism (constructive, or it will be ignored).
Thanks for reading, Anu
vermaxhosting.com port 9001

mud.name: Zombieworld
mud.desc: In Zombieworld you play a survivor in a Zombie-Apocalypse. It has been months since the first infected appeared, and still nobody knows how the disease started... One thing is for sure, you do not want to end up as one of those things... The game is text-based, but very easy to pick up. There are a lot of references to Zombie movies hidden in the text and a few unique word adventures that should bring a smile to your face. There are also some very gruesome descriptions, so the game might not be for the faint-of-heart... You have been warned!
Here are some of the things that you will be doing as a new player:
- Explore the ruins of the cities - Fight the Horde - Gather resources and supplies - Craft your own equipment - Reconquer civilization...?
Join this new experience in MUD casual-gaming by joining the many players on Android devices!
More information is available at:
http://totalmadownage.net/zwo/

mud.name: The Rogue Legion: Rebirth
mud.desc: The Only Mindcloud 3.0 Mud! Children of the night 4.3 IS NOW The Rogue Legion: Rebirth

The Rogue Legion has: * 31 Classes * 16 Races * New Race system[Races based on greek and norse mythology] * Customized Sacrificing [Sacrifice to Dragonlance pantheon gods] * Weapon Proficiencies [+100 to three weapon levels] * Basic and Rare autoloading EQ [autogenerated eq from mob kills rare is the best, stats generated from within a number_range] * Rank [21 rank titles with each new rank the char is strengthend] * Tiers with tierkill [once requisits are met and the minimum amount of tierkills are met one can advance their tier] * Tierkill [Decapitate with no bonuses, save growing closer to the next tier] * Toughness [damage resistance of .1 percent with each 2 bill exp to a max of 50 percent damage resistance maxed] * Sigils [5 sigils that enhance ones weapon with a max of 5 per weapon] * Religions [standard MC religions] * Runes [+1000 hp to a piece of eq, max of 1 per item, very expensive] * Stances Redone [names customized to Xraks liking with small tweaks] * Weather that can hurt you!!! * Symbiote System [every 1K mob kills gives a symbiote point, redeamable for +5 DR, +5HR, +10 AC or +10 DC] * Build reistances to each wpn type from combat [the more your hit with a certain weapon type the more resistant you grow to that weapon type] * Xcenter balancing utility installed [players can type it to see class nmbr attacks, wpn lvl, damcap, parry, dodge] [Admins can change these values in-game] * Events System * Ability system

[--------------------------[Ability]--------------------------] [ Ability Level Exp Exp needed Mods] Toughness 11 527892481 33107519 Resist: 0/HP: 1100 Power 1 0 51000000 Damage: 0/DR: 0 Skill 1 0 51000000 Attacks: 0/HR: 0 Prowess 1 0 51000000 AC: 0/Parry: 0 Agility 1 0 51000000 Attack: 0/Dodge 0 [--------------------------[Ability]--------------------------] * Much More... -Xrakisis (www.ianshirm.net)

mud.name: Void of Reality
mud.desc: Void of Reality (VoR) is based off of the orginal emlen mud called MidPoint Void. This mud is based off one of the best pk code bases out there.
Emlenmud is based off DikuMud, Merc, and NiMud. Has a lot of what you are used to and tons more.

This is a very newbie friendly mud with an over head mapping system, an easy style of xp to help you get into the game faster. Many xp zones to get xp and eq. A wide selection of equipment. 33 different wear locations for eq. 128 different spells and growing. 35 different skills and growing.

12 different guilds that you can join/mix and match: Thief's Guild, Warrior's Guild, Assassin's Guild, Healer's Guild, Wizard's Guild, Ranger's Guild, Elemental Guild, Marauder Guild, Battlemage Guild, Paladin Guild, Necromancer Guild, Tinker's Guild.
Maybe more to be added in if players want them.
If this seems like a mud you would want to play, come and check us out. You may also check out our sister mud at landsofchaos.net port 3222 which has some of the same features as VoR.
We are both hosted on Wolfpaw.net!

mud.name: Darkstar
mud.desc: Darkstar is an up-and-coming fantasy mud loosly based on the Dungeons and Draongs 3rd edition rules. The setting will be all-original. New classes and races are in the process of being added. Both in-mud and admin-run quests are available. An original background story is in process of being finished, and the world will reflect it. The code is circle, more specifically, Rasputin, though it will be heavily modified. We are in the process of adding new features and changing old ones. Darkstar is hiring builders and assistant coders, as well as story-writers and general admin positions. The staff on Darkstar are fair, intelligent, and mature. We are also open-minded to all suggestions by players and staff alike. Keep in mind that we are not even into the Beta-testing phase, and there are still a few stock areas, but none will remain when the mud is open. The staff of Darkstar would like to thank you for your interest, and invite you to stop by at anytime. - Kyrian

mud.name: Sabrous
mud.codebase: [Smaug] Slight modifications and tweaks got most bugs.
mud.desc: Sabrous is a huge entirely-original SMAUG based MUD. While the theme is more or less fantasy, there is very little of the old D&D dragon slaying going on. The base town has a layout similar to Darkhaven for the sake of familiarity to new players.

Situated on a new server, Sabrous welcomes players of all ages, but asks that if you are under 13 you get parental permission due to the descriptive content in some areas. The gods are approachable and friendly, open to suggestions.
We hope to see you on board soon!

mud.name: Transformers: 2K5 MUSH
mud.desc: 2005 was merely the beginning. The Death of Unicron saw the birth of Galvatron and the Unicronian Born, and now the Autobots find themselves in a more desperate war than ever. However the Decepticons are not the only threat, the Quintessons have time and time again made their presence known to both Decepticon and Autobot. Transformers 2005 MUSH -- now set 16 years after the events of Transformers the Movie -- gives a whole new look to the Transformers universe. The Autobots struggle against the immense power of Galvatron, Cyclonus and the Sweeps with Earth and EDC caught in the crossfire. The Junkions seem content to entertain the masses, and help the Autobots when the times become desperate. Transformers 2005 MUSH presents you with the opportunity to take up the role of an Autobot, Decepticon, EDC Trooper, Junkion, or perhaps even just a Human. Come see what the future has to offer! tf2005.net 5555

mud.name: Devil's Silence
mud.desc: Since the beginning of time there has existed a base struggle between the forces of good and the forces of evil. Until now. Long ago, the land was dominated by two major immortal forces, one, the champion of good (whose name has been lost in the ages), and the Devil, champion of evil. Within their immortal hordes were angels, demons and all other forms of magical beings. Eternally they warred, never winning, never losing. Little did they realize that their true power lied in their mortal followers. Neither of the two paid any attention to the mortal plane..allowing it to fall to chaos. This only increased the power of the Devil, for as the land became more chaotic in nature, the true evil of man's heart became known. By the time the champion of good had noticed this, it was too late. His power had dwindled too much and there was little left he could do. Evil had won out and the Devil ruled the realms, both immortal and mortal.

What followed can only be termed as hell. The Devil turned the world into a torturous experience for mankind, forcing the masses to work and slave their lives away. Whisperings of rebellion were heard throughout the mortal realm. Gradually these whisperings grew into a roar. The people of the realm were not looking to fight for good, but to fight against evil. It was rumored that the Devil had lost his immortality during the great battle with his nemesis. It was the truth of this rumor that a group of powerful wizards were staking their lives on. These wizards had been born and raised in magical seclusion. No one knows their exact origins, only that they existed. This group of wizards, known simply as the Seven, fought their way into the Devil's immense castle and there engaged a magnificent battle. They gathered their collective energy and cast a suicide spell on the Devil, sending him and six of their members into oblivion.

This magical cataclysm tore the world asunder, shattering any concept of time or space. Everything was shifted and torn from their rightful places. The world left from this is a nexus, combining places and people from times and worlds beyond. Into this realm stepped the only one of the ancient Seven to survive the grand battle with the Devil, Lady Alecca. She vowed to try and restore what order they could in this new realm. She assumed the role of the gods and forged into this world left by the Devil's Silence.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=- Come and see what this phenomenon is all about. Devil's Silence offers: 54 classes 30 races Immortal, auto and equipment quests Clans and player houses All original areas And tons of pk fun!

mud.name: Eternal Dreams
mud.desc: This is a new mud with alot of moddifcations to the EOD code, its is still in the works. Im currently hiring coders and builders to help me get this mud up and running for people to play and have fun.
Email me at: lonewolf_boyd@sbcglobal.net
if im not online and you want to work here then just e-mail me and i will get back to you.

mud.name: Drugwars 2
mud.desc: Drugwars is a Grand Theft Auto style mud that offers players a modern day theme complete with Guns, Swords, Axes, Cell Phones, Drugs, Gangs, Cops, Organized Crime, a judicial system, a space program for exploring other planets, The codebase has been completely revamped and upgraded. Other ways to enjoy your time on the MUD include Assassination, Taxi Driver, Ambulance, Drug Trafficing and Police Missions. There are also a wide variety of sports that we have incorporated into this unique world. We have set up a newbie area that has a walkthrough on the web page to assist people that are new to this MUD as well as MUD’s in general.

mud.name: Fuzzy Space
mud.desc: Welcome to Fuzzy Space! We're a rather new furry-themed MUSH, with no other true theme than that. Here, you're free to socialize, roleplay, build or program, or any combination of the four. The game is still under construction, and players are encouraged to build large areas of their own.

mud.name: LusitaniaMOO
mud.desc: LusitaniaMOO is based on Orson Scott Card's Speaker for the Dead and takes place on Lusitania only 8 years after the colony is formed. The descolada has not yet struck its people.
Create a character and choose a profession. Also, this MOO is part of the InterMoo Channel System, linking several MOOs together through a chat channel.

mud.name: MicroMUSE
mud.desc: MuseNet, the Multi-User Science Education Network, is a system of computers in the domain musenet.org providing access to Educational MUSEs (Multi-User Simulated Environments), such as MicroMUSE and MariMUSE. It is based at MuseNet World Headquarters and supervised by Dr. Barry Kort (Moulton) with assistance from Kevin Kane (Frnkzk).

MUSEs are multi-user text-based virtual communities accessible via the Internet. They derive from popular text-based adventure games such as Adventure and Zork.
