But MUSEs support real-time interaction among many participants who collaborate to build their own world. Thus they support the constructivist model of learning, in the spirit of Dewey and Montessori. More than just multi-user programming environments, MUSEs foster a strong sense of community among participants.

MicroMuse is a multi-user simulation environment developed in the 1990s at Bolt Beranek and Newman. The system features explorations, adventures, and puzzles with an engaging mix of social, cultural, recreational, and educational content.
MicroMUSE / MuseNet has received the 1996 NII Award for pioneering innovations in Children's Education via the Internet.

mud.name: Virtustan MUD
mud.codebase: [Circlemud] very strong modifier by Russian and Ukrainian coders
mud.desc: Fully Russian MUD. Some English commands allowed also. There are few not standart races. Clan and not clan PK allowed. All Russian-spoken players welcome!

mud.name: DragonBall Z - 7 Stars
mud.desc: The MUD is currently running DBSC2.5.2 codebase. I am working on modifying this codebase, and builders are rebuilding the entire area. The game is in Alpha stages. The game is newbie friendly, and is open to suggestions while it is still in Alpha stages.
Looking for: Builders Enforcers 1 Coder

mud.name: Dragonball: The Hollow Chronicles
mud.desc: Welcome into the realms of Dragonball: The Hollow Chronicles. We run on a heavily modified DBNA 1.5 codebase. We recently took bits and parts from all of the different codebases and packed them into this one, making things even better and even more modified than any of the other dbz codebases out there. We offer a wide race selection, and its going to get even bigger, as we are going to mix in Bleach races and abilities as well, making it more half DBZ and half Bleach. Many exciting things are already added in, things that seperate us from other DBZ MUDs out there. DBZ names and Bleach names are also allowed on creation, so no worries about getting deleted because you want your name to be Goten, Gotenks, and so on. We welcome everyone with open arms, and our staff is also very mature, and always willing to assist the mortals when they have questions. The players are also the same way, if you need help finding a place to gain at, just ask, and everyone will be more than glad to help out. The staff is also always adding in new things code wise, and area wise. We have a strong building team, and a strong coding team, and we always take suggestions and ideas from the players, because it is the players who keep the MUD alive, not just us Immortals. So feel free to check us out! But most of all! Have fun!

mud.name: Minstrel Hall
mud.desc: Minstrel Hall is a small server with facilities to unite DMs and players for tabletop RPG sessions unrestricted by geography. We have Dungeons and Dragons campaigns involving players and DMs from Europe, the Americas, Australia, and more. The code is almost completely unrestricted - you can set up your character any way you like, change your stats at will, etcetera. The world is built on the fly by the Dungeon Masters, and if anything is needed that has not yet been coded, the coder/admin is usually online and able to assist.
Account names are subject to approval; character names are between you and the DM of your campaign.
(Note: Was known as RosDnD during alpha testing.)

mud.name: Necromundus
mud.desc: Website: http://www.jointhesaga.com Telnet: jointhesaga.com 3005

The realm of the dead is without its shepherd: Death is missing. Once a familiar sight at the crossroads of the glowing portals in the mystical purgatory city of Necromundus, the hooded skeleton has vanished without word or warning.

Chaos threatens. Meanwhile, Angels and Demons - trapped for eons amongst the lesser beings of these realms - hunt for the ancient Forbidden Portal. Through that door, it is said, they will achieve the might denied them by their predecessors. First, they must find the door. Then, they must find the key.
And may the powers of the cosmos protect anyone who stands in their way.
Connect to Necromundus at jointhesaga.com 3005

mud.name: Dragons Domain IV
mud.desc: New Zealand's premiere MUD, but open to all.
Extensively modified Envy codebase with dozens of features, classes, etc added.
Deity system based on a Pantheon, opt-in PKilling allowed.
Website and FAQ to come shortly. Come and give us a shot!

mud.name: My MUSH
mud.desc: Within these confines you'll find those Worlds you would love to be a part of. This is a MUSH for the imaginative person and good roleplayer; someone whom enjoys reading books and roleplay will find this experience an adventure that changes on a daily basis. There are no limitations to the experience you can have within the game.

This is not going to be the typical Roleplaying MUSH, solely focused on one World and time. We do love various Universes and would like to play them all, and in the same MUSH. More than that, to play them all and in different times. What worlds are we speaking of? At the moment, they would be three:
* Tolkien’s Middle-Earth (“The Silmarillion”, “The Lord of the Rings” and related books). * M.Z. Bradley’s Avalon and Camelot (“The Mists of Avalon”). * Martin’s Westeros (“A Song of Ice and Fire”).

We want to build a MUSH focused on high quality roleplay, book verse, and aimed at fleshing out the stories of those times a bit more, not changing them. Staying true to the books we love will be a major concern, and although members are not required to be experts, a certain respect and enthusiasm for the works of these authors should be common.

For those who have read the books and wished there were more detail in the stories, and all those blanks filled with dialogue and feelings are welcome to join and bring it all to life. At the moment we search for good players (and coders and builders!), to build a genuine and splendid site. There is a lot of available Book Chars waiting for you to play them.
Feel free to drop around and ask any question you might have.

mud.name: Xanadu Station
mud.desc: In the 25th century, humanity has spread far beyond the confines of the solar system. No alien life above the single-cell level has been encountered, but with bioengineering and cybernetics humans have become plenty alien already. Somewhere on the outskirts of settled space is Xanadu Station: a trading post for prospectors, hangout for criminals and lowlifes, and haven for all kinds of strangeness.
Xanadu Station MUSH is a free-form roleplay game that encourages original character design. Newbies and experienced roleplayers are welcome!
(Setting information and character creation are explained in the Station Museum on the MUSH itself. Feel free to log in as a guest and look around.)

mud.name: Blood-Lust MUD
mud.desc: Come play the game where your race, class, and alignment combination determine you which

mud.name: Star Wars: Evil Never Dies
mud.desc: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away.... Star Wars Evil never dies

It has been a month since the second dreaded death star had been destroyed over the planet of Endor. The New Republic has been gaining a foothold into the hearts of the citizens of the galaxy but the Empire continues to hold the rebel forces back but not with ease. The New Republic is organizing under a new Chief of State. The fleet is at its strongest and ready to strike. Though the Emperor was killed during the battle of Endor, rumor has it, a new leader is on the Imperial capital. Can the Empire continue to hold off the rebel fleet or, will the New Republic once again become the galactic power of the galaxy, or would a new threat emerge that would overwhelm both superpowers...

mud.name: Demoni And Dei
mud.desc: Smaug based, 1400's RPG, ad&d + ad&d2, pkill

mud.name: Gate to Assyria
mud.desc: He who has seen everything, I will make known to the lands. I will teach about him who experienced all things, ... alike, Anu granted him the totality of knowledge of all. He saw the Secret, discovered the Hidden, he brought information of the Time before the Flood. He went on a distant journey, pushing himself to exhaustion, but then was brought to peace. He carved on a stone stela all of his toils, and built the wall of Uruk-Haven, the wall of the sacred Eanna Temple, the holy sanctuary. Look at its wall which gleams like copper in the sun, inspect its inner wall, the likes of which no one can equal! Take hold of the threshold stone--it dates from ancient times! Go close to the Eanna Temple, the residence of Ishtar, such as no later king or man ever equaled! Go up on the wall of Uruk and walk around, examine its foundation, inspect its brickwork thoroughly. Is not the essence of the brick structure made of kiln-fired brick, and did not the Seven Sages themselves lay out its plans? One league city, one league palm gardens, one league lowlands, the plaza of the Ishtar Temple, three leagues and the Bazaar of Uruk it (the wall) encloses. Find the copper tablet box, open the ... of its lock of bronze, undo the fastening of its secret opening. Take and read out from the lapis lazuli tablet how Gilgamesh went through every hardship.

mud.name: TestMUD2
mud.desc: This listing is for Testing purposes only.
-Icculus

mud.name: Shade2
mud.desc: Hey Im xeno, owner of Shade, i've been coding this MUD for a while and thought it was time to ask players for suggestions on how to make it better :P, so if your a builder or coder stop by and leave me a personal or email me at Hotsauce2563@yahoo.com.

mud.name: Dragonball Tyrants Last Stand2
mud.desc: Dragonball: The Last Saga takes places one hundred years after a terrible cataclysm nearly destroyed the known universe. Now a new terror has revealed itself, threatening to once again engulf the universe in chaos. A call goes out to heroes and villians alike to join sides in the struggle to come. Will you preserve the light and bring hope to the universe? Or will you fight with the darkness and bring the universe to its knees?

mud.name: Hogwart's Wizard Town MUSH
mud.desc: Hello!
Welcome to Hogwart's Town MUSH! Hogwar'ts Wizard Town is a MUSH designed fr you to play your uniqu eindividually crafted characters in a unique place which you can play.
We are a Harry Potter MUSH theme with a large Hogwart's and city! We have spells which you can cast and we work on playing the Hogwart's experience to its fullest!
We take place in an alternate world in which Harry Potter was never born! There are no Feature Characters here so the whole world is yours to explore!

mud.name: Three Moons World
mud.desc: Three Moons World, in the past also known as RMUD, is back. We offer 75+ areas with 2000+ different mobiles and 4000+ different objects, all original. The game inherited a lot from ArcticMUD, but in general pretty much everything is rewritten from scratch.
Please note: this MUD is in Russian only. To be able to play, you will need to use a client that knows how to handle Cyrillic characters properly.

mud.name: Star Wars: Sagas
mud.desc: The Emperor is dead. The Rebel Alliance has begun the slow transition into organizing the New Republic but the old Empire is not so easily defeated. Coruscant remains loyal while Corellia has proclaimed political independence and Tatooine continues to boast the galaxy's most wretched hive of scum and villainy just outside of the weakened Empire's grasp. Other planets and systems throughout the galaxy are choosing sides every day; new leaders are emerging to guide their people and allies. Will you be one of them? The fate of the New Republic or the old Empire is still far from certain...
Come join us on Star Wars: Sagas! WE make the characters - YOU make the difference!

mud.name: V: The Visitors Return
mud.desc: _ ___ \"Citizens of the Planet Earth, We bring you Greetings, and we come in peace\" was their greetings when they landed... They Lied.
\"The Visitors are not our Friends! They've come to rape our Planet and kill us! They are not who they appear to be!\" was the Resistance call.

In October of 2001, the Visitor Motherships arrived over the cities of Earth, 50 in all. They claimed to have arrived intending peace, but they lied. They came to take us prisioner and to rob the planet of the resources. By the end of Novemeber, they controlled the planet. Lucky for the Earth, a Resistance was able to form, and beat them with the Red Dust.

After a full year, they came back, as the Dust wasn't completely effective, and now, can not be released again for enviornmental and Health reasons. The warmer regions are back under Visitor Control, all except LA, thanks to a deal brokered between the Visitors and Science Frontiers, who has taken over the LA Government. That was 6 months ago. Now the Resistance is in hiding, for the most part, looking for a way to cause the Visitors troubles.

V: The Visitors Return is a MUSH that allows you to take on the role of a Great Resistance Fighter, or an Evil Reptillian Visitor. Feature Characters from the NBC Mini-Series and Television Series are available for you to play. Visit us at mushland.com 1817

mud.name: Shades of Sorrow
mud.codebase: [Rot] modded to sd and gonna get modded more
mud.desc: hello i am looking to do something speacial with a mud. i know alot of people say that but in my case it is true. I am looking for mostly builders right now. who can help get things started and up and running. i already have a great coder. and just need to round out my staff. if you are looking for a postion email me. and talk to me on the mud just ask for marlboro.

mud.name: Mass Chaos
mud.desc: So, you want to know about Mass Chaos? Well, lets start here... What is Mass Chaos? Mass Chaos is the prodigal child of numerous snippets of Godwars, Mindcloud, and Dystopia code. It's a PK MUD, and I'll go ahead and say it right now: It's NOT for pansies. If you're gonna log on and ask \"What's PK?\", just do me a favor and ingest some Drano now. This is kill or be killed, and the sooner that is realized, the sooner you'll be climbing to the top. Yes, you'll probably die a few times getting started, but contrary to popular belief, the players here will be more than happy to help you... (But only so they can kill you later).

Here's the bottom line. If you're competitive, enjoy killing people, enjoy frequent changes, and appreciate staff members that listen to suggestions, you need to play this MUD... Plain and simple... If you whine or you're an effeminate hippie, you can play anyway, but you probably won't get very far. Why are you still reading this? Log on already.

mud.name: The Seventh Sun
mud.desc: Welcome to The Seventh Sun.
The world is set in a medieval time where the citizens are faced with many hardships both normal and strange.

When you have the challenge of day-to-day life in addition to the constant threat of the creatures from the Rift, wars from rival houses, and invasions from other lands, life becomes a little more interesting.
The game is based on a rich and intricate history that plays a huge part in the day-to-day lives of its citizens.
Everything that HAS happened affects what WILL happen, and YOU the player have the power to change it all.
Immerse yourself in a world waiting to be rebuilt and involve yourself with races ready to be brought into power and prosperity.
The world has waited a long time for you.
How long have you waited for it?

mud.name: Heroes MUSH
mud.desc: Inspired by the hit TV series that stirred the hero inside of millions of viewers around the world comes a roleplaying game that puts the future in your hands.
Heroes MUSH. Here, you'll see familiar faces like you've never seen them before and many new heroes -- and villains -- ready to take the forefront in the new era of evolution.

It's a big world out there. Those with evolved abilities are scattered all over the globe amidst billions of ordinary everyday people -- and they too are just everyday people, but perhaps not so ordinary. Regeneration. Time travel. Telekinesis. All of these unusual powers exist. There are those who would exploit these evolved humans: for control, money, power, scientific exploration or for the safety of the rest of the population... but most of the world doesn't realize these extraordinary people exist. Some of these unique humans want to save the world. Some want to end it. Some just want to make sure the bills get paid on time. They're just average people who have discovered they aren't so average.

After some people experienced life as a fugitive last volume, now, in Volume Five, we explore something a little simpler: humanity. What makes us human? Does having an ability make you more than human? Where do you belong -- where is your family? We'll face these questions, with some challenges along the way. We'll also meet the Sullivan Brothers Carnival, a travelling carnival full of people with abilities, living under the radar as colourful carnies, with their own sense of family and a lot of mysteries of their own. And as always ... prepare for some surprises as you join Heroes MUSH in Volume Five: \"Humanity\".

mud.name: Forgotten Dimensions
mud.desc: Aeons ago, the universe was not as it is today. A great realm known as Torial existed. The plane that was the universe had no beginning, no end. Yet darkness lurked in unwatched corners. Nazroth's hatred and malice sired a new realm of shadows, chaos, and destruction. War was unleashed and Torial broke apart under the violent stress as Good and Evil fought…
And now we live in a New World, or perhaps I should say... Worlds..

Forgotten Dimensions is a highly modified ROM/ROT combination MUD. Feel free and log on and totally forget about life in our quiet atmosphere. Create a character that will help you get lost in a world of Fantasy where Dragons fly through the skies and Magic is so very real. Humans aren't the only sentient beings and Nature is still a precious thing that will defend itself if it has to.

Stand on the side of good, evil or neutrality. Join in the role- play of a world where just about anything is possible and where the Immortals aren't just rumors. Immortals who don't base their rulership on fear and destruction. (Not unless it's rp anyway.) Become an adventurer and one day perhaps even a hero.

Although small, the playerbase is very loyal and rather interested in roleplaying and player killing. The mud has normal questing, area quests and arena. Runs are under construction. Further more the mud is still searching for people who are interested in building. The world needs to grow some more so the planets can be filled and the nexus opened so travel to other worlds can finally be launched. The mud has two tiers of 101 levels, 9 unique first tier classes and 18 unique second tier classes. There are 22 different races and 4 clans have been opened with several more on the way. For new players there is a newbie area to start in and additional support is given by the mud's fansite (www.stom66.com/fd) created by a few loyal players as repayment for the good times they had.
Update: Evil has returned and seeks new minions to do its biddings. Latest Area: Oceanside Docks

mud.name: The End of Infinity
mud.desc: The End of Infinity Game Server has alot to offer. MUD,BBS,Mangband with new games and servers added all the time.. We also have a great website and files/articles for you to enjoy. I ran this mud a few years ago but didn't have time to keep it up. I now have found the time and have restarted my project.. Old users are welcome as well as new players.
Thank you http://teoi.funcrew.info/index.html

mud.name: DBZ: Omega Scrolls
mud.desc: Welcome to DragonballZ: Omega Scrolls!

I have just started this DBSaga2.5.2 codebase up recently and hope to attract a few player testers but mostly admins! I need a staff! Especially coders/builders! I don't want to say that I want to create something different, blah blah blah, like everyone else, I just want to make a DB* themed mud that is fun and doesn't take 2 days to max out!
So please come and check us out!

mud.name: Blademaster: The Age of Darkness
mud.desc: Blademaster: The Age of Darkness picks up the story of the new Blademaster, Alana Steeldrake, right after the events of The Blademaster (the novel by Rick Bentsen) New Blademasters are being discovered, and they and their protectors are being trained in how to deal with the forces of Thraal.
Players can be on the side of Taelin or the side of Thraal... good or evil.
Currently still building, but we are looking for builders specifically to build out the rich world of Calthea.

mud.name: Dawn of Acheron
mud.desc: Still in early alpha.
Project started in mid 2005 after DoC (Distortions Of Chaos) closed.
We started and stopped work on it several times between 2005 and 2008.
But, work has started up again. Not a lot to see yet, but it might be cool to see some old faces from DoC, or new people that just want to see what we're up to!
--Distortions

mud.name: MTBS Nations at War
mud.desc: MTBS Nations at War (NAW) starts out simple enough, but is deceivingly addictive. Played in real-time, players (mayors) build a city that will stand the tests of time by climbing to the top ranks of the game.

The only way to do this is to research new technologies, build armies and structures, and ultimately attack and defend against other players. The game also features allegiances, resource sharing, live chat, and a private messaging system during game play.

All you need to join NAW is either a Mozilla Firefox or Internet Explorer browser, and no additional plug-ins or software is required. Add to the fun and encourage your friends to play! It's all free.
NOTE: This website can't link directly to the game. Go to mtbs3D.com's main site, and select \"MTBS Nations at War\" to play.

mud.name: The Vortex
mud.desc: . Code originally modified and mangled by . .. Satan, Sluggo, and Fang .. ... Later mangled further by Chasm ... .... ...and further by Kale .... ..... Then along came Kline... ..... ...... ...and further mutilated by Loimos! ...... ..... ..... .... Thanks go out to all the players .... ... for their inspiration, dedication, ... .. nagging, griping, whining, bitching, .. . and motivation to make us code =) .

mud.name: Pokemon Frontier MUCK
mud.desc: Be a Pokemon Trainer. Be a member of Team Rocket. Battle your Pokemon or show them off, it's all up to you. Pokemon Frontier MUCK lets you create characters who live in the world. Set in Kanto prior to the events of the games, the only real limits are your own imagination.

-Monthly staff-run events -Easy-to-use system for Pokemon capture -Completely freeform: Play a trainer, a Rocket, a breeder, a Pokemon, or anything else you can think of -Completely customizable: Build your own home, design your Pokemon -True to the original theme: No Pokemorphs, or other variations along those lines -Innovative battle formats based on the Battle Frontier and other spin-off games -Friendly and helpful staff
Your very own Pokemon adventure is about to begin!

mud.name: Sharune
mud.desc: Founded in the year of 1999, Sharune has been constantly evolving ever since at a rapid pace to become what it is today, a flourishing multiplayer online fantasy game. Whether you like the excitement of adventure, the satisfaction of improving your character or if you just strive for the thrill of fighting other players, search no more, Sharune is the answer to your prayers!

With an enormous and detailed world consisting of hundreds of unique areas and a very artistic map the lands of Sharune will let you embark on a journey that will never end. Unique and exciting monsters lurk in every corner of every dungeon, forest or dark tomb, hoarding treasures and magical items that will require the courage and lust for adventure that only -you- have!

You can play reknown races such as cave trolls, elves, dwarves and men, or adventure and fight as any of the multitude of other races that are completely unique to Sharune. The mysterious sphoraxuns(drake men) of the volcanic islands, the proud and noble raukburhrum(boar men) of the deep Altherinn forest, the bewinged mujuons of the mighty mountains and many, many others.

The amount of choice is too large to be described in a short review like this, the best thing you can do is to try it out yourself. Come to Sharune and become enthralled by our fascinating fantasy world!

mud.name: The Rebirth of Static Chaos
mud.desc: Welcome to The Rebirth of Static Chaos. Static Chaos was derived from Chaosium, a great MUD started by a man known as Alathon 5 years ago.Over that time, it has gone from full Merc to about 95% original coding to emulate Godwars.

<u>We're in the beta stage, so we are currently maxxing</U> <u>anyone's first character on the MUD, and setting their</u> <u>2nd character halfway there, so it doesn't hurt to give</u> <u>us a shot. We love getting new faces.</u>
We offer 5 classes, and are currently working on 2.

<u>Saiyans</u> - Dragonball Z <u>Patryns</u> - Deathgate Novels <u>Fists</u> - Fists of The North Star <u>Sorcerers</u> - Slayers <u>Mazoku</u> - Slayers <u>Paladins</u> (Construction) - Diablo II <u>Patriots</u> (Construction) - Metal Gear Solid partially.

We offer a pretty intense PK environment. Players love to battle eachother to the death in group fights, clan wars, 1on1s, and tournaments, where you can win nice prizes. It gets pretty competitive in here, so make sure you're up for intense PK.
The fights are pretty balanced at the moment, but we're always working on making them more balanced and skill oriented.
We've also got Gundams coded from scratch. Build up your skills from Leo to Epyon and show everyone what a machine can do when you attack them unexpectedly.
<u>Free Suit Stats are given in Beta.</u>
Our current projects are....
Challenge, Challenge watch, Challenge bet (90% in) Runes/Socketed Armor - (Diablo II) Arcade/Casino betting/playing Getting a Web Page up with Strategies and Newbie guides
Our MUD is quite unique, and I think if you give it a shot, you'll see what we have to offer that all the other MUD's don't.
I'm the Owner of the MUD, Saladin, if you need anything you can E-Mail me at MichaelShuff@gmail.com. Look forward to seeing you, and watch your head...

mud.name: Industry Shakedown [mud]
mud.desc: 40000 years after the Ring was destroyed, Isildur's ghost looms in the heavens somewhere on the astral plane. The silence of Mt. Doom is broken by a roaring eruption, and the lands, quiet after years of peace, grow dark once again as the Nazgul fly. Isildur's Ring is reforged amongst the balrog's greatest smiths, and out from the depths of Mordor come stumbling the vilest creatures and most horrid troops of Isildur's army. The revenge is afoot as the adventure begins somewhere in Middle Earth...

mud.name: Paranoia
mud.codebase: [NiMUD] Official MUD of the Paranoia RPG by Mongoose Publishing
mud.desc: In most scenarios, each player character is in fact a mutant, commie and/or secret society member, and is given a hidden agenda separate from the group's goals, often involving swindling or killing teammates. Hence the name, Paranoia. Therefore, Troubleshooter missions invariably turn into a constant comedy of errors as everyone on the team seeks to double-cross the others while keeping their own secrets. The game encourages an air of suspicion between the players, offering several tips on how to make Paranoia as paranoid an experience as possible. If the lasers come out before the players are out of the briefing room, the game is on the right track.

Since every character comes in a six-pack of clones, death is less of an issue than in most RPGs, allowing Troubleshooters to be routinely killed (either deliberately or accidentally); instead of leaving the game, the player simply portrays the next member of the clone family, who is assigned to continue the mission. This easy spending of lives tends to frequent firefights, gruesome slapstick, and frequent horrible and humorous demise. The term 'six-pack' is intentional, and is allegedly part of game design, where each player is given a six-pack of beer to represent his remaining clones.

mud.name: LyokoMUSH v2.0
mud.desc: LyokoMUSH v2.0 is the original LyokoMUSH, reborn. The overall plot has taken an AU turn though a large chunk of it still remains canon according to Season 4 of the show 'Code:Lyoko'.

All new players start out on the web on a server not much different to that of the original Lyoko and are given full ability to roam and explore adjacent areas and servers. An extensive combat system is also included now in the form of a highly modified d20 system as well as some added bonuses. All players are given ample chance to build their players stats in the initial Character Generation.

Players are mostly separated by class known as 'factions' and these are both thoroughlly covered in both combat and roleplay. The three active factions are 'XANA' (obvious), 'Guardians' (the original Lyoko Gang and followers), and 'Unaffiliated' (those who desire not to follow any one person).
Roleplaying is still fully encourage and active plots still linger over players every day with more being brainstormed behind the scenes constantly.
There is always something to do on LyokoMUSH. Join us and have fun.

mud.name: d20MUD: Age of Dragons
mud.desc: The War of the Lance is over and peace has returned to the free lands of Ansalon. Or has it? The dragonarmies have been defeated, but not eradicated, and there are new threats forming throughout Ansalon.

The minotaurs build their war machine on their Bloodsea Isles, biding their time and preparing for conquest. Chemosh is growing an army of the dead, and preparing to unleash it upon the free peoples. The dragonarmies have crowned new Highlords, and rumor has it that a new knighthood is being created by the late Lord Ariakas' son, Ariaken.

No, not all is as it seems. Peace is fleeting in Krynn, for though evil will turn on itself, it never sleeps for long. It is up to men and women like you, brave hero, to ensure that these horrors and more do not destroy the victory that was gained by the Knights of Solamnia and their allies.
d20MUD: Age of Dragons is an Open Gaming License rules MUD. The Open Gaming License rules are also found in such systems as the d20 System, D&D 3.5e and Pathfinder.

We are a role play encouraged game with automatic rewards for those who role play. We have a central quest line that will take your character through a gripping story of good versus evil. We are constantly building on this main quest line, and adding side quests with their own unique stories.

We have implemented about 85% of the d20 srd, with some modifications from other systems (such as the pathfinder srd). We offer a custom crafting system as well with the option of being a full time artisan and foregoing combat altogether. Our combat is turn based and is always growing and becoming more feature-rich.

We add new content on a daily basis, with 3 or 4 new things added almost every day. Our player base, though currently small, is growing as well, with each week bringing in new blood who add to our already friendly and helpful community.
If you like dragonlance, role play, and OGL-style rules, then you will love d20MUD: Age of Dragons. Come check us out!

mud.name: MutantMUSH
mud.desc: MutantMUSH is home to those who possess supernatural powers of various types. There are some who are able to walk through walls, can teleport, can create and control the very elements themselves. The appearance of these new subspecies has come into the public awareness very recently, but is unknown just how long they have been around. The public opinion varies from acceptance to down right hate.

Anti-Mutant protest and hate groups have started to surface and have started to become more evident throughout the country. With the growth of these powers, law enforcement is at a loss for a way to control the threats that they bring. It is a constant battle to keep up with the growing threat that constantly seems to grow with each passing day. The constant struggle to keep law and order in the city. Protests, rallies and hate crimes have started to appear throughout the city as more and more mutants are revealed. The law enforcement has been forced to create the Mutant Task Force (MTF) in hopes to battle these recent string of Mutant related incidents.

The lines have been drawn and the tension is starting to build. The world is changing and there are those who embrace the new stage in evolution while others fear and hate it. The government has yet to take a position on the new mutants. Mutants must now decide if they are going to use their new found powers to help mankind or for personal gain.
Which side of the line will you stand on?

mud.name: Silver Millennium
mud.desc: ====================================================================== Silver Millennium is based off of the Sailor Moon anime, with just a few differences. There are still many Feature Characters available and Originals are always welcome! ======================================================================

Fast forward one thousand years past the time of the Silver Millennium. The souls of those who had died in the final attack on the Moon Kingdom have been sent into the future to be reincarnated - well, the future as in now. Present day. Tokyo, Japan. Queen Serenity had saved them all, but none remember anything about who they were, or anything about the Moon Kingdom and the Silver Millennium. If, however, evil forces should try to repeat what happened on the Moon, Queen Serenity ensured that Luna and Artemis (cats, and Royal Advisors of the Moon Kingdom) would be prepared - everything they would need for future earth was sent along with them. When the time came they would know what to do.

Cue present day. Princess Serenity has been reborn as Serena Tsukino, and the other guardians (Sailor Scouts and Guardian Knights) along with Prince Endymion (Darien) have been reborn as well. None recall their past lives, and all seem to be pretty normal, typical teenagers living their lives and doing things they love. Unfortunately, their happy lives are about to be shattered. ======================================================================

mud.name: Army Wars
mud.desc: pick a class join a clan and battle to win

mud.name: Day of Dreams
mud.desc: Day of Dreams is a brand new SMAUG based multi user game like no other, fresh out of the box we are looking for dynamic new staff to help us develop something nobody has experienced with SMAUG yet. If your a fan of Braveheart, Tolkien, drop us a line or stop in, we would like the pleasure of meeting you.
We are developing new aspects of gameplay that belong to no other SMAUG MUD, we are looking for staff to fill all positions, we will train the right applicants.
www.dayofdreams.org.uk [Website] support@dayofdreams.org.uk [Email] forum.dayofdreams.org.uk [Forum]
[Host: dod.dayofdreams.org.uk ][Port: 6767]

Day of Dreams has its own host [www.azure-nova.com] which is hosted by our very own Aldar Devilsbane our server admin. This means Day of Dreams can offer the best of service to its players, and fellow members of staff.

mud.name: Murderous Retaliation
mud.desc: Murderous Retaliation started as an EoD back in 2003, then ported to Dystopia 1.2 on February 2007.
Mud is bilingual spanish/english, language chosen on account creation.
Players can max their character very fast and be ready for pk, but can also continue improving, in such a way that casual vs hardcore characters fights are not unfair.
No ganging is allowed, unless all parties involved have declared themselves as gangers.
All classes have been carefully balanced: each class is balanced to every other class.
Although not newbie-friendly, lots of help files are available for knowledgeable godwars/dystopia players to learn the many new features and powers. Just be sure to read 'help newbie'.
We want your head! Come and try to get ours!

mud.name: Split Infinity
mud.desc: Split Infinity is an LPMud run by the Spirits, with help from the Arches (people with the rank of Prince/Princess, Regent or King/Queen), the other creators (people with a rank of Page or higher) and the players.

mud.name: Battlestar: Odyssey of the Hyperion MUSH
mud.desc: 39,594 Survivors...

This game, set in the universe of the new, reimagined Battlestar Galactica series, follows the adventures of a second battlestar, the Hyperion. Her mission to escort a deep-space mining fleet saved her from destruction when the Cylons attacked and destroyed the Colonies and the rest of the Colonial Fleet. Now, alone in the universe and with the Cylons hunting them, the Hyperion and her small fleet of ships must find a new place to call home...
Battlestar: Odyssey of the Hyperion can be located at bloodshed.org port: 1138. Join us.

mud.name: Vampire wars - Origin of the Myth
mud.desc: The land knew only peace and silence.. until greed befell a small band of men; who sought their fortunes in raiding the tombs of the dead. Hiding amongst the Drow peoples, they entered into an ancient mausoleum. Within, there was but a solitary, stone grave. Opening the lone plot, it gave way to reveal a corpse, mummified in such a state the men were astounded that what was within still appeared living. The corpse, decorated in glittering jewels, was what they had came for. One of the men immediately reached for a ruby ring, still upon the hand of its now dead owner. The hand moved.

Having awakened Caine from his torpor, he perished the men to the life of the damned. Seeking to reclaim his former legacy, Caine sought out only the most ruthless and careful of men to assist him in his conquest; and thus he begot Amano, Scooby, Ponthar, & Malena. As in the traditions of what later became the Camarilla, they began to restore the glory of the undead within the land...

mud.name: Divided Skies MUSH
mud.desc: AIVAS was a fantastic discovery.

Among other things, the wonderful machine gave us the secrets to our earliest beginnings. It gave us plans and designs for technology that seemed something out of our wildest dreams. From it we learned how to make lenses for seeing the very small or the far away. We learned how to turn trees into paper and bind them into books with more ease than hide. But most importantly, we learned how to get rid of Thread.
Or so we thought.

The plan was so simple that it was beautiful. Use the dragons to get the engines from the floating ships and set them in strategic locations on the surface of the Red Star. Ignite them in sequence and push the asteroid out of its orbit. Floating through empty space, we didn't think the Star could have changed that much.
That was the first of our fatal errors.

When we ignited the engines, they didn't fire in sequence as planned. They all fired together. Our second mistake was the positions we placed them. How were we to know that impacts from other celestial bodies over the years had weakened the internal structure? How could we have guessed that our attempt to push the Red Star away would break it in half and double our worries?

The resulting chaos plunged our world into disorder. Two comets with alternating orbits meant that we were now facing Passes of an estimated 200 turns, with only 50 year Intervals in between. For the first time in our history, we found ourselves with the very. very real threat of planetwide civil war.

Nerat is the only Hold in the Northern Continent openly supportive of the Progessive philosophy; who say to use what we've been given and continue to grow from the information AIVAS provides. All others are either carefully neutral or openly for destroying the computer and sticking to the traditions that have carried us this far.
Traditionalists versus Progressives.

There's been enough of an outcry that the Weyr Council - in an effort to keep the peace and act as protection for the Crafters still in the AIVAS complex - sped up its plans to settle a Weyr in the mountains south of the complex.

Two queens close to rising have come forth to lead this exodus, but not all see this project as a positive step. Many are against it and so the party they lead into the untamed south is small. They must work against the marked candles to bring their Eastern Weyr up to fighting fit before Southern withdraws its coverage.
We don't know much about our future, but one thing is for certain.
Life on Pern will never be the same.

mud.name: Amaranth
mud.desc: Amaranth is returning...

What we're going to do this time is start with a ROM2.4b6, and use a level based system with remorts. We'll be implementing all dark ages vampire clans and werewolf tribes initially, but we're going to try and keep it fairly simple at first.
Currently hiring an experienced coder or two, as well as builders and writers.

mud.name: Rune MUD
mud.desc: This is a remake of the original Rune MUD that was closed down almost two years ago. We have now reopened under new management from former immortals of the origninal version, Fewa and Scape.

We are a RPG based MUD. Area's, race and class selection are mainly based off of other famous RPG's for various systems, ranging from all sorts of sources from Final Fantasy and Wildarms to Langrisser and Bahamut Lagoon. We are currently offering a newbie friendly MUD with lands that you may recognize from various games that you may of played. We also offer creation of various pieces of equipment by collecting items dropped from monster. Though you can still buy and find equipment in traditional style MUD. One thing that sets us apart from other RPG MUD's, is our materia system, or a version similar to that of Final Fantasy 7. You can find materia all over the world and embed them into one of three slots which gives you access to spells that are contained within it. After battles you gain AP which is used to increase the level of your equipped materia and allows you to gain access to even more destructive spells.

I hope that you would enjoy your stay. Feel free to ask our staff any questions or concerns. We are currently still building our world and are looking for new builders to help increase the size of our MUD.
Thank you, Fewa

mud.name: Amaranth-mud
mud.desc: We are a WoD game based in Dark Ages Prague. Currently accepting all Vampire Clans, and most Bloodlines, Garou Tribes, and most other Shifters, Mortal and Ghoul characters.

The time setting is 1225, when the conflict between Lord Jurgen and Rustovich is at its peak, with handfulls of Tzimisce, Ventrue and Toreador falling every night. The other Clans cannot help but turn their attention to the fighting, and Prague, recently having two Princes up and disappear, is feeling the tension strongly.

We're RP Enforced, so if you're looking for a hack and slash mud,you're better off if you keep looking. However, if you're looking for a creative evironment where you can build a complex character and get involved in countless storylines, you should take a look. Even if you don't know the first thing about White Wolf, we are newbie friendly, with the staff and the player offering advice or help to anyone with any questions.

A background does need to be sent in, and accepted before a character is classed and may RP, but we work hard to make the process as quick and effective as possible, so you won't wait weeks, or ever days to be classed, or hear about the status of your character or application.
Most of all, we are an open, and normally friendly group of staff and players, and we look forward to playing with new and interesting players and characters.

mud.name: Land of Chaos the new Era
mud.desc: Land of Chaos has been up for years. We have been through alot well its back and im the new owner. I have aquired a copy of the code through my friend Melfice. Changes are being made people are coming back. Give it a shot we have MOSTLY custom classes. HUGE areas and new eq being added in all the time. Our players who are here have been here for awhile. They are willing to help ANYONE new out. If you played LoC come back home people, If you havent welcome to your new home. The MUD is based soly on Mightrate. Kingdoms and Kingdom halls are offered. So come on in and join the intense pk and great MUD environment. I am hiring new builders and MAYBE a coder.
Thank you all for reading, Kezzerdrix And the entire Imm staff

mud.name: relik muD
mud.desc: ###################################################################### #Straight forward mud where you can do what you chose under a moral # #standard. You can build your own continents or cities. You can idle # #here so you don't have to worry about being kicked off the game. You# #can chat here and all things liked I will try to provide with time. # #I would like help providing things everyone likes on this mud. # ######################################################################

mud.name: Realm of Nosferatu
mud.desc: RoN is a new Rom2.4b that has been slightly updated. MUD is Vampires, there are lots of room for new builders to make thier name here

mud.name: Star Wars: Infinite Galaxy
mud.desc: Star Wars: Infinite Galaxy has been in active development since December of 2002. The code base has grown considerably over the past few years. SW:IG is currently open to all players. We are also actively seeking immortals to fill the positions of Architects and Ship Architects. Please contact Keberus or Trelar if interested.

mud.name: The Wire
mud.desc: The Wire will be a Cyberpunk MUD with most of the emphasis on Role-Playing. It is currently in development, and as such does not have a dedicated address at this time. I'm still modifying and writing the code, adding new features on a daily basis.
The future design of The Wire will be heavily influenced by feedback from interested parties.

A few of the features, without giving too much away, include: *A realistic communication system. *Player Housing. *Realistic travel systems. *Cybernetic Implants. *A system that allows players to form RP Groups, assign a GM (temporarily granting them powers to make their job easier) and awards players for well done RP.
I am currently in desperate need of Builders, Testers, and RP Groups who are willing to help guide development.

mud.name: Legend of Deaths embrace after dark
mud.desc: Pure pk.. Were here to have fun and thats it.. Has great IMMs... Nothing much to say check it out ur self =)

mud.name: New Devils Silence
mud.desc: Since the beginning of time there has existed a base struggle between the forces of good and the forces of evil. Until now. Long ago, the land was dominated by two major immortal forces, one, the champion of good (whose name has been lost in the ages), and the Devil, champion of evil. Within their immortal hordes were angels, demons and all other forms of magical beings. Eternally they warred, never winning, never losing. Little did they realize that their true power lied in their mortal followers. Neither of the two paid any attention to the mortal plane..allowing it to fall to chaos. This only increased the power of the Devil, for as the land became more chaotic in nature, the true evil of man's heart became known. By the time the champion of good had noticed this, it was too late. His power had dwindled too much and there was little left he could do. Evil had won out and the Devil ruled the realms, both immortal and mortal.

What followed can only be termed as hell. The Devil turned the world into a torturous experience for mankind, forcing the masses to work and slave their lives away. Whisperings of rebellion were heard throughout the mortal realm. Gradually these whisperings grew into a roar. The people of the realm were not looking to fight for good, but to fight against evil. It was rumored that the Devil had lost his immortality during the great battle with his nemesis. It was the truth of this rumor that a group of powerful wizards were staking their lives on. These wizards had been born and raised in magical seclusion. No one knows their exact origins, only that they existed. This group of wizards, known simply as the Seven, fought their way into the Devil's immense castle and there engaged a magnificent battle. They gathered their collective energy and cast a suicide spell on the Devil, sending him and six of their members into oblivion.

This magical cataclysm tore the world asunder, shattering any concept of time or space. Everything was shifted and torn from their rightful places. The world left from this is a nexus, combining places and people from times and worlds beyond. Into this realm stepped the only one of the ancient Seven to survive the grand battle with the Devil, Lady Alecca. She vowed to try and restore what order they could in this new realm. She assumed the role of the gods and forged into this world left by the Devil's Silence.

-Devil's Silence - A highly addictive RoT PK mud. Sometimes, in order to make friends, you have to KILL them! 26 classes, 36 races, daily immortal, auto, and equipment quests, an arena, multitudes of areas, and plenty of attitude. Devil's Silence offers clans as well as player housing. Newer and better things are currently in progress as well. Come on over and see what this phenomenon is all about.

mud.name: Isles of Aedin
mud.desc: Immerse in a diverse,fully-functional fantasy of magic,war, history,and legend. The Galatean Empire has fallen,leaving the races of Aedin once again in control of their fates. The power of the Gods has waned over the centuries,giving the realm over to the trials and triumphs of the mortals and their impermanent desires. The Imperial City of Danewyr, left to the governance of the Old Nobles after the triumphant rebellion of the Alliance, has crumbled from infighting and sedition; however,the Trade City of Urda thrives as a central metropolis of cultural diversity, religious freedom, racial understanding. The small academy village of Travers, where many of the realmâ€™s adventurers have learned the arts of combat,healing,and runes,bustles with the activities of the young and old perfecting their chosen professions. Denizens of Aedin adventure and seek to rebuild the lands ravaged by war and tyrannical rulers, yet whispers of the evil long since past sifts through the winds,caressing the lips of those who would speak its name.
It is up to you to remember who you once were, and who you will becomeâ€¦

mud.name: Star Wars: New Horizons
mud.desc: Star Wars: New Horizons takes place 5 years after the fall of the Empire at the Battle of Endor. SW:NH is a MUSH where the emphasis is on Role-Play, not Roll-Play. While we do plan to have a detailed CharGen process, this is only to help facilitate the player-base in their search for engaging and entertaining Role-Play. We are running the latest version of the PennMUSH server with no hard code modifications. What this means for the players, is that we will be able to keep the server up to date without having to worry about system getting broken. While the overall focus of the game in public areas is PG13 rated, we do expect that players will wish to play out scenes that are of a more adult oriented focus and provide the player with a small quota to create objects they can drop on the game grid so they may be out of site for these scenes. A space system is in the works so that players can own ships and have grand space battles just like in the movies.

Currently the game is under development and not open to the general public. We are however hiring coders and builders to help speed along the development of the game so we can open as soon as possible. If you are interested in applying for a position as a coder or builder, please feel free to email a resume of your coding/building experience to jaren@newhorizonsmush.net.

mud.name: Scarlet
mud.codebase: [Unknown] Talked based on nuts333, now heavily modified.
mud.desc: Although not a mud Scarlet is a talker that mudders may enjoy, many of members do mud on a regular basis.

mud.name: Esoterica MUX
mud.desc: Esoterica -- an erotic, modern horror MUX with an original theme -- is now open in Beta. We're set in fictional Innswich, MA, with a 1:1 IC/OOC time ratio and use a free RPG known as The Window (http://www.mimgames.com/window/).

We differ from some adult MU*s in that we have a full character sheet, are a little more limited in scope, and tinysex isn't as in your face in public. We are like other adult MU*s in that we want to provide players with a safe, sane and consensual environment to explore fun and fantasies. Of course since we are an adult game, all players should be at least 18 years old.

Rather than divide our players into the usual horror races (such as vampires, shapeshifters, faeries, magic users) we have two races: Humans and Oddkin -- a subrace of humans with special powers as varied as the imagination of the players behind them. More information is available on the web or in our news.

mud.name: CrueltyMUSH
mud.desc: CrueltyMUSH is a BDSM/Bondage/Sexual Slavery MUSH.
It is not intended for anything else.
The theme is completely original, based partly on fantasy BDSM
and partly on a Hyborean model for some areas. Slaves are treated
as slaves OOC and IC - not RL. OOC, however, a slave is a slave.
He or she has to kneel, say \"Mistress\" and \"Master\" OOCly, etc.
It is a very different model, not based entirely on GOR at all
but more of the Fantasy and a unique flavor.
Good RPers are needed, as are slaves who wish to experience
a different way of total slave immersion.

mud.name: Wisney
mud.desc: Wisney has been around for more than a decade, but due to an unfortunate series of server crises a few years ago has lost much of its player base. Wisney is a fully operational, modified CircleMUD.
We want YOU to come play our game!
Wisney offers:

*65 mortal levels *Unlimited multiclass (remort) anytime after you are level 50 *Race selection *An implemented clan system waiting for players *An implemented quest system (quest points which allow you to use quest skills) waiting for players *Many original zones (Sesame Street, The North Pole, Skullcap, The Land of Tarot, et al), plus more zones being worked on RIGHT NOW! *lots of original coding
If you used to play wisney, come on back! If you've never been to wisney, come on over!

mud.name: Vampire Wars: Blood Omen
mud.desc: Vampire Wars: The Blood Omen shines a promising new light into the dark world of Vampire worlds and lore. Sticking near the code source as it was released, the battles between the clans shall be heated and fierce as they struggle for the power and others descend into torpor for centuries. The admin pride themselves in being newbie friendly and open to suggestions. You are the hunter. You are the hunted. Can you survive the madness that becomes The Blood Omen?

mud.name: Dark Age of Cybertron
mud.desc: NOW HIRING A CODER. LOG IN AND SEE DISCORDIA. WILL EVEN PAY.

Four million and three thousand years ago, the war on Cybertron continues to go strong, despite the levels of available energon sinking further and further each cycle. Much of the planets' former architecture and lands has been destroyed, with only a few small oasis left here and there, hidden away on the surface or deeper inside Cybertrons' inner layers.

From the towering pinnacle of Polyhex, the Decepticons dominate the skies with their air superiority, led by the ruthless Megatron. Inside the halls of their Flight Academy, seekers emerge as trained warriors, ready to serve for the glory of the Empire.

Hidden under the dome of Iacon, the heroic Autobots have been driven practically underground, where their landbound forms gave them an edge in the constricted underlayers. Led by the powerful, honorable Optimus Prime, they accept all comers into their own training facility hidden inside Cybertron's second layer, and struggle to keep themselves, and the refugees from the war protected and functioning. A daunting task, indeed, and some may say a futile task.

And finally, there is Crystal City. The last beacon of the golden age of Cybertron on the surface, its' walls shimmer still with the power of Energon, though not as brightly as it did back then when all of its' collectors were opened fully to the sky. Even it felt the strain of resources from constant attacks by the Decepticons. Closing its' gates to immigrants, it claims full neutrality, remaining a trading hub for citizens of any faction, and guarded by the last of the ancient Guardians - Omega Supreme, and his brothers - and the elite Crys Guard, champion-monks of the Temple of Primus. Led by the honorable, if manipulative Solarix, it intends to hold out to the bitter last, and even Megatron knew that razing the city would destroy the largest energon source left on the planet.

Energy resources on the planet change hands frequently, and each faction has a distinct military and citizenry to it. Join the Transformers as not seen before in three million and one thousand years! Plots will range from planet-scale, to Spotlight focus, with a custom made, OPTIONAL combat and advancement system.
Dark Age of Cybertron is very close to opening for applications, with hopes of having an official 'opening tinyplot' of epic scale in early january after the holidays!
For now, we seek out staffers - plotstaff for long term, and descers for the grid. Knowledge of Cybertron and Transformers is essential.
check out darkages.isunlimited.net: 7775 and speak to Discordia. She's on usually in the evenings.

mud.name: Wake
mud.desc: Built on a ROM codebase, many modifications have been made to enhance gameplay, creating a fun, customizable interaction that promotes ease of use, skill, and technique. Among its features are attackspeed based combat, skill trees, class changing, and many gameplay tweaks.

Rather than traditional rounds in which everyone hits at the same time, each player attacks individually based on their own speed. This allows for increased customization and use of strategy, but only in that skills can be timed to coincide with attacks, regular players can continue to use skills as they did on stock ROM without hindrance. Spells are based on a cast time, rather than post-cast lag, giving them a more realistic feel, and creating gameplay elements related to antimages and fighters. At certain levels, players change classes, starting as a Tenderfoot, they refine their training through a class tree that results in a final, specific class. For instance, a player could go from tenderfoot, to fighter, to rogue, to assassin, or from tenderfoot, to mystic, to mage, to wizard. There are eighteen planned final classes, and further customization within each. Classes use a skill tree which is tailored to the player's class. Players receive skill points at each level which can be used how the player wants. Skill points can be used to increase each skill up to level five, which increases the power of effectiveness of the skill. This allows players the option to either spread the points out and gain every skill at an average level, or specialize in a certain field. There have also been numerous smaller changes to enhance the gameplay experience, including groups saving through quits and copyovers, and many unique skills and skill functionality.

mud.name: A Dragonball Saga
mud.desc: A Drag(*)nball Saga is a mud based off the original Dragonball (FE) created by Trenton. Using Trenton's UltiMUD, I have created an enviroment I think players will enjoy, using creative ASCII Maps, and a unique Battle System involving the players skill and timing.
-Spencer

mud.name: MC 3.0
mud.desc: Mindcloud 3.0 is back. This version of Mindcloud didn't stay open for long seeing as Mindcloud Muds slowly lost there players. I figured i would try to rerun this mud, since i see there are no Mindclouds running.
It was either Mindcloud or a Eod while i work on my other mud, and i figured Mindcloud is less of a headache as well as less of a memory hog.
This mud offers all the Stock Mindcloud classes. Nothing out of the ordinary.
Feel free to drop by if you wish to play. I most likely won't be doing must work to this mud. After all its just a play mud for players to mess around with while i work on my main mud.

mud.name: Twiztid Serial Killers
mud.desc: Welcome to the realm of Shangri-La! Your expedition is to find your path to Shangri-La. Will you follow the devout and worthy path of the righteous? Are you going to descend to wicked and immoral ways of damnation? Perhaps will be neutral, stand on the side lines and watch the outcome of all mortals fate? What you decide will be the echo of your live, past, present and future. Come join us and see what is here waiting for you.

mud.name: Crossroads
mud.desc: The Crossroads staff and players welcome you to come explore our world of over 10,000 rooms. Crossroads features a side map, which can be toggled on or off at your liking. We offer activities which players are able to take part in either solo, in a group, or against one another. These activities include but are not limited to autoquesting, global questing, campaigns, war tournaments, hot potato, scrabble, and live events run by our immortal staff. We also offer team activities such as freeze tag. Three types of clans are available for those who like to play competitively or just want to socialize, relax and have fun. If you are new to player- killing, we offer clans specifically designed for experimentation without equipment loss.

There are 6 classes, each of which branch out into unique subclasses. We have over a dozen races which evolve as you grow stronger. There are 90 mortal levels, but it does not end there. Upon heroing, players are able to gain faux levels, which may be spent on new abilities and bonuses for their characters.
Crossroads harbors a small MUD community where all new faces are welcomed, and ideas are appreciated.
Your destiny is here at the Crossroads!

mud.name: DBS: Arena
mud.desc: This game is running the DBS codebase, but in the future gameplay will be nothing like that of previous DBS games, which should set it apart from the others.
So far, the game has already been changed to move away from mindless, mundane spam killing of mobs, and is being tailored for a fun and enjoyable experience for everyone.

mud.name: Cru'en'tus MUD
mud.desc: Cru'en'tus Mud is based off the Browser-based game Cru'en'tus.

Players will have the choice to command armies of varies countries throughout the world or become a soldier in they army. Battles will be fierce and death will meet many when opposing forces try to conquer each other in order to maintain peace or to rule the world. It is up to you to decide whether your country will be safe or if it will become nothing but a memory.
*We are not open for player testing

mud.name: Clash For Power
mud.desc: This is a newly created mud derived from the DBSC2.5 codebase. Assmar, Zafin, and I, have all put hours of time and effort into creating a unique playing field for DBZ mudders and mudders alike. We are confident that once you try out our mud and see all of the additions, you'll be back for more. We have a good, growing community that continues to grow each day.

Our mud offers the player the choice to create from many of your favourite Dragonball races such as: Saiyan, Halfbreed, Human, Icer, Namek, Android, Bio-Android, Kaio, Demon, Genie, Tuffle, Wizard, Mutant and Dragons. These races are never complete because they are always being updated!

We generally try to focus on making Player Kill fun and interesting by offering lots of new ways to try and kill a player alone, or with a partner! We've added numerous additions such as HP regeneration, instant death, invisibility, and much more. Just come by and check it out! Remember, the address once again is: cfp.slayn.net:3050!
Thanks for taking the time to view our listing.
- Clash For Power Staff.

mud.name: Empire of Rome
mud.desc: Rome, once the mightiest Empires this world has known, is now remade. Come walk its streets, visit people from Greece, Egypt, Africa, and beyond. Help repel the barbarian hordes from the north and learn to appreciate the culture of the city Rome itself. Witness the Games of Caesar in the Coliseum as gladiators battle it out. Wager you hard earned Denarii on your favorite and then treat yourself to a night out in Rome. Adventure awaits the person who seeks it in one of the mightiest cities of the ancient world. Come, join the Empire today and become a Citizen of Rome!

mud.name: Tranquil Destruction
mud.desc: Right now theres not much to say. Other than I am looking for 2 - 4 coders and 4 - 6 builders. The Mud will be totaly Revampped and changed for the better. I know most coders dont like to code on ROM code base muds, but I am asking and begging for a few. You can come on to the mud and send me a tell saying what possition you want. If I am not on the mud please send me a email.
Builders must have experince of about 1 year. Coders must have experince of about 1 1/2 - 2 years.
Thank you for taking your time to read this,
Vladimir
P.S. Color code is not in but if a few coders come along. Well there will be alot of colors and stuff. Right now its just a Stock ROM, soon to be mod.

mud.name: Abaddon Mud
mud.desc: Currently seeking builders and creative minds. Abaddon is based off a world after death, the ultimate sentence. Abaddon, being another name for hell, is the world you are sent to for your crimes, your mis- deeds, and/or your wrong-doings.
Lightwalkers/Darkwalkers/(working on no neutrals)..
Classes and Races already coded in from previous mud work from Forsakenlands and AR, new races coming/classes coming. Builders wanted and needed to help finish world. Currently in devolepment stages.
Come be a part of a mud which will exist for years to come!

mud.name: Audio World
mud.desc: Creative minds, artistic hearts, adventurous spirits, wandering souls come experience Audio World. Immerse yourself in reality and imagination. In a place of text and sound and intrigue, anything can happen. We have a large selection of unique areas. Several include not only text but voice and sound as well. In Real Town we've placed many audio places like the fireside in Black Oak Lodge, or the center table in Skylight Cafe. You can actually hear one another or use just text or text to speech. All audio rooms work with voice changing software if you prefer that.

We have audio theatre where people put on plays with a sound stage and using text to depict action. Our just for fun area is where folks participate in games both board, card, dice or table top. And for the RP minded you can create a ship and sail in the Sea of Circles. Create your own island or explore the depths and see if there is a lost city below. If that doesn't strike your fancy and you have an idea for your own game come and create it with us. You would need to hire your own staff, have your own chargen. We would supply a channel and bb. If you'd like audio in your game we will certainly list it on the +audio/list.

We are currently hiring staff. Please apply in Audio World and have a mic and speakers. Have your info about other games you've worked on and references. Check our site to see what positions we are hiring for.
Actors and Actresses please vote on which play we should do in our Christmas show. Log into Audio World to vote.

mud.name: AFTERMATH v1.0
mud.desc: The year is 2086. Thermonuclear war erupted in 2048 and ' the wastelands are populated by cyborgs, mutants and the survivors of a nuclear holocaust.

mud.name: Urth
mud.desc: Urth is not your typical

mud.name: Kombat MUD
mud.desc: Kombat mud is more than just a mud it is a place where people come to get away at the end of the day. It is a place to have fun. The mud is centered around the idea of Mortal Kombat. Curently we have a few things that are still very non-themed, but we are working to get this rectified. This project has been a long ongoing one that has expanded and changed, and because we are seeking to come out of beta within a few years we are looking for competent builders to help re-build a trusted staff.

We have many features that other muds do not, we have a extremely well worked skill system -- we have dual, and triple classing. We have spoken word spell amulet casting. ( This is by far the most awesome thing ever)
Instead of droning on and on about us just come check us out and see for yourself. Ask over chat if you need assistance.
We look forward to seeing you on KM

mud.name: Tir na nOg
mud.desc: Tir na nOg is a game set in the Heroic Age of Ireland, where you can virtually live the life of a great Warrior, cunning Mariner, or powerful Sorcerer. The game features character races based on Celtic mythology including fire breathing Dragons, shape shifting Pookah, diminutive, magical Faeries and charming Selkie. New areas have been written and the center of the game is Temair and the hill of Tara. We have a highway system based on the roads of the Iron Age and an authentic recreation of early Dubh Linn.

= 7 special-enhanced races with stat customising. = No XP loss for losing a fight. = No dying, EQ or spell loss for 6 of 7 the races. = Hybrid, asynchronous combat. (automatic or skilled, without tit-for-tat turns) = Player Combat. (measure yourself against others, with no benefits for bullies) = Player to player XP payment. (buy that enchanted sword with something meaningful) = Player owned rooms, homes, and vehicles. = Reincarnate and multiclass at any time! = 10 year old, extremely stable, crash free codebase.

Come to Temair, the heart of ancient Eire, and be a hero of whom the bards sing. Buy a home and settle down, or rule a city and become a king. Find the secret path to Tir na nOg, and live among the immortal Tuatha de Danaan. Spend an afternoon playing the stock market, or take a break from fighting and search for mushrooms to make a few levels. Change your name, restring your gear, go shopping for a new sofa, or kill that pesky dragon bothering the villagers. The next challenge awaits you.

mud.name: SilverWood
mud.desc: With a strong emphasis on player interaction SilverWood. (the succession to Wait and Bleed) is focused on Quests rather than code development.

mud.name: Twilights Failings
mud.desc: Welcome to Hell in the City of Angels...

Enter a world full of suspense, intrigue, corruption, horror and the supernatural on the often chaotic streets of Los Angeles . Become entwined in the courts of the vampires with the complex webs that they weave as they seek to rule the night. Join the werewolves in their quest to preserve what little wilderness is left and stem the tides of unjust depravity polluting the city. Or seek to survive as a morta l in a world where danger lies at every turn and in each dark corner.

Twilight’s Failing is a World of Darkness MUD set in the Modern Nights. The game is run using the d10 Storyteller System. We support White Wolf’s Vampire: the Masquerade, Werewolf: the Apocalypse and Mortals, as well as a few custom classes. The roleplay is intense and mandatory, featuring extensive interaction with the Storytellers. Complex plots and storylines are run on a regular basis to enrich the entire experience. We welcome players experienced in WoD’s system, as well as those new to it. There are plenty of people around who are more than willing to lend a helping hand.
Come and begin your own tale of personal horror...

mud.name: Ace Combat: Warriors Of The Sky
mud.desc: Ace Combat: Warriors In The Sky Is A MUD based off the fun and enjoyable Ace Combat Games. The MUD is set during the Belkan War.

mud.name: The 'Verse
mud.desc: This is a Sci-Fi mud using the SW:RiP 2.0 codebase. Extensive modifications are being made to alter the mud to a skill-based level system, and incorporate more generic Sci-Fi, and Firefly inspired, aspects. Worlds and Vessels are all original, and any similarity to any canon material is coincidental and unintentional. Nothing is taken directly from Star Wars, Star Trek, or Firefly, but those are the primary inspirations.

If you would like to visit, and offer ideas or suggestions, and test new features as they are added, feel free. All pfiles will be wiped at every stage of developmet. Current stage: Alpha (then Beta, then Live). If you would like to design ship templates, or build cities, send me an e-mail or stop by. I am not hiring any other programmers, and no support staff at this time (i.e. player relations, rp enforcement)

mud.name: Faction Earth
mud.desc: Faction Earth is a massively multi-player online role-playing game (MMORPG) set in the mega-cities of Earth in the year 2125. Faction Earth is a browser-based,graphical, enhanced MUD.

This world, behind the media-made corporate façade, is one of industrial espionage, super-hackers, mastery of newly discovered ancient Egyptian magic, battling factions and religious sects, and a constant struggle of humanity against its own genetic creations gone awry.

Explore this rich future world from the glistening skyscrapers and polluted sewers, to the colonies of Mars. Battle gangs, organized crime syndicates, and hoards of genetic mutations for your life and the existence of your race.

mud.name: Lands Of Darkness
mud.desc: Il MUD Ã¨ fondamentalmente RPG, quindi vi sono regole che \"puniscono\" coloro che non interpretano il proprio personaggio, in modo tale da garantire un'atmosfera adatta.

* 18 razze e 12 classi con caratteristiche ed abilita' proprie. * 21 Religioni specifiche per allineamento e etica, ciascuna con tatuaggio che conferisce poteri particolari. * Allineamento e etica fissi. * Arena per i combattimenti. * Teatro per le rappresentazioni dei giocatori. * Quest fisse gestite dai \"Questor\", quest fisse di interazione con i mob, quest fisse di ricerca. * Quest gestite da immortali. * Possibilita' di divenire \"QuestMaster\" a tempo determinato, tramite elezione gestita dai giocatori. Il QuestMaster eletto avra' carica per 3 mesi, e diverra' immortale di basso livello. Durante la carica si occupera' di gestire Quest e aiutare i Newbie. * 7 Cabale (Gilde) con abilita' proprie e fini politici. * Patrie dove far nascere il proprio personaggio. * Possibilita' di divenire Leggenda o Signore di una citta'. Nel secondo caso, la propria citta' diventera' una patria. * Gestione economica, politica, giuridica e sociale delle citta' affidata alle cabale e a tutti i giocatori. * Possibilita' di avere una propria casa. * Pkill regolamentato, a livelli. * Comandi in inglese e in italiano. * 129 Aree. * Background originale a cui attenersi durante il gioco. * Help con oltre 690 parole chiavi. * Numerose abilita' e incantesimi per tutte le classi. * Forum ufficiale aperto a tutti. * Possibilita' per tutti di creare aree nuove consone all'ambientazione. * Possibilita' di inserire proprie storie nel sito ufficiale. * Assenza di affitto: si puo' uscire dal gioco in (quasi) ogni locazione del mondo. * Presenza assidua di Implementor e Immortali. * Sistema di aste.

mud.name: Dragon's Sword
mud.desc: On Dragon's Sword, there are 71 areas which contain 5035 rooms total. Need assistance? Don't worry, DS has a big help archive, containing 372 helpfiles, easily accessable with the 'help' command. If you feel like socializing, you can show lots of emotions, 255 to be exact. For a list of socials, type 'socials'.
Please come. I can use all the help in the world.
We are looking for immortals
Builders and Coders as well.

mud.name: CosMud
mud.codebase: [ResortMUD] Extremely modd'd, Very fun, Huge world.
mud.desc: CosMud is based on a sort of, Medievil theme meets Dungeons and Dragons. The entire mud is pretty much custom, but the base of it is ResortMud, custom commands,colors, races,classes, and so on. Stop on in for a newbie friendly environment, and a great time.

mud.name: Broken Prophecy
mud.desc: It has been said, at the dawn of time, that the Gods made Rourk and Loch, man and woman, the first of the humans. As time went by, the two had differences they could not settle, thus went their separate ways. Centuries later, the descendants of Rourk and Loch waged war against one another, and against the Elves and Dwarves that inhabited the realm. The Gods, having seen enough of war, banished the humans to the 'Dark Continent' at the edge of the world known as 'Mere.'
Broken Prophecy is centered around two kingdoms, Rourkland and Lochmere. If you are interested in a highly political RP with medieval technology and magic tossed in, you'll enjoy yourself here.
We are accepting applications for Royalty and Nobility.

mud.name: Forgotten Colony
mud.desc: Forgotten Colony is a game that takes place on the world of Rukast, a planet torn between four major factions vying for control.

* The United Rukast American States - The decendents of American settlers. * The Pan-Slavic Federation - Decendents of Russian and other Slavic nations. * Democratic People's Republic of Rukast - A late arrival primarily of Chinese who arrived via an invasion fleet. * Atlantis Network - A neutral hub of trade, led by a city located at the bottom of the ocean which those on Rukast have come to call Atlantis, and the primary setting of the Forgotten Colony story.
Right now, the factions are in a tenuous state of balance that could shift at any moment.
Players take the roles of characters that could potentially tip the scales for one of the factions, profit from the conflict, or simply try to make it from day to day.
Rukast has many stories to tell. What will your character's story be?

mud.name: Vikings
mud.desc: Vikings is a browser-based game which mixes elements of a text MUD with elements of a web-app style Sim. Vikings is a game of adventure, trade and warfare set in our own mythological version of the ancient lands of Thule. Our Thule belongs as much in the realm of fantasy as history, mixing old norse culture with modern fantasy themes.

You'll begin as the head of a family of settlers. Through both good management of your domain and successful adventuring you'll grow into a powerful viking hersir! You'll choose to settle in one of 21 different regions with varying attributes such as medicine women, slavers, or alewives. You'll raise cattle, shear sheep, plow farms, improve your fortress, build longships, mine, and expand your meadhall to entertain more húskarls for your conquests. You'll need sturdy spears from your smithies and a plentiful supply of strong drink to build a loyal army bent on winning tribute from other players and clans. Your people will make demands and multiply as you meet them by trading with good neighbors and players in other regions. Discover which goods your region can export profitably, set your prices, and compete for the financial dominance that will fuel your expansion.

While waiting for your population to regenerate you can venture forth into the wilds of Skåne in search of raw materials for your domain or personal glory for your viking hersir. Vikings uses AJAX and javascript to take advantage of your web browser's ability to provide a mouse-friendly interface with helpful tool tips. Kill, skin, and butcher your prey without typing a single letter, then move on by clicking the minimap which keeps you from getting lost. We also maintain the good points of a MUD, which means letting your imagination do the work rather than forcing you to envision your world as a cartoon. You'll see updating text descriptions of your environment at all times without ever typing look.

Roleplay is highly encouraged and PvP is a necessary evil in this harsh world at war. New features are being added every few days. We're just getting started, but growing quickly. Carve out your kingdom now!

mud.name: Adventurer's Call
