mud.desc: Oldenddar, city of despair, land of danger, world of mysteries. What was once the capital of the kingdom is now a ruined skeleton fit for only storing cargo and docking sailors. Who would guess the wonders that would happen around this last bastion of civilized existence? With the light of Pelor fading quick, Erathis's stern rules being bent and broken, and Melora's calm sea turning into a riptide torrent things look grim for Oldenddar. A new breed of Hero arrives in time however: You. Join our Dungeons & Dragons 4e game. Be a Hero. Join an adventure. Send players through a torturous dungeon. Live it. Heed the Call. The Adventurer's Call. > Adventurer's Call: City of Despair > sc.scworlds.net:4444 Game Information: Using the core 3 books (Players Handbook, Monster Manual, and Dungeon Masters Guide for 4th Edition D&D) we open our world to you. We allow for many things and plots with our flexible Player Run Plot rules. Anyone can become a Player Judge and DM plots, and to help out we have a working Map Grid for combat. Character Generation is completely open and requires little of staff to finish.

mud.name: WoD Berlin
mud.desc: Berlin continues to shrug off the effects of the second world war and collapse of the wall in the 1990s. There are many areas of the city that are still in ruins and many buildings and roads are still shambles as the poor beg on the streets. While many monuments still stand with German pride, many people find it hard to cling to their nationalism as the Turks and other new residents take advantage of the poverty that continues. Then there was construction. With the beginning of renovating most areas of the city came jobs and many, yet not all, Berliners are finding employment and a small place to live. The feeling of pride came back to many hearts even though many have no idea where the money came from to fund such progress. While there are still drugs on the streets and violence at night, hope slowly begins to rise in the hearts of many in the city. However the drugs and panic in the streets won't wash away all that easily. At night freaks roam the clubs and speak of crazy things like creatures of the night who wish to possess them. Of course that's just crazy and no one believes such a thing and the more such rumors circulate around, the more the city administrators seek to encourage the youth to stay away from drugs. So naturally the meister of the city has a lot on his hands but as progress continues the people seem more content than they were before. Tourism, trade, the GMBH, and an unknown source of funds keep the economy improving.

mud.name: Star War Universe
mud.desc: Star Wars Universe is a New mud started by a few players from another SWR based mud that saw things they wished that they could change. When they found their opinions had been shared, Thus Our mud became. We hope to hire a few good builders and one or two coders depending on skill level and familiarity with the code base.
Please inquire by Email if your interested in helping make this mud great.

mud.name: Effacrum
mud.codebase: [Unknown] Derivation of EUO - updated and customised apoc engine, new universe and setting
mud.desc: Effacrum is a graphical MUD-like MORPG set in a unique universe specifically developed for this MUD. It does focus on storytelling of all levels, elaborate plots and sophistication of the roleplaying milieu. Player characters' deeds and schemes become a part of the historical narratives of the setting, thus contributing to its persistency in a creative way.
The graphical frontend is more developed than usual in the

mud.name: Dragonball Revolt
mud.desc: Back in the eighties, in Japan lived a now very famous man. His name being Akira Toriyama. Toriyama San created some of the most beloved and well recognized characters between East and West. With the restart of the franchise in America, there developed a simple Smaug game, and that is Dragonball Saga. That was in 2000. Now, nine years later, the codebase branched off and created many clones. Some private, some public, all with their own little worlds. So, you ask, what does this have to do with this game? This I would say, is that despite the years, criticism, and power struggles, it lives on and The Revolt is here.

The Revolt was created to bring forth the ideas of old and new, and to form a community of players who would love to play that game of yesteryear but with new skills, races, and a constant flow of ideas. The skill system, not seen very often in many clones, was developed by experienced coders and to this day is still being built upon by the people who were there since Day One. This skill tree allows for a free motion of techniques for when you begin. Adding much flavor to the game for veterans. The race system built upon Dragonball characters though relying heavily on the material of the show. It also strives to build your own unique concept of your character and with a bit of imagination, your own world. The races themselves range from the brutish and snide Saiyan, the maniacal and power hungry Icer, to the hellish pits of the Deadzone to bring the Demons and watchers of the universe, the kind-hearted and enigmatic Kaios. As for the community, we strive to bring an entertaining and no nonsense attitude, but listening all the while.

mud.name: Village Rivals
mud.desc: Village Rivals, a MUD from the mid 90's, is now back. Due to Real Life(TM), the Admin had to pull the mud down. Now it's back, and better than ever!

Classes: Clerics - Healing, Spellcasting servants of the Gods. Rogues - Stealing, Backstabbing servants of Themselves. Vampires - These aren't your sparkly-emo Vamps... Barbarians - For when hitting something with a Big Stick gets the job done.

Village Rivals has 2 main cities, who occasionally go to war with each other. As of right now, alot of things are being brought up to date, and no, we don't purge characters. So for some of you people who were here before, come on by, and see whats new!
-Sylph, To, and Tweety-

mud.name: Meat MUD Classic
mud.desc: Meat MUD Classic 1.0 has been released!

Meat MUD Classic was put on-line by an old-school former MUD addict for other old-school former MUD addicts who just don't have the time to invest in serious hardcore MUD gaming any longer. Meat MUD Classic should feel very familiar to former Meat MUD players and anyone else who misses their old Merc or Envy MUD. Meat MUD Classic was inspired by the original Meat MUD started at the University of Texas in 1993 - originally a modified Merc MUD with a Dungeons & Dragons theme blended with some outlandish humor. Please don't mind Frank Zappa - he's always been the mascot of Meat MUD.

Meat MUD Classic uses a modified Greed source with mostly stock areas. OLC is waiting for willing builders who want to get creative and add to the world. Greed was based on Envy 2.2 and features most add-ons expected in modern MUDs today, in addition to OLC. We feature extra classes, multi-classing, races and interactive NPCs. We're just getting started, and there is much to do, but if you want fun, we have it.

We are purposely retaining a mostly stock MUD to pay homage to the original Meat MUD, and also to make it easier for old-timers to be able to quickly join and play. Why learn how to play a MUD all over again? Why not just jump into Meat MUD Classic?
That doesn't mean that Meat MUD Classic holds no surprises - there are new areas waiting to be explored, and some classic areas hold new challenges. Jump right in to see what we mean.

We all have our comfort games. Some of us prefer to know the ins and outs of the games we grew up on, and miss the comfort of a MUD that had become our home away from home. Meat MUD Classic strives to be such a home, and as such we intend to avoid making the game \"more realistic\" or sacrifice fun in favor of \"balance\".
Former Meat MUD veterans are always welcome - and bring your friends!

mud.name: Anime
mud.desc: 'Anime' speaks for itself. It is the culmination of years upon years of steady evolution. It is a place to re-experience, re-learn, and re-live the game you have loved since the mid-1990s.

The mud has 8 races: Air, Earth, Chaos, Order, Fire, Water, Life, and Death. All of them have the chance to evolve twice -- and once that is accomplished you are eligible to 'remort' your class. So much variety.

All of the favorite areas you remember from before still exist. However, there has been an influx of over 20+ areas going into the mud. Every single piece of equipment (including stock) has been completely redone --- nothing is irrelevant.

There is a full set of quest equipment available, and for remorted classes....Legend Equipment. There is a 'character upgrade' list, meant for the very seasoned players looking for that edge. There is an adventure point system that awards players with variation beyond belief regarding intangibles of the mud.

Although we are still under reconstruction, I have ran this MUD for over three years without one single playerwipe. Rest assured, the races and classes are in a very healthy position to be considered 'complete'.
Join in on the fun....with all of the changes that have occurred within the last couple of decades, the screen is still black and text colored in the world we live in.
- Jolohendo Jajolaqua

mud.name: Earth's Fate 2020
mud.desc: Welcome to earth, the year is 2020. It is 3 months after the end of world war 3, and the human race was been wiped out. Animals have taken over the planet, all of which are fighting over supremacy of individual states. Most every animal on the planet earth has become more skilled in combat and strength due to the fact that they've been exposed to nuclear radiation for so long. They have given away to their basic instinct which is to fight for survival of the fittest.

We have 20 races to choose from, and each member can choose a class they wish to join as well. Currently we have all stock rooms, with very little edited, as we are in the planning stages. We are looking for experienced builders, and coders who wish to show off their skill on a new up and coming game. If that sounds like you, please log on and create a character, and once you've joined, speak to an immortal. If you type WHO, and look for those who have the <IMP> sign next to their name, just ask over ooc channel if they could come out and talk to you about either a builder or coder position.

mud.name: Sage's Kingdom
mud.desc: YOU WILL NEED TO DOWNLOAD OUR CUSTOM CLIENT TO CONNECT. A MUD style MMORPG with an epic-sized world. Lots and lots to do here. Organized roughly into storyline form to separate newbies from veterans.
Act 1 (Newbies Act)

mud.name: Star Wars: Way Of The Force
mud.codebase: [LP] DGD 1.2.148 heavily modified, lpmud/kobramud derived lib
mud.desc: Way Of The Force is based on the ideas of the Star Wars universe with some elements from other scifi stories. This universe is filled with trillions of people of all kinds of races, ranging from humanoids to droids.
The game uses a timeframe long after the Emperor has been killed.
Since the days of Luke, Jedi have again become the defenders of the (new) Republic, and many of them are found in our galaxy.

Years after the Emperor died, the empire is clinging on to life, but it has been in decay for centuries now. With the death of Sidious the old Sith order collapsed, but many dark-side force users have come in its place, many of which indentify with the legacy of the Sith.

As a player of WOTF, you are one of the select group of people who has the ability to 'use the force', and your task is to become a well trained user of the force, either on the light side or on the dark side. Ultimately, you can become a master on the Jedi council, even become its leader, or when you fall for the dark side, you could become powerfull enough to rebuild the Sith order and become its master.

Way Of The Force is currently testing the combat system and the 'new player' experience. We are not officially open for playing but our current playtesting is public and you are invited to participate.
Feedback on the mud by means of mud mail or idea/bug reports is very welcome.
We are also looking for people who have experience with both the DGD driver and LPMud derived codebases, please contact Aidil or Kalten on the mud.
Aidil

mud.name: Final Fantasy Afterworlds
mud.desc: Thousands of years after the defeat of Shuyin, the people of what once was Spira have rediscovered their past. Ancient texts of cities long past, technological and magical; methods of drawing power that have since been lost to the darkness of time and the disasters that have unfolded throughout the years--all have been rediscovered by the people. The original name of the planet has been restored. And the world of Gaia is in for change.

But the world cannot support them all. All these methods of drawing power have a price. The world now draws its power from its past. Dubbed the 'Paradox Effect', this odd phenomenon occasionally draws more than power. Sometimes it brings people forward, from the past to the present. And sometimes it takes people into the past.

This is where your story begins. What face will you wear to confront this world? A face of one of its denizens? Or someone from the past? Will you strive to save the world...or will you strive to make it all yours?
It's your choice...your story....

mud.name: Celelste
mud.codebase: [LP] 100% Custom fantasy LP Mud in development.
mud.desc: Celeste is a MUD in development. The environment offers 100% original content with beautifully written descriptions and dialogue. More info to come soon.

mud.name: Asgardian Nightmare
mud.desc: Asgardian Nightmare used to be a great mud, now it is run by ungrateful morons who don't know how to do anything else but powertrip and disrespect those who have done nothing but help them. This is mud is now a shadow of what it once was. And not worth playing at all. Please check out the mud currently listed, it's called divineblood and it's a great mud. Grim and Nico who currently run asgard both cheat all the time and have regard for mortals. divineblood.org:4000

mud.name: The Jungle Mud
mud.desc: The Jungle Mud is a revived ROM2.4 MUD, modified, and under new ownership (Formerlly owned by creators Lanka and Talon). The Jungle Mud is made up of animal races. Players level from 1-100, then have the option to remort (become reincarnated) into a different species. New species become available as the amount of times you remort increases. There are benefits available to specific species. Due to hostname change, pbase has decreased, however building back up. Added three more zones and a new clan. Clans are open to new members – few restrictions. NEWBIE FRIENDLY! Help files galore!

mud.name: Jupiter's Children MUX
mud.desc: Jupiter's Children is an original theme superhero roleplaying game. JC is set in the Los Angeles area in the near future. It's been a generation since the Jupiter Event occurred and the world is still learning to cope with the rising number of Meta-humans. It is a somewhat dark future where the concepts of Good and Evil have been eclipsed by Publicity and Entertainment. It is a world of heavy contrasts separated by shades of gray. JC is a game where adult-style and mature role playing is allowed. If you are not comfortable with the possability of adult situations occurring while playing then you should choose a different game. Players are encouraged to be as original with their characters as possible. Character application is quite easy, requiring only a few lines or a couple paragraphs. Character logins are usually returned withiin minutes of reading. JC has recently re-opened to the public. Join in while the player base is growing and everyone is fresh with excitement!
J U P I T E R ' S C H I L D R E N In a few moments the world changed forever. In a few years it was Life as Normal. In a few more years everyone was Reminded.

mud.name: String Theory MUX
mud.desc: String Theory MUX is a role-playing game based on NBC's hit TV series Heroes, which takes place two years after the first season's explosive finale. Our setting is an alternate universe where the bomb exploded, turning New York into a dystopia where â€” amongst the rubble â€” Homeland Security wages a covert war against the city's Evolved population with the help of a shadowy organization known to fans of the show as The Company.

mud.name: The Realm of War
mud.desc: Realm of War is based upon the GodWars 1995 codebase. We have no set classes, you can design your own on connection and name them. Realm of War has 300 levels which will give you access to numerous skills. We are also in the process of adding 5 remort levels which will allow you to learn more class skills for each remort.

Currently the MUD is in early alpha test mode, we are actively encouraging new players to come and join us and help us make what we hope to me one of the most unique GodWars based muds on the internet!
Recent additions: Wilderness linking zone - where you can mine, fish, grow crops, lay roads and build houses.
Player crafting system - where you can create your eq from collecting stuff from the mud.
BRAND NEW COMBAT CODE - Still in heavy test!!
Plus lots of other fixes...

Realm of War @ omen.genesismuds.com port 2000 ******************************************************************** We currently ARE looking for a small team of dedicated builders to help create our world, if you are interested connect to the MUD and post a note to immortal on the personal board. ********************************************************************

mud.name: Unbridled Desires
mud.desc: From the welcome screen: \"This tinymuck is an adventure land for those with brave hearts. It's not like your average muck in that your character by their action may get changed in little or great ways.\"

The name may imply it's an equine-centric muck, but it's not. Anyone or anything is welcome. although a lot of the players take equine based characters (horses, 'taurs, unicorns, pegasii etc). Unbridled Desires prides itself on being a very open, relaxed atmosphere where friends get together to just to get together. There are no \"In Character\" rules, though you'll find that most of the inhabitants are very real electronic extensions of their \"RL\" creators. While online, the boundary between creator and created can become quite vauge.

mud.name: TrollAttack
mud.desc: A relatively new mud created to resemble Smaug MUDs. Fun little game with an expanding codebase, playerbase, and world. The game begins in a small village of trolls and expands out to the east. This game strives to create a community of people interested in its growth and maturation. Future editions may change to include graphics, and even a 3d environment. The game features a growing list of commands that support standard inter-player communication, as well as normal hack-and-slash style fighting. Recently team-style fighting was improved.

mud.name: Shadow Glen
mud.codebase: [Dikumud] v3: Heavily Customized Diku Derivative, v4: Scratch (Graphical)
mud.desc: The Realm of Shadow Glen is comprised of nearly 10,000 rooms and growing. The current version is soon to become obsolete with a new, scratch version anticipated soon. The story of Shadow Glen is set in the 1100's with Pagan Celtic influences. Multiple magick systems, a hearty combat system, breathtaking descriptions and abilities will keep you coming back for more. Over 2000 players strong and growing daily since 1996.
Several hundred rooms throughout the realm are designated Adult Content -- thus only users with the ADULT flag may enter these RESTRICTED areas. See web site for details.

mud.name: Legends of the West
mud.desc: Legends of the West is an all original mud based in the fictional town of Tumbleweed Texas, LOTW strives to be as realistic as possible. We have 5 races and classes, including Indians. PvP is allowed between the clans. So hop on by and check us out!

mud.name: NaughtyMuffin MUSH
mud.desc: WARNING: Adult Content ========================

Welcome to NaughtyMuffin MUSH, a somewhat whimsical and sexual game with a touch of BDSM. No real theme, no plot, just naughty stuff all the time! All characters are allowed -- anime, video game, TV, whatever you want! We can even have more than one of each character here! If you're trying to come up with an explanation for why an aspect of the Naughty Village is the way it is, you're thinking too hard!

Features certain coded systems for bondage-related phenomena, as well as Predicaments, which Doms (i.e. those who are Dominant in the BDSM scale) can use to do naughty things to their Subs (who are set Submissive). Also includes a Slave class, allowing further control. It's not mandatory, and you can set yourself Switch to ignore the BDSM aspects entirely! All genders welcome, whether male, female, or hermaphrodite, so ... welcome to NaughtyMuffin MUSH!

We are currently in need of people whose preference is for males, gay or bisexual males, and female characters who are both not strictly dominant and whose preferences include males (other than girly ones). We're not going to actually turn you down if you're not, though!

mud.name: Daybreak Ridge
mud.desc: Daybreak Ridge is a very unique mud that stands out from the sea of stock circle/diku/etc etc muds that all use the same system, maybe have a few unique areas, and in general just feel like you've done it all before.
Everything about DBR feels new and fresh by comparison. For example take our combat.
Other muds: 'You whack cave rat for 12 damage!'

Daybreak Ridge: You strike rat adeptly in the back of the waist, paralyzing it from the shoulders down.... With an incredible roar, you tear rat assunder, sending limbs flying in a wide circle. Rat has its left leg severed! Rat has its right leg severed! Rat has her left arm severed!

Our spell system is fun as well as each spell has several levels of power for the same spell with effects ranging from merely making the effects of the spell more powerful, to altering the result of the spell.

We have guilds that focus on the use of pets, magic based guilds, combat guilds, hybrids, and guilds based around our player economy such as Merchants and Arcane-Imbuers. Nearly all gear worth owning is made by players in those last two guilds so they are always in demand.

The people at Daybreak Ridge are very helpful and newbie friendly when they aren't busy killing newbies. }:) We are an open player-kill mud, after the beginning levels you may attack and be attacked by any player. Players police themselves in this respect and the admin by and large keep their hands out of the affairs of mortals. Generally new players aren't picked on in excess because there are older players who are more than happy to kill the players that are killing the newbies.

mud.name: The Dark Hand
mud.desc: Set one year after Return Of The Jedi, Xizor, the leader of the Black Sun criminal organization, has been destroyed. Hapan privateers have assumed control of The Black Sun. Well thought out character history and descriptions are encouraged.

mud.name: Cosmos
mud.desc: Live the life of a pilot and navigate your starship into the Cosmos; explore uncharted sectors of outer space, fight alian enemies while you go on your quest to rebuild humanity, collecting old artifacts from the ruins of the deep Cosmos beyond known space.

Defend your solar system against fatal enemies, salvage debris, haul and mine asteroids, its all in the life of a pilot. Your alliance may have enemies, or an alliance may be aligned with another group. You will advance steadily through your career of pilotting a starship, gaining points and credits. Read our history at: http://trekgames.net/ch.php There is much, much more to expect; ranging from the host-run RP-enforced events, to alien invasions.

mud.name: Forgotten Dreams: Prelude to Light
mud.codebase: [GodWars] Heavily Modified: Fallen Empires/Battle of the Immortals
mud.desc: Forgotten Dreams: Prelude to Light is based off the beloved Battle of the Immortals code base. The staff has worked hard to bring new and custom elements into the mud that bring a custom feel to the game. Such things include, an automated Quest System, An equipment crafting system, casino, automated Class specific Quests, numerous custom classes, death system, etc. While Forgotten Dreams does contain some of the golden oldies of godwars classes, i.e. Vampires, Werewolves, Demons, and Mages(Book/Spell Writing), we also sport a plethora of custom classes: Angels, Mimics, Kindred of the East, Hunters, Monks, Druids, and WarMages, with a revamping of Vampires and Werewolves in the works, along with a few more custom creations. The World of Forgotten Dreams is heavily influenced and based off of White Wolf's World of Darkness. RP is highly encouraged and rewarded, though not necessary to take part in the mud. For those who prefer PK over RP, we have special benefits for you as well. The Immortal Staff is very friendly and strives to be as helpful as possible. We are very newbie friendly here at Forgotten Dreams. If you are looking for a fun and original mud with lots of flexibility and entertainment, drop by and give us a try.
-The Forgotten Dreams Immortal Staff

mud.name: Star Wars: Empire Rising
mud.desc: From the ashes of conflict emerges a new order, unifying the galaxy under a single banner - the first Galactic Empire. The Jedi Order, those august protectors of peace and justice, have been all but erased, their legacy buried beneath carefully-constructed lies and propaganda - and the ruthless Empire has gone to great lengths to ensure the few survivors are rooted out and eliminated.

Yet others have risen up in arms, unwilling to let the Empire's tyranny go unchecked. A ragtag collection of brave and desperate souls, held together by little more than a dream, a unifying ideal: Freedom.

SW:ER is a roleplay-heavy Star Wars MUD utilizing the FotE codebase. We are still in the early stages of development, but have made many helpful and unique changes and additional features already - and fully intend to add more as we progress, as well as revamp areas. The MUD features a helpful and knowledgeable staff and friendly players.

mud.name: Vecterian Realms III
mud.desc: It's just another Mud. Yeah we know we all get that, I mean why would it be any different and I play on so many others... Amusingly enough I would actually write this far to see if you would come with me and at least be interested enough to log in and see if it really is the same as all the other muds you've played or maybe just maybe you'd like it and your friends would be lonely without you ;) or you could always convert them too lol -W- (*Anonymous*) -K-

mud.name: Legends of Talraen
mud.desc: Welcome to Legends of Talraen

Come, friend, and let me tell you of the world known as Talraenâ€¦It is a mystical place, populated with creatures both mundane and unusual. It is a realm where powerful sorcerers engage each other in epic duels, and mighty warriors clash with the greatest of steel. Cunning thieves lurk in the shadows, waiting for their opportunity to spring, and the cursed vampire feasts on the blood of poor and unsuspecting fools. It is a world where legendary dragons soar overhead and unleash devastating breaths of fire and ice upon helpless townsfolk. Great ogres swing hefty clubs at noble adventurers and the old Gods themselves must fend off those who would seek to supplant them. It is a land where the elements collide, and where the forces of darkness and light struggle to overcome one-another. In this world, those who prove themselves fit will be rewarded, and those who do not, will perish. Come, friend, to this realm, and see what you can make of yourself. With time and dedication, you may even ascend into the ranks of the legends of Talraen. With over 100 areas, Both peaceful and deadly play...

mud.name: Midnight Hymns - Requiem Mud
mud.desc: Requiem-mud (Hymns of Midnight) offers players opportunity to become immersed within a rich role-play atmosphere set within a fantasy-themed world.
Players have the ability to become anything that they wish to set their minds to. From a beggar living on the streets and rambling of insane omens, to a soldier fighting against nfamiliar enemies.
Requiem-mud seeks to immerse players with participation in plots imm and player run alike, starting off in the town of Grey.
The town of Grey

Grey has been standing for hundreds of years, it is said that originally it was founded by the city of Jhal as a outpost to watch over the borders of the Wyrm’s Wood but it eventually expanded into a trade town. Some rumours say that the true reason Grey was built was to sate the curiosity of some nobles of Jhal, regarding some ruins that had stood where its foundation was lain.
When Jhal fell to unknown hosts the town was able to survive and prosper on its own, having become entirely self sufficient with a host of fertile farmlands and water supply.

Grey is situated nearby the Long Road which leads past the mountains to the Capital of Khal. Grey sees many travelers each year, some stay only for a night or two, though others find themselves lingering in the bustling town if for their own reasons or not.
Despite its popularity there is much danger to be had; the bards in the inns find themselves often strumming a tune to someone whose deeds would other wisely be forgotten.

The Pale river runs through Khal and passes by Grey, the harbor of Grey a center point for commerce and foreign trade. The town itself often serves as a meeting place for traders or a haven for refugee's from other Kingdoms due to its policies.

Grey not only draws the attention of travelers, adventure seekers and merchants, but members of the Ten Guilds is often sent to it to gain experience. Due to the influx and variation of people available within the town, the members are able to learn to deal with those of different culture.
Most who come to Grey have their own reasons though, some of which are never known.
**Requiem-mud is not yet open to play but please take a look at forums at www.requiem-mud.com/forum for news and world information.

mud.name: Top of the Line (TOTL)
mud.desc: Top of the Line like many (if not all muds) use experience points for the advancement of characters. Experience points are used to raise stats (strength, intelligence, willpower, constitution, dexterity, and charisma) which determine how powerful you are (stat wise). You gain experience points from killing monsters (or players) and solving quests (or puzzles).

Our wizards pride themselves on actually listening to the input from mortals and designing the mud around suggestions and ideas from the whole community. We are currently and always looking for mortals & wizards to join the ranks of TOTL.

The Rules of TotL There are only two VERY simple and relatively understandable rules of conduct on Top of the Line (as per the most wise and benevolent; EotL): 1. Have fun. 2. Don't piss off anyone bigger than you.

mud.name: Dragonball Revolution
mud.desc: This project has been cancelled, due to a lack of interest from the original creator of it (me). My apologies to anyone who had expectations of playing the game. I'm simply not interested in DBZ/Muds anymore. Good luck to everyone else.
-Luther

mud.name: Dreams of Demise
mud.desc: 2007 - New year - New Owner! Come join Vikteren, the Staff and Players of Dreams of Demise as we settle into our new home at dod.mudmagic.com port 2424!Dreams of Demise is a heavily modified Godwars Deluxe codebase. With the ease of use and playability of the many Dystopia codebases out there, combined with the complex classes and fightstyles popular with the more diehard, old school Godwars players. We have original code that you will not find on any other Godwars mud. We are a newbie friendly mud, that encourages feed back - both good and bad - from our players. If you are a die hard Godwars player and enjoying making a character through hard work, then this is the place for you, but even if you are new to mudding, give us a try! Friendly staff and generally helpful longtime players create a great place to start off your new mudding addiction! Come check us out! Staff online and available virtually 24-7, we are ready, willing and able to help get you settled in and enjoying your adventure in your new mud home.

mud.name: Neo Smaug
mud.desc: Neo Smaug is a MUD based on the recent [official] Smaug version 1.8 (released in 2007). Come enjoy a brand new world in Smaug, with plenty of new features since the last version. New features include player homes, object claiming, clan rosters, journal's, and more.

mud.name: Aalynor's Nexus
mud.desc: Founded in 1996, Aalynor's Nexus is an immersive multi-user, text-based fantasy role-playing game. The life of a character within the mystical World of Altin reads much like a fantasy novel, where almost anything is possible...
Will you walk in Aalynor's Light, seek Honor with Paelina, live in Pandora's Hope, enjoy the merriments of Trista, or will you embrace Tilnar's shadow?
It will take many brave and mighty Heroes to turn back the assembled Goblin Hordes, now surrounding the city.

mud.name: Lakes of Darkness
mud.desc: Lakes of Darkness is an old mud that is completely finished as a game. Clans, Classes, Races, Skills, Spells, Questions, and Areas are all in and balanced, this game was popular in the early 2000's and has been down for years until recently. We hope to see you!

mud.name: Memories of Legend
mud.desc: 1000 NE was in many ways a turning point within the Westlands. The Borderlands having fallen to a concentrated campaign from the Shadow, its people driven from their homes in large numbers. The Seanchan, invaders from western lands across the Aryth Ocean, finally cemented their foothold in Arad Doman and Tarabon after years of dealing with rebellions. And, worst of all, the man who was thought to be the Dragon Reborn was proven to be a False Dragon, and an assembly of the rulers of these lands, the Amyrlin Seat and Hall of the White Tower included, turned into a bloodbath before finally he was stopped.

New rulers have been selected, and the White Tower's new Hall has chosen a new Amyrlin Seat. The Borderlanders have gathered into a fledgling alliance based in lands to the north of Andor, on a reclaimed city they call Gamael. Cairhien, though still racked by a multi-sided civil war and bands of mad channelers, seems on the way to recovery with the establishment of a Black Tower. Though the Seanchan Empire has suffered a blow, the Empress having relocated to Tarabon's capital of Tanchico after Seandar was seized by rebels, it too is growing more powerful with Arad Doman and Tarabon having finally being admitted into the Empire as full provinces.

But the threat posed by the Shadow cannot be forgotten, with the occasional raid being the least of the worries of the inhabitants of this land. In this time, heroes and heroines are needed for the Light's only hope rests in everyone doing their best to repel the many threats that face those opposed to the Dark Lord. Are you willing to do your part?

mud.name: Devil's Bob MUD (DeBo MUD) (Brasil)
mud.desc: Inaugurado no final de 2005, o Devil`s Bob Ã© um MUD original, baseado no CircleMUD (desenvolvido por Jeremy Elson). Atualmente, o mundo de Devil`s Bob (DeBo, para os Ã­ntimos) apresenta, dentre outras caracterÃ­sticas, disponÃ­veis aos jogadores: - 8 raÃ§as e 6 classes para criaÃ§Ã£o de personagem - 3 cidades-natais (Midgaard, Jareth, Silverthorne) - Loteria - Transportes - Aventuras AutomÃ¡ticas (Autoquests) - Ãreas em movimento - Rica variedade de magias e habilidades - Sistema de encarnaÃ§Ãµes - Cliente original (http://www.debomud.org/hmud/)
-> Sistemas originais, dos mais diversos!
Uma tentativa de fugir do ciclo de XP que contaminou os MMORPG!
Experimente nosso mundo, e seja muito bem vindo!
http://www.debomud.org

mud.name: RubbeRoom
mud.desc: RubbeRoom was started in 1996 and is back online with new lib modifications, new monsters, new player options and tons of new rooms!

The basis of RubbeRoom is that you are a patient in a mental hospital. You must gain levels by running through domains that include, among many more: Acid Trip land, Camp RubbeRoom, The Hospital Daycare, The Newbie Basement and more!
The object of RubbeRoom is to become as insane as possible. Starting out as a patient, joining

mud.name: Dark Abyss
mud.desc: Okay... No crap this time! Now we got a server paid for atleast 1 year forward, coders who can wipe out the bugs and most important of all the Original Seeds of Hate code! We might start out a bit bumpy.. I've been playin the MUD and fixed what i've found so far but now I need help from you to se if there are more bugs. Please stop by and help me out =)

mud.name: Imak MUD
mud.desc: In short, iMAK Mud is a text game that supports multiple users.

mud.name: Ironclaw Online
mud.desc: Ironclaw Online is an anthromorphic RPG set at the cusp of change on the island-continent of Calabria.

Many different sentient races, cultures, and societies are converging upon the city of Triskellian. As a player, you will start with humble beginnings, only to become involved in machinations as each noble house vies for control and the guilds strive for power.
Which side will you take? Will you throw your fate in with the Bisclavret, becoming a mercenary hoping for riches and glory?
Can you stand against the Avoirdupois warriors, in their staggering numbers and unyielding formations?
And what of the mysterious Doloreaux, with the rumors that they may have unlocked the secrets of the wizard-kings of yore?
Or can you really hope to remain neutral as the destiny of the world is decided?
Join us on this epic adventure in a world filled with many people stretching their imaginations to the limit.

mud.name: Shattered Isles
mud.codebase: [CoffeeMud] Heavily modified w/ S.I. Engine v1.3
mud.desc: ** Shattered Isles is currently in ALPHA testing. **

Shattered Isles is a medieval-themed fantasy world where vast oceans have separated Archai into five inhabited islands and a number of smaller ones in between. Four of the large islands represent each of the world's elements: Air, Earth, Fire, or Water. Located centrally is the fifth and newest isle, New Archai--the melting pot of the world.

In Shattered Isles there are 16 different races from which to choose: one of four different Elven races severed by The Great Shattering, Dragons, Dwarves, Goblins, Gargoyles, Humans, a giant canine race known as Vukasins, faerie-like Sylphs, a giant humanoid race known as the Argali with horns much like a ram, giant Gavial lizards, and the Bolinau, a race of bipedal river creatures; think Otter meets Hobbit.

The player classes consist of Air-mages, Earth-mages, Fire-mages, Water-mages, Diviners, Arcanists, Thieves, Assassins, Hunters, Barbarians, Fighters, Templars, Clerics, and Shamans. Players do not have an overall level to rank up. Instead each class consists of some ability levels that account for all the related skills that fall under each domain. For example, all of your weapon related skills advance an overall combat ability in addition to the actual weapon skill. Mages have a similar spellcasting ability that accounts for all of their learned spells. In Shattered Isles there is no level limit. Every skill and ability can be trained up to a hundred levels and every skill available to your class can be learned and mastered.

The merchant system of Shattered Isles is a huge aspect of the world. All players regardless of class have the opportunity to learn most gathering skills and some basic crafting skills. Additional crafting skills are unlocked as you progress in your overall trade ability. Even more crafting skills are available to those who portray their character as a merchant and have paid proper fees to the New Archai Trading Guild. Player merchants may purchase shops for buying and selling goods and are entitled to custom orders throughout the year.

Role play is strictly enforced by a dedicated and available staff, while conflict and fighting between players is always encouraged! What you won't find in Shattered Isles are flashing colors, annoying Out Of Character channels that take away from the environment, having to track down your dead and looted body, or a MUD straight out of the box with nothing unique to offer. In Shattered Isles we've spent more time than we would like to admit focusing on the smallest of details. We take pride in providing a world in which you can immerse yourself.

mud.name: Age of Empires 2 : The New Era
Dark Wizardry
mud.desc: Dark Wizardry is a true multi-class MUD allowing you to level in all 5 main classes (warrior, thief, mage, psionic and cleric) at the same time, while specializing up to four times throughout your adventures in extra-classes such as backstabbing assassin, undead-conjuring necromancers and peaceful earth-loving druids.

You can explore our enormous world, completing countless quests and collecting artifacts and equipment from the furthest corners, and you can remort as one of 22 new races, allowing you to unlock even more character levels and areas.
Some other features include:

* Random fun-programs, which can multiply the experience you gain, or the damage you deal * Holiday events including special X-mas zones, easter bunnies, etc. * 5 main classes and 10 extra-classes, with a max level of 250 * Long term playability with the remort system * Loads of quests, both automatically generated and built into many of our custom-made zones

mud.name: Novantae Nocturne
mud.desc: You have stepped into a world of darkness. Here, the cities are run by the royal families and their officials.. By day. By night, another set of authorities control and influence the world. Vampires pull at the strings of mortals from the shadows, while the Inquisition remains ever watchful, ever vigilant, ready to draw blade or bane to scourge the souls of demons and their ilk from the face of the earth. Here, werewolves stalk the night, living in their forests, ever-searching for the taint, so that it may be purged from the earth which they are so bound. Here, sorcery and those who dabble in it exist, images and scholars able to bend the laws of the world at a word, or even a thought. You have stepped into a world of darkness, in the darkest age of all.
Come and play with us.

mud.name: Esquinex
mud.desc: Esquinex is a newbie-friendly MUD for ages 10+. Esquinex is jam-packed with dangerous enemies, puzzling dungeons, and more! Note: The server is only up from 7:30-9:30 pm.

mud.name: Eternal Discord
mud.desc: Eternal Discord is a rekmud clone i was just messing around with some. Atm it has some new features added to it but mostly stock Rekmud, but plan to balance the mud out slowly. We offer a wide variety of classes which will hopefully be replaced with custom classes later, or add in the custom classes over top the stock ones.
Feel free to drop by and check the mud out.
Slayn.net port 1616
Stumpy

mud.name: BSG: Kharon
mud.desc: Warday. In a matter of hours, the majority of the human race is vaporized or killed in the subsequent invasion by the Cylon race. The Colonial Fleet scrambles to meet the attack while the government is obliterated. The Fleet meets a similar fate within a day during one-sided battles all across Colonial space. The genocide of the human race is almost complete. Almost.

This is the story of the survivors that were either left behind or chose to stay behind and fight. It begins with the Colonial Escort Carrier 'Kharon' and its small crew of dedicated and proud sailors that intend to fight to the end. But it doesn't end there. What of those left on the planets? The small bands of survivors? Can they simply be abandoned to the Cylons and radiation?

Players here won't find a fleet of ships being escorted around the stars by the savior military. They won't find a government being set-up to debate social issues - at least not in the beginning. There are more important things like staying alive. The players tell the story and unfold it in their own way with the backdrop being the desperation and darkness of fighting a battle that will likely surpass their own lives.
Warday is imminent. How will you survive? Join us at -- bsgkharon.com:5201

mud.name: Immortal Wars
mud.desc: Immortal Wars is an up and coming Godwars mud with a very attentive imm that does it all from coding completely original classes to adding unique features and even building areas. The imm is a professional software developer with degrees from MIT in computer science so rest assured you will be playing a quality mud.

Although there are many MMORPGs to play nowadays, most of the good ones have a subscription fee, tend to require good hardware, and most importantly are hard to play at work. Immortal Wars will always be free to play and is the perfect game to play at work since it requires commodity hardware and you can always alt-tab when your boss comes walking by.

This mud has no stock classes at the moment in favor of some brand new classes. The current classes that we have are: Brawlers | Dragoons | Elementals | Holy Knights | Hydras | Mechwarriors | Rogues | Snipers | Summoners | Astartes | Enchanter | Awakened. To see specifics on each class, please visit the website at http://raiden.servegame.org

This mud has completed its beta-testing phase as over a hundred accounts have already been opened. The pbase varies depending on time of day but has had an average of 5-10 players in the past three weeks.

All feedback is welcome. One of the best things about this mud is the player base. There are a lot of creative players who help improve the mud in many different ways, from improvements to classes, kingdoms, generic look and feel, etc. Our idea board is bursting at over 80 ideas in just the past 2 weeks.
Ideas for new classes are welcome too! The sniper class was actually proposed by a player and then later implemented by me. Classes are modified as players get more ideas.
If you're tired of your typically poorly managed and outdated Godwars full of bugs, come play here for change!

mud.name: Justice League Unlimited MUX
mud.desc: Based on the amazing cartoon series Justice League and Justice League Unlimited, this MUX features DC Super Heroes such as Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, Green Lantern, The Flash, and many more.

Picking up after the episode 'Destroyer', characters follow the history established by the JLU animated series as well as Batman: The Animated Series, Superman: The Animated Series, and Static Shock. Subsequent story development is tracked via a timeline and role play logfiles posted on our wiki. This is a traits-based, consent type game.

JLU-MUX offers the player an opportunity to play in a canon and established DC universe with a continuity simpler than that found in the comics, although it is not a 'Year One' site. While the focus is on characters that appeared in the above-listed series, we are open to allowing characters from the mainstream DCU comics that can be adapted to the animated continuity as well as original characters. Villains and supporting cast members are welcome.

mud.name: Dawn Mud
mud.desc: Welcome to Dawn, a discworld-based lpmud offering excitement and adventure to those brave enough to grasp it. It is a world of stunning beauty and terrifying evil, where creatures long regarded as legendary beings of lore and myth are commonplace; lands of light and lands of shadow lie within the reach of all.

From the religious, lawabiding city of Treeth with its priests and paladins, to the scruffy port city of Iapage, teeming with pirates and other unsavoury characters; from the dark evil of Hylar and its forbidding Red Guard, to stately Kai-Thaan and its courtiers and bureaucrats; from the fragile, beautiful lands of Albion and the ethereal ellyllon, to the hostile depths of the underdark and its deadly inhabitants; adventure, magic, glory ... and perhaps death ... all can be found within these realms.

mud.name: MercsMUX
mud.desc: So you want to be a mercenary? Like big robots shooting big robot guns at big robots? Then read on.

Battletech: Mercenaries is a new MUX, initially set on the planet Galatea. Players either join, or form their own, mercenary units, which hire their services out to the various factions, including the Great Houses and other political entities. Success builds your unit's standing, fame and wealth; failure isn't an option.
MercsMux owes much to its many BTMU* predecessors, but also features multiple new systems that completely change the nature of online Battletech gameplay. Highlights include:
- Fully automated RealSpace mission system, featuring both PVE- and PVP-style combat
- Flexible team creation system, which allows players to c
reate their own units, hire and fire pilots, and negotiate individualized contracts
- Customizable 'Mechs and other combat units
- Dynamic character advancement system and economy, in which players (individually) and units (collectively) progress along multiple dimensions

- Substantially expanded skill usage, which opens multiple character generation options - want better mission payouts? Be prepared to negotiate; salvage an enemy unit and want to use it yourself? Better find someone who can decrypt the pass-codes; want to customize your 'Mech? Make sure your squad includes someone who can tinker with the parts
- Active story-arcs, in which player actions determine the outcomes and impact the game's evolving timeline

mud.name: Dragonball: Awakening
mud.desc: Dragonball: Fate is a hybrid mud. It has the deep roleplaying aspect of a MUSH, but the functionality, and good looks of a MUD.

We run a D10 Based system, completely built around roleplay, there is no killing mobs here, in fact they don't even exist. You pose(emote) out your actions, and Immortal Storytellers assist by making appropriate rolls to ensure parity.
Characters are extremely unique on the mud. Between character backgrounds, merits, flaws, and Random Variables (Rolled at character creation), the mud creates very personable characters.
A character must create a background for their character to be allowed play, this needn't be extensive, but should give us an idea of why a character is who he is.
Bottom line is, if you love dragonball, and want a friendly, and heavy RP environment, come on down :).
-Faristil

mud.name: RPGMUSH 4: Planar Pathways
mud.desc: +++RPGMUSH: Planar Pathways+++

\"You believe your world is the center of existance, that your world is the most important place in the universe. That all the cosmos revolves around you and your almighty civilization, and the gods fawn upon you. Let me be the first, then, to shatter your illusions of grandeur.\"

\"Your world, your kingdom, your ruler; All are insignifigant motes of dust in the wind. Outside your narrow point of view is everything, infinity in all its glory and majesty. The cosmos is infinite in its themes and variations, with space for everything gods or mortals could ever dream of and more. If you have dreamt fondly of it, it is waiting for you out there. If you have seen it only in your worst nightmares, it lurks out there. Infinity is a very large place, and the unwary will disappear between its cracks, unnoticed and unmourned.\"

\"Your right to rule means nothing to us. The only power that matters out here on the Planes, little man, is belief. The planes run on belief, and it matters little what you believe in, only that you believe in it. Even the gods know this, and fight their eternal wars of belief on these puny worlds you call home.\"
\"I'll enjoy hearing your pleas to a distant god when you arrive in Hell, Lord Inquistor. For your soul will not go to the sweet hereafter your priests promise you, but into my tender mercies.\"
-Valstryanix the Pit Fiend to a clueless lord inquisitor.

Planar Pathways is a MUSH that incorporates the past 30 some years of Dungeons and Dragons material and campaign settings into one place. The focus of the MUSH theme is Planescape, providing a means to get to almost anywhere in the D&D multiverse. Nearly anything you can make in D&D is appable at Planar Pathways. Since this is a pure -roleplay MUSH-based enviornment, with unique needs that differ from tabletop, videogames or mush, we have created a simplified (coded) combat system, more similiar to what you'll usually find on mushes, then the complex mechanics of 1st-3rd editions of D&D, while fully incorporating and allowing for players to app almost anything from any edition.
We hope to see you there.

mud.name: Marked For Death II
mud.desc: Marked for Death II is a modified EoD. All the stock classes are still in.. with the recent addition of Elemental and Paladin. Spawned from the old Marked for Death, we are back with a vengeance. Come test your skills in this newly formed world of Chaos, and Destruction. Currently we have a small active pbase, but an immortal staff that is constantly on to assist with any problems or incidents that may occur. So stop by and give us a try!

mud.name: Dragons of Daradis
mud.desc: we are currently undergoing a major area rebuild. we will stay in wizlock untill completion of rebuild

Dragons of Daradis is set in the fantasy world of Daradis. players can play many diffrent parts in the world, from a simple adventurer to a king. positions of power are application only. many things are planed for this mud. i hope you will stop by and check us out.

mud.name: Devilshire
mud.desc: In the early 1600s three very different families with three very different secrets settled on the north shore of the Massachusetts Bay Colony. Four hundred years later their legacy lives on in Devilshire, Massachusetts, a town driven by the local university, tourism, and a surprisingly large supernatural community. Its idyllic New England facade hides a dark past and an even darker future, if certain individuals and creatures about town have their way. While the locals couldn't necessarily put a finger on why they avoid going out at night, they know better than to question the instinct. After all, when the sun goes down, there is no pity for the unwary.

Devilshire is a MUX set in the universe of Buffy, the Vampire Slayer. While familiarity with the television shows may be helpful it is not necessary. Our game wiki is very extensive and includes rules, characters, and a whole lot of extras. There are no Feature Characters on Devilshire, we deal with original characters; you shape the world around you and you are the heroes of our stories. Nobody the hell cares what Giles is doing and the game is not Slayer-centric, anyone can be the big star!
A wide variety of character options are available including slayers, empowered warriors, demons, psychics, werewolves, magic users, and plain but never ordinary humans.
Check out our wiki at: devilshire.org and our MUX at: devilshire.org:4500

mud.name: NoMud 4098
mud.desc: NoMUD 4098 is a branch off of the main mud, NoMUD 4097. On 4098 we support PVP, but are also beginner-friendly. Our mud supports an enhanced ammount of classes, including: Mage, Cleric, Warrior, Thief, Paladin, Anti-Paladin, Monk, Ranger, Bard, Ninja, and Samurai; and Races, including: Human, Elf, Dwarf, Hobbit, Ogre, Vampire, Troll, Fairy, Dragon, Tiefling, Gargoyle, Mouse, Giant and Thri-Keen. NoMUD supports Clans,and are always supporting new clans. We have an extensive communication system, and a large world to play around in.
So, whether you dream of being the high-ranking non-stoppable mortal, the fun, humerious chatter, the powerful clan-leader, or the godly immortal builder or coder, Stop by and check us out.

mud.name: The Goblin and the Butterfly
mud.codebase: [Custom] Self developed server written from scratch
mud.desc: TGATB is a MMORPG under development in Alpha stage.
It has a 2D client and artwork, which is Public Domain, free to use for everybody, and a running game server.

Right now, there are only some test maps, the real world will be created soon (hopfully this year). But the game is already playable, you can chat, go and kill monsters, go to a PK (Player Kill) map and fight players, make some stuff, trade, buy and sell from/to NPC's, learn and cast 2 magic spells and harvest some items.
Volunteers are welcome to help the game, like client programmers, artists. Remember, that all the stuff you make is free for everyone to use, Public Domain.
The client itself is written in C, using the SDL library, so there might be a chance that the client can be compiled not only for Linux, but even Windows or OSX (volunteers for that are welcome).
Just download the client from SVN, connect to the server and have a look.

mud.name: Resident Evil - Destruction
mud.desc: This is a new mud based on the popular Resident Evil series. I am currently looking for coders and builders to help me get this mud started. I have tons of ideas for this MUD and I think it can be one of the best Resident Evil MUDS out there. I hope to get started on it soon and will keep everyone updated on this.
My email is: redleonkennedy@yahoo.com
Thanks Leon S. Kennedy RE-D Owner

mud.name: Paradawn
mud.desc: An actual description will be placed here when the mud is fully operational and open completely for play.

As of now, I'm looking for builders and people who can lend ideas and test the mud out. If I'm not on the mud, you can always contact me on aim at AtroxMavenia, if I'm playing a game, there will be an away message with an alternate mode of communication. If you are interested in helping out with a sci-fi themed mud with a lot of innovation, come to Paradawn and help me develop it.

mud.name: rawrMUSH
mud.codebase: [MUSH] pennmush, internal / external digital RP lounge
mud.desc: This is a digital RP lounge for a pen and paper gamer union. Our static game night is Thursday from 7:00pm to 10:00pm EST. We also have open form MUSH-ing. Feel free to contact myself or anyone you see on the MUSH. We are currently running 250 point fantasy GURPS.

mud.name: Wings Of The Dynasty
mud.desc: Come and see what we are about! The staff shall chat with you!
We are running a basic RoT v2b5 with modifications intended to make the game challenging without being impossible. (Multi-classing is only available once a player reaches the 3rd Tier.)
Role-playing is encouraged, but not required.
We have an auto-questing system, and will have random Immortal-run quests.
We have a PvP arena for players who do not want to be a member of a PK clan (and the arena also allows betting on the outcome).
WE ARE HIRING BUILDERS AND CODING ASSISTANTS!

mud.name: Shroom Mud
mud.desc: Offering clans, a conquest style of control of cities and areas, full crafting support, limited multiplay, there is something for every one. Experience does not have to come only from combat, priests can convert others to their religion, bards can seeks new and interesting places, mages can study long forgotten scrolls, and craftsmen can do what they do best from the safety of home.

mud.name: X-Men: Flame of Darkness
mud.desc: It's the unexplainable reason behind a multitude of natural disasters. It's the spark that makes the loyal husband go rampage and turn his anger on his wife and kids.
It's the system-crash that causes the power to go out, or the hurricane that floods the suburbs.
It's chaos, pure and simple, and its influence is noticeable everywhere to those in the know...
In traditional Marvel history, it's well known that Jean Grey and Rachel Summers are the ones that received the Phoenix Force.
However, this was a complete accident.
Flame of Darkness focuses on the world of Marvel from the series X-Men: Evolution with influences from the X-Men movies, forming a well-rounded RolePlay experience.
Instead of having Jean Grey obtain the Phoenix Force, it went to its rightful heir, Feron.
But during the communal process, something went wrong and a shard of the Force was lost into the Earth.
Years later, a construction crew uncovered it and unleashed it back into the world, tainted by the dark magic that tried to capture it years earlier.
Meanwhile, the mutant phenomenon continues to grow, its secret getting more and more difficult to keep from the ever watching public eye.
Those reaching the age that their powers manifest are at a point where they realise that they aren't alone, but still aren't sure where to turn.
Aware of the threats against this ever-growing facet of mankind, Xavier put together a core group of his most talented students called the X-Men.
They are protectors of normal humans and mutants alike, trained to use their fantastic abilities for the greater good.
But even though their goals are to keep humanity from suffering at the hand of evil and chaos, they struggle just like everyone else.
They know that as much as they want to, they cant risk exposing their status as a mutant to the public.
This, and the fact that they all have mid-terms to study for can be quite a weight on any teenagers shoulders.

mud.name: Silver Dreams
mud.desc: Hello All, We are a mud that is fairly new. We offer over 25 races. With new stuff coming daily. We have a fun loving staff who assists any way possible. We are open to new ideas. There is over 100 areas more coming soon Come stop by for a fun time

mud.name: Marvel: New Dawn
mud.desc: This domain has been given to former MND code staffer Mr. Green/Santiago
MND MUX no longer exists

mud.name: Arabian Moons
mud.desc: Game is Closed

mud.name: Camp Half-Blood
mud.desc: Welcome to Camp Half-Blood, a MUSH devoted to story building and quality RP of the Percy Jackson & The Olympians series!

Set at the series central location, Camp Half-Blood, young demigods train night and day as they prepare for upcoming quest....that is, if they can stay alive long enough. To make matters worse there are strange and dark omens on the air lately. The mist that keeps the mortal world ignorant of the gods and monsters is thinning and no one knows why. Despite more and more tabloids reporting monster and demon sightings on the streets, the mortals don't seem to have realized what is happening yet. Once more, the gods are divided about what to do. Some believe that it is the dawning of a new age and the return of the old ways, while others believe that an evil hand is at work and tossing the world out of balance. Some simply hold their tongue and wait for the chips to fall, but in the heart of Camp Half-Blood campers are worried. Will losing the protection of the mist mean mortals will be thrown to the claws of the monsters the half-blood and the gods fear most? And why are the barriers of the camp weakening?!
Regardless of the whos, whats, and whys, there is no mistaking the truth. The world will soon need a new hero. Will it be you?
Players that are mature, responsible, and respectable RPers with an interest in a game that puts pose and RP quality right up there beside story development, we're looking for you!

mud.name: Ashes of Tiran
mud.desc: Once, a long time ago when the world was still young, humans dominated the lands of Tiran. What they did not know, was the true history behind the world. For you see, the humans were a non-magical race, who went on with their daily lives oblivious to the true power that swirled around them, that was of course, until those that are called gods were awoken. It was at that point in history, which nothing would ever be the same again.

Even that day has almost been all but forgotten except in a few ancient manuscripts that lay around, and maybe an old tome or two. This here is one of those few remaining ones, to try and preserve the knowledge of what happened. Some of the details are a little unclear, since not everything is known, but what is certain, is that these gods changed the fate of Tiran, eventually leading to its shattering.

What transpired between their return and the shattering is left to debate, but from that came a number of races. Some had been in hiding over the years, the rest was formed from their power, taking humans and slowly twisting them into new life forms, creating a new race of people to form armies to do their bidding. These new races began to show humans what magic meant, and what it could do, but it was of course the weakness of the human mind, that magic began to consume some, drawing them into an ever downward spiral of destruction.

Because of that downward spiral, dark magic began to be explored, leeching the life from others, and causing things to become unnatural. As some of these dark mages began to gain in power, that new power further consumed their minds and drove them into desiring more and more, until one day when Venoch was awakened, and the world of Tiran as it was known, was no more. Now that the Ashes of Tiran have settled, we that are left, must strive to revive civilization, before the armies of Venoch can cause the world to implode.

mud.name: Blood of Dragons
mud.desc: Blood of Dragons is set in the low-magic, medieval-inspired fantasy world of George R.R. Martin's A Song of Ice and Fire. Knowledge of the books is not required for players with some MU*ing experience, though it is definitely helpful.

The game takes place 140 years prior to the start of the first book, A Game of Thrones, and the roleplay is focused on the political and social interactions at the royal court in King's Landing and at the court in Sunspear in Dorne, with players taking up characters from various noble families. Players have a choice between CGing a character themselves or taking up previously played, fully pre-generated roles.

Almost three years have now passed since King Daeron I, the Young Dragon, invaded and conquered Dorne, the last independent realm in Westeros. Now his chief commander in Dorne, Lord Tyrell, has been murdered and the fires of rebellion have begun to sweep across the desert.

In light of this the Admin would love to see more PCs in Dorne, either Dornish natives or members of the Targaryen occupation forces. As roleplay in Dorne may be sporadic to start with, players who are interested in Dornish PCs are encouraged to also take up an alt in King's Landing, but this is by no means a requirement. While the broad outline of the events is already planned out, as the game will be following what canon knowledge there is about these events, the fates of individual characters are very much up to their players.

mud.name: Anwethia
mud.desc: Anwethia is a original fantasy medieval theme MUSH - a world where everyones story matters, where everyone can contribute as hero or villain. The theme and world has been crafted and presented so players can find inspiration and opportunities for their own characters development. Our aim is to be unique and flexible, within the bounds of theme, allowing players to find their own place. The printing press has yet to be invented. Majority of the population is illiterate. Travel is by foot, horse, ship and carriage. Weapons are traditional medieval, being swords,daggers, bow and the such. Feudal system (Nobles,commoners) is the political and social structure. Politics both internal and eventually external to Liosliath, intrigue, mystery, conflict, merchant, magic are all part of or planned to be part of the world. The Story - At this time in Anwethias history there is no dominating power, a void that cannot last. A void that the others are jostling to fill The Plains tribes war with Garragg at its northern borders. Liosliath in the southeast area of the continent has freed itself from its conquerors and seeking to rebuild itself. Liosliath is ambitious and maneuvering to be that power. But first it must rebuild itself while facing dangerous challenges such as rogue mages, pirates, coastal and border raiders, politics and infighting, natural disasters add their destabilizing presence. The port city of Carraig is just re-establishing itself as a trading crossroads. Welcome to Anwethia. Where we Role Play and not Roll Play. No sheet, no skills/stats. Anwethia is Creativity, the inspiration to craft stories that will grow as the individual characters and Anwethia grows A world crafted where everyones stories matters. A world with a dedicated inspired staff. A world offering new players the opportunity to play high-ranking feature level characters. Role Play will be focused around Carraig and Caer Glas, the Thanes keep Liosliath has a roster of characters or players may create their own. We are especially looking for motivated players for - Nobles - Merchants- Craftspeople- Magistrates-Healers - Warriors- High-ranking feature level characters

mud.name: Spellwind
mud.desc: Spellwind is a MUD (Multi-User Dungeon) based on the Harry Potter series of books written by J.K.Rowling, running a custom codebase developed by the team named Alohamora. The MUD will feature popular locations such as Hogwarts castle, Diagon Alley, Platform 9 and 3/4 and also some muggle towns, Hogsmeade and eventually other schools.
The players will be able to create their own spells based on a unique system which recognises key words and will be able to use all the spells from the book.
There will be a variety of different items all with different uses from the books and invented by the team. We hope to include books that can be read to add another dimension to the world.
The MUD has been writted using a custom codebase, from scratch which is stable, fast and secure.
We have kept as close to the books as possible because the films are not very accurate.

mud.name: Aranock Online
mud.desc: Aranock online is based off of the ever popular Mercenaries of astonia or Astonia v2 as its also known.
Aranock is a free MMORPG, its completly free to play all you need todo is download the 20mb or so stand alone client and create your character.
Aranock has an ever expanding community and fan base and offers a multitube of quests and challenges, with a new one being released every few weeks if not one every month.

mud.name: Dragon Ball Arena
mud.desc: Welcome to the original Dragonball Arena, under new administration!

Dragonball Arena has been up since 1999, and runs a unique codebase that has been mimicked but never perfectly copied, where nothing in combat is automated. Charge an attack as long as you like or as long as your Ki can handle it and its power will reflect how long you gathered your energy. Melee attacks have a brief follow-through that require recovery, but higher speed gained through stat training allows you to recover faster.

Roleplaying is greatly encouraged, and stories and sagas are run by our RP staff and quest imms. Special attacks, gear, and power up messages are available through RP rewards, allowing you to customize your character to your liking. Famous Dragonball characters are rare, however, as we prefer to make our world more unique and we urge our players to make their characters unique, as well.

Our quest staff offers weekly and monthly quests, and personally tailored quests from certain IMMs, available when they are. Dragonballs, tournaments (both RP and code,) and other major events are scheduled every other month, and is tailored to appeal to all tiers and types of players.
So come and join us in the Arena! Battle and lore all await you!

mud.name: Cult of Man: Southern Cross
mud.desc: The city of Santa Meringue is a thriving port of call, a major shipping hub into and out of the mediterranean continent of Valente. 1030 years after Holy, the citizens of Santa Meringue and Valente at large go about their day to day lives, wether in the fields harvesting argiculture or selling those goods in the thriving bazaar, the common folk of the city live and breathe and die by a series of endlessly repeating steps. But there are those who chose more then the life of a laborer. Powerful mages study arcane energies in the University Spire. Adventurers of all shapes and sizes brave the wilds to keep the land safe from the monsters and villans that inhabit Gaia. And within Valente itself, the Noble Houses plot and scheme agaisnt each other, grasping to curry favor with the government. Your place in the city is up to you, your fate is in your own hands. You find yourself walking in the forest, and there is a blur of light... The music plays...

mud.name: TwilightMUX
mud.desc: The Cullens moved to Forks in the early year 2000, their children starting up at School later that same year. Life was peaceful, they lived their lives amongst the humans like many vampires have to do; but with a different spin. It wasn't until year 2004 that Forks started to get interesting. The arrival of Bella Swan heralded many changes for Forks and the surrounding area, as with the time that Edward Cullen fell in love with the humans, a number of supernaturals started to come to pass... and stay. Werewolves started coming out of the woodworks, Shifters began to become awakened, and the Vampire community increased by a large number.

Of course.. the humans don't know this. Times went onward with many silent battles fought for the sake of peace and keeping their supernatural secret; James was killed, a year later his mate Victoria followed his fate. Others that came to stir the pot were put to rest by another force, or came to live in relative peace with the strange hub of supernatural activity.

The focus of this large group started to spread to Port Angeles in early 2006, even further increasing the ratio of supernaturals against the humans in the area. Late 2007, the Volturi started to take action against the indiscretions of vampires in the area. They took up a temporary headquarters in Port Angeles, rumored to be two of the three ancients that were there for a time, one for a good portion of the duration. Only the Volturi and a small number of Vampires know if this was true or not. Early 2008, however, it seems the ancient vampiric royalty was satisfied, and returned to Volterra, Italy; but they left in their wake a number of Volturi to act as the Supernatural police to make sure that things don't get out of hand in the future.

Thankfully, things were quiet for nearly two years; the missing persons died down to a low minimum even for human activity, the deaths have been few as well. At least, nothing out of the ordinary. However, it is now year 2010, and with the new year brings new possibilities. Will the Supernaturals invoke another looming Volturi presence? Will a war break out between the factions?
Stay tuned, and join us, for the story is still being written...
-- Twilight Mux Staff

mud.name: Times of Chaos
mud.desc: Times of Chaos (TOC) is an old MUD that had a fairly large following back in the mid to late 90's. It was originally based off of DLL (Dragons of Legends and Lore), but was later transformed. The game is up and running, mostly in it's original format. I'm still playing with the code to find out what's missing or needs adjustment.

mud.name: Apocalyptic Legacy
mud.desc: We're a very new MUD. At the moment we're a \"social\" MUD looking for friendly and active people to play with us.
The world is huge and has a lot of things to go through. You'll be able to put in more than a few hours into this without getting too bored.
Yes, the world is not very original yet but we are working everyday to change and mold it into a totally original MUD.

Since the MUD is in its beginning stages it might be a good idea to actually stay with us since you might be able to become a Imm fairly quickly as long as you show you can help others and help the MUD as a whole.
All of our user's input is noted and will more than likely be put to good use with the MUD. Everyone has a voice here instead of some of the more mainstream MUDs out there.
Also, if no one is on when you do a 'who' function don't let that have you not wanting to stay with us. There's at least me, Drakewla, on almost everyday waiting for people's input.
Thanks for reading and we're really hoping to see YOU there and playing with us.

mud.name: Rawhide
mud.desc: Rawhide Buttes has been a camping and hunting ground for natives for centuries. Rumor has it that a white settler bragged of killing an 'Injun' during his excursion in the west. He was warned of the folly by his own people, to no avail. The young white man killed a Cheyenne woman. The other indians in the area came down on the camp and demanded they surrender the murderer to their hand. The rest of the party, having no other choice, was forced to comply. The story goes on to say that the young man was skinned and his hide was stretched to dry in the sun. Thus, the mountain was named Rawhide Buttes, sometimes called Rawhide Mountain. Rawhide is based in what is now called Goshen County, Wyoming. This region contains the Rawhide Buttes range, and the Little Tetons, with sprawling valleys and beautiful scenery. The theme is still being developed. Please be patient.

mud.name: Resurrected Abandonment
mud.codebase: [Rot] Rot 1.4 Heavily Modified, Inspired By Many Similar
mud.desc: Credit for some ideas goes to these great muds I used to play: Ashen Dust Asgardian Nightmare Calindrian Council

We are somewhere between player testing and fully open. I have no plans for any pwipes, so anything you accomplish you can keep. I just finished reorganizing the current skills and spells and am now getting ready to work on the group costs. Also have plenty of new skills I would like to add once I finish cleaning up all the existing ones.

I am thinking about hiring a few builders, but I would prefer to have builders who are currently playing so they can have some sense of the balance of the MUD. I have plenty of areas that need a good retooling / looking over or if you prefer you can build new areas.
Key Points For Players:
Forge System - Allows players to collect metal stone types and forge their own equipment.
Quest System - Everyone should be familiar with this by now.
Global Quest System - Similar to normal quests, but with multiple mobs and allows multiple players to partake.
Arena System - Allows players to fight each other without fear of losing anything. Has many advanced options for disallowing certain skills and items. Allows teams or solo efforts.
Spam Toggles - Allows many messages considered by many as spam to be blocked from your screen.
Advanced Aliases - Allows multiple command substitutions.
PK System - PK rules automated to prevent illegal interference. Looting point system installed for looting to limit looting of harder to obtain items. (5 points per corpse)
PK Records - Automatic saving of all your kills / deaths and the opponents you were fighting including level / clan.
Multiple Scores - 5 separate score screens for customization.
Item Storage - Can store extra equipment in the various banks.
Top Charts - Shows top ranking players in various categories.
Checkstat Command - Can dump the contents of various game_tables to see stats on races / classes / skills / groups / etc.
Mobile AI - Some mobiles act more like players and less like punching bags.
Automated Clans - All the clan building is done by the players and not the Immortals. I find this works out best for everyone.

mud.name: Act of War
mud.desc: Let the warhorns blow! The fantasy world of Uthrac is littered with original landscapes with new spins on the time-tested races we have all become accustomed to finding in fantasy settings. The scope of the game's story focuses on the small kingdom of Tier in the lands of Albiane. Tier is a monarchal society, whose kingly line over the years has slowly weakened. The prince Tornoah is all that remains of the once powerful kings of the past.
