The Tieran nobility squabbles in dimly lit council chambers, each following their own mechinations to gain an upper hand over their rivals. Here, corruption and abuse have become all too common. The general population of the kingdom live their lives in peace, minding their own business, and working the wheat and barley fields that surround Tier. Silver can be had for those willing to take the risks of prospecting in the nearby Ambros Mountains.

To Tier's south lies the fortified city of Kael, once an outpost of Tier, now a strong military bastion. Both city states exist alongside one another in a strained peace. Not long ago Kael's army sacked the city of Tier after the Tieran king Kardan III had their leader General Kael, the fort's namesake, assassinated. After 10 years the Tieran exiles returned however, and retook their city, reestablishing their old borders. Continued border skirmishes exist between the cities, and all-out war threatens the thinly brokered peace.

While western lands fight petty wars over land and honor, deep in the Dragon Mountains far to the east, evil begins to stir. The Matron Mother, vanquished following the fall of Tier, has been reborn by the magic of Lacatus, a powerful necromancer. Her banners fly once again, carried by throngs of orc, goblin, and dagashi armies. Villages are once again being overrun, with fresh slaves pouring in to the Matron's Undermountain City. Some for food, and others as laborers, over time being corrupted themselves by the dark magics of the Matron.
Follow the path of light, and fend against the encroaching evil, or take up the dark blood-stained banner of the Matron Mother! Whichever side you choose, prepare for WAR!

mud.name: Realms of Hell
mud.desc: The Realms of Hell opened on Halloween of 1998 as a Mordor-type mud. In the years sense, many things have been modified, including several new classes, races, spells, skills and abilities. Players can venture into the world as vampires, liches, or werewolves, or play as a cleric who must now additionally chose a deity to worship. Realms also offers multi-class combinations, such as cleric/assassins or fighter/thieves, and pioneered many improvements that are now standard in Mordor, such as player shops and guilds.

The world of Derlith is large and is still unfolding. There are many areas open for players to explore, from underground mazes to tropical islands to glacier palaces. Additionally, we are currently developing racial starting locations, which will add a new angle to character creation and promote roleplaying among our character base.

mud.name: Cotn 2.5.1: The Original
mud.desc: Children of the Night 2.5: The Original Xrakisis [www.ianshirm.net] (marcusironfist@hotmail.com)
The Hybrids cotn that has been running now about 6 years on and off.
Classes: Demon, Werewolf, Drow, Vampire, Tanarri, UK, Angel, Wraith Assassin, Paladin, Elemental, Dragon, Hydra, Zombie, Technomage, Shinobi, Anti-Paladin, Giant, Skyblade, Priest, Ghoul.

HYBRIDS [UNDEAD LYCAN]: Werewolf/Vampire [HELLS SOLDIER]: Demon/Assassin -=(xGaia Wolfx)=-: Werewolf/Elemental [Shadowborn]: Drow/Wraith -=(xDruidx)=-: Paladin/Elemental [Shadow Dragon]: Demon/Dragon [Shadow Fiend]: Demon/Wraith [Stalker]: Werewolf/Drow [HELLS SPAWN]: Vampire/Tanar'ri {/*}Black Assassin{/*}: Drow/Assassin <<Vampyric Mist>>: Vampire/Wraith .x(Silver Dragon)x.: Angel/Dragon .x(Gold Dragon)x.: Paladin/Dragon

- Auto-generated room descriptions. - Weather. (incorporated into room descs, among other things) - Connect and Forge Runes into eq for +50 HR/DR - Glyphs for special affects to Weapons - Races - Original Areas - Xcenter installed (players can now view class stats) (number attacks, damcap, wpn levels, parry, dodge) (Admins can change values from in-game) - Rom style damage messages - Attacks go to body parts - Basic and Rare autoloading EQ - Armorcraft to custom create armor - Player Symbiotes - Auction System - Player Arena - Fbuy to create slabs, gemstones, stones (for armorcraft) - Kingdoms - Convert to change qp to Exp and Exp to Qp - Qp gained from mob kills - Leveling Weapons and Armor - Xset installed - 11 Hybrid Classes - Weapon types and stances redone - Trainable Rank, Resistance and Legend - Exp that doesnt cap at 2billion - Object connect code - Globalpeace and checkfighting added for immortals. - Vampires auto-bite to gain more blood while fighting - Jail Code - Shop code installed - Kavirs Soundex snippit installed - Tiers and Tierkill to gain them - Shield wear location and Shield block (similar to parry/dodge) - Guilds:Dark Hand, Guardian, Crusaders, Druid, Beast, Damned *Each guild as a 32 room fortess with grecall *Guild members can hire guards and soldiers *Guild fortresses connected by a battlefield area - Complete race overhaul in progress

mud.name: GateWay
mud.codebase: [LP] GWlib (with portions of TMI-2) on MudOS v21
mud.desc: What kind of mudder are you? Explorer, Socializer, Achiever or Killer? Perhaps a bit of each? GateWay has something for you!

Explorer: There's plenty to explore on GateWay, it is HUGE and there are endless hidden things to ferret out and discover. Almost every room has clues and hidden things. Every guild has unique abilities to try. Monsters can be listened to as well as spoken with for information. Six Domains, Ten guilds, Thirty quests, unique equipment (some with special abilities), puzzles, hidden treasures... there's too much to list.

Socializer: Love to chat and kid with friends? GateWay has always been a social mud with silly people who do things like moon you, shoot sticky arrows, slap you with \"kick me\" signs or send you a hug from a distance. There's a wonderful chapel to get married in. Also you can give out friendship bracelets. The list of emotes is massive. The mail system is superb and accessable everywhere.

Achiever: Want to get to the top? There are 100 levels and if you make it that far you may qualify to be an AVATAR and go for another 100 gruelling levels. There is an extensive toplist maintained with dozens of rankings to let you know where you stand.

Killer: Wanna stand over the bloody oozing corpse of another player that you've just mangled? Register as a Player Killer and hope that you're tough enough to take on the other registered Player Killers. Because they'll be waiting for you...
Come, enter the GateWay and find your mud waiting for you.

mud.name: Hogwarts: LEGACY
mud.desc: Hogwarts, 2027 is a MUX/MUSH set some thirty years after the events which take place in the Deathly Hallows. Harry Potter is now-- after years of being an auror-- the headmaster at Hogwarts, and the Wizarding World has, for years now, enjoyed a period of relative peace since the fall of the dark wizard, Voldemort. But there are stirrings of a darkness. Something is restless; something unclean. Something which stirs beneath the surface. Hogwarts school of Witchcraft and Wizardry is again the target of that something, as is the wizarding world at large. Only the faintest hints have rippled the placid peace, and only a few have noticed those ripples. We're looking for players of both students and adults, at Hogwarts and in the adult, wizarding world. We have spheres for the school, the Ministry, the Underground, and more. We have helpful, friendly staff, and we look to weave a story where the players are involved, and can make a difference. If you're looking for a home and are a fan of the HP Universe, look no further. We are still finishing up newsfiles, but have most of them in place at this point, and room descs are being added slowly to a fairly large initial grid, but we are now open for play. Feel free to drop by and take a look. The battle against the dark awaits.

mud.name: InfoTech
mud.desc: Based in a fictious futuristic world, InfoTech aims to bring an immersive experience to life rather than an actual story. InfoTech takes a nod at realistic gameplay while shunning away from any such restrictions that would spoil gameplay. Rather than having a story, the world is presented as is and players are let to participate in and shape its future. Large events will be run and players' actions will shape their outcome and their affect on the game world.

InfoTech as a MUD emphesizes on innovation and multifunctionality. We aim to create a plethora of game mechanics in order to avoid the tedium of simply fighting mobs to gain 'levels'. Our greatest goal is to allow a player to reach the top of the field without fighting a single fight, if so he chooses to do.

Other than that, we're revamping most of the stock systems. * Levels have been done away with and are replaced with a stat system which determines your skills and equipment. That one, in turn, increases with use and reflects the type of character you are playing. Those who choose to use psionics will be more powerful at their mental attributes while the fighters will find their physical ones to be higher. * Classes and races have been done away with in order to allow players to truly be whatever they wish to be via their actions rather than the choices they made during creation. This allows a virtually infinite amount of multiclassing. * Due to the fact that there are no classes and any character can have any skill, a special skill system has been implemented. Players have to plan their strategy before heading into combat as they can only carry a limited amount of skills and programs (programs are in InfoTech what spells are in normal medieval MUDs). This forces players to have variety (rather than have everyone be the exact same), while still allowing anyone to do anything. Of course, those who mainly use psionics will find it easier to use than those not trained in it. Esentially, players decide their class by the program set they choose at any given moment, and are able to change it at their discretion. * Combat has been revamped and improved with more work still planned for it. Esentially, the minor annoyances of stock Circle combat have been done away with (such as command lag via the use of a special energy gauge), and many of the calculations and hidden variables have been removed in order to make a more straightforward and reliable combat system. * AC is gone, thank god. Instead, dodge is actually based on one's dexterity, while his armor actually absorbs damage rather than allow the player to dodge it better. Damage is divided into various types, and each armor protects for the better or for the worse against that specific damage type. Furthermore, limb damage is planned to be implemented, allowing for more strategic combat.
And more features are constantly planned and added to fulfill the main goal of truly standing out among other MUDs via innovation.
** The mud is currently in early stages of development, so players won't have much of a world to see yet. Builders, however, are heartilly encouraged to drop by or to drop us a mail.

mud.name: DragonBall Remix
mud.desc: DragonBall Remix: A MUD all it's own. Some say it appears the same as others, some say it brings it's own uniqueness to the front lines. DragonBall Remix is a futuristic MUD with not only the base races that everyones come to know and love, but also a few others yet to be seen by others. The war has started, will you defend? Will you attack? Or will you stay a neutral party? Or will you stalk the shadows as a hardcore stone-cold killer? The choice is yours, forge your own path through the destiny that is DragonBall Remix!

mud.name: Asgardian Nightmare: Rebirth
mud.codebase: [Rot] Highly Modified / Random EQ System / Focusing System / Many Features
mud.desc: Asgardian Nightmare has a long and successful history. Peaking at a playerbase of as many as 30 players on at a time, this mud was a very good mud.

But the mud was closed down for a while.After a long period of downtime the mud is reopen again for players under a new look and with new Owners and Immortals, and with a new site. Allow me to describe a little bit this mud :

One of the most outstanding parts of our mud is random item generation. It works like the items in Diablo 2, where an item is assigned prefixes and suffixes that give it extra stat bonuses or drawbacks.

With a huge number of prefixes and suffixes, as well as condition tags, there are literally millions of possibilities for random items. Builders are constantly working on new areas, so the mud is constantly evolving. We offer three tiers of classes, with 21 third tier classes to choose from, and the option to let your race evolve into one of many new races as you gain experience.

mud.name: Dro' xundus
mud.desc: This mud offers people the chance to travel with their own imaginationof mystical ages.There are 18 races and 30 classes/subclasses for players to choose,and more features to personalize their accounts.The base code is from ROM and Anatolia. The basic idea of this mud is not to ovegrow into a huge realm where people do not know eachother but to maintain it's friendly spirit to old and new players without ofcourse loosing the excitment of player killing.This is a totally free mud,which means that the admins are not geting paid for their work their reward seeing their work appreciated. Last but not least roleplaying is important but not enforced. Your's the Shadowland's crew

mud.name: Dragonball: Saga (Hawaii Style)
mud.desc: Dragonball Saga (Hawaii) Is a Dbsaga base code come fight to be the strongest in the universe!!! Own All and show your true power come down to play currently stock areas expanding vastly in due time This mud is a Mud in work...needs players for suggestions... Server is based in hawaii...Super fast server/broadband come play :D

mud.name: Planes of Existence
mud.desc: Welcome to Planes of Existence, a new GW type mud, baed on Mincloud2.5b. At this time, we are not open. I will update this listing when I am near completion. -Morvudd-

mud.name: GodWars: Rebirth Of Apocalypse
mud.desc: Tired of MUD's that promise HUGE changes and then vanish from the net? Tired of MUD's that claim they are superstable, and when you connect they crash non stop?

Then why not give Rebirth of Apocalypse a try, we are based upon the once popular GodWars: Apocalypse MUD. We are working on adding new fun and exciting features to bring this MUD into the 21st century.
Thirteen years old and STILL getting players! We are the longest running GodWars mud!!!

For those of you who dont know. GodWars: Apocalypse was created in 1997 by myself(Tijer) and Shimian, after working there for a year i left and went off to make my own MUDS. In August 2006 i was given a copy of Apocalypse from 2002, by one of its coders and Majorly modified that code, which caught the eye of Zoth, one of the coders who had recoded Apocalypse, to cut a long story short he gave me permission to run a copy of the code from 2004, which then became Rebirth of Apocalypse. We are NOW GodWars Apocalypse to all of our players!

Rebirth of Apocalypse features the following classes: Vampires, Werewolves, Demons, Magi and Highlanders. Each of which has what the classes have usually on godwars. Mages and Highlanders have been recoded, to give them more powers, and more scope for change.

Along with Hybrids: Abomination(WW/Vampire), Tremere(Mage/Vampire), Baali (Demon/Vampire), Nephandi(Demon/Mage), Skindancer(WW/Mage) and Black Spiral Dancer (WW/Demon). You can hybrid yourself using the selfbrid command for a cost.

We have added a PK arena where players can test their skills at PKILL without the worry of losing status or gaining a death. Players can bet on arenas using quest points and if the person they bet on wins, they gain qps + the payoff from the bet. We have also recently added Wars, where players can win quest points, and status. There are currently 2 types, Team Wars or Last Man Standing.

Rebirth of Apocalypse also has Renown, which gives players a statcap boost, and damcap boost, we also have recoded how status affects statcaps, players can gain hp/mana/move, but when they lose status their stats lower, regaining status brings them back to where they were.
Tired of your clan leader, challenge them for their leadership in arena, and if you win, you get their leader position.
Fed up with having 100's of Quest cards in your inventory? You can now upgrade your quest cards for a cost, to a maximum for 1000 points!!
Rebirth of Apocalypse does what it says on the tin, its the Rebirth of the MUD called GodWars: Apocalypse, come join us! We are not just a MUD, we are a way of life!
We now have a facebook group visit us @ http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=287464174074 apoc.godwars.net 6660 - Rebirth of Apocalypse - Its not just a MUD, its a way of life!

mud.name: Warhammer 40K: Cerberus Campaign
mud.desc: Welcome to the grim darkness of the far future...

Upon the world of Cerberus Prime a seemingly endless battle is waged, it's soil stained red with the blood of fallen soldiers. The noble, zealous humans, the enigmatic Eldar, the savage Orks, the ambitious Tau and the ruinous powers of Chaos all have their claims upon the war-torn world of Cerberus Prime, but in the end, only one will emerge victorious.
Which side will you choose?

Forge a name for yourself in the dangerous battlefields of the 41st millennium where life is brutish and short. Cerberus Campaign is a freeform MUX with optional rolling for those who prefer coded combat. We allow near any race or character concept within reason and welcome tabletop veterans, and those new and interested in the setting alike. Please, come join us and help us bring the Warhammer 40K world to life!

mud.name: Dro'xundus
mud.desc: Original DikuMUD by Hans Staerfeldt,Katja Nyboe, Tom Madsen, Michael Seifert, Sebastian Hammer
Based on MERC 2.1 by Hatchet, Furey, and Kahn
ROM 2.4 copyright (c) 1993-1996 Russ Taylor
ANATOLIA 2.2 copyright (c) 1997-1999 Serdar Bulut, Ibrahim Canpunar, Murat Bicer, Devrim Acar Heavily modified by Yavuz Selim Taskin and Mehmet Ozdemir
DRO'XUNDUS modifications by Selcuk Goren, Zihni Saygili, and Ozgur Cayci, Orkun Turkmen

mud.name: Archons of Light
mud.codebase: [Smaug] Smaug codebase, stock. Need coder(s) badly.
mud.desc: New world, new themes. In need of coders and builders. Privately hosted, invite your friends. (Builders need no prior experience, REdit system is simple) (Coders must have experience)

mud.name: Trunks Palace Online
mud.codebase: [Smaug] A new Dragonball Z MUD with role play strictly enforced.
mud.desc: We have sagas, and plots every week. Being a new mud we need more players to play.

mud.name: Darkon Mud
mud.desc: We are back.. Based on the Original CircleMUD 3.17 code, but rebuilding from scratch and vastly improved.There have been TONS of changes put into this mud. I don't think more then 100 lines or so are left from the original mud. We have lots of areas to explore so we just might have what your looking for. We are trying to rebuild the mud and to phase out stock zones. We are coding in new things just about every week so stop by. If you looking to play, come and enjoy yourself. If you would like to try building here on Darkon, drop us an email. Hope to see you soon!

mud.name: DiamondMud
mud.desc: DiamondMud was founded in the time that I was a student at the University. With a few of my friends there we decided to start our own little place on Mud Land.
DiamondMud excisted untill the early years of 2000. Christmas of 2000 was the last time that a major code update was done. Unfortunately that was also the time that the mud grew less and less active.
At this time, we still have all playerfiles that we had at that time. So if you are a returning member of our community then you will be able to use your character & equipment again.

We are looking for staff and players, so it would be nice if you had some time to check us out and see what you think. Most area's are created by ourselves. But we do have a handful of original CircleMud zones.
Vanyar - Administrator of DiamondMud.

mud.name: Dragonballz - Legacy of Time
mud.desc: DragonballZ - Legacy of Time offers several unique factors to the general gameplay of a mud.

-Player created RP storyline/plotlines -Player created world/skills/powerups Players, through RP, can now dictate what happens in the universe! Good role-playing can results in new cities, new planets, new attacks, new skills, even new powerups! Of course, your enemies can also take cities away, even planets through destruction, so be careful! -Admin run quests for special RP events -Revamped Economy, now you can sell that hard-earned equipment for cold, hard Zeni and other can benefit from your labors.
This is just beginning as old areas are edited and fixed to breathe new life into the game and new areas being designed all the time.
Come join a world limited only by your own imagination!

mud.name: A Vicious Circle
mud.desc: A Vicious Circle is a Seeds of Hate (SoH) based derivative with the intention of debugging and eventually releasing the source to the public.
Currently there are a number of bug fixes and the list grows every night as I have a chance to throw in some new fixes and balances.
telnet://www.planetmud.net:4123

mud.name: Gizmo DikuMud
mud.desc: Gizmo is derived from Diku Code. Its been heavily modified and changed to meet the needs of the players, and offer endless hours of enjoyment. Some of the things Gizmo has to offer are:

.oOo. Extensive Player Base, there are always people logged on. .oOo. Multi-Playing up to a maximum of 4 characters. .oOo. SOLO Character Benefits. .oOo. Meta of Stats (STR/INT/WIS/DEX/CON Hps, Mana, Moves and Age) .oOo. 10 differant classes to choose from. .oOo. Friendly players and Immortals. .oOo. Clan Housing System .oOo. Special Regeneration Rooms .oOo. 200+ Zones, with new ones being added all the time .oOo. Special Procedure Code (Makes things exciting!) .oOo. Arena for PKing without worry of stat loss. .oOo. 50 Mortal levels, 10 Immortal levels .oOo. ANSI Color, highly configurable, use in titles, and all means of communication. .oOo. Quests run by Immortals, and Quests within the areas. .oOo. Very stable environment, with new code added all the time. .oOo. Rank system based on collecting fame by killing powerful monsters. .oOo. Complex riddle-based areas for those who want to pursue a different sort of challenge.

mud.name: Epic Adventures
mud.desc: Lost in the mists of time and space the world of Srinoka awaits the adventureous souls of the spirit plane to come fight for peace or bring glorious war to the lands. The eternal conflict between good and evil plays itself out weaving a tapestry of many colors and wonderful patterns in time. Let the hero in you do the great things you were destined for in Srinoka.

Epic is an LPMud that is based on the Amylaar driver. It starts in Srinoka a land that is peaceful. From here you can adventure the lands that follow a fantasy setting that is medieval in type but not exactly. There are quests to do and equipment to chase after. Many NPC's both good and evil are there to kill in plenty. Skills which encompass spells are available to all classes but are really hard to level up outside of your class. You can train skills up to a certain level and to max it out you have to use it. I encourage you to use clients like tintin++ etc. or whatever is the latest. However movement requires you to type directions which are short like e for east etc. and you cannot move 10 steps in one shot with a client. I am working on making this possible. The mud is under continuous development and contributions from players is highly encouraged. There is mud documentation available for the rest of the features of the mud. Even though this is an LPMud I have encorportard lots of Diku features into it. Eventually it will support all the features offered by a Diku mud as well in addition to the LPMud style custom interface it has.
Cheers,
Akshay Srinivasan (Epic - Creator and Admin) (https://globalepicadventures.com/Epic) (SSL/HTTPS Site)

mud.name: Inner Circle
mud.codebase: [Rot] Heavily Modified Rot, with Rom and Diku sprinked around
mud.desc: Inner circle is an all around fun and creative MUD to play on. It is a fantasy based world full of elves, dwarfs, giants, and all sorts of other fantasy mobs. The mud recently reopened in January of 2010, and hopes to build up a nice player base. Roleplay is encouraged among characters and there are channels for everything from out of character talk, in character talk, to clan talk, gossiping, emoting and so fourth. Clans are options, but allow people who want to go PK to do so. The mud also features Relics, special items which allow you to fully heal you hp, mana, move, high level spells etc, which are the main things clans fight each other to get. They drop when you log out, so they must be guarded in order to keep them. More features will be added soon. And of course, skilled builders/coders are welcome to help this great MUD continue to grow.

Inner Circle has a lot of amazing features some of which are: -200 Level system -19 Races -13 Classes -Reroll/Remort System -Mob driven quest system -Immortal run quests as well -50+ linked areas -Mining, Fabrication, Spellbinding system to make your own equipment -Hundreds of spells/skills to learn -Optional Clans/Player Killing -Mud School for beginner's

mud.name: Unofficial Seeds of Hate
mud.desc: The aim of this mud is to continue on the legacy of the original Seeds of Hate mud. Numerous changes have been made to the mud with many more to come.

Some of the things that have been changed/added: * Numerous classes have been redone/heavily altered (soon to be all). * A command (knowledge) has been added to give the player detailed insight into their combat prowess. * Many areas have been added. * Class abilities and combat bonuses are now gained through a leveling process. * Armor has been modified to allow players to create a build more focused on resisting or avoiding damage. * Countless bugs have been squashed and the fight code has been rewritten to actually make sense. * Many functions such as (areas, powers, score, level, etc.) are much snazzier. * Class travels have been removed in favor of only allowing players to travel to areas they have visited. * Race values have changed and stats now have a greater impact. * many others...
We are currently in need of builders and testers to help mold the world into something better. Players are more than welcome; however, the mud is still in testing.

mud.name: Mass Effect MUSH
mud.desc: Mass Effect is a universe of exploration, adventure, and intrigue. Whether you want to be a notorious pirate who lives beyond the reach of the law or a political leader of free worlds, there's something for you. With nearly limitless thematic content to draw upon based on two books and a hugely successful video game, Mass Effect is a science fiction universe that's ripe for enjoyment.

The creator of the original Underworld MUSH is pleased to present Mass Effect MUSH, a game that has been in development for over two years. A rich plethora of completely original systems awaits our players, from the ability to carry on conversations with NPCs to a dynamic commodity trade market accessible through the latest version of HSpace. Almost every line of code has been written specifically for this game, and we've reached a place where it would be beneficial to have players willing to stress test these systems as even more features are implemented.
If having a voice in the development of the first and only MU* based on the Mass Effect universe appeals to you, then we invite you to connect and explore

mud.name: GreaterMUD
mud.desc: GreaterMUD is a faithful remake of MajorMUD. Both the mud engine and the telnet server it runs on (TGS) were both written completely from scratch in C#. I want to stress the fact that GreaterMUD *does not* use WorldGroup so the sysop does not have to shell out oodles of cash for WorldGroup.

GreaterMUD has been in development for over three years now and an enormous amount of effort has gone into this project to make sure it looks and feels just like MajorMUD. It is 100% MegaMUD compatible so legacy MajorMUD players will be right at home getting around the realm. For those that don't know what MegaMUD is, it is a very well written client program designed specifically to help MajorMUD players navigate the realm and allow AFK scripting.

Almost all the major functionality has been completed and has been well tested. Version 1.0 is scheduled to be released in January of 2009. Please feel free to stop by to check out our realm, and be sure to visit our forums for more information.
Hope to see you there!

mud.name: The Second City: 1920's Chicago by Night
mud.desc: The Second City, Chicago by Night is a heavily immersive role-playing game set in the Old World of Darkness and Chicago, Illinois of 1926. The mortal world is blighted by the dark underbelly of organized crime as two battling Princes wage war for Domain of the city proper. Torn down the middle, Chicago is separated by the North and South; as power ploys between the Camarilla Courts devolve toward desperation the mob families of the city grow increasingly violent and segregated from their would-be comrades in the war against Prohibition.

Al \"Scarface\" Capone and the South Side Gang maintain tight control over vast numbers of the human population as the sinister Ghoul of the Brujah Prince in South Chicago. In the North, Bugs Moran's North Side Gang springs up criminal enterprises to counter his southern rival, powered by the strong blood and acute manipulations of the Nosferatu Prince. As the Kindred puppeteers set the stages and pull the strings, the mortal world is wracked by a seemingly endless timeline of violence, fear and unusual economic prosperity.

The Second City features Vampire: The Masquerade, Mage: The Ascension and Mortal+ Numinists in a true-to-life tabletop gaming environment. We have no coded mobs to kill, no leveling and no autoquests to run. In-Character chronicles are written as you go. To prevent surprises for new players, an average pose-length runs at a four to six sentence paragraph. Some players do a little more or a little less, but either way one must expect to write - and write as well as they can - while weaving together friendships, vendettas, forging alliances, making enemies and composing the epic tales which encompass character progression. We never ask for perfection - just effort.

We feature comfortable MUD-style commands with the role-play niceties of a MUSH, and have frequent code revisions and changes to smooth out bumps in the system. Our community forum allows ideas, custom material and game mechanic debates to flow freely between pbase and staff. The community wiki project is one of the best Old World of Darkness resources on the web (membership approval required), and undergoes constant additions by both players and staff. XP is rewarded weekly based upon RP recommendations made by other players, but XP may also be gained by contributing to the community wiki project. Combat is run almost solely by volunteer player-storytellers (one person is nominated or volunteers themselves when a scene requires a switch to combat), though there is a full Staff in place to mediate or run scenes in which there is no one comfortable enough with combat to run it. Anywhere Rooms fill in the blanks between coded locations on the Chicago grid, allowing players to run scenes, Storylines and Chronicles anywhere - any city, country or dimension - they choose.

The Second City is a new game. We are still in the process of attempting to accumulate a sound playerbase, so don't be discouraged by brief periods of inactivity. During our busy hours there are typically 8-10 players online and In-Character. Applications take an average of 24 hours for reviewal and approval. Any new blood is good blood, so come give us a try - we'd be glad to help you get to know the game.
Connect to: roaringtwenties.genesismuds.com port 9009 Forums: cityofserenity.netfreehost.com (House Rules and Applications may be accessed without membership) Wiki: roaringtwenties.wikidot.com

mud.name: Mythic Falls
mud.codebase: [Custom] Custom build server, client and engine
mud.desc: Mythic Falls is a parody to Mythic Entertainment's (EA) Darkness Falls and Darkness Falls: the Crusade. We have build up the game from scratch. Server/engine and client. The GUI (graphical user interface) have healthbars and maps build in for easy navigation.

mud.name: Iberia MUD
mud.desc: In the 3rd century BC, Rome started its conquest of the Iberian Peninsula, but focusing only their strength there after the end of Punic Wars. The invasion progressed quite well in its initial phases, conquering most of the peninsulae with relative ease.

The consul Servius Sulpicius Galba commanded the Roman troops in Iberia circa 150 BC and started destroying the rest of the Lusitan resistance. Fearing the destruction of their lands, the Lusitans sent an embassy to him. Galba received the Lusitan embassy politely, suspended the offensive and promised to give lands to the Lusitanian people.
The offer turned out to be a trap. When the unarmed Lusitanians tried to reclaim the lands promised by Galba, a massacre happened and many were killed. Viriathus was among those who escaped.

Viriathus never forgot the Roman treachery. Later, when some Lusitanian leaders prepared to make a new agreement with the Romans after a major loss of lives to the Roman army, Viriathus reminded them of Galba's trick and proposed a Lusitanian War against the Romans. The Lusitanians cried with joy.

Viriathus organized an attack against enemy's legions. Since the Romans were better armed, he organized guerrilla tactics and sprung imaginative ambushes. Charging with iron spears, short swords and roars, the Lusitanians clashed and defeated many enemy armies, keeping Iberia Peninsula free from Roman control.

mud.name: In Ancient Times
mud.desc: We are in the building stages of our mud. Hiring for all positions. Stop by if interested, alot to come in the future!!!

mud.name: DragonBall Xtreme
mud.desc: Welcome to the original Dragonball Xtreme, under new administration!

The sister mud of Dragonball Arena, Dragonball Xtreme (formally Dragonball Arena2) has been up since 2000, and runs a unique codebase that has been mimicked but never perfectly copied, where nothing in combat is automated. Charge an attack as long as you like or as long as your Ki can handle it and its power will reflect how long you gathered your energy.

Roleplaying is greatly encouraged, and stories and sagas are run by our RP staff and quest imms. Special attacks, gear, and power up messages are available through RP rewards, allowing you to customize your character to your liking. Famous Dragonball characters are rare, however, as we prefer to make our world more unique and we urge our players to make their characters unique, as well.

Our quest staff offers monthly quests, and personally tailored quests from certain IMMs, available when they are. Dragonballs, tournaments (both RP and code,) and other major events are scheduled every other month, and is tailored to appeal to all tiers and types of players.
So come and join us and find yourself in the new Xtreme! Battle and lore all await you!

mud.name: Caerlon Chronicles
mud.desc: Caerlon was established in the year 2004 by Kira. It is currently being transformed into a player-killing MUD.
Caerlon offers three types of player-killing, NPK/OPK/RPK. Everyone should be able to find something that they enjoy taking part in.

There are several unique and interesting features that have been implemented, such as player accounts, tents for healing, realistic game-world side map, freeze tag, campaigns and autoquests, mining and forging, a multi-user arena, multi-object automated auction system, adoption and family creation, free-for-all war tournaments or level-based tournaments, hidden items and secret doors, player homes, food/item delivery services, hot potato, an automated scrabble game system, and much more. The best way to learn about all of the different features is to simply visit Caerlon and explore.

Caerlon offers roleplaying options such as roleplaying points, which when earned, players gain more experience than normal, an IC channel and roleplaying note board. One can also turn on a roleplaying flag to show that he or she is only in RP mode.

mud.name: City of Angels
mud.desc: City of Angels is a MUSH based on the TV show

mud.name: SC: Heroes of Space
mud.desc: Highwind Station, a launching point of great enterprises, large and small. The ships it sees range from medium class battle cruisers down to floating carpets. Its luxurious accommodations are as diverse as its clientele, fit for man or beast. For the man of action, the sports arena features local teams, blood events and animal racing(Chocobos are especially popular beasts for betting rings). For the more sophisticated, Highwind's shopping and leisure areas are clean and stocked with exotic goods from both Gaia bound merchants and visiting alien species. Heroes of Space is an Adventure game set in a Soft Sci Fi universe. The action centers on Highwind Station, a recently constructed outpost for the people of Gaia, whom are, galactically speaking, quite new to the entire space going idea. Being a world of magic, their technology tends to show it, with dirty shortcuts taken wherever magic would work as well. Even their bodies require magic to function properly, which necessitates magic reserves just as important as fuel depots, limiting the range of the Gaian people. This has not muted their thirst for excitement and profit, however, and the risk is well worth the prizes out there in the hostile spaces. Are you ready to be a hero? All types welcome. Few heroes are entirely clean. Most are in it for themselves on one level or another. What's your angle? Sign the dotted line with Odin Industries and we won't pry much further. You make us profit, and we'll keep your ship running. It's quite a deal! A fair warning, Heroes of Space is currently Open Beta. What does this mean: The values of given powers or ship parts may adjust, new code may come into existence, old code may fade away if it proves it can't work. Rules are being tested, and are not wrought in stone, or even terribly hardened clay. What it does not mean: Your actions don't mean anything. They do, the story is officially launched with this prologue chapter. You WILL be able to take the character you make and move forward into the non beta of the game without losing your stuff.

mud.name: Realms of Redemption
mud.desc: These are the Realms of Redemption, a discworld-based lpmud offering endless adventure to those powerful enough. It is a world of astounding beauty and terrifying evil, where creatures long since regarded as legendary beings are abundant; with paths of light and shadow available to any who choose to walk them. Come join us on an epic tale that is yet to be written by your own hand.

RoR is a balanced and modified version of the classic \"Realms of the Dragon\", \"Hellbound\", \"Waters Edge\", and \"Dawn of Dragons\" LP Muds. Anyone who enjoys(ed) playing on any of those muds will like Realms of Redemption.

mud.name: The Third Turning
mud.desc: Set during the onset of the Trolloc Wars, this is the third age in a time when peace was not known. Under the recently enacted Compact of Ten Nations the nations of man struggle to reform civilization after the Breaking and to find their place even as the forces of Shadow prepare to fight on without their master, the Dark One. Come, join the developing world and help leave your mark.
We offer the following features:

*Original Wheel of Time Magic System - So much more than just a revamped cast *Randomly Generated Objects *Interesting Area Quests *Rewarding Exploration System *Weapon Mastery System offering new combat experiences *Extended Colors for more advanced clients (Zmud, Cmud and Mush for instance) *Nonstandard Wheel of Time Setting - How many other places explore anything other than the book setting? *Open-ended Story - Follow the series' story or don't. Your choices will help change the face of the world. *Responsive World - Get together and start a new group... take over a city... the areas here aren't set in stone. Things change. *Skill Tree System - Make a character that is what you really want to play. *Infinite Levelling System - Reach 90 and the real game begins as you shape yourself *(In Progress) Detailed Crafting System allowing original creations *(In Progress) Spark System allowing progression into legendary talents. *(In Progress) Advanced Pet System allowing you to treat them as more than just the standard charmie.

While we're currently in development, the game has reached a playable beta state and we're always happy to see new faces whether they want to play around and test or take part in creating a whole new experience.
If you don't know the Wheel of Time series, come learn why millions love it. We promise that by the time you log off, you may too.

mud.name: OriginalAuroraMUD
mud.desc: AuroraMUD is not a hack and slash world.
It is primarily puzzle based and chat based.
Set in the modern day world, maybe America, maybe Australia.
Aurora has been a around since 1995, with a 2 year hiatus since 2005.
It's just come back and is looking for new players.
With tons of quests to solve, AuroraMUD has something for everyone.
We welcome anybody with brains and intelligence.

mud.name: Tales From the Black
mud.desc: TFB is based on the Firefly television series and uses the rules and additional setting information contained in the Serenity RPG. The game is set five years after the events of the Serenity movie and will focus exclusively on original PCs, feature characters are not permitted.
Be aware that the game is still in the very early development stages and is unlikely to be ready for even

mud.name: Dysfunction
mud.desc: Just thought I'd throw up a copy of Dystopia 2 for fun...Chances are I will get bored and throw some new content in here, and XP will be far higher than it usually was to encourage fast growth and PK. If you liked D2, come play!
-Micro

mud.name: The Evolution of Esos Mud
mud.desc: The Evolution of Esos is a role-play intensive world where you immerse yourself in the character of your choosing. Role-play in this game world is not only accepted but strictly enforced. The EoE Staff is highly interactive with the player base, both In Character and Out of Character, in an effort to assist the mud in its development. The events in the mud unfold not unlike a storybook, authored by YOU, the player. In this story you will become your character, having adventures untold and living your days in a fantastic, highly descriptive and expansive game world.

Although the mud is completely functional, it is still being developed each and every day, with more additions planned for the future, and can be expected in some manner on a daily basis, whether it be descriptions, special request items, or just about anything your mind can think up that fits into the gameworld. Through the combined effort of the community of players and the staff, the mud itself will always be a work in progress, as we strive to create something bold and unique in flavor. Such additions include vast area building, code changes, new races, mobs, objects and plots. The EoE Staff is quite willing to tailor specific objects to player needs, as valuable role-playing tools or resources from the character s background. The work that you put into your character is more valuable to us than the little time that it takes to craft an object to assist in your role-playing experience, so this is done quickly and with ease. We appreciate YOUR effort as players, parts of the evergrowing tale, and fellow roleplayers.

Players start out by choosing a class, representing the inborn talents. From there, the sky's the limit. Players can learn anything, including hunting, bow shooting, horseback riding, carriage piloting, fishing, swimming, mining for different metals, taking those metals and forging them into useful weapons, an extensive crafting system that allows you to create everything from a simple threading needle to an elaborate tribal headdress, farming, lock smithing, climbing, swimming, guarding, and bartering. The list goes on and on, ending with a very unique magic system. However, just like in real life, if you spread yourself too far and too thin, you shouldn't expect to become a professional. The only skills that a character can NOT learn, are skills based on a magical class, which is restricted to that class and that class alone. This skill system allows the player to truly tailor their characters to their own experiences and their physical abilities and talents will grow and thrive based on what you do, how often, and how intensely you roleplay each and every situation you find yourself in.

EoE is not a hack-n-slash MUD. Roleplaying is strictly enforced according to the documentations and timeline, and appropriate guidelines provided on this webpage. This does NOT mean that you cannot go against the grain! It will however show you what the average elf knows and expects to see, making a character that 'goes against the grain' more informed and playable. We suggest you read the parts of the webpage that are most likely where you want to take your character in game. As things grow and change, more will be added: skills, magic, items, beasts... you can expect that at least five new items, five new npc's, and five new rooms will be added on a daily basis. Plot movement is done on an eighty percent player-driven level. Beyond that, recommended playtimes and such, are open ended. We have no expectations on how such times come out, and have a wide variety of tools at are disposal to keep things moving. You will have fun! You will have a say! Your character will have an impact!

***********************DISCLAIMER************************* The Evolution of Esos sometimes contains adult oriented material, including violence and sometimes sexually graphic material. It is the staff policy for all players to be eighteen years of age. *****************************************************************

mud.name: DragonBall: Dimensions
mud.desc: Four hundred years after the death of Goku, the universe has seen a great long time of peace and prosperity. Things, though, seem to be taking a turn toward fighting, even open warfare. The Intergalactic Space Police struggle against the invading forces of Crimson Imperium, while the Alliance of Free Trade (space pirates) eat at their very core, taking what they want and leaving nothing in their wake. To make matters even worse, Sereitei, home of the benevelant Shinigami, as well as Hueco Mundo, home of the wretched Hollow, have both been taken over, pushing both into our world. Unique races and attacks, options of open PVP training areas (with increased rewards) and closed PVP training areas, fully custom areas, and more await you on the adventure you'll never forget!

mud.name: Realm of Dragons
mud.desc: 9 Different skills to level up 4 Quests to complete for rewards 7 Different character classes to choose from A huge map to explore and venture on Around 250 different monsters to find and slay Guilds and Strongholds, which leads to Guild battles! A Duel Arena, to interact and fight with other players Many towns and areas to explore. A player trading market An in game Forum and Player Chat Regular updates And best of all, its free!

mud.name: Realms of Talos
mud.codebase: [CoffeeMud] Modified underlying code and player relating systems
mud.desc: Wrath of Talos is a under-development mud that is currently very stable yet is lacking an original world. If you would like to visit (talos.divineright.org 4444) you can take a look around and send us any feedback either via the ingame channels or the admin email listed on this page. The game is slowly being developed towards being a relatively large high fantasy environment taking full advantage of our advanced features and heavy skill and spell lists. All content is being reworked so please pop by and take a look.

mud.name: assault mud
mud.desc: wellcome to assault mud 4.0! This is a pure PK mud featuring a wide selection of guns, vehicles and armor equipment. This mud is loosly based off the mud assault that shut down in 2006, with some new features added.

mud.name: London Underground
mud.desc: Under the city streets of London lies a world of Magic and wonder... This is known as the Underworld. Down here, deep in the unused subway tunnels and caverns beneath the rail system lies an entire world that goes unnoticed by the banal humans above. The people of the UnderWorld are as widely varied as those in the World Above. A mix of cultures make up the population, as is the case with any large city. Some of these cultures are similar to those that you would find in the streets of the city above you, but mixed in with these familiar strangers are those that are stranger still: the Freaks, the Legendaries, each as individual as a snowflake. The Lost, out of times past, and the Nomads, who have no such past. Manufactured beings like the Junkmen, the definition of

mud.name: The Last Outpost
mud.codebase: [Dikumud] Started with Diku Gamma 0.0 in 1991, been adding to it ever since.
mud.desc: Three generations ago, The Empire was overrun. The Last Outpost, a small coastal trading community located deep in the wild, was spared from most of the fighting and survived. Life in the Outpost is not easy, and many of the finer things from the old Empire are absent. The residents of the Outpost are descended from the survivors of The Fall, a tough and adventurous breed. They are well suited to the task of reclaiming the land once tamed by their forefathers.
The Last Outpost accepts both IPv4 and IPv6 connections.

mud.name: The Demigod Files
mud.desc: Summer of 2012 has begun. Most of the Gods have laid claim to their errant children by now, most demigods know of their parentage. Summer has been particularly harsh -- restless. The monster are becoming more and more unbearable, forcing more and more demigods to Camp Halfblood to avoid getting eaten. There's something ominous in the air something stirring. The Gods, aware of this, have sent Percy, Annabeth, and Grover out on a scouting mission into the world as the camp's most decorated heroes. Something big is coming.
Something wicked comes this way.
The Mayan calendar mysteriously ends on December 21, 2012. Could this really be the end of the world as we know it?

Based off of the children book's series Percy Jackson and the Olympians by Rick Riordan, The Demigod Files offers an interactive roleplaying experience set in Camp Halfblood, in which good isn't always good, bad isn't always bad, and camp isn't always what is seems. The time to make a hero, or even a villain, is now.
Whatever it may be, it's now your turn to write your own epic adventure of Homeric proportions.
The Demigod Files offers:

* Dice-less, freeform system, based heavily on RP * Emphasis on personal TPs for every character a commitment to see heroes grow * Overarching game metaplot * Quick and hassle-free CGen, with room for original skills and no limits on gods. * The very real opportunity to shape the game into what is desired.
Website: http://demigod.wikidot.com/ Connect: demigod.dyndns.org:4206

mud.name: New Test Mud
mud.desc: This is a test listing.

mud.name: New Test Mud
mud.desc: This is a test listing.

mud.name: Test MUD XXII
mud.desc: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vivamus sed dolor. Suspendisse potenti. Phasellus est erat, porttitor sed, dictum in, venenatis sit amet, metus. Pellentesque vel augue id felis pellentesque sagittis. Proin auctor aliquet nisl. Nunc cursus ligula sed arcu. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae; Nullam id tellus ornare nibh cursus porta. Integer sed arcu vitae lectus ornare auctor. Nullam a est vitae risus pharetra ultrices. Fusce molestie.

mud.name: Eternia
mud.desc: Disappear into a place of unfathomable enchantment; a place of your Eternal dream. Drown yourself in the rich atmosphere of the imagination and breathtaking stories. Retreat from the restraints of your daily life. Become intoxicated by every spectrum of emotion as you breath life into your characters.
Enjoy a world inspired by the very people who play them. Come live in worlds of dreams. Come to your Eternal Escape.

Eternia, along with Eternal Escapes community, is at the very beginning of its creation. We are currently looking for -CODERS- and anyone that possess an imagination, who would be willing to start from scratch, becoming apart of the founding team.
Mini-versions of Eternia have been ran on pre-built/temporary platforms.The test became popular. If you would like to learn more and are interested, please contact me at, *** pakhnu@email.com.
Please, also feel free to visit,
*** eternalescapes.bb3host.com.
